AK.03.01.052ab sundaraṃ ruciraṃ cāru suṣamaṃ sādhu śobhanam .
AK.03.01.052cd kāntaṃ manoramaṃ rucyaṃ manojñaṃ mañju mañjulam .. 52 ..
(ramyaṃ manoharaṃ saumyaṃ bhadrakaṃ rāmaṇīyakam . )
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.052>  
sundaramiti—suṣṭhu nandayatīti sundaram . ʻṭunadi samṛddhaü . ruciṃ manaḥprītiṃ rāti dadātīti ruciram . ʻrā dāne . carati mano'sminniti cāru . ʻcara gataü . suṣṭhu samatvamatrāstīti suṣamam . sādhnoti sidhyatīti sādhu . ʻsādha saṃsiddhaü . śobhata iti śobhanam . ʻśubha dīptaü . kāmyata iti kāntam . ʻkamu kāntaü . mano ramayatīti manoramam . ʻramu krīḍāyām . mano haratīti manoharamiti vā pāṭhaḥ . rocata iti rucyam . ʻruca dīptāvabhiprītau cö . manasā jñeyaṃ manojñam . ʻjñā avabodhane . sarvairmanyata iti mañju . mañjulaṃ ca . ʻmana jñāne . manoharavastunāmāni .. 52 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.052>  
sundaraṃ—mañjulam . sundarādayo dvādaśa śabdāḥ sarveṣāmanukūlavedanīyasya vastuno vācakāḥ . suṣṭhu ādaro yatreti sundaram . gaurādipāṭhāt (4. 1. 41) sādhuḥ . ata eva striyāṃ ṅīṣ (4. 1. 41) .. ruciṃ prītiṃ rāti dadātīti ruciram .. carati mano'sminniti cāru . ʻcara gataü . ʻdṛsanijani caricaṭibhyo ñuṇ (u. 1. 3) iti ñuṇ . atra dvyanubandhagrahaṇaṃ ʻjanivadhyoścö (7. 3. 35) iti vṛddhipratiṣedho mā bhūdityevamarthaṃ kṛtam .. sarveṣāmapyabhilāṣaviṣayatvena tulyatayā suṣṭhu samaṃ suṣamam . ʻsuvinirdurbhyaḥ supisūtisamāḵ (8. 3. 88) iti ṣatvam .. sādhnoti sukhasādhanatayeti sādhu . ʻsādha saṃsiddhau . ʻkṛvāpāji . . . ityādinā (u. 1. 1) uṇpratyayaḥ .. śobhata iti śobhanam . ʻśubha dīptaü . ʻanudāttetaśca halādeḵ (3. 2. 149) iti yuc .. kāmyata iti kāntam . ʻkamu kāntaü . ktaḥ (3. 2. 102) . kasya sukhasya anto niścayo 'treti vā .. mano haratyākarṣati svādhīnaṃ karotīti manoharam . ʻharateranudyamane'c (3. 2. 9) ityac . kecit mano ramayatīti vyutpattyā manoramamiti paṭhanti .. rocata iti rucyam . ʻruca dīptaü . ʻrājasūyasūryamṛṣodyarucya. . .  (3. 1. 114) ityādinipātanāt sādhutvam .. manasā jñāyata iti manojñam . ʻdvandvamanojñādibhyaścö (5. 1. 133) iti nirdeśāt sādhutvam .. dravyavacanād mañjuśabdād bhāvamātravivakṣāyāṃ matvarthīye lacpratyaye sati śyāmaśyāmalamṛdumṛdulaśabdavad mañju mañjulamiti śabdadvayamapi samārtham .. 52 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.052>  
sundaraṃ—majjulam . śobhananāmāni . ʻcakṣuṣyaṃ subhagaṃ ramyaṃ laṭahaṃ hāri valgu cö . etāni ṣaṭ ca .. 52 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.053ab tadāsecanakaṃ tṛpternāstyanto yasya darśanāt
AK.03.01.053cd abhīṣṭe'bhīpsitaṃ hṛdyaṃ dayitaṃ vallabhaṃ priyam .. 53 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.053>  
taditi—āsicyate āpyāyate dṛgindriyamaneneti āsecanakam . ʻṣica kṣaraṇe . yasya darśanāt tṛpteranto nāsti tasya candramaṇḍalādernāma .. ābhimukhyeneṣyate prāpyata iti abhīṣṭam . ʻiṣa gataü . ābhimukhyenāptumiṣṭam abhīpsitam . ʻāplṛ vyāptaü . hṛdayasya priyaṃ hṛdyam . dayate cittamādatta iti dayitam . ʻdaya dānagatirakṣaṇahiṃsādāneṣü . vallate prīṇātīti vallabham . ʻvalla prītaü . prīṇātīti priyam . ʻprīñ tarpaṇe kāntau cö . priyavastuno nāmāni .. 53 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.053>  
tadāsecanakaṃ—darśanāt . yasya candramaṇḍalādeḥ darśanāt cakṣurādīnāṃ tṛpteranto nāsti, kiṃtu punaḥpunaḥ didṛkṣādyatiśaya eva bhavati taccandramaṇḍalādikam āsecanakamucyate . āsicyate āpūryate dṛgindriyādikam aneneti āsecanakam . ʻṣica kṣaraṇe . āṅpūrvaḥ . lyuṭ (3. 3. 117) . ʻsaṃjñāyāṃ kan (5. 3. 75) . subhūticandrastu hrasvādimāha . na siñcanti na kṣaranti cakṣurādīnyasmāditi asecanakamiti . sarvānando'pi hrasvatvamevāha (ṭī. sa. pṛ. 25, ślo. 51) .. abhīṣṭe—priyam . icchāviṣayasya vastuno nāmāni . ābhimukhyena iṣyata ityabhīṣṭam . ʻiṣu icchāyām . ktaḥ (3. 2. 102) . ābhimukhyenāptumiṣṭam abhīpsitam . ʻāplṛ vyāptaü . san (3. 1. 7) . ʻāpjñapyṛdhāmīt (7. 4. 55) . ktaḥ (3. 2. 102) .. ʻhṛdayasya priyaḵ (4. 4. 95) iti hṛdayaśabdāt yat . ʻhṛdayasya hṛllekhayadaṇlāseṣü (6. 3. 50) iti hṛdādeśaḥ .. dayyate yācyata iti dayitam . ʻdaya dānagatirakṣaṇayācaneṣü . ktaḥ .. vallate prīṇayatīti vallabham . valliḥ sautro dhātuḥ . ʻrāsivallibhyāṃ cö (u. 3. 125) ityabhacpratyayaḥ .. prīṇātīti priyam . ʻprīñ tarpaṇe . igupadhetyādinā (3. 1. 135) kaḥ .. 53 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
%%p. 03.076
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.053>  
tadāsecanakaṃ—darśanāt . yasya vastuno darśanāt tṛpteranto nāsti tat āsecanakaṃ syāt .. abhīṣṭe—priyam . priyavastunāmāni .. ʻhṛdispṛgghṛdayaṃgamam . ete dve ca .. 53 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
AK.03.01.054ab nikṛṣṭapratikṛṣṭārvarephayāpyāvamādhamāḥ .
AK.03.01.054cd kupūyakutsitāvadyakheṭagarhyāṇakāḥ samāḥ .. 54 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.054>  
nikṛṣṭeti—nikṛṣyate tiraskriyata iti nikṛṣṭaḥ . pratikṛṣṭaśca . ʻkṛṣa vilekhane arvati śreyolavamanugacchatīti arvā . nānto'yam . ʻarva gataü . riphati hinasti dūṣayatīti rephaḥ . ʻripha katthanayuddhanindāhiṃsādāneṣü . yāpyante guṇā yasmād dūṣyanta iti yāpyaḥ . ʻyā prāpaṇe . avamatvād adhamatvād avamaḥ . adhamatvād adhamaḥ . kutsitaṃ yathā bhavati tathā pūyate viśīryata iti kupūyaḥ . ʻpūyī viśaraṇe . kutsyate sabhyairiti kutsitaḥ . ʻkutsa avakṣepaṇe . na udyate nocyata ityavadyaḥ . ʻvada vyaktāyāṃ vāci . kheṭati sabhyairākṣipyata iti kheṭaḥ . ʻkhiṭa trāse . sabhyairgarhyata iti garhyaḥ . ʻgarha kutsāyām . aṇati bahu jalpatītyaṇakaḥ . ʻaṇa śabde . jātyā hīnasya nāmāni .. 54 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.054>  
nikṛṣṭa—aṇakāḥ samāḥ . nikṛṣyate nikṛṣṭaḥ . pratikṛṣyate pratikṛṣṭaḥ . ʻkṛṣa vilekhane . upasargadvayaṃ nyagbhāve vartata iti upasargavṛttau . yathā—nikṛtaḥ pratikṣipta iti .. arvati sevārtham anyamupagacchatīti arvā . ʻarva gataü . vanippratyayaḥ (3. 2. 75) . ʻarvaṇastrasāvanañaḵ (6. 4. 127) iti prāptastrādeśastu aśvavacanasyaiva nānyasya, prayogāṇāmadarśanāt iti vaijayantīvyākhyāyāmuktam .. riphati sarvatra kalahaṃ karotīti rephaḥ . ʻripha katthanayuddhanindāhiṃsādāneṣü . pacādyac (3. 1. 134) . akārāntaḥ . ʻravarṇe puṃsi rephaḥ syāt kutsite vācyaliṅgavat iti phakārānteṣu mārtaṇḍenābhidhānāt .. yāpyante guṇā asmāditi yāpyaḥ . ʻyāpye pāśap (5. 3. 47) iti nirdeśāt sādhuḥ . yāpayatyātmānaṃ kṛcchrajīvaneneti vā yāpyaḥ . ṇici pugāgame (7. 3. 36) ʻaco yat (3. 1. 97) iti yat .. avas adhas ityetau dvāvupasargau nikarṣārthau . nikarṣo'syāstīti avamaḥ, adhamaśca . ʻavo'dhasorlopaścö iti vaktavyādubhābhyāmapi nipātābhyāṃ matvarthīyo makpratyayaḥ . salopaśca .. kutsitaṃ pūyate viśīrṇo bhavatīti kupūyaḥ . ʻpūyī viśaraṇe . pacādyac (3. 1. 134) . laghūpadhatvābhāvād guṇābhāvaḥ (7. 3. 86) .. kutsā saṃjātā asyeti kutsitaḥ . tārakāditvāditac (5. 2. 36) .. nodyate nocyate na praśasyata ityavadyaḥ . ʻvada vyaktāyāṃ vāci . ʻavadyapaṇyavaryā garhyapaṇitavyānirodheṣü (3. 1. 101) iti nañpūrvāt vaderyatpratyayānto garhyarūpārthe nipātitaḥ .. kheṭati satpuruṣāniti kheṭaḥ . ʻkhiṭa uttrāsane . uttrāsanaṃ bhayajananamiti dhātuvṛttau (mā. dhā. pṛ. 109) . ac .. sarbhyairgahyata iti garhyaḥ . ʻgarha kutsāyām . ʻṛhalorṇyat (3. 1. 124) .. aṇati bahu jalpatīti aṇaḥ . ac (3. 1. 134) . ʻaṇateḥ kvun, hrasvādiḵ iti sarvānandaḥ (ṭī. sa. pṛ. 26) .. 54 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.054>  
nikṛṣṭe—adhamāḥ . ʻkheṭaṃ pāpaṃ ca rephaṃ ca saṃprāhuḵ iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 2. 182) . kupūya—aṇakāḥ samāḥ . nikṛṣṭanāmāni . anuktam—ʻsa syādalaṃjaḥ kiṃjaśca yasya janma nirarthakam . yasya puṃso janma vyarthaṃ sa alaṃjaḥ kiṃjaśca syāt .. 54 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.055ab malīmasaṃ tu malinaṃ kaccaraṃ maladūṣitam .
AK.03.01.055cd pūtaṃ pavitraṃ medhyaṃ ca vīdhraṃ tu vimalārthakam .. 55 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.055>  
malīmasamiti—malo'syāstīti malīmasam . malinaṃ ca . kutsitaṃ caratīti kaccaram . ʻcara gataü . maladūṣitasya nāmāni .. punāti dehādikamiti pūtam . pūyate'neneti pavitram . ʻpūñ pavane . medhanīyaṃ dehaśodhakatvāt saṃgamanīyaṃ medhyam . ʻmedhṛ saṃgamane . śuddhihetubhūtasya vastuno nāmāni .. viśeṣeṇa indhe dīpyata iti vīdhram . ʻñiindhī dīptaü . nirmalasphaṭikādernāma .. 55 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.055>  
malīmasaṃ—maladūṣitam . yat sahajena āgantukena vā kiṭṭādinā malena dūṣitaṃ sat vaivarṇyaṃ prāpitaṃ kāṃsyatāmrapātrādikaṃ tasya nāmāni . malo'syāstīti malīmasam . malinaṃ ca ʻjyotsnātamisrā . . . ityādisūtre (5. 2. 114) malaśabdād īmasacinacpratyayāntau malīmasamalinaśabdau dvāvapi matvarthe nipātitau .. kutsitaṃ caratīti kaccaram . carateḥ pacādyaci (3. 1. 134) ʻrathavadayoścö (6. 3. 102) iti cakārāt koḥ kadādeśaḥ (6. 3. 101) . kecidāhuḥ—kāśabdaḥ kutsitārthaḥ . tataśca kācara iti dīrghādiriti .. pūtaṃ pavitraṃ medhyaśca . pūtapavitraśabdau dvāvapi brahmavarge svabhāvaśuddhaparivrājakādivacanāvuktau (2. 7. 45) . iha tu dravyāntaraśuddhihetuvastuvacanādityapaunaruktyam . punāti dehādikamiti pūtam . pūyate'nena dehādikamiti pavitram . ʻpūñ pavane . itrapratyayaḥ (3. 2. 186) . śodhanadravyeṇa saṅgamanāya yogyo medhyaḥ . ʻmedhṛ saṅgame . ṇyatpratyayaḥ (3. 1. 124) .. vīdhraṃ tu vimalārthakam . svabhāvaśuddhasphaṭikādivacanaṃ vimalaśabdasamānārthamityarthaḥ . viśeṣeṇa indhe vīdhram . ʻñiindhī dīptaü . auṇādikaḥ kran pratyayaḥ (u. 2. 29) . kittvād upadhānakārasya lopaḥ (6. 4. 24) .. 55 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.055>  
malīmasaṃ—maladūṣitam . malavato nāmāni .. pūtaṃ—medhyaṃ ca . pavitranāmāni . ʻśivaṃ puṇyaṃ ca pāvanam . etāni trīṇi ca .. vīdhraṃ tu vimalārthakam . ʻvimale vīdhraṃ maline dvau kaccaramalīmasaü iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 206, ślo. 66) . nirmalanāmāni .. 55 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.056ab nirṇiktaṃ śodhitaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ niḥśodhyamanavaskaram .
AK.03.01.056cd asāraṃ phalgu śūnyaṃ tu vaśikaṃ tucchariktake .. 56 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.056>  
nirṇiktamiti—nirṇijyate śodhyata iti nirṇiktam . ʻṇijir śaucapoṣaṇayoḵ . śodhyata iti śodhitam . ʻśudha śauce . mṛjyata iti mṛṣṭam . ʻmṛjūṣ śuddhaü . nirgataṃ śodhyāt parityājyāditi niḥśodhyam . avidyamāno'vaskaro'syeti anavaskaram . śodhitadravyanāmāni .. na sāro'syetyasāram . śīghrameva phalatīti phalgu . ʻñiphalā viśaraṇe . niḥsārasya tūlādernāmanī .. bādhakābhāvena śune hitaṃ śūnyam . vaśyate kāmyate upaveśanāyeti vaśikam . ʻvaśa kāntaü . tudati śūnyatvāt manaḥ kleśayatīti tuccham . ʻtuda vyathane . ricyate vastubhirhīyata iti riktakam . ʻricir virecane . vastuvirahitasya gṛhādernāmāni .. 56 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.056>  
nirṇiktaṃ—anavaskaram . vastragālanaprakṣālanādibhirapasāritaheyabhāgasya dravyasya nāmāni . nirṇijyate śodhyata iti nirṇiktam . ʻṇijir śaucapoṣaṇayoḵ ktaḥ (3. 2. 102) . ʻupasargādasamāse'pi ṇopadeśasyö (8. 4. 14) iti ṇatvam .. śodhyata iti śodhitam . ʻśudha śauce . ṇici ktapratyayaḥ . mṛjyate mṛṣṭam . ʻmṛjuṣ śuddhaü . ʻvraścabhrasjasṛjamṛja . . . ityādinā (8. 2. 36) ṣatvam .. niṣkrāntaṃ śodhyāt pariharaṇīyabhāgād iti niḥśodhyam .. iha avaskaraśabdena varcaskavācinā tyājyaṃ vastumātraṃ lakṣyate . avidyamāno'vaskaro yatra ityanavaskaram .. asāraṃ phalgu . yat sārabhāgarahitaṃ śigrukāṣṭhādikam, yacca tato'nyadapi upādeyāṃśarahitaṃ vākyādikaṃ tatsarvaṃ phalguśabdenocyate . phalati niḥsāratvena śīghraṃ viśīryata iti phalgu . ʻñiphalā viśaraṇe . auṇādika upratyayaḥ gugāgamaśca (u. 1. 18) . śūnyaṃ tu—riktake . svasamucitamanuṣyādyādheyarahitasya gṛhādernāmāni . yathā—śūnyaṃ gṛham, śūnyo ghaṭa ityādi . śune hitaṃ śūnyam . ʻugavādibhyo yat ityatra ʻśunaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ vā ca dīrghatvam (ga. sū. 5. 1. 2) iti gaṇasūtre śvanśabdasya yatpratyaye parataḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati, vikalpena dīrghaśca .. janāntarānavaruddhatvena vaśaḥ svādhīnatvamatrāstīti vaśikam . ʻvaśa kāntaü . matvarthe ṭhan pratyayaḥ .. ʻtuda vyathane ityasmāt saṃpadādikvipi (vā. 3. 3. 94) tucchabdo duḥkhavacanaḥ . tudaṃ śyati saṃbandharahitatvena tanūkaroti, chyati chinattīti, tuccham . ʻśo tanūkaraṇe ʻcho chedane iti vā dhātuḥ . ʻāto'nupasarge kaḵ (3. 2. 3) . ricyate pṛthagavasthitavastubhirviyujyata iti riktam . ʻricir virecane . ktapratyayaḥ (3. 2. 102) . kutvaṃ ca (8. 2. 30) . svārthe kan (5. 4. 5) .. 56 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

klība iti—pradhatte svopasarjanībhūtaṃ dhārayatīti pradhānam . prakṛṣṭaṃ mukhamiva priyamānasatvamasyeti pramukhaḥ . prakṛṣṭo vekaḥ pṛthaktvamasti asāmānyamasyeti pravekaḥ . asmāduttamo nāstītyanuttamaḥ . udgatānām utkṛṣṭānāmayam atiśayenonnata iti uttamaḥ . mukhamiva pradhānaṃ priyamānasatvamasyeti mukhyaḥ . varaṇīyo varyaḥ . vareṇyaśca . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . prakarṣeṇa bṛhati svaśeṣabhūtānuddharatīti prabarhaḥ . ʻbṛhū udyamane . gaṇasyānaparārdhe mukhyabhāge bhavo vartamāno'naparārdhyaḥ . parārdhyaśca . anavarārdhya iti vā pāṭhaḥ . gaṇakāryamakṛtvā na gacchatītyagraḥ . prāgraṃ sabhāyāṃ mukhyasthānaṃ haratīti prāgraharaḥ . prāgre mukhyasthāne bhavo vartamānaḥ prāgryaḥ . agre mukhyasthāne bhavo vartamāno'gryaḥ . agriyaḥ, agrīyaśca . mukhyanāmāni .. 57 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

stokālpa—kṛśaṃ tanu . bahvavayavārabdhāpekṣayā nyūnāvayavārabdhasya nāmāni . stūyata iti stokaḥ . ʻstokāntika. . .  (2. 1. 39) iti nirdeśāt sādhuḥ . alyate nivāryata ityalpam . ʻala bhūṣaṇādaü . ʻbahvalpārthāt . . . (5. 4. 42) iti nirdeśāt sādhuḥ .. kṣullakaśabdaḥ pāmare niruktaḥ (2. 10. 16) .. sūcyata iti sūkṣmam . ʻsūca paiśunye . ʻsūceḥ sman (u. 4. 178) iti sman .. śliṣyati sarvatra lagno bhavatīti ślakṣṇam . ʻśliṣeraccopadhāyāḵ (u. 3. 19) iti ksna pratyayaḥ upadhāyā akārādeśaśca . ʻṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si (8. 2. 41) iti ṣakārasya kakāraḥ . ʻiṇ koḵ ityādinā (8. 3. 59) ṣatvaṃ, ṇatvaṃ ca (8. 4. 1) .. dabhyate kṣipyata nipātanāt sādhutvam . niṣṭhātakārasya lopaḥ, iḍāgamābhāvaśca .. tanuśabdaḥ śarīre vyutpāditaḥ (2. 6. 71) .. striyāṃ mātrā—kaṇāṇavaḥ . parimāṇālpaviśrāntisthānasya paramāṇvādernāmāni . mātrā ca truṭiśceti kṛtadvandvasamāsābhyāmapi ʻstriyām iti padaṃ saṃbadhyate . ʻpuṃsi iti padaṃ tu lavādibhiścaturbhiriti ṣaṇṇāmapi viśeṣyanighnatvaṃ nāstīti darśitam .. svagatagurutvajñānāya tulayā mīyate paricchidyata iti mātrā . ʻmā māne . tran (u. 4. 169) .. truṭyate chidyata iti truṭiḥ . ʻtruṭa chedane . ʻigupadhāt kiḵ (u. 4. 120) ityauṇādikaḥ kiḥ .. lūyate chidyata iti lavaḥ (3. 3. 57) .. liśati 147) . ac (3. 1. 134) .. gurutvātiśayābhāvād nodanābhighātayorasaṃbhavena śabdotpattau kāraṇābhāvād viruddhalakṣaṇayā aṇati śabdāyata ityaṇuḥ . ʻaṇa śabde . ʻaṇaścö (u. 1. 8) ityauṇādika upratyayaḥ .. atyalpe—aṇīya ityapi . svalpaparimāṇadravyāntarāpekṣayā nyūnaparimāṇadravyasya nāmāni . atiśayenālpam alpiṣṭham . ʻatiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanaü (5. 3. 55) ityalpaśabdād iṣṭhan pratyayaḥ . ʻdvivacanavibhajya . . . ityādinā (5. 3. 57) īyasun pratyaye alpīyaḥ . ʻyuvālpayoḥ kananyatarasyām (5. 3. 64) ityalpaśabdasya vikalpena kan ityādeśe kanīyaḥ . kaniṣṭhaśabdasyāpyupalakṣaṇametat .. AK.03.01.063ab prabhūtaṃ pracuraṃ prājyamadabhraṃ bahulaṃ bahu .
AK.03.01.063cd purubhūḥ puru bhūyiṣṭhaṃ sphāraṃ bhūyaśca bhūri ca .. 63 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.063>  
prabhūtamiti—svakāryamāpādayituṃ prabhavatīti prabhūtam . pracīyate bahubhiravayavairiti pracuram . ʻciñ cayane . bahūkartumekatra prājyate kṣipyata iti prājyam . ʻaja gatikṣepaṇayoḵ . na dabhramadabhram . baṃhate saṃgrahaṇena vardhata iti bahu . bahulaṃ ca . ʻbahi mahi vṛddhaü . purvityanayā saṃjñayā bhūyate 'nubhūyata iti purubhūḥ . puruhūriti vā pāṭhaḥ . pūryata iti puru . ʻpūrī āpyāyane . atiśayena bahu bhūyiṣṭham . bhūyaśca . sphāyate vardhata iti sphāram . ʻsphāyī vṛddhaü . analpatayā bhavatīti bhūri . ʻbhū sattāyām . analpasya nāmāni .. 63 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.063>  
prabhūtaṃ—bhūri ca . prabhavati samartho bhavatīti prabhūtam . ktaḥ (3. 4. 72) . prakarṣeṇa cīyate upacīyata iti pracuram .. prakarṣeṇa ajyate vyaktīkriyata iti prājyam . ʻañjū vyaktimrakṣaṇakāntigatiṣü . kyap pratyaye (vā. 3. 1. 109) ʻaniditāṃ . . .  (6. 4. 24) ityanunāsikalopaḥ .. dabhrādalpād anyad adabhram .. baṃhate vardhata iti bahu . ʻbahi mahi vṛddhau . ʻlaṅghibaṃhyornalopaścö (u. 1. 29) iti upratyayaḥ nalopaśca .. tato bhāvamātravacanād matvarthīye lac pratyaye śyāmalādiśabdavad bahulam .. piparti pūryate vā puru . ʻpṛ pālanapūraṇayoḵ . ʻpṛbhidivyadhigṛdhidhṛṣibhyaḵ (u. 1. 23) iti kupratyayaḥ . ʻudoṣṭhyapūrvasyö (7. 2. 102) ityutvam .. purubhiravayavairbhavatīti purubhūḥ . bhavateḥ kvip (3. 2. 76) .. ʻpuru ityanayā saṃjñayā hūyata iti puruhūḵ iti subodhinīkāraḥ ūṣmapadhāmāha . sarvānandastu (ṭī. sa. pṛ. 29) purūn harati hanti vā puruham . ʻanyeṣvapi dṛśyate (3. 2. 101) iti ḍapratyayaḥ, ityakārāntamūṣmopadhaṃ cāha .. atiśayena bahu bhūyiṣṭham . iṣṭhan pratyaye (5. 3. 55) ʻiṣṭhasya yiṭ cö (6. 4. 159) iti yiḍāgamaḥ, bahorbhūbhāvaśca (6. 4. 158) .. sphāyate vardhata iti sphāram . ʻsphāyī vṛddhaü . ʻsphāyitañci. . .  (u. 2. 13) iti rak . sphiramiti pāṭhe ʻajiraśiśiraśibiraśibilasthirasphirasthavirakhadirāḵ (u. 1. 56) ityauṇādikanipātanāt sphāyateḥ kirac pratyayaḥ, ākārayakārayorlopaśca .. bahuśabdād atiśāyanavivakṣāyām īyasun pratyaye (5. 3. 57) ʻbahorlopo bhū ca bahoḵ (6. 4. 158) iti bahorlope bhūbhāve ca bhūyaḥśabdaḥ . sakārāntaḥ .. analpatvena bhavatīti bhūri . krin pratyayaḥ (u. 4. 65) .. 63 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.063>  
prabhūtaṃ—prājyaṃ bahalaṃ bahulaṃ bahu . adabhraṃ bahulamiti pāṭhāntaram . puruhaṃ puru—bhūrī ca . bahulanāmāni .. ʻsamagraṃ puṣkalaṃ sphāramadabhramati mātrakam . etāni pañca ca .. 63 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.064ab paraḥśatādyāste yeṣāṃ parā saṃkhyā śatādikāt .
AK.03.01.064cd gaṇanīye tu gaṇeyaṃ saṃkhyāte gaṇitamatha samaṃ sarvam .. 64 ..
AK.03.01.065ab viśvamaśeṣaṃ kṛtsnaṃ samastanikhilākhilāni niḥśeṣam .
AK.03.01.065cd samagraṃ sakalaṃ pūrṇamakhaṇḍaṃ syādanūnake .. 65 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.064-65>  
paraḥśatādyā iti—yeṣāṃ saṃkhyeyānāṃ śatādikāt śatasahasrādikāt parā adhikā saṃkhyā yā vidyate tayā paraḥśatādyā bhavanti . ādigrahaṇena paraḥsahasrādayaḥ . gaṇitavyaṃ gaṇanīyam . gaṇeyaṃ ca . ʻgaṇa saṃkhyāne . saṃkhyeyasya tārakādernāmāni .. gaṇyate saṃkhyāyata iti gaṇitam . saṃkhyātasya kramukādernāma .. samati nyūnatvaṃ na prāpnotīti samam . ʻṣama avaikalye . sarvati svasaṃvandhivargopetaṃ gacchatīti sarvam . ʻṣarva gataü . viśatyaṃśena saha saṃviśatīti viśvam . ʻviśa praveśane . nāsti śeṣo'syetyaśeṣam . kṛtyate vyāpyate sthānādi karma vāneneti kṛtsnam . ʻkṛtī veṣṭane . samasyate ūrīkriyata iti samastam . ʻasu kṣepaṇe . khilādupekṣitāṃśād nivṛttaṃ nikhilam . nāsti khilamupekṣitāṃśo'treti akhilam . śeṣānniṣkrāntamiti niḥśeṣam . saṃgatamagramagrāṃśo'treti samagram . kalābhiḥ saha vartata iti sakalam . pūryata iti pūrṇam . ʻpūrī āpyāyane . na khaṇḍamakhaṇḍam . na vidyate ūnatvamatreti anunakam . abhinnasya puṭādernāmāni .. 64-5 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.064-65>  
paraḥśatādyāḥ—śatādikāt . atra śatādikād ityādiśabdena sahasrādīnāṃ grahaṇam . tataśca yeṣāṃ saṃkhyeyānāṃ gajaturagādīnāṃ saṃkhyā śatasahasrādeḥ parā adhikā bhavati te paraḥśataparaḥsahasrādiśabdairucyante . śatāt parā iti vigrahe ʻpañcamī (2. 1. 37) iti yogavibhāgāt samāse rājadantāditvāt (2. 2. 31) paraśabdasya pūrvanipāte pāraskarāditvāt (6. 1. 157) suḍāgame ca paraḥśatā aśvāḥ, paraḥśatānyaśvīyāni, paraḥkoṭayo gajatā ityādi bhavati . ʻālokayāmāsa harirmahīdharānadhiśrayantīrgajatāḥ paraḥśatāḵ iti māghaḥ (śiśu. 12. 50) . ʻbrahmādayo brahmahitāya taptvā paraḥsahasraṃ śaradastapāṃsi iti bhavabhūtiśca (u. ca. 1. 15) . atra sarvānandaḥ (ṭī. sa. pṛ. 30)— ʻgavāṃ paraḥśataṃ, gavāṃ paraḥsahasramityādi saṃkhyānamātre'pi napuṃsakaliṅgatvena prayogo'sti iti .. gaṇanīyaṃ tu gaṇeyam . gaṇanārhadravyasyaite nāmanī . ʻgaṇa saṃkhyāne iti caurādikādadantād dhātoḥ ʻtavyattavyānīyaraḵ (3. 1. 96) ityanīyar pratyaye gaṇanīyam . tata eva dhātoḥ ʻaco yat (3. 1. 97) iti yatpratyaye ʻkyasya vibhāṣȫ (6. 4. 50) ityanuvartamānasya vibhāṣāgrahaṇasya vyavasthitavibhāṣātvāt ʻṇeraniṭi (6. 4. 51) iti ṇilopābhāve gaṇeyamiti bhavati iti dhātupradīpikāyāmuktam . ʻgaṇyamiti tu cintyam iti sarvānandaḥ (ṭī. sa. pṛ. 30) . ʻgaṇereyaḵ iti auṇādikasūtreṇa eyapratyaye gaṇeyamiti subodhinīkāraḥ .. saṃkhyāte gaṇitam . niścitasaṃkhyāviśeṣasya kramukādidravyasya gaṇitamiti ktapratyayāntaṃ (3. 2. 102) nāma .. atha samaṃ sarvamityādi yasya vastunaḥ saṃbandhino loke vede vā prasiddhā yāvanto'vayavaguṇakarmādayaḥ santi mātrayāpi vaikalyarahitā bhavanti tāvatsaṃbandhaṃ tad dravyaguṇakarmādikamanūnamucyate . tatra samādayaḥ pūrṇāntāstrayodaśa śabdāḥ syuḥ .. atha samam—syādanūnake . samatīti samam . ʻṣama ṣṭama vaiklavye . ac (3. 1. 134) . vaikalyābhāvānnirbhīkatvena viruddhalakṣaṇayā vaiklavyaṃ draṣṭavyam . sarvādigaṇeṣu pāṭhādasya sarvanāmasaṃjñā .. sṛtamaneneti sarvam . ʻsṛ gataü . ʻsarvanighṛṣva . . . ityādinā (u. 1. 159) auṇādikasūtreṇa kartṛvyatiriktārthe vanpratyayāntaḥ sarvaśabdo nipātitaḥ .. viśatīti viśvam . ʻviśa praveśane . ʻaśūpruṣi . . . ityādinā (u. 1. 157) kvan pratyayaḥ .. avidyamānaḥ śeṣo'syeti aśeṣam .. kṛtyate tirodhīyate svādhāro'neneti kṛtsnam . ʻkṛtī veṣṭane . ʻkṛtyaśūbhyāṃ ksnaḵ (u. 3. 17) iti ksnaḥ .. samasyate svaguṇībhūtaiḥ ekīkriyata iti samastam . ʻasu kṣepaṇe . ktaḥ .. nivṛttaṃ khilamāhatamasmāditi nikhilam .. avidyamānaṃ khilamatretyakhilam .. niṣkrāntaṃ śeṣāditi niḥśeṣam .. saṃgatamagram agrabhāgo'syeti samagram .. kalābhiravayavaiḥ saha vartata iti sakalam .. vikalāvayavabhāgo hi khaṇḍamucyate . nāstyasya khaṇḍamityakhaṇḍam .. pūryate svāvayavairiti pūrṇam . ʻpūrī āpyāyane . ktaḥ (7. 2. 27) . pūritaparyāyo'pi pūrṇaśabdo'vagamyate . ādiśabdena puṣkalāvikalābhinnādīnāṃ grahaṇam .. ʻūna parihāṇe ityasmāt caurādikāt pacādyaci (3. 1. 134), svārthike kapratyayaḥ (5. 4. 5) . tato nañ samāse (2. 2. 6) sati anūnakam .. 64-5 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.064-65> 
paraḥśatādyāḥ—śatādikāt . yeṣāṃ saṃkhyeyānāṃ śatādikāt parā saṃkhyā te paraḥśatādyāḥ .
ʻsa javena patan paraḥśatānāṃ
patatāṃ vrāta ivāravaṃ vitene . (kirā. 13. 26)
iti vaiyadhikaraṇyenāpi prayogaḥ, ʻparaḥsahasraṃ kariṇāṃ mamāreḵ iti .. gaṇanīyaṃ tu gaṇeyam . saṃkhyātuṃ yogyasya nāmanī .. saṃkhyāte gaṇitam . saṃkhyātanāma .. atha samaṃ—syādanūnake . samastanāmāni . samaḥ samau same . samasmai . sameṣām . samaṃ sarvārtha iti niyamāditarārtheṣu sarvanāmasaṃjñā na bhavati . tena samāya samānāyetyarthaḥ . samānāṃ saṃvatsaraṇāmityarthaḥ . same sādhāvityarthaḥ . ʻsamā strī vatsare sādhusarvatulyeṣu vācyavat iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 237, ślo. 95) .. anuktam—ʻkhaṇḍanemonavikalāḵ . asamastanāmāni .. 64-5 ..  </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.066ab dhanaṃ nirantaraṃ sāndraṃ pelavaṃ viralaṃ tanu .
AK.03.01.066cd samīpe nikaṭāsannasaṃnikṛṣṭasanīḍavat .. 66 ..
AK.03.01.067ab sadeśābhyāśasavidhasamaryādasaveśavat .
AK.03.01.067cd upakaṇṭhāntikābhyarṇābhyagrā apyabhito'vyayam .. 67 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.066-67>  
ghanamiti—vāyujalādinā hanyata iti ghanam . ʻhana hiṃsāgatyoḵ . nirgatamantaramatreti nirantaram . saha andyate vadhyata iti sāndram . ʻadi bandhane . nibiḍasaṃyogāvayavasya goṇyādernāmāni .. pelyate kṣipyate śithilasaṃyogāvayaveṣviti pelavam . ʻpila kṣepe . viśeṣeṇāvayavānāmantaraṃ rātīti viralam . ʻrā dāne . tanyate vistīryata iti tanu . ʻtanu vistāre . śithilasaṃyogāvayavasya paṭādernāmāni .. saṃgatā āpo'treti samīpaḥ . nikaṭati vivadhnātīti nikaṭaḥ . ʻkaṭe varṣāvaraṇayoḵ . āsīdantyatretyāsannaḥ . ʻṣadlṛ viśaraṇe . saṃnikṛṣyate'smāditi saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ . ʻkṛṣa vilekhane . samānaṃ nīḍamasyeti sanīḍaḥ . samāno deśo'treti sadeśaḥ . abhyaśyate vyāpyata iti abhyāśaḥ . ʻaśū vyāptaü . samānā vidhā asyeti savidhaḥ . samānā maryādā atreti samaryādaḥ . samāno veśaḥ praveśo'treti saveśaḥ . upagataḥ kaṇṭhamityupakaṇṭhaḥ . anto'syāstīti antikaḥ . abhyardyate gamyata ityabhyarṇaḥ . ʻarda gataü . abhimukhamagramatretyabhyagraḥ . abhita ityavyayam . samīpasya nāmāni .. 66-7 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.066-67>  
ghanaṃ nirantaraṃ sāndram . dṛḍhāvayavasaṃyogasya prākārādyavayavino nāmāni . nibiḍāvayavatayā vāyvādibhirhanyata iti ghanam . ʻhana hiṃsāgatyoḵ . ʻmūrtau ghanaḵ (3. 3. 77) ityap pratyayaḥ, dhātorghanādeśaśca .. nirgatamantaram avayavavyavadhānamasyeti nirantaram .. svāvayavaiḥ saha andyate badhyata iti sāndram . ʻadi bandhane . rakpratyayaḥ .. pelavaṃ viralaṃ tanu . praśithilāvayavasaṃyogasya tūlapaṭādernāmāni ʻpila kṣepe iti dhātorghañ (3. 3. 18) . pelaśabdena śithilatvamucyate . pelaṃ vāti gacchatīti pelavam . kaḥ .. svagataśaithilyena tṛṇaśalākādidravyāntarasya praveśaṃ viśeṣeṇa rānti dadatīti virāḥ avayavāḥ, tān lātīti viralam .. tanuśabdaḥ śarīre vyutpāditaḥ (2. 6. 71) .. samīpe—abhito'vyayam . nikaṭādayaścaturdaśaśabdāḥ samīpe deśataḥ kālato vā pratyāsanne vartante . upakaṇṭhādiśabdānāṃ nikaṭasadeśādibhirekārthatvalakṣaṇasādṛśyapratipādakau vatipratyayau . saṃgatā āpo'tra samīpam . ṛkpūrabdhū . . . AK.03.01.068ab saṃsakte tvavyavahitamapadāntaramityapi .

AK.03.01.069ab davīyaśca daviṣṭhaṃ ca sudūre dīrghamāyatam .
AK.03.01.069cd vartulaṃ nistalaṃ vṛttaṃ bandhuraṃ tūnnatānatam .. 69 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.069>  
davīya iti—atiśayena dūraṃ davīyaḥ . daviṣṭhaṃ ca . sutarāṃ dūraṃ sudūram . atyantadūranāmāni .. dṛṇāti dūrasthitaṃ vidārayatīti dīrgham . ʻdṝ vidāraṇe . āyamyate vistīryata ityāyatam . ʻyama uparame . dīrghasya nāmanī .. vartate bhuvi parivartata iti vartulam . vṛttaṃ ca . ʻvṛtu vartane . nirgataṃ talamatreti nistalam . vartulasya kandukādernāmāni .. badhnātyunnatatvena sahāvanatatvamiti bandhuram . ʻbandha bandhane . unnatānatasya stanādernāma .. 69 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.069>  
davīyaśca—sudūre . itarāpekṣayā atiśayena dūramiti vigrahe ʻdvivacanavibhajya . . .  ityādinā (5. 3. 57) īyasun pratyaye ʻsthūladūra . . .  ityādinā (6. 4. 156) dūraśabdasya yaṇādilope pūrvasya ca guṇe davīyaḥ . iṣṭhan pratyaye (5. 3. 55) pūrvavadeva daviṣṭham . atiśayena dūraṃ sudūram .. dīrghamāyatam . āyāmākhyaparimāṇayuktasya veṇudaṇḍādernāmanī . dṛṇāti dūraṃ dārayatīti dīrgham . ʻdṛ vidāraṇe . bāhulakāt ghaṅ .. dūradeśamabhivyāpya yamyate niyamyata iti āyatam . ʻyama uparame . ktapratyayaḥ . āṅo'bhivyāptirarthaḥ .. vartulaṃ nistalaṃ vṛttam . kutrāpi samapradeśarahitasya kandukakapitthaphalādernāmāni . bhuvi vartate naikatra tiṣṭhatīti vartulam . ʻvṛtu vartane bāhulaka ulac pratyayaḥ .. talati pratitiṣṭhatīti talaśabdena samadeśo vivakṣitaḥ . ʻtala pratiṣṭhāyām . nirgataṃ talamasmāditi nistalam .. ktapratyaye vṛttam (3. 4. 72) . bimbagrahaṇabhāgasya talayuktatve'pi darpaṇādāvaśrirahitatvasādṛśyād vṛttaśabdaprayogaḥ .. bandhuraṃ tūnnatānatam . yadekameva svabhāvādunnatam upādhivaśāt pradeśāntare cānatam īṣannamraṃ lajjānatamastakādi tad bandhuram . badhnāti svaikadeśamavasthāntaraṃ prāpayatīti bandhuram . ʻbadhi saṃyamane . urac pratyayaḥ (u. 1. 43) . bandhūramiti dīrghamadhyo'pyasti . tathā ca rabhasaḥ—ʻbandhūrabandhurau ramye namre haṃse ca bandhuraḵ iti .. 69 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.069>

ucceti—uccīyata ūrdhvamupacīyata ityuccaḥ . ʻciñ cayane . prāśnute prakarṣeṇordhvamiti prāṃśuḥ . ʻaśū vyāptaü . unnamatyūrdhvamityunnataḥ . ʻṇama prahvatve śabde cö . udgatamagramasyetyudagraḥ . ucchrīyata ūrdhvaṃ śrayata ityucchritaḥ . ʻśriñ sevāyām . tuñjyate vāyvādinā bhajyata iti tuṅgaḥ . ʻtuji hiṃsāyām . unnatasya prāsādādernāmāni .. vāmo valgutvamasyāstīti vāmanaḥ . nimnamañcati gacchatīti nyak . ʻañcu gataü . nīcaistvaṃ vidyate'syeti nīcaḥ . kharvatyavayavadāḍhryena dṛpyatīti kharvaḥ . ʻkharva darpe . dairdhyābhāvād hrasatīti hrasvaḥ . ʻhrasa śabde alpatve cö . anunnatasya nāmāni .. avanatamagramasyetyavāgram . adho namatītyavanatam . ā īṣannatam ānatam . adhomukhasya nāmāni .. 70 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

AK.03.01.071ab arālaṃ vṛjinaṃ jihmamūrmimat kuñcitaṃ natam .

AK.03.01.072ab ṛjāvajihmapraguṇau vyaste tvapraguṇākulau .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.072>  
ṛjāviti—ṛjyate ādareṇa saṃpādyata iti ṛjuḥ . ʻṛja gatisthānārjanopārjaneṣü . na jihma ityajihmaḥ . prakṛṣṭo'vakratvaguṇo'syeti praguṇaḥ . ṛjunāmāni .. vyasyate viparyasyata iti vyaṃstaḥ . prakṛṣṭaguṇayogābhāvād apraguṇaḥ . ākolati ekībhavatītyākulaḥ . ʻkula saṃstyāne bandhuṣu cö . vyākīrṇasya nāmāni .. śaśvad vartamānaḥ śāśvataḥ . dhruvatīti dhruvaḥ . ʻdhruva sthairye . niyataṃ bhavo nityaḥ . sadā bhavaḥ sadātanaḥ . sanātanaśca . vināśarahitasya nāmāni .. 72 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.072>  
ṛjāvajihmapraguṇau . vakraviruddhasya dīrghaveṇudaṇḍādernāmāni . ṛjyate kāryopayogitvena saṃpādyata iti ṛjuḥ . ʻṛja gatisthānārjanopārjaneṣü . auṇādikaḥ kupratyayaḥ (u. 1. 27) .. jihmād bhinno'jihmaḥ .. prakṛṣṭo guṇa upādeyatvalakṣaṇo'syeti praguṇaḥ .. vyaste tvapraguṇākulau . viprakīrṇasaṃniveśasya nāmāni . vyasyate viruddhaṃ kṣipyata vyastam . ʻasu kṣepaṇe . karmaṇi ktaḥ .. ramaṇīyatvābhāvena prakṛṣṭaguṇābhāvād apraguṇaḥ .. ā samantāt kolati saṃstyāno bhavatīti ākulaḥ . ʻkula saṃstyāne . mūlavibhujādiḥ (vā. 3. 2. 5) .. śāśvatastu—sanātanāḥ . vināśarahitasya nāmāni . śāśvaditi kālatrayavācakamavyayam . tatra bhavo vartamānaḥ śāśvataḥ . ʻtatra bhavaḵ (4. 3. 53) ityaṇ . ʻārācchaśvatorneṣyate iti niṣedhāt ʻavyayānāṃ bhamātre— (vā. 6. 4. 144) iti ṭilopasyābhāvaḥ .. dhruvanityaśabdau prathamakāṇḍe vyutpāditau (1. 3. 20, 1. 1. 67) .. sadāsanāśabdau kālatrayavacanāvyayeṣu vakṣyete (3. 4. 22, 17) . tābhyāmubhābhyāmapi bhavārthe ʻsāyaṃciraṃprāhṇeprage'vyayebhyaṣṭyuṭyulau tuṭ cö (4. 3. 23) iti ṭyupratyaye tuḍāgame ca sadātanaḥ, sanātanaśca . śāśvatikaśabdo'pyatra .. 72 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.072>

AK.03.01.079ab pratyakṣaṃ syādaindriyakamapratyakṣamatīndriyam .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.078>  
anvagiti—anugacchantaṃ paścādañcate gacchatīti anvak . ʻañcu gataü . atrāvyayamiti saṃbadhyate . akṣasya purogāminaḥ anu paścād gacchatīti anvakṣam . . padasya purogāminaḥ anu paścād gacchatīti anupadam . yo gacchantamanu paścād gacchati tasya nāmāni .. pratyakṣṇoti puro vyāpnotīti pratyakṣam . ʻakṣū vyāptaü . indriyairgrāhyam aindriyakam . indriyagrāhyasya rūparasādernāmanī .. pratyakṣaṃ na bhavatītyapratyakṣam . adhigatmakṣamindriyam adhyakṣam . tadatikrāntam atyadhyakṣamiti vā pāṭhaḥ . indriyāṇyatikrāntamatīndriyam . indriyairagrāhyasya nāmanī .. 78 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

anvak—avyayam . yo gacchantamanugacchati tasya nāmāni . anu paścād añcati gacchatīti anvak . ʻañcu gatipūjanayoḵ . ʻṛtvig . . . ityādinā (3. 2. 59) kvin pratyayaḥ . cakārāntaḥ . ʻāgacchato'nūci gajasya ghaṇṭayoḵ iti māghaḥ (śiśu. 12. 34) . striyāṃ tu ṅīpi anūcī .. anugatamakṣaṃ pādarūpaṃ karmendriyamasyeti anvakṣam .. purogatāpekṣayā anugataṃ paścādbhūtaṃ padamasyeti anupadam . bahuvrīhitvopādhikavakṣyamāṇaparopagatvavyudāsāya klībamityuktam . ataśca guroranupadamantevāsī bharturanupadaṃ patnī ityādyeva bhavati . yadā tu padasya purogatasya paścāditi vigraho vivakṣitaḥ, tadā ʻavyayaṃ vibhakti . . . ityādinā (2. 1. 6) paścādarthe'vyayībhāvādavyayatvam . kecittu ʻklībamavyayam iti śabdadvayasya prāguktagatyā anvakṣaśabdenāpi saṃbandhamāhuḥ .. pratyakṣaṃ syādaindriyakam . buddhīndriyagrāhyasya rūparasādernāmanī . pratigatam akṣamindriyamiti pratyakṣam . pratītamakṣeṇeti vā . yathā pratyakṣā buddhiḥ . pratyakṣo ghaṭaḥ . pratyakṣaṃ rūpamityādi . adhyakṣamiti keṣāṃcit pāṭhaḥ . tatrāpi pūrvavadeva niruktikramaḥ . indriyādāgatam aindriyakam . kulālādeḥ (4. 3. 118) ākṛtigaṇatvād vuñ .. apratyakṣamatīndriyam . pūrvoktāt pratyakṣādanyad apratyakṣam . atikrāntamadhyakṣam atyadhyakṣam iti kecit . indriyamatikrāntam atīndriyam .. 78 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.078>  
anvak—avyayam . anugatanāmāni . ʻvenusaninadi . anuktam—ʻsahitaṃ saṃhitaṃ yuktayutamanvītamanvitam . yutanāmāni . ʻkūḍinadi .. pratyakṣaṃ syādaindriyakam . cakṣurādīndriyaviṣayanāmanī . adhyakṣasamakṣaśabdāvapi staḥ . ʻadhyakṣapratyakṣau tu samakṣavat iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 212, ślo. 133) .. apratyakṣamatīndriyam . apratyakṣanāmanī . parokṣaśabdopyasti . ʻparokṣe'tīndriyaḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 212, ślo. 133) .. 78 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.080ab apyekasarga ekāgryo'pyekāyanagato'pi ca .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.079>  
ekatāna iti—ekasminneva viṣaye tāno buddhivistāro'syeti ekatānaḥ . anyasminneva viṣaye vṛttiryasyeti anyavṛttiḥ . na anyavṛttirananyavṛttiḥ . ekamagram ekadeśasthaṃ jñeyamasyeti ekāgraḥ . ekamevāyanaṃ gatirasyeti ekāyanaḥ . ekaviṣayaḥ sargo niścayo'sya ekasargaḥ . ekāgra eva ekāgryaḥ . aikāgrya iti vā pāṭhaḥ . eka mevāyanaṃ gatiṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ ekāyanagataḥ . ekāgracittasya nāmāni .. 79 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

AK.03.01.080cd puṃsyādiḥ pūrvapaurastyaprathamādyā atāstriyām .. 80 ..
AK.03.01.081ab anto jaghanyaṃ caramamantyapāścātyapaścimam .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.080>  
puṃsīti—ādīyate prathamamupādīyata ityādiḥ . ʻdā dāne . pūrvatīti pūrvaḥ . ʻpūrva pūraṇe . puraḥ pūrvasmin kāle deśe vā bhavaḥ paurastyaḥ . prathate'nenādvitīyeneti prathamaḥ . ʻpraya prakhyȫ . ādau bhavaḥ ādyaḥ . prathamabhāvinaḥ padārthasya nāmāni .. amati upāntyapaṅktipadārthamatikramya gacchatīti antaḥ . ʻama gatyādiṣü . jaghane paścād bhavaṃ jaghanyam . carati upāntaṃ paryantamatikramya tadanantarasthānaṃ gacchatīti caramam . ante bhavamantyam . paścād bhavaṃ pāścātyam . paścimaṃ ca . antimasya padārthasya nāmāni .. 80 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.080>  
puṃsyādiḥ—prathamādyāḥ . yatkiṃcidapekṣayā prākkālasaṃbandhinaḥ pañca nāmāni . ādīyate prārambhasamaya eva vyavahriyata ityādiḥ . ʻupasarge ghoḥ kiḵ (3. 3. 92) . bhāryākalatrādiviśeṣaṇatve'pi ādiśabdaḥ puṃliṅga eveti niyamyate .. puraṃ vāti gacchati śreṣṭhatveneti pūrvaḥ . ʻvā gatigandhanayoḵ . ʻāto'nupasarge kaḵ (3. 2. 3) .. puraḥ pūrvasmin kāle deśe vā bhavaḥ paurastyaḥ . ʻdakṣiṇāpaścātpurasastyak (4. 2. 98) iti tyakpratyayaḥ . ʻkiti cö (7. 2. 118) iti vṛddhiḥ .. prathate dvitīyādibhiḥ saheti prathamaḥ . ʻpratha prakhyāne . ʻpratheramac (u. 5. 68) ityamacpratyayaḥ .. ādau deśe kāle vā bhavaḥ ādyaḥ . ʻdigādibhyo yat (4. 3. 54) iti yatpratyayaḥ .. athāstriyām—paścimam . ṣaḍetāni dānādānādikriyāsu gaṇanāsamāptisthānasya nāmāni . amati samāptiṃ gacchatītyantaḥ . ʻama gatyādiṣü . kartari ktaḥ (3. 4. 72) . antaśabdasya yoṣidādau viśeṣyabhūte'pi puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgayoranyataratvameveti darśayitum astriyāmityucyate . jaghanyādayastu śabdā liṅgatraye'pi bhavanti . jaghane paścādbhāge bhavatīti jaghanyam . digāditvād (4. 3. 54) yat .. prathamapratītisthānamupakramya caratīti caramam . ʻcara gataü . ʻpratheramac ityanuvṛttau . ʻcareścö (u. 5. 69) ityamac .. ante'vasāne bhavam antyam . digāditvād (4. 3. 54) yat . paścād deśe kāle vā bhavaṃ pāścātyam . ʻdakṣiṇāpaścātpurasastyak (4. 2. 98) iti tyak .. paśyād bhavaṃ paścimam . ʻagrapaścāḍḍimac (vā. 4. 3. 23) iti ḍimac . ḍittvāt ṭilopaḥ .. 80 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.01.081cd moghaṃ nirarthakaṃ spaṣṭaṃ sphuṭaṃ pravyaktamulbaṇam .. 81 ..
AK.03.01.082ab sādhāraṇaṃ tu sāmānyaṃ ekākī tveka ekakaḥ .
AK.03.01.082cd bhinnārthakā anyatara ekastvo'nyetarāvapi .. 82 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.01.01.081-82>  
moghamati—muhyatyasminniti mogham . ʻmuha vaicitye . nirgato'rthaḥ prayojanamasmāditi nirarthakam . nirarthakasya vastuno nāmanī .. ajñānaṃ spaśate bādhata iti spaṣṭam . ʻspaśa bādhanasparśanayoḵ . sphuṭati prakāśata iti sphuṭam . ʻsphuṭa vikasane . ativyaktasya nāmanī .. prakṛṣṭaṃ vyajyata iti pravyaktam . ʻañcū vyaktimrakṣaṇakāntigatiṣü . ulvaṇati haṭhāt darśanaṃ gacchatīti ulbaṇam . ʻbaṇa gataü . haṭhāddarśanena jñāyamānavastuno nāmanī .. samānamādhāraṇam ekasthānamasyeti sādhāraṇam . samānasya bhāvaḥ sāmānyam . aprātisvikapadārthasya nāmanī .. eti kāryaṃ kartuṃ svayameva gacchatītyekaḥ . ekākī . ekakaśca . ʻiṇ gataü . sahāyarahitasya nāmāni .. aniti pṛthageva prāṇitīti anyaḥ . ʻana prāṇane . anya evānyataraḥ . eti pṛthaggacchatītyekaḥ . tviṣati pṛthag bhāsata iti tvaḥ . ʻtviṣa dīptaü . ekatara iti vā pāṭhaḥ svayametīti itaraḥ . prakṛtādanyārthasya nāmāni .. 81-2 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.081-82>  
moghaṃ nirarthakam . svagatadharmavaikalyavaśāt nirarthakasyaite nāmanī . muhyatyatra puruṣo kāryasādhakatvabhrāntyeti mogham . ʻmuha vaicitye . ʻhalaścö (3. 3. 121) iti ghañ . nyaṅkvādikutvam (7. 3. 53) .. niṣkrānto'rthaḥ prayojanamasmāditi nirarthakam .. spaṣṭaṃ sphuṭam .. svagatajātiguṇādivaiśiṣṭyena pratīyamānasyaite nāmanī . spaśate svaviṣayamajñānaṃ bādhata iti spaṣṭam . ʻspaśa bādhanasparśanayoḵ . kartari ktaḥ (3. 4. 72) . ṣatvaṣṭutve .. sphuṭati vikāsitamiva prakāśata ithi sphuṭam . ʻsphuṭa vikasane . igupadhalakṣaṇaḥ kaḥ (3. 1. 135) . vyaktaśabdo'pyatra .. pravyaktamulbaṇam . atidūratvādidoṣasaṃbhave'pi svagatasakaladharmavaiśiṣṭyena pratīyamānasyaite nāmanī . prakarṣeṇa vyajyata iti pravyaktam . ʻañjū vyaktaü . ktaḥ . athavā ʻañcu gatipūjanayoḵ . gatyarthāḥ jñānārthāḥ . karmaṇi ktaḥ (3. 2. 102) . ʻyasya vibhāṣȫ (7. 2. 15) iti niṣṭhāyāmiḍabhāvaḥ . kuvalādāmalakaṃ vyaktam ityapādānaviṣayatvād ʻañco'napādāne (8. 2. 48) iti niṣṭhānatvaṃ na bhavati .. utkṛṣṭatvena baṇyate śabdyata iti ulbaṇam . ʻbaṇa śabde . pṛṣodarāditvād varṇavyatyayaḥ . spaṣṭādayaścatvāro'pyekārthā iti kecit .. sādhāraṇaṃ tu sāmānyam . yo hyanekavyaktīnāṃ tulyarūpo guṇakarmādiḥ, yaścānekānubhavayogyo grāmādiḥ, tasya dvividhasyāpi nāmanī . sādhāraṇasamānaśabdau sadṛśaparyāyeṣu śūdravarge vyutpāditau (2. 10. 37) . samāna eva sāmānyam . cāturvarṇyāditvāt (vā. 5. 1. 124) svārthikaḥ ṣyañ . ʻsāmānyo'yaṃ dharmaseturnṛpāṇām iti prayogaḥ . dharmayoreva sādhāraṇyam, sādṛśyaṃ tu dharmāśrayayoriti sādhāraṇasadṛśayorbhedaḥ .. ekākī tveka ekakaḥ . asāhayasya nāmāni . eti pṛthageva gacchatīti ekaḥ . ʻiṇ gataü . ʻiṇbhīkāpāśa . . . ityādinā (u. 3. 43) kanpratyayaḥ .. eka eva ekākī . ʻkan lukau cö (4. 3.51) iti vartamāne ʻekādākiniccāsahāye (5. 3. 52) ityākinicpratyaye ekāki . cakārāt kanpratyaye ekakaḥ . tasya vaikalpike luki ekaḥ .. bhinnārthakā—itarāvapi . bhinnaśabdasya yo'rthaḥ prakṛtādanyatvalakṣaṇaḥ, tadarthā anyatarādayaḥ pañca śabdā ityarthaḥ . aniti prāṇiti jīvati pratiyogisadbhāveneti anyaḥ . ʻana prāṇane . aghnyādigaṇapāṭhāt (u. 4. 112) sādhuḥ .. alpāctaramiti (2. 2. 34) jñāpakād anyaśabdādapi svārtha eva tarappratyaye anyataraḥ . ekaśabdo vyutpāditaḥ .. tvaśabdastvakhaṇḍa eva bhinnārtha iti subodhinīkāraḥ . ʻuto tvasmai tanvaṃ visasre (ṛk. 10. 71. 4) iti śrutau prayogaḥ .. eti pṛthageva gacchatīti itaraḥ . ʻiṇ gataü . <Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.081-82>

AK.03.01.083ab uccāvacaṃ naikabhedamuccaṇḍamavilambitam .
AK.03.01.083cd aruṃtudaṃ tu marmaspṛgabādhaṃ tu nirargalam .. 83 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.083>  
uccāvacamiti—uccaṃ ca tadavāk ca uccāvacam . naike'neke bhedā asya santīti naikabhedam . anekaprakārasya citrādernāmanī .. uccaṇḍati kopenāśu bhavatītyuccaṇḍam . ʻcaḍi kope . na vidyate vilambitamasyetyavilambitam . kopena kriyamāṇāpakāravad āśukṛtasya nāmanī .. arūṃṣi vraṇāni tudatītyaruṃtudam . ʻtuda vyathane . marmāṇi spṛśatīti marmaspṛk . ʻspṛśa saṃsparśane . marmavyathākarasya vacanādernāmanī .. na vidyate bādhā asyetyabādham . niṣkrāntamargalād niyāmakāditi nirargalam . ucchṛṅkhalaśīlasya nāmanī .. 83 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.083>  
uccāvacaṃ naikabhedam . avidyamāna eko bhedaḥ svagatāvāntaraviśeṣo'syeti naikabhedam . sthāvarajaṅgamātmakaṃ jagadādi taduccāvacamucyate . udak cāvāk ca uccāvacam . mayūravyaṃsakādipāṭhāt sādhuḥ . ʻuccāvacairupagateṣu sahasrasaṃkhyām iti māghakāvye prayogaḥ (śiśu. 4. 46) .. uccaṇḍamavilambitam . ʻcaṇḍastvatyantakopanaḵ iti prāguktam (ślo. 32) . tvarāyāḥ kopakāryatvāt tvarāyukta eva kāraṇaprādhānyena uccaṇḍa ityuktaḥ . svargavargoktasyāpi (pṛ. 44) avilambitaparyāyāntarakathanārthamatrābhidhānamiti jñeyam .. aruṃtudaṃ tu marmaspṛk . atiduḥkhajanakasya śastraprahārābhiśaṃsanādernāmanī . arūṃṣi vraṇāni tatsadṛśāni marmāṇi vā tudatīti aruṃtudam . ʻtuda vyathane . ʻvidhvaruṣostudaḵ (3.2. 35) iti khaś . ʻarurdviṣat . . .  ityādinā (6. 3. 67) mumāgamaḥ . saṃyogāntalopaḥ (8. 2. 23) .. ʻspṛśa sparśane . ʻspṛśo'nudake kvin (3. 2. 58) iti kvin pratyaye kutve ca (8. 2. 62) marmaspṛk .. abādhaṃ tu nirargalam . anivāritodyogasya nāmanī . avidyamāno bādhaḥ pratirodho'syeti abādham .. niṣkrānto'rgalāt pratibandhakāditi nirargalam .. 83 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.083>  
uccāvacaṃ naikabhedam . ʻnaño nalopo yaḥ prokto na sa madhyapade pare iti nalopo na bhavati . bahuprakārakanāmanī .. uccaṇḍamavilambitam . vilambaśūnyasya nāmanī .. aruṃtudastu marmaspṛk . marmasthānavyathakanāmanī .. abādhaṃ tu nirargalam . apratirodhakanāmanī . ʻapi niryantraṇoddāmocchṛṅkhalānargalādi cö . etānyapi . ʻsyādanargalamuddāmamucchṛṅkhalamayantritam iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 212, ślo. 132) .. 83 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.084ab prasavyaṃ pratikūlaṃ syādapasavyamapaṣṭhu ca .
AK.03.01.084cd vāmaṃ śarīre savyaṃ syādapasavyaṃ tu dakṣiṇe .. 84 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.084>  
prasavyamiti—pragataṃ savyād vāmabhāgād dakṣiṇaṃ prāptamiti prasavyam . pratispardhi kūlamasyeti pratikūlam . apagataṃ savyād vāmabhāgāditi apasavyam . apatiṣṭhatyanukūlamapāsyeti apaṣṭhu . ʻṣṭhā gatinivṛttaü . pratikūlasya nāmāni .. vamayati yajñasūtramaneneti vāmam . ʻṭuvamu udgiraṇe . sūyate yajñasūtramaneneti savyam . ʻṣuñ abhiṣave . śarīrasya vāmabhāgasya nāmanī .. apakrāntaṃ savyabhāgāditi apasavyam . dakṣate valavattayā vardhata iti dakṣiṇam . ʻdakṣa vṛddhau śīghrārthe cö . śarīrasya dakṣiṇabhāgārdhasya nāmanī .. 84 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.084>  
prasavyaṃ—apaṣṭhu ca . prastutārthavirodhino'rthasya nāmāni . srotasaḥ svārasikagamanavirodhikūlābhimukhavacanaḥ pratikūlaśabdaḥ svābhāvikārthavirodhikamātrasādharmyeṇa viruddhamātre vartate . pragatamapasṛtaṃ savyāditi dakṣiṇabhāgasthitaṃ prācīnāvītākhyaṃ brahmasūtraṃ prasavyāpasavyābhyāmucyate . tatsādharmyeṇa śubhakāryaviruddhamātreṇānyadapi prakṛtakāryavirodhi prasavyāpasavyaśabdābhyāmuktam . apetyupasargo varjane . apatiṣṭhatyānukūlyaṃ varjayitvā tiṣṭhatīti apaṣṭhu . ʻapaduḥsuṣu sthaḵ (u. 1. 25) iti tiṣṭhateḥ kupratyayaḥ . kittvādākāralopaḥ (6. 4. 64) . ʻambāmba . . .  ityādinā (8. 3. 97) ṣatvam . ʻtava dharmarāja iti nāma kathamidamapaṣṭhu paṭhyate iti iti māghakāvye prayogaḥ (śiśu. 15. 17) .. vāmaṃ—savyaṃ syāt . śarīrasya vāmārdhaṃ savyaṃ syāt . vamatīti vāmam . ʻṭuvama udgiraṇe . jvalāditvād ṇapratyayaḥ (3. 1. 140) .. sūyate savyam . ʻṣuñ abhiṣave . ʻaco yat (3. 1. 97) . ʻsavyaṃ vāme ca dakṣiṇe ityajayaḥ .. apasavyaṃ tu dakṣiṇam . śarīrasya dakṣiṇamardham apasavyam . apakrāntaṃ savyādityapasavyam . dakṣate vīryayuktatveneti dakṣiṇam . ʻtasmād dakṣiṇo'rdha ātmano vīryavattaraḵ iti śruteḥ . ʻdakṣa vṛddhaü . inan pratyayaḥ (u. 2. 50) .. 84 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.084>  
prasavyaṃ—apaṣṭhu ca . pratikūlanāmāni .. vāmaṃ—syāt . vāmaṃ dakṣiṇetarat . tat śarīre savyaṃ syāt .. apasavyaṃ tu dakṣiṇam . dakṣiṇaṃ nāma vāmetarat . tattu śarīre'pasavyaṃ syāt . savyamapi syāt . ʻsavyavāme ca dakṣiṇe iti jayakośaḥ . ʻsavyahaste ca khaṅgaḵ iti purātanaprayogaḥ .. 84 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.085ab saṃkaṭaṃ nā tu saṃbādhaḥ kalilaṃ gahanaṃ same .
AK.03.01.085cd saṃkīrṇaṃ saṃkulākīrṇe muṇḍitaṃ parivāpitam .. 85 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.085>  
saṃkaṭamiti—saṃkaṭantyanyonyamanneti saṃkaṭam . ʻkaṭe varṣāvaraṇayoḵ . asmin parasparaṃ saṃbādhyanta iti saṃbādhaḥ . ʻbādhṛ loḍane . saṃkocasthalanāmanī .. kalyate kṣipyate matiratreti kalilam . ʻkala kila kṣepe . gāhate matiratreti gahanam . ʻgāhū viloḍane . durvijñeyasya nāmanī .. saṃkīryate nairantaryeṇeti saṃkīrṇam . ʻku vikṣepe . saṃkolati nirantarībhavatīti saṃkulam . ʻkula saṃstyāne . ākīryata ityākīrṇam . saṃkīrṇasya nāmāni .. muṇḍyate khaṇḍyata iti muṇḍitam . ʻmuḍi khaṇḍane . parivāpyate khaṇḍyate parivāpitam . ʻḍuvap bījasaṃtāne . kṣurādināpasāritakeśaśmaśruśiraso nāmanī .. 85 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.085>  
saṃkaṭaṃ—saṃbādhaḥ . bahudravyasaṃkīrṇasyālpīyasa ādhārasya nāmanī . saṃkocarūpārthāt samityupasargāt ʻsaṃprodaśca kaṭac (5. 2. 29) iti kaṭac pratyaye saṃkaṭam .. anyonyasaṃmardena bādhyante'tra janā iti saṃbādhaḥ . ʻbādhṛ viloḍane . adhikaraṇe ghañ (3. 3. 121) . saṃbādhaśabdasya viśeṣyāyattaliṅgatvāpavādārthaṃ netyuktam . tataśca viprasaṃbādhaḥ sabhā, janasaṃbādho rājadvāram ityeva bhavati .. kalilaṃ—same . duṣpraveśasyaite nāmanī . kaliṃ vivādaṃ lātyādatta iti kalilam . ʻkala kila kṣepe iti vā dhātoḥ ilac pratyaye (u. 1. 54) kalilam .. gahanaṃ vane vyutpāditam (2. 4. 1) .. saṃkīrṇaṃ saṃkulākīrṇam . nairantaryeṇa bahuvidhadravyairadhiṣṭhitasya haṭṭādernāmāni . saṃkīryate nairantaryeṇa kṣipyata iti saṃkīrṇam . ākīrṇaṃ ca . ʻkṝ vikṣepe . ʻṛta iddhātoḵ (7. 1. 100) iti itvam . ktaḥ . ʻrvorupadhāyā . . . (8. 2. 76) iti dīrghaḥ . ʻradābhyām . . . ityādinā (8. 2. 42) niṣṭhānatvam .. samyak kolati saṃstyānaṃ bhavatīti saṃkulam . ʻkula saṃstyāne . mūlavibhujādiḥ (vā. 3. 2. 5) . ʻśaki śaṅkāyām ityasmād ulac pratyaye śaṅkulamiti tālavyādiriti govardhanaḥ .. muṇḍitaṃ parivāpitam . kṣureṇa mūlaparyantaṃ kṛttakeśaśmaśroḥ puruṣasya nāmanī . muṇḍyate sma muṇḍitam . ʻmuḍi khaṇḍane . ktaḥ .. dhātūnāmanekārthatvād vapirmuṇḍanārthaḥ . ʻkeśaśmaśru vapate ʻkeśaśmaśrunakhāni vāpayitvȫ ityādayaḥ prayogāḥ . paritaḥ śirasi vāpaḥ keśakhaṇḍanaṃ saṃjāto'syeti parivāpitam .. 85 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.085>  
saṃkaṭaṃ—saṃbādhaḥ . saṃkaṭanāmanī .. ʻidvāḍimbidi kalilaṃ—same . praveṣṭumaśakyanāmanī . ʻcorarānidi .. saṃkīrṇaṃ saṃkulākīrṇam . saṃkīrṇanāmāni . ʻsaṃdaḍiṃcinadi .. muṇḍitaṃ parivāpitam . paritaḥ chinnanāmanī . lomacchedananāmanī api . ʻvapiḥ prakiraṇe'pīṣṭaḥ keśacchede'pi dṛśyate iti dhātupradīpaḥ .. 85 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.086ab grathitaṃ granthitaṃ dṛbdhaṃ visṛtaṃ vistṛtaṃ tatam .
AK.03.01.086cd antargataṃ vismṛtaṃ syāt prāptapraṇihite same .. 86 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.086>  
grathitamiti—grathyate badhyata iti grathitam . ʻgrantha saṃdarbhe . granthitaṃ ca . ʻgrathi kauṭilye . dṛbhyate grathyata iti dṛbdham . ʻdṛbhī granthe . grathitasya puṣpādernāmanī .. visriyata iti visṛtam . ʻsṛ gataü . vistīryata iti vistṛtam . ʻstṛñ ācchādane . tanyata iti tatam . ʻtanu vistāre . vistṛtasya nāmāni .. antargatavad na prakāśata iti antargatam . vismaryata iti vismṛtam . ʻsmṛ ādhyāne . vismṛtasya nāmanī .. prāpyata iti prāptam . ʻāplṛ vyāptaü . praṇidhīyata iti praṇihitam . prāptasya vastuno nāmanī .. 86 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.031.01.086>  
grathitaṃ—dṛbdham . ānupūrvīviśeṣeṇaivāvayavakṛtasya puṣpamālādeḥ kavinibaddhaślokādeśca nāmāni . grathyate saṃdarbhyate kusumādibhiriti grathitam . ʻgrantha saṃdarbhe . kryādiḥ . ʻsaṃdarbho nibandhanam ityuktaṃ dhātuvṛttau . ktapratyaye ʻaniditām. . . (6. 4. 24) ityupadhānakāralopaḥ .. ʻgrathi kauṭilye iti bhauvādikaḥ . ʻkauṭilyaṃ kusṛtirbandhaścö iti dhātuvṛttau (pṛ. 64) . ktaḥ . ʻidito numdhātoḵ (7. 1. 58) iti num . sarvānandastvāha—dhātūnāmanekārthatvena grantharūpārthe vartamānād ʻmṛda kṣode iti dhātorṇyantāt svārthe marditam iti . anye tu saṃdīyate saṃhatatvena sūcyādinā sacchidraṃ kriyata iti saṃditam ityāhuḥ .. dṛbhyata iti dṛbdham . ʻdṛbhī granthe . ktaḥ (3. 2. 102) . grantho granthanam .. visṛtaṃ—tatam . pariṇāhavataḥ prasāritasya kaṭakambalādernāmāni . visriyate prasāryate sma visṛtam . ʻsṛ gataü . ktaḥ (3. 4. 72) .. vistīryate sma vistṛtam . ʻstṝñ ācchādane . ktaḥ . tāyate sma tatam . tanoteḥ ktapratyayaḥ . ʻanudāttopadeśavanatitanoti . . .  ityādinā (6. 4. 37) nakāralopaḥ .. antargataṃ—syāt . pūrvakālopalabdhasya saṃskārapramoṣād buddhyanārūḍhasya nāmanī . antargatavadaprakāśamānatvād antargatam .. atra vītyupasargo niṣedhe . tatpūrvāt ʻsmṛ cintāyām iti dhātoḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye (3. 2. 102) vismṛtam .. prāptapraṇihite same . pratyāsannavastuvācakatvena tulye ityarthaḥ . prakarṣeṇa āpyata iti prāptam . prakarṣeṇa nidhīyate saṃnidhau sthāpyata iti praṇihitam . upasargadvayapūrvād dadhāteḥ ktapratyayaḥ . dadhāterhirādeśaḥ (7. 4. 42) . ʻnergadanadapatapadaghumāsyati . . . ityādinā (8. 4. 17) ṇatvam .. 86 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.086>  
grathitaṃ—dṛbdham . tantvādinā gumphitasya nāmāni .. visṛtaṃ—tatam . vistṛtanāmāni .. antargataṃ—syāt . anādhyātanāmanī . ʻmaravapaḍḍhadi .. prāpta—same . prāptanāmanī . ʻdorakapaḍḍhadi . anuktam—upasthitaṃ tṛpanatamupapannamiti trayam . upasthitanāmāni .. ʻupanatamaṇibandhe mūrdhni paulastyaśatroḥ surabhi suravimuktaṃ puṣpavarṣaṃ papātö iti raghuvaṃśaḥ (12. 102) . tatra maṇibandhaḥ paṭṭābhiṣekasamayaḥ .. 86 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.087ab vellitapreṅkhitādhūtacalitākampitā dhute .
AK.03.01.087cd nuttanunnāstaniṣṭhyūtāviddhakṣipteritāḥ samāḥ .. 87 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.087>  
velliteti—vellati calatīti vellitaḥ . ʻvella calane . preṅkhati calatīti preṅkhitaḥ . ʻikhi gataü . ādhūnute kampata iti ādhūtaḥ . dhutaśca . ʻdhuñ kampane . calatīti calitaḥ . ʻcala kampane . ākampata iti ākampitaḥ . ʻkapi calane . kampitasya śākhādernāmāni .. nudyate preryata iti nuttaḥ . nunnaśca . ʻnuda preraṇe . asyata ityastaḥ . ʻasu kṣepaṇe . niṣṭhīvyata iti niṣṭhyūtaḥ . ʻṣṭhivu nirasane . āvidhyata ityāviddhaḥ . ʻvyadha tāḍane . kṣipyata iti kṣiptaḥ . ʻkṣipa preraṇe . īryata itīritaḥ . ʻīra preraṇe . preritasya śarādernāmāni .. 87 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.087>  
vellita—dhute . vāyvabhighātādinimittena calanakriyāyuktasya nāmāni . vellati sma vellitam . ʻvella calane . atra dhātuvṛttikāraḥ—ʻdhātorasaṃyogāntatve'pi prayogavaśād dvirbaddho lakāraḵ iti . prakarṣeṇa iṅkhati sma preṅkhitaḥ . ʻikhi gataü . ādhūnute sma ādhūtaḥ . ʻdhūñ kampane . āṅpūrvaḥ . calati sma calitaḥ .. ʻkapi calane ityasmād āṅpūrvāt ktaḥ ākampitaḥ . ʻdhuñ kampane ityato hrasvāntāt dhutaḥ .. nutta—samāḥ . nodanākhyasaṃyogādinā preritasya śarādernāmāni . ʻṇuda preraṇe ityato dhātoḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye ʻnudavidondatrāghrāhrībhyo'nyatarasyām (8. 2. 56) iti vaikalpike niṣṭhānatve nunnaḥ . tadabhāvapakṣe nuttaḥ .. ʻasu kṣepaṇe ityasmād astaḥ .. ʻṣṭhivu nirasane ityasmāddhātorniṣṭhāyāṃ ʻcchvoḥ śūḍanunāsike cö (6. 4. 19) ityūṭhādeśe niṣṭhyūtaḥ . rūḍhyā vṛttyā mukhavāyvabhighātena mukhakuharād bahiḥ prerite śleṣmalālādike vartamāno'pi niṣṭhyūtaśabdaḥ preritatvasādṛśyād anyatrāpi śarādau vartate .. āvidhyate sma āviddhaḥ . ʻvyadha tāḍane . ktapratyaye ʻgrahijyāvayivyadhi . . .  ityādinā (6. 1. 16) saṃprasāraṇam . ʻjhaṣastathordho'dhaḵ(8. 2. 40) iti niṣṭhātakārasya dhatvam .. ʻkṣipa preraṇe iti dhātoḥ kṣiptaḥ .. īryate sma īritaḥ . ʻīra preraṇe . curādiḥ . ktapratyaye īḍāgamaḥ . ʻniṣṭhāyāṃ seṭi (6. 4. 52) iti ṇilopaḥ .. 87 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.087>  
vellita—dhute . calitanāmāni . kareṇa kampitaḥ khaḍgaḥ . ʻpreṅkholītastaralito lolitāndolitāvapi . āndolitanāmāni . ʻallāḍipaḍudi .. ʻāndolitā karatale navaśaktikeyam . ʻpṛthulajaghanabhāraṃ mandamāndolayantī iti vāṇaḥ .. nutta—samāḥ . kṣiptanāmāni . ʻdobbalabaḍḍadi . anuktam—ʻābarhitocchṛtotkhātotpāṭitonmūlitāḥ samāḵ . utpāṭitanāmāni . ʻperakapaḍḍhadi .. 87 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.088ab parikṣiptaṃ tu nivṛtaṃ mūṣitaṃ muṣitārthakam .
AK.03.01.088cd pravṛddhaprasṛte nyastanisṛṣṭe guṇitāhate .. 88 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.088>  
parikṣiptamiti—parikṣipyate samantād veṣṭyata iti parikṣiptam . ʻkṣipa preraṇe . nitarāṃ vriyate nivṛtam . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . niyataṃ bhriyate nibhṛtamiti vā pāṭhaḥ . kaṇṭakādipariveṣṭitasya kṣetrādernāmanī .. mūṣyata iti mūṣitam . ʻmūṣa steye . muṣyata iti muṣitam . ʻmuṣa steye . taskaritasya nāmanī .. prakarṣeṇa vardhata iti pravṛddham . ʻvṛdhu vṛddhaü . prasaratīti prasṛtam . ʻsṛ gataü . prasṛtasya jaṅghādernāmanī .. vyayādau nyasyate svāmineti nyastaḥ . ʻasu kṣepaṇe . nisṛjyate svāmineti nisṛṣṭaḥ . kāryeṣu svāminā niyuktasya grāmādhipādernāmanī .. guṇyata iti guṇitam . ʻguṇa abhyāse . āhanyate'bhyasyata iti āhatam . abhyastavedādernāmanī .. 88 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.088>  
parikṣiptaṃ tu vivṛtam . yadṛcchāgatapaśvādisaṃcāraparihārāya kaṇṭakaśākhādibhirāvṛtasyārāmādernāmanī . paritaḥ kṣipyate bahiḥsaṃcārād nirasyata iti parikṣiptam .. nitarāṃ vriyate kaṇṭakaśākhādibhiriti nivṛtam . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . ktaḥ .. mūṣitaṃ muṣitārthakam . stenāpahṛtavacano muṣitaśabdaḥ, tatsamānārtho mūṣitaśabda ityarthaḥ . ʻmuṣa steye ityato laghūpadhād dhātoḥ kryādeḥ ktapratyaye muṣitam . dīrghopadhāttu bhauvādikād mūṣitam .. pravṛddhaprasṛte . etadādiślokadvayāntasthitaṃ same (ślo. 90) iti padam etadādibhirdvādaśabhirvākyaiḥ saṃbadhyate . prapūrvo vṛdhiḥ prasaraṇe vartate . tathā ca—ʻtasmādayaṃ pravavṛdhe pṛthivīpatīnāmudgītapuṇyacarito bhuvaneṣu vaṃśaḵ iti bhavabhūtiprayogaḥ . prauḍhe'pi pravṛddhamuktam (ślo. 76) . prasarati sma prasṛtam . ʻsṛ gataü . ktaḥ .. nyastanisṛṣṭe . corādiparihārāya parahaste sthāpitasya suvarṇādernāmanī . dāvopabhogādibhyo nivārya asyate kṣipyata iti nyastam . niyamena sṛjyate dīyata iti nisṛṣṭam . ʻsṛja visarge . ktapratyayaḥ . ṣatvaṃ ṣṭutvaṃ ca .. guṇitāhate . yaṃ kaṃcidekādisaṃkhyāvyañjakamaṅkaṃ phalakādau kvacid vinyasya so'ṅko yatsaṃkhyāguṇito vidhitsitaḥ tatsaṃkhyāṅkamadho vinyasya gaṇitaśāstroktakrameṇa uparitanamaṅkamāhatya aṅkāntaraṃ nidhāyābhyastaṃ sat guṇitāhataśabdābhyāmucyate . guṇyate'bhyasyate sma guṇitam . ʻguṇa abhyāse .. gaṇakairaṅkāntareṇāhanyata iti āhatam . ʻhana hiṃsāgatyoḵ . ktaḥ .. 88 ..  </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.088>  
parikṣiptaṃ tu nivṛtam . paritaḥ veṣṭitasya nāmanī . ʻmusurukopaḍḍhadi .. mūṣitaṃ muṣitārthakam . coritaṃ muṣitaṃ syāt .. pravṛddhaprasṛte . prasṛtanāmanī . ʻprasarepaḍḍhadi . ʻtasmādayaṃ pravavṛdhe pṛthivīpatināmudgītapuṇyacarito bhuvaneṣu vaṃśaḵ iti dharmaśarmābhyudayaḥ .. nyastanisṛṣṭe . samarpitanāmanī . ʻgrāmeṣvātmanisṛṣṭeṣü (raghu. 1. 44) .. guṇitāhate . dve catvāri aṣṭāvityāvartanāmanī .. 88 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.089ab nidigdhopacite gūḍhagupte guṇṭhitarūṣite .
AK.03.01.089cd drutāvadīrṇe udgūrṇodyate kāritaśikṣite .. 89 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.089>  
nidigdheti—nidihyata upacīyata iti nidigdham . ʻdiha upacaye . upacīyata iti upacitam . ʻciñ cayane . upacitasya dhānyādernāmanī .. guhyata iti gūḍham . ʻguhū saṃvaraṇe . gupyata iti guptam . ʻgupū rakṣaṇe . guptasya dhānyādernāmanī .. guṇṭhyate mālyādineti guṇṭhitam . ʻguṭhi veṣṭane . rūṣyata iti rūṣitam . ʻruṣa hiṃsāyām . mālyādinā rūṣitastanādernāmanī .. drūyata iti drutam . ʻdru gatau . avadīryata iti avadīrṇam . ʻdṝ vidāraṇe . vidāritasya nāmanī .. udgūryata iti udgūrṇam . ʻgurī udyamane . udyamyata iti udyatam . udyaktasya nāmanī .. kāryate śikṣyata iti kāritam . śikṣyata iti śikṣitam . ʻśikṣa vidyopādāne . śikṣitasya vidyādernāmanī .. 89 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.089>  
nidigdhopacite . haritālasudhāhiṅgulādiliptasya kuḍyādernāmanī . nitarāṃ dihyate sma nidigdham . ʻdiha upacaye . ktaḥ .. upacīyate dravyāntareṇa vardhyata iti upacitam . ʻciñ cayane . ktaḥ . upasargavaśādatra vṛddhirarthaḥ .. gūḍhagupte . yasya kasyacidaprakaṭībhūtasya vastuno nāmanī . guhyate sma gūḍham . ʻguhū saṃvaraṇe . ktapratyayaḍhatvaṣṭutvaḍhalopāḥ .. gupyate sma guptam . ʻgupū rakṣaṇe . ktaḥ .. guṇṭhitarūṣite . dravyāntareṇācchāditasya nāmanī . yathā—uttarīyāvaguṇṭhitaṃ kucamaṇḍalam . reṇurūṣitaṃ śiraḥ ityādi . ʻguṭhi veṣṭane iti dhātoḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye guṇṭhitam .. rūṣiḥ laukiko dhātuḥ vyāptyartho bhūvādiṣu vijñeyaḥ . tataḥ karmaṇi niṣṭhāyāṃ rūṣitam .. drutāvadīrṇe . dravībhūtasya māṃsādernāmanī . drūyate sma drutam . ʻdru gataü .. avadīryate sma praśithilāvayavatvenetyavadīrṇam . ʻdṛ vidāraṇe . karmaṇi ktapratyaye ṛta itvaṃ niṣṭhānatvaṃ ca .. udgūrṇodyate . ūrdhvadeśasaṃyogaṃ prāptasya khaḍgalaguḍādernāmanī . udgūryate sma udgūrṇam . ʻgurī udyamane . niṣṭhānatvam (8. 2. 42), upadhādīrghaśca (8. 2. 77) .. ʻyama uparame ityasmād niṣṭhāyāmanunāsikalope (6. 4. 37) udyataḥ . udgūrṇocchrite iti kecit paṭhanti . ʻśriñ sevāyām ityataḥ utpūrvāt ktapratyaye ucchritam .. kāritaśikṣite . same ityeva . laukike vaidike vā karmaṇi kṛtābhyāsasya nāmanī . yathā kārito yuddhakarmaṇi, śikṣita ityarthaḥ . śikṣāṃ kāryate smeti kāritam . kṛño ṇici niṣṭhā .. śikṣyate sma śikṣitam . ʻśikṣa vidyopādāne . ktaḥ . subhūticandrastu kācitaśikyite iti paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭa . kācavad añcitaṃ kṛtaṃ kācitam . śikyavat kṛtaṃ śikyitam . saṃhatamityarthaḥ iti . ṭīkāsarvasvakāro'pi tameva pāṭhaṃ manasi nidhāya vyākṛta . ʻkācitādidvayaṃ śikyāropite vartate . “prātipadikād dhātvarthe bahulamiṣṭhavacca” (ga. sū. 7. 4. 97) iti kācaśabdāt śikyaśabdācca ṇici tadantād dhātudvayādapi ktapratyaye kācitaṃ śikyitaṃ ceti (pṛ. 40) .. 89 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.089>  
nidigdhopacite . avacitanāmanī . ʻpeṃpavaḍḍidi .. gūḍhagupte . guptanāmanī . ʻdāṃcabaḍḍidi . guṇṭhitarūṣite . parāgādinā channanāmanī .. drutādīrṇe . svayaṃ vidīrṇanāmanī . ʻdrutaṃ śīghre śīghragate'pyavadīrṇavilīnayoḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 228, ślo. 8) . ʻdru gataü ityarthapāṭho nidarśanam . taduktam—
ʻnipātāścacopasargāśca dhātavaśceti te trayaḥ .
anekārthāḥ smṛtā loke pāṭhasteṣāṃ nidarśanam ..
udgūrṇodyate . utkṣiptanāmanī . udgūrṇaḥ karavālaḥ .. kācitaśikyite . kāraḍikāyantre kṛtasya nāmanī .. 89 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.125
AK.03.01.090ab ghrāṇaghrāte digdhalipte samudaktoddhṛte same .
AK.03.01.090cd veṣṭitaṃ syād valayitaṃ saṃvītaṃ ruddhamāvṛtam .. 90 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.090>  
ghrāṇeti—ghrāyata iti ghrāṇam . ghrātaṃ ca . ʻghrā gandhopādāne . ghrātasya puṣpādernāmanī .. dihyata iti digdham . ʻdiha upacaye . lipyata iti liptam . ʻlipa upadehe . liptasya bhittyādernāmanī .. samudacyata iti samudaktam . ʻañcu gatipūjanayoḵ . uddhriyata iti uddhṛtam . ʻhṛñ haraṇe . uddhṛtasya śalyādernāmanī .. veṣṭyata iti veṣṭitam . ʻveṣṭa veṣṭane . valayākāraḥ saṃjāto'syeti valayitam . veṣṭitasya vastrādernāmanī . saṃvīyata iti saṃvītam . ʻvyeñ saṃvaraṇe . rudhyate āvriyata iti ruddham . ʻrudhir āvaraṇe . āvriyata ityāvṛtam . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . vastrādinā āvṛtasya dehādernāmanī .. 90 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.090>  
ghrāṇaghrāte . ghrāṇendriyānubhūtagandhasya kusumādernāmanī . ghrāyate sma ghrātam . ʻghrā gandhopādāne . karmaṇi ktapratyayaḥ . ʻnudavidonda . . .  ityādinā (8. 2. 56) vaikalpike niṣṭhānatve ghrāṇam .. digdhalipte . candanādinā liptasya nāmanī . dihyate sma digdham . ʻdiha upacaye . upacayo lepa iti dhātuvṛttau . ktapratyaye ʻdāderdhātorghaḵ (8. 2. 32) iti ghatve ʻjhaṣastathordho'dhaḵ (8. 2. 40) iti dhatvam .. lipyate sma liptam . ʻlipa upadehe . ktaḥ .. samudaktoddhṛte same . kūpāderadhaḥpradeśād ūrdhvapradeśamātraṃ nītasya jalādernāmanī . samyag udacyate uddhriyate sma samudaktam . ʻañcu gatipūjanayoḵ . atrāñcateḥ pūjārthatvābhāvād ʻañceḥ pūjāyām (7. 2. 53) iti prāptasya iḍāgamasyābhāvaḥ . ʻudito vȫ (7. 2. 56) iti iḍāgamasya ktvāpratyaye vaikalipakatvād ʻyasya vibhāṣȫ (7. 2. 15) iti niṣṭhāyāmiḍabhāvaḥ . ʻudaktamudakaṃ kūpāt ityādivad añcanasyāpi apādānaviṣayatvād ʻañco'napādāne (8. 2. 48) iti niṣedhād niṣṭhānatvasyābhāvaḥ .. samudasteti kvācitke pāṭhe sopasargadvayāt ʻasu kṣepaṇe iti dhātoḥ karmaṇi ktapratyayaḥ .. uddhriyate smeti uddhṛtam . ʻhṛñ haraṇe . ktaḥ . prāguktam udgūrṇamudyataṃ ceti śabdadvayaṃ tu svaśarīrāpekṣayā uparipradeśaṃ nīte laguḍādau vartata iti na paunaruktyam . kvacid arthasāṃkaryaprayogo lakṣaṇayā nirvoḍhavyaḥ .. veṣṭitaṃ syād valayitam . latādinā veṣṭitasya vṛkṣaprakāṇḍādernāmanī . ʻveṣṭa veṣṭane iti dhātorniṣṭhāyāṃ veṣṭitam .. valayo valayākāro'sya saṃjāta iti valayitam (5. 2. 36) .. saṃvītaṃ ruddhamāvṛtam .. himadhūmādyāvarakadravyavyāptasarvāvayavasya parvatādernāmāni . samantato vīyate udyata iti saṃvītam . ʻvyeñ saṃvaraṇe . ktapratyaye yajāditvāt (6. 1. 15) saṃprasāraṇe parapūrvatve ca (6. 1. 108) ʻhalaḵ (6. 4. 2) iti dīrghaḥ .. ʻrudhir āvaraṇe ityataḥ ktapratyaye ruddham .. ʻvṛñ varaṇe ityasmād āṅpūrvād āvṛtam .. veṣṭitādayaḥ pañcaikārthā iti kecit .. 90 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.090>  
ghrāṇaghrāte . āghrātanāmanī .. digdhalipte . paṅkādinā liptanāmanī .. samudaktoddhṛte same . uddhṛtasya jalādernāmanī .. veṣṭitaṃ—ruddhamāvṛtam . pariveṣṭitanāmanī .. 90 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.091ab rugṇaṃ bhugne'tha niśitakṣṇutaśātāni tejite .
AK.03.01.091cd syād vināśonmukhaṃ pakvaṃ hrīṇahrītau tu lajjite .. 91 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.091>  
rugṇamiti—rujyata iti rugṇam . ʻrujo bhaṅge . bhujyata iti bhugnam . ʻbhujo kauṭilye . bhugnasya rathādernāmanī .. niśāyate tanūkriyata iti niśitam . śātaṃ ca . ʻśo tanūkaraṇe . kṣṇūyate tanūkriyata iti kṣṇutam . ʻkṣṇu tejane . tejyate niśāyata iti tejitam . ʻtija niśātane . śāṇādinā tīkṣṇīkṛtasya khaḍgādernāmāni .. pacyate smeti pakvam . ʻḍupacaṣ pāke . patanonmukhasya phalādernāma .. jihretīti hrīṇaḥ . hrītaśca . ʻhrī lajjāyām . lajjāsya saṃjāteti lajjitaḥ . vrīḍitasya nāmāni .. 91 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.091>  
rugṇaṃ bhugne . ānatāgrabhāgasya nāmanī . yathā‒phalabhārabhugnāstaravaḥ iti . ʻrujo bhaṅge ʻbhujo kauṭilye . ābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ karmaṇi ktapratyaye ʻoditaścö (8. 2. 45) iti niṣṭhānatvena rugṇam . bhugnaṃ ca .. atha—tejite . śāṇādinigharṣaṇena tīkṣṇīkṛtadhārāpradeśasya khaḍgādernāmāni  ʻśo tanūkaraṇe ityato nipūrvāt karmaṇi ktapratyaye ʻśācchoranyatarasyām (7. 4. 41) iti vikalpena itve niśitam . tadabhāvapakṣe śātam . kṣṇūyata iti kṣṇutam . ʻkṣṇu tejane . tejanaṃ tanūkaraṇam . ʻtija niśāne ityataḥ caurādikāt tejitam .. syāt—pakvam . vināśaḥ vilayanam, tatra unmukham . āsannavināśamityarthaḥ . yathā—pakvo jvaraḥ . pakvaḥ pratiśyāyaḥ ityādi . pariṇate'pi pakvaṃ vakṣyate . pacyate sma pakvam . ʻpaco vaḵ (8. 2. 52) iti niṣṭhātakārasya vakāraḥ .. hrīṇahrītau tu lajjite . vrīḍāyuktasya nāmanī . jihreti sma hrīṇaḥ . hrītaśca . ʻhrī lajjāyām . ʻmudavida . . .  ityādinā (8. 2. 56) vikalpena niṣṭhānatvam .. lajjāsya saṃjātā lajjitaḥ . tārakādiḥ (5. 2. 36) .. 91 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.091>  
rugṇaṃ bhugne . bhugnanāmanī .. atha—tejite . uttejitanāmāni .. syāt—pakvam . āsannavināśanāma . ʻpakvo mānajvaraḥ strīṇām .. hrīṇa—lajjite . ljjitanāmāni .. 91 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.128
AK.03.01.092ab vṛte tu vṛttavāvṛttau saṃyojita upāhitaḥ .
AK.03.01.092cd prāpyaṃ gamyaṃ samāsādyaṃ syannaṃ rīṇaṃ srutaṃ snute .. 92 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.092>  
vṛta iti—vriyate kanyādineti vṛtaḥ . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . vṛtyate smeti vṛttaḥ . ʻvṛtu vartane . vāvṛtyate vriyate smeti vāvṛttaḥ . ʻvāvṛtu varaṇe . kanyādinā vṛtasya varādernāmāni .. saṃyojyate yugādineti saṃyojitaḥ . ʻyujir yoge . upa samīpe ādhīyate sthāpyata ityupāhitaḥ . yugādinā saṃyojitasya balīvardādernāmanī .. prāptuṃ yogyaṃ prāpyam . ʻāplṛ vyāptaü . gantuṃ yogyaṃ gamyam . samāsādituṃ prāptuṃ yogya samāsādyam . ʻṣadlṛ viśaraṇādaü . prāptavyasya vastuno nāmāni .. syandate smeti syannam . ʻsyandū prasravaṇe . rīyate prasravatīti rīṇam . ʻrīṅ sravaṇe . sravatīti srutam . ʻsru gataü . snauti sravatīti snutam . ʻṣṇu prasravaṇe . suṣiradvārānniḥsṛtasya jalādernāmāni .. 92 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.092>  
vṛte—vāvṛttau . prasannadevatāṃ prati prārthitārthasya nāmāni . vriyate sma vṛtam . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . ktaḥ . yathā vṛtaḥ putra iti .. ʻtapa aiśvarye ityanantaraṃ divādiṣu ʻvāvṛtu vartane iti paṭhyate . tatra vāgrahaṇaṃ pūrvasya dhātoḥ daivādikavikalpanārthamiti vyākhyāne ʻvṛtu vartane ityasmādeva dhātoḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye vṛttam . apare tu—vāśabdamapyuttaradhātvavayavamāhuḥ . tanmate vāvṛtyate smeti vāvṛttam . ʻvāvṛtu vartane . vartanaṃ varaṇamiti dhātuvṛttiḥ . karmaṇi ktapratyayaḥ . tathā ca— ʻtato vāvṛtyamānāsau rāmaśālāṃ nyavikṣatö iti bhaṭṭiḥ (4. 28) . atra vāvṛtyamānā vṛṇvatītyarthaḥ .. saṃyojita upāhitaḥ . dravyānteraṇa saha prāpitasaṃyogasya vastuno nāmanī . samyag yojitaḥ saṃyojitaḥ .. upa samīpe ādhīyate sma upāhitaḥ . ʻupāhitāṃ vakṣasi pīvarastane iti bhāraviḥ (kirā. 8. 37) .. prāpyaṃ—samāsādyam . prāptuṃ śakyaṃ grāmādikaṃ prāpyam . ʻṛhalorṇyat (3. 1. 124) .. ʻgamlṛ gataü ityataḥ ʻporadupadhāt (3. 1. 98) iti yatpratyaye gamyam .. āṅi sadiḥ padyarthe iti caurādikāddhātoḥ śakyārthe ṇyatpratyaye (3. 1. 124) samāsādyam .. syannaṃ—snutam . praśithilāvayāvārabdhataṭākasetughaṭādeḥ bahirniḥsṛtajalakṣīrādernāmāni . ʻsyandū prasravaṇe ityataḥ kartari ktapratyaye (3. 4. 72) ʻradbhāyām . . . ityādinā (8. 2. 42) niṣṭhānatve syannam . rīyate sma rīṇam . ʻrīṅ gataü daivādikāddhātoḥ ʻsvādaya oditaḵ (ga. sū.) ityatideśād ʻoditaścö (8. 2. 45) iti niṣṭhānatvam .. sravati sma srutam . ʻsru sravaṇe .. snauti sma snutam . ʻṣṇu prasravaṇe .. 92 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.092>  
vṛte—vāvṛttau . vṛtanāmāni . ʻtato vāvṛttamānā sā rāmaśālā nyavikṣatö iti bhaṭṭiḥ (4. 28) .. saṃyojita upāhitaḥ . dravyāntareṇa miśritasya nāmanī . kṣīreṇopāhitaṃ nīram .. prāpyaṃ—samāsādyam . prāptuṃ yogyanāmāni .. syannaṃ—snutam . syannanāmāni .. 92 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.130
AK.03.01.093ab saṃgūḍhaḥ syāt saṃkalito'vagītaḥ khyātagarhaṇaḥ .
AK.03.01.093cd vividhaḥ syād bahuvidho nānārūpaḥ pṛthagvidhaḥ .. 93 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.093>  
saṃgūḍha iti—saṃguhyate saṃkalyata iti saṃgūḍhaḥ . ʻguhū saṃvaraṇe . saṃkalyata iti saṃkalitaḥ . saṃkalitasya bhāratamañjaryādernāmanī .. avagīyate pāpiṣṭho'sāviti śabdyate'vagītaḥ . ʻgai śabde . khyātaṃ garhaṇaṃ yasyeti khyātagarhaṇaḥ . prakhyātanindasya nāmanī .. vicitrā vidhā prakāro'syeti vividhaḥ . vahvyo vidhāḥ prakārā asyeti bahuvidhaḥ . pṛthagvidhaśca . nānāvidhāni rūpāṇyasyeti nānārūpaḥ . bahurūpasya mayūrādernāmāni .. 93 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.093>  
saṃgūḍhaḥ syāt saṃkalitaḥ . bahuvidho'pyarthaḥ kvacidekatra saṃkṣiptaḥ saṃgūḍhādiśabdadvayenocyate . yathā—śrīmahābhāratārtho bālabhāratākhye kāvye . yathā vā—śrīrāmāyaṇārthaḥ saṃkṣeparāmāyaṇe ityādi . gaṇitajñairapyuktam—
ʻyadvastu bhinnakṛtyeṣu vibhajya viniyojitam .
aṅgairekīkṛtāṅkaṃ cet saṃkalīkṛtamucyate ..
iti . saṃkṣepeṇa guhyate saṃvriyata iti saṃgūḍhaḥ . ʻguhū saṃvaraṇe . ktaḥ . gupte'pi gūḍha uktaḥ .. saṃkalyate saṃkṣipyata iti saṃkalitaḥ . kalatiḥ sarvārtho dhātuḥ .. avagītaḥ khyātagarhaṇe . lokaprasiddhamahāpātakādidoṣadūṣitasya nāmanī . avagīyate sagarhaṃ śabdyata iti avagītaḥ . ʻgai śabde . ktaḥ . avetyupasargo garhārthaḥ .. vividhaḥ—pṛthagvidhaḥ . vicitrarūpasya mayūrādeḥ kālabhedena vā nānāprakārasya meghamaṇḍalādernāmāni . vicitrā vidhā prakāro yasyeti vividhaḥ . anye vyaktayogāḥ .. 93 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.093>  
saṃgūḍhaḥ syāt saṃkalitaḥ . bhūgatatvena kṛtasya nāmanī .. avagītaḥ khyātagarhaṇaḥ . prakaṭanindāyukto 'vagītaḥ syāt . punaḥ punaḥ prekṣitamapi . ʻavagītaṃ muhurdṛṣṭam iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 4. 70) .. vividhaḥ—pṛthagvidhaḥ . nānāvidhanāmāni .. 93 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.131
AK.03.01.094ab avarīṇo dhikkṛtaścāpyapadhvasto'vacūrṇita .
AK.03.01.094cd anāyāsakṛtaṃ phāṇṭaṃ svanitaṃ dhvanitaṃ same .. 94 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.094>  
avarīṇa iti—avarīyate bhṛśaṃ pīḍyata iti avarīṇaḥ . ʻrī gatireṣaṇayoḵ . dhikkriyate tiraskriyata iti dhikkṛtaḥ . apadhvasyate pīḍyata iti apadhvastaḥ . ʻdhvaṃsu bhraṃsu avasraṃsane . avacūrṇyate saṃpiṣyata iti avacūrṇitaḥ . ʻcūrṇa saṃpeṣaṇe . pareratyantapīḍitasya nāmāni .. phaṇati dravatvād gacchatīti phāṇṭam . ʻphaṇa gataü . āyāsaṃ vinaiva kṛtasya somakaṣāyādiviśeṣanāma .. svanyata iti svanitam . ʻsvana śabde . dhvanyata iti dhvanitam . ʻdhvana śabde . kṛtaninadasya bheryādernāmanī .. 94 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.094>  
avarīṇo—avacūrṇitaḥ . ʻparairatyantaṃ pīḍitasya catvāryetāni nāmāni iti subodhinīkāraḥ . avagarhitaṃ yathā bhavati tathā bhṛśaṃ pīḍyata iti avarīṇaḥ . ʻrī gatireṣaṇayoḵ . reṣaṇaṃ hiṃseti dhātuvṛttiḥ . ktaḥ . ʻlvādibhyaḵ (8. 2. 44) iti niṣṭhānatvam . atra kecit—adharīṇa iti dvitīyākṣaraṃ dantyavargacaturthaṃ paṭhanti . tatrādharaśabdāt khapratyayopapattiścintanīyā .. dhik ityavyayaṃ bhartsanaśabdasya viṣayaḥ . kuto dhikkṛtaḥ .. dhvasiḥ dhātupārāyaṇe gatyarthaḥ paṭhitaḥ . prayoge tu hiṃsāyāṃ vartate . tataḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye 'padhvastaḥ .. duḥkhajanakatvasādṛśyāt cūrṇaśabdena parakṛtastiraskāro vivakṣitaḥ . avakīrṇaṃ cūrṇamasminniti, avacūrṇaḥ kṛto'vacūrṇitaḥ . ṭīkāsarvasvakārastu apadhvastādidvayaṃ kṣiptacūrṇe vartata iti vyācaṣṭa (pṛ. 42) . avacūrṇayatīti ṇici (3. 1. 25) ktapratyaye avacūrṇitaḥ .. anāyāsakṛtaṃ phāṇṭam . āyāsaḥ prayatnādhikyam . tadantareṇaiva svalpavyāpāramātrāt kaṣāyarūpaṃ yadbhavati tat phāṇṭamityucyate . phaṇati gacchati dravarūpatvād naikatrāvatiṣṭhata iti phāṇṭam . ʻphaṇa gataü . ktapratyaye sati ʻkṣubdhasvānta . . . phāṇṭabāḍhāni . . .  ityādinā (7. 2. 18) nipātanād iḍāgamābhāvaḥ . ṣṭutvaṃ ca . atra sūtre kāśikā—ʻyadapakvam apiṣṭaṃ kaṣāyam udakasaṃparkamātrād vibhaktarasam īṣaduṣṇaṃ bhavati tatphāṇṭamucyate . alpaprayāsasādhyatvād anāyāsena lakṣyate iti (pṛ. 303) . atra ṭīkāsarvasvakāro'pi—
ʻdravyādacūrṇitāt toye pratapte viniveśite .
raso niryāti yaḥ sadyaḥ sa phāṇṭa iti saṃstutaḥ ..
iti . subhūtirapyāha—ʻyadudakanimajjanamātreṇa tasminnevāhani niryāsavinirgamāt saṃpannamauṣadhaṃ kaṣāyadravyātmakaṃ tadanāyāsakṛtaṃ phāṇṭamiti .. svanitadhvanite same . tāḍyamānasya bheryādernāmanī . vyaktayoge ca .. 94 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.094>  
avarīṇo dhikkṛtaḥ . ninditanāmanī .. avadhvasto'vacūrṇitaḥ . cūrṇīkṛtanāmanī . anuktam—ʻavajñāto'pahastitaḵ . karavisṛṣṭanāmanī .. anāyāsakṛtaṃ phāṇṭam . āyāsena vinā racitaṃ phāṇṭaṃ syāt . phāṇṭamauṣadham .. svanitaṃ dhvanitaṃ same . śabditanāmanī .. 94 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.132
AK.03.01.095ab baddhe saṃdānitaṃ mūtamudditaṃ saṃditaṃ sitam .
AK.03.01.095cd niṣpakvaṃ kvathitaṃ pāke kṣīrājyahaviṣāṃ śṛtam .. 95 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.095>  
baddha iti—badhyate sma baddham . ʻbadha saṃyamane . saṃdānyate badhyata iti saṃdānitam . ʻdāna khaṇḍane . mūyata iti mūtam . ʻmūñ bandhane . uddīyata iti udditam . saṃdīyata iti saṃditam . ʻdo 'vakhaṇḍane . sīyata iti sitam . ʻṣiñ bandhane . rajjvādinā baddhasya paśvādernāmāni .. niḥśeṣeṇa pakvaṃ niṣpakvam . kvathyate niḥśeṣeṇa pacyate kvathitam . ʻkvathe niṣpāke . aṣṭabhāgāvaśiṣṭasya kaṣāyādernāmanī .. śrāyate pacyata iti śṛtam . ʻśrā pāke . kṣīrājyavaviṣāṃ pākasya nāma .. 95 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.095>  
baddhe—sitam . rajjvādinā nigalitāvayavasya balīvardādernāmāni . ʻbadha saṃyamane ityataḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye baddham . ʻdāma saṃdānam iti pūrvamuktam (1, pṛ. 596) . tat saṃjātamasyeti saṃdānitam . tārakādiḥ (5. 2. 36) . ʻmūṅ bandhane iti dhātormūtam . ṭīkāsarvasvakāra āha (pṛ. 43)—ʻmurvī bandhane ityataḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye vakāralope “rvorupadhāyā dīrgha ikaḥ” (8. 2. 76) ityupadhādīrghe ca mūrṇam iti .. utpūrvaḥ saṃpūrvaśca dyatidhātuḥ bandhane vartate . ata eva prāguktam (1, pṛ. 499) ʻsame tūddānabandhane iti . tataḥ ktapratyaye sati udditam . saṃditaṃ ca . ʻdyatisyati . . .  ityādinā (7. 4. 40) itvam .. ʻṣiñ bandhane ityataḥ ktapratyaye dhātvādisatve (6. 1. 64) ca sitam .. niṣpakvaṃ kvathitam . agnisaṃyogenāṣṭamabhāgādyavaśeṣitasya triphalākaṣāyādernāmanī . niḥśeṣeṇa pacyate sma niṣpakvam .. ʻkvathe niṣpāke ityataḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye kvathitam .. pāke—śṛtam . pakveṣu puroḍāśājyakṣīreṣu pratyekaṃ śṛtaśabdo vartata ityarthaḥ . ʻśṛtaṃ mayi śrayatām (tai. brā. 3. 7. 6. 12) iti kṣīre prayogaḥ . ʻāgnīdhro havīṃṣi suśṛtāni karoti iti havirmātre ityādi . havirgrahaṇenaiva kṣīrasyāpi grahaṇe ʻśṛtaṃ pāke (6. 1. 27) iti sūtre ʻkṣīrahaviṣoriti vaktavyam iti vārttikacchāyayā pṛthaggrahaṇam . ʻghṛtamājyaṃ haviḵ (1, pṛ. 585) ityādau haviḥśabdasya ghṛtamātre rūḍhatvāt tasyaiva grahaṇaṃ mā bhūdityājyasyāpyupādānaṃ kṛtam . kvacittu ʻpāke syāt kṣīrahaviṣoḥ śṛtam ityeva pāṭhaḥ . śrāyata iti śṛtam . ʻśrā pāke iti kṣīrahaviṣorarthayoḥ śṛbhāvo nipātitaḥ .. 95 ..</Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.095>  
baddhe—sitam . baddhanāmāni .. niṣpakvaṃ kvathitam . nitarāmagninā saṃtaptanāmanī .. pāke—śṛtam . kṣīrādīnāṃ pāke śṛtaṃ syāt . śṛtaṃ kṣīrāmājyaṃ havirvā . anyatra śrāṇā yavāgūḥ .. 95 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.134
AK.03.01.096ab nirvāṇo munivahnyādau nirvātastu gatānile .
AK.03.01.096cd pakvaṃ pariṇate gūnaṃ hanne mīḍhaṃ tu mūtrite .. 96 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.096>  
nirvāṇa iti—nirvāti śāmyati smeti nirvāṇaḥ . ʻvā gatigandhanayoḵ . śāntamunivahnyormokṣādernāma .. nirgato vāto'syeti nirvātaḥ . nivṛttasaṃcārasya vāyornāma .. pacyate kālakrameṇeti pakvam . ʻḍupacaṣ pāke . pariṇamati avasthāntaramāpadyata iti pariṇatam . ʻṇamu prahvatve śabde cö . kālena pariṇāmaṃ gatasya buddhyādernāmanī .. gūyate gudenotsṛjyate gūnam . ʻgu purīṣotsarge . hadyate gudeneti hannam . ʻhada purīṣotsarge . gudānniḥsṛtasya purīṣādernāmanī .. mihyate sicyate'neneti mīḍham . ʻmiha secane . mūtryate prasrūyata iti mūtritam . ʻmūtra prasravaṇe . mehanenotsṛṣṭasya mūtrasya nāmanī .. 96 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.096>  
nirvāṇo munivahnyādau . nirvāti sma nirvāṇaḥ . ʻvā gatigandhanayoḵ . ktaḥ . ʻnirvāṇo'vāte (8. 2. 50) iti vātavyatiriktārthe niṣṭhānatvena nipātitaḥ . yathā—nirvāṇo muniḥ, mukta ityarthaḥ . nirvāṇo gajaḥ, magna ityarthaḥ . nirvāṇo mokṣa ityādi .. nirvātastu gate'nile . vātarahita ityarthaḥ . nirvāti sma nirvātaḥ . nirvāto deśaḥ . nirvātā śālā . nirvātaṃ mandiramityādi .. pakvaṃ pariṇate . kālavaśena paripākaṃ gate avasthāntarāpannatvena pakvasādṛśyāt pakvam . yathā—pakvā buddhiḥ, pakvaṃ kāryam ityādi . pakvaśabdo'traiva varge vyutpāditaḥ (ślo. 91) .. paraṇamati sma pariṇatam . pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntarāpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ . ʻupasargādasamāse'pi ṇopadeśasyö (8. 4. 14) iti ṇatvam .. gūnaṃ hanne . gudamukhād bahirutsṛṣṭasya purīṣādernāmanī . yathā—gūnaṃ purīṣam . gūnā yavāgūḥityādimanuṣyavargoktāni utsṛṣṭānutsṛṣṭasādhāraṇapurīṣasyeti na paunaruktyam . gūyate smeti gūnam . ʻgu purīṣotsarge . ʻdugvordīrghaśceti vaktavyam (vā. 8. 2. 44) iti niṣṭhānatvaṃ dīrghaśca . hadyate pāyudeśāditi hannam . ʻhada purīṣotsarge . ʻradābhyām . . .  (8. 2. 42) iti niṣṭhānatvam . kecittu śabdadvayamapi kartari niṣṭhāyāṃ kṛtapurīṣotsarge prāṇini vartata ityāhuḥ .. mīḍhaṃ tu mūtrite . bahirutsṛṣṭasya mūtrasya nāmanī . mihyate sicyate sma mīḍham . ʻmiha secane . ktapratyaye ʻho ḍhaḵ (8. 2. 31) iti ḍhatve ʻjhaṣastathordho'dhaḵ (8. 2. 40) iti niṣṭhātakārasya dhatve, ṣṭutve (8. 4. 41) ḍhalope (8. 3. 13) dīrghaśca (6. 3. 111) .. mūtryate prasrūyata iti mūtritam . ʻmūtra prasravaṇe . śabdadvayamapi pūrvavat kartari niṣṭhāyām utsṛṣṭamūtre prāṇini vartata iti kecit . yathā mūtrito bāla ityādi .. 96 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.096>  
nirvāṇo munivahnyādau . munivahniprabhṛtau nirvāṇaḥ syāt . nirvāṇo muniḥ . mukta ityarthaḥ . nirvāṇo vahniḥ, dīpo vā . vinaśvaratayā sthita ityarthaḥ . nirvāṇo hastī . jale nimagna ityarthaḥ . ʻnirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtau mokṣe vināśe gajamajjane iti viśvaprakāśikā (pṛ. 52, ślo. 56) .. nirvātastu gate'nile . vāyāvapi nirvātaḥ syāt . nirvāto vāyuḥ . sthira ityarthaḥ .. pakvaṃ pariṇate . paripakvanāmanī .. gūnaṃ hanne . kṛta purīṣasya nāmanī .. mīḍhaṃ tu mūtrite . kṛtamūtrasya nāma .. 96 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.136
AK.03.01.097ab puṣṭe tu puṣitaṃ soḍhe kṣāntamudvāntamudgate .
AK.03.01.097cd dāntastu damite śāntaḥ śamite prārthite'rditaḥ .. 97 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.097>  
puṣṭa iti—puṣyata iti puṣṭam . puṣitaṃ ca . ʻpuṣa puṣṭaü . puṣṭāvayavasya nāmanī .. sahyate mṛṣyate smeti soḍham . ʻṣaha marṣaṇe . kṣamyata iti kṣāntam . ʻkṣamūṣ sahane . sahanādernāmanī .. udvamyate udvāntam . ʻṭuvamu udgiraṇe . udgamyate sma udgatam . tvagādikaṃ bhittvodgatasya lohitādernāmanī .. damyate śikṣyata iti dāntaḥ . damitaśca . ʻdamu upaśamane . ācāryādiśikṣayā śikṣitasya nāmanī .. śamyate smeti śāntaḥ śamitaśca . ʻśamu upaśamane . śāntasya munyādernāmanī .. prārthyata iti prārthitaḥ . artha upayācñāyām . ardyate sma arditaḥ . ʻarda gatau yācane cö . yācitasya padārthasya nāmanī .. 97 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.097>  
puṣṭe tu puṣitam . muṣṭāhārādibhiḥ upacitāvayasya nāmanī . puṣyate sma puṣṭam . ʻpuṣa puṣṭaü . divādiḥ . aniṭkārikāsu puṣyati śuṣyatīti daivādikasya grahaṇāt iḍāgamo nāsti . bhauvādikāttu karmakartari ktapratyaye bhavatyeva . svayameva puṣyate sma puṣitam .. soḍhe kṣāntam . anādṛtasya vākpāruṣyāderaparādhasya nāmanī . yathā—soḍhāḥ paruṣālāpāḥ, soḍhaḥ kaśāghātaḥ iti . sahyate sma soḍham . ʻṣaha marṣaṇe . ktapratyayaḥ . ḍhatvadhatvaṣṭutvaḍhalopeṣu ʻsahivahorodavarṇasyö (6. 3. 112) ityokārādeśaḥ .. kṣamyate sma kṣāntam . ʻkṣamūṣ sahane . karmaṇi ktapratyaye sati ʻanunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti (6. 4. 15) .. ityupadhādīrghaḥ, anunāsikasya parasavarṇādeśaśca (8. 4. 58) ..  udvāntamudgate . valmīkakuharāderudgacchato dandaśūkādernāmanī . udvamyate bahirudgīryate smeti udvāntam . ktapratyayaḥ . upadhādīrghaḥ (6. 4. 15), parasavarṇadeśaśca (8. 4. 58) .. ʻohāṅ gataü iti dhātoḥ utpūrvāt ʻoditaścö (8. 2. 44) iti niṣṭhānatve sati uddhānamiti subhūticandrādayaḥ . gamerutpūrvāt kartari ktapratyaye (3. 4. 72) udgataḥ .. dāntastu damite . karmakaraṇabhāravahanādikleśasahatvena kṛtaśikṣasya bhṛtyabalīvardādernāmanī . brahmavargoktasyāpi dāntasya (1, pṛ. 474) viśeṣyanighnaprastāve vaikalpikarūpāntarapradarśanārthamabhidhānamityapaunaruktyam . damyate svāminā niyamyata iti damitaḥ . ʻdamu upaśame . hetumaṇṇijantāt karmaṇi ktapratyaye iḍāgame ʻniṣṭhāyāṃ seṭi (6. 4. 52) iti ṇilopaḥ . ʻvā dāntaśānta . . .  ityādinā (7. 2. 27) vikalpena nipātanād iḍāgamābhāve dāntaḥ .. śāntaḥ śamite . pratikriyānivartitasya rogādernāmanī . ʻśamu upaśame ityato hetumaṇṇici pūrvavadeva śamitaḥ, śānta iti rūpadvayasiddhiḥ .. prārthite'rditaḥ . yācitasya dhanādernāmanī . ʻartha upayācñāyām ityasmāt curādiṇyantāt karmaṇi ktapratyaye prārthitaḥ .. ʻarda gatau yācane cö ityataḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye iḍāgame ca arditaḥ .. 97 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.097>  
puṣṭe tu puṣitam . puṣṭanāmanī .. soḍhe kṣāntam . soḍhanāmanī .. udvāntamudgate . udgatanāmanī . dāntastu damite . damitanāmanī . dānto'śvaḥ .. śāntaḥ śamite . śamitanāmanī . śānto rogaḥ .. prārthite'rditaḥ . yācitanāmanī .. 97 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.137
AK.03.01.098ab jñaptastu jñāpite channaśchādite pūjite'ñcitaḥ .
AK.03.01.098cd pūrṇastu pūrite kliṣṭaḥ kliśite'vasite sitaḥ .. 98 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.098>  
jñapta iti—jñāpyata iti jñaptaḥ . jñāpitaśca . ʻjñā avabodhane . upādhyāyādinā jñāpitasya padārthasya nāmanī .. chadyata iti channaḥ . ʻchada apavāraṇe . chāditaśca . chāditasya paṅkajādernāmanī .. pūjyata iti pūjitaḥ . ʻpūja pūjāyām . añcyate pūjyata iti añcitaḥ . ʻañcu gatipūjanayoḵ . pūjitasya devādernāmanī . pūryata iti pūrṇaḥ . pūritaśca . ʻpūrī āpyāyane . jalādinā pūritasya kumbhādernāmanī .. kliśyate bādhyata iti kliṣṭaḥ . kliśitaśca . ʻkliśū vibādhane . dāridryādinā pīḍitasya nāmanī .. avasyati paryavasyati smeti avasitaḥ . sitaśca . ʻṣo'ntakarmaṇi . samāptasya kāryādernāmanī .. 98 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.098>  
jñaptastu jñāpite . gurūpadeśādinā prakāśitasyārthasya nāmanī . yathā—jñapto'yamarthaḥ . jñāpito'yamarthaḥ . ʻjñā avabodhane ityasmād hetumaṇṇyantād ʻvā dāntaśāntapūrṇadastaspaṣṭacchannajñaptāḵ (7. 2. 27) iti sarvārthasādhāraṇyena nipātanādiḍāgamābhāve jñaptaḥ . iḍāgamapakṣe jñāpitaḥ . kecittu—jñapita iti hrasvādiṃ paṭhitvā jñapite saṃjñapite chāgādau vartata iti vyācakṣate . tatra ʻjñā māraṇatoṣaṇaniśāmaneṣü iti dhātusūtreṇa mitsajñāyāṃ satyāṃ ʻmitāṃ hrasvaḵ (6. 4. 92) iti hrasvatve ca jñapitamiti bhavati . jñaptaśabdasya tu sarvārthasādhāraṇyena nipātanād māritādyarthatraye'pi sādhutvam . yathā—ʻsaṃjñaptahomaṃ juhoti (āpa. śrau. 7. 17. 3) ityādi .. channaśchādite . āvaraṇakadravyeṇāprakāśitarūpasya nāmanī . yathā—meghacchanno dinakaraḥ, sicayacchannaṃ kucayugam ityādi . chādyate sma channaḥ . chāditaśca . ʻchada apavāraṇe . atrāpi pūrvavad vikalpena nipātanāt śabdadvayasiddhiḥ .. pūjite'ñcitaḥ . ʻpūja pūjāyām ityataḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye pūjitaḥ . ʻañcu gatipūjanayoḵ . ʻañceḥ pūjāyām (7. 2. 53) iti niyamād ʻyasya vibhāṣȫ (7. 2. 15) itīḍāgamapratiṣedho nāsti . ʻnāñceḥ pūjāyām (6. 4. 30) ityupadhānakāralopābhāve sati añcitaḥ . ʻsyādarhite namasyita . . . (ślo. 101) ityādinā vakṣyamāṇād gurvādirūpāt pūjitād anyādṛśa evāyaṃ pūjitaḥ kenacidviśeṣeṇa prāptotkarṣalakṣaṇaḥ . tatrāñcitaśabdaḥ . yathā—ʻhāsāñcitā vacobhaṅgī valanāñcitamīkṣaṇam iti .. pūrṇastu pūrite . udakādinā pūritasya kaṭakādernāmanī . pūryate sma pūrṇaḥ . pūrvavannipātanāt (7. 2. 27) sādhuḥ . vaikalpika iḍāgame sati pūritaḥ .. kliṣṭaḥ kliśite . putraśokādinā pīḍitasya nāmanī . kliśyate sma kliṣṭaḥ . ʻkliśū vibādhane . ktaḥ . kliśitaśca, ʻkliśaḥ ktvāniṣṭhayoḵ (7. 2. 50) iti vikalpeneḍāgamaḥ .. avasite sitaḥ . samāptasya nāmanī . avasyati antaṃ gacchati sma avasitaḥ . sitaśca . ʻṣo'ntakarmaṇi . ktapratyayaḥ . ʻdyatisyatimāsthāmitti kiti (7. 4. 40) iti dhātorākārasyetvam .. 98 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.098>  
jñaptastu jñāpite . ghaṭādipāṭhād bodhitanāmanī . curādipāṭhād buddhanāmanī .. channaśchādite . ācchāditanāmanī .. pūjite'ñcitaḥ . pūjārthe'ñcitaḥ syāt . seṭ . anyatrāniṭ . udaktamudakaṃ kūpāt .. pūrṇastu pūrite . pūritanāmanī .. kliṣṭaḥ kliśite . kleśitanāmanī . ʻuḍhikiṃpapaḍḍhavāṃḍü . avasite sitaḥ . niścitanāmanī .. 98 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
