AK.03.01.099ab pruṣṭapluṣṭoṣitā dagdhe taṣṭatvaṣṭau tanūkṛte .
AK.03.01.099cd vedhitacchidritau viddhe vinnavittau vicārite .. 99 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.099>  
pruṣṭeti—pruṣyata iti pruṣṭaḥ. ʻpruṣa dāhe . pluṣyate pluṣṭaḥ . ʻpluṣa dāhe . uṣyata ityuṣitaḥ . ʻuṣa dāhe . dahyata iti dagdhaḥ . ʻdaha bhasmīkaraṇe . dagdhasya tṛṇādernāmāni .. takṣyata iti taṣṭaḥ . ʻtakṣū tanūkaraṇe . tvakṣyata iti tvaṣṭaḥ . ʻtvakṣū tanūkaraṇe . vardhakyādinā tanūkṛtasya kāṣṭhādernāmanī .. vedhyate smeti vedhitaḥ . ʻvidha vidhāne . chidraṃ saṃjātamasyeti chidritaḥ . viddhyata iti viddhaḥ . ʻvyadha tāḍane . sūcyādinā viddhasya karṇamūlādernāmāni .. vidyate vicāryate vinnaḥ . vittaśca . ʻvida vicāraṇe . vicāryata iti vicāritaḥ . ʻcara gatibhakṣaṇayoḵ . vicāritasya kāryādernāmāni .. 99 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.099>  
pruṣṭa—dagdhe . bhasmāṅgārāvaśeṣitasya kāṣṭhādernāmāni . ʻpruṣa pluṣa dāhe . ʻuṣa dāhe . ʻdaha bhasmīkaraṇe . etebhyaḥ karmaṇi ktapratyaye pruṣṭaḥ, pluṣṭaḥ, uṣitaḥ, dagdhaśceti catvāraḥ śabdāḥ krameṇa nirvaktavyāḥ .. taṣṭatvaṣṭau tanūkṛte . vāśyādivyāpārakṛtena bahiravayavāpasāraṇena svalpaparimāṇīkṛtasya stambhādernāmāni . ʻtakṣū tvakṣū tanūkaraṇe . ābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ karmaṇi ktapratyaye ʻskoḥ saṃyogādyorante cö (8. 2. 29) iti saṃyogādibhūtasya kakārasya lope niṣṭhātakārasya ṣṭutve taṣṭaṃ tvaṣṭaṃ ca .. vedhitacchidritau viddhe . sūcyādinā sarandhrīkṛtasya nāmāni . vedhaḥ sūcyādikṛtaṃ randhraṃ saṃjāto'syeti vedhitaḥ . ʻvidha vidhāne ityasmādvā curādiṇyantāt karmaṇi niṣṭhā .. chidraṃ randhraṃ saṃjātamasyeti chidritaḥ .. viddham ihaiva varge vyutpāditam (ślo. 87) .. vinnavittau vicārite . ubhayatra guṇadoṣatāratamyacintayā grāhyatvena nirdhāritārthasya nāmāni . ʻvida vicāraṇe iti dhātoḥ karmaṇi niṣṭhāyāṃ ʻnudavida . . .  ityādinā (8. 2. 56) vikalpena niṣṭhānatve vinnaḥ, vittaśca .. 99 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.099>  
pruṣṭa—dagdhe . dagdhanāmāni .. taṣṭa—tanūkṛte . vāsyādinālpīkṛtanāmāni . ʻcakkapaḍḍhadi . vedhita—viddhe . viddhanāmāni . ʻkorayapaḍḍhadi .. vinna—vicārite . vicāritanāmanī .. 99 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.100ab niṣprabhe vigatārokau vilīne vidrutadrutau .
AK.03.01.100cd siddhe nirvṛttaniṣpannau dārite bhinnabheditau .. 100 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.100>  
niṣprabha iti—nirgatā prabhā asmāditi niṣprabhaḥ . viśeṣeṇa gatā prabhā asmāditi vigataḥ . na vidyate roko dīptiryasyeti arokaḥ . divā niṣprabhasya candramaṇḍalādernāmāni .. vilīyate'gnāviti vilīnaḥ . ʻlī dravīkaraṇe . vidravatyagnisaṃyogāditi vidrutaḥ . drutaśca . ʻdru gataü . agnisaṃyogād vilīnasya ghṛtādernāmāni .. siddhyatīti siddhaḥ . ʻṣidhu saṃrāddhaü . nirvartata iti nirvṛttaḥ . ʻvṛtu vartane . niṣpadyata iti niṣpannaḥ . ʻpada gataü . pākādinā siddhasyaudanādernāmāni . dāryata iti dāritaḥ . ʻdṛ vidāraṇe . bhidyata iti bhinnaḥ . bheditaśca . ʻbhidir vidāraṇe . prahārādinā bhinnasya ghaṭādernāmāni .. 100 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.100>  
niṣprabhe viratārokau . kāntihīnasya divātanacandrādernāmāni . nirgatā prabhā kāntirasmāditi niṣprabhaḥ . virataśca arokaśceti dvandvaḥ . sato'pyarthakriyākāritvābhāvād virataḥ uparatasadṛśa ityarthaḥ . ʻruca dīptaü ityasmāddhātoḥ ghañi (3. 3. 18) roko dīptiḥ . sa nāstyatreti arokaḥ . eṣa ciraṃtanavyākhyātṛsaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥ . kaścittu—vigataḥ ālokaḥ prakāśo'syeti vigatāloka iti pāṭhena vyācaṣṭa .. vilīne vidrutadrutau . agnisaṃyogādinā dravībhūtasya sarpirjatusuvarṇādernāmāni . vilīyata iti vilīnam . ʻlīṅ dravīkaraṇe . ktaḥ . ʻājyaṃ vilāpyö ityādiprayogaḥ .. dravatvaguṇayogād dravati gacchati naikatrāvatiṣṭhata iti drutam . vidrutaṃ ca . ʻdru gataü . ktaḥ (3. 4. 72) .. siddhe nirvṛttaniṣpannau . pākādisaṃskāraniṣpannasya bhaktavyañjanādernāmāni . yathā—ʻsiddhasya haviṣyasya juhuyāt iti . ʻṣidhu saṃrāddhaü ityataḥ siddham . nirvṛttaniṣpannaśabdāvapi upasargavaśāt tadarthāveva .. dārite bhinnabheditau . kuṭhārādibhirāgrādāmūlaṃ dvidhākṛtasya veṇudalādernāmāni . dāryate sma dāritam . ʻdṝ vidāraṇe . ktaḥ . bhidyate sma bhinnaḥ . ʻbhidir vidāraṇe . rudhādiḥ . curādāvapyayaṃ dhātuḥ paṭhyate . tato ṇyantāt karmaṇi ktapratyaye bheditaḥ .. 100 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.100>  
niṣprabhe vigatārokau . apratibhasya nāmāni . vikato'pi syāt . ʻvigatau vītaniṣprabhaü iti rudraḥ .. vilīne vidrutadrutau . vahnyādinā dravībhūtasya nāmāni . ʻkaragapaḍḍhadi .. siddhe nirvṛttaniṣpannau . parisimāptanāmāni .. dārite bhinnabheditau . dvedhākṛtanāmāni .. 100 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.101ab ūtaṃ syūtamutaṃ ceti tritayaṃ tantusaṃtate .
AK.03.01.101cd syādarhite namasyitanamasitamapacāyitārcitāpacitam .. 101 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.101>  
ūtamiti—ūyyate tantubhiḥ saṃtanyata iti ūtam . ʻūyī tantusaṃtāne . sīvyata iti syūtam . ʻṣivu tantusaṃtāne . ūyate tantubhiḥ saṃtanyata iti utam . ʻveñ tantusaṃtāne . vahutantusamūhasya kanthādernāmāni .. arhyata ityarhitam . ʻarha pūjāyām .. namaḥ kṛtaṃ namasyitam . namasitaṃ ca . ʻṇamu prahvatve śabde cö . apacāyyate pūjyata ityapacāyitam . apacitaṃ ca . ʻcāyṛ pūjāniśāmanayoḵ . arcyata ityarcitam . ʻarca pūjāyām . arcitasya devagṛhādernāmāni .. 101 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.101>  
ūtaṃ—tantusaṃtāne . tantubhiḥ saṃtanyate sūcīmūlastharandhrapraveśitaiḥ sūkṣmasūtrairvyāpyata iti tantusaṃtataḥ kanthākūrpāsādiḥ tatretyarthaḥ . ʻūyī tantusaṃtāne ityataḥ ktapratyaye ūtam . syūtaśabdo vaiśyavarge vyutpāditaḥ (pṛ. 569) .. ʻveñ tantusaṃtāne ityataḥ ktapratyayasaṃprasāraṇa pūrvarūpatveṣu utam .. syādarhite—apacitam . ito vargasamāptiparyantaṃ vṛttadvādaśakamāryācchandaḥ . pūjito hariharagurvādiḥ, tatraite śabdā vartante . arhyate sma arhitam . ʻarha pūjāyām . hariharagurvādiḥ namasyate pūjyate smeti namasyitaḥ . ʻnamo varivaścitraṅaḥ kyac (3. 1. 19) ityatra namasaḥ pūjāyām iti vaktavyena pūjākaraṇārthe kyacpratyaye sati sanādyantatvena dhātusaṃjñāyāṃ karmaṇi ktapratyaye iḍāgamaśca .. ʻkyasya vibhāṣȫ (6. 4. 50) iti vaikalpike yakāralope namasitaḥ .. apacāyyate pūjyate sma apacāyitaḥ . ʻcāyṛ pūjāniśāmanayoḵ iti karmaṇi ktapratyaye iḍāgamaśca .. tata eva dhātoḥ ʻapacitaṃ cö (7. 2. 30) iti sūtreṇa niṣṭhāyāmaniṭtvasya cibhāvasya ca nipātanād apacitam .. arcyate smeti arcitam . ʻarca pūjāyām .. 101 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.101>  
ūtaṃ—tantusaṃtate . tantusaṃtānitanāmāni . ʻkuṭṭapaḍḍhadi .. syādarhite—apacitam . pūjitanāmāni .. 101 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.102ab varivasite varivasyitamupāsitaṃ copacaritaṃ ca .
AK.03.01.102cd saṃtāpitasaṃtaptau dhūpitadhūpāyitau ca dūnaśca .. 102 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.102>  
varivasita iti—varivasyata upāsyata iti varivasitam . varivasyitaṃ ca . upāsyate sevyata iti upāsitam . ʻāsa upaveśane . upacaryate sevyata iti upacaritam . ʻcara gataü . śiṣyādibhiḥ saṃsevitasya upādhyāyādernāmāni .. saṃtapyate sma saṃtāpitaḥ . saṃtaptaśca . ʻtapa saṃtāpe . dhūpyate saṃtapyata iti dhūpitaḥ . dhūpāyitaśca . ʻdhūpa saṃtāpe .. dūyata iti dūnaḥ . ʻdūṅ paritāpe . agnyādisaṃtaptasya nāmāni .. 102 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.102>  
varivasite—copacaritaṃ ca . putraśiṣyādibhiḥ kṛtaparicaryāviśeṣasya pitṛgurvādernāmāni . ʻnamo varivaścitraṅaḥ kyac (3. 1. 19) ityatra varivasaḥ paricaryākaraṇarūpe'rthe kyacpratyaye pūrvavadeva vaibhāṣike yalope varivasitam, varivasyitaṃ ca .. upāsyate sma upāsitam . ʻāsa upaveśane .. upacaryate sma upacaritam . ʻcara gataü . upapūrvaḥ sevārtha iti dhātuvṛttau .. saṃtāpita—dūnaśca . nidāghakṣuttṛṣṇādibhiḥ pīḍitasya nāmāni . ʻtapa saṃtāpe ityasmāt caurādikāt saṃpūrvāt karmaṇi ktapratyaye saṃtāpitaḥ . bhauvādikāttu saṃtaptaḥ .. dhūpyate sma dhūpitaḥ . ʻdhūpa saṃtāpe . ʻgupūdhūpa . . . (3. 1. 28) ityādisūtre ʻāyādaya ārdhadhātuke vȫ (3. 1. 31) iti vikalpenāyapratyaye dhūpāyitaḥ .. ʻṭudu upatāpe ityasmād ʻdugvordīrghaścö (vā. 8. 2. 44) iti niṣṭhānatve dūnaḥ . yadvā ʻdūṅ paritāpe ityasmāt svādaya odita iti pratijñānād ʻoditaścö (8. 2. 45) iti niṣṭhānatve dūnaḥ .. 102 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.102>  
varivasite—copacaritaṃ ca . sevitanāmāni .. saṃtāpita—dūnaśca . saṃtaptanāmāni .. 102 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.103ab hṛṣṭe mattastṛptaḥ prahlannaḥ pramuditaḥ prītaḥ .
AK.03.01.103cd chinnaṃ chātaṃ lūnaṃ kṛttaṃ dātaṃ ditaṃ chitaṃ vṛkṇam .. 103 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.103>  
hṛṣṭa iti—hṛṣyatīti hṛṣṭaḥ . ʻhṛṣa tuṣṭaü . mādyati tuṣyatīti mattaḥ . ʻmadī harṣe . tṛpyatīti tṛptaḥ . ʻtṛpa tṛptaü . prahlādate sma prahlannaḥ . ʻhlādī sukhe avyaktaśabde cö . pramodata iti pramuditaḥ . ʻmuda harṣe . prīyate sma prītaḥ . ʻprīṅ prīṇane . hṛṣṭasya nāmāni .. chidyate sma chinnam . ʻchidir dvaidhīkaraṇe . chāyate sma chātam . chitaṃ ca . ʻcho chedane . lūyate sma lūnam . ʻlūñ chedane . kṛtyate sma kṛttam . ʻkṛtī chedane . dāyate sma dātam . ʻdāp lavane . dīyata iti ditam . ʻdo avakhaṇḍane . vṛścyate sma vṛkṇam . ʻovraścū chedane . lavitrādinā chinnasya vastrādernāmāni .. 103 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.103>  
hṛṣṭo—prītaḥ . iṣṭaprāptijanitānandayuktasya nāmāni . hṛṣyati sma hṛṣṭaḥ . sarva ete kartari ktapratyayāntāḥ .. mādyati sma mattaḥ . ʻmadī harṣe . ʻna dhyākhyāpṝmūrcchimadām (8. 2. 57) iti niṣṭhānatvapratiṣedhaḥ . kṣībe'pi matta uktaḥ (ślo. 23) . tṛpyati sma tṛptaḥ . tṛpirdivādiḥ .. prahlādate sma prahlannaḥ . ʻhlādī sukhe cö . ʻhlādo niṣṭhāyām (6. 4. 95) iti hrasvatvam . radābhyāmiti (8. 2. 42) niṣṭhānatvam .. ʻmuda harṣe ityasmād muditaḥ . prīyate sma prītaḥ .. chinnaṃ—vṛkṇam . lavitrādinā chinnasya tṛṇādernāmāni . sarvāṇyapi karmaṇi ktapratyayāntāni . chidyate sma chinnam . ʻchidir dvaidhīkaraṇe . niṣṭhānatve (8. 2. 42) chinnam .. ʻcho chedane . ktaḥ . chātam . ʻśācchoranyatarasyām (7. 4. 41) iti vikalpenetve chitam .. ʻlūñ chedane lūnam . ʻlvādibhyaḵ (8. 2. 44) iti niṣṭhānatvam .. kṛtyate chidyate sma kṛttam . ʻkṛtī chedane . ʻśvīdito niṣṭhāyām (7. 2. 14) iti iḍāgamapratiṣedhaḥ .. dāyate sma dātam . ʻdāp lavane .. dīyate khaṇḍyate sma ditam . ʻdo avakhaṇḍane . ʻdyatisyatimāsthāmitti kiti (7. 4. 40) iti itvam .. vṛścyate sma vṛkṇam . ʻovraścū chedane ityasmāt ʻskoḥ saṃyogādyorante cö (8. 2. 29) iti saṃyogādibhūtasya sakārasya lopaḥ . ʻgrahijyā . . .  ityādinā (6. 1. 16) saṃprasāraṇam .. 103 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.103>  
hṛṣṭo—prītaḥ . hṛṣṭanāmāni .. chinnaṃ—vṛkṇam . chinnanāmāni .. 103 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.104ab srastaṃ dhvastaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ skannaṃ pannaṃ cyutaṃ galitam .
AK.03.01.104cd labdhaṃ prāptaṃ vinnaṃ bhāvitamāsāditaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca .. 104 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.104>  
srastamiti—srasyate srastam . ʻsraṃsu avasraṃsane . dhvasyate dhvastam . ʻdhvaṃsu avasraṃsane . bhraśyata iti bhraṣṭam . ʻbhraṃśu avasraṃsane . skadyata iti skannam . ʻskandir gatiśoṣaṇayoḵ . padyate srasyate pannam . ʻpada gataü . cyūyata iti cyutam . ʻcyuṅ gataü . galyata iti galitam . ʻgala sravaṇe . srastasya vastrādernāmāni .. labhyata iti labdham . ʻḍulabhaṣ prāptaü . prāpyata iti prāptam . ʻāplṛ vyāptaü . vidyata iti vinnam . ʻvidlṛ lābhe . bhāvyata iti bhāvitam, bhūtaṃ ca . ʻbhū prāptaü . āsādyate prāpyata iti āsāditam . ʻṣadlṛ viśaraṇādaü . labdhasya dānādernāmāni .. 104 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.104>  
srastaṃ—galitam . nūtanaghaṭāderadhaḥprasṛtasya tailajalādernāmāni . ʻsraṃsu avasraṃsane ʻdhvaṃsu gataü, ʻbhraṃsu adhaḥpatane, ʻskandir gatiśoṣaṇayoḵ, ʻpada gataü, ʻcyuṅ gataü, ʻgala sravaṇe . etebhyaḥ saptabhyo dhātubhyaḥ kartari ktāntāḥ srastādayaḥ sapta śabdā veditavyāḥ . caturthapañcamayostu radābhyāmiti (8. 2. 42) niṣṭhānatvam .. labdhaṃ—bhūtaṃ ca . yatheṣṭaviniyāgatvena prāptasya nāmāni . ʻḍulabhaṣ prāptaü ityataḥ labdham . prapūrvād āpnoteḥ prāptam . ʻvidlṛ lābhe ityato niṣṭhānatve vinnam .. ʻbhū prāptaü ityātmanepadī dhṛṣādau paṭhitaḥ . tasmād ʻādhṛṣādvȫ iti vikalpena ṇici bhāvitam . tadabhāvapakṣe bhūtam . āṅaḥ sadiḥ padyartha iti caurādikād āṅpūrvād āsāditam . sarva ete karmaṇi niṣṭhāntāḥ .. 104 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.01.105ab anveṣitaṃ gaveṣitamanviṣṭaṃ mārgitaṃ mṛgitam .
AK.03.01.105cd ārdraṃ sārdraṃ klinnaṃ timitaṃ stimitaṃ samunnamuttaṃ ca .. 105 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.105>  
anveṣitamiti—anveṣyata ityanveṣitam . ʻeṣṛ gataü . gaveṣyata iti gaveṣitam . ʻgaveṣa mārgaṇe . anviṣyata ityanviṣṭam . ʻiṣu icchāyām . mārgyata iti mārgitam . ʻmārga anveṣaṇe . mṛgyata iti mṛgitam . ʻmṛga anveṣaṇe . ādarād vicetavyasya vastuno nāmāni .. ardyata pīḍyata ityārdram . ʻarda hiṃsāyām . ārdreṇa saha vartata iti sārdram . klidyata iti klinnam . ʻklidū ārdrībhāve . timyata iti timitam . ʻtima ārdrībhāve . stimyata iti stimitam . ʻṣṭima ārdrībhāve . samudyata ārdrīkriyata iti samunnam . uttaṃ ca . ʻundī kledane . ārdrībhūtasya nāmāni .. 105 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.105>  
anveṣitaṃ—mṛgitam . ādarātiśayenajijñāsitārthasya nāmāni . ʻeṣṛ gataü, anupūrvaḥ, ʻgaveṣa mārgaṇe, ʻiṣu icchāyām ʻmārga anveṣaṇe ʻmṛga anveṣaṇe; etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karmaṇi niṣṭhāntā anveṣitādayaḥ pañca śabdāḥ .. ārdraṃ—uttaṃ ca . ātapavātādibhiranapākṛtajalāvayavasuśleṣasya vastrādernāmāni . ardyate rasagrahaṇārthaṃ pīḍyate sma ārdram . ʻarda hiṃsāyām . āṅpūrvaḥ, rakpratyayaḥ (u. 2. 18) .. ārdraśabdena dharmamātravivakṣāyām ārdratvena saha vartata iti sārdro'pi .. klidyate sma klinnam . ʻklidū ārdrībhāve . niṣṭhānatvaṃ ca (8. 2. 42) .. ʻtima ṣṭima ārdrībhāve ityābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ karmaṇi ktapratyaye iḍāgame ca krameṇa timitaṃ stimitaṃ ca .. ʻundī kledane ityataḥ ʻnudavidondatra . . .  ityādinā (8. 2. 56) vikalpena niṣṭhānatve samunnam . abhāvapakṣe uttaṃ ca .. 105 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.01.106ab trātaṃ trāṇaṃ rakṣitamavitaṃ gopāyitaṃ ca guptaṃ ca .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.106>  
trātamiti—trāyata iti trātam . trāṇaṃ ca . ʻtraiṅ pālane . rakṣyata iti rakṣitam . ʻrakṣa pālane . avyata ityavitam . ʻava rakṣaṇe . gopyata iti gopāyitam . guptaṃ ca . ʻgupū rakṣaṇe . rakṣitasya nāmāni .. avagaṇyate nādriyata ityavagaṇitam . ʻgaṇa saṃkhyāne . avamanyate'vaślāghyata ityavamatam . ʻmana jñāne . avajñāyate tiraskriyata iti avajñātam . avamānyata ityavamānitam . ʻmāna pūjāyām . paribhūyata iti paribhūtam . ʻbhū sattāyāmö . tiraskṛtasya nāmāni .. 106 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.106>  
trātaṃ—guptaṃ ca . coravyāghrādibhayādyapākaraṇena rakṣitasya nāmāni . ṣaḍamī śabdāḥ karmaṇi niṣṭhāntāḥ . trāyate sma trātam . ʻtraiṅ pālane . ʻnudavidondatrā . . .  ityādinā (8. 2. 56) vikalpena niṣṭhānatve trātaṃ trāṇaṃ ca . ʻrakṣa pālane, rakṣitam . ʻava rakṣaṇe, avitam . ʻgupū rakṣaṇe ityasmād guptam . ʻāyādaya ārdhadhātuke vȫ (3. 1. 31) ityāyapratyaye tadantāddhātoḥ ktapratyaye gopāyitam .. avagaṇitaṃ—paribhūte . paribhūyate ādaraviṣayatayā na svīkriyate smeti paribhūtam . tatra avagaṇitādayaḥ śabdāḥ vartante . ʻgaṇa saṃkhyāne, ʻmana jñāne daivādikaḥ, ʻjñā avabodhane, ʻmāna pūjāyām; avetyupasargavaśād avajñālakṣaṇe'rthe vartamānebhyaḥ caturbhyo dhātubhyaḥ krameṇa avagaṇitam, avamatam, avajñātam, avamānitaṃ ceti catvāraḥ śabdāḥ syuḥ .. 106 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.106>

AK.03.01.107ab tyaktaṃ hīnaṃ vidhutaṃ samujjhitaṃ dhūtamutsṛṣṭam .
AK.03.01.107cd uktaṃ bhāṣitamuditaṃ jalpitamākhyātamabhihitaṃ lapitam .. 107 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.107>  
tyaktamiti—tyajyata iti tyaktam . ʻtyaja hānaü . hīyata iti hīnam . ʻohāk tyāge . vidhūyata iti vidhutam . ʻdhuñ kampane . samujjhyata iti samujjhitam . ʻujjha utsarge . dhūyata iti dhūtam . ʻdhū vidhūnane . utsṛjyata iti utsṛṣṭam . ʻsṛja visarge . tyaktasya nāmāni .. ucyata ityuktam . ʻvaca paribhāṣaṇe . bhāṣyata iti bhāṣitam . ʻbhāṣa vyaktāyāṃ vāci . udyata iti uditam . ʻvada vyaktāyāṃ vāci . jalpyata iti jalpitam . ʻjalpa vyaktāyāṃ vāci . ākhyāyata iti ākhyātam . ʻkhyā prakathane . abhidhīyata ityabhihitam . ʻḍudhāñ dhāraṇapoṣaṇayoḵ . lapyata iti lapitam . ʻlapa vyaktāyāṃ vāci . bhāṣitasya nāmāni .. 107 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.031.01.107>  
tyaktaṃ—utsṛṣṭam . dṛṣṭādṛṣṭopakārakoddeśaṃ vinaiva vairāgyeṇa parihṛtasya nāmāni . sarva ete karmaṇi ktapratyayāntāḥ . ʻtyaja hānaü . tyaktam .. hīyate sma hīnam . ktaḥ . ʻghumāsthāgāpājahātisāṃ hali (6. 4. 66) iti īkārādeśe hīnam .. ʻdhuñ kampane ityato hrasvādervipūrvād vidhutam .. ʻujjha tyāge saṃpūrvaḥ . ujjhitam .. ʻdhū vidhūnane . taudādikād dīrghāderdhūtam .. ʻsṛja visarge ityataḥ utpūrvād utsṛṣṭam .. uktaṃ—lapitam . kaṇṭharaveṇa vyaktatayā prakāśitasya vacasastadarthasya ca nāmāni . ʻvaca paribhāṣaṇe . ʻvacisvapi . . .  ityādinā (6. 1. 15) saṃprasāraṇe uktam .. ʻbhāṣa vyaktāyāṃ vāci ityato bhāṣitam .. ʻvada vyaktāyāṃ vāci ityato yajādisaṃprasāraṇe (6. 1. 15) sati uditam .. ʻjalpa vyaktāyāṃ vāci ityato jalpitam .. ʻkhyā prakathane ityāṅpūrvataḥ ākhyātam .. abhi ityupasargavaśād arthāntareṇa vartamānāt karmaṇi ktapratyaye ʻdadhāterhiḵ (7. 4. 42) iti hirādeśe sati abhihitam .. ʻlapa vyaktāyāṃ vāci ityato lapitam .. 107 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.01.108cd ūrīkṛtamurarīkṛtamaṅgīkṛtamāśrutaṃ pratijñātam .. 108 ..
AK.03.01.109ab saṃgīrṇaviditasaṃśrutasamāhitopaśrutopagatam .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.108>  
buddhamiti—budhyata iti buddham . ʻbudha avagamane . budhyata iti budhitam . ʻbudha bodhane . manyate sma manitam . ʻmana avabodhane . vidyata iti viditam . ʻvida jñāne . pratipadyate jñāyate iti pratipannam . ʻpada gataü . avasīyata ityavasitam . ʻṣo'ntakarmaṇi . avagamyata ityavagatam . ʻgamlṛ gataü . jñātasya nāmāni .. ūrīkriyate'ṅgīkriyata iti ūrīkṛtam . urarīkriyata iti urarīkṛtam . aṅgīkriyata ityaṅgīkṛtam . āśrūyate'ṅgīkriyata ityāśrutam . saṃśrutam upaśrutaṃ ca . ʻśru śravaṇe . pratijñāyata iti pratijñātam . saṃgīryate'ṅgīkriyata iti saṃgīrṇam . ʻgṝ śabde . vidyata iti viditam . ʻvida jñāne . samādhīyate'ṅgīkriyata iti samāhitam . ʻḍudhāñ dhāraṇapoṣaṇayoḵ . upagamyata ityupagatam . aṅgīkṛtasya nāmāni .. 108 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.108>  
buddhaṃ—avagate . jñātārthasya nāmāni . ʻbudha avagamane . aniṭkārikāsu śudhyati budhyatīti pāṭhād asya budhyaterdaivādikatvena iḍāgamābhāve buddham . ʻbudha bodhane iti tu bhauvādikād iḍāgame sati budhitam .. ʻmana avabodhane iti svāderiḍāgame manitam . ʻmana jñāne ityasya tu daivādikatvena ʻyaśca śyani paṭhyate maniḵ (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 299) iti pāṭhād iḍāgamo nāsti . athavā—manaḥśabdāt ʻtatkaroti (ga. sū.) iti ṇici ṭilope manitam .. ʻvida jñāne ityato viditam .. ʻpada gataü, pratipūrvo jñānārthaḥ . niṣṭhānatve (8. 2. 42) pratipannam .. ʻṣo'ntakarmaṇi . dhāturavapūrvo jñānārthaḥ . ʻdyatisyati . . . ityādinā (7. 4. 40) itve'vasitam .. avagamyate sma avagatam .. sarve śabdāḥ karmaṇi niṣṭhāntāḥ .. ūrīkṛtaṃ—upagatam . ūrīkṛtamityādiślokenaikādaśaśabdāḥ abhyupagatārthavācakāḥ . ūrī-urarītiśabdayoḥ aṅgīkaraṇārthe vartamānayoḥ ʻūryādicviḍācaścö (1. 4. 61) iti gatisaṃjñāyāṃ ʻkugatiprādayaḵ (2. 2. 18) iti kṛdantenottarapadena samāse ūrīkṛtam urarīkṛtaṃ ca . atra ādyo dīrghādiḥ . dvitīyo hrasvādiḥ . āryāvṛttānurodhāt . naiṣadhakāvye tu ʻarthiṣu svayamurīkṛtakāmyȫ (5. 117) iti prathamo hrasvādirapi prayuktaḥ . dvitīyastu dīrghādirapyastīti avyayavarge (3. 3. 254) vakṣyate .. aṅgīkriyate sma aṅgīkṛtam .. āśrūyate sma āśrutam . ʻśru śravaṇe . upasargavaśād aṅgīkārārthatvam . ata eva saṃśrutam upaśrutaṃ ca .. pratipūrvatvenāṅgīkārārthāt jānāteḥ pratijñātam .. saṃpūrvasya ʻgṝ nigaraṇe iti dhātoraṅgīkārārthatvaṃ prasiddhama . ʻṛta iddhātoḵ (7. 1. 100) iti itvam . ʻradābhyāṃ . . .  (8. 2. 42) iti niṣṭhānatve ca saṃgīrṇam .. dhātūnāmanekārthatvād ʻvida jñāne ityasmād iḍāgamapratiṣedhābhāvād viditam .. samyagādhiyate sma samāhitam . ʻdadhāterhi (7. 4. 42) .. upagamyate sma upagatam .. sarvatropasargavaśādatra dhātūnāmaṅgīkārārthatvaṃ vijñeyam .. 108 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.108>  
buddhaṃ—avagate . avagatanāmāni .. ūrīkṛtaṃ—upagatam . aṅgīkṛtanāmāni .. 108 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.110ab avagīrṇavarṇitābhiṣṭutelitāni stutārthāni .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.109>  
īḍiteti—īḍyata itīḍitam . īlitaṃ ca . ʻīḍa stutaü . śasyata iti śastam . ʻśaṃsu stutaü . paṇāyyate stūyate paṇāyitam . paṇitaṃ ca . ʻpaṇa vyavahāre stutau cö . panāyyate panāyitaṃ panitaṃ ca . ʻpana stutaü . praṇūyata iti praṇutam . ʻṇu stutaü . avagīryate stūyata ityavagīrṇam . ʻgṝ śabde . varṇyata iti varṇitam . ʻvarṇa varṇakriyāvistāraguṇavacaneṣü . abhiṣṭūyata ityabhiṣṭutam . stutaṃ ca . ʻṣṭuñ stutaü . stutasya nāmāni .. 109 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

AK.03.01.111ab abhyavahṛtānnajagdhagrastaglastāśitaṃ bhukte .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.110>  
bhakṣiteti—bhakṣyata iti bhakṣitam . ʻbhakṣa adane . carvyata iti carvitam . ʻcarva adane . lipyate bhakṣyata iti liptam . ʻlipa upadehe . līḍhamiti vā pāṭhaḥ . pratyavasīyata iti pratyavasitam . ʻṣo'ntakarmaṇi . gilyata iti gilitam . ʻgila adane . khādyata iti khāditam . ʻkhādṛ bhakṣaṇe . psāyata iti psātam . ʻpsā rakṣaṇabhakṣaṇayoḵ . abhyavahriyate bhakṣyata iti abhyavahṛtam . adyata ityannam . jagdhaṃ ca . ʻada bhakṣaṇe . grasyata iti grastam . glasyata iti glastam . ʻgrasu glasu adane . aśyata ityaśitam . ʻaśa bhojane . bhujyata iti bhuktam . ʻbhuja pālanābhyavahārayoḵ . bhuktasya nāmāni .. 110.. </Amarapadavivrti>

AK.03.01.112ab kṣiprakṣudrābhīpsitapṛthupīvarabahuprakarṣārthāḥ .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.111
kṣepiṣṭheti—atiśayena kṣipraḥ kṣepiṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena kṣudraḥ kṣodiṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena priyaḥ preṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena uruḥ variṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena sthūlaḥ sthaviṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena bahulaḥ baṃhiṣṭhaḥ . ete śabdāḥ kramāt kṣiprakṣudrābhīpsitapṛthupīvarabahūnāṃ prakarṣārthā atiśayārthā bhavanti .. 111 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.111>  
kṣepiṣṭha—prakarṣārthāḥ . kṣiprādīnāṃ bahvantānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ madhye ye padārthāḥ kṣipratvāditattaddharmaprakarṣavanto bhava.nti tathābhūtārthavacanā iṣṭhanpratyayāntāḥ kṣepiṣṭhādayaḥ ṣaḍapi śabdāḥ krameṇa bhavantītyarthaḥ . atiśayena kṣipra iti vigrahe ʻatiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanaü (5. 3. 55) itīṣṭhan pratyaye, ʻsthūladūrayuvahrasvakṣiprakṣudrāṇāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ pūrvasya ca guṇaḵ (6. 4. 156) iti yaṇādiparasya lope pūrvasya ca guṇe kṣepiṣṭhaḥ . evaṃ kṣudraśabdādapi kṣodiṣṭhaḥ .. dvitīyārdhe vṛttānurodhāt prayuktena abhīpsitapadena tatparyāyaḥ priyaśabdo lakṣitaḥ . tataśca atiśayena priya iti vigrahe ʻpriyasthirasphirorubahulaguruvṛddhatṛpradīrghavṛndārakāṇāṃ prasthasphavarbaṃhigarvarṣitrabdrāghivṛndāḵ (6. 4. 157) iti sūtreṇa priyaśabdasya prādeśe preṣṭhaḥ .. pṛthuśabdena tatparyāyaḥ uruśabdo lakṣyate . tataśca atiśayena ururiti vigrahe uruśabdasya ʻpriyasthira . . .  ityādinā (6. 4. 157) varādeśe ca variṣṭhaḥ .. pīvaraśabdena tatsamānārthaḥ sthūlaśabdo'bhipretaḥ . tataśca atiśayena sthūla iti vigrahe iṣṭhani yaṇādilope guṇe ca sthaviṣṭhaḥ .. bahuśabdena bahulaśabdo'bhipretaḥ . tasya ʻpriyasthira . . .  ityādinā (6. 4. 157) baṃhādeśe baṃhiṣṭhaḥ .. 111 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.01.111>  
kṣepiṣṭha—prakarṣārthāḥ . kṣepiṣṭādayaḥ śabdāḥ kṣiprādīnāṃ prakarṣārthakāḥ . atiśayena kṣipraḥ kṣepiṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena kṣudraḥ kṣodiṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena priyaḥ preṣṭhaḥ atiśayena uruḥ variṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena sthūlaḥ sthaviṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena bahulo baṃhiṣṭhaḥ .. 111 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.01.112cd sādhiṣṭhadrāghiṣṭhaspheṣṭhagariṣṭhahrasiṣṭhavṛndiṣṭhāḥ .. 112 ..
AK.03.01.113ab bāḍhavyāyatabahuguruvāmanavṛndārakātiśaye ..
iti śrīmadamarasiṃhakṛte nāmaliṅgānuśāsane viśeṣyanighnavargaḥ 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.01.112>  
sādhiṣṭheti—atiśayena bāḍhaḥ sādhiṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena dīrgho drāghiṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena sphiraḥ spheṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena guruḥ gariṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena hrasvo hrasiṣṭhaḥ . atiśayena vṛndārako manojño vṛndiṣṭhaḥ . ete śabdāḥ krameṇa bāḍhavyāyatabahuguvāmanavṛndārakāṇām atiśayārthā bhavanti .. 112 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
iti vaṃgalabhaṭṭopādhyāyasūrisutaliṅgayasūriviracitāyāmamarakośapadavivṛtau viśeṣyanighnavargaḥ samāptaḥ
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.01.112>  
sādhiṣṭha—atiśaye . atrātiśayaśabdo'tiśayavati vartate . bāḍhādīnāṃ madhye tattaddharmātiśayayogini prathamārthe dvandvasamāsasaṃgṛhītā iṣṭhanpratyayāntāḥ sādhiṣṭhādayaḥ śabdā vartante . atiśayena bāḍha iti vigrahe ʻantikabāḍhayornedasādhaü (5. 3. 63) iti sādhādeśe sati sādhiṣṭhaḥ .. atrāpi vṛttānurodhāt prayuktena vyāyataśabdena tatparyāyo dīrghaśabdo'bhipretaḥ . atiśayena dīrgha iti vigrahe ʻpriyasthira . . .  ityādinā (6. 4. 157) dīrghaśabdasya drāghyādeśe drādhiṣṭhaḥ .. bahuśabdena tatparyāyasphiraśabdo gṛhyate . tasya spha ityādeśe spheṣṭhaḥ .. guruśabdasya garādeśe gariṣṭhaḥ .. iha vāmanaśabdena hrasavaśabdo vivakṣitaḥ . tasya ʻsthūladūra . . .  ityādinā (6. 4. 156) yaṇādilope hrasiṣṭhaḥ .. ʻvṛndārake sure śreṣṭhe manojñe vācyaliṅgavat iti pratāpamārtaṇḍenābhidhānād iha vṛndārakaśabdena manojñaḥ śreṣṭhaśca vivakṣitaḥ . tatra atiśayavivakṣāyāṃ vṛndādeśe vṛndiṣṭhaḥ .. upalakṣaṇametat . evameva kṣudrādiśabdebhyaḥ tattadatiśayavivakṣāyāṃ tamappratyayāntā apyudāhāryāḥ . yathā—kṣipratamaḥ, priyatama ityādayaḥ . tathā ʻdvivacanavibhajyopapade tarabīyasunaü (5. 3. 57) iti sūtreṇa tarappratyayāntā īyasunpratyayāntāśca viśeṣyanighnatvena vijñeyā iti sarvaṃ samañjasam .. 112 .. 
bommagaṇṭyappayāryeṇa nāmaliṅgānuśāsane .
viśeṣyanighnavargasya saṃkṣipya vyākṛtiḥ kṛtā ..
iha yattyaktamajñānādālasyād yadupekṣitam .
pramādādanyathoktaṃ yat tadvidvadbhirviśodhyatām ..
iti viśeṣyanighnavivaraṇaṃ samāptam </Amarapadavivarana>

2. saṃkīrṇavargaḥ
AK.03.02.001ab prakṛtipratyayārthādyaiḥ saṃkīrṇe liṅgamunnayet .
AK.03.02.001cd karma kriyā tatsātatye gamye syuraparasparāḥ .. 1 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.001>  
atha saṃkīrṇavargamupakramate prakṛtīti—pratyayetarabhāgaḥ prakṛtiḥ . prakṛteritaraḥ pratyayaḥ . prakṛtibhāgasya abhidheyamarthaḥ . ādyaśabdena rūpabhedasāhacarye ca . etaiḥ prakṛtyādibhiḥ saṃkīrṇe'smin varge liṅgaṃ strīpuṃnapuṃsakamunnayet utprekṣeta .. punaḥ punaḥ kriyata iti karma kriyā ca . ʻḍukṛñ karaṇe . ete vyāpārasya nāmanī .. apare ca pare ca aparasparāḥ . bahubhiravicchedena kriyamāṇāyā gatyādernāma .. 1 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.001>  
prakṛti—liṅgamunnayet . uddeśakramānurodhena (ślo. 3. 1. 1) saṃkīrṇavarga vaktumupakramate . prakṛtiḥ prātipadikam . pratyayaḥ kṛttaddhitarūpaḥ . artho'bhidheyarūpaḥ . iha saṃkīrṇavarge vidheyaśabdasya liṅgasaṃdehe tattalliṅgaviśeṣaniyataiḥ prakṛtyādibhiḥ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ liṅgamutprekṣetetyarthaḥ . asya ca vargasya saṃkīrṇapadābhilakṣyatvamiha vakṣyamāṇārthānāmupasaṃgrahaikanigamābhāvāt . tathā hi—na tāvat teṣāmarthānāṃ prāganuktatvaṃ samāno dharmaḥ . uktānāmapi jvarahūtikhyātisaṃgrahādīnāmabhidhānāt . nāpi dharmamātratvam . dharmiṇāmapi upaghnastambaghnādīnāmapi (ślo. 19, 35) vakṣyamāṇatvāt . nāpyāviṣṭaliṅgatvam . aparasparastambaghnādīnāmapi kathanāt . nāpi prāguktasvargavyomādisaṃbandhitvādilakṣaṇasarvopasaṃgrāhakātyantābhāvaḥ . rājakagāṇikyādivad (2. 8. 3, 2. 6. 22) mānuṣyakakārīṣādīnāṃ (ślo. 42, 43) satyapi manuṣyasaṃbandhe tattatprakaraṇapāṭhaparihāṇenātraiva nirūpaṇād bhūviśeṣasya saṃstāvasyāpi (ślo. 34) atraiva prastutatvāt . anyasyāpi kasyacit samānadharmasya durnirūpatvenānantaravargasya lūnaviśīrṇaprāyārthasaṃkulatvena sakīrṇasaṃjñayā vyavahāraḥ upapadyate .
tatra prakṛtyā liṅgonnayanaṃ yathā—apare ca pare ceti dvandvasamāse aparasparāḥ . kriyāsātatye suḍāgamo nipātitaḥ . atra paravalliṅgatāniyamāt paraśabdasya ca sarvanāmatvena vācyaliṅgatāniyamād aparasparaprātipadikasyāpi vācyaliṅgatvaṃ niścīyate . aparasparāḥ sārthā yānti . aparasparāṇi brāhmaṇakulāni ityādi . tathā ʻtadyuktāt karmaṇo'ṇ (5. 4. 36) iti sūtreṇa napuṃsakaliṅgāt karmaśabdāt svārtha eva utpannataddhitāntasya kārmaṇaśabdasyāpi prakṛtivadeva napuṃsakaliṅgatvam . ata eva bālo bālakaḥ . śārī śārikā . sthānameva sthānakam ityādisvārthikapratyayāntānāṃ prakaḍatiliṅgatvameva . cāturvarṇyādiṣu tu ʻsvārthikāḥ prakṛtito liṅgavacanānyativartante iti vacanāt prakṛtiliṅgātivṛttiḥ tatra tatra viśeṣavidhānādavagantavyā . dāntiḥ śāntiḥ kāntiḥ ityādīnāṃ stryadhikāravihitapratyayāntānāṃ (3. 3. 94) pratyayavaśenaiva strītvaniścayaḥ . ploṣaśleṣagrahajayādiśabdānāmatra saptamīvibhaktyantatvena pāṭhāt liṅgasaṃdehe ʻghañantāḥ puṃsi (ślo. 3. 5. 15) iti puṃliṅgatvaṃ pratyayairevāvagamyate . gatam ityādau napuṃsakatvaṃ bhāvavihitaktapratyayena (3. 3. 114) niścīyate ityādi . arthena yathā—trāṇaśabdo (ślo. 8) niṣṭhānto vācyaliṅgaḥ . lyuḍantaśced napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ (3. 3. 115) . evaṃ ca ʻrakṣṇastrāṇe (ślo. 8) ityatra bhāvavacanarakṣṇaśabdasamabhivyāgahṛtatrāṇaśabdasya napuṃsakaliṅgatvaṃ rakṣṇarūpabhāvārthena nirṇīyate . ʻgīrṇe giraü (ślo. 11) ityatra giriśabdasya strīliṅgapuṃliṅgayostulyarūpatve'pi parvatavācakasya puṃliṅgatvāvadhāraṇād iha tadvilakṣaṇagaraṇarūpabhāvārthena strīliṅgatvamavasīyate . pratyayārthābhyāṃ samuccitābhyāṃ yathā—sahasramasyāstītyarthe ʻtapaḥsahasrābhyāṃ vinīnī ʻaṇ cö (5. 2. 102-3) iti matvarthīye'ṇpratyaye sāhasrāḥ sāmantā ityādirūpeṇa sāhasraśabdo vācyaliṅgaḥ . samūhārthe tu bhikṣādiṣu (4. 2. 38) pāṭhād aṇpratyaye sati napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . evaṃ ca sati sāhasrakārīṣa . . . (ślo. 43) ityatra dvandvasamāsamadhyavartitayā sāhasraśabdasya liṅgasaṃdehe sati aṇpratyayasya samūhārthāvalambanena bhaikṣādiśabdavat (4. 2. 38) napuṃsakatvanirṇāyakatvamityādi yathāsaṃbhavamudāhāryam .
ādyaśabdagṛhītena rūpabhedena yathā—śamathaḥ, damathaḥ (ślo. 3); chidā, bhidā (ślo. 5); vidhūnanaṃ, vidhuvanam (ślo. 4) ityādi . viśeṣavidhinā yathā—ʻvedanā na nȫ (ślo. 6) . ʻathāstriyāṃ tu niṣṭhevaḵ (ślo. 37) ityādi . ʻḍimbe ḍamaraviplavaü (ślo. 14) ityādau sāhacaryāt samāsācca liṅganiścaya iti draṣṭavyam .. atra saṃkīrṇa ityupalakṣaṇam . tathā ceha granthe sarvatrāpi nāmnāmeṣa eva liṅganirṇayopāyo boddhavyaḥ . nanu yadyevaṃ granthādāvevedaṃ vaktavyamiti cet satyam . prāgukte svargādivṛndiṣṭhānte (ślo. 3. 1. 112) śabdaprapañce paricitaniruktimārgasya prakṛtipratyayavivekaḥ sukaraḥ ityatraivedamuktam . ata eva liṅgasaṃgrahavargādāvapyayamarthaḥ kathayiṣyata iti sarvamanavadyam ..
karma kriyā ityete vyāpārasya nāmanī . kriyata iti karma . auṇādiko manin-pratyayaḥ (u. 4. 145) . ʻkarma vyāpye kriyāyāṃ ca puṃnapuṃsakayormatam iti rudravacanāt karmaśabdaḥ puṃnapuṃsakaliṅga iti daśaṭīkāsarvasvakāraḥ (3, pṛ. 51) . ʻkṣapayatyaśubhaṃ karma karmāṇaṃ cinute śubham iti prayogaśca tenaiva darśitaḥ . ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) iti bhāvārthe śapratyaye tasya ṅidvadbhāvena guṇābhāve sati ʻriṅ śayagliṅkṣü (7. 4. 28) iti riṅādeśe ca kriyāśabdaḥ . atra śeṣakāraḥ—ʻkāraḥ kṛtyaṃ na nā kāriḥ praśnoktyoḥ kārikā kṛtiḵ iti ʻḍukṛñ karaṇe ityato bhāve ghañi kāraḥ . ʻvibhāṣā kṛvṛṣoḵ (3. 1. 120) iti bhāvārthe kyap pratyaye kṛtyam . na nā; puṃliṅgaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ . ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) iti cakāreṇa kyap pratyaye kṛtyāśabdaḥ strīliṅgaḥ . ʻvibhāṣākhyānaparipraśnayoriñ cö (3. 3. 110) iti iñ pratyaye kāriśabdaḥ strīliṅgaḥ . ʻkāṃ kārimakārṣīḵ ityādipraśnottarayoreva kāriśabdasya sādhutvam . dhātvarthanirdeśe ṇvuli (3. 1. 133) kārikā . striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) kṛtiḥ ..
tatsātatye gamye syuraparasparāḥ . saṃtatasya bhāva iti saṃtataśabdena vigrahe'pi ʻaviravikanyāyenö satataśabdāt taddhitotpattau sātatyamiti rūpam . tasyā adhyayanagatyādikāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sātatye aparaiḥ paraiḥ saṃghībhūya bahubhiravicchedena kriyamāṇāyāḥ prabandhe vivakṣite sati aparasparā ityayaṃ śabdaḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ . apare ca pare ceti dvandvasamāse ʻaparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye (6. 1. 144) iti sūtreṇa suḍāgamo nipātitaḥ . atra kāśikākāreṇa ʻaparasparāḥ sārthā yānti ityudāharaṇaṃ pradarśya, tasyārtho'pi darśitaḥ ʻsaṃtatamavicchedena gacchantītyarthaḵ iti (2, pṛ. 147) . atra dvandvasamāse paravalliṅgatāniyamāt (2. 4. 26) paraśabdasya ca sarvanāmatvena vācyaliṅgatvād ʻaparasparāṇi brāhmaṇakulāni vahanti ityudāhāryam . kriyāprabandhavivakṣāyā abhāve tu aparasparā suḍāgamarahita eva prayojyaḥ . atra subhūticandraḥ—ʻtatsātatya ityatra sātatyaṃ kriyāvatāṃ kriyāyāśca viśeṣaṇam . tathā ca yatra kriyāvatāṃ tatra vācyaliṅgatvam aparasparaśabdasya . yatra kriyāyāstatra napuṃsakatvamiti pūrṇacandraḥ . ata eva “nirdiṣṭaṃ karmasātatye sudhībhiraparasparam” iti bhāguriḥ . kriyāviśeṣaṇatve yathā—aparasparamadhīyante māṇavakāḵ iti .. 1 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.001>  
prakṛti—aparasparāḥ . prastāvabhāvādyupādhibhiḥ pūrvoktaprakīrṇaśabdasaṃgrahārthe'smin saṃkīrṇavarge prakṛtyarthapratyayārtharūpabhedairliṅgaṃ tarkayet . aparasparāḥ ityatra prakṛtyartho liṅgagamakaḥ . ʻsphātirvṛddhaü (ślo. 9) ityatra pratyayārthaḥ . karma kriyā ityatra rūpabhedaḥ . bhramirbhrame ityatra sāhacaryamagocaram . viśeṣavidheranuktatvāt tadanupādānam . gīrṇirgirau (ślo. 11) ityatra sāhacaryam . ʻsaṃvedo vedanā na nȫ (ślo. 6) iti kvacid viśeṣavidhiḥ .. kriyāsātatye viṣaye kriyāvatsu triliṅgo'parasparaśabdaḥ syāt . apare ca pare ca aparaspare . aparasparā vāhanārthaṃ gacchanti . kriyāyāṃ napuṃsaka eva . aparasparaṃ gacchanti . ʻnirdiṣṭaṃ karmasātatye sudhībhiraparasparam iti bhāguriḥ .. 1 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.160
AK.03.02.002ab sākalyāsaṅgavacane pārāyaṇaturāyaṇe .
AK.03.02.002cd yadṛcchā svairitā hetuśūnyā tvāsthā vilakṣaṇam .. 2 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.002>  
sākalyeti—pāraṃ sākalyamayante prāpnuvanti yeneti pārāyaṇam . ʻaya paya gataü . sākalyavacanasya vedapārāyaṇādernāma . turayā tvarayā ayante yena turāyaṇam . parāyaṇamiti vā pāṭhaḥ . dharmameva paramityayante yena parāyaṇam . āsaktivacanasya dharmaparāyaṇādernāma .. svayamṛcchā icchā yadṛcchā . svairiṇaḥ svatantrasya bhāvaḥ
svairitā . svecchānāmanī .. hetuśūnyā āsthā akāraṇasthitiḥ vilakṣaṇamucyate . vigataṃ lakṣaṇamālocanamatreti vilakṣaṇam . vilakṣaṇanāma .. 2 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.002>  
sākalya—turāyaṇe . vedasaṃhitādeḥ yasya kasyacid granthasya sākalyena kathanaṃ sākalyavacanam . saṅgaḥ skhālityam . tadrāhityena kathanam asaṅgavacanam . tayorubhayorarthayoḥ krameṇa dvāvapi śabdau bhavataḥ . pāraṃ sākalyam ayante prāpnuvanti yena tat pārāyaṇam . tvaraṇaṃ tūḥ . ʻñitvarā saṃbhrame . bhāve kvip . ʻjvaratvara . . .  ityādinā (6. 4. 20) ūṭh . turā tvarayā asaktamayante gacchanti yena tat turāyaṇam . ʻpārāyaṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇa . . . (5. 1. 72) iti nirdeśāt sādhutvam . ciraṃtanavyākhyātārastu—ʻpārāyaṇaparāyaṇe iti paṭhitvā vyācakruḥ—ʻsākalyamāsaṅgaśca tau vadataḵ iti . atra sākalyārthaḥ pārāyaṇaśabdaḥ . tathā ca bhaṭṭikāvye—ʻratnapārāyaṇaṃ nāma laṅkeyaṃ mama maithili iti (5. 89) . atra sākalyārtho gamyata iti sākalyavacanatvam . āsaṅga āsaktiḥ . tadvācakaḥ parāyaṇaśabdaḥ . yathā—ʻatha mohaparāyaṇā satī (ku. saṃ. 4. 1) iti . mohāsaktimatītyarthaḥ . yadṛcchā svairitā . svairī svatantraḥ . tasya bhāvaḥ svairitā . svecchākṛtavyāpāro yadṛcchetyarthaḥ . ʻṛccha gatīndriyapralayamūrtibhāveṣü iti gatyarthād dhātorakārapratyaye (3. 3. 103) ṛcchā . svayamṛcchā svecchā . ʻṛlṛk (mā. sū. 2) iti sūtre ʻlṛkāropadeśo yadṛcchāśaktijānukaraṇaplutyādyarthaḵ iti vārttikakāroccāraṇāt sādhutvam . ʻsvayaṃ vidhātā suradaityarakṣasāmanugrahāvagrahayoryadṛcchayȫ iti māghaślokavyākhyāne (śiśu. 1. 71) vallabhācāryaḥ . ʻyadṛcchāśabdo svecchārtho vyutpattirahitaḥ . na hyatrāvayavārthānusāriṇī vyutpattirastīti .. hetuśūnyā tvāsthā vilakṣaṇam . prayojanarahitā yatra kutracidāsthā sthitirvilakṣaṇamucyate . vigataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sthitijñāpakaṃ prayojanamatreti vilakṣaṇam .. 2 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.002>  
sākalya—parāyaṇe . pārāyaṇaśabdaḥ sākalyavacanaḥ . sākalyaṃ kārtsnyam . parāyaṇaśabdaḥ āsaṅgavacanaḥ . āsaṅga āśrayaḥ . ʻtriṣu syāt tatpare'bhīṣṭe'pyāśraye klī parāyaṇam iti rabhasaḥ . ʻatha mohaparāyaṇā satī (ku. saṃ. 4. 1) ityatra bahuvrīhivaśāṃt strīliṅgaḥ .. yadṛcchā svairitā . niyamatyāganāmanī . ʻyadṛcchā niyamojjhitiḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 192, ślo. 6) .. hetu—vilakṣaṇam . hetuśūnyaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ syāt .. 2 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.003ab śamathastu śamaḥ śāntirdāntistu damatho damaḥ .
AK.03.02.003cd apadānaṃ karmavṛttaṃ kāmyadānaṃ pravāraṇam .. 3 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.003>  
śamatha iti—śamanaṃ śamathaḥ . śamaḥ, śāntiśca . ʻśama upaśame . krodhādyuparamasya nāmāni .. damanaṃ dāntiḥ . damathaḥ, damaśca . ʻdamu upaśame . kleśasahanasya nāmāni .. apadāyate śodhyata iti apadānam . ʻdaip śodhane . avadānamiti vā pāṭhaḥ . vṛttasya śuddhakarmaṇo nāma .. pravāryate'śubhādikamaneneti pravāraṇam . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . aicchikadānasya nāma .. 3 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.003>  
śamathaḥ—śāntiḥ . kāmakrodhādyuparamasya nāmāni . ʻśamu upaśame ityasmāt ʻśamidamibhyāmathac ityauṇādike athac pratyaye śamathaḥ .. ghañi (3. 3. 18) ʻnodāttopadeśasya. . .  (7. 3. 34) iti vṛddhipratiṣedhe śamaḥ .. striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) ʻanunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti (6. 4. 15) iti dīrghe śāntiḥ .. dāntiḥ—damaḥ . manasaḥ pratyāhārādikleśasahiṣṇutāyā nāmāni . ʻdamu upaśame iti dhātoḥ pūrvavadeva śabdatrayaṃ vyutpādanīyam .. apadānaṃ karmavṛttam . vṛttaṃ dṛḍhaṃ śuddhamityarthaḥ . nirvyūḍhamityeke . tathābhūtaṃ karma apadānam . apa iti nipāto varjanārthaḥ . puruṣo'padāyate śudhyate itarasādhāraṇyaparihāreṇa sotkarṣaḥ pratīyate'neneti apadānam . ʻdaip śodhane . karaṇe lyuṭ (3. 3. 115) .. kāmyadānaṃ pradhāraṇam . kāmyasya kamanīyasya kanakaratnādervastunaḥ kāmanāpūrvakaṃ ca dānaṃ pradhāraṇamiti subhūticandraḥ . dātṛpratigrahītroḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ manaso dhāraṇamatreti pradhāraṇam . anye tu pāṭhāntareṇa nirbruvate—prabhūtadhanaprāptyā yācakairalaṃbuddhyā kṛtaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vāraṇaṃ nivāraṇam atreti pravāraṇamiti .. 3 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.003>  
śamathaḥ—śāntiḥ . krodharāgādirāhityanāmāni .. dāntiḥ—damaḥ . kleśasahiṣṇutānāmāni .. apadānaṃ karmavṛttam . antasthadvitīyaṃ pavargadvitīyaṃ ca syāt . vṛttaṃ karma apadānaṃ syāt .. kāmyadānaṃ pravāraṇam . kāmyavastupradānaṃ pravāraṇaṃ syāt .. 3 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.004ab vaśakriyā saṃvananaṃ mūlakarma tu kārmaṇam .
AK.03.02.004cd vidhūnanaṃ vidhuvana tapaṇa prīṇanāvanam .. 4 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.004>  
vaśakriyeti—saṃvanyate vaśīkriyate'neneti saṃvananam . ʻvana saṃbhaktaü . vaśīkaraṇasya nāma .. karmaiva kārmaṇam . mūlairauṣadhādimūlairyat kriyate tasya karmaṇo nāma .. vidhūyate'neneti vidhūnanam . ʻdhūñ kampane . vidhuvanaṃ ca . ʻdhū vidhūnane . vyajanādeścālanasya nāmanī .. tṛpyate'neneti tarpaṇam . ʻtṛpa prīṇane . prīyate'neneti prīṇanam . ʻprīñ tarpaṇe . avyate'nenetyavanam . ʻava rakṣaṇādaü . brāhmaṇādīnām annāditarpaṇasya nāmāni .. 4 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.004>  
vaśakriyā saṃvananam . maṇimantrādibhirvaśīkaraṇasya nāmanī . vaśasya svānuvṛtteḥ kriyā karaṇaṃ vaśakriyā . samyag vananaṃ saṃvananam (3. 3. 115) . vanu iti dhātuḥ . asyāyamarthaḥ . vanudhāturasminnarthe vartata iti śṛṅgagrāhikayā nocyate . kiṃtu sarve'pyarthāḥ asya dhātoriti . ato'tra vaśīkaraṇamarthaḥ .. mūlakarma tu kārmaṇam . ʻtasyedam (4. 3. 120) ityaṇ . ʻan (6. 4. 167) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ . ʻkārmaṇaṃ mantratantrādiyojane karmaṇi smṛtam iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (pṛ. 52, ślo. 59) . tathā ca murārināṭake (anargha. 3. 16) prayogaḥ—
ʻnirmāyakārmaṇamṛcāmaghamarṣaṇīnā-
munmārjanirjagadaghāni tavādya vācaḵ .
iti . aghamarṣaṇamantrāṇāṃ vaśīkaraṇaṃ vidhāya tanmantranirvartyasakaladuritavidhvaṃsanakāryasya svayameva vidhāyakāstava vāca ityarthaḥ . athavā iha pravṛttihetubhūtaṃ vācikaṃ mūlaśabdenocyate . ʻyadvācā vadati tatkarmaṇā karoti iti śruteḥ (nṛsiṃha. u. 1) . vācikaṃ śrutvā yatkarmaṇā kriyate tat kārmaṇamityarthaḥ . tathā ca ʻtadyuktāt karmaṇo'ṇ (5. 4. 36) ityatra kāśikākāraḥ (2, pṛ. 86)— ʻvyāhṛtārthayā vācā yatkarma yuktaṃ tadabhidhāyinaḥ karmaśabdāt svārthe'ṇ pratyayo bhavati . karmaiva kārmaṇam . vācikaṃ śrutvā tathaiva yatkarma kriyate tatkārmaṇamityucyate iti . kātyo'pi—ʻśrutvā tu vācikaṃ karma kriyamāṇaṃ tu kārmaṇam iti . atrāpi vyākhyāne prākpradarśita eva prayogaḥ . nirmāyaṃ kaitavarahitam . tacca tatkārmaṇaṃ ceti nirmāyakārmaṇamityekaṃ padam . aghamarṣaṇamantravyāhṛtārthayuktakarmarūpatvāt kārmaṇamiti vācāmāviṣṭaliṅgaṃ viśeṣaṇam . ata eva jagadaghānāmunmārjanaśīlā iti svārthikapratyayāntānāṃ prakṛtiliṅgakatvaṃ syāt . vargasiddhatvād iha rūpabhedena kārmaṇaśabdasya napuṃsakaliṅgatvaṃ prakāśyate .. vidhūnanaṃ vidhuvanam . vakṣyamāṇaśeṣakāroktaśabdasahitā vidhūnanādayo dvādaśaśabdā vyajanapādapādicalanaprayojakavyāpārasya vācakāḥ . vidhūyate vyajanādikamanena prayojakavyāpāreṇeti vidhūnanam . ʻdhūñ kampane . vipūrvo hetumaṇṇici (3. 1. 27) ʻdhūñprīñornugvaktavyaḵ (vā. 7. 3.37) iti karaṇe lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) ʻṇeraniṭi (6. 4. 51) iti ṇilopaḥ .. vipūrvād ʻdhū vidhūnane ityato lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) kuṭāditvena (1. 2. 1) guṇābhāvād uvaṅādeśe vidhuvanam . śeṣe—
ʻvidhūnanā vidhavanaṃ vidhūtirvidhutiḥ striyau .
vidhūnyaṃ ca vidhavyaṃ ca vidhūyaṃ ca vidhāvyavat ..
vidhuvo vidhavastulyaü .
iti . ʻdhūñ kampane ityasmāt ṇici nuki (vā. 7. 3. 37) ʻṇyāsaśrantho yuc (3. 3. 107) iti yuci vidhūnanāśabdo rūpabhedāt strīliṅgaḥ .. kryādeḥ svādervā ʻdhuñ kampane ityato hrasvāt lyuṭi guṇe vidhavanam .. ʻdhūñ kampane ityato dīrghāntāt kryādeḥ svādervā ʻdhū vidhūnane ityataḥ taudādikādvā striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) vidhūtiḥ . ʻdhuñ kampane ityato hrasvāntād vidhutiḥ .. vipūrvād dhūnayateḥ ʻaco yat (3. 1. 97) iti yatpratyaye vidhūnyam . ʻdhū vidhūnane ityasmāt kuṭāderyati vidhūyam . ʻorāvaśyake (3. 1. 125) iti dhunāterdhunotervā ṇyati vṛddhau ʻvānto yi pratyaye (6. 1. 79) iti vāntādeśe ca vidhāvyam . dhuvateḥ kuṭāderapratyaye uvaṅādeśe vidhuvaḥ . svādeḥ kryādervā apratyaye guṇe ca vidhavaḥ . antimayordvayoḥ liṅgataḥ samatvamiti śeṣakārīyatulyaśabdasyārthaḥ .. tarpaṇaṃ prīṇanāvane . annādinā yat parasya tṛptijananaṃ tasya nāmāni . tṛpyati bhoktā aneneti tarpaṇam . ʻtṛpa prīṇane (3. 3. 115) .. prīyate'neneti prīṇanam . ṇici ʻdhuñprīñornugvaktayaḵ (vā. 7. 3. 37) iti nugāgamaḥ .. avyate'nena pumāniti avanam (3. 3. 115) . ʻava rakṣaṇagatiprītiṣü .. 4 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.004>  
vaśakriyā saṃvananam . vaśyakarma saṃvananaṃ syāt . ʻsaṃvananaṃ samāloce vaśīkāre prakīrtitam iti viśvaprakāśikā (pṛ. 98, ślo. 156) . mūlakarma tu kārmaṇam . mantratantrādiyojanānāma . ʻkārmaṇaṃ mantratantrādiyojane karmakārake iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 52, ślo. 59) .. mūlakarma ca kārmaṇam, iti pāṭho'pyupapannaḥ . ʻsaṃvananaṃ kārmaṇaṃ vaśīkaraṇam iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 4. 31) .. vidhūnanaṃ vidhuvanam . vidhutināmanī . ʻvidiriṃcuṭö .. tarpaṇaṃ prīṇanāvanam . tṛptināmāni . ʻtanivi .. 4 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.005ab paryāptiḥ syāt paritrāṇaṃ hastadhāraṇamityapi .
AK.03.02.005cd sevanaṃ sīvanaṃ syūtirvidaraḥ sphuṭanaṃ bhidā .. 5 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.005>  
paryāptiriti—parirakṣitumāptiḥ paryāptiḥ . ʻāplṛ vyāptaü . paritrāyate'neneti paritrāṇam . ʻtraiṅ pālane . vadhodyatasya hastasya dhāraṇamatrāstīti hastadhāraṇam . vadhyarakṣaṇasya nāmāni .. sīvyate tantubhiḥ saṃtanyata iti sīvanam . sevanam . syūtiśca . ʻṣivu tantusaṃtāne . chinnavastrādeḥ sūcyādinā sīvanasya nāmāni .. vidīryata iti vidaraḥ . ʻdṝ vidāraṇe . sphuṭyata iti sphuṭanam . ʻsphuṭir viśaraṇe . bhidyata iti bhidā . ʻbhidir vidāraṇe . ghaṭādicchedanasya nāmāni .. 5 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.005>  
paryāptiḥ—ityapi . vadhyadhātukayormadhye'nupraviśya ghātukahastasya dhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā yad vadhyasya parirakṣaṇaṃ tasyaitāni nāmānīti subodhinīkāraḥ . trāyasva trāyasveti vikrośamupaśrutya māraṇodyatasya niṣedhaḥ paryāptyāditrayamiti subhūticandraśca . ʻparyāpnotu suhṛdaṃ mahābhāgaḵ iti mahāvīranāṭake prayogaśca . paryāpnotu vālinā hanyamānaṃ sugrīvaṃ rakṣatu rāmaḥ ityarthaḥ . parirakṣitumāptiḥ paryāptiḥ . ktin (3. 3.94) . bhāve lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) paritrāṇam . mārakahastasya dhāraṇaṃ nirvyāpārīkaraṇamatreti hastadhāraṇam . rakṣakahastena vadhyasya dhāraṇaṃ rakṣaṇamiti vā hastadhāraṇam . ghātakahastasya vāraṇaṃ vivāraṇamatreti nirucya hastavāraṇamiti kecit paṭhanti .. sevanaṃ—syūtiḥ . chinnavastrādeḥ sūcyādisaṃghānakaraṇasya nāmāni . ʻṣivu tantusaṃtāne iti dhātorlyuṭi (3. 3. 115) laghūpadhaguṇe (7. 3. 86) ca sevanam . ʻṣṭivusivyordīrghaścö (sara. kaṇṭhā. 2. 4. 167) iti vikalpena dīrghe sīvanam .. tasmādeva striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) ʻcchvoḥ śūḍanunāsike cö (6. 4. 19) iti ūṭhi yaṇādeśe ca syūtiḥ .. vidaraḥ sphuṭanaṃ bhidā . veṇudaṇḍādīnāmagrādāmūlaṃ dvidhākaraṇasya nāmāni . ʻdṛ vidāraṇe iti dhātoḥ ʻṛṝdorap (3. 3. 57) ityap pratyaye vidaraḥ .. ʻsphuṭa viśaraṇe iti dhātorlyuṭi kuṭāditvena ṅittvād (1. 2. 1) guṇābhāve sphuṭanam .. ata eva dhātorghañi ṅittvābhāvena guṇe sphoṭaśca .. ʻbhidir vidāraṇe ityataḥ ʻṣidbhidādibhyo'ṅ (3. 3. 104) iti aṅpratyaye bhidā . ghañi bhedaḥ, lyuṭi bhedanaṃ ca .. 5 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.005>  
paryāptiḥ—ityapi . alamiti vacananāmāni . ʻcālunu aṃṭṭö . sevanaṃ—syūtiḥ . sūcyādinā syūtināmāni . ʻkuṭṭuṭö . vidaraḥ—bhidā . vidāraṇanāmāni . ʻcīruṭö .. 5 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.006ab ākrośanamabhīṣaṅgaḥ saṃvedo vedanā na nā .
AK.03.02.006cd saṃmūrcchanamabhivyāptiryācñā bhikṣārthanārdanā .. 6 .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.006>  
ākrośanamiti—ākrośati anenetyākrośanam . ʻkruśa āhvāne rodane cö . abhiṣajyata ityabhīṣaṅgaḥ . ʻṣañja saṅge . śapanasya nāmanī .. saṃvidyata iti saṃvedaḥ . vedanā ca . ʻvida jñāne . mithaḥ saṃvitternāmanī .. saṃmūrcchyate vyāpyata iti saṃmūrcchanam . ʻmūrcchā māhasamucchrāyayoḵ . abhivyāpyata ityabhivyāptiḥ . ʻāplṛ vyāptaü . dhūpagandhādeḥ samantād vyāpternāmanī .. yācyata iti yācñā . ʻṭuyācṛ yācñāyām . bhikṣyata iti bhikṣā . ʻbhikṣa bhikṣāyām . arthyata ityarthanā . ʻartha upayācñāyām . ardyate yācyata ityardanā . ʻarda gatau yācane cö . yācanānāmāni .. 6 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.006>  
ākrośanamabhīṣaṅgaḥ . durātmanāne garhitaṃ karmācaritamityādirūpeṇa niṣṭhurabhāṣaṇasya nāmanī . ākrośanti janā anenetyākrośanam . ʻkruśa āhvāne rodane cö . karaṇe lyuṭ (3. 3. 115) .. ābhimukhyena śāpavacanānāṃ sañjanaṃ karaṇamabhīṣaṅgaḥ . ʻṣañja saṅge . abhipūrva ākrośane . ʻupasargāt sunoti. . . iti (8. 3. 65) ṣatvam . ʻupasargasya ghañi . . . (6. 3. 122) iti dīrghaḥ .. saṃvedo vedanā na nā . yayoḥ kayościt mithaḥ saṃpratipatternāmanī iti kecit . jñānaviśeṣasyānubhavasya nāmanī iti sarvānandaḥ . ʻvida jñāne ityataḥ saṃpūrvād ghañi (3. 3. 18) saṃvedaḥ .. ʻghaṭṭivandividibhya upasaṃkhyānam (vā. 3. 3. 107) iti yuci vedanā .. na nā iti . puṃliṅgo na bhavatītyarthaḥ . lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) vedanam .. saṃmūrcchanamabhivyāptiḥ . dhūmādīnāmantataḥ prasaraṇasya nāmanī . samantato mūrcchanaṃ saṃmūcchanam . ʻmūrcchā mohasamucchrāyayoḵ . lyuṭ (3. 3. 115) . abhitaḥ samantato vyāptiḥ abhivyāptiḥ . ktin (vā. 3. 3. 94) .. yācñā bhikṣārthanārdanā . dātāraṃ prati svābhīṣṭavastuviṣayavāñchāviṣkaraṇasya nāmāni . ʻṭuyācṛ yācñāyām iti dhātoḥ ʻyajayāca . . . ityādinā (3. 3. 90) naṅpratyaye ścutvena ca yācñā .. ʻbhikṣa yācñāyām ityasmād ʻgurośca halaḵ (3. 3. 103) ityakārapratyayebhikṣā . ʻartha upayācñāyām iti caurādikād yuci (3. 3. 107) arthanā .. ʻarda gatau yācane cö iti dhātoḥ ʻhetumati cö (3. 1. 26) iti cakāreṇa svārthe ṇic pratyaye yuci ca ardanā .. brahmavargoktāyā api (pṛ. 469) yācñāyāḥ prāganuktaparyāyāntarapradarśanārthaṃ punarihānukramaṇamiti jñeyam .. 6 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.006>  
ākrośanamabhīṣaṅgaḥ . nirbhartsananāmanī . ʻtiṭṭuṭö . saṃvedo vedanā na nā . jñānanāmanī . ʻtelivi .. saṃmūrcchanamabhivyāptiḥ . sarvataḥ prasaraṇanāmanī . ʻśiloccaye mūrcchati mārutasyö iti (raghu. 2. 34) .. yācñā bhikṣārthanārdanā . yācñānāmāni .. 6 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.007ab vardhanaṃ chedane'tha dve ānandanasabhājane .
AK.03.02.007cd āpracchanamathāmnāyaḥ saṃpradāyaḥ kṣaye kṣiyā .. 7 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.007>  
vardhanamiti—vardhyate chidyata iti vardhanam . ʻvardha chedanapūraṇayoḵ . chidyata iti chedanam . ʻchidir dvaidhīkaraṇe . chedananāmanī .. ānandyata ityānandanam . ʻṭunadi samṛddhaü . sabhājyate prīyate'neneti sabhājanam . ʻsabhāja prītisevanayoḵ āpṛcchyata ityāpracchanam . ʻpraccha jñīpsāyām . suhṛdādyāliṅganasaṃbhāṣaṇādisukhāvahasya nāmāni .. āmnāyate gurupāraṃparyeṇābhyasyata ityāmnāyaḥ . ʻmnā abhyāse . samyak sarahasyaṃ pradīyata iti saṃpradāyaḥ . ʻḍudāñ dāne . guruparaṃparāyātasya vidyāsthānasya nāmanī .. kṣīyata iti kṣayaḥ . kṣiyā ca . ʻkṣi kṣaye . ācārādināśasya nāmanī .. 7 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.007>  
vardhanaṃ chedane . ghaṭapaṭādivastūnāṃ śakalīkaraṇasya nāmanī . ʻvardha chedanapūraṇayoḵ ityataḥ caurādikāt lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) vardhanam .. ʻchidir dvaidhīkaraṇe ityasmāt chedanam . vardhanasāhacaryāt pratyayārthavaśena ca napuṃsakatvam . yuc pratyayāntatve tu śabdadvayasyāpi strīliṅgaḥ . evamuttaratrāpi tatra tatra pratyayavaśena liṅgaviśeṣanirṇayaḥ kāryaḥ .. atha dve—āpracchanam . prayāṇādisamaye suhṛd-bāndhavādīnāmāliṅganasaṃlāpādisaṃjātasukhānubhavasya nāmāni . ʻṭunadi samṛddhaü iti dhātoḥ āṅpūrvāt lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) ānandanam . ʻmatri guptabhāṣaṇe ityata āṅpūrvāt lyuṭi āmantraṇamiti kecit pāṭhāntareṇa vyācakruḥ .. ʻsabhāja prītisevanayoḵ ityataḥ caurādikāt lyuṭi sabhājanam . ʻsabhājanāyopagatān munīndrān iti raghuvaṃśe (14. 18) prayogaḥ .. ʻpraccha jñīpsāyām iti dhātuḥ āṅpūrva ānandanārthaḥ . yathā—ʻāpṛcchasva priyasakhamamuṃ tuṅgamāliṅgya śailam iti kālidāsaḥ (megha. 1. 12) . tato lyuṭi āpracchanam .. athāmnāyaḥ saṃpradāyaḥ . sadguruparaṃparopadeśaprāptasya vedavyākaraṇādeḥ vidyāsthānasya nāmanī . vedamātre'pi āmnāya uktaḥ . āmnāyate gurupāraṃparyeṇābhyasyata ityāmnāyaḥ . ʻmnā abhyāse . samyak sarahasyaṃ śiṣyāya pradīyata iti saṃpradāyaḥ . ubhayatrāpi karmaṇi ghañi (3. 3. 18) ʻāto yuk ciṇkṛtoḵ (7. 3. 33) iti yugāgamaḥ . śabdadvayamapi bhāvavihitaghañantatvena sadguruparaṃparāgatasarahasyopadeśamātravacanamiti kecit .. kṣaye kṣiyā . kṣaye ācāranāśalakṣaṇakṣayaviśeṣe kṣiyāśabdo vartata ityarthaḥ . ata eva ʻkṣiyāśīḥ praiṣeṣu tiṅākāṅkṣam (8. 2. 104) iti sūtre kāśikākāraḥ (2, pṛ. 420)—ʻkṣiyā ācārabhedaḵ, dharmavyatikrama iti . ʻkṣi kṣaye ityasmād ʻeraci (3. 3. 56) kṣayaḥ . ʻkṣīṣ hiṃsāyām . ʻṣidbhidādibhyo'ṅ (3. 3. 104) ityaṅi kṣiyā . eracaḥ puṃliṅgaviṣayaḥ . aṅastu strīliṅgaḥ . ato viṣayabhedād na bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ . yathā bādhābādha iti gaṇavṛttāvapyuktam . svayaṃ rathena yāti upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati ityādyācārabhedaḥ kṣiyeti . śabadadvayamapi apacayamātravacanamiti kecit .. 7 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.007>  
vardhanaṃ chedane . chedananāmanī. ʻnarakuṭö . atha dve—āpracchanam . yātrādiṣu bandhumitrādīnām anujñāvāptināmāni . ʻāpṛcchasva priyasakhamamum iti (megha. 1. 12) . athāmnāyaḥ saṃpradāyaḥ . vaṃśapāraṃparyanāmanī .. kṣaye kṣiyā . kṣayanāmanī .. 7 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.008ab grahe grāho vaśaḥ kāntau rakṣṇastrāṇe raṇaḥ kvaṇe .
AK.03.02.008cd vyadho vedhe pacā pāke havo hūtau varo vṛtau .. 8 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.008>  
graha iti—gṛhyata iti grahaḥ . grāhaśca . ʻgraha upādāne . patrādyupādānasya nāmanī .. uśyate kāmyata iti vaśaḥ . ʻvaśa kāntaü . kāmyata iti kāntiḥ . ʻkamu kāntaü . icchānāmanī .. rakṣyata iti rakṣṇaḥ . rakṣa iti vā pāṭhaḥ . trāyata iti trāṇam . ʻtreṅ pālane . rakṣaṇasya nāmanī .. raṇyata iti raṇaḥ . ʻraṇa śabde . kvaṇanaṃ kvaṇaḥ . ʻkvaṇa śabde . vīṇādikvāṇanāmanī .. vidhyata iti vyadhaḥ . vedhaśca . ʻvyadha tāḍane ʻvidha vidhāne maṇimuktādicchidrakriyānāmanī .. pacyata iti pacā . pākaśca . ʻḍupacaṣ pāke . śākādipaktināmanī .. hūyata iti havaḥ . hūtiśca . ʻhveñ spardhāyāṃ śabde cö . āhvānasya nāmanī .. vriyata iti varaḥ . vṛtiśca . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . kanyādivarasya nāmanī .. 8 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.008>  
grahe grāhaḥ . prāptārthasya svīkaraṇasya nāmanī . ʻgraha upādāne iti dhātoḥ bhāvārthe ʻgrahavṛdṛniścigamaścö (3. 3. 58) ityappratyaye grahaḥ . ghañi grāhaḥ .. vaśaḥ kāntau . icchāyā nāmanī . ʻvaśa kāntaü . kāntiricchā iti dhātuvṛttau . ʻvaśiraṇyorupasaṃkhyānam (vā. 3. 3. 58) ityapi vaśaḥ .. kameḥ striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) kāntiḥ .. rakṣṇastrāṇe . rakṣaṇasya nāmanī . ʻrakṣa pālane iti dhātoḥ ʻyajayāca . . . ityādinā (3. 3. 90) naṅpratyaye rakṣṇaḥ .. ʻtraiṅ pālane ityato bhāve lyuṭi trāṇam .. ata eva pratyayavaśād napuṃsakatvam .. raṇaḥkvaṇe . śabdakaraṇasya nāmanī . ʻraṇa śabde . ʻvaśiraṇyorupasaṃkhyānam (vā. 3. 3. 58) ityap pratyaye raṇaḥ .. ʻkvaṇa śabde . ʻkvaṇo vīṇāyāṃ cö (3. 3. 65) ityapi kvaṇaḥ . ghañi kvāṇaḥ .. vyadho vedhe . maṇimuktādau chidrakaraṇasya nāmanī . ʻvyadha tāḍane . ʻvyadhajaporanupasarge (3. 3. 61) ityapi vyadhaḥ .. ʻvidha vidhāne ityato bhāve ghañi (3. 3. 18) vedhaḥ .. pacā pāke . odanapacanakriyāyā nāmanī . ʻḍupacaṣ pāke . ṣittvādaṅi (3. 3. 104) pacā .. ghañi pākaḥ . puṃliṅgaḥ . ʻsthāgāpāpaco bhāve (3. 3. 95) iti ktini paktirapi .. havo hūtau . āhvānasya nāmanī . ʻhveñ spardhāyāṃ śabde cö . ʻhvaḥ saṃprasāraṇam . . . (3. 3. 72) ityanuvṛttau ʻbhāve'nupasargasyö (3. 3.75) ityapi havaḥ . striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) yajādisaṃprasāraṇe (6. 1. 15) pūrvarūpatve (6. 1. 108) dīrghe hūtiḥ . śabdādivargoktāyā (1, pṛ. 109) api hūteḥ paryāyāntarapradarśanārthamihābhidhānam . varo vṛtau . vṛtirvaraṇam iṣṭavastuviṣayaḥ prārthanāviśeṣaḥ . tatra varaśabdo vartate . ʻvṛñ varaṇe . ʻgrahavṛdṛniścigamaścö (3. 3. 58) iti ap pratyaye varaḥ . striyāṃ ktini vṛtiḥ . atra subhūticandraḥ—vṛtirgrāmādiveṣṭanam . tatra varaśabdo vartata iti . yastu prasannadevatādyanugrahalabhyaḥ putrapaśvādirūpo varaḥ so'tra na vivakṣitaḥ, bhāvārthavacanaśabdaprastāvād vṛtiśabdasya tatra prayogābhāvācca .. 8 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.008>  
graho grāhaḥ . grahaṇanāmanī . ʻgrahiṃcü .. vaśaḥ kāntau . abhilāṣanāmanī . ʻkorikö .. rakṣṇastrāṇe . rakṣā trāṇe iti pāṭhāntaram . rakṣaṇanāmanī .. raṇaḥ kvaṇe . dhvanināmanī .. vyadho vedhe . vedhananāmanī . ʻkorasuṭö .. pacā pāke . pākanāmanī . anuktam—ʻmāṃspākaḥ syānmāṃspacanam . māṃsapacananāmanī .. havo hūtau . āhvānanāmanī .. varo vṛtau . varaṇanāmanī .. 8 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.009ab oṣaḥ ploṣe nayo nāye jyānirjīrṇau bhramo bhramau .
AK.03.02.009cd sphātirvṛddhau prathā khyātau spṛṣṭiḥ pṛktau snavaḥ srave .. 9 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.009> 
oṣa iti—uṣyata iti oṣaḥ . ʻuṣa dāhe . pluṣyata iti ploṣaḥ . ʻpluṣa dāhe . dāhasya nāmanī .. nīyate prāpyate nayaḥ . nāyaśca . ʻṇīñ prāpaṇe . prāptināmanī .. jināti vayohānimāpadyate yayeti jyāniḥ . ʻjyā vayohānaü . jīryata iti jīrṇiḥ . ʻjṝṣ vayohānaü . vayohānernāmanī .. bhramaṇaṃ bhramaḥ . bhramiśca . ʻbhramu anavasthāne . bhrāntināmanī .. sphāyyata iti sphātiḥ . ʻsphāyī vṛddhaü .. vardhata iti vṛddhiḥ . ʻvṛdhu vṛddhaü . vṛddhināmanī .. prathyata iti prathā . ʻpratha prakhyāne . khyāyata iti khyātiḥ . ʻkhyā prakathane . prakhyātināmanī .. spṛśyata iti spṛṣṭiḥ . ʻspṛśa saṃsparśane . pṛṣṭiriti vā pāṭhaḥ . tadā ʻpṛcī saṃparke iti dhātuḥ . pṛcyata iti pṛktiḥ . pūrvokta eva dhātuḥ . ..saṃparkasya nāmanī .. snūyata iti snavaḥ . ʻṣṇu prasravaṇe . srūyata iti sravaḥ . ʻsru gataü . jalādisravaṇasya nāmanī .. 9 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.009>  
oṣaḥ ploṣe . vahnisaṃyogajasya tṛṇāderbhasmībhāvasya nāmanī . ʻuṣa dāhe ʻpluṣa dāhe iti dhātudvayād ghāṃña (3. 3. 18) krameṇa oṣaḥ ploṣaśca . ʻpruṣa dāhe iti dhātoḥ proṣa iti rephādirvā .. nayo nāye . prāpaṇasya nāmanī . ʻṇīñ prāpaṇe . ʻkṛtyalyuṭo bahulam (3. 3. 113) iti bahulagrahaṇād aci nayaḥ (3. 3. 56) . ʻśriṇībhuvo'nupasarge (3. 3. 24) iti ghañi nāyaḥ .. jyānirjīrṇau . śarīrādeḥ kālaviśeṣāpāditaniḥsāratvarūpāvasthāviśeṣanāmanī . ʻjyā vayohānaü iti dhātoḥ ʻglāmlājyāhābhyo nirvaktavyaḵ (vā. 3. 3. 94) iti ktinpratyayāpavādatvena nipratyaye jyāniḥ . ʻjṝṣ vayohānaü . ktini ʻṛṝkāralvādibhyaḥ ktinniṣṭhāvadbhavatīti vaktavyam (vā. 8. 2. 44) iti natve jīrṇiḥ . śabdadvayamapi striliṅgam .. bhramo bhramau . bhramaṇarūpakriyāviśeṣasya nāmanī . ʻbhramu anavasthāne . bhāve ghañi nodāttopadeśād (7. 3. 34) iti vṛddhipratiṣedhe bhramaḥ .. ʻik kṛṣyādibhya iti vaktavyam (vā. 3. 3. 108) iti bhāve striyāmikpratyaye bhramiḥ . vā ṅīṣi bhramī ca .. sphātirvṛddhau . śarīrādīnāmavayavopacayasya nāmanī . ʻsphāyī vṛddhaü ityataḥ striyāṃ ktini ʻlopo vyorvali (6. 1. 66) iti yakāralope sphātiḥ .. ʻvṛdhu vṛddhaü ityato ktini vṛddhiḥ . dvayamapi pratyayataḥ strīliṅgam .. prathā khyātau . kulaśīlavidyādyutkarṣajanitāyāḥ prasiddhernāmanī . ʻpratha prakhyāne iti dhātoḥ ʻghaṭādayaḥ ṣitaḵ (ga. sū.) iti paribhāṣayā ʻṣidbhidādibhyo'ṅ (3. 3. 104) ityaṅi prathā .. ʻkhyā prakathane ityataḥ striyāṃ ktini khyātiḥ .. spṛṣṭiḥ pṛktau . hastādinā ghaṭādisparśanasya nāmanī . ʻspṛśa saṃsparśane . striyāṃ ktini vraścetyādinā (8. 2. 36) ṣatve spṛṣṭiḥ . ʻpṛcī saṃparke iti dhātoḥ striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) pṛktiḥ . pratyayato dvāvapi strīliṅgau .. snavaḥ srave . apakvaghaṭāderbahirbhāge jalādiprasravaṇasya nāmanī . ʻṣṇu prasravaṇe . ʻsru gataü . ābhyāṃ dhātubhyām ʻṛṝdorap (3. 3. 57) ityappratyaye snavaḥ sravaśca . bāhulake ghañi srāvo'pyasti .. 9 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.009>  
oṣaḥ ploṣe . dāhanāmanī .. nayo nāye . nītināmanī .. jyānirjīṇā . jarānāmanī .. bhramo bhramau . bhramaṇanāmanī .. atra bhramiśabdasya pūrvāparasāhacaryaṃ liṅgajñāpakam . vaijayantyāṃ tu (pṛ. 192, ślo. 10) ʻcakrāvarto bhramo bhrāntirbhramirghūrṇiśca ghūrṇanam iti svaparyāyasāhacarya eva . sphātirvṛddhau . śarīrādyabhivṛddhināmanī .. prathā khyātau . prasiddhināmanī .. spṛṣṭiḥ pṛktau . sparśananāmanī .. snavaḥ srave . sravaṇanāmanī .. 9 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.010ab edhā samṛddhau spharaṇaṃ sphuraṇe pramitau pramā .
AK.03.02.010cd prasūtiḥ prasave ścyote prāghāraḥ klamathaḥ klame .. 10 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.010>  
edheti—edhyata ityedhā . ʻedha vṛddhaü . samṛdhyata iti samṛddhiḥ . ʻṛdhu vṛddhaü . samṛddhināmanī .. spharyata iti spharaṇam . sphuryata iti sphuraṇam . ʻsphara sphura sphuraṇe . sphuraṇeti vā pāṭhaḥ . oṣṭhādicalanasya nāmanī .. pramīyate samyaganubhūyata iti pramitiḥ . pramā ca . ʻmāṅ māne . samyaganubhavasya nāmanī .. prasūyata iti prasūtiḥ . prasavaśca . ʻṣūṅ prāṇiprasave . ʻṣū preraṇe iti vā dhātuḥ . prāṇiprasavasya nāmanī .. ścyutyata iti ścyotaḥ . ʻścyutir kṣaraṇe . prakarṣeṇa jighartyaneneti prāghāraḥ . ʻghṛ kṣaraṇadīptyoḵ . kṣaraṇasya nāmanī .. klāmyata iti klamathaḥ . klamaśca . ʻklamu glānaü . klāntināmanī .. 10 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.010>  
edhā samṛddhau . dhanadhānyādyatiśayasya nāmanī . ʻedha vṛddhaü ityataḥ ʻgurośca halaḵ (3. 3. 103) ityakārapratyaye edhā . subhūticandrastu—vipūrvād dadhāteḥ ʻātaścopasarge (3. 3. 106) ityaṅi vidheti pāṭhāntareṇa vyākhyātavān . tatsaṃvādatvena ʻvidhānarddhiprakāreṣu gajānne vetane vidhȫ iti rudrābhidhānamapyudājahāra .
ʻutkṣiptahastataladattavidhānapiṇḍa-
snehasrutisnapitabāhuribhādhirājam .
iti māghakāvye (śiśu. 5. 51) prayogaḥ .. ʻṛdhu bṛddhaü . saṃpūrvasya ktini samṛddhiḥ .. spharaṇaṃ sphuraṇe . oṣṭhanayanapakṣmādispandanasya nāmanī . ʻsphara sphura sphuraṇe . tatra prathamāddhātoḥ kaṇṭhyasvaropadhāt lyuṭispharaṇam . dvitīyād oṣṭhyasvaropadhāt kuṭāditvena (1. 2. 1) guṇapratiṣedhe lyuṭi sphuraṇam . spandanaśabdo'pyatra .. pramitau pramā . samyaganubhavasya nāmanī . ʻmāṅ māne ityasmād dhātoḥ sopasargād bhāve ktini ʻdyatisyatimāsthā . . . ityādinā (7. 4. 40) dhātoritve ktini pramitiḥ .. ʻātaścopasarge (3. 3. 106) ityaṅi pramā .. prasūtiḥ prasave . garbhavimocanasya nāmanī . ʻṣūṅ prāṇiprasave ʻṣū preraṇe iti vā dhātoḥ striyāṃ ktini prasūtiḥ .. ʻṛdorap (3. 3. 57) ityappratyaye prasavaḥ .. ścyote prādhāraḥ . ghaṭādigatasya kṣīraghṛtāderuparipradeśāduccalanenādhodeśe kṣaraṇasya nāmanī . ʻścyutir kṣaraṇe . ghañi ścyotaḥ.. ʻghṛ kṣaraṇadīptyoḵ ityasmāt prapūrvād ghañi ʻupasargasya ghañi . . . (6. 3. 122) iti dīrghe prādhāraḥ .. klamathaḥ klame . vyāyāmādinā manasaḥ niḥsahatvanāmanī . ʻklamu glānaü . auṇādiko'thac-pratyayaḥ .. ghañi klamaḥ (7. 3. 34) .. 10 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.010>  
edhā samṛddhau . dhanadhānyasamṛddhināmanī . ʻedhā ṛddhiprakāreṣu gajānāṃ vetane vidhȫ iti rudraḥ .. sphulanaṃ sphuraṇe . sphuraṇanāmanī . ʻniganigaserusuṭö . ʻsphara saṃcalane iti keṣāṃcit sakārasahitaphakāropadham .. pramitau pramā . yathārthajñānanāmanī .. prasūtiḥ prasave . garbhamocananāmanī .. ścyotaḥ prāghāre . dhārānāmanī . ʻvyaktaskandhakabandhabandharudhiraprāghāraniṣyandinȫ iti bhavabhūtiḥ (mālatī. 5. 29) .. klamathaḥ klame . glānināmanī .. 10 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.011ab utkarṣo'tiśaye saṃdhiḥ śleṣe viṣaya āśraye .
AK.03.02.011cd kṣipāyāṃ kṣepaṇaṃ gīrṇirgirau guraṇamudyame .. 11 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.011>  
utkarṣa iti—utkṛṣyate'tiśayyata iti utkarṣaḥ . ʻkṛṣa vilekhane . atiśayyata ityatiśayaḥ . ʻśīṅ svapne . ābhimukhyanāmanī .. saṃdhīyata iti saṃdhiḥ . ʻḍudhāñ dhāraṇapoṣaṇayoḵ . śliṣyate saṃbadhyata iti śleṣaḥ . ʻśliṣa āliṅgane . saṃbandhanāmanī .. visīyata iti viṣayaḥ . ʻṣiñ bandhane . ā samantāt śrīyata ityāśrayaḥ . ʻśriñ sevāyām . sthānasya nāmanī .. kṣipyata iti kṣipā . kṣepaṇaṃ ca . ʻkṣipa preraṇe . kṣepaṇasya nāmanī .. gīryata iti gīrṇiḥ . giriśca . ʻgṝ nigaraṇe . nigaraṇasya nāmanī .. gūryata iti guraṇam . ʻgurī udyamane . udyamyata ityudyamaḥ . ʻyama uparame . upasargavaśād dhātorudyogārthaḥ . udyogasya nāmanī .. 11 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.011>  
utkarṣo'tiśaye . vidyāśauryadhanādīnāṃ parakāṣṭhāviśrānternāmanī . ʻkṛṣa vilekhane ityataḥ utpūrvād ghañi (3. 3. 18) utkarṣaḥ .. ʻśīṅ svapne ityataḥ sopasargāderaci (3. 3. 56) atiśayaḥ .. saṃdhiḥ śleṣe . saṃbandhasya nāmanī . saṃpūrvād dadhāteḥ ʻupasarge ghoḥ kiḵ (3. 3. 92) iti kipratyaye ākāralope ca saṃdhiḥ .. ʻśliṣa āliṅgane ityato ghañi śleṣaḥ .. viṣaya āśraye . ālambanasya nāmanī yathā ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ saṃgrāmāśrayo'yamabhiniveśa iti viśeṣeṇa sīyate bandha iva tiṣṭhatyatreti viṣayaḥ . ʻṣiñ bandhane . adhikaraṇe ʻerac (3. 3. 56) . ʻparinivibhyaḥ sevasitasaya . . . ityādinā (8. 3. 70) ṣatvam . ʻviṣayo gocare deśe rūpādau nityasevite ityajayaḥ .. ā samantāt śrīyata ityāśrayaḥ . ʻśriñ sevāyām . ʻerac (3. 3. 56) . sarvānandastu (pṛ. 57) ʻśīṅ svapne iti dhātorvipūrvād eraci viśayaḥ, āśaya iti śabdadvayamapi tālavyāṣmamadhyaṃ repharahitaṃ cāha . yathā—āmāśayaḥ, pakvāśayaḥ, jalāśaya iti .. kṣipāyāṃ kṣepaṇam . preraṇāyā nāmanī . ʻkṣipa preraṇe . bhidāditvād aṅi (3. 3. 104) kṣipā . lyuṭi kṣepaṇam .. gīrṇirgirau . nigaraṇasya nāmanī . ʻgṝ nigaraṇe ityataḥ ktin pratyaye (3. 3. 94) ṛta ikārādeśe (7. 1. 100) ʻṛkāralvādibhyaḥ ktin niṣṭhāvadbhavati (vā. 8. 2. 44) iti vaktavyānniṣṭhāvadbhāvena takārasya natve gīrṇiḥ .. ʻik kṛṣyādibhyaḵ (vā. 3. 3. 108) iti ikpratyaye giriḥ . śeṣe—ʻsyādudgiraṇamudgiraü . ʻṭuvamu udgiraṇe iti dhātunirdeśād udgiraṇaśabdaḥ sādhuḥ . tathā ca nigaraṇāvagaraṇādāvastyeva guṇaḥ .. guraṇamudyame . tāḍanādihetorlaguḍāderudyamanasya nāmanī . ʻgurī udyamane . lyuṭi kuṭāditvād (1. 2. 1) guṇābhāve guraṇam . ʻyamaḥ samupaniviṣu cö (3. 3. 63) iti niyamād utpūrvād yamidhātorappratyayo nāstyeva . kiṃtu ʻhalaścö (3. 3. 121) iti ghañā bhāvyam . tathāpi ʻgurī udyame iti dhātunirdeśasāmarthyādudyamaśabdaḥ sādhuḥ . caurādikāttu ʻgurī udyame iti dhātoryuci (3. 3. 107) goraṇā . lyuṭi goraṇaṃ ca .. 11 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.011>  
utkarṣo'tiśaye . atiśayanāmanī . prāgbhāro'pi . ʻprāgbhāro'tiśayaḥ smṛtaḵ ityasminnarthe halāyudhaḥ .. saṃdhiḥ śleṣe . saṃyoganāmanī . saṃbhedasaṃnipātasaṃśleṣādīni asminnarthe iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 194, ślo. 26) .. viṣaya āśraye . nityasevitanidrāhārādīnāṃ nāmanī . ʻviṣayo gocare deśe rūpādau nityasevite ityajayakośaḥ .. kṣipāyāṃ kṣepaṇam . preraṇanāmanī . ʻnūkuṭö .. gīrṇirgirau . gilananāmanī . ʻmṛguṭö .. guraṇamudyame . udyamananāmanī . ʻyettuṭö .. 11 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.012ab unnāya unnaye śrāyaḥ śrayaṇe jayane jayaḥ .
AK.03.02.012cd nigādo nigade mādo mada udvega udbhrame .. 12 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.012>  
unnāya iti—(ud) ūrdhvaṃ nīyata ityunnāyaḥ . unnayaśca . ʻṇīñ prāpaṇe . ūrdhvanayanasya vā utprekṣāya vā nāmanī .. śrīyata iti śrāyaḥ . śrayaṇaṃ ca . ʻśriñ sevāyām . sevāyā nāmanī .. ʻśrāvaḥ śravaṇe iti pāṭhe ʻśru śravaṇe iti dhātuḥ . śruternāmanī .. jīyata iti jayanam . jayaśca . ʻji abhibhave iti prathamo dhātuḥ . ʻji jaye iti dvitīyo dhātuḥ . parābhibhavasya nāmanī .. nigadyata iti nigādaḥ . nigadaśca . ʻgada vyaktāyāṃ vāci . sphuṭakathanasya nāmanī .. mādyata iti mādaḥ . madaśca . ʻmadī harṣe . vidyādhanādhikyanibandhanaharṣasya nāmanī .. udvijyate ūrdhvaṃ cālyata ityudvegaḥ . ʻovijī bhayacalanayoḵ . udbhrāmyata ityudbhramaḥ . ʻbhramu calane . ūrdhvacalanasya nāmanī .. 12 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.012>  
unnāya unnaye . yasya kasyacid dravyasya ūrdhvadeśaṃ prati prāpaṇasya nāmanī . musalamunnayati . ūhasya nāmanī ityapare . yathā—ʻbhāvikāryamunnayet iti . ʻavodorniyaḵ (3. 3. 26) iti ghañi unnāyaḥ . bāhulakād eraci (3. 3. 56) unnayaḥ .. śrāyaḥ śrayaṇe . āśrayasya nāmanī . ʻśriñ sevāyām . ʻśriṇībhuvo'nupasarge (3. 3. 24) iti ghañi śrāyaḥ . lyuṭi śrayaṇam .. jayane jayaḥ . sarvotkarṣeṇa vṛtteḥ parābhibhavanasya nāmanī . ʻji abhibhavane . lyuṭi jayanam . eraci (3. 3. 56) jayaḥ . ʻji jaye iti vā .. nigādo nigade . vyaktabhāṣaṇasya nāmanī . ʻgada vyaktāyāṃ vāci ityato veti vartamāne ʻnau gadanadapaṭhasvanaḵ (3. 3. 64) iti pākṣike ap pratyaye nigadaḥ . pakṣe ʻhalaścö (3. 3. 121) iti ghañi nigādaḥ .. mādo made . vidyābhijanadhanādisamṛddhijanitaharṣātiśayasya nāmanī. ʻmadī harṣe ityataḥ ʻsadha mādasthayośchandasi  (6. 3. 96) iti sūtre ghañ pratyayāntatvena nirdeśād mādaśabdaḥ sādhuḥ .. ʻmado'nupasarge (3. 3. 67) ityappratyaye madaḥ .. udvega udbhrame . ūrdhvacalanasya nāmanī iti subodhinī . udbhramaḥ camatkāra iti sarvānandasubhūticandrau . anavasthitacittatvamityapare . ʻovijī bhayacalanayoḵ . bhāve ghañ . ʻcajoḥ . . . (7. 3. 52) iti kutve guṇe ca udvegaḥ .. ʻbhramu calane ityato ghañi bhramaḥ .. 12 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.012>  
unnāya unnaye . nimagnāderuddharaṇanāmanī . ʻpīḍavugāpeṭṭuṭö .. śrāyaḥ śrayaṇa . śrayaṇanāmanī .. jayane jayaḥ . vijayanāmanī . ʻgelucuṭanü . sarvotkarṣanāmāpisyāt . ʻsā jayati sarasvatī devī . ʻsa jayatyarisārthasārthakīkṛtanāmā kila bhīmabhūpatiḵ iti naiṣadhaḥ (2. 16) .. nigādo nigade . vyaktoktināmanī . ʻpalukuṭö .. mādo made . madanāmanī .. udvega udbhrame . udbhramanāmanī . ʻubbacesuṭö .. 12 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.013ab vimardanaṃ parimale'bhyupapattiranugrahaḥ .
AK.03.02.013cd nigrahastu nirodhaḥ syādabhiyogastvabhigrahaḥ .. 13 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.013>  
vimardanamiti—vimṛdyata iti vimardanam . ʻmṛda kṣode . mithaḥ parimalyata iti parimalaḥ . ʻmala malla dhāraṇe . dravyayoranyonyaghaṭṭanasya nāmanī .. abhyupapadyata ityabhyupapattiḥ . ʻpada gataü . anugṛhyate svīkriyata ityanugrahaḥ . ʻgraha upādāne . upakārasya nāmanī .. niyamena gṛhyata iti nigrahaḥ . nirudhyata iti nirodhaḥ . ʻrudhir āvaraṇe . tadviruddhasyānugrahaviruddhasya nāmanī .. (abhi) ābhimukhyena yujyata ityabhiyogaḥ . ʻyujir yoge . ābhimukhyena gṛhyata ityabhigrahaḥ . ʻgraha upādāne . ābhimukhyenodyamanasya nāmanī .. 13 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.013>  
vimardanaṃ parimalaḥ . kuṅkumakarpūrādidravyayoḥ parasparasaṃghaṭṭanasya nāmanī . ʻmṛda kṣode . kṣodaḥ saṃpeṣaṇam . bhāve lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) vimardanam .. ʻmala malla dhāraṇe ityato bhāve ghañi (3. 3. 18) vṛddhividheḥ saṃjñāpūrvakatvāt ʻsaṃjñāpūrvako vidhiranityaḵ iti paribhāṣayā vṛddhiratra na bhavati .. abhyupapattiranugrahaḥ . manaḥprasādapūrvakasya saṃmānanāviśeṣasya nāmanī . ʻpada gataü . abhyupapūrvo'nugrahe vartate . tathā ca—ʻratimabhyupapattumādarāt iti kālidāsaḥ (ku. saṃ. 4. 25) . tataḥ striyāṃ ktini abhyupapattiḥ .. ʻgrahavṛdṛniścigamaścö (3. 3. 58) iti gṛhṇāteranupūrvād appratyaye anugrahaḥ .. nigrahastu nirodhaḥ syāt . apakārakaraṇasya nāmanī . niyamanāya grahaṇaṃ nigrahaḥ . nipūrvasya gṛhṇāterap (3. 3. 58) .. nitarāṃ rodhaḥ nirodhaḥ . viśeṣeṇa rodho virodha iti kecit paṭhanti . subodhinīkārastu—ʻnigrahastadviruddhaḥ syāt, tadviruddho'nugragahaviruddho'pakārakaḥ iti vyācaṣṭa .. abhiyogastvabhigrahaḥ . apacikīrṣayā prabalena durbalasyākramaṇam abhiyogaḥ iti subhūticandraḥ . abhiyogādidvayam udyoge vartata iti sarvānandaḥ (pṛ. 59) . bahuśrutatvādinā jātasyotkarṣasya nāmanī iti bhojarājaḥ . ʻabhiyuktāḥ punarevamāhuḵ iti prayogaśca .. 23 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.013>  
vimardanaṃ parimalaḥ . kuṅkumacandanādibhiḥ saṃmardananāmanī . kastūrikādeḥ peṣaṇanāmāpi .. abhyupapattiranugrahaḥ . anugrahanāmanī .. nigrahastu nirodhaḥ syāt . nigrahanāmanī .. abhiyogastvabhigrahaḥ . abhigamyākramanāmanī . ʻabhipūrvau grahiyujī abhigamyākrame smṛtaü iti upasargamañjarī . anuktam—ʻparasparaṃ syādanyonyamitaretaramityapi . parasparanāmanī . ete amante . ime sakhyau parasparaṃ prayacchataḥ . imāḥ sakhyaḥ parasparād bibhyati . śākaṭāyanamate puṃliṅgaikavacane syātām . ime sakhyau parasparaste prayacchataḥ . imāḥ sakhyaḥ parasparād bibhyati .. 13 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.02.014ab muṣṭibandhastu saṃgrāho ḍimbe ḍamaraviplavau .
AK.03.02.014cd bandhanaṃ prasitiścāraḥ sparśaḥ spraṣṭopataptari .. 14 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.014>  
muṣṭīti—muṣṭerbandhaḥ muṣṭibandhaḥ . saṃgṛhyate muṣṭiratreti saṃgrāhaḥ . ʻgraha upādāne . mallayoranyonyamuṣṭibandhanasya nāmanī .. ḍīyate jano'neneti ḍimbaḥ . ʻḍīṅ vihāyasā gataü . dāmyata iti ḍamaraḥ . ʻdamu upaśame . viplāvyate vidrāvyate jano'neneti viplavaḥ . ʻpluṅ gataü . upadravanāmāni .. badhyata iti bandhanam . ʻbandha bandhane . prasīyate badhyata iti prasitiḥ . ʻṣiñ bandhane . carati mandamaneneti cāraḥ . ʻcara gataü . bandhanasya nāmāni .. spṛśatyupatāpayatīti sparśaḥ . spraṣṭā ca . ʻspṛśa upatāpe . upatāpayatīti upataptā . ʻtapa saṃtāpe . upatāpakāriṇo vairyādernāmāni .. 14 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.014>  
muṣṭibandhastu saṃgrāhaḥ . saṃgṛhyata iti karmaṇi ghañantatvena phalakasya muṣṭigrāhyo bhāgaḥ kṣatriyavarge (pṛ. 537) saṃgrāha uktaḥ . iha tu saṃgṛhyante saṃkṣipyante'ṅgulayo'treti adhikaraṇavyutpattyā mallāderaṅgulisaṃniveśaviśeṣaḥ saṃgrāha ucyata ityapaunaruktyam . ʻsami muṣṭaü (3. 3. 36) iti ghañ . tathā ca ʻkhaṭako muṣṭiḥ striyāṃ ca saṃgrāhaḵ iti bopālitena muṣṭiparyāyatvena kathitaḥ . ʻkhādayantaḥ phalarasaṃ muṣṭisaṃgrāhapīḍitam iti bhaṭṭiḥ (bha. kā. 7. 40) .. ḍimbe ḍamaraviplavau . paracakrākramaṇanimittasya prajāpalāyanagrāmadāhadhanadhānyādināśarūpasya kṣobhasya nāmāni . ḍayante palāyante prajā atreti ḍimbaḥ . ʻḍīṅ vihāyasā gataü . ato ḍimbapratyaye ṭilope ca ḍimba iti pavargatṛtīyopadhaḥ . asmādeva dhātoḥ ḍamarapratyaye pūrvavat ṭilope ca ḍamaraḥ .. svadeśaṃ vihāya plavaḥ palāyanaṃ viplavaḥ . ʻpluṅ gataü . ʻṛdorap (3. 3. 57) .. bandhanaṃ prasitiścāraḥ . yena nigaḍādinā badhyate tatra bandhanāditrayamiti ṭīkāsarvasvakāreṇa vyākhyāya cāraśabdasya bandhanavacanatve ʻbandhāpasarpayoścāraḵ iti rudrābhidhānaṃ darśitam (pṛ. 59) . apare tu ʻsame tūddānabandhane iti prāguktasyaiva (pṛ. 499) bandhanasya paryāyāntarapradarśanamityāhuḥ . ʻidaṃ kila tasyāścārajanaduḥsaṃcāraṃ cārāgāram iti yayāticaritanāṭake prayogaśca . cārāgāraṃ bandhanaśāletyarthaḥ .. ʻṣiñ bandhane . striyāṃ ktini prasitiḥ .. mandaṃ caratyaneneti cāraḥ . ʻcara gataü . karaṇe ghañ . cārā gūḍhacāriṇaḥ santyatreti vā . arśaādyac (5. 2. 127) .. sparśaḥ spraṣṭopataptari . upatāpajanakarogasya nāmāni . spṛśati upatāpaṃ janayatīti sparśaḥ . ʻspṛśa upatāpe . ʻpadarujaviśaspṛśo ghañ (3. 3. 16) ityatra ʻspṛśa upatāpa iti vaktavyam iti vacanāt kartari ghañ . ʻrujāyāṃ sparśake sparśo dānasparśanayorapi iti rudraḥ . vāsarūpavidhinā (3. 1. 94) ca tṛcpratyaye ʻanudāttasya cardupadhasyānyatarasyām (6. 1. 59) ityamāgame spraṣṭā .. upapūrvāt tapateḥ tṛci (3. 1. 133) upataptā . atra śeṣakāraḥ—ʻsparṣṭā ca svaritā svartȫ iti spṛśereva tṛci amāgamābhāvapakṣe guṇe sati sparṣṭā . ʻsvṛ śabdopatāpayoḵ ityasmāt kartari tṛci ʻsvaratisūtisūyati . . .  ityādinā (7. 2. 44) iḍāgamasya vaikalpikatvāt svaritā svartā ca iti rūpadvayam . kecittu—pūrvavākye bandhanādipadadvayameva paryāyatvena vyākhyāya, samanantarapadaṃ spāra iti paṭhitvā tadādicatuṣkamapi upatāpajanakarogavācakamāhuḥ . tata eva dhātoḥ svārthaṇyantād acpratyaye spāra iti nirbruvate . apare tu—ʻbandhanaṃ prasitiḥ sparśaḥ sparaspraṣṭopataptari iti paṭhitvā sparateḥ pacādyaci spara ityāhuḥ .. 14 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.02.014>

AK.03.02.015ab nikāro viprakāraḥ syādākārastviṅga iṅgitam .
AK.03.02.015cd pariṇāmo vikāro dve same vikṛtivikriye .. 15 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.015>  
nikāra iti—nikṛṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ nikāraḥ . viruddhaprakāreṇa karaṇaṃ viprakāraḥ . khalīkaraṇasya nāmanī .. ākriyate āviṣkriyate'bhiprāyo'nenetyākāraḥ . ʻḍukṛñ karaṇe . iṅgati jānāti nigūḍhamabhiprāyamaneneti iṅgitam . iṅgaśca . ʻigi gataü . ceṣṭitasya nāmāni .. pariṇamati kāleneti pariṇāmaḥ . ʻṇamu prahṇatve śabde cö . vikriyata iti vikāraḥ . vikṛtiśca . vikriyā ca . vikārasya nāmāni .. 15 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.015>  
nikāro viprakāraḥ syāt . akṛtyārthakaraṇodghāṭanena durjanīkaraṇasya nāmanī . apakāramātrasya nāmanī ityapare . nikṛṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ nikāraḥ . viruddhaprakāreṇa karaṇaṃ viprakāraḥ . bhāve ghañ (3. 3. 18) .. ākārastviṅga iṅgitam . yadyapyatra, ʻākārairiṅgitairgatyā jñāyate'ntargataṃ manaḵ iti smṛtau (ma. smṛ. 8. 26); ʻtasya saṃvṛtamantrasya gūḍhākāreṅgitasya cö ityādimahākaviprayoge ca (raghu. 1. 20) iṅgitākārayorastyeva bhedaḥ . ālaṃkārikā apyāhuḥ—ʻākāraśabdasya dvāvarthau, iṅgitam ākṛtiścö iti . ata eva vakṣyati—ʻākārāviṅgitākṛtī (3. 3. 162) iti . tathā cātra iṅgitaparyāyenokta iti . iṅgati jānāti gūḍhamarthamaneneti iṅgaḥ . ʻigi gataü . gatirjñānam . karaṇe ghañ .. ʻnapuṃsake bhāve ktaḵ (3. 3. 114) iti ktapratyaye iṅgitam . upacārāt karaṇe tasya vṛttiḥ .. pariṇāmo vikāre . pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntarāpattilakṣaṇe vikāraviśeṣa pariṇāmaśabdaḥ syāt . yathā kṣīrasya pariṇāmo dadhi . mṛtpiṇḍasya ghaṭaḥ . kāṣṭhasya bhasma ityādi . ʻṇama prahvatve śabde cö ityasmāt paripūrvāt bhāve ghañi ʻupasargādasāmāse'pi . . . (8. 4. 14) iti ṇatve pariṇāmaḥ . ʻṣoḍaśakaśca vikāraḵ (sāṃkhya. 3) ityādāvupacārād bhāvavacanayorapi pariṇāmavikāraśabdayoḥ prayogaḥ .. dve same vikṛtivikriye . pariṇāmarūpasyānyasya vā prakṛteranyathātvamātrasya nāmanī . yathā—bhrūvikṛtiḥ, svaravikriyā ityādi . striyāṃ ktini (3. 3. 94) vikṛtiḥ .. ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) iti śapratyaye vikriyā . ime dve upapade'rthato liṅgataśca same tulye ityarthaḥ .. 15 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.02.016ab apahārastvapacayaḥ samāhāraḥ samuccayaḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.016>  
apahāra iti—apahriyata ityapahāraḥ . ʻhṛñ haraṇe . apacīyate hīyata iti apacayaḥ . ʻciñ cayane . hānernāmanī .. ekatra samāhriyata iti samāhāraḥ . ekatra samuccīyata iti samuccayaḥ . anekasya ekatra samāveśasya nāmanī .. pratyāhriyata iti pratyāhāraḥ . upādīyata iti upādānam . ʻḍudāñ dāne . aṅganādiviṣayebhya indriyādīnāmakarṣaṇasya nāmanī .. viśeṣeṇa cittamāhriyata iti vihāraḥ . paritaḥ kramyata iti parikramaḥ . ʻkramu pādavikṣepe . krīḍāsaṃcāranāmanī .. 16 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.016>  
apahārastvapacayaḥ . pūrvāvasthāpekṣayā jātahrasvatvasya nāmanī . yathā—ācārāpahāraḥ, vidyāpahāra iti . apetyupasargo hrasvārthe . tathā hi—ʻapānyathātve viśleṣe hrasvodghāṭanavāraṇe iti upasargavṛttau . tataśca ʻhṛñ haraṇe ityasmād bhāve ghañi (3. 3. 18) apahāraḥ .. ʻciñ cayane ityasmād eraci (3. 3. 56) apacayaḥ .. samāhāraḥ samuccayaḥ . anekeṣāmekatra samāveśasya nāmanī . yathā—smṛtisamuccayaḥ, śabdasamuccayaḥ iti .. pratyāhāra upādānam . indriyārthebhyo rūpādibhya ākṛṣya cakṣurādīnāmupādānaṃ svāyattatākaraṇam, sa pratyāhāra ityucyate . pratyāharaṇaṃ pratyāhāraḥ . bhāve ghañ . dāño lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) upādānam .. vihārastu parikramaḥ . krīḍārthamudyānādau saṃcaraṇasya nāmanī . ʻkramu pādavikṣepe . bhāve ghañ . ʻnodātta. . . iti (7. 3. 34) na vṛddhiḥ .. 16 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.02.017ab abhihāro'bhigrahaṇaṃ nirhāro'bhyavakarṣaṇam .

AK.03.02.018ab pravāhastu pravṛttiḥ syāt pravaho gamanaṃ bahiḥ .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.018>  
pravāhastu pravṛttiḥ syāt . jalāderanyasya vā vicchedarahitānuvṛtternāmanī . yathā—nadīpravāhaḥ, vidyāpravāha iti . prakarṣeṇa vāho vahanaṃ viṣayāntaraprāptiḥ pravāhaḥ . prakṛṣṭā vicchedarahitā vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ .. pravaho gamanaṃ bahiḥ . gṛhanagarāderbahirgamanasya nāma . ʻpravahaḥ syād bahiryātrȫ iti bhāguriḥ . prakṛṣṭo vahaḥ pravahaḥ . ʻgocarasaṃcaravaha . . . ityādinā (3. 3. 119) sādhuḥ . bahulagrahaṇādacpratyayo vā .. viyāmo—saṃyamau . paropadravādibhya uparaternāmāni . vetyanuvṛttau ʻyamaḥ samupaniviṣu cö (3. 3. 63) iti sopasargād anupasargādapi pākṣike'ppratyaye yamaḥ, viyamaḥ, saṃyamaḥ iti trayaḥ śabdāḥ . tadabhāvapakṣe ʻhalaścö (3. 3. 121) iti ghañi viyāmaḥ, saṃyāmaḥ, yāmaḥ iti śabdatrayam . kecidatra vyākurvate—viyāmādidvayaṃ manovākkāyapūrvakavirodhoparativācakam . yāmādidvayam uparatimātravacanam . saṃyāmādidvayam ātyantikoparativācakamiti .. 18 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.02.019ab hiṃsākarmābhicāraḥ syād jāgaryā jāgarā dvayoḥ .
AK.03.02.019cd vighno'ntarāyaḥ pratyahaḥ syādupaghno'ntikāśraye .. 19 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.02.019>  
hiṃsākarmeti—paramabhibhavituṃ cāraḥ caraṇam abhicāraḥ . hiṃsākarmaṇo nāma .. jāgaraṇaṃ jāgaryā . jāgarā ca . ʻjāgṛ nidrākṣaye . nidrābhaṅgasya nāmanī .. kāryāṇāṃ vihananaṃ vighnaḥ . antarā madhye'yanaṃ vicchedo'ntarāyaḥ . ʻaya paya gataü . pratikūlamūhanaṃ pratyūhaḥ . ʻūha vitarke . prārabdhakāryāṇāṃ pratikūlasya nāmāni .. upahanyata ityupaghnaḥ . ʻhana hiṃsāgatyoḵ . atra dhātorgatyarthaḥ . antikāśrayaṇasya nāmanī .. 19 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.02.019>  
hiṃsākarmābhicāraḥ syāt . paramāraṇārthamanuṣṭheyaṃ śyenādikarma abhicāra ucyate . paramabhicarituṃ caraṇamabhicāraḥ . ʻcara gatibhakṣaṇayoḵ . abhipūrvo hiṃsāyāṃ vartate . yathā—ʻpratyagenamabhicāraḥ stṛṇute, ʻśyenenābhicaran yajetö iti .. jāgaryā jāgarā dvayoḥ . nidrānāśasya nāmanī . ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) ityatra ʻjāgarterakāro vȫ (vā. 3. 3. 101) ityakārapratyayaśapratyayau . tatra śapratyayapakṣe ʻsārvadhātuke yak (3. 1. 67) iti yak . ubhayatra ʻjāgro'viciṇṇalṅitsü (7. 3. 85) iti guṇe jāgaryā jāgareti śabdadvayam iti subodhinīkāraḥ . ʻriṅśayagliṅkṣü (7. 4. 28) iti riṅādeśe jāgriyā iti dhātupārāyaṇam iti sarvānandaḥ (pṛ. 62) . akārapratyayabalena kevalasya strīliṅgasyaiva unnayanaṃ mā bhūditi dvayorityuktam . tena ghañpratyaye puṃliṅgo'pyastīti darśitam .. vighno'ntarāyaḥ pratyūhaḥ . kāryasiddhipratibandhanasya nāmāni . yathā—ghaṭasiddheścakracīvarādyabhāvaḥ . arthasiddheḥ piśunavyāpāra iti . vihantyanena puruṣaḥ kāryasiddhimiti vighnaḥ . ʻhana hiṃsāgatyoḵ . ʻghañarthe kavidhānaṃ sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham (vā. 3. 3. 58) iti dhañarthe kapratyayaḥ . ʻgamahanajana . . . ityādinā upadhālopaḥ, ʻho hanteḵ (7. 3. 54) iti kutvam .. antarā madhye āyaḥ ayanaṃ kāryavyavadhānamatreti antarāyaḥ .. pratikūlam ūhyate'neneti pratyūhaḥ . ʻūha vitarke .. syādupaghno'ntikāśraye . samīpabhūta āśraye upaghnaśabdaḥ . upa samīpe hanyate gamyata ityupaghnaḥ . ʻhana hiṃsāgatyoḵ . ʻupaghna āśraye (3. 3. 85) iti nipātitaḥ . ʻāśrayaśabdaḥ sāmīpyaṃ pratyāsattiṃ lakṣayati iti kāśikā (1, pṛ. 220) .. 19 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
