<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.016-17>  
manojñamukhyadeveṣu vṛndāraka udāhṛtaḥ .. 33 ..
praśastaṃ vṛndamasyāstīti vṛndārakaḥ ..
saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyamukhyānyāsahāyeṣveka ucyate .
svayameva etītyekaḥ . ʻiṇ gataü ..
dāmbhiko'tyantavikṣiptadṛṣṭau kaukkuṭike'pi ca .. 34 ..
dambhaḥ prayojanamasyeti dāmbhikaḥ . kaukkuṭiko māyāvī ..
kāryāśakte svāmibhāvadarśī lālāṭikaḥ smṛtaḥ .
kopaprasādacihnaṃ prabhulalāṭaṃ paśyatīti lālāṭikaḥ ..
kaṭakaḥ kaṅkaṇe śailanitambe rāṣṭrake'pi ca .. 35 ..
kaṭatīti kaṭakaḥ . ʻkaṭe varṣāvaraṇayoḵ ..
drumasya tīkṣṇāvayave sūcyagrakṣudravairiṇoḥ .
romāñce paruṣālāpe kaṇṭakaḥ parikīrtitaḥ .. 36 ..
kaṇatyanena tāḍita iti kaṇṭakaḥ . ʻkaṇa śabde .. 16-17 ..
iti kāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.016-17>  
vṛndārakau rūpimukhyau . rūpī surūpaḥ . mukhyaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ . praśastaṃ vṛndaṃ svopasarjanībhūtamasyāstīti vṛndārakaḥ . ʻśṛṅgavṛndābhyāmārakan vaktavyaḵ (vā. 5. 2. 122) . liṅgatraye'pyudāhāryam . strītvavivakṣāyāṃ tu ʻna yāsayoḵ (7. 3. 45) iti sūtre ʻvā sūtakāputrakāvṛndārakāṇāmupasaṃkhyānam (vā. 7. 3. 45) iti vacanādāpi parataḥ itvapratiṣedhe'sya vaikalpikatvādatra strīliṅge vṛndārakā vṛndāriketi rūpadvayamasti . devatāparyāyeṣu prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 9) .. eke mukhyānyakevalāḥ . mukhye yathā—sarvasattvaikabandhuḥ . anyārthe yathā—ityeke prāhuḥ . kevalaḥ sahāyarahitaḥ . tatra yathā—ʻeko'jayad ripupurāṇi haraḥ kharādīn iti . eti gacchati ityekaḥ . ʻiṇ gataü . auṇādikaḥ kan (u. 3. 43) . śeṣe—ʻekaḥ saṃkhyeyabhede syāt iti . eko ghaṭaḥ . ityādi .. syād dāmbhikaḥ—īkṣaṇaḥ . dambhaḥ prayojanamasyeti dāmbhikaḥ . taduktam—
ʻmṛṣaiva yāyajūkādiveṣamālambya jīvati .
ātmastutiparo yaśca sa hi dāmbhika ucyate ..
iti . yaśca parivrājakādirgamanasamaye kukkuṭavat cakṣuḥsaṃyamanena kiṃcit kiṃcit purodeśaṃ paśyan śanaigacchati sa adūreritekṣaṇaḥ . tāvubhau kaukkuṭikaśabdenocyete . ʻmithyācaryā kalpanā syāt kukkuṭiḥ kuhanā tathȫ iti ratnakośe . kukkuṭiṃ kuhanāṃ paśyatīti kaukkuṭikaḥ . ʻsaṃjñāyāṃ lalāṭakukkuṭyau paśyati (4. 4. 46) iti ṭhaki kaukkuṭiko dāmbhikaḥ . kukkuṭavanmandaṃ mandaṃ caratīti kaukkuṭiko dvitīyaḥ. eṣa svābhāvikaceṣṭāyuktaḥ, prathamastu pratāraka ityanayorbheda iti subhūticandraḥ .. lālāṭikaḥ—kāryākṣamaśca yaḥ . bhālaṃ lalāṭam . prabhoḥ kopaprasādābhivyañjakabhrūkuṭirekhādiparijñānāya bhālaṃ lalāṭaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa lālāṭikaḥ . bhāvadarśīti pāṭhe bhāvo'bhiprāyaḥ, tadarthamiti lalāṭameva paśyatīti lālāṭikaḥ . ʻsaṃjñāyāṃ lalāṭakukkuṭyau paśyati (4. 4. 46) iti ṭhakpratyayaḥ . yaśca svakīyamanyadīyaṃ vā kartuṃ na śaknoti, kiṃ tu ʻyathā lalāṭe likhitaṃ tattathā na tadanyathȫ iti sarvadā svalalāṭameva paśyati, na tu kvacidapyudyuṅkte, so'pi lālāṭikaḥ .. ʻbhūbhṛnnitambavalayacakreṣu kaṭako'striyām . bhūbhṛtaḥ parvatasya nitambo madhyabhāgaḥ ityekamabhidheyam, valayaḥ karabhūṣaṇaṃ, cakraṃ sainyam . eṣu kaṭakadvayasāraviccakraṃ rāṣṭram ityapare . yathā—āndhrakaṭakaṃ, karṇāṭakakaṭakam iti . subhūticandrasarvānandau tu—bhūbhṛnnitambetyādikaṃ ślokārdhaṃ prakṣiptaṃ manyamānau na vyācakratuḥ . ata eva triṣūttare ityatra kāntavargasamāptiparyantāḥ śabdāḥ vācyaliṅgā iti vyācakratuśca . subodhinīkārādayastu—paṭhitvā vyākhyātavantaḥ . ʻromāñce kṣudraśatro ca taroraṅge ca kaṇṭakaḵ . kaṃ sukhaṃ ṭaṅkayati badhnātīti kaṇṭakaḥ . ʻṭaki bandhane . etadapi ślokārdha prakṣiptameva nāmarasiṃhīyamiti saṃpradāyaḥ .. 16-17 .. 
iti kāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.016-17>  
vṛndārakau rūpimukhyau . triṣūttare ityadhikārāt triliṅgaḥ . vṛndārikā kanyā vṛndārakaṃ kulamiti varayiturbhāgyam . eke mukhyānyakevalāḥ . ʻdeveṣveko mahādevo devānekānna manmahe .. syād dāmbhikaḥ—īkṣaṇaḥ . dāmbhikau dūreritekṣaṇau puruṣau kaukkuṭikau syātām .. lālāṭikaḥ—akṣamaśca yaḥ . yaḥ prabhorbhāvadarśī, bhāvajijñāsaḥ prabhoḥ, kāryākṣamaḥ kāryālasaḥ sa lālāṭikaḥ syāt .. 16-17 ..
anuktam—
kṛpāyāmapi śūkaḥ syādapayāne sṛgālikā .
apayānaṃ palāyanam ..
drāvakastu vidagdhe'pi mātulyāmapi cāmbikā ..
vā droṇyāṃ kavivekaḥ syānmṛṇāle'pi ca korakam .
kavāṭakuṭake'pi syāt kūcikātha kanīnikā ..
svalpāṅgulau cālirute vastrabhaṅge'pi cormikā .

siṃhikātanayo rāhuḥ ..
kautukaṃ hastasūtre syānnarmaṇyapi ca vismaye .
bhavejjalakaraṅkastu nārikelaphale'mbude ..

khanakau coravittajñau karkau kuliradarpaṇau ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.020>  
pataṅgau pakṣisūryau ca . pakṣī śalabhākhyaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 351) . patatīti pataṅgaḥ . śeṣe—ʻśālibhede pakṣimātre pataṅgaḥ pārade'pi cö iti .. pūgaḥ kramukavṛndayoḥ . iha kramukaśabdena brahmadāru guvākaścetyubhayaṃ vivakṣitaṃ vanauṣadhivarge (pu. 240, 322), tadubhayaparyāyeṣu kramukapūgaśabdayokarapi pāṭhāt . ekajātīyānāmekakarmopajīvināṃ samūha eva pūgaśabdasya mukhyo'rthaḥ . ʻnṛpeṇādhikṛtāḥ pūgāḥ śreṇayo'tha kulāni cö ityādiṣu ca (yā. smṛ. 2. 2. 30) prasiddhaḥ . samūhamātre tūpacārāt prayogaḥ . phale tu klībam .. paśavo'pi mṛgāḥ . paśavaḥ gomahiṣyādayaḥ . apiśabdāt siṃhaprabhṛtayaśca siṃhādivarge mṛgaśabdenoktāḥ (pṛ. 334) . tadviśeṣaḥ kuraṅgaḥ . tathā ca pratāpaḥ—ʻmṛgo nakṣatrabhede syāt kuraṅge kuñjarāntare . mṛgavyayācñāpaśuṣü iti . nakṣatrabhedo mṛgaśīrṣākhyaḥ . kuñjarāntaraṃ ca gajaviśeṣaḥ . taduktam—
ʻbhadro mandro mṛgaśceti vijñeyāstrividhā gajāḥ .
vanapracārasārūpyasattvabhedaviniścitāḥ ..
iti .. vegaḥ pravāhajavayorapi . vijate calatyaneneti vegaḥ . ʻovijī bhayacalanayoḵ . karaṇe ghañ . kutvaṃ ca (7. 3. 52) . pravāhe yathā—ʻnadī vegena śudhyati (manu. 5. 108) . śeṣe yathā—ʻvego mahākālaphale viṇmūtrādivinirgame iti . mahākālaphalaḥ kiṃpākasaṃjño vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . ʻvegānna dhārayed vātaviṇmūtrakṣavatṛṭkṣudhāḵ iti viṣṭhāderbahiḥpravṛttau .. 20 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.022>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.022>  
sargaḥ—sṛṣṭiṣu . anāgantuko dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ . utpattisiddha ityarthaḥ . yathā jalasya śaityaṃ nisargaḥ . nirmokṣaḥ tyāgaḥ . yathā bāṇavisargaḥ . niścayo'dhyavasāyaḥ . yathā—ʻgṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te (raghu. 3. 51) iti . adhyāyo nāma rāmāyaṇādimahākāvyeṣu kathānāṃ viśrāntisthānam . yathā—ʻsargabandho mahākāvyam (kāvyādarśa 1. 14) . sṛṣṭirutpādanam . yathā—ʻsargasthityantakāraṇam iti . ʻsṛja visarge iti dhātoryathāyathaṃ karmaṇi karaṇe bhāve ca ghañi sargaḥ .. yogaḥ—yuktiṣu . mahākarmasu saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārasya tadekatānatvaṃ saṃnahanam . yathā—ʻsetubandhe kṛtodyogaḵ iti . saṃnahanaṃ kavacādikamiti kecit . sāmadānādirupāyaḥ . yathā—ʻtantrāvāpavidā yogairmaṇḍalānyadhitiṣṭhatȫ iti māghakāvye (śiśu. 2. 88) . dhyānaṃ cittavṛttinirodhaḥ . yathā—ʻyogenānte tanutyajām iti raghuvaṃśe (1. 8) . saṃgatiḥ saṃśleṣaḥ . yathā—ratnaviyogaḥ kāñcanasya iti . yuktiḥ yogyatā, yathārhatvamityarthaḥ . yathā—yathāyogamitareṣām iti . ʻyujir yoge iti dhātoryathāyathaṃ bhāve karmaṇi karaṇe ca ghañi yogaḥ . śeṣe—ʻyogaḥ sūtre dravyalābhe viṣkambhādau ca bheṣaje iti . pāṇinyādīnāṃ sūtre yathā yogavibhāgādiṣṭasiddhiḥ iti . alabdhadravyalābhe yathā—ʻupeyādīśvaraṃ caiva yogakṣemārthasiddhaye (yā. smṛ. 1. 5. 100) . ʻviṣkambhaḥ prītirāyuṣmān ityādayaḥ saptaviṃśatiryogāḥ jyotiḥśāstre prasiddhāḥ . bheṣajamauṣadham . yathā—gugguluyogaḥ, pippalyādiyogaḥ .. 22.. </Amarapadavivarana>

bhogaḥ—kāyayoḥ . sukhaṃ sukhānubhavaḥ . yathā—ʻbhogī parijanaiḥ sahö iti . vaśyastrīṇāṃ riraṃsubhiḥ deyaṃ dhanādimūlyaṃ stryādibhṛtiḥ . yathā—ʻbhogaṃ tu ma ācakṣva yasmādiha striyo bhogameva hārayante iti . ādiśabdena svakīyadhānāyādiprāpaṇārthaṃ parakīyāṇāṃ ghoṭakabalīvardādīnām adhvayojanānusāreṇa kalpitaṃ mūlyaṃ gṛhyate . ʻbhuja paripālanābhyavahārayoḵ iti dhātoḥ bhāvādau ghañi bhogaḥ . śeṣe—ʻkauṭilye pālane ca syād dāne ca draviṇe'pi cö iti . ʻbhujo kauṭilye iti dhātoḥ niṣpannasya kauṭilyamarthaḥ .. cātake—śabale triṣu . cātakaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaḥ prāguktaḥ (pṛ. 340) . hariṇaḥ kuraṅgaḥ . śabalaḥ karburavarṇaḥ . śeṣe—ʻhastibhṛṅgau ca sāraṅgaü iti . viśvaprakāśe'pi—ʻsāraṅgaścātake bhṛṅge kuraṅge ca mataṅgaje (pṛ. 27, ślo. 49) iti . sajātīyairaram atyarthaṃ gacchatīti sāraṅgaḥ (vā. 3. 2. 38) . sāraṇi śreṣṭhāni aṅgānyavayavāni asyeti vā sāraṅgaḥ . śakandhvāditvāt pararūpatvam (vā. 6. 1. 94) .. 23 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.023>  
bhogaḥ—kāyayoḥ . stryādibhṛtirnāma lañjikādivetanam . ʻciraḍupumudalainadi .. cātake—śabale triṣu . bhṛṅgakuraṅgagajeṣu ca puṃliṅgaḥ . ʻsāraṅgaścātake bhṛṅge kuraṅge ca mataṅgaje iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 27, ślo. 49) .. 23 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

śṛṅgaṃ prādhānyasānvośca . pradhānasya bhāvaḥprādhānyam . prabhutvamiti yāvat . yathā—ʻśṛṅgaṃ sa dṛptavinayādhikṛtaḥ pareṣāmatyucchritaṃ na mamṛṣe na tu dīrghamāyuḵ (raghu. 9. 62) iti . sānu giriśikharam, prasthaśca . tathā ca kātyaḥ—ʻśṛṅgaṃ śikharaṃ sānvapi iti . śṛṅgaśabdaḥ puṃliṅge'pyasti . tathā ca vaijayantyām (pṛ. 237, ślo. 87)—ʻkrīḍāmbuyantre śṛṅgo'strī parvatāgraprabhutvayoḥ . paśvaṅge cö iti . kūrcaśīrṣe puṃliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (pṛ. 302) . madgurasya priyāyāṃ (pṛ. 272) viṣāyāṃ ca (pṛ. 273) ṅībantaḥ prāguktaḥ .. varāṅgaṃ mūrdhaguhyayoḥ . guhyaṃ yoniḥ . avayaveṣu śraiṣṭhyādubhayorvarāṅgatvam . ʻguḍatvaci varāṅgaṃ syād yonau mūrdhni gaje tu nȫ iti rabhasaḥ .. bhagaḥ—kīrtiṣu . śrīḥ saṃpattiḥ kāntiśca . kāmo yoniḥ icchā ca . māhātmyaśabdena jñānavairāgyaiśvaryayogo vivakṣitaḥ . vīryamakuṇṭhitā śaktiḥ . yatna utsāhaḥ . arkaḥ sūryaḥ . kīrtiḥ sādhuvādaḥ . rūpabhedāt puṃliṅga iti subhūtiḥ . rabhasakośe tu—ʻbhagaṃ śrīyonivīryeṣu jñānavairāgyadharmayoḵ ityādi napuṃsakakāṇḍe'bhihitam . rudrastu—ʻjñānavairāgyayoryonau bhagamastrī ravau tu nȫ iti . bhajyata iti bhagaḥ . ʻbhaja sevāyām . ghapratyayaḥ (3. 3. 118) .. 26 ..

(7. 3. 53) .. aṃho—agham . aṃhaḥ pāpam . vyasanaṃ madyapānadyūtādi . ʻaghi gataü iti dhātoḥ pacādyac (3. 1. 134) .. triṣviṣṭe'lpe laghuḥ . iṣṭe yathā—ʻdarśanena laghunā yathā tayoḥ prītimāpurubhayostapasvinaḵ iti (raghu. 11. 12) . alpe yathā—laghvāhāra iti ..

AK.03.03.028b kācāḥ śikyamṛdbhedadṛgrujaḥ .
AK.03.03.028cd viparyāse vistare ca prapañcaḥ pāvake śuciḥ .. 28 ..
AK.03.03.029ab māsyamātye cātyupadhe puṃsi medhye site tripu .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.028-29>  
dṛgrogamaṇiśikyeṣu mṛdbhede kāca iṣyate .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.028-29>  
kācāḥ—dṛgrujaḥ . ghaṭādidhāraṇārtho rajjukṛto yantraviśeṣaḥ śikyam . mṛdbhedastu daridrayoṣidādīdhāraṇīyānāṃ valayāṅgulīyakādīnāṃ prakṛtibhūto mṛttikāviśeṣaḥ . dṛśaḥ netrasya rug rogaḥ kācākhyaḥ prasiddhaḥ . ʻkaca dīptibandhanayoḵ iti dhātoḥ karmaṇyadhikaraṇe ca yathāyogaṃ ghañ . ʻna kvādeḵ (7. 3. 59) iti kṛtvapratiṣedhaḥ .. viparyāse—prapañcaḥ . atasmin taditi pratyayo viparyāsaḥ . yathā—ʻprapañcasya layo jñānāt iti . vistaraḥśabdabāhulyam . yathā—ʻalamatiprapañcenö iti . padārthaprapañcaḥ ityādau śabdavyatirikte prapañce śabda aupacārikaḥ . ʻpaci vistāravacane ityasmāt caurādikāt ʻerajaṇyantānām iti ṇyantaparyudāsasya prāyikatvād eraci (3. 3. 56) prapañcaḥ .. pāvake—site triṣu . atra māsiśabdenāṣāḍhamāso vivakṣitaḥ . ʻśaucācāraparijñānamamātyānāmupadhȫ iti kauṭilyaḥ (arthaśāstre 1. 10) . parijñānopāyaśca kṣatriyavarge prapañcitaḥ (pṛ. 496) . tāmatikrānto'tyupadhaḥ, upadhāśaddha iti yāvat . pāvakādyarthatraye puṃliṅgaḥ . pavitre dhavaladravye ca vācyaliṅgaḥ . śṛṅgārarase'pi śuciśabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 131) .. abhiṣaṅge—ruciḥ striyām . abhiṣaṅgaḥ āsaktiḥ . yathā—vedābhyāsaruciḥ iti . spṛhā vāñchā . yathā—ʻbhinnarucirhi lokaḵ iti (raghu. 6. 30) . tigmaruciriti gabhastau . ʻruca dīptaü ityasmād ʻigupadhāt kit (u. 4. 120) itīnpratyaye ruciḥ .. 28-9 ..
iti cāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.028-29>  
kācāḥ—dṛgrujaḥ . mṛdbhedaḥ . ʻgājü .. viparyāse—prapañcaḥ . vistaraḥ śabdavistṛtiḥ .. pāvake—triṣu . atyupadhaśabdo'mātyaviśeṣaṇam .
ʻśuciḥ śabde'nupahate śṛṅgārāṣāḍhayoḥ site .
grīṣme hutavahe'pi syādupadhāśuddhamantriṇi ..
iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 30, ślo. 6) .. abhiṣaṅge—ruciḥ striyām . abhiṣaṅgo 'tyāsaktiḥ . spṛhā bubhukṣā .. anuktam—
śmaśruṇyapi ca kūrcaḥ syāt kacaḥ śuṣkavraṇe'pi ca .
piśācaḥ syād biḍāle'pi nārāco'mbukariṇyapi ..
cañcaḥ kirātabhede syāccañcā strī tṛṇapūruṣe .
kaṇīciḥ puṣpitalatāguñjayoḥ śakaṭe'pi ca ..
ratanārīcaḥ śunake sītkāre ca natabhruvām .
iti cāntavargaḥ
paridhānāñcale kacchaḥ pārśve puṣpavane'pi ca .
pucchaḥ paścātpradeśe'pi mlecchaḥ pāparate'pi ca .. 28-9 ..
iti chāntāḥ </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.030ab kekitārkṣyāvahibhujau dantaviprāṇḍajā dvijāḥ .
AK.03.03.030cd ajā viṣṇuharacchāgā goṣṭhādhvanivahā vrajāḥ .. 30 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.030>  
ahibhuṅnakule'pi syād vainateyamayūrayoḥ .. 64 ..
ahiṃ bhūṅkta ityahibhuk ..
traivarṇikeṣu danteṣu pakṣisarpādiṣu dvijaḥ .
reṇukāyāṃ ca bhārgyāṃ ca dvijāśabda udāhṛtaḥ .. 65 ..
dvirjāyata iti dvijaḥ . ʻjanī prādurbhāve ..
hare harau vidhau kāme chāge raghusute'pyajaḥ .
vidhirbrahmā . na jāyata ityajaḥ ..
gosthānādhvasamūheṣu vrajaśabdo'bhidhīyate .. 66 ..
vrajatīti vrajaḥ . ʻvraja gataü .. 30 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.030>  
anantaramacchakacchatucchādīnāṃ sadbhāve'pi teṣāṃ prayogaprācuryābhāvāt tānupekṣya jāntānāha—kekitārkṣyāvahibhujau . nigadavyākhyātam . nakule'pyahibhukśabdaḥ .. dantaviprāṇḍajā dvijāḥ . vipragrahaṇaṃ traivarṇikopalakṣaṇam . tathā ca smṛtiḥ—
ʻmāturyadagre jāyante dvitīyaṃ mauñjibandhanāt .
ʻtatrāsya mātā sāvitrī pitā tvācārya ucyate .
ʻbrāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśastasmādete dvijāḥ smṛtāḥ .
iti . ata eva dvirjātā dvijāḥ . vṛttiviṣaye sucpratyayasya lopaḥ . aṇḍajāḥ pakṣisarpādyāḥ . bhārgyāṃ reṇukāyāṃ ca dvijā strīliṅgā prāguktā (pṛ, 268, 286) .. ajā viṣṇuharacchāgāḥ . na jāyata ityajaḥ . ajati gacchatīti vā acaḥ . ʻvidhīśaviṣṇukāmeṣu puṃsyajaḥ prakṛtau striyām iti nānārthasaṃgrahaḥ . raghuputro'pyajaḥ prasiddhaḥ .. goṣṭhādhvanivahā vrajāḥ . goṣṭhaṃ gosthānam . nivahaḥ samūhe . vrajantyasminniti vrajaḥ . ʻgocarasaṃcaravahavrajavyajāpaṇanigamāścö (3. 3. 119) iti ghapratyayānto nipātitaḥ .. 30 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.030>  
kekitārkṣya—mayūrayoḥ . aṇḍajaḥ pakṣī .. ajā viṣṇu—vrajāḥ . brahmapitāmahānādayo'pi . ʻajaḥ pitāmahe'nādau chāge viṣṇau hare ravaü iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 230, ślo. 4) .. 30 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.031ab dharmarājau jinayamau kuñjo dante'pi na striyām .
AK.03.03.031cd balaje kṣetrapūrdvāre valajā valgudarśanā .. 31 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.031>  
dharmarājo jine'pi syād yudhiṣṭhirakṛtāntayoḥ .
dharmasya rājā dharmarājaḥ ..
gajadante nikuñje ca sānau kuñja udāhṛtaḥ .. 67 ..
kuñjatīti kuñjaḥ . ʻkuñja śabde ..
sasyakṣetre puradvāre samare valajaṃ matam .
valajā varakāntāyāṃ medinyāmapi saṃmatā .. 68 ..
balena jāyata iti valajā . ʻjanī prādurbhāve .. 31 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.031>  
dharmarājau jinayamau . jinaḥ sugataḥ . yudhiṣṭhire'pi dharmarājaśabdaḥ .. kuñjo dante'pi na striyām . kujiḥ laukiko dhātuḥ āvaraṇārtha iti subodhinī . kuñjati āvṛṇoti svāvāsasthānamiti kuñjaḥ . dante gajadante . yathā kuñjara iti . apiśabdāt ʻlatādipihitodare iti prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 213) .. valaje—valgudarśanā . kṣetraṃ ca nagaradvāraṃ ca pratyekaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgena valajaśabdenocyate . valgudarśanā vāmalocanā . yoṣeti yāvat . sā strīliṅgasya valajāśabdasyārthaḥ . bale jātaṃ valajam . vabayorabhedaḥ .
ʻvalajaṃ gopure kṣetre sasyasaṅgarayorapi .
valajā vārayoṣāyāṃ vasumatyāmapi smṛtā ..
iti viśvaprakāśikā (pṛ. 33, ślo. 17) . ʻvalajaṃ dhānyarāśau syāt iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 128, ślo. 65) . ʻkarṣakeṇa valajaṃ pupūṣatȫ iti māghaḥ (śiśu. 14. 7) .. 31 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.031>  
dharmarājau jinayamau . yudhiṣṭhiro'pi syāt . ʻdharmarājo yame buddhe dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhire iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 34, ślo. 30) .. kuñjo dante'pi na striyām . danto gajadantaḥ . ʻyenugadavaḍö .. ʻkuñjo nikuñje'pi hanau bhaved dante ca dantinām iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 33, ślo. 12) .. valaje—valgudarśanā . valajeti tantreṇa strīnapuṃsakayoreva grahaṇam . ʻvalajā varanāryāṃ strī kṣetre dvāre ca sā na nȫ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 263, ślo. 78) .. 31 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.032ab same kṣmāṃśe raṇe'pyājiḥ prajā syāt saṃtatau jane .
AK.03.03.032cd abjau śaṅkhaśaśāṅkau ca svake nitye nijaṃ triṣu .. 32 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.032>  
yuddhe ca samabhabhāge kṣaṇe'pyājiḥ prakīrtitaḥ .
ajanti kṣipanti śastrāṇyatretyājiḥ . ʻaja gatikṣepaṇayoḵ ..
jane'pyabhijane caiva prajāśabdaḥ prakīrtitaḥ .. 69 ..
prajāyata iti prajā . ʻjamī prādurbhāve ..
abjo dhanvantarau śaṅkhe padmenduniculeṣu ca .
adbhye jāto'bjaḥ ..
sanātane svakīye ca nijaśabda udāhṛtaḥ .. 70 ..
nitarāṃ jāyata iti nijaḥ . ʻjanī prādurbhāve .. 32 ..
iti jāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.032>  
same kṣmāṃśe raṇe'pyājiḥ. samapadaṃ bhūbhāgasya viśeṣaṇam . ʻājiḥ samabhuvi striyām iti bhūvarge śeṣakāreṇoktatvāt . raṇaḥ yuddham . apiśabdāt kṣaṇarūpakāla iti subodhinī . ʻyudbhūbhāgakṣaṇeṣvājiḵ iti durgokteśca .. prajā syāt saṃtatau jane . saṃtatirapatyaparaṃparā . yathā—prajāvān bhūyāsamiti . jane yathā—ʻatha prajānāmadhipaḥ prabhāte iti (raghu. 2. 1) .. abjau śaṅkhaśaśāṅkau ca . śeṣe—ʻabjo niculavaidyayoḵ iti . niculo hijjalaḥ . vaidyaḥ dhanvantariḥ . rūpabhedādeṣvartheṣu puṃliṅgaḥ . vyaktayogaśca . ʻśaṅkhe dhanvantarau candre puṃsyabjaḥ klībamambuje iti saṃgrahaḥ .. svake nitye nijaṃ triṣu . svakaṃ nijasaṃbandhi . yathā—nijagṛham . nijaṃ vastramiti . nityaṃ yāvad dravyabhāvi guṇādikam . yathā—nijo dharmaḥ . nijaṃ gāmbhīryamiti . nitarāṃ jāyata iti nijam . triṣu vācyaliṅga ityarthaḥ .. 32 .. 
iti jāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.032>  
same kṣmāṃśe—jane . saṃtatirapatyam .. abjau śaṅkhaśaśāṅkau ca . ʻabjo dhanvantarau śaṅkhe candre klī lavaṇe'mbuje iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 230, ślo. 3) .. svake nitye nijaṃ triṣu . svabhāve napuṃsakam . ʻsahajaṃ nijamājānaṃ dharmasargau nisargavat iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 192, ślo. 1) .. anuktam—
jūrākāśe sarasvatyāṃ piśācyāṃ nā tu rākṣase .
aṅgajaṃ rudhire klībaṃ pumān putramanojayoḥ .
kārujaḥ karipote syāt svayaṃjātatile'pi ca .
parañjastailayantre syād ḍiṇḍire churikāphale .
paṭahe'pi ca guñjā syāt kastūryāmapi cāṇḍajā .
pakṣisarpādiṣu puṃliṅgaḥ .
rājarājaḥ śaśāṅke'pi lājaḥ syāccārdrataṇḍule .
bhṛṣṭadhānye bahuvacanāntaḥ .. 32 ..
iti jāntavargaḥ </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.033ab puṃsyātmani pravīṇe ca kṣetrajño vācyaliṅgakaḥ .
AK.03.03.033cd saṃjñā syāccetanā nāma hastādyaiścārthasūcanā .. 33 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.033>  
pravīṇe cātmani tathā kṣetrajñaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ .
kṣetraṃ jānātīti kṣetrajñaḥ . ʻjñā avabodhane ..
saṃjñā syād bhānubhāryāyāṃ gāyatryāṃ caiva nāmani .. 71 ..
cetanāyāṃ ca hastādyaiḥ sūcanāyāṃ ca vastunaḥ .
samyak jñāyata iti saṃjñā .. 33 ..
iti ñāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.033>  
anantaraṃ jhāntānāṃ kliṣṭakalpyatayā tānupekṣya ñāntānāha—puṃsyātmani—vācyaliṅgakaḥ . kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ svabhogasādhanatvena jānātīti kṣetrajño jīvātmā . kṣetraṃ sthānaviśeṣaṃ jānātīti kṣetrajño nipuṇaḥ .. saṃjñā syāt—arthasūcanā . cetanā jñānam . nāma nāmadheyam . ādyaśabdena bhrūnikocādergrahaṇam . tairarthasya prayojanasya vastuno vā sūcanā jñāpanamityarthaḥ . saṃpūrvāt jānāteḥ ʻātaścopasarge (3. 3. 106) iti yathāyogamarthatraye bhāve karaṇe ca aṅi saṃjñā .
ʻsaṃjñā syād bhānubhāryāyāṃ gāyatryāṃ caiva nāmani .
cetanāyāṃ ca hastādyaiḥ sūcanāyāṃ ca vastunaḥ ..
iti nānārthasaṃgrahaḥ . śeṣe—ʻnāmasmṛtyorabhijñā syāt jñastu saumye vipaściti iti ..33 ..
iti ñāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.033>  
puṃsyātmani—arthasūcanā . cetanā nāma mūrcchāviparyayaḥ .
ʻmūrcchāsu mūrkhāsu tirobhavanti kapālaminduḥ karicarmanāgāḥ .
kāśyāmatho kaṇṭhagatasya jantoḥ ..
anuktam—
doṣajñau vaidyavidvāṃsau jño vidvān somajo'pi ca .
somajo budhaḥ .
sarvajñau sugateśānau kālajñau jñānikukkuṭau .. 33 ..
iti ñāntavargaḥ </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.034ab kākebhagaṇḍau karaṭau gajagaṇḍakaṭī kaṭau .
AK.03.03.034cd śipiviṣṭastu khalatau duścarmaṇi maheśvare .. 34 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.034>  
gajagaṇḍe vādyabhede kusumbhe nindyajīvane .. 72 ..
ekādaśāhaśrāddhe ca vāyase karaṭo mataḥ .
ke raṭatīti karaṭaḥ . ʻraṭa paribhāṣaṇe ..
atireke śave pretakriyākartṛkiliñjayoḥ .. 73 ..
kaṭaḥ śmaśāne samaye śroṇimātaṅgagaṇḍayoḥ .
kaṭyata iti kaṭaḥ . ʻkaṭe varṣāvaraṇayoḵ ..
nārāyaṇe maheśāne kharvāṭe duṣṭacarmaṇi .. 74 ..
śipiviṣṭastu piśunavādinyapi ca vartate .
śipau carmaṇi viṣṭaṃ doṣavyāptirasyeti śipiviṣṭaḥ . ʻviplṛ vyāptaü .. hariharapakṣe yathā—śipiṣu paśuṣu janeṣu viṣṭo vyāpta iti śipiviṣṭaḥ .. 34 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.034>  
kākebhagaṇḍau karaṭau . ke raṭati śabdaṃ karotīti karaṭaḥ . ʻraṭa parabhāṣaṇe . karoti madamiti karaṭaḥ gajakapolaḥ . ʻśakādibhyo'ṭan (u. 4. 82) iti aṭan . atra pratāpaḥ—
ʻkaraṭo vādyabhede syāt kusumbhakarigaṇḍayoḥ .
ekādaśe ca śrāddhe ca vāyase nindyajīvini ..
iti .. gajagaṇḍakaṭī kaṭau . kaṭiḥ śroṇiḥ . śeṣe—
ʻkaṭo'tirekaśavayoḥ kriyākāriśmaśānayoḥ ..
kiliñje samaye strī tu kaṭiḥ śroṇyāṃ kaṭī ca sā ..
iti . atireke yathā—prakaṭo vikaṭaḥ . śave yathā—varjayet kaṭadhūmamiti . kriyākāriṇi pretakarmakāriṇi yathā—ʻsakaṭānnaṃ ca nāśnīyāt (yā. smṛ. 3. 1. 15) iti . kiliñjake yathā—kaṭe śete . samaye yathā—ʻvaktavyamiha bauddhakaṭarūḍhai iti .. śipiviṣṭastu—maheśvare . khalatiḥ keśotpattirahitaśirobhāgayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ . nikṛttamehanāvaraṇacarmā duścarmā . kuṣṭhītyeke . ʻśipiviṣṭastu duścarmakhalvāṭahariśaṃkarāḵ iti nānārthasaṃgrahe . doṣavyāptaṃ śipirucyata iti svāmī (pṛ. 277) . tena viṣṭaṃ vyāptaṃ śarīramasyeti śipiviṣṭaḥ . maheśvare tu—ʻyajño vai viṣṇuḥ paśavaḥ śipiḵ iti śrutau darśanāt paśavaḥ śipiśabdenocyante . tairviṣṭo vyāptaḥ sevitaḥ, tatpatiriti yāvat . taduktaṃ skāndapurāṇe—
ʻātmānaḥ paśavaḥ proktāḥ sarve saṃsāravartinaḥ .
teṣāṃ patitvād viśveśo bhavaḥ paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ ..
iti . ʻśipayo raśmayaḥ, tairviṣṭo vyāpta iti śipiviṣṭo viṣṇuḵ iti sahasranāmabhāṣye (pṛ. 78) vyākhyātam . ʻviṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭaḵ iti śrutiśca (vāja. saṃ. 8. 55) .. 34 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.034>  
kākebhagaṇḍau—maheśvare . khalatiḥ indraluptavyādhimān . ʻbaṭṭatalavāṃḍü . ʻkhalvāṭaḥ khalatirbabhruḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 185, ślo. 147) .. 34 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.035ab devaśilpinyapi tvaṣṭā diṣṭaṃ daive'pi na dvayoḥ .
AK.03.03.035cd rase kaṭuḥ kaṭvakārye triṣu matsaratīkṣṇayoḥ .. 35 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.035>  
amarāṇāṃ vardhakau ca sūrye tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ .. 75 ..
tvakṣati tanūkarotīti tvaṣṭā . ʻtvakṣū tanūkaraṇe ..
daive'tisarjane kāle diṣṭaśabdo'bhidhīyate .
diśyate nirdiśyata iti diṣṭam . ʻdiśa atisarjane ..
rase sugandhe puṃsi syādakārye na dvayoḥ kaṭuḥ .. 76 ..
strī kṣave rohiṇīkaṅgvostriṣu matsaratīkṣṇayoḥ .
kṣavo'tra kṛṣṇasarṣapaḥ . kaṭatīti kaṭuḥ . ʻkaṭi gataü .. 35 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.035>  
devaśilpinyapi tvaṣṭā . devaśilpī viśvakarmā . apiśabdāt sūrye . vardhakimātre tu prāguktaḥ (pṛ. 625) .. diṣṭaṃ daive'pi na dvayoḥ . daivaṃ purākṛtaṃ karma . na dvayoriti niṣedho nityānuvādaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ . apiśabdāt kāle puṃliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 73) . diśyate nirdiśyata iti diṣṭaḥ . atisṛṣṭe tu triliṅgaḥ .. rase kaṭuḥ—tīkṣṇayoḥ . rase śuṇṭhīmarīcādisaṃbandhini puṃliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1. pṛ. 69) . akārye kartumanarhe daṇḍapāruṣyādau tu rūpabhedānnapuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . yathā—kaṭu karma karotīti . bopālitastu—ʻakāryāpriyayoḥ kaṭuḵ iti vācyaliṅgaprakaraṇe prāha . saṃgrahe tu—anyadīyaśubhadveṣo matsaraḥ . tadyukte tīkṣṇe kṛpāṇādau ca vācyaliṅgaḥ . tīkṣṇaśabdena kaṭurasayuktaṃ sarṣapādikamiti vivakṣitam . tatrāpi vācyaliṅgaḥ . tīkṣṇaśabdena kaṭurasayuktaṃ sarṣapādikamiti vivakṣitam . tatrāpi vācyaliṅgaḥ . tīkṣṇaśabdena niṣṭhuraśabdo'pi vivakṣitaḥ . yathā—kaṭu raṭati kākaḥ iti . kaṭati varṣati duḥkhamiti vā, kaṭatyāvṛṇoti parotkarṣamiti vā kaṭuḥ . śeṣe—ʻkṣave priyaṅagurohiṇyāṃ striyāṃ gandhe pumān kaṭuḵ iti . kṣavaḥ sarṣapo rājikākhyaḥ . priyaṅaguḥ phalinī . rohiṇī kaṭurohiṇī . gandhe yathā—kaṭugandhā nirguṇḍī iti .. 35 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.035>  
devaśilpinyapi tvaṣṭā . apiśabdād vardhakāvapi syāt .. diṣṭaṃ daive'pi na dvayoḥ . kāle puṃliṅgaḥ .. rase kaṭuḥ—tīkṣṇayoḥ . rase rasaviśeṣe .. 35 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.037ab ayoghane śailaśṛṅge sīrāṅge kūṭamastriyām .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.036>  
aśubhe kuśale riṣṭamabhāve ca prakīrtitam .. 77 ..
riṣyata iti riṣṭam . ʻriṣa hiṃsāyām ..
takre nimbadrume kāke śubhe maraṇalakṣaṇe .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.036>  
riṣṭaṃ kṣemāśubhābhāveṣu . kṣemaṃ kalyāṇam . aśubhamamaṅgalam . abhāvo nāśaḥ . riṣyati duḥkhamiti vā riṣṭam . ʻriṣa hiṃsāyām .. ariṣṭe tu śubhāśubhe . mithoviruddhaśubhāśubhavacanasya riṣṭaśabdasya nañsamāse sati ariṣṭaśabdasyāpi śubhāśubhavacanatvam .
ʻklībaṃ śubhe'śubhe takre sūtyagārāntacihnayoḥ .
ariṣṭo laśune kāke nimbaphenilavṛkṣayoḥ ..
iti rabhasaḥ . antacihnaṃ maraṇacihnam . yathā—svasthāriṣṭamaśiraskapuruṣacchāyādarśanam iti .. māyā—kūṭamastriyām . māyādīnāṃ saptānāṃ dvandvaḥ . yantramantrauṣadhādiprayogeṇa paravyāmohajananaṃ māyā . niścalaṃ nirvikāram . yathā—ʻkūṭastho'kṣara ucyate (bha. gī. 15. 16) iti . yantraṃ mṛgapakṣibandhanasādhanam, yatsaṃbandhād vaitaṃsikasya kauṭika iti saṃjñā . iṣurbāṇaḥ . vastusvarūpasya kapaṭenānyathākaraṇaṃ kaitavam . yathā—kūṭalekhyaḥ kṛtaḥ iti . anṛtamasatyavacanam . yathā—kūṭasākṣī iti . rāśiḥ dhānyapuñjaḥ . yatra nidhāya taptaṃ lohaṃ hanyate sa ayoghanaḥ yathā—ʻtvaṣṭuḥ kūṭe bhaviṣyati candramāḵ iti murāriḥ (a. rā. 2. 80) . śailaśṛṅgaṃ giriśikharam . sīrāṅgaṃ vakradārurūpam . phāla ityeke . ʻkūṭa kauṭilye iti dhātoḥ igupadhalakṣaka pratyaye (3. 1. 135) kūṭaḥ kauṭilyaṃ kusṛtibandhaśca iti dhātuvṛttau . pṛṣodarāditvād upadhādīrghaḥ . keṣucidartheṣu ʻkūṭa dāhe iti dhātuḥ .. 36 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.037-38>  
sūkṣmailāyāṃ—saṃśaye'pi sā . sūkṣmailā nāma kācidelāvāntarajātibhedaḥ . kālaḥ kālaviśeṣaḥ . sa ca sūcyagreṇa sarojadalāṣṭakasya vyatibhedaparicchinnaḥ . laghvakṣaroccāraṇaparicchinnaḥ kālastruṭiriti kecit . alpe leśe yathā—ʻtruṭimātraṃ suvarṇasya liṅgasyādāya mūrdhani iti purāṇam (bhāgavata. 10. 13. 40) . saṃśayo'tra maraṇaviṣaya eveti . yathā—ʻtruṭiṃ prāpto rogī iti . svopādhinā truṭyate paricchidyata iti truṭiḥ kālaviśeṣaḥ . truṭyate tattvajñānena bhidyata iti truṭiḥ saṃśayaḥ . ʻtruṭiḥ strī saṃśaye leśe sūkṣmailākālabhedayoḵ iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (pṛ. 38, ślo. 28) .. artyutkarṣāśrayaḥ koṭyaḥ . artiḥ cāpāgram . yathā—dhanuḥkoṭiḥ iti . utkarṣo'tiśayaḥ yathā—parāṃ koṭimārūḍha iti . aśriḥ koṇaḥ . yathā—śatakoṭirvajra iti . śatilakṣātmakaḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣaśca koṭirucyate . koṭiśabdaḥ kṣatravarge vyutpāditaḥ (pṛ. 533, 539) . koṭiśabdāt kṛdikārāditi ṅīṣi (ga. sū.) koṭīśabdasyāpi vidyamānatvād vṛttānurodhena koṭīśabdo'pi ṅīṣantaḥ prayuktaḥ . etena hrasvopadhakoṭiśabdasya strīliṅgatvaṃ vyaktīkṛtam .. mūle lagnakace jaṭā . vṛkṣasaṃbandhinī śiphā mūlam . lagnāḥ parasparaṃ saṃśliṣṭāḥ kacāḥ keśā yasmin keśasamūhe sa lagnakacaḥ . jaṭati saṃhatībhavatīti jaṭā . ʻjaṭa saṃghāte .. vyuṣṭiḥ phale samṛddhau ca . phalaṃ karmasādhyaṃ sukṛtādi . yathā (rāmā. 6. 95. 29)—
ʻtasyaiva tapaso vyuṣṭyā prasādācca svayaṃbhuvaḥ .
nāsurebhyo na devebhyo bhayaṃ mama kadācana ..
iti sarvānandadarśitaḥ prayogaḥ (ṭī. sa. pṛ. 86) . ʻeṣā vyuṣṭiḥ samākhyātȫ iti vāmanavṛttau prayogaḥ . vyucchyate samāpyate vyāpāro'neneti vyuṣṭiḥ . ʻucchī vivāse . vivāsaḥ samāptiriti dhātuvṛttau (pṛ. 97) . vipūrvaḥ karaṇe striyāṃ ktin (3. 3. 94), vraśca . . . ityādinā (8. 2. 36) ṣatvaṃ ca . cakārāt stotre'pīti svāmī (pṛ. 278) .. dṛṣṭirjñāne'kṣṇi darśane . akṣṇi netre . karaṇe ktinpratyayaḥ (3. 3. 94) . darśanaṃ jñānam . bhāve ktin . yathā—na hi draṣṭurdṛṣṭerviparilopo vidyate iti .. 37-8 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

viṣābhimara—khare triṣu . viṣaṃ kālakūṭādikam, sahajaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca . abhimaro yuddham . lohaḥ śastrakam . arthatraye'pi rūpabhedād napuṃsaktavam . khare duḥsahe sūrakiraṇādau viśeṣyanighnaḥ . ʻte tīkṣṇā ye dhanecchāto yudhyanti dviradādibhiḵ iti nītiṣaṭsāhasryām .. pramāṇaṃ—pramātṛṣu . atra hetuśabdena jñaptikāraṇaṃ vivakṣitam . yathā—ʻsamyaganubhavasādhanaṃ pramāṇam iti . maryādā avadhiḥ . yathā—grāmayoranayoḥ parvataḥ pramāṇamiti . śāstre yathā—asminnarthe manuvacanaṃ pramāṇamiti . jñānasādhanatvākāreṇa śāstrasyāpi hetūpadeśenaiva grahaṇe'pyalaukikākāreṇa tato vailakṣaṇyāt pṛthagupādānaṃ kṛtam . athavā śāstraśabdena tadviśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ yathā—ʻpadavākyapramāṇajñaḵ iti (mā. mādha. 7) . iyattā avacchedaḥ . yathā—ʻkiyatpramāṇamudakam iti . (bho. pra. pṛ. 40, ślo. 185) . pramātari pramāśraye yathārthānubhavayukta ityarthaḥ . yathāhurnaiyāyikāḥ—ʻpramāsādhanapramāśrayayoranyataratvaṃ pramāṇalakṣamam iti . ʻtanme pramāṇaṃ śivaḵ iti ca . rabhaso'pi—

iti . pramātaryabhidheye tadgatabahutve satyapi tadviśeṣaṇasya pramāṇaśabdasya nityamekavacanāntamevetyarthaḥ . yathā—manvādayaḥ pramāṇam iti . satyavādimātre yathā—pramāṇabhūto devadatta iti . nitye yathā—ʻvācā virūpa nityayȫ (ṛgveda 8. 75. 6) iti . pramāṇabhūtayetyarthaḥ . ʻmāṅ māne iti dhātoryathāyogaṃ bhāvakaraṇādau lyuṭ (3. 3. 115, 117, 113) . kvacidarthaviśeṣe tu—ʻmīña hiṃsāyām iti dhātoḥ ʻmīnātiminoti . . . (6. 1. 50) ityātvam .. 53 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.054-55>

karaṇaṃ—indriyeṣvapi . kriyāprasiddhau prakṛṣṭopakārakaḥ kārakaviśeṣaḥ sādhakatamaḥ . yathā—ʻkaraṇādikaraṇayoścö (3. 3. 117) . kriyate saṃskriyate kṛṣīvalairiti karmaṇi lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) karaṇaṃ kṣetram . kirati bījamatreti vā . arthāntareṣu karaṇe lyuṭ (3. 3. 117) . gātraṃ śarīram . indriyaṃ cakṣurādikaṃ tvagādikaṃ ca . śeṣe—ʻkaraṇaṃ ratibandheṣu nṛttasaṃsthānakarmaṇoḵ iti . ratibandhāḥ kāmaśāstraprasiddhāḥ nāgabandhajṛmbhitādayaḥ . saṃgītasāre—

saṃsthānabhedān nāṭyajñāḥ karaṇāni pracakṣate ..

ʻśikharābaddhameghānāṃ vyajyante yatra veśmanām .
anugarjitasaṃdigdhāḥ karaṇairmurajasvanāḥ ..
iti . karmaṇi yathā—navīkaraṇam, śithilīkaraṇam iti . prāṇyutpāde—ghaṇṭāpathe . jīvānāṃ svasvakarmavaśena naratiryagādīnāṃ yoniṣu saṃbhavaḥ prāṇyutapādaḥ . saṃsāra iti yāvat . mārge vipulatayā asaṃbādhena parasparānupamardena senāyāḥ prasaraṇamasaṃbādha camūgatiḥ . samyagasaṃbādhena sarantyatreti saṃsaraṇam . ghaṇṭāpathaḥ rathyā . śeṣe—ʻraṇārambhe saṃsaraṇaṃ gopure puranirgame iti .. atha vāntānne—unnaye . uddhriyate kukṣikuharādūrdhvaṃ nīyata iti samuddharaṇaṃ charditānnam . bhāvasādhanatve tu unnaya uttolanam . ʻtatroddhṛtamamatrebhyaḵ (4. 2. 14) ityatra kāśikā (pṛ. 305) ʻbhuktojjhitamuddhṛtamucyate, yasyoddharaṇamiti prasiddhiḵ iti . kecittu—samyaguddharaṇaṃ samuddharaṇamiti vigṛhya mūlagranthaṃ paṭhitvā vyācakṣate .. 54-5 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.054-55>  
karaṇaṃ—indriyeṣvapi .
ʻkaraṇaṃ kāraṇe kāye sādhanendriyakarmasu .
kāyasthe vratabandhe ca nāṭyagītaprabhedayoḥ ..
ityajayaḥ .. prāṇyutpāde—ghaṇṭāpathe . prāṇyutpādaḥ saṃsāraḥ .
ʻsaṃsaraṇaṃ raṇārambhe puranirgamagopure .
ghaṇṭāpathe ca saṃsāre'pyasaṃbādhacamūgatau ..
iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 54, ślo. 87-8) .. atha vāntānne samuddharaṇamunnaye . unnaya uddhāraḥ . ʻuddharaṇaṃ samuddhāravāntānnonmūlaneṣvapi iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 54, ślo. 86) .. 54-5 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 03.301
AK.03.03.056ab atastriṣu viṣāṇaṃ syāt paśuśṛṅgebhadantayoḥ .
AK.03.03.056cd pravaṇaḥ kramanimnorvyāṃ prahve nā tu catuṣpathe .. 56 ..
AK.03.03.057ab saṃkīrṇau nicitāśuddhāvīriṇaṃ śūnyamūṣaram .
iti ṇāntavargaḥ
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.056> 
viṣāṇaṃ paśuśṛṅge'pi kroḍadaṃṣṭrebhadantayoḥ .
ajaśṛṅgyākhyauṣadhe'pi viṣāṇī parikathyate .. 120 ..
viṣāṇaśabdaḥ sattvavati triṣu liṅgeṣu vartate . sa viśeṣyāśrayāt . veveṣṭīti viṣāṇam . ʻviṣlṛ vyāptaü .. 
kramanimnakṣititale kṣāntapraguṇayorapi .
prahve catuṣpathe caiva pravaṇo vācyaliṅgakaḥ .. 121 ..
pravaṇatīti pravaṇaḥ . ʻvaṇa śabde ..
apavitre ca nicite saṃkīrṇaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ .
samyak kīrṇo vyāptaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ ..
īriṇaṃ śūnyadeśe syādūṣare cāpi saṃmatam .. 122 ..
īrayatīti īriṇam . ʻīra kṣepe .. 56 ..
iti ṇāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.056> 
atha triṣu—ibhadantayoḥ . atha ṇakārāntasamāptiparyantaṃ catvāraḥ śabdā liṅgatraye vartante . triliṅgatvamātre sādharmyam . na tu sarvadā . tataśca viṣāṇaśabdaḥ taṭamaṇḍalādiśabdavat svabhāvādeva triliṅgaḥ . itare tu viśeṣyanighnāḥ .. paśūnāṃ gāmahiṣyādīnāṃ śṛṅge gajadante ca viṣāṇam . viśeṣeṇa syati nāśayati virodhinamiti viṣāṇam . ʻṣo'ntakarmaṇi . lyuḥ (3. 1. 134) . ʻupasargāt sunotisuvatisyati . . .  (8. 3. 65) iti ṣatvam . striliṅge tu śṛṅgavacanasya ajādipāṭhāt ṭābantatve viṣāṇā . ʻkṛṣṇaviṣāṇayā kaṇḍūyate iti ṭābantasya prayogaḥ . aśṛṅgivacanatve tu pippalyādipāṭhād viṣāṇīti ṅīṣantaḥ prāguktaḥ (1. pṛ. 286) . viśvaprakāśe (pṛ. 52, ślo. 64-5)— ʻviṣāṇā tu kroḍadviradadaṃṣṭrayoḵ iti .. pravaṇaṃ—catuṣpathe . purobhāge kiṃciṃdavanatāyāṃ bhūmau vācyaliṅgaḥ . na tu viṣāṇaśabdavad svabhāvataḥ . yathā—prācīnapravaṇo deśaḥ, udakpravaṇā bhūmiḥ . ityādi . catuṣpathe tu nā puṃliṅga iti triliṅgatvasyāpavādaḥ . viśeṣeṇa kleśarāhityena pravante janā atreti pravaṇaḥ . ʻpruṅ gataü . prakarṣeṇa vanute vā . ʻpranirantaḥśara . . . ityādinā (8. 4. 5) ṇatvam . prahve yathā—bhaktipravaṇa iti . vidyāpravaṇo dharmapravaṇa ityādau anukūlārthe lakṣaṇayā prayogaḥ .. saṃkīrṇau nicitāśuddhau . nicito vyāptaḥ . yathā—mlecchasaṃkīrṇo deśa iti . aśuddhe yathā—saṃkīrṇā jātiriti .. iriṇaṃ śūnyamūṣaram . śūnyaṃ mānuṣapaśvādisaṃcārarahitaṃ gṛhādikam . kṣāramṛttikāprāyaṃ sthalamūṣaraṃ ca . iyarti sasyābhāvādaniruddho gacchatyatreti iriṇaḥ . ʻṛ gataü . ʻarteḥ kidiccö (u. 2. 55) iti inanpratyayaḥ, dhātorirityādeśaśca . kittvād guṇābhāvaḥ . hrasvādirayaṃ śabdaḥ . ʻtatsvakṛtamiriṇo'bhavat iti śrutau darśanāt . ʻīriṇaṃ śūnyamūṣaram iti dīrghādau rabhasaḥ paṭhitavān iti subhūticandraḥ .. 56 .. 
iti ṇāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.056>  
atha triṣu—ibhadantayoḥ . satrīliṅge gaurāditvād ṅīṣ . pravaṇaṃ—catuṣpathe . atha triṣvityadhikārāt catuṣpathavarjaṃ triliṅgaḥ . pravaṇo deśaḥ . pravaṇā bhāryā . tatparetyarthaḥ . ʻucyate pravaṇaḥ prahvastatparaśca parāyaṇaḵ iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 2. 197) .. saṃkīrṇe—iriṇaṃ śūnyamūṣaram . ʻiriṇaṃ tūṣaṇaṃ śūnyamiṣvāso'stramiṣukṣipȫ iti hrasvādiṣu jayakośaḥ . ʻīkṣaṇaṃ darśane dṛṣṭāvīriṇaṃ śūnyamūṣaram iti dīrghādiṣu rabhasakośaḥ ..
anuktam—
pārṣṇiḥ pāścātyabhāge'pi vṛṣṇiḥ pāṣaṇḍake'pi ca .
paraśvadhe'pi drughaṇā nikaṣe'pi ca roṣaṇaḥ .
mudgare drughaṇaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . roṣaṇaḥ triliṅgaḥ ..
jyārave'pi vyākaraṇaṃ surate'pi ca dharṣaṇam .
vayaḥsaṃdhau ca nārīṇāṃ garbhe dohadalakṣaṇam .
vātarāyaṇa unmatte puruṣe cāprayojane .. 56 ..
iti ṇāntavargaḥ </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.057cd devasūryau vivasvantau sarasvantau nadārṇavau .. 57 ..
AK.03.03.058ab pakṣitārkṣyau garutmantau śakuntau bhāsapakṣiṇau .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.057>  
amare cāpi mārtāṇḍe vivasvānabhidhīyate .
prabhayā vivasta iti vivastejo'syāstīti vā vivasvān . ʻvasa ācchādane ..
nade samudre rasike sarasvān parikīrtyate .. 123 ..
govāṅnadībhāratīṣu strīratne ca sarasvatī .
saraḥ sarvataḥ saraṇamasyāstīti sarasvān ..
vainateye vihaṅge ca garutmān samudāhṛtaḥ .. 124 ..
garutaḥ pakṣā asya santīti garutmān ..
śakuntaḥ kīṭabhede syād raktakāke vihaṅgame .
gantuṃ śaknotīti śakuntaḥ . ʻśaklṛ śaktaü .. 57 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.057>  
devūsūryau vivasvantau . devaśabdena devatāmātramucyate .. sarasvantau nadārṇavau . sarasvānityeva prasiddho nadaviśeṣa iti kecit . śoṇādinadamātramityapare . atra pratāpaḥ—
ʻsarasvatī nadībhede govāgdevatayorgiri .
strīratne dhanade puṃsi sarasvān rasike budhau ..
iti . nadībhedaḥ kurukṣetra sarasvatyākhyayaiva prasiddhā . gavi yathā—ʻiḍe rante'dite sarasvati iti (tai. saṃ. 7. 1. 6. 8) . vāgdevatā śāradā . giri vacasi yathā—ʻvyājahāra sarasvatīm iti . strīratnaṃ śreṣṭhā strī . rasikaḥ sahṛdayaḥ . pakṣitārkṣyau garutmantau . pakṣijātīyo yaḥ kaścit . tārkṣyo vainateyaḥ .. śakuntau bhāsapakṣiṇau . bhāso gṛdhrasadṛśaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaḥ . pakṣī vihagamātram .. 57 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.057>  
devasūryau—nadārṇavau . nadī sarasvatī . ʻsarasvatī syāt strīratne nadyāṃ nadyantare gavi iti jayakośaḥ . pakṣitārkṣyau—bhāsapakṣiṇau . bhāso nāma goṣṭhakukkuṭaḥ . ʻnigadyate goṣṭhakukkuṭo bhāsaḵ iti ratnamālā .. 57 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.058cd agnyutpātau dhūmaketū jīmūtau meghaparvatau .. 58 ..

AK.03.03.060cd grahabhede dhvaje ketuḥ pārthive tanaye sutaḥ .. 60 ..

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.060>

AK.03.03.061cd mūrdhābhiṣikto bhūpe'pi ṛtuḥ strīkusume'pi ca .. 61 ..
AK.03.03.062ab viṣṇāvapyajitāvyaktau sūtastvaṣṭari sārathau .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.069>  
mūrdhābhiṣikto bhūpe'pi . paṭṭābhiṣikte rājani kṣatriyamātre prāguktaḥ (pṛ. 484)  mukhyāmātye'pi mūrdhābhiṣikta ucyate . mūrdhāvasikta iti pāṭhe brāhmaṇena kṣatriyastriyāmutpāditaḥ putro'piśabdārthaḥ .. ṛtuḥ strīkusume'pi ca . iyarti niyatakālaṃ prāpnotīti ṛtuḥ . ʻṛ gataü . strīṇāṃ pratimāsaṃ jāyamānaṃ rajaḥpuṣpaṃ strīkusumam . apiśabdād vasantagrīṣmādiriti .. viṣṇāvapyajitā vyaktau . na jīyate kenāpi nābhibhūyata ityajito viṣṇuḥ . apiśabdād aparājitaśca . na vyajyata ikyavyakto viṣṇuḥ

<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.061>

AK.03.03.062cd vyaktaḥ prājñe'pi dṛṣṭāntāvubhe śāstranidarśane .. 62 ..
AK.03.03.063ab kṣattā syāt sārathau dvāḥsthe kṣatriyāyāṃ ca śūdraje .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.062>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.070>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.070>

AK.03.03.072ab paṅktiśchando'pi daśamaṃ syāt prabhāve'pi cāyatiḥ .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.072>

AK.03.03.073ab prakṛtiryoniliṅge ca kaiśikyādyāśca vṛttayaḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.073>  
prajāyāṃ dhātuliṅgādau sahaje paramātmani .. 156 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.073>  
prakṛtiryoniliṅge ca . ghaṭādyupādānaṃ mṛdādikaṃ yoniḥ . yathā bhūtaprakṛtīni śarīrāṇi . liṅgaṃ strīpuṃnapuṃsakamiti . yathā—tṛtīyā prakṛtiḥ . prakriyate'nayā kāryamiti prakṛtiḥ (3. 3. 94) . pradhāne (1, pṛ. 89), rājyāṅgeṣu saptasu (pṛ. 493), svabhāve ca (pṛ. 144) prāguktā . kṛttaddhitapratyayānāṃ prathamabhāgādau tu prātipadikādibhāgāśca prakṛtiśabdenocyante . yathā—ʻprakṛtipratyayayorivānubandhaḵ iti bhāraviḥ (kirā. 13. 19) . ʻdarśapūrṇamāsāviṣṭīnāṃ prakṛtiḵ ityādau prakṛtiśabdaḥ svabhāvavacanaḥ . vikṛtibhūtānāmanvārambhaṇīyānāṃ devatāyāmitikartavyatāyāṃ vā yatkiṃcidvairūpyād vikṛtitvam .. kaiśikyādyāśca vṛttayaḥ . ādyaśabdena—
ʻkaiśikī sātvatī caiva bhāratyārabhaṭī tathā .
catasro vṛttayasteṣāṃ yāsu nāṭyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ..
ityuktānāṃ (nā. śā. 6. 25) grahaṇam . tallakṣaṇāni ca saṃgītasāre kathitāni—
ʻevaṃ nāṭye vidhātavyo nāyakaḥ saparicchadaḥ .
tadvyāpārātmikā vṛttiścaturdhā tatra kaiśikī ..
gītanṛttavilāsādyairmṛduśṛṅgāraceṣṭitaiḥ .
sātvatī kāryasaṃroṣatyāgadhairyadayojjvalaiḥ ..
bhāratī saṃskṛtaprāyo vāgvyāpāro naṭāśrayaḥ .
māyendrajālasaṃgrāmakrodhabhrāntyādiceṣṭitaiḥ ..

iti . ʻstriyāṃ kṛṣiḥ pāśupālyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ ceti vṛttayaḵ ityuktāḥ (pṛ. 554) jīvikāyāmapi . svabhāve yathā—sādhuvṛttiriti . sūtravyākhyāne ca yathā—kāśikāvṛttiḥ, laghuvṛttiriti .. sikatāḥ syurvālukāpi . vālukāśabdena śuṣkanadīmadhyagataḥ sarṣapādapyalpaparimāṇaḥ pāṣāṇaprāyo mṛdviśeṣaḥ ucyate . sā bahuvacanāntena strīliṅgena sikatāśabdenocyate . ʻbahavaśca samāḥ sikatāḵ iti vāmanīyaliṅgānuśāsanokterbahuvacananiyamaḥ (pṛ. 16, ślo. 23) . api ca ʻṣica kṣaraṇe iti sicyante jalairiti vyutpattyā sūtranirdeśāt (5. 2. 104) sikatāśabdaḥ sādhuriti kecidāhuḥ . ʻchandasi niṣṭarkya . . . iti sūtre (3. 1. 123) kaseḥ sikatāśabda iti mahābhāṣyakāraḥ (ma. bhā. pṛ. 87) . apiśabdena sikatāvān deśo'pi sikatāḥ . atra hi ʻsikatāśarkarābhyāṃ cö (5. 2. 104) ityutpannasya matvarthīyasya ʻdeśe lubilacau cö (5. 2. 105) iti lupi sati vyaktivacanayoḥ yuktavadbhāvena strītve bahutve ca sikatā ityeva, ekavacanāntena puṇḍrekṣuvikāraḥ sikatā śarkarocyata ityāhuḥ .. vede śravasi ca śrutiḥ . śravasi karṇe . caśabdena ṣaḍjādisvarāṃśe yathā—ʻpṛthagvibhinnaśrutimaṇḍalaiḥ svaraiḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 10) . śravaṇakriyāyāṃ vārtāyāṃ ca .. 73 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.073>  
prakṛtiryoniliṅge ca . liṅgaṃ tattvaviśeṣaḥ . ʻliṅgaṃ cihne'numāne'pi sāṃkhyoktaprakṛtāvapi iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 25, ślo. 20) . kaiśikyādyaśca vṛttayaḥ . ʻvṛttirvivaraṇe jīvye kaiśikyādiṣu ceṣyate iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 61, ślo. 58) sikatāḥ syurvālukāpi . vālukāvatpradeśe'pi syāt . bahutvaṃ keṣāṃcidasaṃmatam .

AK.03.03.075ab bṛhatī kṣudravārtākī chandobhede mahatyapi .

AK.03.03.076ab vārtaṃ phalgunyaroge ca triṣvapsu ca ghṛtāmṛte .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.076>  
ārogyaphalgunorvārtaṃ napuṃsakamudāhṛtam .

jighartīti ghṛtam . ʻghṛ kṣaraṇadīptyoḵ ..

pathyā dhātrī gulūcī strī nā tu dhanvantarau sure .
na mriyate'nenetyamṛtam ..
kaladhautaṃ rūpyahemnoḥ kaladhautaḥ kaladhvanau .. 167 ..
kalaḥ kālikā dhauto'syeti kaladhautam . ʻdhāvu gatiśuddhyoḵ ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.076>  
vārtaṃ—triṣu . phalguni niḥsāre rūpabhedād napuṃsakatvam . yathā—vārtarahitametat iti . rogarahite tu vācyaliṅgaḥ .. apsu ca ghṛtāmṛte . ghṛtamamṛtaṃ ceti śabdadvayaṃ jale . caśabdād ghṛtaśabda ājye pradīpte ca . yathā—ghṛtapratīkaḥ iti (tai. brā. 1. 2. 1. 11) . amṛtaśabdaḥ pīyūṣādau . tathā ca vyāḍiḥ—
ʻamṛtaṃ vārisurayornirvāṇe cātisundare .
ayācite yajñaśeṣe puṃsi dhanvantarau bhavet ..
iti . abhayāgulūcyāmalakīṣu strīliṅgāḥ prāguktāḥ (pṛ. 250, 264, 248) .. kaladhautaṃ rūpyahemnoḥ . rūpyaṃ rajatam . hema suvarṇam .. nimittaṃ hetulakṣmaṇoḥ . hetuḥ kāraṇam . yathā—vidyānimitto dhanalābhaḥ . lakṣma śubhāśubhāvedakaṃ bhujanetraspandanādikam . ʻnimittaṃ sūcayitvȫ iti . ʻnimittaṃ kāraṇe cihnam ityajayaśca . hetulakṣyayoḥ iti pāṭhe lakṣyaṃ śaravyam . yathā—
ʻnimittādaparāddheṣordhānuṣkasyeva valgitam . (śiśu. 2. 27 b.)
ʻvedhyaṃ lakṣyaṃ śaravyaṃ ca nimittaṃ ca samaṃ viduḥ ..
iti raṅgarājodāhṛtamabhidhānaṃ ca . nitarāṃ medyati sma nimittam . ʻñimidā snehane . ʻsnukramoranātmanepadanimitte (7. 2. 36) iti nirdeśād niṣṭhānatvasyābhāvaḥ .. 76 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.076>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.077>  
śrutaṃ śāstrāvadhṛtayoḥ . śāstraṃ vyākaraṇādi . yathā—bahuśruto vipraḥ . avadhṛtamākarṇitam . yathā—bahudhāśruto'yamartha iti . ʻśru śravaṇe . karmaṇi ktaḥ (3. 2. 102) .. yugaparyāptayoḥ kṛtam . kṛtaṃ yugākhyaṃ prathamam . paryāptamiti bhāve niṣṭhā . paryāptiḥ nivāraṇamityarthaḥ . śeṣe—ʻkṛtaṃ phale kriyāyāṃ ca vācyavadvihite hate iti . phale yathā—ʻtapasaḥ kṛtametaddhi yadīśa tava darśanam iti . kriyāyāṃ yathā—kṛtasya pratikṛtamāsīditi . vihite yathā—kṛtamāhnikamiti . hate yathā—upākṛtaḥ paśuriti . ʻkṛte paśau puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati iti .. atyāhitaṃ—jīvānapekṣi ca . putramaraṇādyaniṣṭaśaṅkājanitaṃ bhayamatyāhitam . jīvānapekṣi karma bhṛgupatanavyāghrayodhanādisāhasam . dadhātirupasargadvayavaśādarthaviśeṣe vartate . śeṣe—ʻatyāhitamupaśliṣṭe iti . ata eva atyādhānamupaśleṣaṇam iti kāśikā ca (1. 4. 75, pṛ. 78) .. 77 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.078ab yukte kṣmādāvṛte bhūtaṃ prāṇyatīte same triṣu .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.078>

same'tīte devalake vṛtte prāpte'bhidheyavat .. 170 ..
bhavatīti bhūtam ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.078>  
yukte—same triṣu . yuktaṃ nyāyam . yukte yathā—ʻvidvāṃso bhūtakāriṇaḵ iti . kṣmādau pṛthivyādipañcake yathā—ʻpañcānāmapi bhūtānām iti (raghu. 4. 11) . ṛte satye yathā—ʻbhūtamapyanupanyastaṃ hīyate vyavahārataḵ iti (yā. smṛ. 2. 2. 19) . atrārthatraye'pi rūpabhedād napuṃsakaliṅgo bhūtaśabdaḥ . prāṇyatīta iti dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ . tatra prāṇiśabdena tadviśeṣaḥ . ʻpiśāco guhyakaḥ siddho bhūtaḵ ityuktāḥ vivakṣitāḥ (1, pṛ. 10) . tatra svabhāvādeva bhūtaśabdaḥ strīliṅgaḥ . yathā—ʻye bhūtāḥ pracaranti divānaktaṃ balimicchanto vitudasya preṣyāḵ (tai. ā. 10. 67. 2) iti . ʻbhūtāni yānīha vasanti tāni iti . atīte niṣpanne yathā—bhūto ghaṭaḥ, bhūtamannam, prabhūtā saṃpat . same sadṛśe yathā—pitṛbhūto jyeṣṭhaḥ, mātṛbhūtā bhaginī, gṛhabhūtaṃ tarutalam ityādi . bhūtaśabdasya samāsottarapadatve satyeva tādṛśārthatvam . na tu vigṛhītasya . ʻsyuruttarapadetvamī nibhasaṃkāśö ityādinā (pṛ. 642) prāgapyayamartho darśitaḥ . subhūticandrastu—prāṇyatīta ityatra prāṇīti prathamāntaṃ chitvā sakalamapi śarīramātraṃ rūpabhedādeva napuṃsakaliṅgabhūtavācyamiti vyācaṣṭa . yathā—ʻtaṃ bhūtānyabhyakrośan iti . ʻyāṃ sadā sarvabhūtāni iti . śeṣe—ʻbhūto devalake puṃsi triṣu prāpte'vakalkite iti . prāpte yathā—kaṃcitprakāraṃ prāpta itthaṃbhūtaḥ . ʻbhū prāptaü iti dhātuśca . ʻbhuvo'vakalkane ityatra avakalkanaṃ cintanamiti dhātuvṛttau . yathā—ʻtvadbhūtāḥ sukhamedhante mama prakṛtayaḥ sadȫ iti . tvadbhūtāḥ tvayā cintitā ityarthaḥ . vikalkana iti pāṭhe vikalkanaṃ vipāpakaraṇam . yathā—ʻtapobhūtātmano yuṣmān iti . tapasā niṣpāpī kṛtātmana ityarthaḥ . anukalkana iti pāṭhe'nukalkanaṃ miśrīkaraṇam . yathā—dadhnā bhūta odana iti . viśvaprakāśe'pi —

AK.03.03.083cd satye sādhau vidyamāne praśaste'bhyarhite ca sat .. 83 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.083>  
āmle ca paruṣe pūte śuktaḥ syād vācyaliṅgakaḥ .. 179 ..
śucyata iti śuktaḥ . ʻ(ī) śucir pūtībhāve ..
mecake dhavale caiva śitiśabdaḥ prakīrtitaḥ .
śīyata iti śitiḥ . ʻśiñ niśāne ..
sat praśaste vidyamāne satyābhyarhitasādhuṣu .. 180 ..
astīti sat . ʻasa bhuvi .. 83 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.083>  
dvau cāmlaparuṣau śuktau . ihāmlaśabdena cirakālaparivāsasaṃjātarasāntara odanaṣāḍavādiramlaviśeṣa ucyate . niṣṭhuro vāgviśeṣaḥ paruṣaḥ . pariharaṇīyatvenāmlasadṛśatvāt paruṣavākye śuktaśabdasyaupacārikatve'pi nirūḍhatvena mukhyatulyatvād nānārthatvenābhidhānam . ata eva svāmī (pṛ. 289)—ʻparuṣe śuktaśabda upacārāt iti . śucyate klinno bhavatīti śuktaḥ . (ī) śucir pūtībhāve . īditvādiḍāgamasyābhāvaḥ .. śitī dhavalamecakau . śinoti svabāhulyena varṇāntaraṃ tanūkarotīti śitiḥ . ʻśiñ niśātane . athavai ʻśo tanūkaraṇe . ʻśāchoranyatarasyām (7. 4. 41) itītvam .. satye sādhau—ca sat . satye yathā—sadbrahma . sādhau‒satputra iti . san ghaṭaḥ, sadākāśam iti vidyamāne . satkarmeti praśaste . abhyarhitaḥ pūjito yathā—satpuruṣaḥ . śeṣe—ʻbhavānyāṃ tu satī strī syānnakṣatre tu napuṃsakam iti . ʻgaganamiva satpathopaśobhi . nagaramiti śeṣaḥ . astīt san . ʻasa bhuvi . śatṛpratyayaḥ . ʻśnasorallopaḵ (6. 4. 111) ityakāralopaḥ .. 83 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.083>  
dvau cāmlaparuṣau—abhyarhite ca sat . satye iti dharmavacanam . dharme napuṃsakameva . ʻsat praśaste vidyamāne triṣu klī satyatārayoḵ iti śaśvataḥ .. 83 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.084>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.085>  
ucchrito vṛddhiyukte ca proddhṛtotpannayorapi .. 182 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.085>

AK.03.03.086ab artho'bhidheyaraivastuprayojananivṛttiṣu .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.086>  
arthaḥ prakāre viṣaye vittakāraṇavastuṣu .
abhidheye ca śabdānāṃ nimitte ca prayojane .. 185 ..
arthyata ityarthaḥ . ʻartha yācñāyām ..
tīrthaṃ śāstrādhvarakṣetropāyopādhyāyamantriṣu .
avatārarṣijuṣṭāmbhonipānastrīrajaḥsu ca .. 186
javena pāpāni tarantyaneneti tīrtham . ʻtṝ plavanataraṇyoḵ .. 86 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.086>  
artho—nivṛttiṣu . abhidheyaḥ śabdapratyāyyaḥ . yathā—śabdārthau kāvyam iti . rāḥ dhanam . yathā—nyāyenārjanamarthānām iti . vastu pramāṇasiddhaṃ svarūpam . yathā—ṣaṭ padārthāḥ, ṣoḍaśa padārthāḥ iti . prayojanamuddeśyam . yathā—odanārthāstaṇḍulāḥ . odanaprayojanā ityarthaḥ . dharmārthā patnī . kimarthaṃ gamanam . ko'rtho'nena sādhyate . ʻekā kriyā dvyarthakarī prasiddhȫ (ma. bhāṣya. 1. 1. 1) . nivṛttivacanasyārthasiddhasya nityasamāsaniyamaḥ . tathā ca śabdaprakāśe bhojarājaḥ—ʻbahuvrīhāvuttaraḥ syādarthaśabdo nivṛttivāk iti . nivṛttivacanasyārthaśabdasya samastatvamuttarapadatvaṃ ca niyatamityarthaḥ . yathā—maśakārtho dhūmaḥ . taskarārtho'rgalabandhaḥ ityādi . arthyate prārthyata ityarthaḥ . athavā ʻṛ gataü . ʻuṣikuṣigārtibhyasthan (u. 2. 4) iti . indriyārthe rūpādayaḥ . arthollekhi jñānamityādau viṣayarūpārthe'pyarthaśabdaḥ . tatra viṣayaprākaṭyasya prayojanatvāt kathaṃcit prayojanapadenaiva saṃgṛhītaḥ .. nipāna—gurau . ʻnipānamāhāvaḵ iti prāguktam (pṛ. 173) . yathā—ʻvedatīrthamidaṃ śāstraṃ sulabhaṃ dharmamicchatām iti . ʻnidānāgamayoḵ iti kecit paṭhanti . tatra nidānaṃ mūlakāraṇam . yathā—jñānatīrthaṃ gurorvacaḥ iti . āgamaḥ śāstram . yathā—tīrthakara iti . maharṣisevitajale—tīrthayātrāprasakto'yamiti . gurau yathā—tīrthāptavidya iti . taratyanena pāpamajñānaṃ veti tīrtham . ʻtṝ plavanataraṇayoḵ . thakpratyayaḥ . ʻṛta iddhātoḵ (7. 1. 100) itītvam . ʻrvorupadhāyāḥ dīrgha ikaḵ (8. 2. 76) iti dīrghaḥ . anyatrāpi—
ʻtīrthaṃ śāstre'dhvare kṣetropāyopādhyāyamantriṣu .
avatārarṣijuṣṭāmbhaḥstrīrajaḥsu ca śabdyate ..
iti . adhvare yajñe . yathā—tīrtheṣvālabhate paśūn iti . upādhyāye yathā—ʻbalavān prakṛtistho'pi vinā tīrthaṃ vinaśyati . mantriṇi yathā—sattīrthanyastabhāra iti . atra mantrigrahaṇaṃ mantrisenāpatipurohitādīnāṃ nītiśāstraprasiddhānāmaṣṭādaśānāmapyupalakṣaṇam . teṣāmuddeśalakṣaṇaviṣaye granthagauravabhayāduparamyate . avatāro jalāvataraṇamārgaḥ . yathā—ʻkṛtatīrthaḥ payasāmivāśayaḵ (kirā. 2. 3) iti . strīrajasi yathā—ʻcaṇḍālīsadṛśī jñeyā satīrthā prathame'hani iti . ʻtīrthaṃ satriṇi pātre cö iti svāmī (pṛ. 290) . satriṇi dīkṣite yathā—ʻnāsti tīrthasya sūtakam iti . pātre yathā—ʻtīrthagāmi karavai vidhānataḵ iti māghakāvye .. 86 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.086>  
artho—nivṛttiṣu . abhidheyaṃ śabdavācyam . rai iti dhanam . vastviti padārthaḥ . prayojanaṃ kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca syāt . ʻkārye hetau prayojanam iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 273, ślo. 8) . dharmārthaṃ dhanam . nivṛttiḥ pravṛttiviparyayaḥ .
maśakārtho dhūmaḥ .. nidāna—gurau . nidānamupāyaḥ . āgamaḥ śāstram . ṛṣijuṣṭajalaṃ pāvanodakam . gururupādhyāyaḥ

AK.03.03.087ab samarthastriṣu śaktisthe saṃbaddhārthe hite'pi ca .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.087>

<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.087>

AK.03.03.095ab mūḍhālpāpaṭunirbhāgyā mandāḥ syurdvau tu śāradau .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.095>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.095>  
mūḍhālpa—mandā syuḥ . mūḍhaḥ prajñāhīnaḥ . yathā—ʻmandaḥ kaviyaśaḥprārthī iti (raghu. 1. 3) . agnimāndyamiti alpe . apaṭuḥ vyādhitaḥ . yathā—mandaṃ cikitsati bhiṣak iti . nirbhāgyo bhāgyahīnaḥ . yathā—nāsti mandasya kāṅkṣitam iti . śeṣe—ʻmando mande mandakārye svairakārībhabhedayoḵ iti . ibhabhedaḥ, ʻbhadro mando mṛgaśceti vijñeyāstrividhā gajāḵ ityuktalakṣaṇaḥ . śanaiścaragraho'pi manda ucyate .. dvau tu —apratibhau . śaradi bhavaḥ śāradaḥ . lakṣaṇayā anyatrāpi . apratibhaḥ prajñārahitaḥ . śeṣe —
ʻśāradaḥ saptaparṇe syāt sarasvatyāṃ tu śāradā .
śāradī gajapippalyāmṛtuvarṣabhave triṣu ..
iti . ṛtubhave varṣabhave ca vācyaliṅga ityarthaḥ .. vidvatsupragalbhau viśāradau . viśiṣṭā śāradā asyeti vidvān . vigataḥ śāradaḥ pratibhārāhityalakṣaṇo doṣo'syeti viśāradaḥ supragalbhaḥ .. 95 ..
iti dāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.095>  
mūḍhālpa—mandāḥ syuḥ . apaṭuśabdena kṣudravacaskarogiṇoreva grahaṇam . ʻmandaṃ . . .mūḍhakṣudravāgrogiṣü iti sajjanaḥ .. dvau tu—apratibhau . apratibho'dhṛṣṭaḥ . vidvatsupragalbhau viśāradau . supragalbhaḥ sudhṛṣṭaḥ .. anuktam—
kuruvindaḥ pumān padmarāgadarpaṇayorapi .
andūstu pādābharaṇapādavandhanayoḥ striyām .
aṣṭāpadastu śarabhe bhavecchākhāmṛge'pi ca .
ardhendurgalahaste syānnakhāṅke'ṅgulimaithune .

AK.03.03.096ab vyāmo vaṭaśca nyagrodhāvutsedhaḥ kāya unnatiḥ .
AK.03.03.096cd paryāhāraśca mārgaśca vivadhau vīvadhau ca tau .. 96 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.096>  
nyagrodho vyāmavaṭayornyagrodhaśca śamītarau .. 205 ..
nyagrodhī vṛṣaparṇyāṃ ca mohanākhyauṣadhe'pi ca .
nyak tiryag ruṇaddhīti nyagrodhaḥ . ʻrudhir āvaraṇe ..
utsedhaḥ syāducchraye'pi kāye ca parikīrtitaḥ .. 206 ..
utsādhayatīti utsedhaḥ . ʻṣidhu gatyām ..
vivadho vartate mārge paryāhāre ca vīvadhaḥ .
paryāhāraḥ taṇḍulādivadhaḥ . vividho vadho gatirjīvanaṃ vātrāstīti vivadhaḥ vīvadhaśca . ʻhana hiṃsāgatyoḵ .. 96 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.096>  
vyāmo vaṭaśca nyagrodhau . vyāmaḥ prāguktalakṣaṇaḥ (1, pṛ. 417) tiryakprasāritabhujayormadhyam . vaṭaḥ taruviśeṣaḥ . nyak tiryak rohatīti nyagrodhaḥ . ʻruha bījajanmani prādurbhāve cö .. utsedhaḥ kāya unnatiḥ . kāyo dehaḥ . unnatiḥ ucchrāyaḥ . ūrdhvaṃ sedhanam utsedhaḥ . ʻṣidhu gatyām .. paryāhāraśca—vīvadhau ca tau . vikretṛbhiḥ deśāntarādāhṛtaṃ vikrayasthānasthaṃ taṇḍulādidravyaṃ paryāhāraḥ . mārgaḥ panthāḥ . tāvubhau pratyekaṃ vivadhavīvadhaśabdābhyāmucyete . vividho vadho gamanamatreti vivadhaḥ . ʻvibhāṣā vivadhavīvadhāt (4. 4. 17) iti nirdeśād vaikalpike dīrghe vīvadhaśca . atra sūtre kāśikākāraḥ—vivadhavīvadhaśabdau pathi paryāhāre ca vartete iti (pṛ. 366) . atra nyāsakāraḥ—parita āhriyata iti paryāhāraḥ taṇḍulādirartha iti (bhāga 1, pṛ. 1033) . aparastvāha—parita āhriyate'neneti paryāhāraśabdena koṭidvayagrathitaśikyadvayayuktaṃ taṇḍulādyāharaṇasādhanaṃ kākoṭikākhyaṃ kāṣṭhaveṇvādikamucyata iti . vividho vadho vahanaduḥkhamatreti vivadhaḥ . nirdeśabalādeva dīrghe vīvadhaśca .. 96 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.096>

vidhurviṣṇau candramasi . vidhati lokāniti vidhuḥ viṣṇuḥ . ʻvidha vidhāne . viśeṣeṇa dhīyate pīyate devairiti vidhuḥ candramāḥ . ʻdheṭ pāne . auṇādika upratyayaḥ .. paricchede bile'vadhiḥ . paricchedo maryādā . bilaṃ chidram . avadhīyate'nena svarūpasyeyattetyavadhiḥ . ʻupasarge ghoḥ kiḵ (3. 3. 92) . ʻavadhistvavadhāne syāt sīmni kāle bile'pi cö iti nānārthasaṃgrahaḥ . avadhānamaikāgryam . kāle yathā—ʻdarśāvadhiṃ cāndramuśanti māsam iti . aikāgryamapyavadhirucyate .. vidhirvidhāne daive'pi . ʻupasarge ghoḥ kiḵ (3. 3. 92) iti bhāvārthe kipratyaye vidhiḥ . vidhānaṃ yāgādyanuṣṭhānam . purākṛtaṃ karma daivam . śeṣe—ʻvidhiḥ prakāre kalpe ca liṅādyarthe prajāpataü iti . yathā—ʻtulya eva vidhistayoḵ iti . ʻeṣa dāvavidhiḥ proktaḵ iti kalpe . liṅādyarthe yathā—ʻvidhivihito'yaṃ pratyayaḵ iti .. praṇidhiḥ prārthane care . prārthanaṃ yācñā . caro'pasarpaḥ . praṇidhānamapi praṇidhiḥ .. buddhavṛddhau paṇḍite'pi . ʻbudha avabodhane iti daivādiko budhyatiraniṭ . budhyate . ktaḥ . apiśabdāt sugate (1, pṛ. 12), budhite ca (2, pṛ. 150) buddhaḥ prāguktaḥ . vṛddhaśabdastu sthavire triliṅgaḥ . śaileye tu napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ (1, pṛ. 288) .. skandhaḥ samudaye'pi ca . adhyāyādisamūhaḥ samudayaḥ . yathā—triskandhaṃ jyotiḥśāstram . dvādaśaskandhaṃ bhāgavatam iti . śeṣe—ʻsamīhāvṛṣayoḥ skandhaḥ sainyarūpādipañcake iti . samīhā icchā . sainye yathā—ʻskandhāvāre dhanyasenāsya rājñaḵ iti . rūpavedanāvijñānasaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ pañcaskandhā iti bauddhāḥ . bhujaśirasi (1, pṛ. 411) prakāṇḍe ca (1, pṛ. 220) prāguktaḥ . skandati gacchatīti skandhaḥ . ʻskandir gatiśoṣaṇayoḵ . pṛṣodarādiḥ .. 99-100 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.101ab deśe nadaviśeṣe'bdhau sindhurnā sariti striyām .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.101>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.101>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.102>

madhu madye—kṣaudre'pi . mādhvīkarūpe madhuviśeṣe, puṣparase makarande, kṣudrābhirmakṣikāviśeṣaiḥ kṛte sāraghe . manyata iti madhu . ʻmana jñāne . ʻphalipāṭinamimanijanām . . .  ityādinā (u. 1. 18) upratyayo dhakārāgamaśca . śeṣe—

astriyāṃ madyabhede syāt klībaṃ saliladugdhayoḥ ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.104>  
brahmabandhuradhikṣepe nirdeśe . brāhmaṇo'pyayaṃ brāhmaṇakarmaṇi na pravartate, kevalaṃ jātimātrayukta eveti . evamādyadhikṣepe tiraskāre prakāśanīye brahmabandhuśabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ . yathā—brahmabandho kimevamāttha iti . nirdiśyata iti nirdeśaḥ . yasya dveṣānnāma na gṛhyate, na tvadhikṣepārtham, tasminnirdeṣṭavye brahmabandhuśabdaḥ . yathā—kiṃ karoti brahmabandhuḥ iti . atra kecidāhuḥ—brāhmaṇajātiyukto'yamityetāvatyeva nirdeṣṭavye brahmabandhuriti vācya iti . apare āhuḥ—kasmiṃścid deśāntarīyatvena prāgajñāte śuśrūṣādinā parijñātabrāhmaṇasaṃbandhe bhṛtyaśiṣyādau nirdeṣṭavye brahmabandhuriti nirdeśa iti . brahmabandhurityatra bahuvrīhau tatpuruṣe vā samāse brahmapratiyogikabandhutvameva prakāśyate, na tu brahmatvamiti adhikṣepāvagatiḥ . yathā—maitrabhāryāputra ityukte maitrajanyo'yaṃ na bhavatīti pratītiḥ .. atha—avaṣṭabdhaḥ . avalambitaḥ ālambitaḥ, gṛhīta iti yāvat . yathā—hastāvaṣṭabdhayaṣṭiḥ iti . avidūre yathā—avaṣṭabdhā senā (kāśikā pṛ. 438) iti . āsannā ityarthaḥ . avaṣṭabhyata ityavaṣṭabdhaḥ . stambhiḥ sautro dhātuḥ pratibandhārthaḥ . karmaṇi ktaḥ (3. 4. 72) . ʻavāccālambanāvidūryayoḵ (8. 3. 68) iti ṣatvam . śeṣe—ʻākrānte cāvaruddhe syādavaṣṭabdhastiraskṛte iti . ākrānte yathā—ʻrathāntaramavaṣṭabdhaṃ tadā tena tarasvinȫ iti . gale vaṭināvaṣṭabdha iti niruddhe . tiraskāre yathā—nigrahāvaṣṭabdho vāvadūkaṃ manyate iti .. prasiddhau khyātabhūṣitau . khyātaḥ prakhyātaḥ . bhūṣito'laṃkṛtaḥ . prasidhyati sarvatra prakhyāto bhavatīti prasiddhaḥ .. 104 .. 
iti dhāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.110>  
śakro—ghanāghanaḥ . ghātuko hiṃsraḥ . mattebho mattagajaḥ . varṣukābdo varṣaṇaśīlo meghaḥ . indrādyarthacatuṣṭayeṣu ghanāghanaśabdaḥ . tathā ca halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 5. 40)—ʻghanāghano ghācukamattadantinornirantare vāsavavarṣukābdayoḵ iti . yathā—ghanāghane nabhasi bhānti nārkatviṣaḥ iti . svāmī tu—ghātukaścāsau mattebhaśceti karmadhārayamuktvā vyākhyat . hantīti ghanāghanaḥ . ʻcaricalipativadīnāṃ dvitvamacyāk cābhyāsasyö (vā. 6. 1. 12) ityanuvṛttau ʻhantarghatvaṃ ca  (vā. 6. 1. 12) iti dhātordvirvacanamabhyāsasyāgāgamaśca, hakārasya ca ghatvaṃ ca .. abhimāno—hiṃsayoḥ . dhanena kulena vidyayā vā matsadṛśaḥ ko'pi nāstīti buddhirarthādidarpaḥ . atra jñānaśabdena atasmiṃstaditi jñānaviśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ . yathā—śuktikāśakale rajatābhimānaḥ iti . praṇayaḥ prārthanā . parāpadravakaraṇaṃ hiṃsā . ʻmana jñāne ʻmana avabodhane ʻmāna pūjāyām . ebhyo dhātubhyo yathātathaṃ bhāve ghañi (3. 3. 18) abhimānaḥ . ʻmīñ hiṃsāyām ityasmāddhātoḥ lyuṭi (3. 3. 115) ʻmīnāti minoti . . . (6. 1. 50) ityātve mānaśabdo hiṃsāvacanaḥ . ko māna iti mahābhāṣyaprayogadarśanāt lyuḍantasyāpi puṃliṅgatvopapattiḥ .. 110 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.110>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.111>  
meghe mūrtiguṇe mūrte sāndre vistāradārḍhyayoḥ .. 234 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.111>  
ghano meghe—nirantare . mūrtiguṇe kāṭhinyaguṇe . rūpabhedāt puṃliṅgaḥ . mūrte kāṭhinyayukte nibiḍāvayavadravyādau vācyaliṅgaḥ . hanyate'neneti ghanaḥ . ʻmūrtau ghanaḵ (3. 3. 77) iti nipātanāt sādhuḥ . atra sūtre ʻmūrtiḥ kāṭhinyam iti yadyapi vṛttikāreṇoktaṃ (kāśikā, pṛ. 219) tathāpi meghādāvapi ghanaśabdasya prāyikaprayogadarśanād upamānena sādhutvaṃ samarthanīyam . ghana iti yogavibhāgāśrayaṇena sādhutvamapītyapare . ata eva dharmaśabdena dharmī ca sūcita iti vṛttāvuktam (kāśikā pṛ. 219) . śeṣe—ʻghanaṃ syāt kāṃsyatālādau puṃsi mudgaramustayoḵ iti .. inaḥ sūrye prabhau . prabhuśabdena rājā, patiśca vivakṣitaḥ . tathā ca viśvaprakāśe (pṛ. 85, ślo. 1)— ʻinaḥ sūrye nṛpe patyaü iti . eti gacchatīti inaḥ . ʻiṇ gataü . auṇādiko nakpratyayaḥ .. rājā—nṛpe . kṣatriye tadvarṇamātre . śeṣe—ʻrājā kṣayāmaye śakre patimātradrubhedayoḵ iti . drubhedaḥ āragvadhākhyaḥ (1, pṛ. 230) . rabhaso'pi—ʻprabhau bhūmipatau rājā kṣatriye rajanīpataü iti .. 111 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.112ab vāṇinyau nartakīdūtyau sravantyāmapi vāhinī .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.112>  
mattāvidagdhādūtīṣu nartakyāṃ vāṇinī matā .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.112>  
vāṇinyau nartakīdūtyau . vaṇati śabdāyata iti vāṇinī . kecidatra dvitīyākṣaraṃ dantyavargapañcamaṃ paṭhanti . tathā ca śeṣe—ʻmattāvidagdhe vāṇinyau vāṇinī vāninī same iti . vāninīśabdo'pi vāṇinīśabdenārthato liṅgataśca samāna ityarthaḥ .. sravantyāmapi vāhinī . sravantī nadī . śeṣe—ʻvāhinyau sainyatadbhede iti . vahate vāhayatīti vā vāhinī . sainyamātre (1, pṛ. 528) tadviśeṣe ca (pṛ. 530) prāguktaḥ .. hrādinyau vajrataḍitau . vajraṃ kuliśam . hrāda ārāvo'syā astīti hrādinī .. vandāyāmapi kāminī . vakṣaprarūḍho vijātīyapraroho vandā . kāmyata iti kāmaḥ ārogyādijanitasaukhyam . so'syā astīti kāminī . apiśabdena strīviśeṣaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 363) .. atra pratāpaḥ—ʻśyāmā pārāvatī strīṣu cakravākyāṃ ca kāminī iti . śyāmā priyaṅguḥ .. 112 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.114-115>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.114-15>  
vedastattvaṃ—prajāpatiḥ . vede yathā—brahmayajña iti . tattvaṃ paramātmā . yathā—ʻsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmö (chā. u. 3. 14. 1) . tapasi yathā—ʻtapo brahmeti (tai. u. 3. 2. 10) . asminnarthatraye rūpabhedād napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . vipre vedhasi ca puṃliṅgaḥ . bṛṃhati vardhata iti brahma . ʻbṛṃhi vṛddhaü . ʻbṛṃherno'ccö (u. 4. 148) iti manin, nakārasyākāraśca . śeṣe—ʻbrahmā candrārkayoryoge puṃsi syādṛtvigantare iti . candrasūryayoryogo viṣkambhādiṣu pañcaviṃśaḥ . ʻbrahmā hotādhvaryuragnīt (tai. brā. 3. 3. 88) ityuktaṛtvigviśeṣaḥ .. utsāhane—gandhanam . utsāhanamutsāhotpādanam . hiṃsāyai iti caturthyantaṃ padaṃ pūrvottarābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate . ataśca hiṃsārthamarthadānena vacasā protsāhanena, hiṃsārthaṃ hastaceṣṭanādisūcane'pītyuktaṃ bhavati . tathā ca śeṣe—ʻhiṃsārthasūcane hiṃsotsāhane cāpi gandhanam iti . gandhyate'rdyate'neneti gandhanam . ʻgandha ardane . ardanaṃ hiṃseti dhātuvṛttau . karaṇe lyuṭ (3. 3. 117) . athavā gandhavantaṃ karotīti ṇic . matupo luki lyuṭi gandhanam . yucpratyaye strīliṅgo gandhanāśabda eṣvartheṣu vartata ityanusaṃdheyam . kecittu hiṃsāyāmiti saptamyantaṃ paṭhitvā gandhanaśabdasya hiṃsārūpamapyarthamāhuḥ .. ātañcanaṃ—āpyāyanārthakam . śṛtaśīte payasi dadhiniṣpādanāya svalpamāvāpyatakrāderavasecanaṃ pratīvāpaḥ . yathā—ʻagnihotroccheṣaṇamātañcanārthaṃ nidadhāti iti prayogaḥ (āpa. śrau. 1. 11. 1) . drutasya svarṇāderdravyāntareṇāvacūrṇanaṃ pratīvāpa iti kecit . avacūrṇanaṃ rūpāntarāpādanam . javanaṃ vegaḥ . kṣīṇasya pūraṇamāpyāyanam . ātañcyate saṃkucyate payo'nenetyātañcanam . ʻtañcu gataü iti dhātuḥ .. 114-5 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.114-15>  
vedastattvaṃ—hiṃsāyai sūcane cāpi gandhanam . hiṃsāyai iti sūcanaviśeṣaṇam . ʻprakāśotsāhayorhiṃsāsūcane cāpi gandhanam iti rabhasakośaḥ . hiṃsāyām iti pāṭhe paryāyapadam . ʻgandhanaṃ sūcanotsāhahiṃsaneṣu prakāśane iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 91, ślo. 74) .. ātañcanaṃ—āpyāyanārthakam . pratīvāpo nikṣepaṇam . javanaṃ vegaḥ . āpyāyanaṃ prāṇanam .. 114-5 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

vyañjanaṃ—avayaveṣvapi . lāñchanaṃ kapidhvajādikam . puraṣamukhaprabhavaṃ romavṛndaṃ śmaśru . niṣṭhānaṃ temanam . avayavaḥ śiśnopasthagudādiḥ . vyajyate'neneti vyañjanam . ʻañjū vyaktimrakṣaṇakāntigatiṣü . karaṇe karmaṇi ca lyuṭa . apiśabdāt kakārādihakārāntānāṃ halāṃ ca grahaṇam . tathā ca śeṣe—ʻvyañjanaṃ kādihānte syāt iti . syāt kaulīnaṃ—pakṣiṇām . ninditaḥ puruṣo namitamukhatvena kau bhūmau līna iva bhavatīti kulīna ucyate . tasyedam iti kṛtvā kaulīnam (5. 1. 130) . lokavādaḥ janavādaḥ . meṣavṛṣādipaśūnāṃ sarpāṇāṃ lavakādipakṣiṇāṃ yad yuddhaṃ tadapi kaulīnamucyate . tathā ca pratāpaḥ—

AK.03.03.118cd vyutthānaṃ pratirodhe ca virodhācaraṇe'pi ca .. 118 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.118>  
udyame pauruṣe tantre malavege raṇe mṛdhi .
upaviṣṭordhvabhāge syādutthānaṃ pustake'ṅgane .. 250 ..
uttiṣṭhantyatretyutthānam . ʻṣṭhā gatinivṛttaü ..
svairasya karaṇe caiva virodhācaraṇe tathā .
samādhestu nivṛttau ca vyutthānaṃ parikīrtitam .. 251 ..
vyuttiṣṭhantyatreti vyutthānam .. 118 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.118>  
utthānaṃ—udgame'pi ca . ūrdhvavistṛtadoḥpāṇipuruṣapramāṇamatra pauruṣaśabdena vivakṣitam . yathā—ʻsaptotthānamidaṃ ramyamāptarakṣiśatāvṛtam iti kṣemendraḥ . tantraṃ sainyam . yathā—utthānasaṃpanno rājā iti . saṃniviṣṭasyopaviṣṭasya śayitasya vā udgamanamūrdhvībhāvaḥ . śeṣe—ʻmalotsarjana utthānaṃ harṣodyogasamāptiṣü iti . harṣe yathā—sūtthānaṃ te mukham . udyoge yathā—anutthāne vinaśyati . samāptau yathā—ʻyadā śataṃ sahasraṃ kurvantyathaikamutthānam (tai. saṃ. 7. 2. 1. 4) iti . utpūrvāt tiṣṭhateḥ karaṇe bhāve ca lyuṭi (3. 3. 117, 115) ʻudaḥ sthāstambhoḥ pūrvasyö (8. 4. 61) iti sakāralope utthānam .. vyutthānaṃ—ācaraṇe'pi ca . pratirodhaḥ āskandanam . virodhācaraṇaṃ pratikūlācaraṇam . vigatamutthānaṃ pracāro'treti vyutthānam . apiśabdāt samādhinivṛttāvapi . yathā—vyutthānadaśeti .. 118 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.118>  
utthānaṃ—udgame'pi ca . udyame samare harṣe'ṅgaṇe'pyutthānamiti subhūtiṭīkā . tantraṃ sainyam .. vyutthānaṃ—ācaraṇe'pi ca . svatantratāyāmapi syāt . ʻsvatantratā ca vyutthānam iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 30, ślo. 812) . ʻsvātantryānuṣṭhānaṃ vyutthānaṃ vilasitaṃ lalitam iti ratnakośaḥ .. 118 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.119ab māraṇe mṛtasaṃskāre gatau dravyopapādane .
AK.03.03.119cd nirvartanopakaraṇānuvrajyāsu ca sādhanam .. 119 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.119>  
siddhau liṅge sainyagatyorvadhe dravyopapādane .
nirvartane ca gamane kārake mṛtasaṃskṛte .. 252 ..
śiśnopāyopaharaṇeṣūpakāre ca sādhanam .
upakāra upakaraṇam . sādhyate'neneti sādhanam . ʻsādha saṃsiddhaü .. 119 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.119>  
māraṇe—arthadāpane—sādhanam . māraṇe yathā—kṛṣṇena sādhitaḥ kaṃsaḥ iti . mṛtasaṃskāro'gnipradānādiḥ . yathā—kṛtasādhanāḥ pitaraḥ iti . kaścit amṛtasaṃskāra ityakārapraśleṣeṇa chedanaṃ kṛtvā amṛtasya vatsanābhāderviṣasya nirviṣīkaraṇarūpasaṃskāra iti vyācaṣṭa . yathā—sādhitaṃ viṣamiti . gatau yathā—ʻsādhayāmyahamavighnamastu te iti (raghu. 11. 91) . dravye dhanadhānyādau yathā—sādhanaṃ saṃpattiriti . arthasyāghamarṇena gṛhītasya dāpanaṃ punarādāpanam . yathā—ʻprapannaṃ sādhayannartham iti (yā. smṛ. 2. 3. 40) . nirvartanaṃ kāryasya niṣpādanam . yathā—paṭaṃ sādhayati kuvinda iti . ghaṭaṃ sādhayati kulāla ityādi . subodhinīkārastu nivartanamiti repharahitaṃ paṭhitvā kāryānnivartanamiti vyācaṣṭa . upakaraṇamupāyaḥ . yathā—kiṃ sādhanaṃ dhanaprāptau iti . gurvādīnanusṛtya gamanam anuvrajyā . yathā—śiṣyasādhanayukta iti . sādhyate'neneti sādhanam . karaṇe bhāve lyuṭ (3. 3. 117, 115) śeṣe—ʻsādhanaṃ karaṇe liṅgasainyayormehane'pi cö iti . karaṇaṃ kārakaviśeṣaḥ . ʻsādhakatamaṃ karaṇam (1. 4. 42) ityuktarūpaḥ . liṅgamanumāpakam . yathā—anityatvasādhanaṃ kṛtakatvamiti . sainye yathā—prabhūtasādhano yāyāt iti . mehane yathā kāvyaprakāśikāyām (7. 151) aślīlodāharaṇe—ʻsādhanaṃ sumahad yasyö iti .. 119 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.119>  
māraṇe—sādhanam . mṛtasaṃskāro'gnidānam . dravyaṃ dhanam . arthadāpanaṃ bhūmihiraṇyādīnāṃ nyāsaḥ . upakaraṇamupāyaḥ .
ʻsādhanaṃ nirvṛtau meḍhre sainye siddhau pade gatau .

AK.03.03.120ab niryātanaṃ vairaśuddhau dāne nyāsārpaṇe'pi ca .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.120>  
niryātanaṃ vitaraṇe nyāsapratyarpaṇe tathā .. 253 ..
ṛṇavairamalādīnāṃ śodhane cāpi kathyate .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.120>  
niryātanaṃ—arpaṇe'pi ca . vairaśuddhiḥ pratīkāraḥ . iha dānaśabdena pratiśrutārthasya pradānaṃ vivakṣitam . upanidhidravyasyānudghāṭitamudrasya svāmihaste dānaṃ nyāsārpaṇam . niryātyate niṣkāsyate vairaṃ svahastagataṃ dhanamaneneti niryātanam . ʻyata nikāropaskarayoḵ, ṇici karaṇe lyuṭ (3. 3. 117) .. vyasanaṃ—kāmajakopaje . vipad duḥkham . yathā—ʻcirāya mitravyasanī sudamo damaghoṣajaḵ iti māghaḥ (śiśu. 2. 60) . bhraṃśaḥ skhālityam . yathā—āmnāye vyasanaṃ prāpta iti . kāmajānāṃ kopajānāṃ ca doṣāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ manunā prapañcitam . yathā—(ma. smṛ. 7. 47-8)
ʻmṛgayākṣo divā svāpaḥ parīvādaḥ striyo madaḥ .
tauryatrikaṃ vṛthā tyāgaḥ kāmajo daśako gaṇaḥ ..
paiśunyaṃ sāhasaṃ droha īrṣyāsūyārthadūṣaṇam .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.121>

AK.03.03.122ab akāryaguhye kaupīnaṃ maithunaṃ saṃgatau rate .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.122>

AK.03.03.125ab ācchādanaṃ saṃpidhānamapavāraṇamityubhe .

talpaṃ—astriyām . ʻśākhāyāṃ pallave stambe vistāre viṭapo'striyām iti rabhasaḥ .. prāptarūpa—manojñayoḥ . abhirūpamapatyam . abhirūpā kanyā .. kūrmī—kacchapī . vīṇābhedaḥ sarasvatīkaravīṇā . ʻmahatī nāradasya syāt sarasvatyāstu kacchapī iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 145, ślo. 119) .. anuktam—

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.133>  
anekārthaphakārāntaśabdānāṃ prācuryeṇa prayogābhāvāt tadatikrameṇa bāntānāha—
antarābhava—divyagāyane . atra subodhinīkāraḥ—dyāvāpṛthivyorantarābhavasattvena mahāparvataśikharapradeśeṣu vartamāne devayoniviśeṣe ghoṭakamātre tridivaukasāṃ gāyane ca gandharvaśabdo vartata iti .. kamburnā valaye śaṅkhe . valaye karabhūṣaṇe . śaṅkhe tu napuṃsakatvamapi prāguktam (1. pṛ. 170) . dvijihvau sarpasūcakau . sūcakaḥ karṇejapaḥ . jihvāśabdo'tra lakṣaṇayā vacane vartate . atra vacanasya ca dvaividhyaṃ samakṣaparokṣayorekarūpatvābhāvādavaseyam .. pūrvo—pūrvajān . atra prākcchabdaḥ pūrveṣu digdeśakāleṣu tatratyasaṃbandhipadārtheṣu ca vartate viśeṣyanighnaśca . yathā—pūrvā dik . pūrvaṃ dikcakram . pūrvā saṃdhyā . pūrvo deśaḥ . pūrvā bhūmiḥ . pūrvamupavartanam . pūrvaḥ samudraḥ . pūrvaṃ dinam . pūrvā rātriḥ . pūrvā dhanasaṃpattiḥ . pūrvaṃ dhanam ityādi yathāsaṃbhavamudāhāryam . yadā tu pūrvajān pitṛpitāmahādīn pūrātanān vā abhidhatte, tadā pūrvaśabdasya puṃliṅgatvabahuvacanāntatvayorniyamaḥ . yathā—matpūrvaiḥ pālito deśa iti . pūrātaneṣu yathā—ʻpūrve pūrvebhyo vaca etadūcuḵ (tai. brā. 3. 12. 9. 2) iti . vabayorabhedād gandharvādiśabdānāmatra pāṭhaḥ kṛtaḥ . kaiścid vyākhyātṛbhiḥ ʻantarābhavö ityādikaḥ sārdhaśloko'pi na vyākhyātaḥ .. 133 ..
iti bāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.133>  
antarābhava—divyagāyane . antarābhavasattvaḥ maraṇajanmanormadhyāvasthāpannajantuḥ . aśvaḥ hayaḥ . divyagāyanaḥ tumburuprabhṛtiḥ . gāyanamātre ca syāt . ʻantarābhavasattve syād gandharvo gāyane haye iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 241, ślo. 24) .. kamburnā valaye śaṅkhe . śaṅkhe puṃnapuṃsakaḥ .. dvijihvau—pūrvajān . prākcchabdo digdeśa kālavacanaḥ . pūrvā dik . pūrvaṃ sthānam . pūrvo divasaḥ . pūrvajaśabdo vaṃśayavacanaḥ . ʻpūrvaiḥ kilāyaṃ parivardhito naḵ iti raghuvaṃśaḥ (13. 3) .. anuktam—
bimbaṃ bimbīphale tulye pratimāpratibimbayoḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.134-35>  
ghaṭe gajaśiraḥpiṇḍe rāśau vārāṅganāpatau .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.137>  
kṣatriye'pi ca nābhirnā . nā puṃliṅga ityarthaḥ . nabhate hinastīti nābhiḥ . ʻṇabha hiṃsāyām . śeṣe pratāpe ca—
ʻcakrāntaścakravartinoḥ .
nābhiḥ pradhāne kastūrīmade prāṇyaṅgake'pi ca ..
cakrāntaḥ cakrayormadhyaṃ piṇḍikākhyam . rabhaso'pi—

iti . ʻsamucchṛsatpaṅkajakośakomalairupāhitaśrīṇyupanīvi nābhibhiḵ iti bhāravikāvye puṃliṅgaprayogaḥ (kirā. 8. 24) .. surabhirgavi ca striyām . gavi kāmadhenvāmityarthaḥ . ʻsutāṃ tadīyāṃ surabheḵ iti raghuvaṃśe (2. 82) . gomātre iti kecit . suṣṭhu rabhata iti surabhiḥ . ʻrabha rābhasye . rābhasyaṃ kāryopakrama iti dhātuvṛttau . śeṣe—
ʻsurabhirnā jātiphale vasante campakadrume .
śallakyāṃ strī mātṛbhede manojñe tu viśeṣyavat ..
iti . ʻsurabhirghrāṇatarpaṇaḵ iti gatam (1, pṛ. 98) .. sabhā saṃsadi samyeṣu . saha bhāntyatreti vyutpattyā sabhā saṃsat brāhmaṇasamāveśanamityarthaḥ . tadvartitvād upacāreṇa sāmājikeṣvapi sabhāśabdaḥ . ekasminneva puruṣe sabhāśabdo na pravartata iti jñāpayituṃ samyeṣviti bahuvacanamupāttam . śeṣe—ʻsabhā durodare'pi syāt samūhe bhāvite triṣü iti . bhayā kāntyā nakṣatrairvā yukte vācyaliṅgaḥ . triṣvadhyakṣe'pi vallabhaḥ . adhyakṣo'tra goṣṭhādhyakṣa eveti subodhinīkāraḥ . ʻvalla prītau saṃcaraṇe cö . vallata iti vallabhaḥ . vallatiḥ sautro dhātuḥ . ʻrāsivallibhyāṃ cö ityabhac pratyayaḥ (u. 3. 125) . śeṣe—ʻvallabhastu pradhānāśve kulīnaścāpi vallabhaḵ iti . yathā—ʻstokena nākramata vallabhapālamuccaiḵ (śiśu. 5. 56) iti, ʻnīto vallabhapālakena ca nijāmuccaiḥśravo mandurām iti ca māghakāvye . ʻdayitaṃ vallabhaṃ priyam iti prāguktam (2, pṛ. 75) .. 137 ..
iti bhāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.139>  
dharmāḥ—somapāḥ . puṇyam iṣṭāpūrtajanyaḥ puruṣaguṇaḥ . tatra dharmaśabdaḥ puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 86) . yamo dharmarājaḥ . tatra nāmaikadeśanyāyena dharmaśabdaḥ . nyāyo vyavahāranirṇayastarkaḥ . yathā—dharmādhikaraṇaṃ prāpta iti . svabhāvaḥ padārthasya sahajo dharmaḥ . yathā—vahneruṣṇatvam, jalasya śaityamiti . ācāro deśakulādyācāraḥ . yathā—deśadharmaḥ, kuladharma iti . somapaḥ somapīthi . yathā—dharmo'yaṃ kulabhūṣaṇamiti . dhriyata iti dharmaḥ . ʻdhṛñ dhāraṇe . manpratyayaḥ (u. 1. 145) . śeṣe—ʻahiṃsāyāṃ rājabhede dharmaścāpopamānayoḵ iti . rājabhede—ikṣvākuvaṃśayo rājaviśeṣaḥ . yathā—ʻprājyaṃ dharmaḥ pālayāmāsa rājyam iti . cāpe yathā—ʻayaṃ rāmo naivaṃ sa hi janakadharma dalitavān iti . upamāne yathā—kṣatradharmo'yaṃ brāhmaṇa iti . kecittu—somaḥ pīyate'treti vyutpattyā somapaśabdena ṛturucyata ityāhuḥ . tathā ca viśvaprakāśikā—(pṛ. 111, ślo. 17)
ʻdharmaḥ puṇye yame nyāye svabhāvācārayoḥ kratau .
upamāyāmahiṃsāyāṃ dhārmike ca nigadyate ..
iti . tathā hi—yo yāgamanutiṣṭhati taṃ dhārmikamāhurjanāḥ . somapaḥ somapīthīti kathyata iti .. upāya—upakramaḥ . ārabhyata ityārambhaḥ . ārabhyamāṇaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ . upāyajñānapūrvako ya ārambhaḥ sa puṃliṅgenopakramaśabdenocyate . yathā—brahmaṇa upakramo jagaditi . yatra hi upakramaśabdāntaḥ tatpuruṣo bhavati, tatra tasya napuṃsakatvaṃ vakṣyate . mantripurohitādīnāṃ parīkṣaṇamupadheti kṣatriyavarge'bhihitam (1, pṛ. 486) . tatrāpyupakramaśabdaḥ . upakramyata ityupakramaḥ . śeṣe—ʻupakramastu prārambhe cikitsāyāṃ ca vikrame iti . prārambhe yathā—bhojanasyopakramaḥ . cikitsāyāṃ yathā—anupakramo rogaḥ . vikrame yathā—aho kaṇṭhīravasyopari jambukasyopakrama iti .. 139 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.140>  
vaṇikpathaḥ—nigamaḥ . vaṇikpatho vāṇijyam . haṭṭamārgo vā . puraṃ nagaram . veda āmnāyaḥ . niyataṃ gamyate'trepsitārtho'neneti vā nigamaḥ . niyataṃ gacchatyatreti vā nigamaḥ . ʻgocarasaṃcaravahavrajavyajāpaṇanigamāścö (3. 3. 119) ityadhikaraṇe ghañanto nipātitaḥ . nagaro—naigamo dvau . nigamaśabdasya nagaraṃ vaṇikpathaśca ityarthadvayaṃ prāguktam (1, pṛ. 165, pūrvārdhe ca) . tadubhayasaṃbandhād naigamaśabdasya nagarasaṃbandhī vaṇik cetyarthadvayamapi . atra subodhinīkāraḥ—ʻnaigamaśabdaḥ kevalayogamātrapravṛtto na bhavati . kiṃtu nāgare vaṇikpathe ca rūḍhaḵ . ʻrūḍhiryogamapaharati iti nyāyād brāhmaṇasyāmnāyarūpanigamasaṃbandhe satyapi naigamaśabdābhidheyatvanivṛttyarthaṃ dvāvityuktam iti . svāmī cāha (pṛ. 303)—ʻbrāhmaṇasya naigamatvaniṣedhārthaṃ dvāvityuktam iti . vijñāneśvarastu—ʻśreṇinaigamapāṣaṇḍigaṇānāmapyayaṃ vidhiḵ iti yājñavalkyavyākhyānāvasare, ʻye vedasyāptapraṇītatvena prāmāṇyamicchanti pāśupatādayaste naigamāḵ iti vyācaṣṭa (yā. smṛ. 2. 15. 192) .. bale rāmo—triṣu . ramate krīḍatīti rāmaḥ . balabhadra ityarthaḥ . ʻramu krīḍāyām . ʻjvalitikasantebhyo ṇaḵ (3. 1. 140) . atra rūpabhedāt puṃliṅgaḥ . ramante'smin ityadhikaraṇārthe ghañi rāmaḥ (3. 3. 12) . kṛṣṇavarṇe sundare dhavalavarṇe cāyaṃ vācyaliṅgaḥ . tathāca—
ʻrāmaḥ paśuviśeṣe ca jāmadagnye halāyudhe .
rāghave cāsitaśvetamanojñeṣu tu vācyavat ..
rāmāṅganāhiṅgulinyo rāmaṃ vāstukakuṣṭhayoḥ ..
iti (vi. pra. pṛ. 111, ślo. 21-2) . paśuviśeṣe ʻgandharvaḥ śarabho rāmaḵ iti prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 334) . hiṅgulini ʻdurlabho hiṅgulī rāṣṭrī nākulī ca mahauṣadhiḵ iti . dravyati kuṣṭhaṃ sāribhākhyo gandhadravyaviśeṣaḥ .. 140 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.3.144>  
sūkṣmamadhyātmamapi . adhyātmamiti vibhaktyarthe'vyayībhāvaḥ . paramātmani sūkṣmaśabdo napuṃsakaliṅgo vartata ityarthaḥ . durjñānatvenāṇuparimāṇadravyasādṛśyāt sūkṣmam . ʻaṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān iti śruteḥ (kaṭha. 2. 20) . apiśabdena svalpe'pi sūkṣmaśabdo vācyaliṅgaḥ . ādye pradhāne prathamastriṣu . ādye yathā—ʻagniṣṭomaḥ prathamo yajñaḵ iti . pradhāne śreṣṭhe yathā—dātṛṇāṃ prathama iti . prathate tasmādanyaditarad dvitīyādikaṃ svaguṇabhūtaṃ veti prathamaḥ . ʻpratha prakhyāne . prathamaśabdaprabhṛtayo vakṣyamāṇā makārāntāstriṣu vācyaliṅgā ityarthaḥ . vāmau valgupratīpau dvau . valguḥ manoharaḥ . yathā—vāmalocanā . pratīpaḥ pratikūlaḥ . yathā—ʻvidhau vāmārambhe vahati viphaladhiyaḥ pauruṣabharāḵ iti . vamati prakaṭayati svaguṇamiti vāmaḥ . ʻṭuvamu udgiraṇe . ʻjvalitikasantebhyo ṇaḵ (3. 1. 140) iti ṇapratyaye ʻnodāttopadeśasya māntasyānācameḵ (7. 3. 34) ʻanācamikamivamīnāmiti vaktavyam iti vṛddhiḥ śeṣe—
ʻvāmaḥ savye triṣu smṛtaḥ .
puṃsi kāme hare klībe draviṇe strī tu yoṣiti .
vāmī sṛgālībaḍavārāsabhīkarabhīṣu ca ..
iti . hare yathā—ʻvāmadevo mahādevaḵ (1, pṛ. 23) . draviṇe yathā—ʻvāmamasmabhyaṃ sā vīḥ, vāmabhājaḥ syāmö iti . yoṣinmātre ṭābantaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 362) . sṛgālyādiṣu ṅībantaḥ yathā—ʻathoṣṭravāmīśatavāhitārtham (raghu. 5. 32) iti .. adhamau nyūnakutsitau . nyūno'samagraḥ . yathā—adhamapakṣaḥ . kutsitaḥ garhitaḥ . yathā—brāhmaṇādhamaḥ, rājāghamaḥ iti . [ʻadho'vasorlopaścö (sara. kaṇṭhā. 4. 3. 120)] ʻavo'dhasorlopaśca iti vaktavyam (vā. 4. 3. 8) . adhaḥśabdād mapratyayaḥ sakāralopaśca . śeṣe—adhaḥstho'pyadhamo'dhmāne iti . adhobhāgasthito'pyadhamaḥ . dhamatīti dhamaḥ . ʻpāghrādhmāgheṭdṛśaḥ śaḵ (3. 1. 137) . tato'nyo'dhamaḥ . adhmāno dhmānarahita ityarthaḥ .. jīrṇa ca—dvayam . upabhogena kālavaśena vā gatasāraṃ jīrṇam . yathā—yātayāmāni mālyāni iti . tathā—ʻvayamapi śithilāṅgā yātayāmaṃ kalatram iti . darbhāḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ mantraḥ ityādi karmāntareṣu viniyuktānāmapi darbhādīnāmanyatrāpi karmaṇi viniyogo'stītyarthaḥ . yāgādau viniyuktaṃ paribhuktam . yathā—ʻyātayāmānyanyāni havīṃṣyayātayāmamājyam iti yāmaśabdena praharavācinā kālamātraṃ lakṣyate . karmāntareṣūpayuktasyāpyājyasya puroḍāśādivad yātayāmatvopādhikaniṣedho nāstītyarthaḥ . atra paribhuktaṃ bhuktojjhitamiti sarvānandaḥ (ṭī. saṃ. pṛ. 121) . yāto yāmaḥ kālo'syeti yātayāmam .. 144 .. 
iti māntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.144>  
sūkṣmamadhyātmamapi . ʻsūkṣmaṃ syāt kaitave'dhyātme'pyaṇau sūkṣmo'lpake'nyavat iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 111, ślo. 19) .. ādau pradhāne—pratīpau dvau . dvāviti niyamena savyādyarthe triṣvityadhikṛtaliṅgaṃ na bhavati .. adhamau—yātayāmamidaṃ dvayam . paribhuktamiti bhuktojjhitam . ʻparibhuktojjhite jīrṇe yātayāmaṃ triliṅgakam iti rabhasaḥ . anuktam—
daṇḍayāmastu divase kṛtānte kumbhasaṃbhave .
talimaṃ baddhabhūmau syāt talpe caiva vitānake ..
kacchape jalagulmaḥ syādāvarte salilasya ca .
dhyāmaśca dhyāmalaśca dvau śyāmale ca malīmase ..
tokmaṃ karṇamale klībaṃ harite syāt triliṅgakam .
vidrumaḥ pallave'pi syād himaṃ syāccandane'pi ca .
gardabhyāmapi vāmī syāt saumye'pyanupamo bhavet .
niyamo yantraṇāśliṣṭaniścayaprabhṛtiṣvapi .
pañcamau bhekahṛdyau ca saṃbhramau vibhramāvapi .. 144 ..
iti māntavargaḥ </Amarapadaparijata>

turaṃgagaruḍau tārkṣyau . tṛkṣasyāpatyaṃ pumān tārkṣyaḥ garuḍaḥ . vegena tārkṣyasādṛśyād aśvo'pi tārkṣyaḥ . śeṣe—ʻtārkṣyo'nūrāvaśvakarṇe rathe naptu rasāñjane iti . anūruḥ sūryasārathiḥ . aśvakarṇo vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . rathe ca puṃliṅgaḥ . tathā ca—ʻāruhya tārkṣyaṃ nabhasīva bhūtale iti māghakāvye rathe prayogaḥ (śiśu. 12. 2) . rasāñjane tu nap napuṃsakāliṅga ityarthaḥ .. nilayāpacayau kṣayau . nilayo gṛham . apacayo hāniḥ . ʻkṣi nivāsagatyoḵ . ʻkṣi kṣaye . ābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ krameṇādhikaraṇe bhāve ca erac (3. 3. 56) . śeṣe—ʻkṣayo gatau ca hiṃsāyām iti . yakṣmaroge kalpānte ca prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 392, 86) .. śvaśuryau devarasyālau . patyurbhrātā patnyā śvaśurya iti vyavahartavyaḥ, bhāryāyā bhrātā bhartuśca śvaśurya iti vyavahartavya ityarthaḥ . śvaśurasyāpatyaṃ śvaśuryaḥ . ʻrājaśvaśurādyat (4. 1. 137) iti yatpratyayaḥ .. bhrātṛvyau bhrātṛjadviṣau . bhrāturapatyamiti vigrahe ʻbhrāturvyaccö (4. 1. 144) iti vyatpratyaye bhrātṛvyaḥ . ʻvyan sapatne (4. 1. 145) iti sūtreṇa bhrātṛśabdāt prakṛtipratyayasamudāyānapekṣayā śatrāvabhidheye vyan pratyaye bhrātṛvyaḥ . atra kaścidāha—bhrātṛputraḥ kadācid dāyaharatvena pitṛvyamabhibhavati . evamabhibhāvakatvasādharmyāt śatrurapi bhrātṛvya ityucyate . rūḍherabhidhātulyavatvād nānārthatvenābhidhānamiti . tadanupapannam . mukhyalākṣaṇikayoḥ svaravailakṣaṇyānupapatteḥ . lakṣaṇasiddhe'rthe sūtrārambhavaiṣamyācca .. parjanyau rasadabdendrau . rasadabdo garjanmeghaḥ . subodhinīkārastu—śaradabdendrau iti paṭhitvā śāradameghasya garjitaprāyatvāt śaradabdaśabdena garjanmegha ucyate ityāha . parjanya ityauṇādikanipātanasāmarthyāt ʻpṛṣu secane ityasmād nyapratyaye ṣakārasya ca tālavyavargatṛtīye jakāre ca sati parjanyaśabdaḥ (u. 3. 103) . ajervā anyapratyaye dhātoḥ pugāgamaśca . kvacinniḥśabde'pi meghe garjanayogyatvāt parjanyaśabdaḥ aupacārikaḥ .. syādaryaḥ svāmivaiśyayoḥ . svāmī prabhuḥ . ʻaryaḥ svāmivaiśyayoḵ (3. 1. 103) iti nipātanāt sādhuḥ .. 145-6 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
