paścādavasthāyi—saṃnayau . yuddhodyuktaṃ balaṃ svasamīpaṃ nayatīti saṃnayaḥ . ʻpacādyac (3. 1. 134) . asya kartari vihitatvād erac pratyayena bādho nāsti . yudhyamānabalasyāvaṣṭambhakatvena tatpaścādbhāgāvasthitaṃ balamityarthaḥ . samavāyaḥ samūhaḥ . melanamiti kecit . saṃścāsau nayaśca saṃnayaḥ . sannaṃ yātīti sannayaḥ ityādīnāmarthānāṃ kliṣṭasamāsagamyānāṃ prāyeṇa vaktuṃ śakyatvād na teṣāṃ nānārthakāṇḍe'bhidhānamityavadheyam .. saṃghāte—saṃstyāyaḥ . saṃghātaḥ samūhaḥ . ʻsaṃniveśo nikarṣaṇam iti prāguktam (1, pṛ. 207) . saṃniveśo'vayavasaṃsthānamiti kecit . samyak styāyante saṃhatā bhavantyatreti saṃstyāyaḥ . ʻstyai śabdasaṃghātayoḵ . ghañ .. praṇayāḥ—premāṇaḥ . visrambhaḥ paricayaḥ . yathā—ʻpremārdrāḥ praṇayaspṛśaḥ paricayāt iti bhavabhūtiḥ (mālatī. 5. 7) . yācñā prārthanā . yathā—ʻtadbhūtanāthānuga nārhasi tvaṃ saṃbandhino me praṇayaṃ vihantum iti raghuvaṃśe (2. 58) . yadyapi ʻpremanītaṃ prakarṣaṃ cet sa eva praṇayo mataḵ iti bhāratīyavacanena premapraṇayayoravasthābhedo'sti, tathāpi avāntaraviśeṣamanādṛtya premapraṇayaśabdāvekārthatvenoktāvityavadheyam . prapūrvasya nayate rajantasyopasargavaśād anekārthatvam .. virodhe'pi samucchrayaḥ . ʻudi śrayati. . .  ityādinā (3. 3. 49) prāptasya ghañi bāhulakād abhāve sati eraci (3. 3. 56) samucchrayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻsamucchrayaḥ syādunnatyāmūrdhvāśrayaṇa eva cö iti .. 151 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.151>

viṣayo deśaśabdādibhaveṣvanyatra gocare .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.152-53>  
viṣayo—śabdādikeṣvapi . yasya devadattādervidyāviśeṣo jñāto'tyantapariśīlitaḥ sa tasya devadattāderviṣaya ityarthaḥ . yathā—devadattasyānuvāko viṣayaḥ iti . athavā yena jñānasādhanena satā yo'rtho jñāyamāno bhavati sa tasya viṣayaḥ . yathā—vedasya yāgādirviṣayaḥ . upaniṣadāmadvaitaṃ viṣayaḥ ityādi . śabdasparśarūparasagandhāstu pañcāpi kevalasyaiva viṣayaśabdasyārthaḥ . yathā—viṣayābhilāṣaḥ, viṣayanivṛttirityādi . ʻdeśaviṣayau tūpavartanam iti prāguktam (1, pṛ. 189) . viśvaprakāśe'pi (pṛ. 120, ślo. 63)—
ʻviṣayaḥ syādindriyārthe deśe janapade'pi ca .
gocare ca prabandhāderyasya jñātastu tatra ca ..
iti .. niryāse'pi kaṣāyo'strī . niryāsaḥ kvāthaḥ . yathā—dhātrīkaṣāyaḥ . triphalākaṣāyaḥ iti . keśavasvāmī (nānā. saṃ. 2. pṛ. 76)—
ʻkaṣāyastuvare na strī niryāse rañjakāśmani .
surabhāvapaṭau rāge bhāvanāyāṃ ca viplave ..
iti . tuvaro rasaviśeṣaḥ . yathā—kaṣāyaraso harītakīti . rañjakāśmani yathā—kaṣāyavāsā iti . surabhau yathā—ʻvakulāmodakaṣāyaḥ prasarati malayānilaḵ iti . apaṭau yathā—kaṣāyamānasaḥ iti . rāge yathā—paripakvakaṣāya iti . bhāvanāyāṃ yathā—ʻamunaiva kaṣāyitastanī subhagena priyagātrabhasmanȫ iti kumārasaṃbhave (4. 34) . viplave yathā—ʻsudatī janimajjanārpitairghusṛṇairyatra kaṣāyitāśayȫ iti . rabhaso'pi—
ʻrasabhede'ṅgarāge ca niryāse ca vilepane .
kaṣāyo'strī triliṅgastu surabhau rūṣite'pi ca ..
iti .. sabhāyāṃ ca pratiśrayaḥ . bahūnāṃ melanārthaṃ nirmitā śālā sabhā . pratiśrayate bahubhiḥ sevyata iti pratiśrayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻpratiśrayastvāśrayaṇe proktaḥ sādhāraṇāspade iti . kālavyatirikte'pi sthānamātra ityarthaḥ .. prāyo bhūmnyantagamane . bhūmni bāhulye yathā—prāyeṇa dharmaśīlaḥ . antagamanaṃ maraṇasaṃkalpaḥ . yathā—ʻprāyopaveśanamatirnṛpatirbabhūvö iti (raghu. 8. 94) . vaijayantyāmapi—ʻprāyo vayasi bāhulye tulyānaśanamṛtyuṣü iti (pṛ. 217, ślo. 36) . atra vayaḥśabdena yauvanaṃ vivakṣitam . tathā ca rājābhiṣeke—ʻprakāmameṣā pracalaiḥ prasanne prāyaḥpraveśaṃ prathayatyapāṅgaiḵ iti . tulye yathā—mūrkhaprāyaḥ prāyapāṭhaḥ iti . ʻprāyaḥ syād bhojanatyāgaḵ iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 4. 75) . ʻiṇ gataü ityasyopasargavaśād anekārthatvam .. manyurdainye kratau krudhi . dīnasya bhāvaḥ karma vā dainyam . kraturaśvamedhādiḥ . krut krodhaḥ . manyata iti manyuḥ . ʻmana jñāne . ʻmanyurdainye kratau krudhi ityamaramālāyāṃ puṃskāṇḍe'bhihitam .. 152-3 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.152-53>  
viṣayo—śabdādikeṣvapi . prathamodāharaṇam—devadattasya viṣayo vyākaraṇam . dvitīyodāharaṇam—netrasya viṣayo rūpam .. niryāse'pi kaṣāyo'strī . ʻniryāse ca kaṣāyo'tha surabhau lohite'nyavat iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 120, ślo. 73) . niryāsa auṣadhīrasaḥ . surabhiḥ sugandhiḥ, lohito varṇaḥ .. sabhāyāṃ ca pratiśrayaḥ . satraśālāyāmapi syāt . ʻsatraśālā pratiśrayaḵ iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 2. 142) .. prāyo bhūmnyantagamane . antagamanaṃ maraṇam . ʻprāyo vayasi bāhulye tulyānaśanamṛtyuṣü iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 217, ślo. 36) .. manyurdainye kratau kratau krudhi .. 152-3 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.154ab rahasyopasthayorguhyaṃ satyaṃ śapathatathyayoḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.154>  
rahasyopasthayorgūhyaṃ guhyaḥ kamaṭhadambhayoḥ .. 321 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.154>  
rahasyopasthayorguhyam . rahasyaṃ gopanīyam . yathā—guhyabhāṣaṇam iti . upastho yonyādiḥ . yathā—guhyaśuddhiriti . guhyate saṃvriyata iti guhyam . ʻguhū saṃvaraṇe . ʻśaṃsiduhiguhibhyo veti vaktavyam (vā. 3. 1. 109) iti kyap pratyayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻguhyo nā kamaṭhe dambhe iti . kamaṭhaḥ kūrmaḥ .. satyaṃ śapathatathyayoḥ . śāstraikasamadhigamyo viśvāsahetuḥ śapathaḥ, devatāsparśanādikriyārūpaḥ . yathā—satyena śudhyata iti . tathye yathā—satyavādī iti . sati satpuruṣe sādhu satyam . śeṣe—ʻsatyastu saptame loke satsu sādhuni vācyavat iti .. vīryaṃ bale prabhāve ca . balaṃ śarīraśaktiḥ . yathā—vīryavān puruṣaḥ . prabhāvo vastusāmarthyam . yathā—ʻrasavīryavipākāḵ iti . vīrasya bhāvaḥ karma vā vīryam . ʻvīravīryau cö (6. 2. 120) iti nirdeśāt sādhuḥ . retasi prāguktam (1, pṛ. 399) .. dravyaṃ bhavye guṇāśraye . bhavyaśabdenābhipretānāmarthānāṃ pātrabhūto bhāgyasaṃpanna ucyate . ʻdravyaṃ ca bhavye (5. 3. 104) iti sūtreṇa druśabdādivārthe yatpratyayaḥ . drumasādṛśyaṃ ca phalapradatvādityavadheyam . yathā—ʻna śāstramadravyeṣvarthavat iti vāmanasūtram (kāvyā. sū. 1. 2. 4) . yathā—ʻtat tasya kimapi dravyaṃ yo hi yasya priyo janaḵ iti bhavabhūtiḥ (uttara. 2. 19) . guṇāśrayatvaṃ ca ʻguṇātyantābhāvasamudāyānadhikaraṇabhāvatvaṃ ca dravyalakṣaṇam iti tārkikāḥ . yathā—pṛthivyādīni nava dravyāṇīti . prayojanāpekṣibhiḥ dravaṇīyatvād dravyam . ʻdru gataü . ʻaco yat (3. 1. 97) iti yat vāntādeśaśca . śeṣe—ʻbhavye dravyaṃ triṣu klībaṃ dyumne jatuni bheṣaje iti . atra dravyaśabdasya bhavyarūpārthe prāguktavācyaliṅgatvaṃ śeṣakāreṇocyate . ata eva ʻdravyo'yaṃ māṇavakaḥ, dravyo'yaṃ rājaputraḵ iti vṛttāvudāhṛtam (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 73) . dyumnaṃ ghanamātram . jatu lākṣā . bheṣaje yathā—dravyaṃ vaiśeṣikam iti . ārakūṭe'pi dravyaśabdaḥ .. 154 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.154>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.155>  
dhiṣṇyaṃ sthāne gṛhe śaktau nakṣatre jvalane pumān .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.155>  
dhiṣṇyaṃ sthānaṃ gṛhe bhe'gnau . atra sthānādyarthaviśeṣeṇa liṅgavailakṣaṇyasya vidyamānatve'pi dhiṣṇyaśca dhiṣṇyaṃ ceti bhinnaliṅgayordvandvaikaśeṣe sati napuṃsakasyaiva pariśeṣābhiprāyeṇa dhiṣṇyamiti napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ iti vyākhyeyam . tacca liṅgavailakṣaṇyaṃ śeṣakāreṇa vyaktīkṛtam . yathā—ʻsthānāgnyoḥ puṃsi dhiṣṇyaḥ syād dhiṣṇyaṃ śaktaü iti . atra sthānaśabdena saumikavedyāmāgnīdhrīyahotriyamārjālīyākhyānyāyatanāni vivakṣitāni . yathā—ʻcātvālāddhiṣṇiyānupavapati (tai. saṃ. 6. 3. 1. 1) ʻaṣṭāvaṣṭāvanyeṣu dhiṣṇiyeṣūpadadhāti (tai. saṃ. 5. 4. 11. 4) iti . agniśabdenāpi prāguktasthāneṣveva sthāpanīyo'gnirvivakṣitaḥ . yathā—ʻyadāgnīdhrād dhiṣṇiyān viharati (tai. saṃ. 6. 3. 1. 1) . tataśca yathā sabhāśabdaḥ sthānaviśeṣe tatrasthajanasamāje ca vartate iti na mukhyalākṣaṇikatvacintāvakāśaḥ, tathā dhiṣṇyaśabdo'pi ubhayatrāpi vartata iti nānārthatvenābhidhānamityavadhātavyam . gṛhanakṣatrayoḥ śaktarūpārthe ca dhiṣṇyaśabdo napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . dhīyata iti dhiṣṇyam . uṇādau dhiṣṇyamiti nipātanāt sādhuḥ .. bhāgyaṃ karma śubhāśūbham . kevalasukhajanakaṃ śubham . kevaladuḥkhajanakamaśubham . sukhaduḥkhayorjanakaṃ śubhāśubham . etat tritayamapi karma bhāgyamityucyate . bhāgaḥ karmaphalaṃ dīyate'treti bhāgyam . ʻbhāgādyaccö (5. 1. 49) iti yatpratyayaḥ . yathā—ʻmadbhāgyopacayādayaṃ samuditaḥ sarvo guṇānāṃ gaṇaḵ (ratnā. 1. 6) iti śubhakarmaṇi prayogaḥ .. kaśeruhemnorgāṅgeyam . kaśeruḥ jalakandam . gaṅgāyā utpannatvena tadapatyatulyatvād gāṅgeyam . śeṣe—ʻgāṅgeyaḥ puṃsi bhīṣme ca gāṅgeyaṃ mustake bhavet iti . viśalyā dantikāpi ca . dantikā vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . śeṣe—
ʻviśalyā gataśalyā syāllāṅgalī tripuṭāmṛtā .
mahauṣadhiviśeṣo'pi ..
iti . vividhāni śalyatulyāni kaṇṭakānyasyā iti viśalyā . vigataṃ śalyaṃ duḥkhamasyā iti vā viśalyā .. 155 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.155>  
dhiṣṇyaṃ—bhe'gnau . bhaśabdena śukratārakayorgrahaṇam . ʻbhaḥ syānmayūkhe śukre bhaṃ nakṣatre ca prakīrtitam iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 108, ślo. 16) . dhiṣṇyaṃ sarvatra napuṃsakam . śukrāgnyoḥ keṣāṃcit puṃliṅgaḥ . ʻdhiṣṇyaḥ śukre ca pāvake iti puṃskāṇḍe'maradattaḥ .. bhāgyaṃ—gāṅgeyam . kaśeruḥ kandaviśeṣaḥ . ʻśuklakāraṃ tu kṛsaraṃ vṛṣyakandaṃ kaśeru cö iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 157, ślo. 47) .. viśalyā dantikāpi ca . trivṛtāyāmapi syāt . ʻtiguḍa adunnü .. 155 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

vṛṣākapāyī śrīgauryoḥ . vṛṣākapeḥ viṣṇorharasya vā strī iti vigrahe ʻpūtakratorai cö (4. 1. 36) ityādi sūtratrayaṃ puṃyogaprakaraṇe draṣṭavyamiti vṛttikāreṇoktatvād (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 270) ʻvṛṣākapyagnikusitakusīdānāmudāttaḥ (4. 1. 37) iti ṅīp pratyayaḥ aikāraścāntādeśaḥ . agnibhāryāyāmindrāṇyāṃ ca vṛṣākapāyīśabdaḥ .. abhikhyā nāmaśobhayoḥ . abhikhyāyate kathyate'nayeti abhikhyā nāmasaṃjñetyarthaḥ . ātaścopasarge (3. 3. 106) ityaṅ . yathā—caitrābhikhyo maitrābhikhya iti . śobhāyāṃ yathā—ʻkāpyabhikhyā tayorāsīt iti raghuvaṃśe (1. 46) . ʻabhikhyā kīrtiyaśasorabhikhyā nāmaśobhayoḵ iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (pṛ. 123, ślo. 104) .. ārambho niṣkṛtiḥ—nava kriyāḥ . atra kriyāśabdasyārthanirūpakatvenāpātrasya upāyaśabdasyāpi yakārāntanimittavidheyatvabhrāntinivāraṇārthaṃ navetyuktam . tataśca ārambhādayaḥ kriyāśabdasyaivārthā ityuktaṃ bhavati . ārambha upakramaḥ . yathā—kriyāvān karmasūdyataḥ (2, pṛ. 26) iti prāguktam . niṣkṛtiḥ prāyaścittam . yathā—ʻmahāpātakināṃ puṃsāṃ bhavet prāṇāntikā kriyȫ iti . śikṣā abhyāsaḥ . yathā—ʻdhanurvede kṛtakriyāḵ iti . ʻśikṣā kriyā kasyacidātmasaṃsthā saṃkrāntiranyasya viśeṣayuktȫ iti . kālidāsaśca (mālavikā. 1. 26) . pūjane yathā—ʻkṛtā pitratithikriyȫ iti . saṃpradhāryate niścīyate saṃdigdhārtho'neneti saṃpradhāraṇaṃ likhitasākṣyādikam . yathā—ʻprāṅnyāyakāraṇoktau tu pravṛttyarthe ca niṣkriyām ityādi . cikīrṣitārthe siddhiheturupāyaḥ . yathā—sapta sāmādikāḥ kriyāḥ iti . saptopāyā ityarthaḥ . ubhayoḥ sādhanatvāviśeṣe'pi kārakarūpasyopāyasya pūrvasmād jñāpakarūpāt saṃpradhāraṇād bhedaḥ . karmaśabdenātra vedoditamanuṣṭhānaṃ vivakṣitam . yathā—ʻtebhyaḥ kriyāparāḥ śreṣṭhāstebhyo'pyadhyātmavittamāḵ iti . (yā. smṛ. 1. 9. 199) . ʻkriyāmuddiśya yācakaḵ iti ca . yadyapi prayatnavadātmasaṃyogasamavāyikriyā ceṣṭeti prasiddhā, tathāpyatra ceṣṭāśabdena pūrvapradeśavibhāgaheturuttarasaṃyogahetuścalanarūpo dharmo vivakṣitaḥ . yathā—hastakriyā, paramāṇukriyā iti . cikitsāyāṃ yathā—ʻpunarjvare samutpanne kriyā pūrvajvarānugȫ iti . ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) iti karoterdhātoryathāyathaṃ bhāve karmaṇi ca śapratyaye, ʻriṅśayagliṅkṣü (7. 4. 28) iti riṅādeśe ca kriyā . śeṣe—ʻsaṃskārākhyātadhātvartharacanāsu kriyā bhavet iti . saṃskāre yathā—ʻsa gururyaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedamasmai prayacchati iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 2. 34) . ākhyāte yathā—kriyāpadaṃ, kriyāgopakam iti . dhātvarthe yathā—kriyāvacanā hi dhātavaḥ iti . racanāyāṃ yathā—ʻśṛṇuta manobhiravahitaiḥ kriyāmimāṃ kālidāsasyö iti (vikrama. 1. 2) .. 156 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

chāyā—anātapaḥ . sūryapriyā sūryapatnī . kāntiḥ dīptiḥ . pratibimbam ādarśādisvacchadravyagataṃ svamukham, tāruśilādinirmitā pratimā, citralikhitaṃ ca . anātapo gṛhavṛkṣādyāvaraṇakṛtaḥ prakāśābhāvaḥ . chyati saṃtāpādikamiti chāyā . ʻcho chedane . yapratyayaḥ (u. 4. 111) . śeṣe—ʻchāyā syāt pālanotkocasacchobhākāvyarītiṣü iti . pālane—ʻavadhānaḥ kṛtacchāyaḥ karaṃ tābhyaḥ samāharet iti . tava chāyāyāṃ vasāma iti ca . utkoce yathā—ʻvṛtte tu kārye chāyāyāṃ grahaṇaṃ durlabhaṃ bhavet iti . sacchabdo nakṣatravacana iti prāguktam . sacchobhā nakṣatrakāntiḥ . yathā—ʻchāyāpatheneva śaratprasannamākāśamāviṣkṛtacārutāram iti (raghu. 13. 2) . kāvyarītau yathā—chāyāmapaharati kaviḥ iti .. kakṣyā—bandhane . harmyādermahāgṛhasya prakoṣṭhe'ntargṛhe svalpagṛhe yathā—bahukakṣyaḥ prāsāda iti . strīnitambagatā kāñcī mekhalā . palyayanabandhanārthaṃ gajasya kukṣimadhyanihitā rajjuḥ madhyebhabandhanam . yathā—ʻsindūraiḥ kṛtarucayaḥ sahemakakṣyāḵ iti bhāraviḥ (kirā. 7. 8) . kakṣaśabdena bāhumūlavācinā sāmīpyād madhyabhāgaḥ tirohitasādṛśyād gṛhamadhyasthānaṃ ca lakṣyate . tatra bhavā kakṣyā . ʻśarīrāvayavādyat (5. 1. 6) iti yat pratyayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻkakṣyā bṛhatikāyāṃ syāt iti . yathā—ʻnīlayā kakṣyayā channā tamasyandhe'bhisārikȫ iti .. kṛtyā—dhanādibhiḥ . ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) iti cakārād bhāve kyapi kṛtyāśabdena kriyocyate . yathā—kāṃ kṛtyāmakārṣīḥ iti . kṛtau paramāraṇe sādhuḥ kṛtyā . ʻtatra sādhuḵ (4. 4. 98) iti yat . paramārikā devatā yathā—ʻkṣipraṃ kṛtye nivartasva kartureva gṛhān prati iti . sāmadānādibhirupāyaiḥ parasmin vairamutpādya svavaśatvena kriyata iti kṛtyo bhedyaḥ . ʻvibhāṣā kṛvṛṣoḵ (3. 1. 120) iti karoteḥ karmaṇi kyap-pratyayaḥ . hrasvasya tugāgamaḥ (6. 1. 71) . atra kauṭilyaḥ—ʻkruddhalubdhabhītāvamānitāḥ pareṣāṃ kṛtyāḵ iti (a. śā. 1. 13) . yathā—ʻkṛtyākṛtyavidastīrtheṣvantaḥ praṇidhayaḥ padam iti māghakāvye (śiśu. 2. 111) . kṛtyaḥ parasenāpatiḥ, kṛtyā parasāmantasaṃhatiḥ, kṛtyaṃ parabalam, ityādirūpeṇa vācyaliṅga ityarthaḥ śeṣe—
ʻkṛtyaṃ kārye napuṃsakam .
hiṃsye grathye chedanīye triṣu tavyādike pumān ..
iti . kārye yathā—kṛtakṛtya iti . ʻkṛtī hiṃsāgrathanayoḵ, ʻkṛtī chedane . ābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ ʻṛdupadhāccāklṛpicṛteḵ (3. 1. 110) iti kyap pratyayaḥ . prāṅṇvula ityanukrāntāḥ tavyādipratyayāḥ kṛtyasaṃjñāḥ .. 157-8 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

saṃgrāme janitavye ca sādhau janitṛpūjyayoḥ .. 332 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.159>  
janyaṃ syājjanavāde'pi . janasya jalpo janyam . ʻmatajanahalāt karaṇajalpakarṣeṣü (4. 4. 97) iti yat . apiśabdārthaḥ śeṣakāreṇa darśitaḥ . yathā—
ʻjanitavye raṇe klībe'pavādajanajalpayoḥ .
astrī varavadhūjñātipriyatulyahiteṣu ca ..
janyastriṣu jane sādhau janitrutpādanīyayoḥ ..
iti . janitavyamavaśyaṃ janyārhatvam . ʻjanī prādurbhāve . ʻṛhalorṇyat (3. 1. 124) . raṇo yuddham . tato mātsaryādibhirjāyata iti janyam . atra ʻbhavyageya . . . ityādinā (3. 4. 68) kartari yat . atrobhayatra janyaśabdaḥ kevalanapuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . apavādo nindā . nindāyāṃ janavāde ca astrī puṃnapuṃsakaliṅga ityarthaḥ . atra ca ʻjanyaḥ syājjanavāde'pi ityamarasiṃhīyaḥ puṃliṅgapāṭho'pi sādhureva . ata eva subhūticandro'pyāha—ʻjanavāde tu puṃsyenaṃ siṃhaḥ klībe'jayo'bravīt iti . varasya vadhvāśca ye jñātayaḥ priyā hitāstulyāśca te janyāḥ . janīṃ vadhūṃ varasamīpaṃ prāpayantīti janyāḥ . ʻsaṃjñāyāṃ janyāḵ (4. 4. 82) iti tadvatītyarthe yatpratyayo nipātitaḥ . jane loke, jantau janmani vā sādhuḥ janyaḥ . ʻtatra sādhuḵ (4. 4. 98) iti yat . jāyata iti kartaryarthe ʻbhavyageya . . . ityādinā (3. 4. 68) yatpratyaye janyo janitā janeḥ kartā yajamāna ityarthaḥ . janerṇyantāt karmaṇi yatpratyaye janya utpādanīyaḥ evaṃ varavadhūsaṃbandhijñātyādiṣu utpādyānteṣu artheṣu janyaśabdo vācyavaśena triliṅgaḥ . anena pūrvavākyasthasya triṣviti padasya yāntavargasamāptiparyantamanuvartamānasya, asminnapi vākye janyaśabdaviṣaye pratiniyatārthatvaṃ śeṣakāreṇoktamiti veditavyam . ʻjanyaṃ haṭṭe parīvāde iti pratāpaśca .. jaghanyo'ntye'dhame'pi ca . kramaniviṣṭānāmarthānāmante bhavo'ntyaḥ . adhamo guṇahīnaḥ . paścātpratīyamānasādṛśyāt jaghanaśabdena caramaḥ kālo deśo vā vivakṣitaḥ . tatra bhavo jaghanyaḥ . śeṣe—ʻjaghanyaṃ śephasi klībe iti . śephasi śiśne . caśabdāt jaghanabhavo'pi jaghanyam . ʻśarīrāvayavāccö (4. 3. 55) iti yat .. garhyādhīnau ca vaktavyau . garhyaḥ kutsitaḥ . adhīno vacanagrāhī . vacanārho vaktavyaḥ . ʻarhe kṛtyatṛcaścö (3. 3. 169) iti tavyapratyayaḥ . caśabdād vacanīyamātre'pi vaktavyaśabdaḥ . vaktavyo devadattaḥ . vaktavyā naṭikā . vaktavyaṃ kāvyamiti . vacanīyavācyaśabdāvapi vaktavyapadasamānārthatayā prasiddhatvādiha noktau . atastāvapyatra vijñeyau . śeṣe—ʻvaktavyaṃ śabdavārttike iti . vyākaraṇasaṃbandhini vararucivārttike vaktavyaśabdo rūpabhedād napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ .. kalyau sajjanirāmayau . sajjaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ . śeṣe—ʻkalāsu sādhau dakṣe ca kalyaḵ iti . prabhātarūpārthe tu kalyaśabdaḥ kevalanapuṃsakaliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 74) .. 159 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.160>  
ātmavānanapeto'rthādarthyau . arthārjane sādhurarthyaḥ . ātmavān buddhimānityarthaḥ . arthādanapeta iti vigrahe ʻdharmapathyarthanyāyādanapete (4. 4. 92) iti yatpratyaye'rthyaḥ, sarvadā sudhanavāniti . śeṣe—ʻarthyo budhe pumān klībaḥ śilājatunyarthye triṣü . arthamarhatītyarthyo vidvān . ʻvidvānaśeṣamādadyāt sa sarvasya prabhuryataḵ iti smṛteḥ (yā. smṛ. 2. 2. 34) . arthye prārthanīye vastuni vācyaliṅgaḥ .. puṇyaṃ tu cārvapi . cāru manoharam . puṇyaṃ vanam . puṇyā nadī ityādi . puṇatīti puṇyam . ʻpuṇa karmaṇi śubhe . apiśabdāt puṇyavati triliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (2, pṛ. 5) . sukṛte napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ .. rūpyaṃ praśastarūpe'pi . praśastaṃ rūpamasyāstīti rūpyam . āhataṃ rūpamasyāstīti rūpyo mudrāliṅkatasuvarṇādiḥ . ʻrūpādāhatapraśaṃsayoryap (5. 2. 120) iti yap . asminnarthe vācyaliṅgaḥ . rajatamātre tu napuṃsakaṃ prāguktam (1, pṛ. 610) .. vadānyo valguvāgapi . valguvāgiti vāgmītyarthaḥ . apiśabdād bahuprado'pi .. nyāyye'pi madhyaḥ . nyāyādanapeto nyāyyaḥ . tatra madhyaśabdaḥ . yathā madhyastha iti . apiśabdād avalagne puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1. pṛ. 412) . manyata iti madhyam . ʻmanu avabodhane . ʻaghnyādayaścö (u. 4. 113) iti auṇādikanipātanāt sādhuḥ . yathā—śarīrasya madhyam . yathā pūrvottarabhāgau vihāya vartate, tathāyaṃ madhyārthe'pi rāgadveṣau parityajya vartata iti sādṛśyād madhya ucyate .. saumyaṃ tu sundare somadaivate . somo devatā asyeti saumyam . ʻsomāṭṭyaṇ (4. 2. 30) . saumyaṃ haviḥ . sundare tūpacārād vṛttiḥ . rauhiṇeye puṃliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1. pṛ. 67) .. 160 ..
iti yāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.160>  
ātmavānanapeto'rthādarthyau . ātmā buddhiḥ, tadvānātmavāniti subhūtiṭīkā .. puṇyaṃ tu cārvapi . sukṛte napuṃsakam .. rūpyaṃ praśastarūpe'pi . rajate napuṃsakam .. vadānyo valguvāgapi . dānaśauṇḍo'pi syāt .. nyāyye'pi madhyaḥ . antararthe napuṃsakam .. saumyaṃ tu sundare somadaivate . sundarārthe—saumyā strī . somadevatāke—saumī ṛk . ʻsomāṭṭyaṇ (4. 2. 30) iti ṭittvāt ṅīp . ʻhalastaddhitasyö (6. 4. 150) iti ṭilopaḥ . anuktam—
sarvajñabhiṣajau vaidyo kulyā kulavadhūḥ sarit .
phalakalyāṇayorbhavyaṃ yogyaṃ sāṃpratike triṣu ..
dyuḥ pumānahni gagane codyaṃ praśne ca vismaye .
kṣetriyaṃ kṣetrajatṛṇe paradārarate triṣu ..
ubhayatra triliṅgaḥ . kṣetriyo darbhaḥ . kṣetriyā prajā ..
kaukṛtyamanutāpe syādayuktakaraṇe'pi ca .
dugdhāmre dugdhatālīyaṃ dugdhaphene'pi tanmatam ..
antaśayyā tu maraṇe bhavecca pitṛkānane .
bhayaṃ pratibhaye'pi syādahaṃtāyāṃ ca vismayaḥ ..
janayitryāmapi jyā syāt puraṃdhryāmapi ca trayī .
umāyāmapi māyā syād vyavāyo'pyavadhāvapi ..
piciṇḍake rājakanyā dakṣakanyā tu diśyapi .
atithāvapi cātithyaṃ nepathyaṃ raṅgabhūmyapi ..
mṛtyuḥ syāddevatāyāṃ ca jātyaṃ syāt sundare'pi ca .

nivahāvasarau vārau . nivahaḥ samūhaḥ . avasaraḥ prakṛtakāryocitaḥ kālaḥ . yathā—ʻsnātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā vāro'ṅgarājasvasuḵ iti (1, pṛ. 94) . śeṣe—

iti . kramaḥ paryāyaḥ . yathā—vārastrī iti . kūpako guṇavṛkṣakaḥ . saṃbhogaḥ saṃbhuktiḥ sevā . pratāpo'pi—

iti . ralayorabhedād vāraśabdasya mūrdhajaḥ keśo'pyarthaḥ . ʻvṛñ varaṇe, ʻvṛṅ saṃbhaktaü . arthānurodhāt karmaṇi bhāve'dhikaraṇe ca ghañ .. saṃstarau prastarādhvarau . samyak stīryate vastrādikamatreti saṃstaraḥ prastaraḥ śayyetyarthaḥ . samyak stīryante darbhā atreti saṃstaro yajñaḥ . ʻstṝñ ācchādane ityasmād dhātoḥ ʻṛdorap (3. 3. 57) ityadhikaraṇe appratyayaḥ .. gurū gīṣpatipitrādyau . ādyaśabdārthaḥ kūrmapurāṇe prapañcitaḥ (2. 12. 26-7)—

iti . śeṣe—ʻdurjarālaghunordīrghasaṃyuktaparayorgurǖ iti . durjare yathā—ʻmāhiṣaṃ dadhipiṣṭaṃ hi bṛṃhaṇaṃ madhuraṃ gurü iti . laghutvaṃ nāma patanapratibandhakaḥ kaścid bhāvaḥ . tadabhāvavati pāṣāṇādau yathā—dvayorgurutvaṃ rasavattvaṃ ca iti . dvimātro dīrghaḥ . saṃyuktamakṣaraṃ paraṃ yasyeti saṃyuktaparam . ubhayatra yathā—ʻsaṃyoge guru . dīrghaṃ cö iti pāṇiniḥ (1. 4. 11, 12) .. dvāparau yugasaṃśayau . dvābhyāṃ kṛtatretāyugāmyāṃ paro dvāparo yugaḥ . saṃśayasya koṭidvayāvalambitvena dvau parau nirūpyāvatreti saṃśayo dvāparaḥ . pṛṣodarādiḥ .. prakārau bhedasādṛśye . bhedo viśeṣaḥ . yathā—ṣaṭprakārā bhāvāḥ iti . sādṛśye yathā—pitṛprakāraḥ putra iti .. ākārāviṅgitākṛtī . iṅgitam abhiprāyasūcakaceṣṭāviśeṣaḥ . ākṛtiravayavasaṃsthānam . ākriyate manogato'rtho'neneti ākāraḥ .. 161-2 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.166>  
muktāśuddhau ca tāraḥ syāt . mauktikānāṃ ślāghyatvahetuḥ śuddhiśabdābhilapyo guṇastāra ityarthaḥ tārayati apakarṣaparihāṇenotkarṣaṃ prāpayatyātmānamiti tāraḥ . ʻtṛ plavanataraṇayoḵ . ghañ (3. 3. 19) . śeṣe—
ʻtāro nā mauktike śuddhe gurusugrīvabhāryayoḥ .

tāramatyuccanidhvānatarīsaṃbandhayostriṣu ..
iti . śuddhe mauktike ca puṃliṅgastāraśabdenocyate . guruḥ bṛhaspatiḥ . tadbhāryāyāṃ sugrīvabhāryāyāṃ cetyarthaḥ . tathā ca purāṇam—ʻyathā bṛhaspaterbhāryāṃ tārāṃ jagrāha śītaguḵ iti . bauddhānāṃ kuladevatā tārādevīti prasiddhā . tārakayoriti kanīnikāyāṃ nakṣatre cetyarthaḥ . evaṃ garubhāryādyarthapañcake strīliṅgaḥ . rūpyaṃ rajatam . varṇaḥ praṇavākhyaḥ . sa ca mantraśāstre tārasaṃjñayā prasiddhaḥ . rajatādyarthadvaye napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . tarī nauḥ . atyuccadhvanau naukāsaṃbandhe ca viśeṣyanighna ityarthaḥ .. śāro—karbure . śṛṇāti saṃtāpamiti śāraḥ . ʻśṝ hiṃsāyām . ʻśṝ vāyuvarṇanivṛtteṣviti vaktavyam (vā. 3. 3. 21) iti ghañ . vāyau nari puṃliṅge . karbure citravarṇe vācyaliṅgaḥ . ʻkṛṣṇaraktaḥ sitaḥ śāraḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 198, ślo. 25) .. atha pratijñā—saṃgaraḥ . imamarthamavaśyamitthaṃ kariṣyāmīti niścayaḥ pratijñā . yathā—satyasaṃgaraḥ . ājiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ . yathā—saṃgare maraṇaṃ puṇyamiti . ekakāryāṇāṃ dvayorbahūnāṃ vā kāryanirvāhaparyantaṃ sarvairasmābhiraśithilodyogaiḥ dṛḍhayatnairasminnarthe bhavitavyamiti śapathapūrvikā pravṛttiḥ saṃvit . yathā—anyonyaṃ kṛtasaṃgarā iti . āpadi yathā—saṃgare śaraṇaṃ suhṛditi . ʻgṝ śabde ityasmād ghātoḥ saṃpūrvād adhikaraṇe bhāve ca ʻṛdorap (3. 3. 57) ityap pratyayaḥ . viśvaprakāśe'pi—ʻviṣāpadoḥ kriyākāre saṃgare tu śamīphale iti . śeṣe—ʻśamyāḥ phale saṃgaraḥ syāt iti .. 166 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.166>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.167>  
vedabhede guptivāde mantraḥ . arthavādasahitabrāhmaṇavyatiriktavedabhāgaḥ ʻiṣe tvȫ ityādiko mantraḥ . guptivādo nāma rājāmātyaprabhṛtīnāṃ rahasi kartavyārthāvadhāraṇam . mantryate guptiṃ bhāṣyate kartavyārthamatreti mantraḥ . ʻmatri guptabhāṣaṇe . curādiḥ . ʻerac (3. 3. 56) ityadhikaraṇe ac pratyayaḥ . ʻmana jñāne ityasmādvā auṇādikapratyayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻmantro devādisādhane iti . śrīrāmādidevatāprītisādhanabhūtaḥ ṣaḍakṣarādirmantraḥ .. mitro ravāvapi . sūrye rūpabhedāt puṃliṅgaḥ . apiśabdāt suhṛdi napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 490) .. makhoṣuyūpakhaṇḍe'pi svaruḥ . makho yajñaḥ . iṣurbāṇaḥ . paśvañjanārtho yūpāvatakṣaṇaśakalo yūpakhaṇḍaḥ svaruḥ . tathoktamāpastambena—ʻavatakṣaṇānāṃ svaruradhimanthanaśca śakalaḵ (ā. śrau. sū. 7. 3. 3) iti . svarati śabdāyata iti svaruḥ . svaryate upatapyate dahyate pāśukenāgninā iti vā svaruḥ . tathā cāpastambaḥ—ʻpratyākramya juhvāṃ svarumavadhāya anūyājānte juhoti (ā. śrau. sū. 7. 27. 4) iti . ʻsvṛ śabdopatāyoḵ auṇādika ukārapratyayaḥ (u. 1. 10) . śobhanānyarūṃṣyasyeti svaruriti kenacidanadhātāśrutaśrautagandhena rephāntaprakaraṇānusaṃdhāne śūnyadhiyā kṛtā niruktirupekṣaṇīyā . pratāpo'pi—ʻyūpakhaṇḍe sāyake ca svaruradhvaravajrayoḵ iti . svaruśabda ukārāntaḥ puṃliṅgaśca, ʻśatakoṭiḥ svaruḵ ityatra prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 32) .. guhye'pyavaskaraḥ . avakīryate chādyata ityavaskaraḥ . guhyaṃ gudapradeśaḥ . apiśabdād viṣṭhāyāṃ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 404) . yadyapi ʻvarcaske'vaskaraḵ (6. 1. 148) iti viṣṭhāyāṃ nipātitaḥ, tathāpi varcaskasaṃbandhād gudapradeśe'pīti vṛttiḥ (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 148) . nirūḍhalakṣaṇānāṃ mukhyatulyatvād nānārthatvenānuśāsanaṃ kṛtam .. 167 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.171ab sāro bale sthirāṃśe ca nyāyye klībaṃ vare triṣu .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.171>  
sāraḥ sthirāṃśe nyāyye syādutkarṣabalayorbhavet .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.171>  
sāro—vare triṣu . sarati śarīraṃ vyāpnotīti sāraḥ . yathā—gograhe dṛṣṭasāro dhanaṃjayaḥ iti . sthāyitvena kālāntaraṃ vyāpnotīti sāraḥ . sthirāṃśe yathā—candanasāraḥ, khadirasāraḥ iti . ʻsṛ sthire (3. 3. 17) ityatra ʻvyādhimatsyabaleṣviti vaktavyam iti kartari ghañ . atrārthadvaye balasthirāṃśayoḥ rūpabhedāt puṃliṅgaḥ . sarati manīṣiṇāṃ hṛdayamiti sāraṃ nyāyyam . yathā—naitatsāramiti . nyāyye nyāyādanapetamityarthe napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . vare śreṣṭhe vācyaliṅgaḥ . sāro deśaḥ . sārā vārāṇasī . sāro deveṣu śaṃkaraḥ . sāraṃ kurukṣetramiti . nanvasya vācyaliṅgatve, ʻsāraṃ sāraṅgalocanȫ ʻrājye sāraṃ vasuṃdharȫ ityādau kathaṃ viśeṣyaliṅgatvābhāva iti cet satyam . ʻsāmānyaviśeṣabhāvatvena pṛthagvākyatvena yojanāyāṃ na pūrvadoṣāvakāśaḵ iti gaṇaratnamahodadhāvuktam (2. ślo. 72) .. durodaro—durodaram . duṣṭamā samantādudaramasyeti durodaro dyūtakaraḥ . tatsaṃbandhāt paṇabhūtaṃ dhanam . dyūtakarma ca napuṃsakena durādaraśabdenocyate . ʻdurodaro'striyāṃ dyūtaḵ ityajayaḥ . ʻāśritya durgaṃ girikandarodaraṃ krīḍanti tasmin satataṃ darodaram iti yamakakāvye nirukāraṃ govardhanaḥ paṭhatīti sarvānandaḥ (ṭī. sa. 3. pṛ. 130) .. 171 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.171>  
sāro—vare triṣu . valaṃ sāmarthyam . tatra ca sthirāṃśe puṃliṅgaḥ . nyāyyamucitāparityāgaḥ . tatra napuṃsakam . varaṃ śreṣṭham . atra triliṅgaḥ . keṣāṃcinnapuṃsakameva .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.175-76>  
śarkarā karparāṃśe'pi . śīryata iti śarkarā . śṛṇātīti vā . śaṃ karotīti vā . ʻśarkarādibhyo'ṇ (5. 3. 107) iti nirdeśāt sādhuḥ . śīryaterauṇādikaḥ karan pratyayo vā (u. 4. 3) . viśvaprakāśe'pi—
ʻśarkarā khaṇḍavikṛtāvupalākarparāṃśayoḥ .
śarkarānvitadeśe ca rugbhede śakale'pi ca ..
iti . karparo bhinnaghaṭādeḥ kapālam . tathā ca pratāpaḥ—ʻkarparastu kapāle syācchastrabhedakaṭāhayoḵ iti . tasyāṃśa ekadeśaḥ . rugbhedo rogaviśeṣaḥ śarkarākhyaḥ aśmarīsaṃjñakaśca .. yātrā syād yāpane gatau . snānabhojanādikayā dinacaryayā vartanaṃ yātrā . yathā—śarīrayātrā, prāṇayātrā iti . gatirgamanam . gate yathā—kāśiyātrā, parvatayātrā . yātyanayeti yātrā . ʻhuyāmāśrubhasibhyastran (u. 4. 169) iti tran pratyayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻyātrā devārcanotsave iti . devatāmahotsave yathā—ʻbhagavataḥ kālapriyanāthasya yātrāyāmāryamiśrān vijñāpayāmi iti (uttara. 1) .. irā—pramīlayoḥ . etīti irā . ʻiṇ gataü . auṇādiko ran pratyayaḥ (u. 2. 31) . śeṣe—ʻirā apsaraḥsü iti . irā nāma kācidapsaraḥstrī .. tandrī nidrāpramīlayoḥ . nirindriyātmapradeśe manaso'vasthānaṃ nidrā . śarīrakhedajanito mohaprāyaḥ pramādaḥ pramīlā, nidrātaḥ pūrvāvasthā . ʻavitṝstṝtandribhyaḥ īḵ (u. 3. 159) iti tandrīḥ sautrād dhātoḥ īḥpratyayaḥ . ḍyantatvābhāvāt sulopābhāvaḥ . śeṣe—ʻtandriśca tandrī samārthakaü iti . tasmādeva sautrāddhātoḥ ʻgurośca halaḵ (3. 3. 103) ityakārapratyaye tandrā . tatraiva ʻprajñādibhyaścö (5. 4. 38) iti ṅīpi tandrī . ʻsaṃjñāpūrvako bidhiranityaḵ (pa. 2. 4. 79) iti vṛddhyabhāvaḥ .. dhātrī—āmalakyapi . upamātā svastanyapradānena poṣaṇakāriṇī . dhayantyenāmiti dhātrī . ʻdheṭ pāne . ʻdhaḥ karmaṇi ṣṭran (3. 2. 181) . ṣittve ca ṅīṣ pratyayaḥ (4. 1. 41) . dhatte dhārayatīti vā dhātrī bhūmiḥ . poṣayitrī bhūtadhātrī . āmalakyāmuktā .. 175-6 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

kṣudrā—alpe'pi kṣudraḥ . vyaṅgā aṅgahīnā . naṭī nartakastrī . veśyetyācārahīnopalakṣaṇam . saraghā madhumakṣikā . kaṇṭakārikā nidigdhikā . vyaṅgādipañcake strīliṅgaḥ . krūranikṛṣṭasvalpeṣu viśeṣyanighnaḥ . kṣuṇatti kṣudyate vā kṣudraḥ . ʻkṣudir saṃpeṣaṇe . auṇādiko rak pratyayaḥ (u. 2. 13) . kṣudaṃ rātīti vā kṣudraḥ . apiśabdāt kṛpaṇe prāguktaḥ (2, pṛ. 68-9) .. mātrā—avadhāraṇe . paricchadaḥ parikaraḥ . yathā—kāpālikasya mātrā mahāmātrāḥ pradhānāni . alpe yathā—ʻsuppratinā mātrārthe (2. 1. 9) iti sūtre kāśikā—mātrā stokamalpamiti paryāyā iti (1, pṛ. 86) . parimāṇe yathā—mātrāsi sarvakālam, hastamātro'ṅkuśa iti . asminnarthatraye rūpabhedāt strīliṅgaḥ . kārtsnye yathā—prāṇimātraṃ na hiṃsyāt iti . sarvānapi prāṇino na hiṃsyāt ityarthaḥ . asya parihāreṇaikasyaiva vastuno niṣkarṣaṇamavadhāraṇam . yathā—śākamātraṃ bhukṅte iti . atrobhayatra rūpaviśeṣādeva napuṃsakatvam . ʻmāṅ māne ityasmād dhātoḥ ʻhuyāmāśrubhasibhyastran (u. 4. 170) iti auṇādikaḥ tran pratyayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻstriyāṃ mātrā bhūṣaṇe syād varṇavṛttāṃśayordhane iti . bhūṣaṇe yathā—hastamātrā, karṇamātrā iti . varṇasyāpyakṣaraikadeśe yathā—ekamātro hrasvaḥ . dvimātro dīrgha iti . vṛtte yathā—mātrāvṛttam iti . dhane yathā—ko jīvenmātrayā vinā iti .. 177 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.178-79>  
ālekhyāścaryayościtram . cīyate kuḍyapaṭādau haritālādivarṇakairiti citram ālekhyam, suranaraturagādiprakṛtiḥ . ʻciñ cayane . ʻamicimidiśasibhyaḥ ktraḵ (u. 4. 165) iti ktrapratyayaḥ . citrayati kadācid bhavatīti citram āścaryam, ākasmikākālakusumaphalādi . caurādiḥ . śeṣe—
atha citrake

iti . citrakaṃ tilakam . khamākāśam . ubhayatra rūpabhedād napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhaṃ hastanakṣatrānantaranakṣatram . ahiḥ sarpaḥ . citrā nāmāpsaroviśeṣaḥ . nakṣatrādidantikānteṣu strīliṅgaḥ . citramūlādyauṣadhiviśeṣe puṃliṅgaḥ . karburavarṇe triliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 101) .. kalatraṃ śroṇibhāryayoḥ . śroṇiḥ kaṭibhāgaḥ . kalaṃ trāyata iti kalatram . śeṣe—ʻnṛpatiprabhṛtīnāṃ tu durgasthānaṃ kalatrakam iti . svārthe kapratyayaḥ pādapūraṇārthe . yathā—ʻpatyustviṣāmiha mahauṣadhathaḥ kalatrasthānaṃ parairanabhibhūtamamūrvahanti iti māghakāvye (śiśi. 4. 34) .. yogyabhājanayoḥ pātram . dātāraṃ narakapātanāt pāti rakṣatīti pātram . yogyaṃ kulaśīlavidyāsaṃpannaṃ saṃpradānamityarthaḥ . kṛpāpātramityādāvupacārād arhamātre prayogaḥ . bhājanamamatram . śeṣe—ʻrūpakeṣu praveśārhe pātraṃ syād rājamantriṇi iti . rūpake nāṭakādau, praveśārhe nāyakādau . yathā—pātrapraveśaḥ iti . mantriṇi yathā—mahāpātramiti . ʻpātraṃ tadantaram iti gatam (1, pṛ. 159) . ʻpātraṃ sruvādikam iti gatam (1. pṛ. 464) . amatravacanaḥ pātraśabdo liṅgatrayavāniti vakṣyate (3. 5. 42) . tatra strīliṅge—ʻpā pāne ʻpā rakṣaṇe ʻpai śoṣaṇe ebhyo dhātubhyaḥ kartari tṛci (3. 1. 133) striyāṃ ṅīp pratyaye pātrī pānakartrī rakṣikā śoṣikā ca iti .. patraṃ vāhanapakṣayoḥ . vāhanaṃ balīvardādikam . ʻpatraṃ palāśaṃ chadanam iti gatam (1, pṛ. 223) .. nideśa granthayoḥ śāstram . nideśaḥ ājñā . granthaḥ śāṃkarabhāṣyamahābhāṣyādiḥ . ʻśāsu anuśiṣṭaü . bhāve karaṇe ca auṇādikaḥ ṣṭran . śastraśabdād bhavādyarthe taddhitotpattau vācyaliṅgaḥ.. śastramāyudhalohayoḥ . āyudhaṃ khaḍgacchurikādi . lohaṃ kālāyasam . ʻsyācchastrī cāsiputrī cö iti gatam (1, pṛ. 539) .. 178-9 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

ʻālekhyāścaryayościtraṃ klībe syāt tilake striyām idi rabhasaḥ . kalatraṃ śroṇibhāryayoḥ . durgasthāne'pi syāt . ʻdurgasthāne nṛpādīnāṃ kalatraṃ śroṇibhāryayoḵ iti rudraḥ .. yogyabhājanayoḥ—parṇayoḥ . garucchurikayorapi syāt . ʻpatraṃ tu vāhane parṇe churikāgarutorapi iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 225, ślo. 20) .. nideśa—āyudhalohayoḥ .. 178-9 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.180ab syājjaṭāṃśukayornetraṃ kṣetraṃ patnīśarīrayoḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.180>  
jaṭāyāṃ tarumūle ca nadyāṃ syandanavastrayoḥ .

syājjaṭāṃśukayornetram . jaṭā vṛkṣamūlam . aṃśukaṃ netrākhyapaṭṭanirmitaṃ vastram . vastramātramiti kecit . ʻnetrakrameṇoparurodha sūryam iti kālidāsaḥ (raghu. 7. 39) . nīyate'neneti vā nayatīti vā netram . ʻdāmnīśasayuyuja . . . ityādinā (3. 2. 182) ṣṭran . atra pratāpaḥ—

iti . syandano rathaḥ . mathiguṇe manthānasyākarṣaṇarajjau . ʻmanthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim iti purāṇam . nāḍī sirā . netari nāyake . yathā—ʻye devāḥ puraḥsado'gninetrāḵ iti śruteḥ (kāṭhakasaṃhitā 15. 2) .. kṣetraṃ patnīśarīrayoḥ . kṣiṇoti kṣīyate vā kṣetram . ʻkṣiṇu hiṃsāyām . ʻkṣi kṣaye . ṣṭranpratyayaḥ (u. 4. 160) . atra pratāpaḥ—

ʻgotraṃ kule bale nāmni gotrastu dharaṇīdhare .
gotrā bhuvi gavāṃ vṛnde ..
ityajayaḥ .. 180 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.181ab satramācchādane yajñe sadādāne vane'pi ca .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.181>  
ācchādane sadādāne yajñe sādanadambhayoḥ .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.181>  
satramācchādane—vane'pi ca . ācchādanaśabdena gṛhaṃ vivakṣitam, na tu vastramiti subodhinīkāraḥ . ʻāsīrannupayanti ityādibrāhmaṇavihitabahukartṛko yajñaviśeṣo'tra yajñaśabdena vivakṣitaḥ . sadādānamapyannasyaiva . na tu gavādīnāmapi . jñānasatram, vidyāsatramityādau tu prayoga aupacārikaḥ . vanamaraṇyam . ʻaraṇyaṃ vipinaṃ satram iti pratāpaḥ . ʻayameva mṛgavyasatrakāmaḵ iti bhāraviḥ (kirā. 13. 9) . sīdantyatreti satram . ʻṣadlṛ viśaraṇādaü . adhikaraṇe ṣṭranpratyayaḥ (u. 4. 160) . śeṣe—
ʻsatraṃ dambhe sādane ca satāṃ trātari ca triṣu .
kvacit pāpe'tha saddeye satrāvyayamadhīnavat ..
iti . sīdanti naśyanti aneneti satram . dambhaḥ kapaṭaḥ . sīdaterṇyantāt tranpratyaye ʻbahulamanyatrāpi (u. 2. 25) iti ṇiluki satram . sādanamityarthaḥ . sataḥ trāyata iti satraḥ, satpuruṣāṇāṃ rakṣakaḥ . tatra viśeṣyanighnaḥ . kvacideva vṛttiviṣaye satraśabdaḥ pāpavacanaḥ . yathā—ʻkaṇvaḥ pāpaṃ cikīrṣati ityasvapadavigrahe ʻsatrakaṣṭakakṣakṛcchragahanebhyaḥ kaṇvacikīrṣāyām (vā. 3. 1. 14) iti kyaṅpratyaye satrāyate pāpaṃ kartumicchatītyarthaḥ . sadbhayo deye sadadhīne ityarthadvaye ʻtadadhīnavacane (5. 4. 54) ʻdeye trā cö (5. 4. 55) iti trāpratyaye satrākaroti . ʻcvyartha iti vācyam (vā. 1. 4. 74) iti satrāśabdo'vyayam . ʻkiṃsvit pratyuta yacca kaccana na kaṃ satraṃ samaṃ sākamaḵ iti gaṇaratnamahādadhau (1. 5) uktatvāt satramiti makārāntamavyayamapyasti .. ajiraṃ viṣaye kāye'pi . viṣayo rūpādiḥ . kāyaḥ śarīram . ajanti kṣaranti cakṣurādīnyatreti ajiram . ʻaja gatikṣepaṇayoḵ . ʻajiraśiśira . . . ityauṇādikanipātanāt (u. 1. 56) sādhuḥ apiśabdādaṅgaṇe prāguktam (1, pṛ. 203) .. ambaraṃ vyomni vāsasi . ambate śabdaṃ karotīti ambyate vā ambaram . ʻabi śabde . sugandhidravyabhede'pyambaraśabdaḥ . tathā ca viśvaprakāśe—ʻambaraṃ vasane vyomni kārpāse ca sugandhini iti (pṛ. 133, ślo. 102) .. 181 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.181>

daro'striyāṃ bhaye śvabhre . darati bibhetyasmāditi daro bhayam . ʻdṝ bhaye . bhayāditvādac pratyayaḥ (vā. 3. 3. 56) . tatraiva puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . dīryata iti daraḥ . śvabhraṃ gartaḥ . śvabhre tu darī iti ṅībanto'pyasti . śeṣe—ʻīṣadarthe darāvyayam iti . dareti hrasvāntamavyayam . yathā—ʻdaradalitaharidrāpiñjarāṇyaṅgakāni iti prayogaḥ .. vajro'strī hīrake pavau . hīrako maṇivedhakaraṃ ratnam . paviḥ kuliśam . ʻvajraṃ kuliśaśastrayoḥ . maṇibhede ratnabhede iti keśavasvāmī (nānā. saṃ. pṛ. 142, ślo. 1158-9) . vajati pratibandharāhityena gacchatīti vajram . ʻvaja vraja gataü . ʻṛjrendrāgravajra . . .  ityādinā (u. 2. 31) ran-pratyayaḥ . śeṣe—

guḍūcyām ..
iti . yogo viṣkambhādiṣu pañcadaśo vajrākhyaḥ . mahauṣadhilakṣaṇaṃ tu svacchandabhairave uktam . yathā—
ʻvajravallī samākhyātā sapuṣpā kṣīriṇī bhavet .
snuhipatropamaiḥ patraistatkṣaṇāt sūtabandhinī ..
iti .. tantraṃ—paricchade . pradhāne yathā—svatantraḥ, svapradhāna ityarthaḥ . atra siddhāntaśabdena tadvyutpādako grantho vivakṣitaḥ . yathā—kaṇādatantram, bhāṭṭatantramiti . ūyata iti vāyaḥ . sūtraṃ cāsau vāyaśceti sūtravāyaḥ . sa ca tantramityucyate . tathā ca nyāsakāraḥ—ʻdairghyeṇa prasāritāstantavaḥ tantramityucyate iti . anye tu—yena daṇḍādinā kuvindāstantuvayanaṃ kurvanti sa tantuvāyaḥ . sa sūtravāyaśabdanocyata ityāhuḥ . śalākārūpa iti kecit . paricchadaḥ parikaraḥ . yathā—bahutantro'lpatantra iti . tanoti tanyate vā tantram . ʻtanu vistāre ṣṭran (u. 4. 160) . ʻtatri kuṭumbadhāraṇe ityasmādvā tantram . śeṣe—

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.187>  
antaraṃ—antarātmani ca . athāryāvṛttam . avakāśo dravyāntarānavaruddhaḥpradeśaḥ . yathā—asmākamantaraṃ dehi, atrāntare gṛhāḥ kāryāḥiti . kriyāntarānavaruddhaḥ kālo'pyavakāśa ucyate . yathā—dattapratidānamanatiramaṇīyam . asmākamidamantaram . anatikramaṇīyo deśaḥ kālo vā avadhiḥ . yathā—anayorgrāmayoḥ seturantaram . māsāntarādidaṃ deyamiti . paridhāne yathā—antare śāṭakāḥ . upasaṃvyānamityarthaḥ . upasaṃvyānabahiryogayorarthayoḥ sarvanāmasu pāṭhāt puṃliṅgatvam . antardhau vyavadhāne yathā—javanikāntarastiṣṭhati iti . parvatāntarito deśa iti . bhedaviśeṣe yathā—ʻnāntarajñāḥ śriyo jātü (kirā. 11. 24) . mahadantaraṃ merusarṣapayoḥ iti . tādarthye yathā—odanāntarastaṇḍulaḥ iti . chidraṃ suṣiram . yathā—kuḍyāntare praviṣṭaścora iti . athavā chidraṃ randhram . parāvaskandanānukūlamityarthaḥ . yathā—praharedantare śatrumiti . tribhuvanacchidrapidhānavratamityādau chidraśabdo vyasanavacanaḥ . tadapyantaramucyate . ātmīye yathā—ayamabhyantaro mama iti . vinārthe yathā—antare bhavamantarīyaṃ vinābhūtam, tato nañsamāse nāntarīyakam, avinābhūtamityarthaḥ . bahirarthe yathā—antare caṇḍālagṛhā iti . ʻantaraṃ bahiryogopasaṃvyānayoḵ (1. 1. 36) . bāhyāścaṇḍālagṛhā ityarthaḥ . avasare yathā—ʻatrāntare kimapi . . . mānmathamāvirāsīt iti (māla. mā. 1. 29) . madhye yathā—idānīmantare jātāḥ saritsāgaraparvatāḥ iti . antarātmani yathā—antarātmā, antaṃ rārītyantaram iti . śeṣe—ʻantaraḥ sadṛśānyayoḵ iti . sadṛśe yathā—ʻsthāne'ntaratamaḵ iti (1. 1. 50) . anyasmin yathā—sthalāntaraṃ gacchāma iti . yadyapyatrāviśeṣeṇāntaramiti napuṃsakaliṅgamuktam, tathāpi keṣucidarthaviśeṣeṣu napuṃsakatvam, na sarvatra . tathā ca vaijayantyām (pṛ. 257, ślo. 2)—
ʻantaraḥ paridhānīye bāhye svīye'ntarātmani .
klībaṃ madhye cāvakāśe tādarthye'vasare'vadhau .
viśeṣavivarāntardhiṣvavasthānavinārthayoḥ ..
iti . madhyādiṣvartheṣu klībamityarthaḥ .. 187 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.187>  
antaraṃ—antarātmani ca . sādṛśyānyārthayorapi syāt . gakārasya ghakāro'ntaratamaḥ . janmāntarāgataṃ śīlam .. 187 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.188ab muste'pi piṭharaṃ rājakaśeruṇyapi nāgaram .
AK.03.03.188cd śārvaraṃ tvandhatamase ghātuke bhedyaliṅgakam .. 188 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.188>  
muste'pi piṭharaṃ kumbhe bhavenmanthānadaṇḍake .. 403 ..
piṭhyate kliśyate'neneti piṭharam . ʻpiṭha hiṃsāsaṃkleśanayoḵ ..
jalakandaviśeṣe'pi śuṇṭhīsuratabandhayoḥ .
asaṃjñāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ca pravīṇe kutsite tathā .. 404 ..
nāgaraṃ tu triṣu bhavellipyāṃ nagarasaṃbhave .
nagare jātaṃ nāgaram ..
ghātuke śarvarījāte hiṃsre dantāvale'pi ca .. 405 ..
andhatāmisrake cāpi śārvaraḥ parikathyate .
śarvaryāṃ jātaṃ śārvaram . śṛṇātīti vā śārvaram .. .. 188 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.188>  
muste'pi piṭharam . peṭhatīti piṭharam . ʻpiṭha hiṃsāsaṃkleśanayoḵ . ʻśīkarādayaścö ityarapratyayaḥ . ʻpiṭharaḥ sthālyukhā kuṇḍam iti puṃliṅgo gataḥ (1, pṛ. 572) . gaurādiṣu pāṭhāt striyāṃ ṅīṣi piṭharī ityapi . manthadaṇḍe'pi piṭharaśabdaḥ . śeṣe—ʻvaiśākhadaṇḍe piṭharamukhāyāṃ piṭharītyapi iti .. rājakaśeruṇyapi nāgaram . rājakaśeru bhadramustākhyam . rājīvakanda ityure . apiśabdāt śuṇṭhyāṃ nāgaramuktam (1, pṛ. 576) . nagarākhyadeśe prāyeṇa bhavaṃ nāgaram . śeṣe—
ʻpravīṇaṃ kutsitaṃ vinā .
asaṃjñānagare jātaṃ nāgaraṃ nāgarāyate .
triṣvatho saurate bandhe nāgaram ..
iti .asyārthaḥ—ayodhyāpāṭalīputrādike nagare jātaṃ nāgaraṃ viśeṣyanighnaḥ . tatra jāto'pi yadi kutsitaḥ pravīṇo vā syāta, tatra ʻnagarāt kutsanaprāvīṇyayoḵ (4. 2. 128) iti vuñpratyaye nāgaraka ityeva bhavati . nanu nagaramiti viśeṣasaṃjñayaiva gurjaradeśe prasiddhaṃ kiṃcinnagaramasti . tatra jāta ityaṇpratyaye sati nāgaramityeva syādityatrāha—asaṃjñānagara iti . kartryādiṣu nagaraṃ paṭhyata iti vṛttikāravacanāt tatra jāte kartryādibhyo ḍhakañpratyaye (4. 2. 95) nāgareyakamityeva bhavati . na tu nāgaramiti syāt . yaśca nagarasya rāyako dhāyakaḥ yājakādisamāsaḥ, tatra na agaṃ rātīti vyutpattyā nāgaraśabdo vācyaliṅgaḥ . suratakāle strīpuṃsayoravayavasaṃniveśaviśeṣe suratabandhe nāgaraṃ napuṃsakam . nāgaralakṣaṇamuktaṃ granthāntare .. śārvaraṃ—bhedyaliṅgakam . śarvaryāṃ bhavaṃ śārvaram . gāḍhamandhaṃ tamaḥ śṛṇātīti śārvaram . ghātuko hiṃsraḥ . ʻśṛ hiṃsāyām . varanpratyayaḥ . pṛṣodarāditvād dīrghaḥ . śārvaro vyādhaḥ . śārvaraṃ śābarakulam ityādau vācyaliṅgaḥ . ʻghātukebhe'nyaliṅgakam iti pāṭhe ghātukaścāsau ibhaśceti samāsaḥ . tatra ghātukaḥ kuñjaraḥ, kuñjaraghaṭā, kujjarayūthamityādi viśeṣyānurodhenānyaliṅgatvamityarthaḥ .. 188 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.188>  
muste'pi piṭharam . sthālyāmapi syāt .. rājakaśeruṇyapi nāgaram . rājakaśeru tṛṇamūlaviśeṣaḥ . śuṇṭhyāmapi syāt . śārvaraṃ—bhedyaliṅgakam .. 188 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.189>  
aruṇe dhavale pīte padmakesaracandrayoḥ .. 406 ..

AK.03.03.199ab bahulāḥ kṛttikā gāvo bahulo'gnau śitau triṣu .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.199>  
agnau site kṛṣṇapakṣe'rjune bahulo bhavet .. 434 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.199>  
bahulāḥ—śitau triṣu . bahvīradhiṣṭhānatāre lātyādatta iti bahulāḥ kṛttikānakṣatraviśeṣāḥ . tatra strīliṅgo bahuvacanāntaśca . govācake'pi strīliṅga eva . bahu havyaṃ lātīti bahulo'gniḥ . śitau kṛṣṇavarṇe vācyaliṅgaḥ śeṣe—ʻbahulau kṛṣṇapakṣadhanaṃjayau . klībaṃ hṛnnabhasoḵ iti . dhanaṃjayo'rjunaḥ . elāyāmapi strīliṅgo bahulāśabda uktaḥ (1, pṛ, 289) . ʻadabhraṃ bahulam iti viśeṣyanighne uktaḥ (ślo. 63) . ʻbahulaṃ chandasi (2. 4. 39) ityādipāṇinīyavyavahāre bahulaśabdo napuṃsakaliṅgo vikalpaviśeṣaḥ prasidghaḥ .. līlā vīlāsakriyayoḥ . strīṇāṃ vilāsaḥ . śṛṅgārabhāvaceṣṭāviśeṣo vilāsaḥ . kriyā kāyikaḥ parispandaḥ . yathā—ʻmalayapavanalīlāvilulitabakulodbhāvāmodāḵ iti .. upalā śarkarāpi ca . sarṣapamarīcādiprāyakaṭhināvayavamiśrā mṛttikā śarkarā . upyate kṣipyate gṛhādiṣviti upalā . ʻḍuvap bījasaṃtāne . ʻvṛṣādibhyaścit (u. 1. 111) iti kalapratyayaḥ . yajāditvāt (6. 1. 15) saṃprasāraṇam . śeṣe—
ʻaśmapiṇḍo'śmarūpā ca mṛdvikāraścaikṣavo'pi yaḥ .
tatropalā striyāṃ puṃsi śilāratnaviśeṣayoḥ ..
iti . ratne yathā—ʻnīlopalasyūtavicitradhātum iti māghaḥ (śiśu. 4. 1) .. 199 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.199>

AK.03.03.201ab śīlaṃ svabhāve sadvṛtte sasye hetukṛte phalam .
AK.03.03.201cd chadirnetrarujoḥ klībaṃ samūhe paṭalaṃ na nā .. 201 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.201>  
sadvartane svabhāve ca śīlaśabdaḥ prakīrtitaḥ .
śīlyate'neneti śīlam . ʻśīla samādhaü ..
takkole phalake muṣṭau lābhamuktāpriyaṅguṣu .. 439 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.201>  
śīlaṃ svabhāve sadvṛtte . śīlyate samādhīyata iti śīlam . ʻśīla samādhaü . yāvaddravyabhāvī dharma ityarthaḥ . yathā—nidrāśīlaḥ, dūṣaṇaśīlaḥ iti . sadvṛtte yathā—śīlavān putra iti .. sasye hetukṛte phalam . sasye yathā—ʻoṣadhyaḥ phalapākāntāḵ (1, pṛ. 218; ma. smṛ. 1. 46) . hetunā kāraṇena kṛte prāpte yathā—yāgasya svargaḥ phalam . duṣkṛtasya narakaḥ phalam iti . śeṣe—
ʻphalaṃ jātīphale muṣṭau muktādhānyakaṇeṣu ca .
bāṇāgravārkṣatriphale takkole tilake'pi ca ..
iti . muṣṭiḥ saṃgrāhaḥ . muktā mauktikam . dhānyakaṇāḥ taṇḍulaśakalāḥ . yathā—ʻsuphalīkṛtān juhoti iti . bāṇāgrādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ . vṛkṣasya saṃbandhi vārkṣam, sahakāradāḍimaphalādi . phalakaṃ carmadārupaṭṭikādi . ʻpriyaṅguḥ phalinī phalī iti gatam (1, pṛ. 247) . ʻphalaṃ phāle dhane bīje niṣpattau bhogalābhayoḵ iti keśavasvāmī (nā. saṃ. pṛ. 113, ślo. 825) . phalati niṣpadyata iti phalam . ʻphala niṣpattaü .. chadirnetrarujoḥ—paṭalaṃ na nā . paṭaṃ vistāraṃ lātīti paṭalam . chadiḥ tṛṇādinirmitaṃ gṛhācchādanam . netrarogaḥ paṭalākhyaḥ netragolakayostirodhāyakaḥ sūkṣmaḥ śleṣmādidhātuvikāraḥ . paṭasādṛśyāt paṭa ityucyate . taṃ lātīti paṭalam . yathā—ʻtimiraṃ kācatāṃ yāti paṭale tadupekṣayȫ iti . samūhavacanatve tu strīnapuṃsakobhayaliṅgaḥ . striyāṃ tu gaurādiṅīṣi (4. 1. 41) paṭalī . śeṣe—ʻtilake ca paricchade . paṭalaḥ . iti . paricchade yathā—bhūṣāpaṭalikāhasta iti .. 201 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.201>  
śīlaṃ—phalam . hetukṛtaṃ śāstraphalaṃ vinaya ityādisvarūpahetudarśanasamuttham .

AK.03.03.205ab karālo danture tuṅge cārau dakṣe ca peśalaḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.205>  
karālo danture jihme tuṅgabhīṣaṇayorapi .. 447 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.205>  
karālo danture tuṅge . atrāpi triṣvityanuvartate . danturaḥ unnatadantaḥ. karoti bhayamiti karālam . kṛṇotīti vā . ʻkṛñ hiṃsāyām . śeṣe—ʻkaśeruṇi karālaṃ nap bhīṣaṇe vācyaliṅgakaḵ iti .. cārau dakṣe ca peśalaḥ . piśati avayavavyāpāraṃ karotīti peśalaḥ . ʻpiśa avayavakriyāyām  iti niṣkṛṣṭo dhātuḥ . śeṣe—ʻpeśalo mṛdule prokto musale kokile hare iti .. mūrkhe'rbhake'pi bālaḥ syāt . mūrkho durāgrahayuktaḥ . valyate'jñānena saṃvriyata iti bālaḥ . ʻvala saṃvaraṇe atra sarvadharaḥ—

iti lāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.205>  
karālo—lolaścalasatṛṣṇayoḥ . triṣvityadhikāraniyamāt jihvālakṣmyornoktam . ʻlolā jihvākamalayorlolaścalasatṛṣṇayoḵ iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 152, ślo. 44) .. anuktam—

dhruvo bhabhede—śāśvate triṣu . bhabhedastārakāviśeṣaḥ, uttānapādasya putraḥ . tatra rūpabhedāt puṃliṅgaḥ . niścite tu napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . yathā—ʻdhruvaṃ praṇāśaḥ prahitasya patriṇaḵ iti bhāraviḥ (kirā. 14. 9) . śāśvata vācyaliṅgaḥ . yathā—ʻdhruvā dyauḥ dhruvā pṛthivī (ṛgveda 10. 173. 4), dhruvaṃ viśvamidaṃ jagat iti . dhruvatīti dhruvaḥ . ʻdhruva sthairye . ʻpacādyac (3. 1. 134) . kuṭāditvāt (1. 2. 1) guṇābhāvaḥ . śeṣe—

ityādimatsyapurāṇoktānām (5. 21) aṣṭānāṃ vasūnāṃ madhye dvitīyo vasuḥ . vaṭo nyagrodhataruḥ . yogo viṣkambhādiṣu dvādaśaḥ . gītau svaratālāśrayaviśeṣe yathā—ʻviśvāmitrasya prāveśikī dhruvȫ iti murāriḥ (a. rā. 1. 13-) . tarka utprekṣā . yathā—ʻmanye śaṅke dhruvaṃ prāyaḵ iti daṇḍī (kā. ā. 2. 234) . avadhau yathā—ʻdhruvamapāye'pādānam (1. 4. 24) iti . srugbhede strīliṅge prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 465) . yathā—dhruvāyāmājyam iti prayogaḥ . viśvaprākāśe'pi—

dhruvā mūrvāśālaparṇyorgītisrugbhedayorapi ..

kalahe vyutkrame yugmaśivayorvijane'pi ca .. 463 ..
yajñapātraprayoge ca samāse dvandvamucyate .
mithunatvād dvandvam .. 212 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.212>  
strīkaṭī—paripaṇe'pi ca . strīṇāṃ nitambadeśasthasya vāsasaḥ śaithilyaparihārārthaṃ kṛto granthiviśeṣa ityarthaḥ . nīyate vastrādidārḍhyamanayeti nīvī . ʻniyo vic . vā ṅīṣi nīvī strīkaṭīvastrabandhaḥ . paripaṇaṃ nāma vaṇijāmāyavyayaśuddhaṃ mūladhanam . śeṣe—ʻnīvī syād bandhanāgāre iti . atra strīgrahaṇaṃ nīvīśabdasya strīliṅgatvapratipādanaparamiti kenacit kṛtaṃ vyākhyānamanādaraṇīyam . ʻnīvirāgrathanaṃ nāryā jaghanasthasya vāsasaḵ iti kātyokteḥ .. śivā gaurīpheravayoḥ . sṛgālaḥ pheravaḥ . śeṣe—
ʻmokṣe bhadre sukhe śivam .
hare yogāntare vede vāluke guggulau śivaḥ ..
puṇḍarīkadrume cātha śivā jhaṇṭāmalauṣadhe .
abhayāmalakīgaurīkroṣṭrīsaktuphalāsu ca ..
iti . harādāvarthaṣaṭke śivaśabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . yogaviśeṣo viṣkambhādiṣu viṃśaḥ . vālukaṃ harivālukam . harītakyāṃ saktuphalāyāṃ ca strīliṅgatoktā (1, pṛ. 250, 246) . viśvaprakāśe'pi—
ʻśivaṃ mokṣe śubhe bhadre salile'tha śivo hare .
vede yogāntare kīle vāluke guggule'pi ca ..
puṇḍarīkadrume cāpi śivā jhaṇṭāmalauṣadhau .
abhayāmalakīgaurīkroṃṣṭrīsaktuphalāsu ca ..
iti (pṛ. 163, ślo. 10-11) . dvandvaṃ kalahayugmayoḥ . dvayoṃridamiti dvandvam . kalahe yathā—ʻbāhudvandvapravṛttayoḵ iti . dvau dvau iti dvandvaṃ yugmaṃ mithunam . yathā—ʻdvandvāni bhāvaṃ kriyayā vivavruḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 35) . ʻdvandvaṃ rahasyamaryādāvacanavyutkramaṇayajñapātraprayogābhivyaktiṣü (8. 1. 15) iti sūtreṇa dviśabdasya dvirvacanaṃ pūrvapadasyāmbhāvaḥ uttarapadasya atvaṃ ca nipātyate . atra sūtre, anyatrāpi dvandvamiṣyate ityuktatvāt sādhutvam . śeṣe—ʻdvandvaṃ rahasyamaryādāyajñapātraprayojane iti . yathā—dvandvaṃ mantrayati . rahasyaṃ mantrayata ityarthaḥ . maryādāvacane yathā—ʻācaturaṃ hīme paśavo dvandvaṃ mithunāyante iti . yajñapātre yathā—ʻdvandvaṃ yajñapātrāṇi prayunakti iti . vyutkramaṇaṃ hi vibhedaḥ pṛthagavasthānam . yathā—dvandvaṃ vyutkrāntā brāhmaṇā iti . dvivargasaṃbandhena pṛthagavasthitā ityarthaḥ .. 212 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.212>  
strīkaṭī—paripaṇe'pi ca . śivā gaurīpheravayoḥ . pherave strī .
ʻśivā harītakī kroṣṭā śamī nadyāmalakyumā .
śivo ghole padmarāge hare kīle śivaṃ jale ..

AK.03.03.213ab dravyāsuvyavasāyeṣu sattvamastrī tu jantuṣu .

iti vāntavargaḥ
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.213>  
dravye prāṇe vale jantau vyavasāyasvabhāvayoḥ .. 464 ..
guṇe vitte sato bhāve sattvaṃ guṇini tu triṣu .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.213>  
dravyāsu—astrī tu jantuṣu . iha dravyaśabdena pāribhāṣikaṃ dravyamāśrīyate . tathā hi—
ʻvastūpalakṣaṇaṃ yatra sarvanāma prayujyate .
dravyamityucyate so'rtho bhedyatvena vivakṣitaḥ ..
iti . asyārthaḥ—yatra yasminnarthe tadidamiti sarvanāmadvayamatītavartamānasaṃbandhavastupratipādakaṃ prayujyate sa kāladvayasaṃbandhisiddharūpārtho bhedyatvena vivakṣitaḥ . guṇakriyasāmānyairviśeṣyatvena vivakṣito dravyamityucyate iti . yathā—ʻsattve niviśate'paiti iti . asuṣu prāṇeṣu yathā—antaḥsattvaḥ iti . vyavasāya utsāhaḥ . yathā—sarvatra sattvasaṃpanna iti . dravyāditraye rūpabhedād napuṃsakaliṅgatvam . jantuṣu prāṇimātre yathā—ʻsarvasattvahite rataḵ iti . sīdatīti sattvam . auṇādikatvanpratyayaḥ (u. 4. 107) . viśvaprakāśe—
ʻsattvaṃ guṇe piśācādau bale dravyasvabhāvayoḥ .
sadbhāve vyavasāye ca citte prāṇeṣu śabdyate ..
iti (pṛ. 163, ślo. 16) . sāttvikaprakṛtiriti sattvākhye guṇe . sattvanātha iti piśācādau . siṃhasattvaḥ iti bale . sato bhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ . śuddhasattva iti citte .. klībaṃ napuṃsake—avikrame . napuṃsake tṛtīyaprakṛtau . ṣaṇḍe varṣavare . ubhayatra rūpabhedād napuṃsakatvam . paryāyaprastāve napuṃsakaliṅga uktaḥ (1, pṛ. 384) . ata evāmaramālāyām—ʻastrī napuṃsake klībam ityabhihitam . avikrame dhairyarahite viśeṣyanighnaḥ . vabayorekatvābhidhānāt kāṇḍasthavakāramadhye klībaśabdo'pyuktaḥ .. 213 .. 
iti vāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.213>  
dravyāsu—astrī tu jantuṣu . jantava ityanena piśācādayo'pyuktāḥ . ʻpiśācādau guṇe prāṇibale jantau ca cetasi ityajayaḥ .. klībaṃ napuṃsakaṃ—avikrame .. anuktam—

ʻdvīparājanyayoḥ kuśaḥ .

<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.216>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.217-18>  
vaśā strī kariṇī vandhyā . strī mānuṣī . vandhyā yā kācit [anapatyā] . vaṣṭi icchatīti vaśā . ʻvaśa kāntaü . kāntiriccheti dhātuvṛttau . śeṣe—
ʻprabhutvecchāyattatāsu vaśo nā triṣu tadvati .
strīgavīsutayoḥ strī syāt ..
iti . prabhutve yathā‒svavaśaḥ, svaprādhānyavānityarthaḥ . tadvati prabhutvādidharmayukte viśeṣyanighnaḥ . sutā duhitā . tathā ca vaijayantyām—ʻvaśā kariṇyāṃ vandhyāyāṃ rāmāyāṃ duhitaryapi iti (pṛ. 235, ślo. 71) .. dṛgjñāne jñātari triṣu . ʻdṛśir prekṣaṇe ityasmāddhātoḥ saṃpadāditvāt (vā. 3. 3. 94) kvipi dṛkśabdo jñānavacanaḥ strīliṅgaśca . ʻkvip cö (3. 2. 76) iti kartari kvipi dṛk jñātā . tatra viśeṣyaliṅgaḥ vicakṣaṇe . nayane ca strīliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 421) . ʻkvin-pratyayasya kuḵ (8. 2. 62) ityatra pratyayagrahaṇāt kvibādipratyayāntare'pi kutvaṃ kvacid bhavatīti nyāsakāreṇoktam (pañjikā 2, pṛ. 1004) . tena dṛśerapi kvippratyayaprakṛteḥ padāntare'pi kutvaṃ bhavati .. syāt karkaśaḥ—amasṛṇāvapi . lobhena paradhanaharaṇaparastrīdharṣaṇādikaraṇaśīlaḥ sāhasikaḥ . kaṭhoraḥ kaṭhinaḥ pāṣāṇādiḥ . amasṛṇo rūkṣaḥ tuṣāṅgārabhasmādiḥ . ʻkṝ hiṃsāyām ityasmādauṇādike kaśapratyaye karkaśaḥ . athavā karkam aśmaviśeṣamapi śyati nāśayati tanūkaroti svagatapāruṣyeṇeti karkaśaḥ . śeṣe—ʻkarkaśau krūranirdayau . khaḍgekṣukāḥ samarthāścö . karkaśaśabdavācyā ityarthaḥ . ʻapīvaro bṛhatkāṇḍaḥ kṛṣṭekṣuḥ karkaśābhighaḵ ityāyurvedadravyabhede ca . ʻkāmpilyaḥ karkaśaḵ iti gatam (1, pṛ. 304) . triṣviti padasya pūrvavākyādanuvṛtterasyāpi vācyaliṅgatvamunneyam .. prakāśo'tiprasiddhe'pi . triṣvityanuvartate . ʻvipināni prakāśāni śaktimattvāccakāra saḵ iti kālidāsaḥ (raghu. 4. 31) . prakarṣeṇa kāśata iti prakāśaḥ . ʻkāśṛ dīptaü, pacādyac (3. 1. 134) . śeṣe—ʻprakāśaḥ prakāśavānapi iti . ʻprakāśo dyota ātapaḵ iti puṃliṅgo gataḥ (1, pṛ. 72) . bhāvamātravacanatve'pi puṃliṅgaḥ .. śiśāvajñe ca bāliśaḥ . viśeṣyanighnavarge bāliśaḥ kṛtanirvacanaḥ .. kośo'strī—arthaughadivyayoḥ . kuḍmalo mukulaḥ . yathā—ʻkośadvandvamidaṃ dadhāti nalinī kādambacañcukṣatam iti . khaḍgapidhāne yathā—ʻunmuktakañcukateyamudārakāntiḥ śastrīva śambarariporapanītakośaḵ iti . khaḍgagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇam . pidhāyakamātre kośaśabdo vartate . yathā—garbhakośānnirgata iti . annamayādīnāṃ pañcānāmapi brahmasvarūpāvarakatvena kośaḥ prasiddhaḥ . arthaugho dhanasamūhaḥ, kṛtākṛtobhayarūpasuvarṇarajatasamudāyaḥ . yathā—ʻkośadaṇḍāviva kṣitiḵ iti kālidāsaḥ (raghu. 15. 13) . kośāgāramiti ca . divyaṃ śapatham . bruvate ca durgābhairavādyugradevatāsnānodakapānarūpam . yathā—tulāgnyāpo viṣaṃ kośo divyānīti . vipraṃ na pāyayet kośam ityādi . kūyate śabdyata iti kośaḥ . ʻku śabde . auṇādikaḥ śapratyayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻkośaḥ śiśne jātiphale tathā śabdārthasaṃgrahe iti . śiśne śephasi yathā—ʻkurvan karikarakrīḍāṃ śanaiḥ kośaṃ praveśayet iti ratirahasye . strīvyañjane'pi kośaśabdo yathā tatraiva—ʻstrīpuṃsayoḥ kośasāmye bhāvasāmyaṃ bhaved dhruvam iti prayogaḥ . atra manuṣyavargoktajātīkośaśabdasyaikadeśanyāyena kośaśabdo'pi jātīphale vartate . yathā—kośavāsitaṃ salilam iti . śabdā arthā vā ubhaye vā saṃgṛhyante'neneti śabdārthasaṃgraho granthaḥ . yathā—amarakośaḥ . abhidhānakośa ityādi . atra śabdārthasaṃgrahaśabdena pustakamapyucyata iti kecit . kośāntare tvayaṃ pāṭha iti likhanti vyākhyātāraḥ . ʻvaideśikeṣu kośeṣu pāṭhabhedān nirīkṣya tān iti . dakṣiṇāvartanāthastu kośavānācārya iti . ʻpeśī kośaḵ iti gatam (1, pṛ. 357) . tālavyopadho'yaṃ śabdaḥ . atra kecit—kośo'strītyādikam amarasiṃhīyaślokārdhaṃ samanantaramūrdhanyoṣmopadhavarge paṭhanti . vyākhyātṛbhiḥ kaiścit tatraiva vyākhyātam, ʻkuṣa niṣkarṣe ityasmād dhātornirbruvate ca . asmābhistu katipayaṭīkākārapaddhatyā nānāgranthadarśanena ca tālavyopadhatvena likhitamityalam .. 217-18 .. 
iti śāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.217-18>  
vaśā strī kariṇī ca syāt . strīśabdaḥ strīviśeṣavacanaḥ . vandhyā ca syāt . ʻvaśā kariṇyāṃ vandhyāyāṃ rāmāyāṃ duhitaryapi iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 235, ślo. 71) .. dṛgjñāne jñātari triṣu . triṣviti bāliśaśabdāntamadhikāraḥ .. syāt karkaśaḥ—amasṛṇāvapi . kaṭhoro nirdayaḥ . amasṛṇaḥ kharasparśaḥ .. prakāśo'tiprasiddhe'pi . ʻprakāśo'tiprasiddhe syāt sadṛśātapayoḥ sphuṭe iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 169, ślo. 20) .. śiśāvajñe ca bāliśaḥ . anuktam—
nāśaḥ kṣaye tirodhāne jīviteśaḥ priye yame .
kośo'strī kuḍmale khaḍgapidhāne'ryaughadivyayoḥ ..
nṛśaṃsakhaḍgau nistriṃśau pāśo bandhanaśastrayoḥ .
niveśaḥ syād vivāhe'pi nistriṃśo nirdaye'pi ca ..
apabhraṃśo'vapāte syājjīviteśo ravāvapi .
ṭīkāyāmapi cādarśaḥ sadṛśaṃ tūcite'pi ca ..
kleśo duḥkhe vyavasitau spṛhāsvādhīnayorvaśaḥ .
pallīpatau syāt piṅgāśaḥ piṅgāśaṃ jātyakāñcane .. 217-18 ..
iti śāntavargaḥ </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.221ab śukrale mūṣike śreṣṭhe sukṛte vṛṣabhe vṛṣaḥ .

AK.03.03.222ab nā dyūtāṅge karṣacakre vyavahāre kalidrume .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.221>  
mūṣikaśreṣṭhayo rāśau śukrale sukṛte tathā .
vṛṣo vṛṣabhapuṃsoḥ syāt siṃhīkaṇḍūrayorvṛṣā .. 483 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.221>  
śukrale—vṛṣabhe vṛṣaḥ . śukralaḥ retobahulaḥ . varṣatīti vṛṣaḥ . ʻvṛṣa secane . igupadhalakṣaṇaḥ kaḥ (3. 1. 135) śeṣe—
ʻvṛṣaḥ puṃsi ca rāśau nā kapikaccāṭarūṣayoḥ .

iti . vṛṣa iti rāśirmeṣānantaraḥ .
ʻvṛṣo dharme balīvarde śreṣṭhamūṣakarāśiṣu .
śukrale ca pumān strī tu kapikaccāṭarūṣayoḥ ..
iti rabhasaḥ .. dyūte'kṣe—ākarṣaḥ . ākṛṣyate śārikātreti ākarṣaḥ dyūtaḥ krīḍā dyūtaphalakaṃ ca . atrākarṣaśabdo dyūtakarmavācyaḥ śārikāpi . chandaḥ ākṛṣyata ityākarṣo'kṣaḥ pāśakaḥ . kārmukāderapyākarṣaṇamākarṣaḥ . ākṛṣṭirityarthaḥ .. athākṣamindriye—kalidrume . akṣṇoti viṣayamityakṣam indriyam . yathā—pratyakṣo ghaṭaḥ . pratyakṣa ātmā iti . tatra rūpabhedād napuṃsakam . arthāntareṣu puṃliṅgaḥ . dyūtāṅgaṃ pāśakākhyam . yathā—ʻdurakṣān dīvyatā rājñā rājyamātmā vayaṃ vadhūḵ iti bhāraviḥ (kirā. 11. 47) . karṣaḥ ṣoḍaśamāṣātmakaḥ . yathā—ʻte ṣoḍaśākṣaḥ karṣo'strī iti (1, pṛ. 605) . cakraṃ rathāṅgam . tena tadubhayasaṃbandhaṃ tiryagavasthāpitaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ lakṣyate . yathoktam—ʻakṣāgrakīlake tu dvayoraṇiḵ iti (1, pṛ. 518) . vyavahāre yathā—ʻprāḍvivākākṣadarśakaü iti (1, pṛ. 486) . kalidrumo vibhītakaḥ (1, pṛ. 249) . śeṣe—ʻakṣo vyāptāvātmani cö iti . ātmani yathā—etadadhyakṣasākṣikam iti .. 221 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.222cd karṣūrvārtā karīṣāgniḥ karṣūḥ kulyābhidhāyinī .. 222 ..
AK.03.03.223ab puṃbhāve tatkriyāyāṃ ca pauruṣaṃ viṣamapsu ca . 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.222>  
kulyāvṛttyoḥ karīṣāgnau karṣuśca samudāhṛtā .. 486 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.222>  
karṣūrvārtā—kulyābhidhāyinī . atra vārtāśabdena vṛttiviśeṣaḥ kṛṣirucyata iti svāmī (pṛ. 326) . subodhinīkārastu—ʻkarṣūrvaktā karīṣāgneḵ iti paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭa . karṣūśabdaḥ karīṣāgneḥ śuṣkagomayendhanavahneḥ vaktā vācakaḥ . vakteti viśeṣaṇarūpabhedāt puṃliṅgatvam iti . kulyāśabdenātra pretakarmaṇi kriyamāṇo garta ucyate . tadabhidhānaśīletyarthaḥ . tatrāpi viśeṣaṇavaśena karṣūśabdasya strīliṅgatvam . yathā—ʻtisraḥ karṣūḥ khātvȫ iti kalpasūtre prayogaḥ . tathā ca rabhasaḥ—ʻkarīṣāgnau pumān karṣūḥ kulyāyāṃ tu striyāṃ bhavet iti . karṣati samīpasthamiti karṣūḥ . kṛṣyate kuddālādineti ca . ʻkṛṣa vilekhane . ʻkṛṣicamitanidhanisarjikharjibhya ūḵ (u. 1. 84) iti auṇādika ūkārapratyayaḥ .. puṃbhāve tatkriyāyāṃ ca pauruṣam . puruṣasya bhāvaḥ karma vā pauruṣam . bhāve karmaṇi ca vartamāne ʻprāṇabhṛjjātivayovacanodgātrādimyo'ñ (5. 1. 129) iti prāṇabhṛjjātiviśeṣavacanāt puruṣaśabdād añpratyayaḥ . śeṣe—ʻpuṃstejasi ca pauruṣam iti . puruṣasya tejasi prabhāve ityarthaḥ . ūrdhvavistṛtadoḥpāṇibhāgasya puruṣasya pramāṇe gatam (1, pṛ. 417) .. viṣamapsu ca . apsu jale caśabdād garale prāguktam (1, pṛ. 151) . yathā—ʻtayā mama viyogo'dya viṣaṃ muñcanti vāridāḵ ityabhinandaḥ .. 222 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.222>  
karṣūrvārtā—kulyābhidhāyinī . vārtākarīṣāgnyoḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . vārtā nāma vṛttiḥ . kulyāyāṃ strīliṅgaḥ . kulyā nāma nadī .. puṃbhāve tatkriyāyāṃ ca pauruṣam . puruṣatejasyapi syāt . ʻpauruṣaṃ puruṣasyoktaṃ bhāve karmaṇi tejasi iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 172, ślo. 17) .. viṣamapsu ca . garale'pi syāt .. 222 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

upadāne'pyāmiṣaṃ syāt . ʻupāccārapradānandā hāro grāhyopāyane'pi ityabhidhānacintāmaṇau . upaśabdād uttareṣāṃ cāradānādiśabdānāṃ paryāyatvābhidhānād ihopadānaśabdena upāyanamucyate; upādāna iti dvitīyākṣaradīrgho'papāṭhaḥ . śeṣe—
ʻāmiṣaṃ sundarāradrurūpādiviṣaye bhavet .
saṃbhogalobhayormāṃse ..
iti . sundaraviṣaye yathā—ʻādāsyamānaḥ pramadāmiṣaṃ tat iti raghuvaṃśe (7. 31) .. aparādhe'pi kilbiṣam . vāgdaṇḍapāruṣyarājājñollaṅghanādikamaparādhaḥ . śeṣe—ʻkilbiṣaṃ durite ruji iti . rug rogaḥ .. syād vṛṣṭau—varṣamastriyām . lokasya dhātrī, dhārayitrī bhūmiḥ . anye tu—dadhāteḥ ʻsitanigami . . . ityādinā (u. 1. 72) tunpratyayāntaṃ kṛtvā lokadhātvaṃśa iti paṭhitvā lokadhātuśabdenāpi bhūmirevābhidheya ityāhuḥ . tasyā aṃśo bhūmyekadeśasya jambūdvīpasyaiko bhāgaḥ . vatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ . vṛṣyate sicyata iti varṣam . ʻvṛṣu secane (vā. 3. 3. 56) . śeṣe—ʻvarṣaṃ klaibye pumān meghe iti . klaibye yathā—varṣadhara iti . varṣatīti pacādyaci (3. 1. 134) varṣo meghaḥ . ʻpuṃnapuṃsakayorvarṣaṃ jambūdvīpābdavṛṣṭiṣü iti rudraśca .. prekṣā nṛttekṣaṇaprajñāḥ . nṛttādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ dvandvaḥ . nṛttaṃ prekṣaṇakasaṃjñayā prasiddham . īkṣaṇaṃ nayanavyāpāraḥ . kecittu—nṛttasyekṣaṇamiti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣamāśritya bhinnaṃ padamāhuḥ prekṣā kautukamiti . prajñā śīghragrāhiṇī buddhiḥ . prajñā yathā—prekṣāvanta iti . prapūrvād īkṣateḥ ʻgurośca halaḵ (3. 3. 103) ityakārapratyaye bhāve karmaṇi ca prekṣā .. bhikṣā sevārthanā bhṛtiḥ . arthanā yācñā . bhṛtirvetanam . śeṣe—ʻbhikṣā bhikṣitavastuni iti . yathā—bhikṣāṃ dehīti . ʻbhikṣa yācñāyām iti dhātoḥ pūrvavad akārapratyayaḥ .. 223-4 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.223-24>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.225>  
śobhādīptyorgiri rave vyavasāye tviḍucyate .. 491 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.225>  
tviṭ śobhāpi . śobhā kāntiḥ . yathā—campakatviḍiyamiti . apiśabdād dīptirapi . yathā—sahasratviḍiti . tveṣate'nayeti tviṭ . ʻtviṣa dīptaü . kvip (vā. 3. 3. 94) . śeṣe—ʻtviḍ dīptau vyavasāye ca jigīṣāyāṃ giri dhvanaü iti .. triṣu pare . pare vakṣyamāṇāḥ nyakṣādayastrayaḥ śabdā vācyaliṅgā ityarthaḥ .. nyakṣaṃ kārtsnyanikṛṣṭayoḥ . kārtsnyaśabdasya dharmavacanatvenārthanirdeśe'pi pūrvavākye nyakṣaśabdasyāpi vācyaliṅgatvavidhānāt kṛtsnarūpe dharmiṇyeva paryavasānam . yathā ʻkārmastācchīlye (6. 4. 172) ityādiṣu . niyatamakṣamindriyasaṃyogo'sminniti nyakṣaṃ kṛtsnam . niṣiddhamakṣamindriyavyāpāro'neneti nyakṣaḥ nikṛṣṭaḥ, adhama ityarthaḥ . śeṣe—ʻnyakṣaḥ paraśurāme syātö iti .. pratyakṣe'dhikṛte'dhyakṣaḥ . adhigato'kṣairindriyairiti adhyakṣaḥ . pratyakṣo ghaṭādiḥ . adhyakṣṇoti vyāpnotīti adhyakṣo'dhikṛtaḥ grāmādiṣu niyuktaḥ .. rūkṣastvapremṇyacikkaṇe . premarahite yathā—rūkṣavṛttiḥ prajākṣayam iti . acikkaṇe mārdavarahite yathā —rūkṣasparśa iti . ʻrūkṣa pāruṣye iti caurādikād dhātoḥ pacādyaci (3. 1. 134) rūkṣaḥ . śeṣe—ʻrūkṣaḥ syāt pādapāntare iti ..
iha mūrdhanyoṣmopadhavargamadhye ʻkoṣo'strī kuḍmale khaḍgapidhāne'rthaughadivyayoḵ (ślo. 215) iti ślokārdha paṭhitvā kṣīrasvāmisubodhinīkārābhyāṃ vyākhyātam . pustakeṣvapi keṣucidihaiva likhitam . ato mūrdhanyopadhaḥ koṣaśabdo'pyastīti vijñeyam . asmābhistu tālavyopadhavargamadhye vyākhyātam .. 225 .. 
iti ṣāntavargaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.225>  
tviṭ śobhāpi . ʻtviṭ strī śobhārujorvāci iti rudraḥ .. triṣu pare—nikṛṣṭayoḥ . triṣu pare ityadhikāraḥ . kārtsnyaśabdaḥ kṛtsnavacanaḥ .. pratyakṣe'dhikṛte'dhyakṣaḥ . pramāṇaṃ ca prameyaṃ ca pratyakṣam .. rūkṣastvapremṇyacikkaṇe . acikkaṇaṃ karkaśasparśaḥ .. anuktam —

AK.03.03.226ab raviśvetacchadau haṃsau sūryavahnī vibhāvasū .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.226>  
ravau śvetacchade viṣṇau haye'matsarayoginoḥ .. 493 ..

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.226>  
raviśvetacchadau haṃsau . śvetacchado haṃsanāmnaiva prasiddhaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaḥ . śeṣe—
ʻhaṃso nirlobhanṛpatau śārīramarudantare .
hayabhede yogibhede mantrabhede ca matsare ..
paramātmani viṣṇau ca śreṣṭhe rājādipūrvakaḥ ..
iti . hayabhedaḥ sarvaśubhrāśvaḥ . yogibhedo haṃsākhyaḥ saṃnyāsiviśeṣaḥ . śārīravāyuviśeṣe yathā—ʻhaṃsaṃ tanau saṃnihitaṃ carantam iti naiṣadhakāvye (3. 4) . śreṣṭhe yathā—rājahaṃsaḥ, kavihaṃsaḥ ityādi .. sūryavahnī vibhāvasū . vibhā prabhaiva vasu dhanaṃ yayostau vibhāvasū . śeṣe—ʻvibhāvasurhārabhede iti .. vatsau tarṇakavarṣau dvau . acirajātagaustarṇakaḥ . varṣaḥ saṃvatsara iti subodhinī . tarṇakaputrau iti paṭhitvā putrastanaya iti kecidāhuḥ . ʻvasa nivāse ityasmādauṇādikaḥ sapratyayaḥ (u. 3. 62) . ʻsaḥ syārdhadhātuke (7. 4. 49) iti sakārasya takāraḥ . ʻuro vatsam (1, pṛ. 411) iti vakṣasi klībaṃ gatam .. 226 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.226>  
raviśvetacchadau haṃsau . ravaḥ prāṇisvanaḥ . ʻprāṇisvane tvārāva āravaḥ . ravaḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 31, ślo. 3-4) . ravayogād ravī jīvo'pi syāt .. sūryavahnī—tarṇakavarṣau dvau . putrādirapi syāt . ʻvatsastarṇakaputrādivarṣe iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 174, ślo. 6) .. sāraṅgāśca divaukasaḥ . devā api syuḥ . bahutvamavivakṣitam . ʻdivaukāścātake sure iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 17', ślo. 54) .. 226 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.227ab śṛṅgārādau viṣe vīrye guṇe rāge drave rasaḥ .
AK.03.03.227cd puṃsyuttaṃsāvataṃsau dvau karṇapūre ca śekhare .. 227 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.227>  
ādye dhātau viṣe vīrye pārade jalarāgayoḥ .. 496 ..
drave guṇe ca tiktādau śṛṅgārādau rasaḥ smṛtaḥ .
ghoṇṭābhuvoḥ kaṅgujihvāsallakīṣu rasā bhavet .. 497 ..
rasyata iti rasaḥ . ʻrasa āsvādane ..
syātāmuttaṃsāvataṃsau karṇapūre ca śekhare .
uttaṃsyate'nenottaṃsaḥ . avataṃsaśca . ʻtasi alaṃkaraṇe .. 227 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.227>  
śṛṅgārādau—drave rasaḥ . ādiśabdena vīrakaruṇa ityādinoktāḥ (1, pṛ. 131) rasāḥ nāṭyavargoktā vivakṣitāḥ . viṣaṃ garalaṃ jalaṃ ca . viṣe garale yathā—ʻrasaṃ dāsyāmi iti murārināṭake śūrpaṇakhāvākyam . jale yathā—ʻsahasraguṇamutsraṣṭumādatte hi rasaṃ raviḵ iti raghuvaṃśe (1. 18) . ʻjale śarīradhātau ca tiktādau pārade rasaḵ iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 36, ślo. 1002) . vīrye yathā—ʻviddhi cāttarasamojasā hareraiśvaraṃ dhanurabhāji yattvayȫ iti raghuvaṃśe (11. 76) . kṣīrādatirasaṃ sarpiḥ iti ca . guṇe mādhuryādau yathā—ʻrasāḥ kaṭvamlalavaṇatiktoṣṇakaṣāyakāḵ iti . rāge'nurāge yathā—rasārdracittaḥ iti . drave yathā—ʻkṣīre trirātraṃ svarase trirātram iti . rasyate āsvādyata iti rasaḥ . ʻrasa āsvādane curādāvadantaḥ . śeṣe—ʻrasaḥ śarīradhātau ca raso brahmaṇi pārade iti . śarīradhātau yathā—ʻvasāsṛṅmāṃsamedo'sthimajjāśuklāni dhātavaḵ iti (vāgbhaṭa. 1. 8) . brahmaṇi yathā—ʻraso vai saḥ rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati iti (tai. u. 2. 7. 1) . pārade yathā—rasavāda iti . bhuvi pāṭhāyāṃ sallakyāṃ raseti strīliṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ (1. pṛ. 185, 265, 288) . puṃsyuttaṃsāvataṃse vā karṇapūre ca śekhare . karṇapūraḥ karṇabhūṣaṇam . śekharaḥ śirobhūṣaṇam . uttaṃsyate bhūṣyate karṇaḥ śiro vā aneneti uttaṃsaḥ . upasargabhedād avataṃsaṃ ca . tasiḥ bhūṣārtho dhāturdurgācāryeṇa paṭhita iti subodhinīkāraḥ . dvandvāntarūpabhedādubhayornapuṃsakatvam . ʻpuṃsi vȫ ityuktyā vikalpena puṃliṅgatvaṃ ca . ʻvaṣṭi bhāguriḥ . . . ityādinā (kaumudī 2. 4. 82) akāralope vataṃso'pi .. 227 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.227>  
śṛṅgārādau—drave rasaḥ . viṣaṃ garalaṃ jalaṃ ca syāt . vīryaṃ valam . dehadhāturapi syāt . ʻjale śarīradhātau pāradasvarṇayo rasaḵ iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 36, ślo. 1002) . dravaḥ parīhāsaḥ . niryāso'pi syāt . ʻniryāse'mṛtaśabdayoḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 218, ślo. 49) .. puṃsyuttaṃsāvataṃsau—śekhare . vataṃso'pyetatprakāra eva . ʻvataṃsottaṃsāvataṃsāḥ karṇapūre'pi śekhare iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 270, ślo. 59) .. 227 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.228ab devabhede'nale raśmau vasū ratne dhane vasu .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.228>  
agnau mayūkhe dhanade deve yoktre vasuḥ pumān .. 498 ..

āśāste'nayetyāśīḥ . ʻśāsu icchāyām, ʻśasu hiṃsāyām, ʻśaṃsu stutaü .. 228 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.228>  
devabhede'nale—dhane vasu . aṣṭau vasava iti gaṇadevatāviśeṣāḥ prasiddhāḥ (1, pṛ. 9) . anale'gnau yathā—ʻvasuragnirvasuśravāḵ iti (ṛgvedaḥ 5. 24. 2) raśmiḥ kiraṇaḥ . punarapi vasugrahaṇaṃ ratnadhanayorvartamānasya vasuśabdasya rūpabhedena napuṃsakatvajñāpanārtham . kiraṇe dhane ca yathā—ʻnirakāsayadravimapetavasuṃ viyadālayādaparadiggaṇikȫ iti māghakāvya (śiśu. 9. 10) . ratne yathā—ʻvāmaṃ vasu vivadamāno gṛhān iti . svocitasthāne vasatīti vasu . ʻvasa nivāse .. viṣṇau ca vedhāḥ . ʻvidha vidhāne ityasmād asun pratyaye vedhāḥ . śeṣe—ʻvedhā vidhau budhe viṣṇaü iti . budhaḥ paṇḍita ityarthaḥ . caturmukhe prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 14) .. strī tvāśīrhitāśaṃsāhidaṃṣṭrayoḥ . hitasya putrapaśvāderāśaṃsā, ʻprajāvān bhūyāsam, paśumān bhūyāsaṃ ityādirūpeṇa prārthanā . aheḥ sarpasya daṃṣṭrāyāṃ yathā—āśīviṣa iti . āśāsanamāśīḥ . ʻāṅaḥ śāsu icchāyām . saṃpadāditvāt kvip (vā. 3. 3. 94) . dhātūnāmanekārthatvāt pūrvasmādeva dhātohiṃsārthāt kartari kvipi āśīḥ sarpadaṃṣṭrā . ʻśāsa idaṅhaloḵ (6. 4. 34) ityatra ʻkvippratyaye tu tasyāpi bhavatīti vaktavyam (vā. 6. 4. 34) iti āśāserapi upadhāyā itvam .. 228 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.228>  
devabhede'nale—dhane vasu . kiraṇaśca pragrahaśca raśmiśabdārthaḥ . ʻvasuryoktrāgniśuṣmeṣu devabhedamayūkhayoḵ iti jayakośaḥ .. viṣṇau ca vedhāḥ . ʻvedhā vidhau budhe viṣṇaü iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (pṛ. 176, ślo. 27) .. strī tvāśīḥ—daṃṣṭrayoḥ . āśīti ahidaṃṣṭrāyāmīkārānto'pi syāt .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.229>  
lālase prārthanautsukye . prārthanā vāñchā . autsukyamiṣṭārthodyogaḥ . śeṣe—ʻlālasā tvaklībe tṛṣṇātirecane iti . aklībe dvayorliṅgayorityarthaḥ . bhṛśaṃ lasati viṣayeṣu śliṣyatyanayā puruṣa iti lālasā . ʻlasa śleṣakrīḍanayoḵ . kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅpratyayaḥ (3. 1. 22) . ʻsanyaṅo (6. 1. 9) iti dvirvacanam . yaṅantād ʻa pratyayāt (3. 3. 102) iti striyāmakārapratyayaḥ . puṃliṅgapakṣe ʻakartari ca kārake saṃjñāyām (3. 3. 19) iti karaṇe ghañpratyayaḥ . ʻyaṅo'ci cö (2. 4. 74) ityubhayatra yaṅo luk . ʻtṛṣṇātireke vāñchāyāmautsukye lālasā dvayoḵ iti rabhasaḥ .. hiṃsā cauryādikarma ca . paradravyaharaṇaṃ cauryam . ādiśabdena bandhanatāḍanādikaṃ gṛhyate . caśabdād vadho'pi . ʻhisi hiṃsāyām ityasmādakārapratyayaḥ (3. 3. 103) .. prasūraśvāpi . aśvā baḍavā . jananyāṃ prāguktā (1, pṛ. 377) . latāyāmapi prasūśabda ityāhuḥ .. bhūdyāvau—rodasī ca te . bhūśca dyauśca bhūdyāvau pṛthivyantarikṣe dve api sakṛduccaritena ṅībantatvena dvivacanāntena rodasīśabdena, sakārāntena ca napuṃsakaliṅgena dvivacanāntarodaḥśabdena vā abhidhīyate . yathā—ʻhotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyoḵ iti (ṛgveda. 4. 3. 1) . tathā—ʻvedānteṣu yamāhurekapuruṣaṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ rodasī iti vikramorvaśīye (1. 1) . antargataṃ sarvaṃ vastu rundhāte āvṛṇvāte iti rodasī . ʻrudhir āvaraṇe . auṇādiko'sun pratyayaḥ (u. 4. 189) . bahulagrahaṇād dhātugatadhakārasya dakāraḥ . rūpabhedādeva napuṃsakatvam . strītvavivakṣāyām ʻugitaścö (4. 1. 6) iti ṅīpi rodasyau . gaṇaratnamahodadhau tu ʻbhūrbhuvorvācakaṃ rodasītyavyayam (pṛ. 35) ityavyayagaṇe'bhihitam .. 229 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.231ab tejaḥpurīṣayorvarco mahastūtsavatejasoḥ .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.231>  
tejaḥpurīṣayorvarcaḥ . varcyata iti varcaḥ . ʻvarca dīptaü . vṛjyate tyajyata iti varcaḥ purīṣam . ʻvṛjī varjane . auṇādiko'sun pratyayaḥ (u. 4. 189) . bāhulako jakārasya cakāraḥ . śeṣe—ʻvarcastu rūpavadvarcaḵ iti . rūpa iva tejaḥpurīṣayorapi varcaḥśabdo vartata ityarthaḥ .. mahaścotsavatejasoḥ . mahyate pūjyate saṃbandhijano'treti mahaḥ . ʻmaha pūjāyām . ʻmahāmahonīlaśilārucaḥ puraḵ iti māghakāvye (śiśu. 1. 16) sakārāntaprayogaḥ . utsavavacane tvakārānto nāṭyavarge kathitaḥ (1, pṛ. 144) . tatrāpi sakārāntakathane ʻmaha uddhava utsavaḵ ityatra liṅgasaṃkaradoṣaḥ prasajyeta . atastatrākārāntatvaṃ sakārāntatvaṃ cetyutsavavācakasya mahaḥśabdasyobhayamaṅgīkaraṇīyam . ʻna khalu dūragato'pyati vartate mahamasāviti bandhutayoditaiḵ iti māghakāvye (śiśu. 6. 19) akārāntasya mahaśabdasya prayogaśca . ʻsa rāśirāsīnmahasāṃ mahojjvalaḵ ityubhayatrāpi naiṣadhakāvye (1. 1) . iha tu prakaraṇapāṭhasāmarthyāt sakārāntatvamastītyavagamyate .. rajo guṇe ca strīpuṣpe . ʻguṇāḥ sattvaṃ rajastamaḵ ityukto guṇaḥ (1, pṛ. 90) . striyāḥ puṣpamārtavam . pratimāsaṃ jāyamānamiti yāvat . ca śabdāt pāṃsau ca prāguktam (1, pṛ. 542) .. rāhau dhvānte guṇe tamaḥ . guṇaḥ tadviśeṣaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 90) . śeṣe—ʻtamaḥ śoke iti . ʻklībaṃ tamoguṇe śoke saiṃhikeyāndhakārayoḵ iti rabhasaśca . rāhau—ʻtamastu. rāhuḥ svarbhānuḵ iti (1, pṛ. 67) . ʻsvarbhānuśca tamo rāhuḥ saiṃhikeyo vidhuṃtudaḵ ityamaramālāyāṃ puṃskāṇḍe kathitamiti subhūticandraḥ .. 231 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.232ab chandaḥ padye'bhilāṣe ca tapaḥ kṛcchrādikarma ca .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.232>  
chandaḥ padye'bhilāṣe ca . padye padyagatākṣarasaṃniveśaviśeṣe gāyatrītriṣṭubādipadābhilapye . abhilāṣe'kārānto'pyasti . tathā ca śabdabhedaprakāśe—ʻchando'bhilāṣe chandaḥ syādutsave ca maho mahaḵ iti . cakārād vede ca . yathā—śrotriyaḥ chando'dhīte iti .. tapaḥ kṛcchrādikarma ca . kṛcchraṃ sāṃtapanādikam . ādiśabdena japopavāsādikaṃ gṛhyate . śeṣe—ʻtapo loke dharmamātre kleśe śiśiramāghayoḵ iti . loke—tapoloke . dharmamātre—dānādhyayanādau . kleśe yathā—kiṃ karotu tapasvī . śocyata ityarthaḥ .. saho balaṃ sahā mārgaḥ . balaṃ sāmarthyam . mārgo māsaviśeṣaḥ . tatra rūpabhedāt puṃliṅgaḥ . śeṣe—ʻsaho jyotiṣi hemante nā hāsavati vācyavat iti . hemante ca viśeṣavidhānāt puṃliṅgaḥ . hāsayukte tu triliṅgaḥ . tatra hasanaṃ has, bhāve kvip . hasā saha vartata iti sahaḥ . strīpuṃsayorapyevameva, dīrghaprāpterabhāvāt .. nabhaḥ khaṃ śrāvaṇe nabhāḥ . khamākāśam . dviḥ padopādānamarthaviśeṣeṇa liṅgabhedanapratyayanārtham . śeṣe—
ʻnabhaḥ klībaṃ jaladhare nā tu ghrāṇe patadgrahe .
mṛṇālasūtre varṣāsu ..
iti . viśvaprakāśe ca—
ʻnabho vyomni nabhā meghe nabhāḥ puṃsi patadgrahe .
ghrāṇe mṛṇālasūtre ca varṣāsu śrāvaṇe'pi ca ..
iti (pṛ. 177, ślo. 37) .. 232 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.232>

okaḥ sadmāśrayaścaukāḥ . sadma gṛham . āśrayo vṛkṣādisthānamātram . ucyanti saṃbhūya tiṣṭhantyatreti okaḥ . ʻuca samavāye daivādikaḥ . ʻoka ucaḥ ke (7. 3. 64) ityasun pratyayaḥ cakārasya kakārādeśaśca . ucyaterasun pratyaye uṇādiṣu bahulagrahaṇāt kutvamiti kāśikā (2, pṛ. 343) . dviḥ padāvṛttiḥ pādapūraṇārthā . śeṣe—ʻsyādokaḥ puṃsyadantakaḵ iti . akārāntasya prasaṅgāduktiḥ .. payaḥ kṣīraṃ payo'mbu ca . atrāpi pādapūraṇārthaṃ dviḥ padapāṭhaḥ .. ojo dīptau bale . dīptiḥ prakāśaḥ . balaṃ sāmarthyam . ubjati vyaktībhavatīti ojaḥ . ʻubja ārjave . ārjavaṃ spaṣṭateti dhātuvṛttau . ʻubjerbale balopaścö (u. 4. 193) iti bale'bhidheye'sun pratyayaḥ . dhātorbakārasya ca lopaḥ . sūtre balagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvād arthāntare'pi dhātorasun pratyaye bakāralopaśca bhavatyeva . laghūpadhaguṇaḥ (7. 3. 86) . ʻojarkṣe puruṣāṃśake ityakārāntatvena jātakagranthe prayuktaḥ . ojaḥśabdo viśeṣasaṃkhyāvācitvena jyautiṣakaiḥ paribhāṣita iti neha tasyopayogaḥ .. srota indriye nimnagāraye . indriyam indriyasthānagataṃ dvāram . yathā—ʻsrotobhistridaśagajā madaṃ kṣarantaḵ iti bhāraviḥ (kirā. 7. 8) . rayaśabdenātra pravāho lakṣyate . yathā—trisrotā iti . sravatīti srotaḥ . ʻsrurībhyāṃ tuṭ cö (u. 4. 203) ityasun, tasya ca tuḍāgamaḥ .. 233 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

tejaḥ prabhāve dīptau ca bale śukre'pi . prabhāvaḥ pratāpaḥ . durādharṣatvamityarthaḥ . taduktam—
ʻadhikṣepāvamānādeḥ prayuktasya pareṇa yat .
prāṇātyaye'pyasahanaṃ tattejaḥ samudāhṛtam ..
iti . dīptiḥ prakāśaḥ . balaṃ sāmarthyam . śukraṃ caramadhātuḥ . tejayati tanūkaroti śātravādikamiti tejaḥ . ʻtija niśātane . niśātanaṃ tanūkaraṇam . asun pratyayaḥ (u. 4. 189) .. atastriṣu . itaḥ paraṃ sāntavargasamāptiparyantāḥ śabdāḥ vācyaliṅgā ityarthaḥ .. vidvān vidaṃśca . yo vidn jñeyopādeyavivekavān sa vidvānucyate . ʻvida jñāne iti dhātoḥ lādeśasya śatṛpratyayasya ʻvideḥ śaturvasuḵ (7. 1. 36) iti vasvādeśe sati ʻugidacāṃ sarvanāmasthāne'dhātoḵ (7. 1. 70) iti numāgame ʻsāntamahataḥ saṃyogasyö (6. 4. 10) iti dīrghe saṃyogāntalope ca (8. 2. 23) vidvāniti rūpam . prajñādigaṇe (5. 4. 38) vidanniti śatrantaḥ paṭhyate . ata eva jñāpakād ʻvideḥ śaturvasuḵ iti vasvādeśasya pākṣikatvādiha granthakāreṇa vidanniti śatrantanirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ . athavā—ʻtuhyostāṅṅāśiṣyanyatarasyām (7. 1. 35) ityanuvartate . tathā ca kāśikākāraḥ—ʻkecidanyatarasyāṃ grahaṇamanuvartayanti . tena vidantau vidantaḥ iti siddhaṃ bhavati iti (2, pṛ. 280) . śeṣe—ʻvidvānātmavidi prājñe paṇḍite cābhidheyavat iti . prājño gambhīrārthāvadhāraṇakṣamaḥ .. bībhatso hiṃsre'pi . hiṃsro ghātukaḥ . ʻbadha bandhane iti dhātoḥ ʻmānbadhadānśānbhyo dīrghaścābhyāsasyö (3. 1. 6) iti sūtre badhervairūpya iti vaktavyāt vairūpyārthe sanpratyaye tadantāddhātoḥ ʻapratyayāt (3. 3. 102) ityakārapratyaye strīliṅgād bībhatsāśabdād arśaādyaci (5. 2. 127) bībhatsaḥ . śeṣe—ʻpārtho ghṛṇāvān bībhatsaḵ iti . pārtho'rjunaḥ . ghṛṇāvān jugupsita ityarthaḥ . rase puṃliṅgaḥ . tadvati triliṅgaśceti prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 101) .. atiśaye tvamī . amī vakṣyamāṇāḥ īyasun pratyayāntā jyāyaḥprabhṛtayaścatvāraḥ śabdā vṛddhādīnāṃ bāḍhaparyantānāmatiśayārthe vartante .. 234 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.234>  
tejaḥ prabhāve—bale śukle'pi . balaṃ parākramaḥ . śuklaṃ retaḥ .. atha triṣu vidvān vidaṃśca . paṇḍito'pi syāt . adhikārāt triliṅgaḥ . viduṣī sabhā . vidvatsadaḥ .. bībhatso hiṃsre'pi . jugupsite'pi syāt .. atiśaye tvamī .. 234 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.236ab dale'pi barhaṃ nirbandhoparāgārkādayo grahāḥ .

parivāre pumān ..
iti . prādhānyādiṣu puṃliṅga ityarthaḥ . ʻbṛha vṛddhaü iti dhātoḥ pacādyaci (3. 1. 134) barham .. nirbandhoparāgārkādayo grahāḥ . nirbandha āgrahaḥ . uparāgo rāhuṇā candrasūryayorgrahaṇam . ādiśabdena sūryādayo nava grahāḥ . ʻgrahavṛdṛniścigamaścö (3. 3. 58) iti bhāve appratyayaḥ . gṛhṇantīti grahāḥ sūryādayaḥ . ʻvibhāṣā grahaḵ (3. 1. 143) iti pakṣe pacādyac . śeṣe—ʻyuddhagrahaṇānugraheṣu tu . pūtanādau grahaḵ iti . atra yuddhaśabdena yuddhodyogo vivakṣitaḥ . tathā viśvaprakāśe—
ʻgraho'nugrahanirbandhagrahaṇeṣu raṇodyame .
sūryādau pūtanādau ca saiṃhikeyoparāgayoḥ ..
iti (pṛ. 179, ślo. 2) .. dvāryāpīḍe—nāgadantake . dvāraṃ gṛhādau nirgamapraveśārthaṃ vikalpitaṃ kavāṭasthānavivaram . ʻāpīḍaśabdena kuḍyād bahirnirgataṃ dāru kathyate iti kṣīrasvāmisubodhinīkārau . taduktaṃ viśvakarmaṇā—
ʻsthūṇā tulāgrayorlagnaṃ dviprāntaṃ tiryagunnatam .
āpīḍa ucyate dāru svordhvasyāpīḍadhāraṇāt ..
iti . apare tu—svasaṃbandhaṃ puruṣamāpīḍayati sthāpayatīti vyutpattyā mattavāraṇamāpīḍaśabdāthamāhuḥ . tathā ca vaijayantyām—ʻkūṭāgāraṃ tu valabhī niryūho mattavāraṇam iti (pṛ. 161, ślo. 31) . subhūticandrastu—āpīḍaḥ śekhara iti vyākhyāya tatra rudrābhidhānasaṃvādamāha—ʻniryāse śekhare dvāri niryūho nāgadantake iti . kvātharasaḥ puṣparasaḥ . nāgadantakalakṣaṇamuktaṃ vāstuśāstre—
ʻdvāraprāntadvaye khātaṃ nāsāyā īṣadunnatam
dāru sragavalambārthaṃ nāgadantaka ucyate ..
iti . dvārabandhasyoparisthitaṃ dāru nāsā . prāntadvayavartitvena nāgadantasādṛśyād nāgadantakaḥ . ʻnāgadanto dviparade gṛhanirgatadāruṇi iti viśvaprakāśaśca (pṛ. 72, ślo. 199) . niryāntyaneneti vā, svayaṃ niryātīti vā niryūhaḥ . yoterūhapratyayaḥ .. 236 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.238ab dāreṣu ca gṛhāḥ śroṇyāmapyāroho varastriyāḥ .

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.238>  
dāreṣu ca gṛhāḥ . bhartrādidattaṃ gṛhṇantīti gṛhāḥ . puṃliṅgo bahuvacanāntaścāyaṃ gṛhaśabdaḥ . caśabdād veśmani ca . ʻgehe kaḵ (3. 1. 144) iti sūtre gehaśabdasya veśmābhidheyatvam, tātsthyāt lakṣaṇayā patnī cābhidheyabhūtā . evamarthadvaye'pyabhidheye kartari grahadhātoḥ kapratyaye ʻgrahijyā . . .  ityādinā (6. 1. 16) saṃprasāraṇe gṛhamiti .. śroṇyāmapyāroho varastriyāḥ . śeṣe—

ārohaṇe drāghimani māne'pyāroha iṣyate ..

(3. 1. 134) .. 
iti hāntavargaḥ 
atra nānārthavargaparisamāptiṃ dyotayituṃ vargāntare vakṣyamāṇamupakṣipati—avyayāḥ pare iti . anantaramavibhaktikalakṣaṇā avyayā eva kathayiṣyanta ityarthaḥ . iha kecidāhuḥ—vakṣyamāṇānām āṅīṣadādīnāmapyanekārthatvād ʻviśeṣyanighnaiḥ saṃkīrṇaiḵ (3. 1. 1) ityādyuddeśaślokagatānāṃ nānārthaśabdenodāharaṇam . vargasamāptistu ʻhi hetāvavadhāraṇe (ślo. 257) ityantanānārthāvyayanirūpaṇānantarabhāvīti . avyayavargastu ʻcirāya cirarātrāyö ityādika iti ca . apare tu—teṣāmapyavibhaktikatvād avyayapadenaivopasaṃgrahaṇād āṅīṣadartha . . . ityādiko'vyayavarga ityāhuḥ . teṣāmanekārthatvaṃ kāṇḍaprathamaślokoktasya vargāṇāṃ vargasaṃśrayatvasyaiva nirvāhakamiti . avyayavarge dvāvapyavāntaravargau nānārthavargaḥ paryāyavargaśca ityupapatteḥ . na ca viśeṣyanighnatvaṃ saṃkīrṇavargavad avāntaravargāśrayatvaṃ mā bhūditi vācyam . sati saṃbhave tu parityāgānupapatteḥ . tayorapi vargayorācāryoktaṃ vargasaṃśrayatvaṃ prāgeva samarthitam . kiṃ ca nānārthavargādāvācāryeṇa pratijñātam iha kecidanekārthāḥ kāntādivargeṣveva vivakṣyante . bhūriprayogāstu paryāyakāṇḍe kāntādiṣu ceti . na cāṅādayaḥ paryāyakāṇḍagatāḥ . na hi kāntādivargeṣu kroḍīkṛtya paṭhitāḥ . ato nānārthavargasamāptiratraiva . avyayavargastu āṅīṣadarthaṃ (ślo. 239) ityādiriti sarvaṃ kalyāṇam .. 238 ..
vyācaṣṭāmarasiṃhokte nāmaliṅgānuśāsane .
bommagaṇṭyappayācāryo vargaṃ nānārthagumphitam ..
iha yattyaktamajñānādālasyādyadupekṣitam .
pramādādanyathoktaṃ yat tad vidvadbhirviśodhyatām ..
