AK.03.03.239cd āṅīṣadarthe 'bhivyāptau sīmārthe dhātuyogaje .. 239 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.239>  
avyayāḥ pare . pare vakṣyamāṇāḥ śabdā āliṅgasaṃgrahavargāntamavyayāḥ . aliṅgā ityarthaḥ .. ataḥ paramavyayanānārthavargamupakramate—āṅīṣadarthe—dhātuyogaja iti . vartate iti śeṣaḥ . atrodāharaṇāni . īṣadarthe yathā—ʻāpāṇḍarībhūtamukhacchavīnām iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 33) . abhivyāptau yathā—ākumāraṃ yaśaḥ . kumārā api yaśo jānantītyarthaḥ . sīmni yathā—ʻāsamudrakṣitīśānām (raghu. 1. 5) . dhātuyogaje yathā—ādatte . āharati . ākrāmati . āyātītyādi .. 239 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.239>  
āṅīṣadarthe—dhātuyogaje . uddeśakramānurodhena pūrvavargānta evopakṣiptānavyayānāha—āṅityasya gaṇagatatvena ʻupadeśe'janunāsika it (1. 3. 2) iti ṅakārasyetsaṃjñālope sati prayogakāle tasyābhāva eva . īṣadartho'lpārthaḥ . yathā—ā uṣṇamiti vigrahe ʻnityaṃ kugatiprādayaḵ (2. 2. 18) iti samāse sati oṣṇaṃ, kiṃciduṣṇamityarthaḥ . ālavaṇam . ʻāpāṇḍarībhūtamukhacchavīnām (ku. saṃ. 3. 33) iti ca . anyena yukto vidhiḥ abhividhiḥ . yathā—ʻākumāraṃ yaśaḥ pāṇineḵ (ma. bhāṣya. 1. 4. 89), bālā api pāṇineryaśo jānantītyarthaḥ . ʻājanmaśuddhānām (raghu. 1. 5) iti ca . sīmni maryādāyām . yathā—ʻodakāntaṃ priyaṃ pānthamanuvrajet, deśāntaraṃ prati gacchantaṃ priyaṃ sajalajalāśayadarśanāntamanuvrajedityarthaḥ . ʻpañcamyapāṅparibhiḵ (2. 3. 10) iti pañcamī dhātuyogaje'rthe iti anekārthe satyapi anabhivyaktārthā eva dhātavaḥ āṅādyupasargavaśādarthaviśeṣe vartante . ato dhātvarthadyotakatvena upasargāṇāmapi tadarthatvamucyate . āṅityasya īṣadādyarthatrayābhidhāyakatvaṃ, dhātuyogajārthasya tu dyotakatvamiti vivekaḥ . evamuttaratrāpi yathāyathaṃ draṣṭavyam . atra dhātuyogaja ityasya vivaraṇaṃ śeṣakāreṇa kṛtam . yathā—
ʻkriyodgamagrahādharṣāśleṣaśāpābhikāṅkṣaṇe .
avaṣṭambhe kālahṛtāvutkaṇṭhānikaṭatvayoḥ ..
spardhāvāpaniṣedheṣu vināme bandhane vadhe .
snāne saṃsthāsaṃpradāyadarśaneṣu vimarśane ..
vijñāne jñāpane pāratantrye tyāganiyogayoḥ .
bhūṣāsaṃbhāṣaṇālekhyābhimukhyākramaṇeṣu ca ..
vṛttyāvṛttiprāpaṇeṣu pratiśravaṇavistṛtau .
visrambhābhividhodyogaṃ saṃbhramābhyavahārayoḥ ..
sthāna āvaraṇāhvāna ādhmāpūjāśrameṣu ca .
uktiduḥkhānandaneṣu saṃcaye cāṅ pravartate ..
iti . kriyāyāṃ yathā—ācarati karotītyarthaḥ . udgama ūrdhvagamanam . yathā—ʻyāvat pratāpanidhirākramate na bhānuḵ iti (raghu. 5. 71) . udetītyarthaḥ . grahe svīkāre . yathā—ʻādatte hi rasaṃ raviḵ (raghu. 1. 18) iti . ʻmiṣatāmācchinatti naḵ (ku. saṃ. 2. 46) . gṛhṇātītyarthaḥ . ʻādharṣaḥ ādharṣaṇamupadravakaraṇam . yathā—āskandati . āśleṣe yathā—āliṅgati . śāpe yathā—ākrośati . abhikāṅkṣaṇamicchā . yathā—ākāṅkṣati bhikṣām . avaṣṭambhaḥ tadekaśaraṇatvam . yathā—ʻnālambate daiṣṭikatām iti (śiśu. 2. 86) . kālahṛtiḥ kālayāpanam . yathā—āgamayasva tāvanmāṇavakam . utkaṇṭhāyām . yathā—ādhyānamutkaṇṭheti prāguktam (1, pṛ. 138) . nikaṭatve sāmīpye . yathā—āsīdati, saṃnikṛṣṭo bhavatītyarthaḥ . spardhāyām . yathā—ʻgatabhīrāhvata cedirāṇmurārim (śiśu. 20. 1); śiśupālaḥ spardhamānaḥ sannāhvānaṃ kṛtavānityarthaḥ . āvāpo nidhānam . yathā—garbhamādadhāti . bījamāvapati . vināmo vakrīkaraṇam . yathā—hastamākuñcayati . bandhane yathā—ʻāmuñcatīvābharaṇam iti (raghu. 13. 21) . vadhe yathā—ʻvāyavyaṃ śvetamālabhetö (tai. saṃ. 2. 1. 1. 1) iti . snāne yathā—āplāvate iti . saṃsthā avayavaviśeṣo yathā—ʻākārasadṛśaprajñaḵ iti (raghu. 1. 15) . chandogā āmanantītyāmnāyaḥ . saṃpradāya iti ca gatam (2, pṛ. 168) . darśane yathā—ālokanta iti . vimarśo vicāro yathā—ālocayatīti . vijñāne yathā—artho'yamābhāsate, jñānaviṣayo bhavatītyarthaḥ . jñāpane yathā—ādiśatīti . pāratantrye yathā—tadāyattaḥ, tatparatantra ityarthaḥ . tyāgaḥ prārabdhakarmaparityāgaḥ . yathā—ʻanārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitāḵ iti (kirā. 1. 15) . niyoge yathā—ājñāpayati devaḥ iti . bhūṣāyāṃ yathā—ābharaṇamiti . saṃbhāṣaṇe yathā—ālapati, bhāṣata ityarthaḥ . ālekhye yathā—ālikhati . ābhimukhye yathā—āgacchati . ākramaṇaṃ vyāpanam . yathā—ārohati dhūmo harmyatalam . ākramate nīhāra iti . vṛttau yathā—vṛddhyājīvo vārdhuṣikaḥ . āvṛttirnivṛttiḥ . yathā—āvartate vanāntāt . punaḥ punaḥ kriyāyāmabhyāsa āvṛttiḥ . yathā—āvṛttaśāstraḥ . prāpaṇe yathā—antarvedi havīṃṣyāsādayati . ājyamāsādayati . pratiśravaṇaṃ pratijñātam . yathā—ʻāśrutaṃ pratijñātam iti gatam (2, pṛ. 150) . vedamapauruṣeyamāsthiṣata bhāṭṭāḥ . āśrṛṇoti, pratijānīta ityarthaḥ . vistṛte vistāre yathā—āyāmaḥ . visrambho viśvāsaḥ . yathā—āśvastamitrajana iti . abhito vidhānaṃ kārtsnyena karaṇamityarthaḥ . yathā—darbhānālunāti, samantato lunātītyarthaḥ . udyoge yathā—ārabhate . saṃbhramastvarā . yathā— āvegaḥ, āgrahaḥ . abhyavahāre yathā—ācāmati, āsvādayati . sthāne yathā—ādhāraḥ . āvaraṇaṃ tirodhānakaraṇam . yathā—āvṛṇoti . āhvāne yathā—ākārayati . ādhmā ādhmānaṃ pūraṇamityarthaḥ . yathā—ādhmātaśaṅkha iti . pūjāyāṃ yathā—ārādhayati śivam . śrame yathā—āyāsayati . uktau yathā—ācaṣṭe samyag bhāṣaṇam . sāṃmukhyena bhāṣaṇaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇam, uktistu bhāṣaṇamityanayorbhedaḥ . duḥkhe yathā—ātaṅka āpannaḥ . ānande yathā—ʻāpṛcchasva priyasakhamamum iti (megha. 1. 12) . saṃcayaḥ saṃgrahaḥ . yathā—gomayānācinoti . evaṃ prayogānupalakṣyopasargadyotyā arthā draṣṭavyāḥ .. 239 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.239>  
avyayāḥ pare . hāntavargādupari vakṣyamāṇāḥ śabdā avyayā bhavanti .. āṅīṣadarthe—dhātuyogaje . īṣadarthe—āpiṅgalā gauḥ . abhivyāptau—ājanmabrahmacārī . sīmārthe—odakāntaṃ priyamanuvrajet . dhātuyogaje—āharati .. 239 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.240ab ā pragṛhyaḥ smṛtau vākye'pyāstu syāt kopapīḍayoḥ .
AK.03.03.240cd pāpakutseṣadarthe ku dhignirbhartsananindayoḥ .. 240 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.240>  
ā pragṛhyaḥ smṛtau vākye cāḥ kope tāpapīḍayoḥ .
pāpakutseṣadarthe ku dhiṅ nirbhartsananindayoḥ .. 524 ..
vākye'pi . vartataṃ iti śeṣaḥ . smṛtau yathā—ā evaṃ kila tat . vākye yathā—ā evaṃ nu manyase .. kopaṃ yathā—ʻāḥ kimetat iti krodhāt (devīmā. 2. 36) . tāpe yathā—āḥ kvāsi priye . pīḍāyāṃ yathā—āḥ kaṣṭaṃ vartate .. ku, pāpārthe yathā—tyajet kujanasaṃgam . kutsāyāṃ yathā—kubhojanam . īṣadarthe yathā—koṣṇam, kaduṣṇam, kavoṣṇam .. ghik, nirbhartsane yathā—dhig jālmam . nindāyāṃ yathā—ʻdhigimāṃ dehabhṛtāmasāratām iti (raghu. 8. 51) .. 240 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.240>  
ā pragṛhyaḥ smṛtau vākye'pi . ā ityayaṃ nipātaḥ smaraṇe vākye ca vartate . smṛtau yathā—ā evaṃ kila tat iti . pūrvoditādarthādanyathātvadyotanāya vākyāntarasyādau ākāraḥ prayujyate . yathā—ā evaṃ nu manyase iti . pūrvaṃ naivamamaṃsthāḥ, adhunā prakārāntareṇa manyasa iti tasyārthaḥ . vākye vākyālaṃkāre ityapare . yathā—ā adya svādiṣṭhaṃ bhojanaṃ labdham iti .
ʻīṣadarthe kriyāyoge maryādābhividhau ca yaḥ .
etamātaṃ ṅitaṃ vidyād vākyāsmaraṇayoraṅit ..
iti haradattaḥ (padama. 1, pṛ. 113) . tataśca ʻnipāta ekājāṅ (1. 1. 14) iti pragṛhyasaṃjñāyāṃ ʻplutapragṛhyā aci (6. 1. 125) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ . amarasiṃhagranthe'pi pragṛhyasaṃjñāvidhānasya prakṛtibhāva eva prayojanamiti jñeyam .. āstu syāt kopapīḍayoḥ . āḥ iti visarjanīyānto nipātaḥ prayoktuḥ krodhe pīḍāyāṃ ca vartate . krodhe yathā—ʻāḥ kimetaditi krodhādābhāṣya mahiṣāsuraḵ iti (devīmā. 2. 36) . āḥ kaṣṭaṃ vartate iti pīḍāyām .. pāpakutseṣadarthe ku . pāpe yathā—ʻtyajet kujanasaṃgamam iti . kutsāyāṃ nindāyām . yathā—kubhojanam . īṣadarthe yathā—koṣṇa, kavoṣṇamiti . atra ʻkavaṃ coṣṇe (6. 3. 107) iti kuśabdasya kavādeśaḥ .. dhig nirbhartsananindayoḥ . nirbhatsane yathā—dhigimaṃ niṣṭhurālapamiti . nindāyāṃ yathā—ʻdhigimāṃ dehabhṛtāmasāratām iti (raghu. 8. 51) .. 240 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.240>  
ā pragṛhyaḥ smṛtau vākye'pi . smṛtyarthe—ā jñātam . jaṭāyureṣaḥ . vākyapūraṇe—ā evaṃ manyase . pragṛhyatvāt saṃdhirna bhavati .. āstu syāt kopapīḍayoḥ . kope—āḥ pāpa . pīḍāyām—āḥ kaṣṭamāpatitam .. pāpakutseṣadarthe ku . pāpe—kubrāhmaṇaḥ . kutsāyām—kudānam . īṣadarthe—koṣṇam .. dhig nirbhartsananindayoḥ .. 240 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.241ab cānvācayasamāhāretaretarasamuccaye .
AK.03.03.241cd svastyāśīḥkṣemapuṇyādau prakarṣe laṅghane'pyati .. 241 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.241>  
cānvācayasamāhāretaretarasamuccaye .
pādapūraṇacedarthatulyayogāvadhāraṇaṃ .. 525 ..
viniyoge'pi hetvarthe cānubandhe'pi kathyate .
anvācaye yathā—bhikṣāmaṭa, gāṃ cānaya iti . samāhāre yathā—chatropānaham . itaretarayoge yathā—devadattayajñadattābhyāmidaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyam . samuccaye—vasiṣṭhaṃ gautama dharmamagastyaṃ praṇanāma ca . pādapūraṇe yathā—ʻrāmo rāmaśca rāmaśca buddhaḥ kalkīti te daśö . cedarthe—ʻtvaṃ ca māṃ nayase rājannāgamiṣyāmi sajjitaḵ  iti . tulyayoge yathā—tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca sakhe gacchāvaḥ . avadhāraṇaṃ yathā—ʻvelāmatītā tava ceyamājñȫ iti . viniyoge yathā—paṭha ca paca ca . hetvarthe yathā—rājā ca draṣṭavyaḥ . anubandhe yathā—tvaṃ ca gacchasi kāryaṃ naḥ setsyati ..
svastyāśīḥkṣemayoḥ puṇye maṅgale prativandane .. 526 ..
āśiṣi—ʻsvastyastu te (raghu. 5. 17) . kṣeme yathā—svasti gacchati . svasti punarāgacchati . puṇye yathā—svastimān svargamaśnute . maṅgale—svastivākyaṃ tataḥ kuryāt . prativandane—rājñā namaskṛtā viprāḥ svastītyete prayuñjate iti .. 
prakarṣe laṅghane vyādhāvatideśe ca pūjane .
durnaye yāpane nāśe nirbandhānarthaśaṅkayoḥ .. 527 ..
anubandhānujñayoḥ syādadhikṣepāpahāsayoḥ .
āropaṇe cāpyupadhāvatiśabda udāhṛtaḥ .. 528 ..
prakarṣe yathā—ʻpūrvān mahābhāga tayātiśeṣe (raghu. 5. 14) . laṅghane—ʻatītakālastvahamabhyupetaḵ (raghu. 5. 14) . vyādhau—atisāreṇa pīḍitaḥ . atideśe—atidiśati . pūjane—atistuto mayā vipraḥ . durnaye—aticarati . yāpane—gāḍhapaṅkamativāhitātapaḥ . nāśe—ʻvarṣātyayena rucamabhraghanādivendoḵ iti (raghu. 13. 77) . nirbandhe—yadvai brahmacārin prāṇamatyaprakṣaḥ . anarthaśaṅkāyām—mā te 'tyāhitamaṅgane . anubandhe—atigṛhṇāti māṃ saṃkhyā . anujñāyām—atisṛjati bhojanāya . adhikṣepe—svāmyadhikṣipati prajāḥ . apahāse—syālān devo'tihasati . āropaṇe—atyādadhati pātreṣu dhanaṃ kuśalabuddhayaḥ . upadhāyām—atisaṃdhatte .. 241 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.241>  
cānvācaya—samuccaye . ekasya prādhānyaṃ sati aparasya guṇībhāvo'nvācayaḥ . yathā—bhikṣāmaṭa, gāṃ cānaya iti . atra bhikṣāṭanaṃ kurvāṇo yadi gāṃ paśyati tadā tāmapyānayati . no cet bhikṣāṭanameva karoti . na tu gāmapyanviṣyānayatīti bhikṣāṭanasya prādhānyam . gavānayanasya guṇabhāvaḥ cakāreṇāvagamyate . itaretaraśabdenātra itaretarayogo lakṣyate . sa ca parasparāpekṣāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ dvayorvā parasparabhedānugamena samudāyarūpatāmāpannānāmekasminnarthe'nvaye sati bhavati . yathā—devadattayajñadattābhyāmidaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyamiti, plakṣanyagrodhau saha tiṣṭhata iti udbhūtāvayavabhedatvād dvivacanamapi bhavati . plakṣanyagrodhāvityatra sāhacaryavaśāt plakṣaśabdo nyagrodhārtho'pi bhavati . nyagrodhaśabdaśca plakṣārtho'pi śabdaśaktimahimnā samāveva samudāyārthamāhatuḥ . na pṛthagbhūtau . tataśca na plakṣānayanaprasaṅga nyagrodhānayanam . nāpi nyāgrodhānayanaprasaṅge plakṣānayanam . nāpyekenoktatvāt parasya prayogānupapattiḥ . palkṣaśabdena yāvadartho'bhidhīyate tāvān nyagrodhaśabdenāpīti dvyarthatvād dvivacanameva bhavati . ataḥ samudāyānna bahuvacanamityādiprapañco mahābhāṣyakārakaiyaṭābhyāṃ nirūpito'nusaṃdheyaḥ . parasparasāpekṣāṇāmevāvayavabhedatirodhānena ekībhūtāvasthatayā ekasmin pratisaṃbandhini saṃbandhaḥ samāhāraḥ . yathā—chatropānaham, mārdaṅgikapāṇavikam ityādi . atra saṃhateḥ pradhānatvād ekavacanameva . itaretarayogasamāhārarūpayorarthayoḥ ʻcārthe dvandvaḵ (2. 2. 29) iti vihitasya samāsasya vaikalpitatvād vākyamapi bhavati . tasmād devadattena yajñadattena ca kartavyam, chatropānahośca samāhāra ityapi prayogaḥ . parasparanirapekṣāṇāmanekeṣāmekasmin saṃbandhisaṃbandhaḥ samuccayaḥ . yathā—goravaśca mahiṣaśca devadattasyetyādi . ʻśaṃ ca me mayaśca me priya ca me ityādi (tai. saṃ. 4. 7. 3. 1) . tathā ekasmin dravye bahvīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ samuccayaḥ . yathā—
ʻpurīmavaskanda lunīhi nandanaṃ muṣāṇa ratnāni harāmarāṅganāḥ .
vigṛhya cakre namucidviṣā balī ya itthamasvāsthyamahardivaṃ divaḥ .
iti (śiśu. 1. 51) . atra ya iti nirdiṣṭakartṛbhūtarāvaṇarūpe dravye puryavaskandananandanalavanaratnamoṣaṇāpsaroharaṇarūpāṇāṃ kriyāṇāṃ samuccayaḥ . atra caśabdaprayogābhāve'pi samuccayasya gamyamānatvam . ata eva ʻsamuccaye'nyatarasyām (3. 4. 3) iti bhūtalakārāpavādena loṭpratyayaḥ . tathā guṇayorapi kvacit samuccayaḥ . yathā—paṭānto raktaḥ śuklaśceti . śeṣe—
ʻcaṇ cetarthe ṇakāretsyādavadhāraṇabhedayoḥ .
pādasya pūraṇe hetau tulyayugviniyogayoḥ ..
iti . yadā ceti nipātasya ṇakāra itsaṃjñako bhavati, tadā cedarthe vartata ityarthaḥ . taduktam—caṇ cedartha iti . yathā —tvaṃ ca gacchasi kāryaṃ naḥsetsyati iti; tvaṃ cet gacchasi kāryasiddhirbhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ . ṇakārānubandho nipātairyadyadiha . . .cet caṇ kaccidyatra yuktamiti nighātapratiṣedhārthaḥ . avadhāraṇe yathā—ʻatītaḥ panthānaṃ tava ca mahimā vāṅmanasayoḵ iti (śivamahimna. 2) . bhedaviśeṣe yathā—sa khalu tvāmanuvartate tvaṃ ca nirapekṣaḥ iti . tvaṃ punarnirapekṣa ityarthaḥ . pādapūraṇe yathā—ʻbhīmaḥ pārthastathaiva cö iti . hetau yathā—ʻna cānyatastasya śarīrarakṣȫ iti (raghu. 2. 4) . yasmāt tasya dilīpasyānyataḥ śarīrarakṣaṇaṃ nāpekṣitam, ato'nuyāyivargo niṣiddha ityarthaḥ . tulyayoge yathā—tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca gacchāvaḥ . viniyoge yathā—paṭha ca paca ca .. svastyāśīḥkṣemapuṇyādau . avidyamānārthasya prārthanamāśīḥ . yathā—ʻsvastyastu te (raghu. 5. 17) . labdhaparipālanaṃ kṣemaḥ . yathā—svastyeva gacchati svasti punarāgacchati . ʻbhūtānukampā tava cediyaṃ gaurekā bhavet svastimatī tvadante (raghu. 2. 48) iti . puṇye yathā—
ʻsauvastikāni karmāṇi savedaiva karotyayam .
. . . . . . . .savastimān svargamaśnute ..
iti . ādiśabdād maṅgale yathā—svasti śrīmadityādikaṃ saṃdeśapatrikāsu . ʻprāsthānikaṃ svastyayanaṃ prayujyö iti (raghu. 2. 70) .. prakarṣe laṅghane'pyati . prakarṣe yathā—atiśete . laṅghane yathā—atikrāmati . śeṣe—
ʻatiḥ pūjātikramaṇātideśavyādhiyāpane .
āropaṇe ca nirbandhe vināśānujñayorapi ..
iti . pūjāyāṃ yathā—svatī pūjāyām (ʻsvatibhyāmevö vā. 5. 4. 69) . atikramaṇe yathā—ʻatiratikramaṇe cö (1. 4. 95) . ekatropadiṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāmanyatra sadbhāvakathanamatideśaḥ . yathā—ʻprakṛtidharmāṇāṃ vikṛtāvatideśaḵ iti . vyādhau yathā—atisāreṇa pīḍitaḥ iti . yāpane yathā—kālamativāhayati . āropaṇe yathā—udghane kāṣṭhamatyādadhāti . nirbandhane yathā—mā sma gurūnatipṛccha, nirbandhena mā prākṣīrityarthaḥ . vināśe yathā—atīto devadattaḥ . anujñāyāṃ yathā—pratyātisṛja hoṣyāmi atisṛṣṭa uddhare juhuyāt iti . apiśabdād bhaye yathā—atyāhitam . kapaṭe yathā—atisaṃdhatte .. 241 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.241>  
cānvācaya—samuccaye . anvācaya—bhikṣāmaṭa gāṃ cānaya . anvācayo yatraikaḥ prādhānyenābhidhīyate, aparo guṇabhāveneti . atra bhikṣāṭanaṃ pradhānam, gavānayanamupasarjanam . samāhāre—govalībardau . itaretare—plakṣanyagrodhau . āvirbhūtāvayavabhedaḥ itaretaraḥ, tirohitāvayavabhedaḥ samāhāra iti tadbhedaḥ . samuccaye—gāvaśca vatsāśca gacchanti .. svastyāśīḥ kṣemapuṇyādau . ādiśabdād maṅgale'pi syāt . ʻsvasti maṅgalaniṣpāpakṣemeṣvāśīrvacasyapi iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 286, ślo. 29) .. prakarṣe laṅghane'pyati . apiśabdāt praśaṃsāyāmapi syāt . ʻatiḥ prakarṣapraśaṃsālaṅghaneṣu prayujyate iti jayakośaḥ .. 241 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

svit praśne ca vitarke ca . praśne yathā—ʻkaḥ svidekākī carati (tai. saṃ. 7. 4. 18. 3) . vitarke yathā—ʻadhaḥ svidāsīdupari svidāsīt (ṛgveda. 10. 129. 5) iti .. tu syād bhede'vadhāraṇe . bhede yathā—ʻsevayā tu kalau yuge iti . avadhāraṇe yathā—ʻtattu samanvayāt (bra. sū. 1. 1. 4); ʻvedāstu pramāṇam iti ca . śeṣe—ʻtvarcāhetvoḥ pādapūrtaü iti . arcā pūjā . yathā—ʻvedāḍhyastu dvijātīnām iti . hetau yathā—ʻdiśastu jaladaiśchannā bhavitrī vṛṣṭisaṃhatiḵ iti . yasmād meghairdiśaśchannā ato vṛṣṭirbhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ . pādapūraṇe yathā—ʻtatastu dharmarājaṃ tam iti .. sakṛt sahaikavāre cāpi . sahārthe yathā—dampatī sakṛdbhuñjāte . sahabhuñjāte ityarthaḥ . ekavāre yathā—ʻsakṛt pradīyate kanyȫ (ma. smṛ. 9. 47) . apiśabdāt sarvadetyarthe yathā—sakṛttaruṇā devāḥ; sarvadā yuvāna ityarthaḥ . ārād dūrasamīpayoḥ . dūre yathā—ʻārātte'gnirastvārāt paraśurastu te iti (āpastambamantrapāṭhaḥ 1. 13. 7) . samīpe yathā—ʻārādāgatamṛtyavaḵ iti .. 242 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

AK.03.03.243ab pratīcyāṃ carame paścādutāpyarthavikalpayoḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.243>

pratīcyāṃ yathā—paścādastaṃ gato raviḥ . caramārthe yathā—ʻpaścime vayasi naimiśaṃ vaśī iti (raghu. 19. 1) ..
apyarthapādapūrtyośca samuccayavikalpayoḥ .
pakṣāntarapraśnayorapyutāvyayamudāhṛtam .. 531 ..
apyarthe yathā—uta bhindyācchirasā śiloccayam . pādapūrtau—abravīduta rāvaṇam . samuccaye—suśevo balavānuta . vikalpe—ʻjāyāmadoṣāmuta saṃtyajāmi (raghu. 14. 34) . pakṣāntare—ʻajījanat sindhurutāvamanthyaḵ . praśne—ʻuta yena bibharṣi tat (ku. saṃ. 6. 23) ..

pratyakṣatulyayoḥ sākṣādavyayaṃ samudāhṛtam .. 532 .. 
pratyakṣe—ʻśrīvatsalakṣmā puruṣaśca sākṣāt iti (ku. saṃ. 7. 43) . tulye—ʻskandena sākṣādiva devasenām iti (raghu. 7. 1) .. 243 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

AK.03.03.244ab khedānukampāsaṃtoṣavismayāmantraṇe bata .
AK.03.03.244cd hanta harṣe'nukampāyāṃ vākyārambhaviṣādayoḥ .. 244 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.244>  
khedānukampāsaṃtoṣavismayāmantraṇe bata .
khede yathā—ʻtyajata mānamalaṃ vata vigrahaiḵ iti (raghu. 9. 47) . anukampāyāṃ yathā—ʻmā rodīrbata putra tvaṃ modakān pradadāmi te iti . saṃtoṣe yathā—ʻvata muktāsmi kilbiṣāt iti . vismaye yathā—ʻaho batāsi spṛhaṇīyavīryaḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 20) āmantraṇe yathā—ʻbata putra satāṃ saṅgaṃ kuru nityamatandritaḵ iti ..
āmode ca viṣāde ca vākyārambhānukampayoḥ .. 533 ..
dānaniścayayoścaiva hantāvyayamudāhṛtam .
āmode yathā—ʻhanta jīvitāḥ smaḵ iti (sa. kaṇṭhā. pṛ. 32) . viṣāde yathā—ʻhanta jātamajātāreḥ prathamena tvayāriṇȫ iti (śiśu. 2. 102) . vākyārambhe yathā—ʻhanta te kathayiṣyāmi iti (bha. gī. 10. 19) . anukampāyāṃ yathā—ʻmā rodīrhanta putrake iti . dāne yathā—ʻidaṃ manuṣyebhyo hantö iti (sa. kaṇṭhā. pṛ. 32) . niścaye yathā—ʻhanta bhokṣyāvaḵ iti .. 244 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.244>  
khedānukampā—āmantraṇe bata . khede yathā—ʻbata kaṣṭāṃ vaśāṃ gato'si iti . anukampāyāṃ yathā—ʻbata bubhukṣitāsi iti . saṃtoṣe yathā—ʻbata dṛṣṭā priyȫ iti . vismaye yathā—ʻbata bāla pragalbhase iti . āmantraṇaṃ saṃbodhanam . yathā—ʻbata vitarata toyaṃ toyavāhā himāntam iti . he meghāḥ setorārabhya himācalāvadhi toyaṃ muñcata ityarthaḥ .. hanta harṣe—viṣādayoḥ . harṣe yathā—hanta labdhajīvanāḥ smaḥ iti . anukampāyāṃ yathā—mā rodīrhanta putraka iti . vākyārambhe yathā—ʻhanta te kathayiṣyāmi iti (bha. gī. 10. 19) . viṣāde yathā—hanta vṛthā yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ iti . hanteti nipāto dāne'pi . yathā—bhūriyaṃ hantakāra iti . manuṣyebhyo dīyamānamannaṃ hantakāra ityarthaḥ .. 244 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.244>  
khedānukampā—vata . hanta—viṣādayoḥ .. 244 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.245ab prati pratinidhau vīpsālakṣaṇādau prayogataḥ .
AK.03.03.245cd iti hetuprakaraṇaprakarṣādisamāptiṣu .. 245 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.245>  
vīpsāyāṃ ca pratinidhau lakṣaṇapratidānayoḥ .. 534 ..
itthaṃbhūtasya cākhyāne prati bhāge ca kathyate .
vīpsāyāṃ yathā—vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ prati siñcati (kāśikā. 1, pṛ. 80) . pratinidhau yathā—putro janakataḥ prati iti . lakṣaṇe yathā—ʻvṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut iti (kāśikā 1. 4. 90) . pratidāne yathā—caṇakānasmai godhūmebhyaḥ prati yacchati iti . itthaṃbhūtākhyāne yathā—sādhuḥ putro devadattaṃ prati . bhāge yathā—yaddattaṃ māṃ prati syāditi ..
iti hetuprakaraṇaprakarṣādisamāptiṣu .. 535 ..
evamarthe vakṣyamāṇavicāre niyame tathā .
hetau yathā—ʻsahasodvegamiyaṃ vrajediti iti (raghu. 8. 7) . prakaraṇe yathā—ʻiti śatruṣu cendriyeṣu cö iti (raghu. 8. 23) . prakarṣe yathā—iti pāṇiniśabdaḥ iti . samāptau yathā‒iti dvitīyavargaḥ iti . evamarthe yathā—ʻiti bruvantaṃ tamuvāca sa vratī iti (śiśu. 1. 31) . vakṣyamāṇavicāre yathā—ʻstutiriti jagade hareḥ sūnunȫ (kirā. 18. 21) iti . niyame yathā—ʻātmodayaḥ parajyānirdvayaṃ nītiritīyatī iti (śiśu. 2. 30) .. 245 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.245>  
prati pratinidhau—prayogataḥ . mukhyasadṛśaḥ pratinidhiḥ . yathā—ʻabhimanyurarjunataḥ prati (kāśikā 1. 4. 92) . abhimanyurarjunasadṛśa ityarthaḥ . mukhyasadṛśatayā pratinidhīyata iti pratinidhiśabdasyāpi pratiśabdasāmarthyalabhyam . sāmarthyameva pravṛttinimittamatra . atra pratinidhiśabdagrahaṇam ekasūtropāttasya pratidānasyāpyupalakṣaṇam . tathā ca pāṇinisūtram—ʻpratinidhipratidāne ca yasmāt (2. 3. 11) iti . pratidāne yathā—ʻmāṣānasmai tilebhyaḥ prati yacchati iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) . vinimayasaṃpratipattyā tilān gṛhītvā māṣān dadātītyarthaḥ . nānābhūtānāmarthānāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapad vyāptumicchā vīpsā vyāptirityarthaḥ . yathā—vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ prati siñcati (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) . dvirvacanamatra pratiśabdāvayavavīpsābhivyaktyartham . lakṣaṇaṃ cihnam . jñāpakamiti yāvat . yathā—vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut (kāśikā 1. 4. 90) . ādiśabdena ʻlakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu pratiparyanavaḵ (1. 4. 90) iti sūtroktayoḥ itthaṃbhūtākhyānabhāgayorgrahaṇam . kaṃcit prakāraṃ prāptaḥ itthaṃbhūtaḥ . tasyākhyāne yathā—ʻsādhu devadatto mātaraṃ prati iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) . bhāge yathā—yadatra māṃ prati syāt sa bhāgo dīyatām iti . ʻpratinidhipratidāne ca yasmāt (2. 3. 11), ʻlakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu pratiparyanavaḵ (1. 4. 90) iti sūtrābhyāṃ pratiśabdaḥ pūrvokte pratinidhyādyarthaṣaṭke karmapravacanīyasaṃjño bhavati . ʻprayogataḵ ityasyāyamarthaḥ . na kevalaṃ sūtradvayānusāreṇoktā eta eva pratiśabdasyārthāḥ, kiṃ tu prayogato lokaprayogānusāreṇa anye'pyarthāḥ, lakṣaṇādāviti ādiśabdenaiva saṃgṛhītā iti . te ca śeṣakāreṇa kecit darśitāḥ—
ʻparijñāne padaprāptau kālahṛtyāṃ nivāraṇe .
vyalīkāviṣkṛtau tuṣṭau sevāyāṃ niṣkraye'pi ca ..
protsāhe cāvinābhāve vighnāṅgīkārayorapi .
vyābartane vinimaye punarāvartane'pi ca ..
vaiparītye vidratve'pekṣāprekṣakayorapi .
saṃkṣepaspardhasādṛśye svīkārābhyavahārayoḥ ..
uttarastokayatneṣu copasargaḥ prati smṛtaḥ .
iti . parijñānādiṣvartheṣu karmapravacanīyasaṃjñāyā abhāve sati pratiśabda upasargasaṃjñako bhavatītyarthaḥ . parijñāne yathā—pratidīyate, pratipadyate . padaprāptau yathā—pratitiṣṭhati . kālaharaṇe yathā—pratīkṣate, pratipālayati . nivāraṇe yathā—pratiṣedhati . vyalīkāviṣkṛtau yathā—pratibhinatti, pratyupalabhate . tuṣṭau yathā—pratinandati, pratītaḥ . sevāyāṃ yathā—pratiśrayate . niṣkraye yathā—pratyupakurute, pratiyātayati, pratimuñcati . protsāhe yathā—hotre pratigṛṇāti (si. kau. 1. 4.41) . avinābhāve yathā—dhūmo'gninā pratibaddhaḥ, vyāpta ityarthaḥ . vighne yathā—pratibaghnāti . aṅgīkāre yathā—pratīcchati, pratiśṛṇoti . vyāvartane yathā—pratyāvartate, pratigacchati . vinimaye yathā—pratidadāti, pratilabhate . svatvanivṛttiparatvāpattiparyantaṃ pratidānaṃ vinimayārthaḥ . vyatyayamātramiti pratidānavinimayayorbhedaḥ . punarāvartane yathā—pratyārabhate, pratyujjīvati . vaiparītye yathā—pratayavatiṣṭhate . vinidratve yathā—pratibudhyate niśātyaye . apekṣāyāṃ yathā—pratijāgaraḥ . prakṣepe yathā—prativāpaḥ . saṃkṣepe yathā—pratyāharaṇam . spardhe yathā—pratigarjati . sādṛśye yathā—pratimānaṃ, pratibimbam . svīkāre yathā—pratigṛhṇāti . abhyavahāre yathā—pratyavasyati . uttare yathā—pratibrūte . stoke'lpe yathā—sūpaprati, śākaprati (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 86) . ʻsuppratinā mātrārthe (2. 1. 9) iti samāsaḥ . yatne yathā—bhoktuṃ pratiyatate . evamabhiyuktaprayogānanviṣya pratiśabdasyārthāntarāṇyunneyāni .. 
iti hetuprakaraṇaprakarṣādisamāptiṣu . hetau yathā—cora iti palāyate . prakaraṇaṃ prakāraḥ . yathā—gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastīti jātiḥ (ma. bhāṣya. 1. 1. 1) . gavādiprakārā jātirityarthaḥ . prakarṣe yathā—iti bodhāyano'vravīt iti . bodhāyano dharmajñānaprakarṣavān, ataḥ taduktamavaśyānuṣṭheyamiti tasya tātparyam . ādyarthe yathā—ʻjvalitikasantebhyo ṇaḵ (3. 1. 140) . helālīlotyamī bhāvā iti ca . samāptau yathā—iti śrīmadrāmāyaṇe bālakāṇḍe prathamaḥ sargaḥ . śeṣe—
ʻitiruktārthanirdeśe matyevaṃniyameṣu ca .
vakṣyamāṇaparāmarśe vivakṣāniyameṣu ca .
iti . pūrvoktavākyārthasya ca nirdeśe karmatvena nirdiśyamānatve ityarthaḥ . atra vākyaparāmarśe yathā—ʻāśrāvayeti caturakṣaramastu . śrauṣaḍiti caturakṣaram (tai. saṃ. 1. 6. 11. 1) iti . vākyārthaparāmarśe yathā—ʻgato'stamarka iti (bhāmaha. 2. 87) ; sūryāstakathanasya saṃdhyākālo jāta ityarthaḥ . matau buddhiviśeṣe yathā—ityāpiśaliḥ; āpiśalermatamityarthaḥ (ʻvā supyāpiśaleḵ 6. 1. 92) . evamarthe yathā—ʻityuktavantaṃ vraja sādhayeti pramāṇayan vākyamajātaśatroḵ iti (kirā. 3. 24) . niyamo nāma yogānyayogayorvyavacchedaḥ . yathā—ʻsāmānyaṃ dvividham, paramaparaṃ ceti (tarkasaṃ. pṛ. 7) . ʻātmodayaḥ parajyānirdvayaṃ nītiritīyatī (śiśu. 1. 30) iti . vakṣyamāṇaparāmarśe yathā—ʻratnākaraṃ vīkṣya mithaḥ sa jāyāṃ rāmābhidhāno harirityuvācö iti (raghu. 13. 1) . vivakṣāniyame yathā—ʻtasminniti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasyö (1. 1. 66) . ʻtasmādityuttarasyö (1. 1. 67) . ʻtadasyāstyasminniti matup (5. 2. 94) iti .. 245 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.245>  
prati pratinidhau—prayogataḥ . pratinidhau—pradyumno vāsudevāt prati . ʻpratiḥ pratinidhipratidānayoḵ iti pāṇinīyam (1. 4. 92) . pratidāne'pi syāt . ʻmāṣānasmai tilebhyaḥ prati yacchati (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) . ʻlakṣaṇenābhipratī ābhimukhye (2. 1. 14) iti ābhimukhyārthe'pi syāt . ācāryaṃ prati kṛtāñjalistiṣṭhet . vīpsāyām—vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ prati siñcati (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) . lakṣṇādau—vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut (kāśikā 1, 4. 90) . sādhurdevadatto mātaraṃ prati . yadatra māṃ prati syāt (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) . ʻlakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu pratiparyanavaḵ (1. 4. 89) iti sūtrāt paryanuśabdāvapi syātām . ʻabhirabhāge (1. 4. 91) iti bhāgaṃ vinā abhiśabdaśca syāt .. iti hetu—samāptiṣu . hetau—hantīti palāyate . prakaraṇe—iti vakṣye citrakathām . prakaraṇaṃ prakramaḥ prastāva iti paryāyāḥ . prakāre—laukikāḥ śabdāḥ, śakunirmṛgo brāhmaṇa iti (ma. bhāṣya. 1. 1. 1) . evaṃprakārā ityarthaḥ . ʻprakāśādisamāptiṣü iti pāṭhe—iti pāṇiniḥ . pāṇineḥ khyātirityarthaḥ . iti hariśabdaḥ . prakāśata ityarthaḥ . ādyarthe—helālīletyamī bhāvāḥ . samāptau—ʻityamarasiṃhakṛtaü (1, pṛ. 183) .. 245 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.246ab prācyāṃ purastāt prathame purārthe'grata ityapi .
AK.03.03.246cd yāvattāvacca sākalye'vadhau māne'vadhāraṇe .. 246 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.246>  
prācyāṃ purastāt prathame purārthe'grata ityapi .. 536 ..
prācyām yathā—ʻpaurastyānevamākrāmastāṃstāñjanapadān jayī iti (raghu. 4. 34) . prathame yathā—ʻpurastāt kriyate karma paścāt siddhyati tatphalam iti . purārthe yathā—ʻtvayā purastādupayācito yaḵ (raghu. 13. 53) iti . agrato'rthe—ʻnaśyat purastādanupekṣaṇīyam iti (raghu. 2. 44) ..
yāvattāvacca sākalye 'pyavadhāraṇamānayoḥ .
bhaviṣyadarthe sātatye'pyavadhāvapi kathyate .. 537 ..
sākalye yathā—ʻyāvatkṛtaṃ tāvadeva phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḵ iti . avadhāraṇe yathā—ʻyāvadamatraṃ brāhmaṇānāmantrayasvö iti . māne yathā—ʻsaptāśvatthasya patrāṇi tāvatsūtreṇa veṣṭayet (yā. smṛ. 2. 7. 103) iti . bhaviṣyadarthe ʻyāvad bhavatyāhitasāyakasyö (ku. saṃ. 3. 4) iti . sātatye yathā—ʻyāvajjīvamatandritaḵ iti . avadhau yathā—ʻyāvat kuṇḍinamacyutaḵ iti .. 246 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.246>  
prācyāṃ purastāt—agrata ityapi . prācyādiṣvartheṣu purastācchabdo vartate . tathā ca vopālitaḥ—ʻprācyāṃ puraḥ purastādagraprathamavyatīteṣü iti .. yāvattāvacca—māne'vadhāraṇe . sākalyaṃ sāmastyam . yathā—yāvatkartavyaṃ tāvatkṛtam . sākalyena kṛtamityarthaḥ . avadhiḥ maryādā . yathā—ʻyāvat sasyakṣetraṃ tāvat kaṇṭakīvṛkṣaiḥ parivṛtam iti . mānaṃ pramāṇam . yāvaddattaṃ tāvadbhuktam (kāśikā 2. 1. 8) . yatpramāṇaṃ dattaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ bhuktamityarthaḥ . avadhāraṇe yathā—ʻyāvadamatraṃ brāhmaṇānāmantrayasvö iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 86) . amatrasaṃkhyayaiva brāhmaṇā nimantraṇīyāḥ, na nyūnāḥ nādhikāścetyarthaḥ . ʻtadvalgunā yugapadunmiṣitena tāvat (raghu. 5. 68) iti yugapadevetyarthaḥ . śeṣe—ʻbhaviṣyadarthaṃ sāntatyaṃ yāvadapratiyugbhavet iti . tatra pratiyukcchabdena yāvacchabdapratiyogitvena tāvacchabdo vivakṣitaḥ . tadrahitaḥ kevalo yāvacchabdo bhaviṣyadarthaṃ sāntatyaṃ cābhidadhātītyarthaḥ . bhaviṣyadarthe yathā—ʻyāvadbhavatyāhitasāyakasya matkārmukasyāsya nideśavartī iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 4) .. 246 .. </Amarapadaviarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.246>  
prācyāṃ purastāt—agrata ityapi . purārthaḥ atītaḥ . agrato'rthaḥ agram . ʻprācyāṃ puraḥ purastādagraprathamavyatīteṣü iti gopālitaḥ .. yāvattāvacca—avadhāraṇe .. anuktam—

AK.03.03.247ab maṅgalānantarārambhapraśnakārtsnyeṣvatho atha .
AK.03.03.247cd vṛthānirarthakāvidhyornānānekavinārthayoḥ .. 247 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.247>  
aṅgīkāre'dhikāraṃ ca samuccayavikalpayoḥ .
maṅgalānantarārambhapraśnakārtsnyeṣvatho atha .. 538 ..
aṅgīkāra yathā—ʻida tvadīyaṃ dhanuratheti brūmaḵ iti . adhikāre yathā—ʻatha śabdānuśāsanam iti (mahābhāṣya 1. 1. 1) . samuccaye yathā—ʻdānaṃ kurvatha bhojanam iti . vikalpe yathā—ʻhanmi lokamatha te makhārjitam iti (raghu. 11. 84) . maṅgale yathā—ʻatha varṇān pravakṣyāmi iti . anantare yathā—ʻathauṣadhīnāmadhipasya vṛddhaü iti (ku. saṃ. 7. 1) . ārambhe yathā—ʻatha parasmaipadānyārabhyante iti . praśne yathā—ʻatha kiṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vadö iti . kārtsnye yathā—ʻathāto darśapūrṇamāsau vyākhyāsyāmaḵ iti (āpa. śrauta. 1. 1) . eṣvartheṣu athośabdo'pi vartate ..
vṛthā nirarthakāvidhyornānānekavinārthayoḥ .
nirarthake yathā—ʻprāsādaśṛṅgāṇi vṛthādyarohat iti . avidhau yathā—ʻprapacyate sa narake yo vṛthālabhate paśum iti .. nānā; anekārthe yathā—ʻnānāceṣṭairjalada laliternirviśestaṃ nagendram (megha. 1. 65) iti .. vinārthe yathā—ʻnānā nārīṃ niṣphalā lokayātrȫ iti .. 247 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.247>  
maṅgalānantara—atho atha . maṅgale yathā—ʻatha varṇasamāmnāyaḵ (tai. prā. 1. 1) iti .
ʻoṃkāraścāthaśabdaśca dvāvetau brahmaṇaḥ purā .
kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā viniryātau tasmānmāṅagalikāvubhau ..
iti . ānantarye yathā—ʻatha prajānāmadhipaḥ prabhāte iti (raghu. 2. 1) . ārambhe yathā—ʻathedānīmetannirūpyate iti . praśne yathā—ʻathaikadhenoraparādhacaṇḍād guroḥ kṛśānupratimād bibheṣi iti (raghu. 2. 49) . kārtsnaye yathā—atha curādayaḥ kathyante iti . sākalyena kathyanta ityarthaḥ . śeṣe—
ʻaṅgīkāre'dhikāre ca samuccayavikalpayoḥ .
matāntare'pyathātho ca anvādeśe tvatho iti ..
iti . aṅgīkāre yathā—ʻkiṃ tārkiko bhavāniti praśne atheti brūmaḵ iti . adhikāre yathā—ʻatha śabdānuśāsanam iti (mahābhāṣya. 1. 1. 1) . samuccaye yathā—ʻodanaṃ pacāthö . sūpamapi pacanīyamityatraiva prayokturabhiprāyaḥ . natvānantarye . vikalpaḥ saṃśayaḥ . yathā—ʻśabdaḥ kiṃ nityaḥ, athānityaḵ iti . matāntare yathā—athaivaṃ manuṣe iti . eteṣvartheṣu atho atha iti dvayaṃ vartate . tataśca atho ityasyāpi udāharaṇāni draṣṭavyāni . anvādeśe tvatho śabda eveti śeṣaḥ . yathā—ʻimaṃ vyākaraṇamadhyāpaya, atho enaṃ smṛtīḵ iti .. vṛthā nirarthakāvidhyoḥ . nirarthake prayojanaśūnye yathā—ʻprayuktamapyastramito vṛthā syāt (raghu. 2. 34) iti . avidhau śāstrīyetikartavyatārāhitye yathā—ʻvaset sa narake ghore yo vṛthālabhate paśum iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 7. 180) . vṛthā avidhinetyarthaḥ . athavā avidhiḥ kriyāśūnyaḥ, yathā—vṛthāvākya iti . uktārthakaraṇaśūnya ityarthaḥ .. nānānekavinārthayoḥ . anekārthe yathā—ʻtasmānnānārūpāḥ paśavaḵ iti . bahurūpā ityarthaḥ . vinārthe yathā—ʻnānā nārīṃ niṣphalā lokayātrȫ iti . gaṇaratnamahodadhau ca ʻvinānekārthayornānȫ iti (pṛ. 23, adhyā. 1. 17) . vakṣyati ca—ʻpṛthagvināntareṇarte hiruṅ nānā ca varjane iti (3. 4. 3) . ʻnānānekobhayārthayoḵ iti kecit paṭhanti . tathā ca viśvaprakāśe—ʻnānā vinārthe'pi bhavennānānekobhayārthayoḵ iti (pṛ. 188, ślo. 32) .. 247 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.247>  
maṅgalānantara—atho atha . athaśabdaḥ saṃśayaprathamayorapi syāt . ʻatha kalyāṇānantarasaṃpraśnārambhasaṃśayādyeṣü iti gopālitaḥ .. vṛthā nirarthakāvidhyoḥ . nirarthakaṃ niṣkāraṇam . ʻvṛthā nirarthakāvidhyoḵ ityamaramālā .. anuktam—
yathā sādṛśyayogyatvavīpsāspardhānatikrame ..
tathā samuccaye saumye paramārthābhyanujñayoḥ ..
nānānekobhayārthayoḥ .. 247 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.248ab nu pṛcchāyāṃ vikalpe ca paścātsādṛśyayoranu .
AK.03.03.248cd praśnāvadhāraṇānujñānunayāmantraṇe nanu .. 248 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.248>  
pṛcchāviṣādayoḥ pādapūraṇotprekṣayorapi .. 539 ..
upamāyāṃ vitarke ca nuśabdaḥ parikathyate .
pṛcchāyāṃ yathā—ʻkathaṃ nu śakyo'nunayo maharṣeḵ iti (raghu. 2. 54) . viṣāde yathā—ʻkva nu māṃ tvadadhīnajīvitām iti (ku. saṃ. 4. 6) . pādapūraṇe yathā—ʻahiṃsā nu paro dharmaḵ iti . utprekṣāyāṃ yathā—ʻvyatyayaṃ vinimayaṃ nu vitene iti (kirā. 9. 60) . upamāyāṃ yathā—ʻpadmaṃ nu lapanaṃ tasyā rājate hariṇīdṛśaḵ iti . vitarke yathā—ʻtayā gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhyastato gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhiḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 1. 47) ..
vīpsāyāmānupūrvye ca paścātsādṛśyayoranu .. 540 ..
vīpsāyāṃ yathā—ʻvṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣamanu siñcati (kāśikā 1. 4. 90) iti . ānupūrvye yathā—ʻjyeṣṭhānugamanāt pūrvam iti (raghu. 12. 35) . paścādarthe yathā—anujaḥ iti . sādṛśye yathā—ʻātmānurūpāṃ vidhinopayeme iti (ku. saṃ. 1. 18) ..
āmantraṇe'pyanujñāyāmavadhāraṇapṛcchayoḥ .
nanuśabdo'pyanunaye kṣepe paramatasya ca .. 541 ..
āmantraṇe yathā—ʻnanu nānveti hitaḥ priyaḵ iti . anujñāyāṃ yathā—nanu gacchāmi . avadhāraṇe yathā—ʻtvayā niyamyā nanu divyacakṣuṣȫ iti (raghu. 3. 45) . pṛcchāyāṃ yathā—nanvabhoji . anunaye yathā—nanvadhiṣṭhāḥ . paramatakṣepe yathā—nanu caitat kathaṃ ghaṭate iti .. 248 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.248>  
nu pṛcchāyāṃ vikalpe ca . pṛcchā praśnaḥ . yathā—ʻā no nu yuvāṃ na hīmāni no hāni . . . iti . vikalpaḥ saṃśayaḥ . yathā—ʻsthāṇurnu puruṣaḵ iti . ʻpuruṣo nu kāminīṣu madano nü iti . śeṣe—
ʻpratyuktāvupamāne ca viṣādotprekṣayorapi .
nu pādapūraṇe jñeyo jijñāsāyāṃ samuccaye ..
iti . prativacane yathā—ʻdevadatta kiṃ kaṭaṃ kṛtavānasi iti praśne ʻahaṃ nu karomi iti prativacanam (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 195) . ʻnanvorvibhāṣȫ (3. 2. 121) iti bhūtārthe laṭ . upamāne yathā—ʻpadmaṃ nu lapanaṃ tasyā rājate hariṇīdṛśaḵ iti . viṣāde yathā—ʻkva nu māṃ tvadadhīnajīvitām iti (ku. saṃ. 4. 6) . utprekṣāyāṃ yathā—ʻastaśailagahanaṃ nu vivasvānāviveśa jaladhiṃ nu mahīṃ nü iti (kirā. 9. 7) . pādapūraṇe yathā—ʻākhyāsyāmi nu te vārtām iti . jijñāsāyāṃ yathā—ʻkathamidaṃ nu bhavet iti . samuccaye yathā—ʻvāruṇī paraguṇātmaguṇānāṃ vyatyayaṃ vinimayaṃ nu vitene iti (kirā. 9. 60) .. paścātsādṛśyayoranu . paścādarthe yathā—anurathaṃ pādātam . sādṛśye —yathā—anusakhi . ubhayatrāpi ʻavyayaṃ vibhakti . . .vacaneṣü (2. 1. 6) ityavyayībhāvaḥ śeṣe—
ʻanu hīne lakṣaṇe ca saha dairghyānupūrvyayoḥ .
lakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsamīpayoḥ ..
athopasargo vijñeyaḥ sahapaścāddayāsu saḥ .
avaboghe cānumatau sādṛśye sāntvasevayoḥ ..
praśne cālocanācāra ānukūlye ca mārgaṇe .
āsaktāvānupūrvyāṃ ca sātatyecchopakāravat ..
protsāhe cānutāpe ca vāsane ca prasādhane .
anvaye viniyoge ca ..
iti . hīne yathā—anuśākaṭāyanaṃ vaiyākaraṇāḥ (kāśikā 1. 4. 86) . śākaṭāyanāddhīnā anye vaiyākaraṇā ityarthaḥ . lakṣaṇaṃ hetuḥ yathā—ʻśākalyasya saṃhitāmanu prāvarṣatö iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 79) . śākalyasaṃhitāhetunetyarthaḥ sahārthe yathā—ʻnadīmanvavasitā senȫ iti (kāśikā 1. 4. 85) . nadyā saha saṃbaddhetyarthaḥ . ʻanurlakṣaṇe (1. 4. 84), ʻtṛtīyārthe (1. 4. 85), ʻhīne (1. 4. 86) ityanoḥ karmapravacanīyatvam . tṛtīyārthe sahārthe . dairghye yathā—ʻanugaṅgaṃ vārāṇāsī (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 88) iti . gaṅāgāyāmena vārāṇasyāyāmo lakṣyate . ʻyasya cāyāmaḵ (2. 1. 16) ityavyayībhāvaḥ . ānupūrvye'nukrame yathā—ʻanujyeṣṭhaṃ praviśantu bhavantaḵ (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 86) iti . jyeṣṭhānupūrvyeṇetyarthaḥ . ʻavyayaṃ vibhakti . . . ityādinā (2. 1. 6) avyayībhāvaḥ . lakṣaṇe yathā—ʻvṛkṣamanu vidyotate vidyut (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) iti . itthaṃbhūtākhyāne yathā—ʻsādhurdevadatto mātaramanü iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 80) . bhāge yathā—ʻyadatra māmanu syāt sa bhāgo dīyatām iti . vīpsāyāṃ yathā—ʻvṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣamanu vidyotate vidyut iti . ʻlakṣaṇetthaṃbhūta . . .  ityādinā (1. 4. 90) karmapravacanīyatvam . sāmīpye yathā—ʻanuvanamaśanirgataḵ iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 88) . ʻanuyetsamayȫ (2. 1. 15) ityavyayībhāvaḥ . sahārthe yathā—anuplavate . paścādarthe yathā—anuvadati . dayāyāṃ yathā—anukrośati, anukampate . avabodhe jñāne yathā—anumimīte, anubhavati . anumatau yathā—anujānāti . sādṛśye yathā—anuharati pituraśvaḥ . sāntvane yathā—anunayati . sevāyāṃ yathā—anujīvati . praśne yathā—anuyogaḥ . ālocane yathā—anusaṃdhānam . ācāre yathā—anuṣṭhānam . ānukūlye yathā—anukūlaḥ . anulomaḥ . mārgaṇe yathā—anveṣaṇam . āsaktau yathā—anurajyate . ānupūrvye yathā—anukramaḥ . sātatye yathā—saṃpat saṃpadamanubadhnāti . icchāyāṃ yathā—anurodhaḥ . upakāre yathā—anugṛhṇāti . protsāhe yathā—hotre anugṛṇāti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 70) . hotāraṃ protsāhayatītyarthaḥ . ʻanupratigṛṇaścö (1. 4. 41) iti saṃpradānārthatvam . anutāpe yathā—anuśete, anutaptaḥ . vāsane yathā—kapūreṇānuviddhaṃ jalam . vāsitamityarthaḥ . prasādhane yathā—anulimpati . anvaye yathā—anuṣajyate, anvetītyarthaḥ . viniyoge yathā—anuśāstiḥ; ityādyudārahaṇīyam .. praśnāvadhāraṇa—āmantraṇe nanu . praśne yathā—ʻnanu varṇā nityā anityā vȫ iti . nanvabhoji . avadhāraṇe yathā—nanvadya gacchāmaḥ . anujñāyāṃ yathā—nanu bhokṣyāmi . ʻnanvityanujñaiṣaṇāyām (8. 1. 43) iti sūtre kāśikā . ʻanujñaiṣaṇā anujñāprārthanetyarthaḵ iti (2, pṛ. 383) . anunaye yathā—nanvadhīṣva . āmantraṇe yathā—nanu bhuṅkṣe . śeṣe—ʻnanu kṣepe matasya ca . pratyuktāveṣaṇāyāṃ cö . paramatakṣepe yathā—ʻnanvetat kathaṃ ghaṭate iti . uktau prativacane </Amarapadavivarana>

punaraprathame khede . atrāprathame āvṛttau yathā—punarbhuktam . khede yathā—ʻvaiśyā āraṇyānna vikrīṇanti kiṃ punarbrāhmaṇaḵ iti . nirniścayaniṣedhayoḥ . niścaye yathā—nirṇayaḥ . niṣedhe yathā—nirasyati . śeṣe—
ʻsukhaprāptāvabhāve ca prādurarthe pṛthakkṛtau .
khedanigrahakārtsnye ca bhogārthādau nirīritaḥ ..
iti . sukhaprāptau yathā—nirvṛṇoti . abhāve yathā—ʻkṛtaṃ bhavatā nirmakṣikam iti (śāku. 2. 7-) . prādurartho vyaktatvam . yathā—nirvacanam . pṛthakkaraṇe yathā—nirdhārayati . khede yathā—nirvedaḥ . nigrahe yathā—nirbadhnāti . kārtsnye yathā—nirdahati . niṣkṛntati . niṣpinaṣṭi . upabhoge yathā—nirviśati . ādiśabdād niṣṭhīvatīti nirasane, nirdiśatītyanvākhyāne ityādi . ʻpraparāpasamanvavanirduvyāṅnyadhi . . . ityādyupasargagaṇe niḥ iti visarjanīyāntaṃ ni iti hrasvāntaṃ ceti dvayamapi paṭhitam . sūtreṣvapi ʻniraḥ kuṣaḵ (7. 2. 46) ʻnergadanada . . . (8. 4. 17) ityādiṣu dvayaṃ vyāhṛtam . tathā ca amarasiṃhenāpi ʻnirniścayaniṣedhayoḵ ityupasargadvayasyāpi sāmānyena grahaṇam . tatra hrasvāntasya niścaye yathā—ʻniyamena mayā nibarhaṇīyaḥ paramaṃ lābhamarātibhaṅgamāhuḵ iti (kirā. 13. 12) . niyamaḥ śāstraniyamaḥ niyatavāgityādi . niṣedhe yathā—niṣedhati . abhāve yathā—nivāpo deśaḥ . nīvākaḥ nidhanamiti . nikāra iti tiraskāre .. syāt prabandhe—purā . prabandhe sātatye yathā—upādhyāyena purādhīyate sma . aviratamapāṭhīdityarthaḥ . athavā prabandhe vākyaracanārūpe purāṇādāvityarthaḥ . cirātīte bahukālātīte yathā—ʻitihāsaḥ purāvṛttam (1, pṛ. 106); ʻpurātanaṃ tvāṃ puruṣaṃ purāvidaḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 33) . kecittu ciramatītaṃ ceti vyācakṣate . atīte yathā—ʻetena ha sma vā ṛṣayaḥ purā vijñānena dīrghasatramupayanti (tai. saṃ. 3. 3. 8. 4), ʻathaihainaṃ purarṣayaḵ; atīte kāle ityarthaḥ. nikaṭāgamikam avilambena bhāvi . yathā—ʻgaccha śīghraṃ purā devo varṣati iti . varṣiṣyatītyarthaḥ . kecittu—saṃnihite nikaṭavartini, āgāmike cetyarthadvayaparatvena vyācakṣate . saṃnihite yathā—ʻpurā prātaranuvākājjuhuyāt iti . prātaranuvākāta saṃnihite pūrvakāla ityarthaḥ .. 253 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.253>  
punaraprathame—niścayaniṣedhayoḥ . niścaye—nirvaktu bhavān . niścitaṃ vaktu bhavānityarthaḥ . niṣedhe—niṣkāmo bhavān . niṣiddhakāma ityarthaḥ .. syāt prabandhe—purā . prabandho nāma vākyaracanā . naṭī kasmāt purā dhīyate . cirātītaṃ bhūtam . yathā—purātanam . nikaṭāgāmikam anāgatam . ʻāloke te nipatati purȫ (megha. 2. 25) . avyavadhānena nipatiṣyatītyarthaḥ .. 253 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.03.254ab ūraryūrī corarī ca vistāre'ṅgīkṛtau trayam .
AK.03.03.254cd svarge pare ca loke svarvārtāsaṃbhāvyayoḥ kila .. 254 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.254>

paraloke devaloke sukhe svaḥ parikathyate .. 551 ..

nyakkārālīkavārtāsu saṃbhāvye'nucite kila .
nyakkāre yathā—ʻtvaṃ kilānamitapūrvamakṣiṇoḵ iti . alīke yathā—ʻamūṃ kila tvaṃ tridivādavātaraḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 36) . vārtāyāṃ yathā—ʻatha kilaikarathena nṛpātmajȫ iti . saṃbhāvye yathā—gurūn kilātiśete śiṣyaḥ iti . anucite yathā—ʻvaktuṃ kila gurūnevamanarhastvaṃ vinaṣṭadhīḵ iti .. 254 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.03.254>  
ūraryūrī—aṅgīkṛtau trayam . dvayaṃ dīrghādi. tṛtīyaṃ tu hrasvādi . tathaiva prāguktam ʻūrīkṛtamurarīkṛtam iti (2. pṛ. 150) . ajayastu trayamapi hrasvādiṣu papāṭha . yathā—
ʻupatāpo gade tāpa utsargastyāgadānayoḥ .

<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.254>  
ūraryūrī—aṅāgīkṛtau trayam . ūraryūrīśabdau hrasvādirapi syātām . ūrīśabdo dīrghādiḥ .
upatāpo gade tāpa utsargastyāgadānayoḥ .

4. avyayavargaḥ
AK.03.04.001ab cirāyacirarātrāyacirasyādyāścirārthakāḥ .
AK.03.04.001cd muhuḥ punaḥ punaḥ śaśvadabhīkṣṇamasakṛtsamāḥ .. 1 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.001>  
athāvyayavargamupakramate cirāyeti—atrādyaśabdena prathāmātṛtīyāpañcamīvibhaktyantapratirūpakā avyayā gṛhyante . atra krameṇodāharaṇāni—ʻcirāya saṃtarpya samidbhiragnim iti (raghu. 13. 55) . ʻcirarātrāya saṃcitam iti . ʻcirasya dṛṣṭeva mṛtotthitevö iti (ku. saṃ. 7. 4) . ʻciraṃtanastāvadabhinyavīviśat iti (śiśu. 1. 15) . ʻcireṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindavaḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 24) . ʻcirāt sutasparśarasajñatāṃ yayaü iti (raghu. 3. 26) .. muhurmuhuḥ—asakṛtsamāḥ . atrodāharaṇāni—ʻavekṣamāṇaṃ mahatīṃ muhurmuhuḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 10) . ʻpunaḥ punaḥ sūtaniṣiddhacāpalam iti (raghu. 3. 42) . ʻvanyavṛttirimāṃ śaśvat iti (raghu. 1. 88) . ʻabhīkṣṇamakṣuṇṇatayātidurgamam iti (śiśu. 1. 32) . ʻasakṛdanavagītaṃ gītamākarṇayantaḵ iti (śiśu. 11. 10) . etāni muhurarthe vartante .. 1 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.001>  
cirāya cirarātrāya—cirārthakāḥ . athaikārthāvyayā ucyante . nānārthāvyayā uktāḥ . athaikārthānavyayānāha—cirāyeti . atra ādyaśabdena ciraṃ cirāt cireṇeti vibhaktyantapratirūpakā avyayā gṛhyante . cirārthakāḥ cirākālārthakā ityarthaḥ . cirārthakā ityuktibhaṅgyā ciraśabdo'vyayo'pyastīti sūcitam . ata eva ʻsāyaṃciraṃprāhṇe . . . (4. 3. 23) ityatra vṛttāvuktam—sāyādayo na vyayā apīti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 336) . tathā ca ciraparicayaḥ, cirāyuḥ ityādayaḥ prayogā draṣṭavyāḥ . krameṇodārahaṇāni—cirāya yathā—ʻcirāya saṃtarpya samidbhiragnim iti (raghu. 13. 55) . ʻsaṃcitaṃ cirarātrāyö iti . ʻcirasya dṛṣṭeva mṛtotthitevö iti (ku. saṃ. 7. 4) . ʻciraṃ na sahate sthātuṃ parebhyo bhedaśaṅkayȫ iti (śiśu. 2. 29) . ʻcireṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindavaḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 24) . ʻcirāt sutasparśarasajñatāṃ yayaü iti (raghu. 3. 26) .. muhuḥ punaḥ—asakṛtsamāḥ . yasyāḥ kasyāścit kriyāyā anuparata evābhyāsavṛtteḥ etāni nāmāni . yathā—ʻśarāsanajyāṃ muhurāmamarśö iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 64) . ʻsrastāṃ nitambādavalambamānā punaḥpunaḥ kesaradāmakāñcīm iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 55) . ʻśaśvat priyamayaṃ brūte iti . abhīkṣṇamiti makārāntamavyayam . yathā—ʻabhīkṣṇamakṣuṇṇatayātidurgamam iti (śiśu. 1. 32) . ʻasakṛd bhaktihitaṃ hitābhilāṣī iti . śeṣe—ʻvāraṃvāraṃ śaśvadarthe iti . ʻvāraṃvāreṇa ceṣyate iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaśca (pṛ. 37, ślo. 1023) . yathā—ʻvāraṃ vāraṃ tirayati dṛśāvudgato bāṣpapūraḵ iti (mālatī. 1. 35) . ʻāste natānanastūṣṇīṃ vāraṃ vāreṇa niśvasan iti .. 1 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.001>  
cirāya cirarātrāya—cirārthakāḥ . ete cirārthakāḥ syuḥ . cirārtho dīrghakālaḥ . ʻcireṇa cirarātrāya dīrghakāle cirācciram iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 287, ślo. 1) .. muhuḥ punaḥ—asakṛtsamāḥ . ete paunaḥpunyārthakāḥ . vāraṃvāreṇa vāraṃvāraṃ śabdāvapi . ʻvāraṃvāraṃ śaśvadarthe vāraṃvāreṇa ceṣyate iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 37, ślo. 1023) . napuṃsakabhūto'bhīkṣṇaśabdo'pyasti . ʻabhīkṣṇamavyayaṃ vā syāt paunaḥpunyabhṛśārthayoḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 250, ślo. 2) .. 1 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.002ab srāgjhaṭityañjasāhnāyadrāṅmaṅkṣusapadi drute .
AK.03.04.002cd balavat suṣṭhu kimuta svatyatīva ca nirbhare .. 2 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.002>  
srāgjhaṭiti—drute . etāni drutārthe vartante . srāk—ʻsrāgvayo yāti dehinām . jhaṭiti—sutaśatamatyantadurlabhaṃ jhaṭiti . añjasā—añjasā yāti turagaḥ. ahnāya—ʻahnāya tāvadaruṇena tamo nirastam iti (raghu. 5. 71) . drāk—ʻdrāgbhaviṣyati sukhaṃ tava priye iti . maṅkṣu—ʻmaṅkṣūdapāti paritaḥ paṭalairalīnām iti (śiśu. 5. 37) . sapadi—ʻvacasastasya sapadi kriyā kevalamuttaram iti (śiśu. 2. 22) .. balavatsuṣṭhu—nirbhare . etāni nirbharārthe vartante . atrodāharaṇāni . balavat—ʻpunarvaśitvād balavannigṛhyö iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 69) . suṣṭhu—suṣṭhu pītaṃ mayā ghṛtam . kimuta—kimutādya kṛtaṃ kāryam . su—suvṛṣṭiḥ sasyavardhanī . ati—ʻativṛṣṭiranāvṛṣṭiḵ iti . atīva—atīva śobhate rājā .. 2 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.002>  
srāgjhaṭiti—sapadi drute . srāgādayaḥ sapta śīghrarūpārthe . krameṇa yathā—srāk sarantyabhisārikāḥ (gaṇaratna, pṛ. 36) . jhaṭiti—ʻānīya jhaḍiti ghaṭayati vidhirabhimatamabhimukhībhūtaḵ iti (ratnā. 1. 5) . eṣa mūrdhanyavargatṛtīyamadhyākṣaraḥ . jhaṭitīti vargaprathamamadhyākṣarastvapapāṭhaḥ . añjasā—suvarga lokamañjasā nayati . ahnāya—ʻahnāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarjö iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 86) . drāk—ʻpātāle drāgahibhayamathāstyeva nityam iti . maṅkṣu—ʻmaṅkṣūdapāti paritaḥ paṭalairalīnām iti (śiśu. 5. 37) . sapadi—ʻvacasastasya sapadi kriyā kevalamuttaram iti (śiśu. 2. 22) . jhagitīti kaṇṭhyavargatṛtīyamadhyākṣaro'pyasti . tathā ca gaṇaratnamahodadhau dvayamapyuktam—ʻahnāya maṅkṣu jhagiti jhaḍiti drāk srāk śaighrye iti . balavat—nirbhare . balavadādiṣaṭkaṃ nirbhare'timātre . krameṇa yathā—ʻbalavadapi śikṣitānāmātmanyapratyayaṃ cetaḵ iti (abhi. śā. 1. 2) . suṣṭhu—suṣṭhu pītaṃ mayā ghṛtam . kimuta—kimuta brahmavid yājñavalkyaḥ . gaṇaratnamahodadhau—ʻkiṃpunararthe'tiśaye praśne pakṣāntare'pi kimutö iti (pṛ. 7) . su—suvṛṣṭiḥ sasyavardhanī . ati—ativṛṣṭirabhūt . atīva—atīva kṣudhito'tithiḥ .. 2 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.002>  
srāgjhaṭiti—sapadi drute . ete śīghrārthe syuḥ .. balavat—nirbhare . ete ṣaṭ nirbhare iti sādhikārthe vartante . ʻkimutātīva balavadatisuṣṭhu su sādhike iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 287, ślo. 4) .. 2 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.003ab pṛthagvināntareṇarte hiruṅ nānā ca varjane .
AK.03.04.003cd yattadyatastato hetāvasākalye tu ciccana .. 3 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.003>  
pṛthagvinā—varjane . atrodāharaṇāni . pṛthak—kiṃcid dattvā pṛthakkriyām . vinā—ʻkṣaṇamapyutsahate na māṃ vinȫ iti (ku. saṃ. 4. 36) . antareṇa sutaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ bhuvi . ṛte—ʻṛte raveḥ kṣālayituṃ kṣameta kaḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 38) . hiruk—hiruk karmaṇāṃ mokṣaḥ . nānā—nānā viṣṇuṃ mokṣado nāsti devaḥ . etāni varjanārthe vartante .. yattadyatastato hetau . atrodāharaṇāni . yat—ʻvyāvṛttā yat parasvebhyaḵ iti (raghu. 1. 27) . tat—ʻtadidaṃ parirakṣa śobhane bhavitavyapriyasaṃgamaṃ vapuḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 4. 44) . yataḥ—ʻyato budhaiḥ sarvagatastvamucyase iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 58) . ʻyato gaṅgāmbhasi snātastato niṣkalmaṣo janaḵ iti . etāni hetvarthe vartante .. asākalye tu ciccana . atrodāharaṇe . cit—karoti kiṃcidabhyāsāt . cana—ʻapātre kuśalairdeyaṃ na kiṃcana dhanaṃ sadȫ iti . ete asākalyārthe vartete .. 3 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.003>  
pṛthagvinā—varjane . pṛthagādiṣaṭkaṃ varjanarūpārthe . pṛthag devadattam . pṛthag devadattena . pṛthag devadattāt (kāśikā. 1, pṛ. 117) . ʻpṛthagvinānānābhistṛtīyānyatarasyām (2. 3. 32) iti dvitīyātṛtīyāpañcamyaḥ . evaṃ vinānānāśabdayoge'pi vibhaktitrayam . tvāmantareṇa . ʻantarāntareṇa yukte (2. 3. 4) iti dvitīyā . ṛte—ʻṛte kṛśānorna hi mantrapūtamarhanti tejāṃsyaparāṇi havyam iti (ku. saṃ. 1. 52) . ʻanyārāditararte . . . ityādinā (2. 3. 29) ṛteyoge pañcamī . hiruk—ʻna hiruk karmaṇāṃ mokṣaḵ iti . (gaṇaratna. pṛ. 39) . karmaṇāṃ varjane sati mokṣo nāstītyarthaḥ . nānā—ʻnānā nārīṃ niṣphalā lokayātrȫ (gaṇaratna. pṛ. 41), ʻnānā viṣṇuṃ mokṣado nāsti devaḵ . atra mahodadhau—ʻpṛthagvinā ca varjane nānānekavinārthayoḥ, antarāntareṇa vinārthau hirugvarjane iti (pṛ. 41, pṛ. 39) .. yattadyatastato hetau . ʻyad vidyāsu pragalbho'si tatsarvairapi pūjyase . ʻyato meghāḥ samunnādāstato vṛṣṭirbhaviṣyati iti .. asākalye tu ciccana . asākalye paritaśchinnaparimāṇe yathā . cit—atra kecidāhuḥ . cana—smṛtiranyeti kecana .. 3 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.003>  
pṛthagvinā—varjane . ete ṣaṭ varjanārthe .. yattadyatastato hetau . ete ca hetvarthe .. asākalye tu ciccana . etau dvau asākalyārthe .. 3 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.615
AK.03.04.004ab kadācijjātu sārdhaṃ tu sākaṃ satrā samaṃ saha .
AK.03.04.004cd ānukūlyārthakaṃ prādhvaṃ vyarthake tu vṛthā mudhā .. 4 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.004>  
kadācijjātu . atrodāharaṇe . ʻkadācidupaviṣṭena jñāyate jātu na śramaḵ iti . ete ekadārthe vartete .. sārdhaṃ tu sākaṃ satrā samaṃ saha . atrodāharaṇāni . sārdham—ʻsārdhamuddhavasīribhyām iti (śiśu. 2. 2) . sākam—patnyā sākaṃ patirbhuṅkte . satrā—satrā kalatreṇa sukhaṃ samaśnute . samam—ʻsamaṃ vadhūbhirvalabhīryuvānaḵ iti (śiśu. 3. 53) . saha—ʻniḥśvāsadhūmaṃ saha ratnabhābhiḵ iti (śiśu. 4. 1) etāni sahārthe vartante .. ānukūlyārthakaṃ prādhvam . ʻsavyetaraṃ prādhvamitaḥ prayuṅkte iti (raghu. 13. 43) . etadānukūlyārthe vartate .. vyarthake tu vṛthā mudhā . vṛthā—ʻprayuktamapyastramito vṛthā syāt (raghu. 2. 34) . mudhā—ʻtatra bhramatyeva mudhā ṣaḍaṅghriḵ iti . ete vyarthakārthe vartete .. 4 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.004>  
kadācijjātu . aniyatakālasyaite nāmanī . yathā—ʻkadācidāsannasakhīmukhena sȫ iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 6) . jātu—ʻtatrāniśaṃ niṣaṇṇāptā jānakī jātu na śramam iti .. sārdhaṃ tu sākaṃ satrā samaṃ saha . pañcaitāni sahetyasya nāmāni . sārdham—ʻsārdhamuddhavasīribhyām iti (śiśu. 2. 2) . sākam—ʻsākaṃ śaktidhareṇa tatrabhavato devād bhavānīpateḵ iti . satrā—ʻsatrā kalatramitraiśca gārhasthyaṃ sukhamaśnute iti . samam—ʻsamaṃ vadhūbhirvalabhīryuvānaḵ iti (śiśu. 3. 53) . saha—putreṇa sahāgataḥ pitā (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 115) . etairyoge ʻsahayukte'pradhāne (2. 3. 19) iti tṛtīyā . samakaṃ sajūriti śabdāvapyatra . ʻsamakaṃ caturaṅgasenayȫ, ʻsajūrdevaiḵ iti .. ānukūlyārthakaṃ prādhvam yathā—ʻsavyetaraṃ prādhvamitaḥ prayuṅkte (raghu. 13. 43) . atra ʻprādhvaṃ bandhane (1. 4. 78) iti bandhanahetukamānukūlyamabhipretam . tataśca savyetaraṃ bhujamaṅgulibandhanenānukūlaṃ kṛtvā prayuṅkte ityarthaḥ .. vyarthake tu vṛthā mudhā . yathā—ʻvṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam iti . mudhā—ʻmugdhe mudhā mā kupaḵ iti . ayaṃ vargacaturthopadha ityāhuḥ .. 4 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.004>  
kadācijjātu . etau dvau viśṣyājñātakālārthakau . ʻohamāṭü .. sārdhaṃ tu sākaṃ satrā samaṃ saha . ete pañca sāhityārthe . ʻkūḍuṭö . kvacittu satrāśabdaḥ satramiti mānto'pi . ʻsamakaṃ tu sajūḥ sākaṃ sārdhaṃ satraṃ samaṃ sahö iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 288, ślo. 17) .. ānukūlyārthakaṃ prādhvam . prādhvaṃśabdaḥ ānukūlyārthakaḥ . namrārthe'pi syāt . ʻprādhvaṃ namrānukūlayoḵ iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 189, ślo. 46) .. vyarthake tu vṛthā mudhā . vyarthaka iti niṣphalārthe .. 4 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.616
AK.03.04.005ab āho utāho kimuta vikalpe ki kimūta ca .
AK.03.04.005cd tu hi ca sma ha vai pādapūraṇe pūjane svati .. 5 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.005>  
āho utāho—kimūta ca . atrodāharaṇāni . āho—ʻāho svidāsārayadacyuto'ṅgāt iti . utāho—ʻutāho brahma cocyate iti . kimuta—ʻkimuta tvaṃ śivo brahmā viṣṇurvā yadi devarāṭ iti . kim—sthāṇurayaṃ kiṃ puruṣaḥ . kimu—kimu te kāryamutānyadīyakāryam . uta—ʻuta yena bibharṣi tat (ku. saṃ. 6. 23) . etāni vikalpārthe vartante .. tu hi ca sma ha vai pādapūraṇe . atrodāharaṇāni . tu—rāmastu lakṣmaṇaṃ prāha . hi—ahaṃ hi yāsye nagaram . ca—sa ca prāha ca rājānam . sma—mayā sma bhuktaṃ sahasā . ha—rāmaḥ prāha ha lakṣmaṇam . vai—tena vai rākṣaso hataḥ . etāni pādapūraṇārthe vartante .. pūjane svati . su—supanthāḥ . ati—atipanthāḥ . ete pūjane vartete .. 5 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.005>  
āho utāho—kimūta ca . yathā—ʻsthāṇurayamāho puruṣaḵ iti (gaṇaratna. pṛ. 10) . utāho—ʻparamātmāthavānanta utāho brahma ucyate iti . kimuta—sthāṇurayaṃ kimuta puruṣaḥ . ʻśabdaḥ kiṃ nityo'nityo vā kimü iti dvyakṣaro nipātaḥ . yathā—ʻuta mukhaṃ sudṛśaḥ kimu vārijam iti . āho ityādiṣaṭkaṃ vitarkasaṃśaye vartate ityarthaḥ . āho iti padaṃ dīrghādi hrasvādi ca .. tu hi ca sma vai pādapūraṇe . ślokapāde sārthakākṣarairaparipūraṇe sati chandasaḥpūrtaye prakṛtopayuktārthaparatvābhāve'pi stobhākṣaravat prayoktavyā ityarthaḥ . yathā—ākhyāsyāmi tu te vārtām . hi—ʻutphullakamalakesaraparāgagauradyute mama hi gauri iti (nāgā. 1. 13) . ca—sa ca prāha ca rājānam . sma—ʻiti ha smāhurācāryāḵ . vai—ʻyo vai yuvāpyadhīyānaḵ iti (ma. smṛ. 2. 156) .. pūjane svati . yathā—supanthāḥ, atipanthāḥ iti . ʻna pūjanāt (5. 4. 69) iti samāsāntapratiṣedhaḥ .. 5 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.005>  
āho utāho—kimūta ca . ete ṣaḍ vikalpārthakāḥ . sthāṇurayamāho puruṣaḥ . hrasvādiśca dṛṣṭaḥ . ʻāho utāho ca vikalpārthe prayoktṛbhiḵ iti bhāguriḥ .. tu hi ca—pādapūraṇe . ete ṣaṭ pādapūraṇārthakāḥ .. pūjane svati . etau pūjanārthe .. 5 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.617
AK.03.04.006ab divāhnītyatha doṣā ca naktaṃ ca rajanāviti .
AK.03.04.006cd tiryagarthe sāci tiro'pyatha saṃbodhanārthakāḥ .. 6 ..
AK.03.04.007ab syuḥ pāṭ pyāḍaṅga he hai bhoḥ samayā nikaṣā hiruk .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.006>  
divāhnīti . divā—ʻkecid divā tathā rātraü (devīmā. 1. 36) . etad ahnīti saptamyarthe eva vartate .. atha doṣā—rajanāviti . doṣā—corā doṣā yayuḥ pathi . naktam—ʻnaktamāpānabhūmiṣü iti (ku. saṃ. 6. 42) . etau śabdau rajanau rātrau saptamyarthe'pi vartete .. tiryagarthe sāci tiraḥ . sāci—ʻcumbanāyodyate patyau vadhvā sācīkṛtaṃ mukham iti . tiraḥ—meghaistirodhīyate tīkṣṇaraśmiḥ . etau tiryagarthe vartete .. atha saṃbodhana—he hai bhoḥ . atrodāharaṇāni . pāṭ—pāṭ priye hyehi me'ntikam . pyāṭ—pyāṭ putra paṭha sarvadā . aṅga—ʻśrūyatāmaṅga vāmapi iti (śiśu. 2. 12) . he—he vṛkṣa kiṃ kampase . hai—hai vaṭo bhaikṣamāhara . bho—bho rāvaṇa tiṣṭha mamāgrato yudhi . etāni saṃbodhanārthaṃ kathayanti .. samayā nikaṣā hiruk . samayā—samayā parvataṃ nadī . nikaṣā—āpaḥ kharāṃśuṃ nikaṣā nyakārṣuḥ . hiruk—parvatasya hiruṅ nadī . ete samīpārthe vartante .. 6 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.006>  
divāhnīti . divetyetadavyayam adhikaraṇe, pradhāna eva vāhaḥśabdārthe vartata iti darśayitumitikaraṇaṃ kṛtam . yathā—ʻkecid divā tathā rātrau prāṇinastulyadṛṣṭayaḵ (devīmā. 1. 36) iti .. atha doṣā ca naktaṃ ca rajanāviti . atrāpi doṣetyākārāntam, naktamiti makārāntaṃ cetyavyayadvayam . adhikaraṇapradhāne rajaniśabdārthe rātrirūpe vartata iti darśayitumitikaraṇaṃ kṛtam . yathā—ʻdoṣā caranti corā naktaṃcarāḵ iti .. tiryagarthe sāci tiro'pi . yathā—ʻsāci locanayugaṃ namayantī iti (kirā. 9. 44) . tiraḥ—tiro'ñcatīti tiryak . ʻtirasastiryalope (6. 3. 94) iti tiri ityayamādeśo bhavati .. atha saṃbodhana—he hai bhoḥ . saṃbodhanamabhimukhīkaraṇam . pyāṭ—pyāṭ putra paṭha satvaram . pāṭ—śīghramāyāhi pāṭ priye . kecittu pyāṭ pāḍiti oṣṭhyavargaprathamamidaṃ paṭhanti . apare tu phāḍiti dvitīyamādim antastharahitaṃ cāhuḥ . pāṭ pāntha madgṛhe bhuṅkṣva, phāṭ sakhe phalito mākandaḥ . aṅga—ʻmama tāvanmatamidaṃ śrūyatāmaṅga vāmapi iti (śiśu. 2. 12) . he—he vṛkṣa kiṃ kampase . hai—hai vaṭo bhaikṣamāhara . bhoḥ saptadvīpavartino rājānaścetayadhvam . ayaṃ sakārāntaḥ, visarjanīyarahita okārānto'pyasti . yathā—ʻbho bho jāmadagnyö iti . nanubataśabdāvapyatra .. samayā nikaṣā hiruk . etat trayaṃ sāmīpye vartate . vārāṇasī gaṅgāṃ samayā . vārāṇasī gaṅgāyāḥ samīpe ityarthaḥ . nikaṣā—ʻvilaṅghya laṅkāṃ nikaṣā haniṣyati iti (śiśu. 1. 68) . ʻabhitaḥ paritaḥ samayā nikaṣā hā pratiyoge'pi (vā. 1. 4. 48) ityubhayatra dvitīyā . hiruk—gaṅgāyā hiruk vārāṇasī . gaṅgāsamīpe vārāṇasītyarthaḥ . uttaratra ʻnikaṣāntike (ślo. 19) iti nikaṣāśabdasya sāmīpyalakṣaṇārthe vakṣyamāṇatvād iha samayāditrayaṃ madhyarūpārthe vartata iti subhūticandraḥ .. 6 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.006>  
divāhnīti . divāśabdo'hnīti saptamyarthe . aharmātre'pi vadanti .. atha doṣā—rajanāviti . doṣā naktaṃ śabdau rajanāviti saptamyarthe . rajanīmātrārthe'pi vadanti . anavyayāvityapi vadanti . tathā ca viśvaprakāśikā—(pṛ. 171, ślo. 7; pṛ. 191, ślo. 64)—
ʻdoṣaḥ syād dūṣaṇe pāpe doṣā rātrau bhuje'pi cö .
ʻdoṣā rātrimukhe rātrāvatrānavyayamapyasaü .
iti . ʻvasatiḥ sthānanaktayoḵ iti dhvanimañjarī .. tiryagarthe sāci tiraḥ . tiryagarthe strīliṅgaḥ sāciśabdo'pyasti . ʻtiryak sāci striyām iti ratnakośaḥ .. atha saṃbodhana—he hai bhoḥ . aye, hanta, haṃho śabdā api syuḥ .
ʻhaṃho siṃhaṇabhūpa tāvakayaśaḥ karpūramurvībhṛtāṃ
vikrīṇan kaṭakeṣu jīvati ciraṃ śrīmān kaliṅgaḥ kaviḥ .
iti . reśabdaḥ nīcasaṃbodhanārthakaḥ .
ʻre re kokila mā bhaja maunaṃ
kicidudañcaya pañcamarāgam .. iti .
samayā nikaṣā hiruk . ete samīpārthe .. 6 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.007cd atarkite tu sahasā syāt puraḥ purato'grataḥ .. 7 ..
AK.03.04.008ab svāhā devahavirdāne śrauṣaḍ vauṣaḍ vaṣaṭ svadhā .
AK.03.04.008cd kiṃcidīṣanmanāgalpe pretyāmutra bhavāntare .. 8 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.007-8>  
atarkite tu sahasā . yathā—ʻsahasā vidadhīta na kriyām iti (kirā. 2. 30) . avicāritārthasya nāma .. syāt puraḥ purato'grataḥ . puraḥ—ʻpuraḥ sakhīnāmamimīta locane iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 15) . purataḥ—purato'valokya . agrataḥ—ʻpratyarthino'grato lekhyam (yā. smṛ. 2. 1. 6) iti . etānyagrasamārthāni .. svāhā deva—vaṣaṭ svadhā . atrodāharaṇāni . svāhā—ʻagnaye svāhȫ (tai. saṃ. 1. 4. 28. 1) śrauṣaṭ—ʻastu śrauṣaṭ (tai. saṃ. 1. 6. 11. 1) vauṣaṭ—ʻindrāya vauṣaṭ . vaṣaṭ—ʻśikhāyai vaṣaṭ (varada. upa. 2. 2) . ʻsvadhā—ʻsvadhā pitṛbhyaḵ (tai. saṃ. 1. 1. 11. 1) . ete devebhyo havirdāne vartante .. kiṃcidīṣanmanāgalpe . kiṃcit—ʻkiṃcid vihasyārthapatiṃ babhāṣe iti (raghu. 2. 46) . īṣat—īṣaduṣṇaṃ payaḥ piba . manāk—ʻmanāganabhyāvṛttyā vȫ iti (śiśu. 2. 43) . etānyalpārthe vartante .. pretyāmutra bhavāntare . ʻpretya svarge mahīyate (rāmā. 1. 1. 99) . amutra—ʻiha vāmutra vaikeṣāṃ bhāvastatra prayojanam iti (yā. smṛ. 3. 4. 133) . etau janmāntare vartete .. 7-8 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.007-8>  
atarkite tu sahasā syāt . yathā—ʻsahasā vidadhīta na kriyām iti (kirā. 2. 30) .. puraḥ purato'grataḥ . ete trayo'graśabdasamānārthāḥ . puraḥ—ʻpuraḥ sakhīnāmamimīta locane iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 15) . purataḥ—purato'valokya . agrataḥ—ʻpratyārthino'grato lekhyaṃ yathāveditamarthinȫ iti (yā. smṛ. 2. 1. 6) .. svāhā deva—vaṣaṭ svadhā . yaduddeśena puroḍāśādikaṃ tyājyamiti śrutivākyeṣu dṛśyate sā devatā devatāśabdenocyate . evaṃ cāyamarthaḥ saṃpannaḥ . coditāṃ devatāmuddiśya dravyapradāne prakāśye svāhādayaḥ śabdā vartante . yathā—ʻagnaye svāhȫ (tai. saṃ. 1. 4. 18. 1) . śrauṣaṭ—ʻastu śrauṣaṭ (tai. saṃ. 1. 6. 11. 1) . vauṣaṭ—ʻsomasyāgne vīhi vauṣaṭ (ai. brā. 3. 5) . vaṣaṭ—ʻindrāya vaṣaṭ (tai. saṃ. 3. 5. 4. 6) iti . svadhā—ʻā svadhetyāśrāvayati, astu svadheti pratyāśrāvayati iti (tai. brā. 1. 6. 9. 5) .. kiṃcidīṣanmanāgalpe . alpe'lpārthe vartante . yathā—ʻkiṃcid vihasyārthapatiṃ babhāṣe iti (raghu. 2. 46) . īṣat—ʻīṣaduṣṇaṃ payaḥ pibö iti . manāk—ʻmanāganabhyāvṛttyā vā kāmaṃ kṣāmyatu yaḥ kṣamī iti (śiśu. 2. 43) .. pretyāmutra bhavāntare . etad dvayaṃ bhavāntare janmāntare . pretyeti lyabantakapratirūpakamavyayamidam . lyabantatve tu janmāntararūpārthavirodhaḥ syāt . bhavo maraṇānantarabhāvivartamānaśarīrāsaṅgānantaraparigraha ityarthaḥ . ʻpretya svarge mahīyate (rāmā. 1. 1. 99) iti . amutra—ʻamutra bhavitā yatte taccintaya śubhāśubham iti (svāmī pṛ. 339) .. 7-8 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.007-8>  
atarkite tu sahasā . sahasāśabdaḥ atarkitārthe . akasmācchabdo'pi syāt . akasmāt kupyati bhavān .. syāt puraḥ purato'grataḥ . ete agrārthe .. svāhā deva—vaṣaṭ svadhā . ete devatānāṃ havirdānārthe .. kiṃcidīṣanmanāgalpe . ete alpārthe .. pretyāmutra bhavāntare . etau bhavāntarārthe .. 7-8  </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.621
AK.03.04.009ab vad vā yathā tathevaivaṃ sāmye'ho hī ca vismaye .
AK.03.04.009cd maune tu tūṣṇīṃ tūṣṇīkāṃ sadyaḥ sapadi tatkṣaṇe .. 9 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.009>  
vad vā yathā tathevaivaṃ sāmye . atrodārahaṇāni . vat—ʻsomavat priyadarśanaḵ (rāmā. 1. 1. 18) iti . vā—ʻpuṣpekṣaṇairbimbitalocanairvȫ iti . yathā—ʻtasyārtasya yathauṣadham iti (raghu. 1. 28) . tathā—ʻyathā tathaivāvarajeṣu vṛttim iti (raghu. 14. 21) . iva—ʻinduḥ kṣīranidhāvivö iti (raghu. 1. 12) . evam—ʻagnirevaṃ dvijo bhasmasātkuryādavamānitaḵ iti . etāni sāmye vartante .. aho hi ca vismaye . ʻaho me saubhāgyaṃ mama ca bhavabhūteśca bhaṇitam iti (bho. pra. pṛ. 56, ślo. 253) . hī—ʻhatavidhilasitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḵ iti (śiśu. 11. 64) . ete vismaye vartete .. maune tu tūṣṇīṃ tūṣṇīkām . tūṣṇīm—ʻtūṣṇīmetāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇām iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 2. 13) . tūṣṇīkām—ʻjapannāste munirdevīṃ tūṣṇīkāṃ jalamadhyagaḵ iti . ete maunasya nāmanī .. sadyaḥ sapadi tatkṣaṇe . sadyaḥ—ʻsadyo hatanyaṅkubhirasradigdhaṃ vyāghraiḥ padaṃ teṣu nidhīyate me iti (raghu. 16. 15) sapadi—ʻsārundhatīkāḥ sapadi prādurāsan puraḥ prabhoḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 6. 4) ete tatkṣaṇārthe vartete .. 9 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.009>  
vad vā yathā tathevaivaṃ sāmye . atra vacchabdena vatipratyayāntā gṛhyante . ʻtena tulyaṃ kriyā cedvatiḵ (5. 1. 115) iti . yathā—ʻpuṃvatpragalbhȫ iti (raghu. 6. 20) . ʻtatra tasyevö (5. 1. 116) iti vatiḥ . yathā—brāhmaṇa iva brāhmaṇavat . vā—ʻviśeṣako vā viśiśeṣa yasyāṃ śriyaṃ trilokītilakaḥ sa evö iti (śiśu. 3. 63) . yathā—ʻtasyārtasya yathauṣadham iti (raghu. 1. 28) . tathā—ʻśivaḥ pūjyastathā guruḵ iti . iva—kamalamiva mukham . evam—yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti .. aho hīti vismaye . sāmye aho ityakārapraśleṣaḥ . aho iti dvyakṣaro nipātaḥ . ʻaho me saubhāgyam iti (bho. pra. pṛ. 56, ślo. 253) . hī—ʻhatavidhilasitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḵ iti (śiśu. 11. 64) .. maune tu tūṣṇīṃ tūṣṇīkām . maune vāgvṛttiparityāge yathā—tūṣṇīmāste ityādi . ʻtūṣṇīmaḥ kām pratyayo vaktavyaḵ (vā. 5. 3. 71) iti kām pratyaye tūṣṇīkāmāste (kāśikā. 2, pṛ. 70) . kām pratyayasyājñānakutsānukampādyarthaviśeṣavivakṣāyāmeva vidhānāt tūṣṇīkāṃ śabdasya maunaviśeṣo'rthaḥ . tūṣṇīṃśabdasya maunamātramartha ityarthabhede satyapi pradhānamātrasyābhedāt paryāyatvamuktamiti vijñeyam .. sadyaḥ sapadi tatkṣaṇe . tatkṣaṇe tatkāle . yathā—ʻsadyo hatanyaṅkubhirasradigdham iti (raghu. 16. 15) . sapadi—ʻsapadi mukulitākṣīṃ rudrasaṃrambhabhītyȫ iti (ku. saṃ. 3. 76) .. 9 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.009>  
vad vā yathā tathevaivaṃ sāmye . ete sāmyārthe .. aho hīti vismaye . etau vismayārthe . tantrāt hiśabdasyāpi grahaṇam . ʻaho hi ho ahahā ca nanā paśyata vismaye iti śṛṅgāraprākāśikā .. maune tu—sapadi tatkṣaṇe . etau tatkṣaṇārthe .. 9 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.010ab diṣṭyā samupajoṣaṃ cetyānande'thāntare'ntarā .
AK.03.04.010cd antareṇa ca madhye syuḥ prasahya tu haṭhārthakam .. 10 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.010>  
diṣṭyā samupajoṣaṃ cetyānande . yathā—ʻdiṣṭyā tvamasi me dhātrā bhītenevopapāditaḵ iti (raghu. 15. 18) . ʻsamupajoṣaṃ bhavān jayati iti . ete ānandasya nāmanī .. athāntare—madhye syuḥ . atrodāharaṇāni . antare—ʻāvayorantare jātāḥ saritsāgaraparvatāḵ iti (mahānāṭaka 5. 25) . antarā—ʻantarā tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḵ (sara. kaṇṭhā. pṛ. 58) . antareṇa—ʻmṛṇālasūtrāmalamantareṇa sthitaścalaccāmarayordvayaṃ saḵ iti (śiśu. 3. 3) . etāni madhyārthe vartante .. prasahya tu haṭhārthakam . yathā—ʻprasahya dāsyabhigame iti (yā. smṛ. 2. 24. 291) . etad haṭhārthasya balātkārasya nāma .. 10 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.010> 
diṣṭhyā śamupajoṣaṃ cetyānande . itiśabdo'tra śabdasvarūpanirdeśārthaḥ . navānandārthaḥ . tataśca diṣṭyādayastrayaḥ ānande citraharṣe vartanta iti sūbhūticandraḥ . yathā—ʻdeva diṣṭhyā vardhase iti . śamiti tālavyādi māntamavyayaṃ ca . ʻśaṃ no vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśvā śaṃ nastapatu sūryaḵ iti (tai. ā. 4. 42. 1) . ʻśaṃkaraḥ śaṃ karotu naḵ iti . upajoṣam—ʻupajoṣamihāsmahe iti . tathā ca vaijayantī—ʻsukhe diṣṭyopajoṣaṃ śam iti (pṛ. 288, ślo. 17) . subodhinīkārastu—ʻdiṣṭyā samupajoṣam iti paṭhitvā dvitīyaṃ śabdaṃ pañcākṣaradantyoṣṭhyādi ca manvāno ʻdiṣṭyā samupajoṣaṃ cö ityavyayadvayamānande vartata iti vyākhyāya udājahāra—ʻdiṣṭyā putro jātaḥ, samupajoṣaṃ śubhaṃ ceti makārāntamavyayadvayamapyatra vijñeyamiti .. athāntare—madhye syuḥ . antare iti saptamyantapratirūpakamekārāntamavyayam . tadādāya trayaḥ śabdā yatkiṃciddvayāpekṣayā madhyarūpārthe vartante . yathā—antare parvatayoḥ nadī . antarā—ʻantarā tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḵ (sara. kaṇṭhā. pṛ. 58) . antareṇa—ʻmātaraṃ pitaraṃ cāntareṇa putraḵ iti . ʻantarāntareṇa yukte (2. 3. 4) iti dvitīyā . atra gaṇaratnamahodadhikāraḥ—ʻantarāntareṇeti madhyamādheyapradhānamācakṣate iti (pṛ. 32) .. prasahya tu haṭhārthakam . prasahyeti lyabantapratirūpako nipāto balātkāraśabdasamānārtha ityarthaḥ . yathā—ʻprasahya siṃhaḥ kila tāṃ cakarṣö iti (raghu. 2. 27) .. 10 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.010>  
diṣṭyā samupajoṣaṃ cetyānande . etau ānandārthe . joṣaṃśabdo nānārthavarge gataḥ (pṛ. 598, ślo. 251) .. athāntare—madhye syuḥ . ete madhyārthe .. prasahya tu haṭhārthakam . prasahyaśabdo balātkārārthe .. 10 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.011ab yukte dve sāṃprataṃ sthāne'bhīkṣṇaṃ śaśvadanārate .
AK.03.04.011cd abhāve nahya no nāpi māsma mālaṃ ca vāraṇe .. 11 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.011>  
yukte dve sāṃprataṃ sthāne . yathā—ʻsvayaṃ chettumasāṃpratam iti (ku. saṃ. 2. 55) . sthāne yathā—ʻsthāne bhāvānekanarādhipaḥ sannakiṃcanatvaṃ makhajaṃ vyanakti iti (raghu. 5. 16) . ete dve yuktārthe vartete .. abhīkṣṇaṃ śaśvadanārate . yathā—ʻabhīkṣṇamuṣṇairapi tasya soṣmaṇaḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 65) . śaśvad bhavaḥ śāśvataḥ . etāvanāratārthaṃ kathayataḥ .. abhāve nahi no nāpi . apiśabdād nañapi . yathā—ʻnahi svātmārāmaṃ viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇā mṛgayate iti . no—ʻno cakrī kiṃ kulālaḵ iti . na—ʻna me kiṃcana dahyate iti . a—ʻarājadaivikaṃ naṣṭaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dāpyastu vāhakaḵ iti (yā. smṛ. 2. 16. 197) . ete 'bhāve nāstītyarthe vartante .. māsma mālaṃ ca vāraṇe . atrodāharaṇāni . māsma —ʻsaudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho māsma bhūrujjayinyāḵ iti (megha. 1. 28) . mā—ʻmā bhūdāśramapīḍeti (raghu. 1. 37) . alam—ʻalaṃ mahīpāla tava śrameṇö iti (raghu. 2. 34) . etāni vāraṇārthe vartante .. 11 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.011>  
yukte dve sāṃprataṃ sthāne . sāṃpratamiti makārāntam, sthāne ityokārāntaṃ cetyavyayamiti yuktarūpārthe vartete . yathā—ʻviṣavṛkṣo'pi saṃvardhya svayaṃ chettumasāṃpratam iti (ku. saṃ. 2. 55) . yuktaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ . sthāne yathā—ʻsthāne bhavānekarādhipaḥ sannakiṃcanatvaṃ makhajaṃ vyanakti iti (raghu. 5. 16) .. abhīkṣṇaṃ śaśvadanārate . anārate sarvakāla ityarthaḥ . yathā—abhīkṣṇamannaṃ dadāti . ajasraṃ dadātītyarthaḥ . śaśvad bhavaḥ śāśvataḥ .. abhāve nahya no nāpi . nahyādicatuṣkamabhāve niṣedhe vartate . nahīti dvyakṣaramekaṃ padam . yathā—ʻnahi svātmārāmaṃ viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇā bhramayati iti . akāraḥ kevalaḥ pratiṣedhe . yathā—svayamapacanti parivrājakāḥ . svayaṃ na pacantītyarthaḥ . ʻhāsakaramidamadhanute nitarāṃ śirasīva kaṅkaṇamupoḍhamūrdhaje iti māghakāvye ca . no—ʻno cakrī kiṃ kulālaḵ iti . na—ʻna me kiṃcana dahyate iti . apiśabdād nañ niṣedhe yathā—ʻanādirantaḵ ityādi . ʻnalopo nañaḵ (6. 3. 73) iti nakāralopaḥ . atra subhūticandraḥ—anaśabdo'pi niṣedhe . yathā—ʻanopamā te buddhiḵ iti śṛṅgāraprakāśe iti .. māsma mālaṃ ca vāraṇe . māsmetyādayastrayo nivāraṇārthe vartante . yathā—ʻsaudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho māsma bhūrujjayinyāḵ iti (megha. 1. 28) . mā—ʻmā bhūdāśramapīḍeti parimeyapuraḥsaraü iti (raghu. 1. 37) . alam—ʻalaṃ mahīpāla tava śrameṇö iti (raghu. 2. 34) . māṅvyatiriktaḥ kevalo'pi māśabdo nipātaḥ pratiṣedhavacanaḥ . yathā—ʻmā cāpalāyeti gaṇān vyanaiṣīt iti (ku. saṃ 3. 41) .. 11 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.01
yukte dve sāṃprataṃ sthāne . ete yukte iti ucitārthe .. abhīkṣṇaṃ śaśvadanārate . anāratārthe 'vicchede'rthe .. abhāve nahya no nāpi . ete'bhāvārthe .. māsma mālaṃ ca vāraṇe . etāni vāraṇe iti niṣedhārthe . caśabdād nahyādayo'pi syuḥ . ʻna hi no anamā māsma pratiṣedhe prakīrtitāḥ prakīrtitāḵ iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 36, ślo. 1017) .. 11 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.626
AK.03.04.012ab pakṣāntare cedyadi ca tattve tvaddhāñjasā dvayam .
AK.03.04.012cd prākāśye prādurāviḥ syādomevaṃ paramaṃ mate .. 12 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.03.012>  
pakṣāntare cedyadi ca . yathā—ʻsatyaṃ cet tapasā ca kiṃ śuci mano yadyasti tīrthena kim iti (nī. śa. 37) . etau pakṣāntare vartete .. tattve tvaddhāñjasā dvayam . udāharaṇe . addhā—ʻārādhito'ddhā manurapsarobhiḵ iti . (sara. kaṇṭhā. pṛ. 58) . añjasā—ʻañjaseti rurudhuḥ kacagrahaiḵ iti (raghu. 19. 31) . etau tattve niścaye vartete .. prakāśe prādurāviḥ syāt . yathā—ʻprādurāsīd vasuṃdharȫ iti (raghu. 15. 83) . ʻāvirbabhūva kuśagarbhamukhaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ yūtham iti (raghu. 9. 55) . ete prakāśasya nāmanī .. omevaṃ paramaṃ mate . yathā—ʻomityuktavato'tha śārṅgiṇa iti vyāhṛtya vācaṃ nabhaḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 75) . evam—ʻevaṃ yadāttha bhagavan iti (ku. saṃ. 2. 31) . paramam—ʻtataḥ paramamityuktvȫ iti (ku. saṃ. 6. 35) . ete mate 'ṅgīkāre vartante .. 12 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.012>  
pakṣāntare cedyadi ca . anekapakṣasaṃbhāvanāyām anyatarapakṣaviśeṣaparigraharūpārthe dvāvetau śabdau vartete . yathā ca ʻkoṭidvayanipāte ekakoṭiparigrahaḥ yadyarthaḵ iti vallabhācāryaḥ . yathā—ʻsatyaṃ cet tapasā ca kiṃ śuci mano yadyasti tīrthena kim iti (nī. śa. 37) .. tattve tvaddhāñjasā dvayam . yathā ʻaddhā śriyaṃ pālitasaṃgarāya pratyarpayiṣyatyanaghāṃ sa sādhuḵ iti (raghu. 13. 65) . añjasā—ʻañjasā vakti sajjanaḵ iti .. prakāśe prādurāviḥ syāt . yathā—ʻprādurāsīt prajāpatiḵ iti . āviḥ—ʻāvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḵ iti (megha. 1. 21) .. omevaṃ paramaṃ mate . mate'ṅgīkāre omiti . yathā—ʻomityuktavato'tha śārṅgiṇaḵ iti (śiśu. 1. 75) . evam—ʻoṃ tathā . evametad yathāttha tvam iti . paramam—ʻtataḥ paramamityuktvā pratasthe munimaṇḍalam iti (ku. saṃ. 6. 35) .. 12 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.012>  
pakṣāntare cedyadi ca . etau pakṣāntarārthe . ʻca pādapūraṇe pakṣāntare hetau viniścaye iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 36, ślo. 1018) .. tattve tvaddhāñjasā dvayam . etad dvayaṃ tattve iti paramārthe .. prakāśe prādurāviḥ syāt . ete dve prakāśe iti prākaṭyārthe . prādurabhūt . sākṣāditi pāṭhe vyavahite'pi syātām . ʻabhavan yugapad vilolajihvāyugalīḍhobhayasṛkkabhāgamāviḵ iti (śiśu. 20. 42) .. omevaṃ paramaṃ mate . etāni matātha .. 12 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.627
AK.03.04.013ab samantatastu paritaḥ sarvato viṣvagityapi .
AK.03.04.013cd akāmānumatau kāmamasūyopagame'stu ca .. 13 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.013>  
samantatastu—viṣvagityapi . udāharaṇāni . ʻsamantato varṣati meghasaṃghaḵ iti . paritaḥ—ʻāyānti paritaḥ striyaḵ iti . sarvataḥ—ʻtvaṃ sarvatogāmi ca sādhakaṃ cö iti . (ku. saṃ. 3. 12) . viṣvak—ʻviṣvak taṭeṣu patati sphuṭamantarikṣam iti . etāni sarvato'rthe vartante .. akāmānumatau kāmam . yathā—ʻkāmaṃ kṣāmyatu yaḥ kṣamī iti (śiśu. 2. 43) etadakāmānumatau aniścayāṅgīkṛtau vartate .. asūyopagame'stu ca . cakārād bhavatvityapi . atra udāharaṇe . astu—ʻtathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 82) . bhavatu—ʻbhavatu bhavatvasuhṛjjanaḥ sakāmaḵ iti . etāvasūyayā aṅgīkāre vartete .. 13 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.013>  
samantatastu—viṣvagityapi . samantata ityādicatuṣṭayaṃ kriyāyāḥ sarvadeśasaṃbandhitva . yathā—ʻsamantato varṣati meghasaṃghaḵ iti . paritaḥ—ʻāyānti paritaḥ śriyaḵ iti . sarvataḥ—sarvato'valokya . viṣvak—ʻviṣvaktaṭeṣu patati sphuṭamantarikṣam iti . itiśabdaḥ evaṃvidhāvyayāntarapradarśanārthaḥ . yathā—samantādavalokya ityādi .. akāmānumatau kāmam . kāmam ātmana icchāyā abhāve'pi parānurodhād balādvā kṛtamaṅgīkaraṇam anumatiḥ . yathā—ʻmanāganabhyāvṛttyā vā kāmaṃ kṣāmyatu yaḥ kṣamī iti (śiśu. 2. 43) . kadācidapi kṣamā na karaṇīyeti tanmatam . yadi karaṇīyeti parasya mataṃ, tarhi kvacideva kriyatāmityarthaḥ kāmamiti māntenāvyayena prakāśyate . subhūticandrastu ʻākāmānumatau kāmam iti dīrghādiṃ paṭhitvā nikāmānumatāviti vyācaṣṭa . tathā ca ʻkāmaṃ kāmābhyanujñāyāḵ iti trikāṇḍyāmuktam . rudrastu ubhayamapyāha—ʻākāmānumatau kāmamasūyopagame'pi cö iti .. asūyopagame'stu ca . asūyāpūrvake'ṅgīkāre yathā—ʻalaṃ vivādena yathā śrutastvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 82) . caśabdād bhavatuśabdo'pīti subodhinīkāraḥ . yathā—ʻbhavatu ko doṣaḵ iti .. 13 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.013>  
samantatastu—viṣvagityapi . etāni sarvatrārthe . samantācchabdo'pyasti . ʻparitaḥ sarvato viṣvak samantācca samantataḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 287, ślo. 3) .. akāmānumatau kāmam . kāmaṃśabdaḥ akāmapūrvakānumatau . asūyopagame'stu ca . astuśabdo'sūyāpūrvakābhyupagame'pi syāt . ʻastu syādabhyupagame'pyasūyāpīḍayorapi iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 186, ślo. 15) .. 13 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.629
AK.03.04.014ab nanu ca syād virodhoktau kaccit kāmapravedane .
AK.03.04.014cd niḥṣamaṃ duḥṣamaṃ garhye yathāsvaṃ tu yathāyatham .. 14 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.014>  
nanu ca syād virodhoktau . ʻnanu cātraṃ tugāgamaḥ kathaṃ bhavati iti . nanu ceti virodhoktau vartate .. kaccit kāmapravedane . yathā—ʻāmṛśyate jānapadairna kaccit iti (raghu. 5. 9) . etat kāmapravedane iṣṭaparipraśne vartate .. niḥṣamaṃ duḥṣamaṃ garhye . yathā—niḥṣamaṃ vakti mūrkhaḥ . duḥṣamaṃ vartate vadhūḥ . etau garhye nindārthe vartete .. yathāsvaṃ tu yathāyatham . yathā—ʻyathāsvamāśramaiścakre iti (raghu. 17. 65) . yathāyathaṃ palāyantaḥ . etāvātmanyātmīye vartete .. 14 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.014>  
nanu ca syād virodhoktau . yathā—nanu ca nityā vedāḥ; tvaduktaṃ vedānāmāptapraṇītatvaṃ viruddhamityarthaḥ .. kaccit kāmapravedane . svābhiprāyāviṣkaraṇaṃ kāmapravedanam . yathā—ʻkaccijjīvati te mātā kaccijjīvati te pitȫ ityādāvapi bhavadīyapitrorjīvanaṃ mamābhimatamityādirartho'vagantavyaḥ . kecittu—kāmapravedanaśabda iṣṭaparipraśne lakṣaṇayā vartata ityāhuḥ .. niḥṣamaṃ duḥṣamaṃ garhye . nirgataṃ samaṃ niḥṣamam . duṣṭaṃ samaṃ duḥṣamam . ʻtiṣṭhadguprabhṛtīni cö (2. 1. 17) ityavyayībhāve ʻsuvinirdurbhyaḥ supisūtisamāḵ (8. 3. 88) iti ṣatvam . tathā ca mahodadhau—(pṛ. 133) ʻnirgataṃ samaṃ nirgatatvaṃ samasyeti vā samānniṣkrānto vā niḥṣamam . ʻduṣṭaṃ samaṃ, duṣṭatvaṃ vā samasya duḥṣamam . (pṛ. 135) . ʻavyayībhāvaścö (2. 4. 18, 1. 1. 41) iti napuṃsakatvamavyayatvaṃ cetyanayoḥ śabdāntareṇa samāso nāstīti ʻtiṣṭhadguprabhṛtīni cö (2. 1. 17) iti ʻcakāreṇāvadhāritam . anye tvāhuḥ—ʻnirgatā bahavaḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarā yasmin śaratsaṃvatsarādyātmake kāle sa kālo niḥṣamam . yathā—niḥṣamaṃ vakti mūrkhaḥ . bahukālasādhyamarthaṃ svalpāvaśiṣṭakāle vaktītyarthaḥ tathā duḥṣamaśabdo'pi kālavācanaḥ . yathā—duḥṣamaṃ vartata iti . duṣṭasamāveśāt kālasya duṣṭatvam . duṣṭaḥ kālo vartata ityarthaḥ . ubhayorapi purvavadevāvyayībhāvatvaṃ ṣatvaṃ ca . niḥṣamaduḥṣamakālo'pyatirikte garhyamātre tūpacārād niḥṣamaduḥṣamaśabdau vartete iti boddhavyam .. yathāsvaṃ tu yathāyatham . atra svaśabda ātmīyavacanaḥ . tena yo ya ātmā yo ya ātmīyo vā tatrobhayatrāpi yathāsvaṃ yathāyathamiti śabdadvayaṃ vartate . ʻyathāsvamiti vīpsāyāmavyayībhāvaḵ iti kāśikā . yathāsvaṃ yathāyathamiti yathāśabdasya dvirvacanaṃ napuṃsakatvaṃ ca nipātyate (kāśikā. 2, pṛ. 376) . ata eva ʻhrasvo napuṃsake prātipadikasyö (1. 2. 47) iti hrasvatvasyāvyayagaṇe pāṭhādavyayatvam . tatrātmavacanatve yathā—ʻyathāsvaṃ kṛtavikramāḵ iti . ʻtatprasādādamī bhāvā jñātāḥ sarve yathāyatham iti . sarve padārthāḥ svarūpato jñātā ityarthaḥ . ātmīyavacanatve yathā—ʻadhyāsate cīrabhṛto yathāsvaṃ cirojjhitānyāśramamaṇḍalāni iti (raghu. 13. 22) . ʻyathāyathaṃ tāḥ sahitā nabhaścaraiḥ prabhābhirudbhāsitaśailavīrudhaḵ iti (kirā. 8. 2) .. 14 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.014>  
nanu ca syād virodhoktau . nanucaśabdo virodhoktau syāt . praśne'pi syāt . tathā ca viśvaḥ ʻnanuca praśnadṛṣṭyoktyoḵ iti (pṛ. 186, ślo. 11) .. kaccit kāmapravedane . kaccicchabdaḥ kāmapravedanāyām . praśnavitarkayorapi syāt . ʻkaccit praśnavitarkayoḵ iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 287, ślo. 15) .. niḥṣamaṃ duḥṣamaṃ garhye . ete garhyārthe syātām .. yathāsvaṃ tu yathāyatham . sveṣāṃ sveṣāmityasminnarthe syātām .. 14 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.631
AK.03.04.015ab mṛṣā mithyā ca vitathe yathārthaṃ tu yathātatham .
AK.03.04.015cd syurevaṃ tu punarvaivetyavadhāraṇavācakāḥ .. 15 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.015>  
mṛṣā mithyā ca vitathe . yathā—ʻbhavanti noddāmagirāṃ kavīnāmucchrāyasaundaryaguṇā mṛṣodyāḵ iti (śiśu. 4. 10) . mithyā—ʻtāmūcatuste priyamapyamithyȫ iti (raghu. 14. 6) . etāvanṛte vartete .. yathārthaṃ tu yathātatham . yathā—yathārthamuktavānāsīt . yathātatham—gururyathātathaṃ vakti . etau satye vartete .. syurevaṃ—dhāraṇavācakāḥ . yathā—ʻevametad yathā prāha viṣṇustu jagadīśvaraḵ iti . tu—ʻrāvaṇaṃ tu durātmānamavadhīd rāghava punaḵ iti . vā—ʻvyāso vā sarvadharmajñaḵ iti . eva—ʻtvameva sākṣātkaraṇīya ityataḥ kimasti kāryaṃ guru yogināmapi iti (śiśu. 1. 31) . ete'vadhāraṇe niścayārthe vartante .. 15 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.015>  
mṛṣā mithyā ca vitathe . vitathe'prāmāṇike vacasi vastvantare vā yathā—mṛṣā bhāṣase, mithyā vadasi . mithyābhūtamidaṃ jagat, prapañco mithyā iti . yathārthaṃ tu yathātatham . arthaṃ vastutattvamanatikramya yathārtham . .ʻtathāśabdaḥ satyavacane iti mahodadhau (pṛ. 422) . tathā satyamanatikramya yathātatham . ʻyathātathayathāpurayoḥ paryāyeṇö (7. 3. 31) iti nipātanāt sādhutvam .. syureva tu—dhāraṇavācakāḥ . evaśabdādayaḥ pañca svetaraniṣedhagarbhitaniścayajñānavācakāḥ . yathā—ʻna vaiva dravyāṇi iti . kecit evamiti sabindukaṃ paṭhitvodāharanti—ʻevametat kaḥ saṃdehaḵ iti (ratnā. 1. 7-) . tu—ʻātmā sava tu paśyati iti . ātmaiva paśyatītyartha . punaḥ—ʻvipraḥ punaḥ pūjyatamaḥ samastaiḵ iti . vipra eva pūjya ityarthaḥ . vai—ʻna vai brāhmaṇe śrī ramate iti . na ramata evetyarthaḥ . ca —ʻātmā ca saccidānandaḵ iti prāmāṇikaprathā . kecittu vaivetyantimaṃ śabdaṃ paṭhanti . yathā—ʻsā vā śaṃbhostadīyā vā mūrtirjalamayī mamö iti (ku. saṃ. 2. 60) . atra na tṛtīyā vyaktirityavadhāraṇaṃ dvābhyāṃ vāśabdābhyāṃ gamyate .. 15 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.015>  
mṛṣā mithyā ca vitathe . ete vitathārthe syātām .. yathārthaṃ tu yathātatham . ete satyārthe .. syureva tu—dhāraṇavācakāḥ . ete pañca avadhāraṇārtakāḥ syuḥ .. 15 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 04.632
AK.03.04.016ab prāgatītārthakaṃ nūnamavaśyaṃ niścaye dvayam .
AK.03.04.016cd saṃvad varṣe'vare tvarvāgāmevaṃ svayamātmanā .. 16 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.016>  
prāgatītārthakam . yathā—ʻprapedire prāktanajanmavidyāḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 1. 30) . etadatītārthake vartate .. nūnamavaśyaṃ niścaye dvayam . yathā—ʻnūnaṃ mattaḥ paraṃ vaṃśyāḵ iti (raghu. 1. 66) . avaśyam—ʻavaśyaṃ yātāraścirataramuṣitvāpi viṣayāḵ iti (vai. śa. pṛ. 61, ślo. 157) . etau niścaye vartete .. saṃvad varṣe . yathā—ʻrāmaḥ pañcadaśe saṃvadayodhyāṃ praviveśa hö iti . etad varṣe saṃvatsare vartate .. avare tvarvāk . yathā—ʻarvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ yasya saṃvatsarād bhavet iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 20. 255) . etadavarārthe vartate .. āmevam . yathā—ʻāṃ karomi tava priyam iti . etadevamarthe'ṅgīkāre vartate .. svayamātmanā . yathā—ʻsvayaṃkṛtaprasādasyö iti (śiśu. 2. 110) . etadātmanā iti tṛtīyārthe vartate .. 16 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.016>  
prāgatītārthakam . yathā—ʻprapedire prāktanajanmavidyāḵ iti prāguktam (ku. saṃ. 1. 30) .. nūnamavaśyaṃ niścaye dvayam . yathā—ʻnūnaṃ hantāsmi rāvaṇam iti . avaśyam—ʻavaśyaṃ yātāraścirataramuṣitvāpi viṣayāḵ iti (vai. śa. 157) .. saṃvad varṣe . varṣe vatsare . yathā—ʻrāmaḥ pañcadaśe saṃvadayodhyāṃ praviveśa hö iti . ʻsaṃvattṛtīye cūḍākarmö iti; tṛtīye varṣe cūḍākaraṇaṃ kartavyamityarthaḥ .. apare tvarvāk . parasmādutkṛṣṭādanyo'paraḥ . avara ityantasthamadhyākṣarapāṭhe'pyayamarthaḥ . yathā—ʻarvāk tu brahmahatyāyāḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ kṛcchramācaret iti .. āmevaṃ . āmevamiti dvayaṃ parodīritārthasyāṅgīkāre vartate . omevaṃ paramamiti prāguktam (pṛ. 626, ślo. 12) . śabdadvayaṃ tu svaparayorubhayorapi saṃmatasyāṅgīkāre iti bhedaḥ . yathā—āṃ kiṃ karomi, evaṃ karomi iti .. svayamātmanā . tṛtīyaikavacanāntasyātmaśabdasya yāvānarthaḥ tatra svayamityavyayaṃ vartata ityarthaḥ . yathā—ʻsvayaṃkṛtaprasādasyö iti (śiśu. 2. 110) .. 16 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.03.016>  
prāgatītārthakam . prākśabdo'tītārthakaḥ syāt .. nūnamavaśyaṃ niścaye dvayam . ete dve niścayārthe syātām .. saṃvad varṣe . saṃvacchabdaḥ saṃvatsarārthe .. avare tvarvāk . arvāk śabdaḥ avare ityadhastādarthe .. āmevam . ete dve 'nujñārthe vartete .. svayamātmanā . etadekamātmaneti tṛtīyāntārthe .. 16 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
