AK.03.04.017ab alpe nīcaiḥ mahatyuccaiḥ prāyo bhūmnyadrute śanaiḥ .
AK.03.04.017cd sanā nitye bahirbāhye smātīte'stamadarśane .. 17 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.017>  
alpe nīcaiḥ . yathā—ʻtathāpi nīcairvinayādṛśyatö iti (raghu. 3. 34) . etadalpārthe vartate .. mahatyuccaiḥ . yathā—ʻśṛṅgamuccairgireridam iti . etad mahadarthe vartate .. prāyo bhūmni . yathā—ʻprāyo navavadhūḥ kāntȫ iti . etad bhūmārthe vartate .. adrute śanaiḥ . yathā—āliṅgati śanaiḥ śanaiḥ . etadadrute'śīghrārthe vartate .. sanā nitye . yathā—sanātanaḥ . etannityārthaṃ kathayati .. bahirbāhye . yathā—ʻdāsīkumbhaṃ bahirgrāmānninayeran svabāndhavāḵ iti (yā. smṛ. 3. 5. 294) . etad bāhyārthe vartate .. smātīte . yathā—ʻsevate sma śayanaṃ parāṅmukhī (ku. saṃ. 8. 2) iti . etadatītārthe vartate .. astamadarśane . yathā—ʻastameti yugabhagnakesaraiḵ iti . etadadarśananāma .. 17 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.017>  
alpe nīcaiḥ . ʻyathā—tathāpi nīcairvinayādadṛśyatö iti (raghu. 3. 34) .. mahatyuccaiḥ . yathā—mahān vāto vātītyarthe uccairvāto vāti . sakārāntāvetau .. prāyo bhūmni . bhūmni bāhulye . yathā—ʻprāyaḥ pratyayamādhatte svaguṇeṣūttamādaraḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 6. 20) . akārāntaḥ prāyaśabdaḥ yānteṣu prāguktaḥ (pṛ. 433, nānā. 153) . adrute śanaiḥ . adrute śīghrarahita ityarthaḥ . yathā—śanaiścara iti .. sanā nitye . yathā—ʻpūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanam iti . nityamityarthaḥ .. bahirbāhye . anāvṛto deśo bāhyam . tatra yathā—grāmād bahiriti . smātīte . atītakālasaṃbandhini bhūtārtha ityarthaḥ . ʻsevate sma śayanaṃ parāṅmukhī (ku. saṃ. 8. 2) iti .. astamadarśane . adarśanaṃ darśanābhāvo nāśaprayuktaḥ tirobhāvaprayukto vā . tatrābhayatra māntamavyayaṃ vartate . yathā—astaṃ gato rāvaṇaḥ, astaṃ gato bhāskaraḥ iti .. 17 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.017>

AK.03.04.018ab asti sattve ruṣoktāvu ūṃ praśne'nunaye tvayi .
AK.03.04.018cd huṃ tarke syāduṣā rātreravasāne namo natau .. 18 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.018>  
asti sattve . yathā—ʻāstikaḥ śraddadhānaścö iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 10. 268) . etat sattve satobhāve vartate .. ruṣoktau hum . ʻprasahya huṃkāranivartitaḥ purȫ iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 54) . umiti vā pāṭhaḥ . yathā—ʻumityuvāca purataḥ puruṣasya kāntȫ iti . etad ruṣoktau vartate .. u praśne . ʻu āgataḥ śatruḵ iti . etat praśnārthe vartate .. anunaye tvayi . yathā—ʻayi kriyārthaṃ sulabhaṃ samitkuśam iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 33) . etadanunaye vartate .. tarke tu syāt . yathā—ʻsyāccet kiṃ nopapadyate iti (ku. saṃ. 6. 61) . ʻtarke nu syāt iti vā pāṭhaḥ . yathā—rāmo nu lakṣmaṇo nu iti . etau tarke vartete .. uṣā rātreravasāne . yathā—uṣā janāḥ prabadhyante iti . etat prabhāte vartate .. namo natau . yathā—namo viṣṇave . etannatyarthe vartate .. 18 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.018>  
asti sattve . astīti kālasāmānye tiṅantapratirūpakamavyayaṃ sattāvācakam . yathā—ʻṣaṇṇāṃ padānāmastitvam ʻastikṣīrā brāhmaṇī (kāśikā. 1, pṛ. 106) iti .. ruṣoktau hum . roṣeṇa vacasi humiti nipāto vartate . yathā—ʻvṛddhāste na vicāraṇīyacaritāstiṣṭhantu huṃ vartate iti bhavabhūtiḥ (uttara. 5. 35) . anucitabhavadīyavacanaśravaṇenāsmākaṃ roṣoktirvartata ityarthaḥ . anye tu ruṣoktāvūm iti makārāntaṃ dīrghamoṣṭhyaṃ svaraṃ paṭhanti . yathā—ūṃ saiva bhavataḥ priyā . bhavato manasi yā vartate saiva priyā nāhaṃ priyetyarthaḥ .. uṃ praśne . parodīritaṃ manasikṛtya prakṛtaprasaṅgaviśeṣajijñāsāviṣkaraṇamiha praśnaśabdena vivakṣitam . atra umiti hrasvo mānto nipāto vartate . ʻuṃkonuṭu perü .. anunayo tvayi . yathā—ʻayi jīvitanātha jīvasi iti (ku. saṃ. 4. 3) . ʻayi mugdhe iti ca .. tarke nu syāt . dvayamūhe . yathā—ʻastaśailagahanaṃ nu vivasvānāviveśa jaladhiṃ nu mahīṃ nü iti (kirā. 9. 7) . syāt—ʻyadyagnirna syāt tarhi dhūmo'pi na syāt iti .. uṣā rātreravasāne . rātreścaturthapraharottarārdhe ghaṭikācatuṣṭaye . yathā—ʻuṣātano vāyurupaiti mandam iti . namo natau . natau praṇāme . yathā—ʻnamo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase iti (bhāgavata. 12. 12. 1) . ʻnamaḥ svasti . . . ityādinā (2. 3. 16) caturthī . ʻsākṣātprabhṛtīni cö (1. 4. 74), ʻvibhāṣā kṛñi (1. 4. 72) iti gatisaṃjñāpakṣe ʻnārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtyö ityādau ʻupapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī (pari. 2. 3. 16) iti dvitīyaiva bhavati . ʻnamovarivaścitraṅa kyac (3. 1. 19) iti kyacpratyaye tu ʻnārāyaṇaṃ namasyati . ʻsvayaṃbhuve namaskṛtyö, ʻbrāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtyö ityādayaḥ prayogāḥ ʻpatye śete ʻyuddhāya saṃnahyati ityādivadupapādanīyāḥ .. 18 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.018> 
asti sattve . astiśabdaḥ sattve iti vidyamānatāyāṃ vartate . asti devadattaḥ, abhūt bhavati bhaviṣyati vā ityarthaḥ . ʻastyāha kālasāmānye tiṅantapratirūpakam iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 37, ślo. 1025) .. ruṣoktāvūm . ūṃśabdo roṣoktau dīrghādiḥ .. uṃ praśne . uṃ śabdaḥ praśnārthe hrasvādiḥ .. anunaye tvayi . ayiśabdo 'nunayapūrvakaḥ praśnārthe . ʻayi praśnenānunaye ityamaramālā .. tarke nu syāt . nusyācchabdau tarkārthe .. uṣā rātreravasāne . uṣāśabdo rātriśeṣe . uṣaḥśabdo'pyasti . ʻuṣā syād rajanīśeṣa uṣa ityapi dṛśyate iti rabhasaḥ .. namo natau . namaḥśabdo natyarthe . anavyayanamaḥśabdo'pyasti . ʻyattannamaḥ kimapi śuśruma devatābhyaḵ iti . ʻtvāmantareṇa namasāmavasānabhūmim iti ca .. 18 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.019ab punararthe'ṅga nindāyāṃ duṣṭhu suṣṭhu praśaṃsane .
(āmānuguṇye smaraṇe'ye phaḍ vighnanirākṛtau .
aṅgīkṛtau syādadhikaṃ hīnasaṃbodhane tu re ..)
AK.03.04.019cd sāyaṃ sāye prage prātaḥ prabhāte nikaṣāntike .. 19 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.019>  
punararthe'ṅga . yathā—ʻmūrkhastu nāvamantavyaḥ kimaṅga vidvān iti (svāmī pṛ. 341) . etat punararthe vartate . nindāyāṃ duṣṭhu . yathā—duṣṭhuvṛttirdurjanaḥ syāt . etannindāyāṃ vartate .. suṣṭhu praśaṃsane . yathā—suṣṭhu bhuktaṃ mayā gṛhe . etat praśaṃsāyāṃ vartate .. āmānuguṇye . yathā—āma vartate . etadānuguṇye svavaśatve vartate . smaraṇe'ye . yathā—aye pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā . etat smaraṇe vartate .. phaḍ vighnanirākṛtau . ʻastrāya phaṭ iti (varadapūrvatāpanyupaniṣat 2. 2) . etad vighnanirākaraṇe vartate .. aṅgīkṛtau syādatha kim . yathā—devadatta ghaṭaṃ karoṣi? atha kim . etadaṅgīkāre vartate .. hīnasaṃbodhane tu re . yathā—rere pāpin mamāntikādapasara . etat hīnasaṃbodhane vartate .. sāyaṃ sāye . yathā—ʻvinyastasāyaṃtanamallikāsü iti . etat sāye dinānte vartate .. prage prātaḥ prabhāte . yathā—ʻitthaṃ rathāśvebhaniṣādināṃ prage gaṇo nṛpāṇāmatha toraṇād bahiḵ iti (śiśu. 12. 1) . prātaḥ—ʻprātaḥ saṃdhyāmupāsītö iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 5. 98) . etau prabhāte vartete .. nikaṣāntike . yathā—ʻvilaṅghya laṅkāṃ nikaṣā haniṣyati iti (śiśu. 1. 68) . etat samīpārthe vartate .. 19 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.019>  
punararthe'ṅga . atra punararthe bhedarūpaḥ. yathā—ʻmūrkho'pi nāvamantavyaḥ kimaṅga vidvān iti murārināṭake . ʻnārake'pi taṃ cottiṣṭhamānaṃ paurajānapadāḥ prakṛtayo 'pyanūttiṣṭheran kimaṅga saṃbandhibāndhavāḵ iti . kiṃpunaḥ saṃbandhibāndhavā ityarthaḥ .. nindāyāṃ duṣṭhu . yathā—duṣṭhu jalpati . garhitaṃ vadatītyarthaḥ .. suṣṭhu praśaṃsane . yathā—suṣṭhu bhāṣyakāreṇa iti .. āmānuguṇye . ānuguṇye ānukūlye . yathā—āma maithili . āma iti hrasvānto'yaṃ nipātitaḥ smaraṇe'ye . yathā—ʻaye pūrva kṛtam iti pūrvaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ smṛtamityarthaḥ .. phaḍa vighnanirākṛtau . yathā —ʻhuṃ phaṭ ʻastrāya phaṭ (varada. upa. 2. 2.) .. aṅgīkṛtau syādatha kim . yathā—ʻdevadatta kiṃ bhokṣyase iti pṛṣṭa āha ʻatha kim iti .. hīnasaṃbodhane tu re . yathā—ʻre re rāvaṇö iti . kecit ʻhīnasaṃbodhane tvare iti svarādidvyakṣaraṃ paṭhitvodāharanti—yathā—ʻre re vānara ko bhavānahamare tvatsūnuhantāhave iti . iha kaiścit ṭīkākāraiḥ ʻāmānuguṇye ityādiśloko na vyākhyātaḥ na paṭhitaśca . sāyaṃ sāye . atra sāya iti saptamyā vinirdiśannanavyayo'pyakārāntaḥ sāyaśabdo'stīti darśayati . kālavarge'pyakārānta uktaḥ (pṛ. 74) sa ca sāyāhna ityādau dinānte vartate . ʻsāyamaṇḍanamabhi tvarayantyaḵ (kirā. 9. 6) ityādau niśāmukhe . atrobhayatrāpi sāyamiti māntamavyayaṃ bhavati . yathā—ʻsāyaṃtanyaparatra cenmṛtatithiḥ pratyābdike māsike sā grāhyȫ iti dinānte . ʻsāyaṃ prātaragnihotraṃ juhoti iti niśāmukhe .. prage prātaḥ prabhāte . prage ityekārāntamavyayam . yathā—ʻpragetano vāyurupaiti mandam iti . prātaḥ—ʻprātaḥsaṃdhyāmupāsītö iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 5. 98) .. nikaṣāntike . yathā—ʻvilaṅghya laṅkāṃ nikaṣā haniṣyati iti (śiśu. 1. 68) . laṅkāyāḥ samīpe ityarthaḥ . ʻabhitaḥparitaḥsamayānikaṣā hāpratiyogeṣu ca dṛśyate (vā. 1. 4. 48) ityanena nikaṣāśabdayoge laṅkāśabdasya dvitīyā .. 19 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.019>  
punararthe'ṅga . aṅgaśabdaḥ punararthe .. nindāyāṃ duṣṭhu . duṣṭhuśabdo nindārthe .. suṣṭhu praśaṃsane . suṣṭhuśabdaḥ praśaṃsāyām .. sāyaṃ sāye . sāyaṃśabdaḥ sāye iti divasāvasāne .. prage prātaḥ prabhāte . ete dve divasādau .. nikaṣāntike . nikaṣāśabdaḥ samīpārthe .. anuktam—atyantāya syānnitānte . atyantāyaśabdo nitāntārthe syāt .. 19 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.020ab parutparāryaiṣamo'bde pūrve pūrvatare yati .
AK.03.04.020cd adyātrāhnyatha pūrve'hnītyādau pūrvottarāparāt .. 20 ..
AK.03.04.021ab tathādharānyānyataretarāt pūrvedyurādayaḥ .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.020>  
parutparāri—pūrvatare yati . pūrve pūrvatare yati vartamāne ca krameṇa parucchabdaḥ parāriśabda aiṣamaḥśabdaśca vartate . atrodāharaṇe ślokaḥ—
ʻparārisaṃcitaṃ vittaṃ parunnaṣṭamabhogataḥ .
aiṣamaścīyate yatnāt tasya kiṃ vā bhaviṣyati ..
iti .. adyātrāhni . atrāhni asmin vartamāne'hani adyaśabdo vartate . yathā—ʻarāvaṇamarāmaṃ vā jagadadyeti niścitaḵ iti (raghu. 12. 83) .. atha pūrve'hnītyādau—pūrvedyurādayaḥ . asyārthaḥ—pūrvottarāparāt tathā anyānyataretarāt śabdācca pūrve'hnītyādau pūrvedyurādayaḥ śabdā vartante . atra krameṇodāharaṇāni—pūrvedyuḥ—ʻnimantrayeta pūrvedyuḵ iti (yā. smṛ. 1. 10. 225) . uttaredyuḥ—ʻnāndīmukhāduttaredyurvivāhaḵ iti . apuredyuḥ, adharedyuḥ—ʻāgatānaparedyustānadharedyuḥ samāgatāḵ iti . anyedyuḥ—ʻanyedyurātmānucarasya bhāvam iti (raghu. 2. 26) . anyataredyuḥ—ʻpañcamīṣaṣṭhyoranyataredyuḥ pitaraṃ drakṣyasi . itaredyuḥ—kaṣṭadināditaredyuḥ priyo draṣṭavyaḥ .. 20 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.020>  
parutparāri—pūrvatare yati . pūrvasminnabde parucchabdaḥ . pūrvatare varṣe parāriśabdaḥ . yati vartamāne varṣe aiṣamaḥ ityarthaḥ . ʻsadyaḥparut parāryaiṣamaḥ. . . (5. 3. 22) ityatra kāśikā (2, pṛ. 61)—ʻpūrvapūrvatarayoḥ parabhāvo nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare'bhidheye . pūrvasmin saṃvatsare parut, pūrvatare saṃvatsare parāri . idama iś bhāvaḥ samasaṇpratyayo nipātyate saṃvatsare'bhidheye . “idama iś” (5. 3. 3) itīśādeśaḥ ādivṛddhiśca . asmin saṃvatsare aiṣamaḥ . yathā—
ʻparārisaṃcitaṃ vittaṃ parunnaṣṭamabhogataḥ .
aiṣamaścīyate yatnāt tasya kiṃ vā bhaviṣyati ..
tathā ca—
ʻparārisaṃdarśitasaṃniveśau parutparābhūtasarojakośau .
imāviyantau punaraiṣamaste kucau kiyantau purato bhavetām ..
iti .. adyātrāhni . atra vartamāne'hani, adhikaraṇārthapradhāne . yathā—ʻadyāhaṃ vasantotsave sabahumānamāhūyö iti (ratnā. 1. 5-) . atha pūrve'hnītyādau—pūrvedyurādayaḥ . asyārthaḥ—pūrva uttara apara ityetebhyaḥ, adhara anya anyatara itara ityetebhyaśca saptabhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ krameṇa pūrve'hni uttare'hni apare'hni ityādyadhikaraṇatvaviśiṣṭārthavivakṣāyām edyusipratyaye, pūrvedyuḥ uttaredyuḥ aparedyuḥ adharedyuḥ anyedyuḥ anyataredyuḥ itaredyuḥ ityete sapta śabdā bhavanti . ʻsadyaḥ parut parārthaiṣamaḥ paredyavyadyapūrvedyuranyedyuranyataredyuritaredyuraparedyuradharedyurubhayedyuruttaredyuḵ (5. 3. 22) iti nipātanādeṣāṃ sādhutvam . yathā—ʻpūrvedyurnāndīmukham iti . ʻpūrvedyuriṣyate prātaḥ pūrvedyuḥ pūrvavāsare iti rudravākyāt pūrvedyuśabdaḥ prātararthe'pi vartate . uttaredyuḥ—nāndīmukhādīnāmuttaredyurvivāhaḥ . aparedyuḥ—tasminnaparedyurvā gṛhapraveśaḥ . adharedyuḥ—sarvatropavāsadinādharedyurekabhuktaṃ kuryāt . anyedyuḥ—ʻanyedyurātmānucarasya bhāvaṃ jijñāsamānā munihomadhenuḵ iti (raghu. 2. 26) . anyataredyuḥ—ʻpratipatpañcadaśyoranyataredyurāgamiṣyat prabhākaraḵ iti . itaredyuḥ—ʻriktatitheritaredyurdraṣṭavyo rājȫ iti .. 20 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.020>  
parutparārī—pūrvatare yati . parut parāri aiṣamaḥ ityete śabdāḥ pūrvapūrvataravartamānavarṣeṣu syuḥ . yathā—
ʻparārisaṃdarśitasaṃniveśau parutparābhūtasarojakośau .
tathaiṣamastālaphalopamau tau stanau kiyantau purato bhavetām ..
iti .. adyātrāhni . adyaśabdo'trāhnītyetasminnatha syāt .. atha pūrve'hnītyādau—pūrvedyurādayaḥ . pūrvedyurādiśabdāḥ pūrvādiśabdebhyaḥ sakāśāt pūrve'hnītyādyartheṣu syuḥ . pūrvedyuḥ pūrvāhṇaśca pūrvadivasaśca syuḥ . ʻpūrvedyuriṣyate prātaḥ pūrvedyuḥ pūrvavāsaraḵ iti rudraḥ . uttaredyuḥ uttare'hnītyarthaḥ . aparedyurapare'hni . adharedyuradhare'hni . anyedyuranyasminnahani . anyataredyuranyatarasminnahani . itaredyuritarasminnahanītyarthaḥ .. 20 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.021cd ubhayadyuścobhayedyuḥ pare tvahni paredyavi .. 21 ..
AK.03.04.022ab hyo'tīte'nāgate'hni śvaḥ paraśvastatpare'hani
AK.03.04.022cd tadā tadānīṃ yugapadekadā sarvadā sadā .. 22 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.021-22>  
ubhayadyuścobhayedyuḥ . etāvubhayorahnorityasminnarthe vartete . yathā—ubhayadyurupoṣaṇam . ubhayedyurutsavaḥ .. pare tvahni paredyavi . pare'hnītyarthe paredyavi ityavyayaṃ vartate . yathā—paredyavi dṛṣṭaste sakhā .. hyo'tīte . gate'hni hyaḥ ityavyayaṃ vartate . yathā—hyaḥ sarvamabhavat .. anāgate'hni śvaḥ . anāgate vartamānānantaradivase śvaḥ śabdo vartate . yathā—ʻśvaḥkāryamadya kurvītö iti .. paraśvastatpare'hani . śvodinānantare'hani paraśvaḥśabdo vartate . yathā—paraśvo vā bhaviṣyati .. tadā tadānīm . etau tasmin kāle ityarthe vartete . yathā—ʻtadā cakṣuṣmatāṃ prītirāsīt samarasā dvayoḵ iti (raghu. 4. 18) . tadānīm—ʻyadā syāt priyayā saṅgastadānīmeva me sukham iti .. yugapadekadā . etau tulyakāla ityasminnarthe vartete . yathā—ʻyugapadvyānaśe diśaḵ iti . ekadā—ekadā militā dvijāḥ .. sarvadā sadā . etau sarvasmin kāla ityarthe vartete . yathā—ʻsarvadā sarvado'sīti yācate yācakaḥ sadȫ .. 21-2 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.021-22>  
ubhayadyuścobhayedyuḥ . ubhayasmin ahnītyarthe ʻdyuścobhayādvaktavyaḵ (vā. 5. 3. 22) iti dyuḥpratyaye ubhayadyuḥ, tadabhāvapakṣe ʻsadyaḥparut parāri. . .  (5. 3. 22) ityādinipātanāt edyusipratyaye ubhayedyuḥ . yathā—ʻubhayedyurjalūkābhirasṛṅmokṣaḥ praśasyate iti .. pare tvahni paredyavi . pūrvavadeva nipātanāt sādhuḥ . yathā—ʻhantāsmi laṅkādhipatiṃ paredyavi iti .. hyo gate . ahnītyanukṛṣyate . gate'nantarātīte dine . yathā—ʻhyogodohodbhavaṃ ghṛtam iti .. anāgate'hni śvaḥ . saṃnihita eva bhaviṣyati divase . yathā—ʻśvobhūte brāhmaṇaṃ vṛṇīte iti . ʻśvo na hanyāṃ jayadratham iti ca . hyas śvas śabdāvubhāvapi sakārāntāvyayau .. paraśvastatpare'hani . tasmāt śvaḥśabdavācyāt pare'nantare'hani paraśvaḥ . pāraskarāditvena (6. 1. 157) paraśabdāduttarasya śvaḥśabdasya suḍāgame ścutve ca paraśśvaḥ . yathā—ʻparaśvo'pi vāhanotsavaḵ iti .. tadā tadānīm . dvayaṃ tasmin kāle ityarthe vartate . ʻtado dā cö (5. 3.19) iti vartamānakāle vartamānāt saptamyantāt tacchabdād dāpratyayaḥ . cakārād dānīṃpratyayaśca (5. 3. 18) . yathā—ʻtadaiva prātaḥsavanāya prasarpanti iti . tadānīm—ʻtadānīṃ kalaho mahān iti .. yugapad ekadā . bahvīnāṃ kriyāṇāmavacchedakanyūnātirekarahite kāle dvayaṃ vartate . tatra yugapat ityavyutpannaṃ prātipadikam . yathā—yugapad vrajanti, yugapadāgacchanti iti . ekadā . ʻsarvaikānyakiṃyattadaḥ kāle dȫ (5. 3. 15) iti dāpratyayaḥ . yathā—ekadā karma kurvanti iti .. sarvadā sadā . sarvasmin kāle ityarthe dvayam . ʻsarvaikānya. . .  ityādinā (5. 3. 15) sarvaśabdāt saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dāpratyaye sarvadā . yathā—sarvadā ka iva vā sahiṣyate . ʻsarvasya so'nyatarasyām (5. 3. 6) iti vikalpena sabhāve sadā . yathā—sadātana iti .. 21-2 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.04.021-22>  
ubhayadyuścobhayedyuḥ . ete dve ubhayasminnahanītyarthe syātām .. paredyavi pare'hani . paredyaviśabdaḥ pare'hanītyarthe syāt .. hyo gate . hyaḥśabdo bhūtadivasārthe syāt . ʻninnanü .. anāgate'hni śvaḥ . śvaḥśabdo'nāgatadivasārthe syāt . ʻrepü .. paraśvastu pare'hani . paraśvaḥśabdaḥśvaḥparadivasārthe syāt . ʻmarnāḍü .. tadā tadānīm . ete dve tasmin kāle ityarthe syātām . ʻappuḍü .. tarhiśabdo'pi syāt . ʻyadā yarhi tadā tarhi iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 287, ślo. 5) .. yugapadekadā . ete dve ekasmin kāle ityarthe syātām . ʻohappuḍü .. sarvadā sadā . ete dve sarvasmin kāle ityarthe syātām . ʻyallappuḍunnü .. 21-2 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.04.023ab etarhi saṃpratīdānīmadhunā sāṃprataṃ tathā .
AK.03.04.023cd digdeśakāle pūrvādau prāgudakpratyagādayaḥ .. 23 ..
ityavyayavargaḥ
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.04.023>  
etarhi saṃprati—sāṃprataṃ tathā . ete pañcaśabdā asmin kāle ityarthe vartante . yathā—etarhi kriyate kāryam . saṃprati—ʻsaṃpratyasāṃprataṃ vaktum iti (śiśu. 2. 70) . itānīm—ʻidānīmasmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḵ iti (bha. gī. 11. 51) . adhunā—ʻvalāvalepādadhunāpi pūrvavat iti (śiśu. 1. 72) . sāṃpratam—tatpāpo dhāma sāṃpratam .. digdeśakāle—pratyagādayaḥ . asyārthaḥ—pūrvādau pūrvapaścimottarādhareṣu digdeśakāle digarthe deśārthe kālārthe gamyamāne prāgudakpratyagādayaḥ prāk udak pratyak, ādiśabdādadhastāt arvāk iti pañcāvyayā bhavanti . atrodaharaṇāni—diśi yathā . prāk—ʻāyuṣyaṃ prāṅmukho bhuṅkte iti (ma. smṛ. 2. 52) . deśe yathā—ʻprāgbhāgataḥ patadihedamupatyakāsü iti (śiśu. 4. 49) . kāle—ʻprāksṛṣṭeḥ kevalātmane iti (ku. saṃ. 2. 3) . evamudakpratyagādiṣvapi kālavarjamudāharaṇāni draṣṭavyāni .. 23 ..
iti śrīvaṅgalaliṅgayasūriviracitāyāmamarakośapadavivṛtāvavyayavargaḥ </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.04.023>  
etarhi saṃprati—sāṃprataṃ tadā . ete pañca śabdāḥ asmin kāle ityarthe vartante . ʻidamo rhil (5. 3. 16) iti rhilpratyayaḥ . ʻetetau rathoḵ (5. 3. 4) iti idama etādeśaśca . saṃpratiśabdasya tiṣṭhadguprabhṛtitvena (2. 1. 17) niḥṣamādiśabdavadavyayībhāvatvam . ʻdānīṃ cö (5. 3. 18) iti saptamyantād idaṃśabdāt kāle vartamānāt dānīṃpratyaye idādeśe ca idānīṃśabdasiddhiḥ . ʻadhunȫ (5. 3. 17) iti nipātanād idaṃśabdāt kāle vartamānāt saptamyantāt dhunāpratyayaḥ prakṛteraśādeśe ca adhunāśabdaḥ sādhuḥ . ʻtaddhitaścāsarvavibhaktiḵ (1. 1. 38) ityavyayatvam . saṃpratiśabdādeva svārthike'ṇ pratyaye sāṃpratam . yathā—etarhi kriyate . saṃpratyevāgataṃ mayā . idamidānīṃ nirūpyate . upayogo'dhunocyate . ʻkonvasmin sāṃprataṃ loke iti (rāmā. 1. 1. 2) .. digdeśakāle—pratyagādayaḥ . asyārtho yathā—ʻdakṣiṇottarābhyāmatasuc (5. 3. 28) ityatra sūtre digdeśakāleṣu ityarthatrayānuvṛttāvapi dakṣiṇaśabdasya kāle vṛttyasaṃbhavād uttaraśabdādevārthatrayavṛtteratasucpratyayavidhiraṅgīkṛto vṛttikārādibhiḥ (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 62) . evaṃ prakṛte'pi digdeśakāla ityaviśeṣaṇoktāvapi prākpadasyaivārthatraye vidhiḥ . udagādiśabdānāṃ tu kālarūpārthe vṛttyasaṃbhavād arthadvaya eva vidhiḥ . yathā—ʻprāṅmukho'nnāni bhuñjītö iti prācyāṃ diśi . ʻprāgbhāgataḥ patadihedamupatyakāsü iti (śiśu. 4. 49) prāgdeśaḥ . ʻprāksṛṣṭeḥ kevalātmane (ku. saṃ. 2. 3) iti pūrvakāle . kaṇṭhasthabrahmasūtra udaṅmukha iti udīcyāṃ diśi . udakpravaṇa iti deśe . pratyagā tārakodayāditi pratīcyāṃ diśi, pratyagunnata iti deśe . ādiśabdena arvāk adharāk ityādi . yathā—ʻprāg avāg udag adharāk sarvatastvā diśa ādhāvantü iti śrutiḥ (tai. saṃ. 1. 4. 1. 2) . tathā ʻdikśabdebhyaḥ saptamīpañcamīprathamābhyo digdeśakāleṣvastātiḵ (5. 3. 27) iti prācī avācī udīcī adharā ityetebhyo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ digdeśakāleṣu vartamānebhyaḥ astātipratyaye sati ʻañcerluk (5. 3. 30) iti dikśabdasya uttarasyāstātipratyayasya luk . tato ʻluk taddhitaluki (1. 2. 49) iti strīpratyayasya luki prāk arvāk pratyak adharāk iti bhavati . idānīṃ śeṣakāreṇoktā nirūpyante .
ʻuktā grandhakṛtā kecit pratyayāntāvyayā iha .
tatprasaṅgānnirūpyante pratyayāntāvyayāḥ pare ..
ityavyayavarganirūpaṇaprastāve parutparāritadātadānīmityādayaḥ kecit pratyayāntāvyayāḥ amarasiṃhanāthena pradarśitāḥ . tatprasaṅgādapare'pi pratyayāntā avyayā nirūpyanta ityarthaḥ . tāneva ślokena saṃgṛhṇāti—
suckṛtvasuctrātasitraldādāmedhārhilāhayaḥ .
sāccivaḍājdhamuñaścaktvāśasvatimāntakṛdavyayam ..
iti . eteṣāṃ ca sujantaprabhṛti māntakṛdantaparyantānāṃ ʻsvarādinipātamavyayam (1. 1. 37) ityadhikāre sūtravārttikabhāṣyakārairavyayatvakathanāt,
ʻsadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu .
vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tadavyayam ..
iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 14) avyayalakṣaṇasya sadbhāvācca suspaṣṭamavyayatvam . sujādipratyayāntā avyayībhāvasamāsaśca avyayā ityarthaḥ . eṣāṃ krameṇodārahaṇāni . suc—ʻdvitricaturbhyaḥ suc (5. 4. 18) . ʻdvirbhuṅkte trirbhuṅkte, caturavattaṃ haviḵ iti . kṛtvasuc—ʻsaṃkhyāyāḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane kṛtvasuc (5. 4. 17) . yathā—ʻpañcakṛtvaste namaḵ iti (tai. ā. 4. 28. 1) . ṣaṭkṛtvaḥ, saptakṛtvaḥ . trā—ʻtadadhīnavacane (5. 4. 54) ʻdeye trā cö (5. 4. 55) . brāhmaṇādhīnaṃ deyaṃ karoti brāhmaṇatrā karoti . brāhmaṇatrā bhavati . brāhmaṇatrā syāt (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 91) . atra kṛbhvastiyoganiyamaḥ . ʻdevamanuṣyapuruṣapurumartyebhyo dvitīyāsaptabhyorbahulam (5. 4. 56) iti trā . atra dhātuniyamo nāsti . yathā—devān gacchati, devatrā gacchati . deveṣu gacchati, devatrā gacchati ityādi (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 91) . evaṃ manuṣyādayo'pyudāhāryāḥ . bahulagrahaṇād ʻbahutrā jīvato manaḵ (ṛgveda. 10. 164. 2) ityādyapi bhavati . tasil—ʻpañcamyāstasil (5. 3. 7) kasmādityarthe kutaḥ . sarvasmādityarthe sarvataḥ . yasmādityarthe yataḥ ityādi . ʻparyabhibhyāṃ cö (5. 3. 9) ityatra sarvobhayārthe vartamānābhyāṃ pratyaya iṣyate . paritaḥ, abhitaḥ iti . tathā—ʻpratiyoge pañcamyāstasiḵ (5. 4. 44) . ʻpradyumno vāsudevataḥ prati (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 88) . māṣānasmai tilataḥ prati yacchati iti . ʻtasiprakaraṇe ādyādibhya upasaṃkhyānam (vā. 5. 4. 44) iti . ādau āditaḥ . madhye madhyataḥ . pārśve pārśvataḥ . pṛṣṭhe pṛṣṭhataḥ ityādi ..
tral—ʻsaptamyāstral (5. 3. 10) iti saptamyarthe . yathā—kasminnityarthe kutra . yatra, tatra ityādi .. dā—ʻsarvaikānyakiṃyattadaḥ kāle dȫ (5. 3. 15) iti . sarvadā, sadā, ekadā .. at—ʻkimo't (5. 3. 12) . kimaḥ ʻkvāti (7. 2. 105) iti kvabhāvaḥ . kasminnarthe kva .. ām—ʻkimettiṅvyayaghādāmvadravyaprakarṣe (5. 4. 11) iti . kiṃtarām . kiṃtamām . pragetarām . pragetamām . pacatitarām . pacatitamām . uccaistarām . uccaistamām (kāśikā 2. pṛ. 82) iti .. edhā—ʻdvitryośca dhamuñ (5. 3. 45) iti vartamāne, ʻedhāccö (5. 3. 46) iti edhājādeśaḥ . dvedhā, tredhā ityādi . ʻsaṃkhyāyā vidhārthe dhȫ (5. 3. 4 2) iti . dvidhā karoti . tridhā dṛśyate . bahudhā bhāṣate ityādi . atra dhāgrahaṇamanyasyāpi dhāpratyayādeśasyopalakṣaṇam . tataśca ʻekāddho dhyamuñanyatarasyām (5. 3. 44) iti dhyamuñpratyaye ʻtaddhiteṣvacāmādeḵ (7. 2. 117) iti ñiti taddhitapratyayasya paratvādādivṛddhiḥ . aikadhyam . ekadhā iti bhavati ..
rhil—ʻidamo rhil (5. 3. 16) ityasmin kāle ityarthe ʻetetau rathoḵ (5. 3. 4) iti idama etādeśaḥ . ʻanadyatanerhilanyatarasyām (5. 3. 21) iti kimādeḥ saptamyantād anadyatane vā rhil . kadetyarthe karhi . yadetyarthe yarhi ityādi . pakṣe dādi (5. 3. 15) kadā, yadā .. ā—ʻdakṣiṇādāc (5. 3. 36) iti . dakṣiṇā vasati, dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi vasatītyarthaḥ . dakṣiṇā digiti vā .. āhi—āhayaḥ ityatra (śeṣakāraśloke) ākārasyāpi savarṇadīrghe āhipratyayanirdeśasiddhiḥ . ʻāhi ca dūre (5. 3. 37) iti, cakārāt ācpratyayaḥ . dakṣiṇāhi vasati . dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi dūre ityarthaḥ . dakṣiṇāhi parvato dūre . dakṣiṇāhi ramaṇīyam iti . ʻuttarāccö (5. 3. 38) iti ājāhī pratyayau . uttarasyāṃ diśi dūre vasatītyarthe uttarāhi vasati . uttarāhi parvataḥ . uttarāhi ramaṇīyam iti ..
sāt—ʻvibhāṣā sāti kārtsnye (5. 4. 52) iti . sarvaṃ lavaṇamudakamāpadyata ityarthe udakasādbhavati lavaṇam . pakṣe udakībhavati . agnisādbhavati . pakṣe—agnībhavati . ʻabhividhau saṃpadā cö (5. 4. 53) iti sātipratyaye agnisāt saṃpadyate . ʻtadadhīnavacane (5. 4. 54) iti sātipratyaye agnisāt bhavati . rājādhīnaṃ karoti rājasāt karoti . rājasādbhavati . rājasāt saṃpadyate . rājasāt syāt . tathā ʻdeye trā cö (5. 3. 55) iti sātiḥ . brāhmaṇādhīnaṃ deyaṃ karoti brāhmaṇasātkaroti, pātrasātkarotītyādi (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 90-1) .. cviḥ—ʻabhūtatadbhāve kṛbhvastiyoge saṃpadyakartari cviḵ (5. 4. 50) iti . aśuklaḥ śuklaḥ saṃpadyata ityarthe śuklībhavati, śuklī syāt, śuklīkaroti iti . tathā ʻarumanaścakṣuścetorahorajasāṃ lopaścö (5. 4. 51) iti cviḥ . prātipadikasya ca lopaḥ . anarurarurbhavati arūbhavati . unmanībhavati . pracakṣūbhavati . pracetīkaroti . virajīkaroti ityādi .. ḍāc—ʻavyaktānukaraṇāddvyajavarārdhādanitau ḍāc (5. 4. 57) iti . damadamā bhavati . simasimā karoti ityādi . tathā ʻkṛño dvitīyatṛtīyaśambabījāt kṛṣaü (5. 4. 58) iti ḍāc . dvitīyā karoti . dvitīyalekhanaṃ karotītyarthaḥ . evaṃ tṛtīyā karoti . śambā karoti . anulomakṛṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ tiryag vā kṛṣatītyarthaḥ ityādi . ʻmadrāt parivāpaṇe (5. 4. 67), ʻbhadrācceti vaktavyam (vā. 5. 4. 67) iti ḍāc . madrā karoti, bhadrā karoti; maṅgalārthaṃ muṇḍanaṃ karotītyarthaḥ . ityādayo ḍājantāḥ ..
dhamuñ—dhāpratyayasya vidhārthe ʻdvitryośca dhamuñ (5. 3. 45) iti . dvaidham . traidham iti . ʻdhamuñaścö iti śeṣagranthe cakāro vikalpārthaḥ . dhamuñpratyayānto vikalpanāvyaya ityarthaḥ . tathā ca ʻdhamuñantāt svārthe ḍadarśanam (vā. 5. 3. 45) iti ḍapratyaye satyakārāntanapuṃsakatvamapi vikalpena bhavati . yathā—dvaidhasya viṣayaḥ, traidhasya viṣayaḥ iti ..
ktvā—ʻalaṃkhalvoḥ pratiṣedhayoḥ prācāṃ ktvȫ (3. 4. 18) iti . yathā—ʻālapyālam iti (śiśu. 2. 40) nālapitavyamityarthaḥ . khalu—ʻkhalūktavā khalü (śiśu. 2. 70) . vācikaṃ na vaktavyamityarthaḥ . tathā ʻudīcāṃ māṅo vyatīhāre (3. 4. 19) iti ktvā . yathā—apamitya yācate . yācitvāpamayate ityarthaḥ . ʻsamānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle (3. 4. 21) iti ktvā . yathā—bhuktvā vrajati . pītvā gacchati (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 243) . vyādāya svapiti . saṃmīlya svapiti ityupasaṃkhyānam . atra apūrvakālatvāditi ādyudāharaṇāni [apamitya yācate ityādi] .. śas—ʻbahvalpārthācchaskārakādanyatarasyām (5. 4. 42) iti . bahvarthād maṅgalavacanam . yathā—bahuśo dadāti . pakṣe bahūni dadāti . bhūriśo dadāti . bhūri dadātīti . alpārthādamaṅgalavacanam . yathā—alpaśo dadāti . pakṣe alpaṃ dadāti . stokaśo dadāti . pakṣe stokaṃ dadāti . (kāśikā. 2, pṛ. 88) . evaṃ kārakāntareṣvudāhāryam . ʻsaṃkhyaikavacanācca vīpsāyām (5. 4. 43) iti śas . yathā—dvau dvau dadātītyarthe dviśo dadāti . trīṃstrīn dadātītyarthe triśo dadāti . karṣāpaṇaṃ karṣāpaṇaṃ dadātītyarthe karṣāpaṇaśo dadāti . māṣaśo dadāti . prasthaśo dadāti ityādi (kāśikā. 2, pṛ. 88) ..
vatiḥ—ivārthe vatiḥ prāguktaḥ . ʻtena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḵ (5. 1. 115) . brāhmaṇavat . rājavat . ʻtatra tasyevö (5. 1. 116) iti vatiḥ . mathurāyāmiva mathurāvat . devadattasyeva devadattavat ..
māntakṛt—ʻābhīkṣṇye ṇamul cö (3. 4. 22) . yathā—bhojaṃ bhojaṃ vrajati . pāyaṃ pāyaṃ vrajati . tathā ʻvibhāṣāgreprathamapūrveṣü (3. 4. 24) . agre bhojaṃ vrajati . agre bhuktvā vrajatītyarthaḥ .. tathā ʻkarmaṇyākrośe kṛñaḥ khamuñ (3. 4. 25) coraṃkāramākrośati . coro'si ityākrośatītyarthaḥ . tumun—ʻśakadhṛṣajñāglāghaṭarabhalabhakramasahārhāstyartheṣu tumun (3. 4. 65) . yathā—śaknoti bhoktum ityādi . ʻtumunṇvulau kriyāyāṃ kriyārthāyām (3. 3. 10) iti tumun . yathā—bhoktuṃ vrajati iti (kāśikā. 1, pṛ. 208) .. śeṣe—iti tumun . yathā—bhoktuṃ vrajati iti (kāśikā. 1, pṛ. 208) .. śeṣe—
ʻthālthamustādenabasādavyayībhāva āsi cö  
iti . thālpratyayādisaptapratyayāntaṃ śabdarūpam avyayībhāvasamāsaścetyaṣṭavidham avyayasaṃjñamiti pūrveṇānvayaḥ . tatra thāl—ʻprakāravacane thāl (5. 3. 23) . tena prakāreṇetyarthe tathā . evaṃ, yathā sarvathā iti .. thamu—ʻidamasthamuḵ ʻkimaścö (5. 3. 24-5) iti . yathā—ittham, katham iti .. astātiḥ—ʻdikśabdebhyaḥ saptamīpañcamīprathamābhyo digdeśakāleṣvastātiḵ (5. 3. 27) . pūrvasyāṃ diśītyarthe purastāt, pūrvasyā diśaḥ purastāt, pūrvā dik purastāt itiyādi .. enap—ʻenabanyatarasyāmadūre'pañcamyāḵ (5. 3. 35) iti . yathā—uttarasyāṃ diśyadūre vasatītyarthe uttareṇa vasati iti . evaṃ dakṣiṇena, adhareṇa ityādi digdeśakāleṣu vibhaktyantare draṣṭavyam . apañcamyā iti niṣedhāt tatrābhāvaḥ .. as—ʻpūrvādharāvarāṇāmasi puradhavaścaiṣām (5. 3. 39) iti . puraḥ . pūrvasyāṃ diśītyarthaḥ . evam adhaḥ, avaḥ iti digdeśakāle vibhaktitrayaṃ draṣṭavyam .. āt—ʻuttarādhara dakṣiṇādātiḵ (5. 3. 34) iti astāterarthe ātiḥ . uttarasyāṃ diśi vasati, uttarād vasati . adharād vasati . dakṣiṇād vasati iti .. avyayībhāvaḥ—avyayībhāvo nāma samāsaviśeṣaḥ . ʻavyayaṃ vibhaktisamīpa . . . (2. 1. 6) ityādisūtrasaṃdarbhavihitaḥ . yathā—adhipīṭham, upakumbham, pratyarthamityādi .. āsi—ʻiṇa āsiḵ (u. 4. 223) . ayāḥ .. anantaraṃ kecidavyayāḥ śeṣakāreṇa darśitāḥ . yathā—pratyārambhe saha iti . acoditasyāvadhikaraṇe na pratiṣedhaḥ pratyārambhaḥ . yathā—saha bhokṣyasa iti .. śeṣe—
ʻbhago he haṃho bho ho ca saṃbuddhiḵ
iti . ete pañca saṃbuddhiḥ saṃbodhane . yathā—bhago guravaḥ . he vṛkṣa kiṃ kampase . haṃho paśyata . bho devadatta . upahūto ho ityāha iti .. śeṣe—ʻduṣṭasaṃbodhane agho syāt . yathā—agho durātman iti .. śeṣe—ʻtvayā te me mayeti cö . iti-śabdasya tvayetyanenāpyanvayaṃ darśayituṃ caśabdaḥ . tataśca tvayetyarthe teśabdo vartate . mayetyarthe meśabdo vartata ityarthaḥ . yathā—ʻśrutaṃ te rājaśārdūla śrutaṃ me bhavato guro iti .. śeṣe—ʻyena teneti hetau staḵ iti . sādhanatvāvasthāpanne hetau abhidheye tṛtīyaikavacanapratirūpakau yena tenetyavyayau sta ityarthaḥ . ʻvitara giramudārāṃ yena mūkāḥ pikāḥ syuḵ iti . tena—ayaṃ vādeṣu pragalbhate tena ślādhyaḥ iti .. śeṣe—ʻna ha vai tu niṣedhane . yathā—ʻna ha vā etasyārcā na yajuṣā na sāmnā'rtho'sti, yaḥ sāvitraṃ vedö iti . śeṣe—ʻśubhaṃ śubhe . yathā‒śubhaṃyuḥ iti .
śeṣe—ʻviśeṣe tü iti . yathā—ayaṃ tu vaktā iti .. śeṣe—ʻvitarke nu vai smṛtaḵ iti . yathā—ʻko nu vā antarikṣe vācaṃ visṛjati iti .. śeṣe—ʻhetāvṛtaṃ nimittarte iti . nimittaṃ ca ṛtaṃ ca nimittartam iti dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ . hetau ityavyayaṃ nimitte vartate . ṛtamityavyayam ṛte satye vartate ityarthaḥ . hetau yathā—hetau tuṣyati bhavān iti . kenāpi nimittena tuṣyatītyarthaḥ . yathā—ṛtaṃvadaḥ . satyavādītyarthaḥ .. śeṣe—ʻsamyagarthe paśuḥ smṛtaḵ iti . yathā—ʻbodhaṃ nayanti paśuṃmanyamānāḵ iti . samyak pratipādyamānā ityarthaḥ .. śeṣe—ʻmātrāyāṃ parimāṇārthe iti . yathā—mātrāyāṃ bhuṅkte iti .. śeṣe—ʻśukaṃ śīghre iti . yathā—śukaṃ gacchati iti .. śeṣe—ʻmamatvavān mamö . mametyavyayam . mamatvaṃ vaktītyarthaḥ . yathā—ʻnirmamo nirahaṃkāraḵ iti (bha. gī. 2. 71) .. śeṣe—ʻprāhṇe ahna ārambhe iti . ahnaḥ prārambhe prāhṇeśabdaḥ . yathā—ʻprāhṇe devānām iti . pūrvāhṇe devānāmityarthaḥ ..
śeṣe—ʻathānyonyasya paraspare iti . anyonyasyetyavyayaṃ parasparaśabdārthe vartate . yathā—ʻchandāṃsyanyonyasya lokamabhyadhyāyan iti .. śeṣe—ʻyathā kathā cānādṛtyām iti . anādṛtyāmanādare . yathā—ʻyathā kathā ca dīyate . yathā kathā ca dakṣiṇȫ iti (gaṇa. maho. pṛ. 15) .. śeṣe—ʻmaryādā syāt sīmabandhane iti . sīmni dīyamānatayā maryādāśabdo nirvyūḍhaḥ . ʻmaryā iti sāmabandhane . maryā ādīyate maryādȫ iti mahodadhiśca (pṛ. 15) .. śeṣe—ʻhiṃ prastāve iti . prastāvaḥ sāmabhaktiviśeṣaḥ . yathā—ʻhiṃ karoti iti . (hiṃ sāma gīyate iti mahodadhau pṛ. 19) .. śeṣe—ʻkat prakarṣe iti . yathā—ʻkad rudrāya pracetase iti (tai. ā. 10. 17. 1) .. śeṣe—ʻśoḥ kutsāyām iti . yathā—ʻśoḥ karoti iti .. śeṣe—ʻsukhe tu śam iti . yathā—śaṃkaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ iti ..
śeṣe—ʻantarikṣe bhuvaḵ iti . sakārānto'yam . ʻbhuvo vāyunāntarikṣeṇa sāmnȫ iti śrutiḥ (āpastambamantrapāṭhaḥ 2. 21. 3) . rephānta ityapare . yathā—ʻbhuvardevāṃstarpayāmi iti . etaccodāharaṇadvayaṃ bhrāntimūlamityanye .. śeṣe—ʻkau bhūḵ iti . bhūrityavyayaṃ rephāntaṃ kau bhūmau vartata ityarthaḥ . yathā—bhūrlokaḥ iti .. śeṣe—ʻmithune mithunaṃ viduḵ iti . yathā—ʻmithunaṃbhāva ubhayoḵ iti .. śeṣe—ʻsamānārthe praśān iti . yathā—praśān devadattena yajñadattaḥ iti .. śeṣe—ʻyuktaṃ nyāyye iti . yathā—ʻna tava yuktaṃ duṣṭabhāvaḵ iti .. śeṣe—ʻkṣāntau kṣamā bhavet iti . yathā—kṣamākaroti; ityādayo'vagantavyāḥ . avyayagaṇeṣu vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāśca nipātā ityuktā avyayāḥ . ta idānīṃ pradarśyante . yathā—āsa babhūvārthe . yathā—ʻlāvaṇya utpādya ivāsa yatnaḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 1. 35) .. na yātīti na śakyate ityarthe . yathā—idaṃ te kartuṃ na yāti iti . yātīti śakyārthe . idaṃ kartuṃ yāti .. vartate iti solluṇṭhanyaṅgavacane . yathā—ʻvṛddhāste na vicāraṇīyacaritāstiṣṭhantu huṃ vartate iti (uttara. 5. 35) . na vartate iti maṅgalapratiṣedhe . yathā—ʻsamarābhimukhe patyāvaśrupāto na vartate (gaṇa. maho. pṛ. 30) iti . maṅgalaṃ na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ .. bhavati sattāyām . yathā—ʻbhavati nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati iti (gaṇa. maho. pṛ. 30) .. manye vitarke . yathā—ʻmanye mārtaṇḍagṛhyāṇi padmānyuddhartumutsukaḵ iti (gaṇa. maho. pṛ. 30) . nāstīti sattāniṣedhe . yathā—nāsti matirasya nāstikaḥ iti .. asmītyasmadarthānuvāde . yathā—ʻavidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ pañca kleśāḵ iti (yogasū. 2. 3) . ʻtvāmasmi vacmi viduṣāṃ samavāyo'tra tiṣṭhati iti kāvyaprakāśikāyām .. ehi manye prahāsādau . yathā—ehi manye rathena yāsyasi iti . ehi na tvayā jalpiṣyāmītyanādare . asi tvamarthavākyālaṃkārayoḥ . tvamarthe yathā mālatīmādhave—ʻkalyāṇānāṃ tvamasi mahatāṃ bhājanaṃ viśvamūrte iti (1. 3) . ʻāsate śatamadhikṣiti bhūpāstoyarāśirasi te khalu kūpāḵ iti naiṣadhakāvye (5. 100) . tvaṃ toyarāśirityarthaḥ . vākyālaṃkāre yathā—ʻyadapūpujastvamasi pārthö iti (śiśu. 15. 24) ..
pūryate iti niṣedhe . yathā—ʻpūryate prāṇāyāmenö iti (gaṇa. maho. pṛ. 30) . alaṃ prāṇāyāmenetyarthaḥ .. asti sattāyām . yathā—asti paraloke matirasyetyāstikaḥ . astikṣīrā brāhmaṇī (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 106) iti . śaṅke iti vitarke . yathā—ʻśaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te (megha. 2. 28) iti . śaṅke śaśāṅko'yam iti ca . vidyate iti bhavatyarthe . yathā—vidyate kṣīrā brāhmaṇī iti . paśya, paśyata iti pūjāyām . yathā—
ʻmahīṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ bho rājan paśya pālaya .
guravaḥ paśyatāsanne mayi datta kṛpāṃ dṛśā ..
iti . āha ityuvācetyarthe . yathā—ʻathāha varṇī vidito maheśvaraḵ iti (ku. saṃ. 5. 65) . iti tiṅantapratirūpakā uktāḥ .
atha vibhaktipratirūpakāḥ keciducyante—prāyaḥ, aham, tvam, śubham, kṛtam, paryāptam, yena, tena, cireṇa antareṇa, cirāya, cirarātrāya, akasmāt, akṛtyā, anyonyasya, cirasya, mama, prāhṇe, prage, hetau, velāyām, mātrāyām iti vibhaktipratirūpakāḥ . evamādayo gaṇapāṭheṣu nighaṇṭvantare ca draṣṭavyāḥ . granthagauravabhayādiha na likhyante .. 23 ..
nānaikārthaviśeṣād vargadvayavantamavyayasamūham .
śeṣoktādisametaṃ pravyaktaṃ vyākhyadappayācāryaḥ ..
iha yattyaktamajñānādālasyādyadupekṣitam .
pramādādanyathoktaṃ yat tadvidvadbhirviśodhyatām ..
ādyāvyayavargīyaślokā aṣṭottarā daśa .
cirādyavyayavargīyaślokā netrapayodhayaḥ ..
nānārthāvyayasaṃyuktāścatvariṃśadadhidvikāḥ .
iti śrībommagaṇṭyappayācāryakṛtanāmaliṅgānuśāsanavivaraṇe'vyayaḥ samāptaḥ </Amarapadavivarana>

etarhi saṃprati—sāṃprataṃ tadā . etāni etasmin kāle ityarthe syuḥ . ʻippuḍü . digdeśakāle—pratyagādayaḥ . prāgādiśabdāḥ pūrvādigdeśakāleṣu syuḥ . pūrvadigdeśakālāḥ. prāk—prāgāgataḥ . prāgvasati . prāgramaṇīyam . uttaradigdeśakālāḥ . udak, pratyak . ādipadāt adharadigādiḥ . adhastāt . upari upariṣṭāt ityādi .. 23 ..

5. liṅgādisaṃgrahavargaḥ
AK.03.05.001ab saliṅgaśāstraiḥ sannādikṛttaddhitasamāsajaiḥ .
AK.03.05.001cd anuktaiḥ saṃgrahe liṅgaṃ saṃkīrṇavadihonnayet .. 1 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.001>  
atha liṅgādisaṃgrahavargamupakramate saliṅgeti . asyārthaḥ—liṅgaśāstrasahitaiḥ sannādikṛttaddhitasamāsajairgranthairiha saṃgrahe varge'nuktaṃ liṅgaṃ saṃkīrṇavat saṃkīrṇavarge ivonnayet .. 1 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.001>  
saliṅgaśāstraiḥ—saṃkīrṇavadihonnayet . iha hi granthādau granthakāraḥ ʻsaṃpūrṇamucyate vargairnāmaliṅgānuśāsanam (1, pṛ. 3) iti pratijñāya etadantena granthasadaṃrbheṇa saliṅgānāṃ nāmnāṃ sāvyayānāmanuśāsanaṃ vidhāya tatra tatra liṅgavidherasaṃpūrṇatāṃ manvānaḥ tannirūpaṇāya vargāntaramārabhate saliṅgeti . saṃkṣepeṇa samyak vācyaliṅgānyatra gṛhyante nirūpyanta iti saṃgrahaśabdena vakṣyamāṇo liṅgasaṃgrahākhyo vargo vivakṣitaḥ . liṅgamityekavacanamavivakṣitam . unnayediti lakṣaṇamukhena tattvajñānamunnīya liṅgāni jānīyādityarthaḥ . kathaṃ jānīyāt? ityata āha—sannādītyādinā . iha sannādiśabdena san kyac kāmyajādipratyayāntebhyo dhātubhyo vihitā akārādipratyayā abhihitāḥ, tṛtīyadhātvadhikāravihitāḥ tiṅvarjitāḥ pratyayāḥ kṛtaḥ sanādyantebhyo dhātubhyo vihitānāṃ kṛtpratyayavyatiriktapratyayānāṃ liṅganirṇayaupayikatvābhāvāt . yadyapi sannādayo'pi kṛdrūpā eva, tathāpi brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena kṛdbhyaḥ sannādīnāṃ pṛthageva nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ . tathā kṛcchabdena sanādyantadhātuvyatiriktadhātuvihitā eva kṛtyapratyayā grāhyāḥ . taddhitāḥ prasiddhāḥ . sannādayaḥ kṛtaśca taddhitāśca samāsāśceti dvandvaḥ . tebhyo jātānyanantaramevāsmābhiḥ kṛdādyupādhimukhena vakṣyamāṇāni vākyāni . tatra srībhāvādāvaniktinnityādīni kṛjjāni (ślo. 4), talvṛnde yenikaṭyatrā ityādīni (ślo. 4) taddhitāni, ajantairdvigurekārthaḥ (ślo. 3) ityadīni samāsajāni talliṅgānyunnayet ityanvayaḥ .
nanu—bhavatpraṇītavākyānāṃ kathaṃ prāmāṇyamityata āha—saliṅgaśāstrairiti . ʻstriyāṃ ktin (3. 3. 94), ʻakārāntottarapado dviguḥ striyāmiṣyate (vā. 2. 4. 17), ʻpuṃsi saṃjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prāyeṇö (3. 3. 118), ʻghañantāḥ puṃsi (liṅgānu. 36) . ʻrātrāhnāhāḥ puṃsi (2. 4. 29), ʻanuvākādayaḥ puṃsi vaktavyāḵ, ʻnapuṃsake bhāve ktaḵ (3. 3. 114), ʻapathaṃ napuṃsakam (2. 4. 30), ʻardharcāḥ puṃsi cö (2. 4. 31), ʻparavalliṅgaṃ dvandvatatpuruṣayoḵ (2. 4. 26) ʻpūrvavadaśvabaḍabaü (2. 4. 27) ityādīni yāni pāṇinivararucibhāṣyakārādibhiḥ praṇitāni liṅgapratipādakāni śāstrāṇi, yāni ca bārhaspatyādīni ca liṅgānuśāsanāni tatsahitairityarthaḥ . tatsāhityaṃ ca tadekārthatvaṃ tanmūlatvamiti yāvat . anena svavākyānāṃ prāktanaliṅgānuśāsanamūlakatvena prāmāṇyamuktam .
nanu—nāmānuśāsanasamaya eva liṅgānāmapi spaṣṭīkaraṇāt kimanena piṣṭapeṣaṇaprayāsatulyena pratyayādidvārakaliṅganirṇayakartavyatāprayāsena ityata āha—anuktamiti . ayamabhiprāyaḥ—sakalasya śabdajātasya prātipadyena liṅganirṇayakaraṇānupapatteḥ yatkiṃcidupādhimukhenaiva śabdajātaṃ kroḍīkṛtya liṅganirṇayaḥ kartavyaḥ . sa ca pūrvamakṛta eva . saṃkīrṇavarge tu prakṛtyādibhirunnayanamātramupakṣiptam . na tūnnayanopāyo'pi vivicya darśitaḥ . ataḥ paryāyakāṇḍe nānārthakāṇḍe ca kṛtamapi liṅgānuśāsanam asākalyādanuktaprāyameveti manvānena anuktamityuktam .
atra kecit paṭhanti—tatrāpi prāganuktaiḥ sakalaśabdaśāstrakrodīkāraiḥ kṛtyapratyayādibhirupādhibhiḥ liṅgamunnayediti yojyam . dṛṣṭāntamukhenāpi liṅgonnayanopāyaprakāramāha—saṃkīrṇavaditi . yathā saṃkīrṇavarge prakṛtyādimukhena liṅgonnayanamuktaṃ tadvadihāpīti . tatra prakṛtyā yathā—bāla eva bālakaḥ . śaśa eva śaśakaḥ . godhaiva godhikā . sthānameva sthānakam . ityādiṣu svārthavihitapratyayānteṣu prakṛtiliṅgānuvartanam . viśeṣavidhāneṣu cāturvarṇyādiṣu prakṛtiliṅgasyāpyatisṛtiḥ pratyayena liṅgonnayanam . yathā—pātrī puṭī ityādīnāma (ślo. 42) . matvarthe inipratyayāntatvapakṣe vakṣyamāṇaparopagatvaprakaraṇapāṭhāpatteḥ . tadabhāvatvena ṅībantatvaniścaye sati strīliṅganirdeśa ityavadhāryate . yatra pātrībhūtapradeśa iti prayogastatra matvarthīyapratyayena viśeṣyanighnamityādi . arthena yathā—ʻnābhī rājasabhāpi cö (ślo. 9) . yadyapi strīliṅgaprakaraṇe vakṣyate, tathāpi prāṇyaṅgavacanasya ca strīliṅgatvam . kṣatriye tu puṃstvamityarthena nirṇayaḥ (1, pṛ. 518) . cūrṇiḥ, śāṇī, dṛṇī, darad ityādiṣu prakaraṇavaśāt liṅgāvadhāraṇam . tathā kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmatvaṃ napuṃsakatvaṃ cetyādikaṃ boddhavyam .
nanu—samanantaravargasya liṅganirṇayārthatve ʻpātrāmatraṃ ca bhājanam (1, pṛ. 573) ityatra pātraśabdasya kevalanapuṃsakaliṅgatvamuktam . liṅgādisaṃgrahe tu—ʻtriṣu pātrī (ślo. 42) iti triliṅgatvaṃ vakṣyate . ataḥ kevalanapuṃsakatvatriliṅgatvayorvirodhaḥ . tathā—ʻkuvalaphenile (1, pṛ. 237) iti kuvalaśabdasya napuṃsakatvaṃ prāguktam . liṅgasaṃgrahe tu—triliṅgatvamabhidhāsyate (ślo. 42) ityādisthaleṣu pūrvottarasthaleṣu ca virodhe kasya prasaṅga ityākāṅkṣāyāmāha—liṅgaśeṣetyādi (ślo. 2) .. 1 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.001>  
rakṣatu lakṣmīramaṇo lakṣmīkucakumbhayugmaparirambhaḥ .
rakṣitalokatritayaḥ śikṣitarakṣogaṇādhipādhyakṣaḥ ..
saliṅgaśāstreḥ—saṃkīrṇavadihonnayet . iha saṃgraho liṅgānāṃ nāmnāṃ ca saṃgrahaṇādayaṃ vargo liṅgādisaṃgrahavargaḥ . atrānuktaṃ liṅgaṃ ca saṃkīrṇavat saṃkīrṇavarge prakṛtipratyayārthādibhiryathā liṅgonnayanaṃ tathā saliṅgaśāstraiḥ liṅgaśāstrasahitaiḥ sannādikṛttaddhitasamāsajaiḥ kṛttaddhitasamāsaśāstre unnayet tarkayet . ʻjaitrejaḥ pratipattavyaḥ śambare śabdaśāsane iti . tāni kānīti ced vidyunniśāvallītyādīni liṅgaśāstrāṇi . strībhāvādau ktinnityādīni kṛcchāstrāṇi . sannādigrahaṇaṃ tumādivyudāsārtham . tal kaṭyac tralityāditaddhitaśāstrāṇi . dvigurekavacanamityādīni samāsaśāstrāṇi .. 1 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.002ab liṅgaśeṣavidhirvyāpī viśeṣairyadyabādhitaḥ .
AK.03.05.002cd striyāmīdūdvirāmaikāc sayoniprāṇināma ca .. 2 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.002>  
liṅgaśeṣa—abādhitaḥ . liṅgaśāstre striyāmīdūtityādibhiḥ, sannādibhiḥ cikīrṣā jihīrṣā ityādibhiḥ, kṛjjaiḥ kṛtiḥ hṛtiḥ ityādibhiḥ, taddhitajaiḥ mauṣṭā pāllavetyādibhiḥ, samāsajaiḥ trilokī trivedītyādibhiḥ liṅgaviśeṣavidhiḥ strīliṅgānuśāsanaviśeṣavidhirabādhitaścet aviśeṣetaścet tadā vyāpī prasaṅgād bhavati .. striyāmīdūdvirāmaikāc . ekāc ekasvarā īdvirāmā ūdvirāmā ca śabdaprakṛtiḥ striyāṃ vartate . atrodāharaṇāni—śrīḥ, dhīḥ, bhūḥ, pūḥ ityādi .. sayoniprāṇināma ca . yonimatprāṇināṃ nāma striyāṃ vartate . yathā—iyaṃ kapiḥ . iyaṃ guruḥ. iyaṃ hariratyādi .. 2 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.002>  
liṅgaśeṣavidhirvyāpī . uktanayena liṅgayorvirodhe sati liṅgaśeṣavidhireva vyāpī prasaṅgavān bhavati . grāhyo bhavatītyarthaḥ . pātrādiśabdānāṃ prāguktaṃ (1, pṛ. 573) liṅgamabādhitvaiva liṅgāntaravidhānād (ślo. 42) vāstavo virodho nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ . nanu—liṅgaśeṣavidhinaiva tadarthalābhāt pūrvavidhivaiyarthyamityapi na vācyam . prayogaprācuryapradarśanaparatvādvā svaprāyapaṭhitasya liṅganiścayārthatvādvā tasyopapatterityalam ..
nanu—yadi pūrvavidhyapekṣayā liṅgaviśeṣavidheḥ prābalyaṃ syāt, tarhi ʻsayoniprāṇināma cö iti strīmātre nāmnāṃ sāmānyena strīliṅgatvaṃ vidadhatā liṅgaviśeṣavidhinā dāraśabdasya pūrvoktaṃ (1, pṛ. 365) puṃliṅgatvaṃ kalatraśabdasya napuṃsakatvam (2, pṛ. 470) ityādi bādhyetetyatrāha—viśeṣairyadyabādhitaḥ . asyārthaḥ—ʻsayoniprāṇināma cö iti liṅgasaṃgrahokto vidhiḥ sāmānyavidhiḥ . ʻpuṃ bhūmni dārāḵ (1, pṛ. 365), ʻkalatraṃ śroṇibhāryayoḵ (1, pṛ. 470) iti prāgukto vidhiḥ viśeṣavidhiḥ . viśeṣeṇa ca sāmānyabādho yuktaḥ . viśeṣagṛhītavyatiriktasthale sāmānyasya sāvakāśatvāt . na ca sāmānyavidhinā viśeṣavidherbādhaḥ . viśeṣavidheranyatrānarthakyaprasaṅgāt . ataḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavyatirekeṇa dvayorapi viśeṣavidhitve liṅgaśeṣavargoktavidheḥ prābalyamiti ..
evaṃ sukhajñānāya paribhāṣāmuktvā strīpuṃnapuṃsakaliṅgāni vyastāni ca krameṇa vidhatte—striyāmiti . adhikāro'yam ā puṃliṅgavidheḥ (ślo. 11), ita uttaratra vakṣyamāṇāḥ striyāṃ veditavyā ityarthaḥ .. īdūdvirāmaikāc . īdvirāmam īkārāntam, ūdvirāmam ūkārātam, ekāc ekasvaraṃ padaṃ ca striyāṃ bhavati . yathā—śrīḥ, dhīḥ, bhūḥ, pūḥ ityādi . ekājiti kim? grāmaṇīḥ, pratibhūḥ iti . īdūdvirāmeti kim? kaḥ, svam iti .. sayoniprāṇināma ca . yoniḥ strīvyañjanam . yonimataḥ prāṇino nāma striyāṃ bhavati . yathā—yoṣit, vadhūḥ, snuṣā ityādi . sayonīti kim? puruṣaḥ, pitā, bhrātā iti .. 2 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.002>  
liṅgaśeṣa—abādhitaḥ . viśeṣairabādhito liṅgaśeṣavidhirvyāpī . bādhitaviṣayaṃ vinā tadatiriktasvaviṣaye vyāpaka ityarthaḥ . ʻmandākṣaṃ hrīstrapā vrīḍȫ (1. pṛ. 135) . atra mandākṣaśabdo bādhitaviṣayaḥ .. striyāmādūdvirāmaikāc . striyām ityāmasīśabdam (ślo. 10) adhikāraḥ . īdūdvirāmāṇi īdūdantāni ekackāni ca nāmāni striliṅgāni . yathā—lakṣmīḥ, tantrīḥ, tandrīḥ, tarīḥ, jambūḥ, alābūḥ, kutūḥ, kūhūḥ, dṛk, śṛk, srak, vāk .. sayoniprāṇināma ca . yonimatprāṇināṃ nāma strīliṅgam . yathā—gauḥ, kareṇuḥ .. 2 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 05.656
AK.03.05.003ab nāma vidyunniśāvallīvīṇādigbhūnadīhriyām .
AK.03.05.003cd adantairdvigurekārtho na sa pātrayugādibhiḥ .. 3 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.003>  
nāma vidyut—nadīhriyām . taḍidrātrilatāvallakīdigbhūsarillajjānāṃ nāma striyāṃ vartate .. adantairdvigurekārthaḥ . adantairakārāntottarapadaiḥ ekārthaḥ samāhārarūpo dvigusamāsaḥ striyāṃ bhavati . atrodāharaṇāni—pañcapūlī, daśapūlī, trilokī ityādi .. na sa pātrayugādibhiḥ . sa dvigusamāsaḥ pātrayugādibhiruttarapadaiḥ striyāṃ na vartate . udāharaṇāni—tripātram, caturyugam . ādiśabdāt tribhuvanamityādi .. 3 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.003>  
nāma vidyut—nadīhriyām . vidyutaḥ saudāminyāḥ, niśāyā rātryāḥ, vallyāḥ latāyāḥ, vīṇāyā vallakyāḥ, diśaḥ kakubhaḥ, bhuvo bhūmeḥ, nadyāḥ saritaḥ, hriyo lajjāyāśca sarvāṇi nāmāni strīliṅgāni bhavanti . udāharaṇāni spaṣṭāni . mandākṣamityādau (1, pṛ. 235) viśeṣavidhinā sāmānyasya bādhaḥ sarvatrānusaṃdheyaḥ . atra bhūśabdahrīśabdayordvayoḥ ʻīdūdvirāmaikāc (ślo. 2) iti prāguktam . niśāvallīvīṇādiśabdānāṃ ʻṅyābūṅantam (ślo. 5) iti vakṣyamāṇaṃ nityastrītvaṃ suspaṣṭam . tathāpi tatparyāyāṇāmanevaṃbhūtānāṃ vidyudrātrivratatiprubhṛtīnāṃ liṅgapratipādanārthaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ cānena rūpeṇābhidhānamityavagantavyam ..
adantairdvigurekārthe . adantaiḥ akārāntottarapadaiḥ saha saṃkhyāśabdānāmekārthe . ʻtaddhitārthottarapadasamāhāre cö (2. 1. 51) iti samāhārarūpārthe vihito dvigusamāsaḥ striyāṃ vartate . taduktam—ʻakārāntottarapado dviguḥ striyāṃ bhāṣyate iti (vā. 2. 4. 17) . atra samāhārasyaikatvād ʻdvigurekavacanam (2. 4. 1) ityekavacanam . ʻdvigoḵ (4. 1. 21) iti ṅīppratyayaśca . yathā—pañcapūlī, daśapūlī (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 266), ṣaṭśatī, saptaśatī ityādi . tathā tisṛṇāṃ purāṃ samāhāraḥ tripurī, pañcānāṃ dhurāṃ samāhāraḥ pañcadhurī iti . atra ʻṛkpūrabdhū . .  . ityādinā (5. 4. 74) samāsāntasya uttarapadāvayavatvadarśanāśrayaṇena uttarapadasyākārāntatve tripurī pañcadhurī ityādi bhavati ..
yattu matam—prathamataḥ samāsaḥ, tataḥ samāsāntavidhiḥ iti . atrādantairiti akārāntabhūtairlakṣito dviguḥ striyāmiti vyākhyeyam . adantairiti kim ? pañcānāmagnīnāṃ samāhāraḥ pañcāgni . atra ʻsa napuṃsakam (2. 4. 17) iti napuṃsakatvam . dviguriti kim ? samitkuśam, pāṇipādam iti samāhāradvandve mā bhūt . atra ʻdvandvaikatvāvyayībhāvaü (ślo. 26) iti napuṃsakatvaṃ vakṣyati . ekārtha iti kim ? trināvam, pañcakapālaḥ puroḍāśaḥ iti ..
adantairdvigurekārtha ityasya kvacidapavādamāha—na sa pātrayugādibhiḥ . sa dvigurakārāntairapi pātrayugādibhiruttarapadairupetaḥ striyāṃ na bhavati . yathā—tripātram, caturyugam tribhuvanam (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 131) ityādi . nanu—ʻpātrādyadantairekārtho dvigurlakṣyānusārataḵ (ślo. 25) iti vakṣyamāṇo napuṃsakavidhiḥ adantairityasya bādhako bhaviṣyatīti kimatrānena pratiṣedheneti cet, satyam . asya pratiṣedhasya ʻpātrādibhyaḥ pratiṣedho vaktavyaḵ (vā. 2. 4. 17) iti vaktavyamūlatvapratijñānārthaṃ prapañcārthaṃ copanyāsa iti .. 3 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.003>  
nāma vidyut—nadīhriyām . vidyudādyarthānāṃ nāma strīliṅgam . vidyunnāmno nīlāñjanā śatahradā, niśānāmno yāmyā kṣaṇinī, vallīnāmno vratatiḥ pratatiḥ, tadviśeṣanāmno'pi drākṣā navamālikā, vāṇānāmno ghoṣavatī kaṇṭhakūṇikā, tadviśeṣanāmno'pi kiṃnarī dantikā .. adantairdvigu—yugādibhiḥ . akārāntottarapadasamāhāradviguḥ strīliṅgaḥ . trilokī pañcapūlī . na sa pātrayugādibhiriti bādhitaviṣayaḥ pradarśitaḥ . yathā—pañcapātram, caturyugam, tribhuvanam iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 131) .. 3 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 05.658
AK.03.05.004ab tatvṛnde yenikaṭyatrā vairamaithunikādivun .
AK.03.05.004cd strībhāvādāvaniktiṇṇvulṇacṇvuckyabyujiñṅniśāḥ .. 4 ..
AK.03.05.005ab uṇādiṣu nirūrīśca ṅyābūḍantaṃ calaṃ sthiram .
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.004>  
talvṛnde yeni—calaṃ sthiram . tal—bhāvasamūhasvārtheṣu vartamānaḥ talpratyayaḥ striyāṃ vartate . atra krameṇodāharaṇāni . bhāve yathā—aśvatā, puruṣatā . samūhārthe yathā—janatā, bandhutā, sahāyatā . svārthe yathā—devatā ityādi .. vṛnde yenikaṭyatrāḥ . vṛnde samūhārthe vihitā yapratyayaïnipratyayakaṭyacpratyayatrapratyayāntāḥ striyāṃ vartante . udāharaṇāni . yapratyayāntā yathā—pāśyā, vātyā, dhūmyā, vanyā ityādi . inipratyayāntā yathā—khalinī, ulūkinī, kuṇḍalinī ityādi . kaṭyacpratyayānto yathā—rathakaṭyā iti (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 312) . trapratyayānto yathā—gotrā iti .. 
vairamaithunikādivun . vairavivāhavācako vunpratyayāntaḥ striyāṃ vartate . udāharaṇāni . vaire yathā—kākolūkayorvairaṃ kākolūkikā, aśvamahiṣikā ityādi . vivāhe yathā—atribharadvājayorvivāhaḥ atribharadvājikā . vaśiṣṭhakuśikayorvivāhaḥ vasiṣṭhakuśikikā . ādiśabdād dānadaṇḍadvandvabhāvakarmavācako vunpratyayāntaśca striyāṃ vartate . krameṇodāharaṇāni . dvau dvau pādau dadāti dvipadikāṃ dadāti . dve dve śate daṇḍayati dviśatikāṃ daṇḍayati .. vṛñ śiṣyopādhyāyayoḥ bhāvaḥ karma vā śaiṣyopādhyāyikā (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 29) . gargasya [ślāghārthe] bhāvaḥ karma vā gārgikā . kauśikasya bhāvaḥ karma vā kauśikikā (5. 1. 134) ityādi .. 
strībhāvāditi . siddhāvasthāmāpanno dhātvartho bhāvaḥ . bhāvaḥ ādiryasyāsau bhāvādiḥ . strī cāsau bhāvādiśca strībhāvādiḥ . tasmin vihitā anyādipratyayāntāḥ striyāṃ vartante . anipratyayānto yathā—ajananiḥ, akaraṇiḥ .. ktinprapatyayānto yathā—kṛtiḥ, bhṛtiḥ, hṛtirityādi .. ṇvulpratyayānto yathā—pravāhikā, pracchardiketyādi .. ṇacpratyayānto yathā—vyāvakrośī . anyonyakrośanaṃ vartata ityarthaḥ . vyāvahāsītyādi . ṇvucpratyayānto yathā—[bhavataḥ] śāyikā . kyappratyayānto yathā—vrajyā . samajyā, sutyetyādi .. yucpratyayānto yathā—āsanā, kāraṇā, granthanetyādi .. aṅpratyayānto yathā—trapā, bhidā, chidā ityādi .. apratyayānto yathā—putrīyā ityādi . nipratyayānto yathā—glāniḥ, mlāniḥ, hāniḥ ityādi . śapratyayānto yathā—mṛgayā, icchā ityādi . atha uṇādiṣu nipratyayānto yathā—śreṇiḥ, yoniḥ, droṇiḥ ityādi .. anipratyayānto yathā—saraṇiḥ . ūkārapratyayānto yathā—kharjūḥ, camūḥ ityādi . īkārapratyayānto yathā—tantrīḥ, lakṣmīḥ ityādi ..
ṅyābūṅantaṃ calaṃ sthiram . ṅītyanena ṅīp, ṅīṣ, ṅīn iti pratyayāntānāṃ grahaṇam . ābityanena ṭāp ḍāp cāp iti pratyayāntānāṃ grahaṇam . ūṅ ityanena ūṅpratyayasya grahaṇam . calamabhidheyavalliṅgam . sthiraṃ niyataliṅgam . calaṃ sthiraṃ ṅībantamābantamūṅantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ striyāṃ vartate . ṅībante yathā—kartrī . ṅīṣante yathā—gaurī . ṅīnante yathā—śārṅgaravī . ṭābanto yathā—ajā . ḍābanto yathā—surājā . cābanto yathā—kaumudagandhyā . ūṅanto yathā—vāmorūḥ .. 4 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.004>  
talvṛnde yeni—calaṃ sthiram . tal . vividhastalpratyayaḥ . talantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ striyāṃ vartate . tatra, ʻtasya bhāvastvatalaü (5. 1. 119) iti bhāvārthe tal . yathā—devadattasya bhāvo devadattatā . aśvatā . ʻgrāmajanabandhubhyastal (4. 2. 43) iti samūhārthe tal . yathā—grāmatā, janatā ityādi . ʻdevāttal (5. 4. 27) iti svārthe tal . deva eva devatā . atrānubandhagrahaṇaṃ kim? ʻpūñhasibhyāṃ tan (u. 3. 86) iti tanpratyaye potaḥ, hastaḥ, iti ..
vṛnde yenikaḍyatrāḥ . yaśca iniśca kaḍyacca traśceti catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ samūhārthe vihitāḥ . tadantāḥ śabdāḥ striyāṃ bhavanti . ʻpāśādibhyo yaḵ (4. 2. 49) iti yapratyaye pāśānāṃ samūhaḥ pāśyā . evaṃ galyā, tṛṇyā, halyā ityādi .. ʻkhalagorathāt (4. 2. 50) ityanuvṛttau, ʻinitrakaḍyacaścö (4. 2. 51) iti yathāsaṃkhyanyāyena khalaśabdād inipratyaye khalinī . atra ʻkhalādibhya inirvaktavyaḵ (vā. 5. 2. 51) iti vaktavyabalād ulūkānāṃ samūhaḥ ulūkinī, kuṭumbinī, kuṇḍalinī ityādi . gavāṃ samūha ityarthe gośabdāduttare trapratyaye gotrā . rathānāṃ samūho rathakaḍyā iti . kecittu rathakaṭyeti mūrdhanyavargaprathamākṣarayuktaṃ kathayanti . sūtrasthacaśabdena śabdatrayādapi yapratyayaḥ samuccīyate . tataśca khalyā, gavyā, rathyā iti trayaḥ śabdā bhavanti . vṛnda iti kim? ʻsakhyuryaḵ (5. 1. 126) ityādau strītvaṃ mā bhūt .. 
vairamaithunikādivun . vairaṃ virodhaḥ . maithunikaḥ vivāhaḥ . tatra ʻdvandvād vun vairamaithunikayoḵ (4. 3. 125) ityanena sūtraiṇa dvandvasamāsāt prātipadikād vunpratyayo vihitaḥ . tadantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ striyāṃ bhavati . yathā—kākolūkayorvairaṃ kākolūkikā . aśvamahiṣikā iti .. maithunikāyāṃ yathā—atribharadvājayorvivāhaḥ atribharadvājikā . śāṇḍilyakuśikayorvivāhaḥ śāṇḍilyakuśikikā . ādiśabdārthaḥ śeṣe—ʻvīpsādaṇḍanadāne vun iti . vīpsāyāṃ yathā—dvau dvau pādau dadāti dvipadikā . ʻpādaśatasya saṃkhyādervīpsāyāṃ vun lopaścö (5. 4. 1) iti vun-pratyayaḥ . tatsaṃniyogena cāntyasya lopaḥ . ʻyasyeti cö (6. 4. 148) ityanenaiva lope siddhe punarlopavacanaṃ paranimittānapekṣalopavidhānārtham . ʻyasyeti cö iti vihito lopaḥ parinimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvena ʻpādaḥ pat (6. 4. 130) iti padbhāvo na syāt . pratyayasaṃniyogaviśiṣṭasya tu lopasya paranimittakatvābhāvāt sthānivadbhāvābhāvena dvipadikāṃ dadāti dviśatikāṃ dadātityādau padbhāvaḥ syādeveti vṛttikāreṇa prapañcitam (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 80) . daṇḍane yathā—dvipadikāṃ daṇḍayati . dāne yathā—dvipadikāṃ dadāti . dvau dvau pādau dadātītyarthaḥ . dve dve śate dadāti dviśatikāṃ dadāti . ʻdaṇḍavyavasargayoścö (5. 4. 2) ityubhayatrāpi vunpratyayaḥ . vyavasargaḥ dānam . 
atra śeṣakāraḥ—
ʻvuña dvandvād bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . ślāghāyāṃ tadavetetyākāre caraṇagotrayoḵ iti . asyārthaḥ—ʻyopadhād gurūpottamād vṛñ (5. 1. 132) ityato vuñ iti vartamāne, ʻdvandvamanojñādibhyaścö (5. 1. 133) ityanena sūtreṇa bhāvakarmaṇorarthayoḥ dvandvasamāsād vihito yo vuñpratyayaḥ tadantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ striyāṃ bhavati . yathā—śiṣeyopādhyayorbhāvaḥ karma vā śaiṣyopādhyāyikā . gopālapaśupālikā . tathā ʻgotracaraṇācchlāghātyākāratadaveteṣü (5. 1. 134) iti sūtreṇa, gotramapatyam, caraṇaṃ śākhā, gotrapratyayāntāt caraṇapratyayāntācca śalāghādiṣvartheṣu gamyamāneṣu bhāvakarmaṇorvihito yo vṛñpratyayaḥ tadantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ striyāṃ bhavati . gargasya bhāvena karmaṇā vā ślāghate gārgikayā ślāghate . tadavetaḥ tatprāptiḥ . atyākāraḥ parādhikṣepaḥ . gārgākāmavetaḥ . gārgikayā atyākaroti . caraṇapratyayāntād yathā—kāṭhikayā ślāghate . kāṭhikayā atyākaroti . kāṭhikāmavetaḥ ityādi (kāśikā 2, pṛ. 29) ..
strībhāvādāvanikti—yujiñaṅniśāḥ . śeṣe—ʻakartṛkakārake bhāve kvibakāreṇṇvucaḥ striyām iti . bhāva ādiryasya kartṛvarjitakārakasya sa bhāvādiḥ iti tadguṇasaṃvijñāno bahuvrīhiḥ . strīliṅgaścāsau bhāvādiśca, strībhāve kartṛvarjite kārake'rthe ca vihitāḥ ani, ktin, ṇvul, ṇac, kyap, yuc, iñ, aṅ, ni, śa, ityācāryasaṃgṛhītā daśa pratyayāḥ, tathābhūta evārthe śeṣakāreṇa kvip akāraḥ iṇ ṇvuc iti catvāraśca, ityevaṃ caturdaśapratyayāntāḥ strīliṅgā saṃgṛhītāḥ veditavyāḥ . te ca krameṇodāhriyante .
tatra ʻākrośe nañyaniḵ (3. 3. 112) ityākrośe śapathe gamyamāne nañyupapade bhāvārthe dhātoranipratyayo vihitaḥ . yathā—akaraṇiste vṛṣala bhūyāt (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 224) . abhavanirastu te vibhūteḥ . apūraṇiste kāmānāmastu . ʻtasyājananirevāstu jananīkleśakāriṇaḵ iti (śiśu. 2. 45) . atha ktin . yathā—ʻstriyāṃ ktin (3. 3. 94) . prakṛtiḥ, hṛtiḥ, śuddhiḥ, buddhiḥ iti . ʻśruyajistubhyaḥ karaṇe (vā. 3. 3. 94) . śrūyate'nayeti śrutiḥ . ijyate'nayeti iṣṭiḥ . stūyate'nayā sā stutiḥ . ʻṛkāralvādibhyaḥ ktinniṣṭhāvad bhavati iti vaktavyam (vā. 3. 3. 94) . ʻjṝṣ vayohānaü . jīrṇiḥ . ʻkṝ hiṃsāyām . kīrṇiḥ . ʻlūñ chedane . lūniḥ . niṣṭhāvadbhāvāt takārasya nakāraḥ (8. 2. 42) . ʻsthāgāpāpaco bhāve (3. 3. 95) ityaṅpratyayasyāpavādaḥ . ʻṣṭhā gatinivṛttaü . prasthitiḥ . ʻvyavasthāyāmasaṃjñāyām (1. 1. 34), ʻāspadaṃ pratiṣṭhāyām (6. 1. 146) ityādijñāpakād aṅapyasti . pratiṣṭhā, saṃsthā, niṣṭhā ityādi . ʻgai śabde . udgītiḥ . ʻpā pāne . prapītiḥ . ʻḍupacaṣ pāke . paktiḥ . ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyād aṅapyasti (3. 3. 104) . pacā . tathā ʻūtiyūtijūtisātihetikīrttayaścö (3. 3. 97) iti ktinnantanipātanam yathā—ʻava rakṣaṇe . ūtiḥ . ʻyu miśraṇe . yūtiḥ . ʻjǖ iti sautro dhātuḥ. jūtiḥ . ʻṣo'ntakarmaṇi . sātiḥ . ʻhi gataü . hetiḥ ..
atha ṇvul . ʻrogākhyāyāṃ ṇvul bahulam (3. 3. 108) iti ṇvul . ʻcharda vamane . pracchardikā . ʻvaha prāpaṇe . pravāhikā (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 223) . ʻdhātvarthanirdeśe ṇvul vaktavyaḵ (vā. 3. 3. 108) . ʻāsa upaveśane . āsikā . ʻśīṅ svapne . śāyikā . ʻviśa praveśane . veśikā ..
atha ṇac . ʻkarmavyatihāre ṇac striyām (3. 3. 43) iti . dhātubhyo bhāvārthe ṇac pratyayo bhavati . karmavyatihāre kriyāvinimaye gamyamāne, ʻṇacaḥ striyāmañ (5. 4. 14) iti svārthiko'ñ pratyayaḥ . añ pratyayāntatvena ʻṭiḍḍhāṇañ . . . ityādinā (4. 1. 15) ṅīpi vyāvakrośī . anyonyaṃ krośanamityarthaḥ . evaṃ parasparaṃ hasanaṃ vyāvahāsī . parasparamukṣaṇaṃ vyātyukṣī . vyāvacorī ityādi (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 214) ..
atha ṇvuc . ʻparyāyārhaṇotpattiṣu ṇvuc (3. 3. 111) iti . paryāyaḥ paripāṭī . arhaṇamarho yogyatā . eṣvartheṣu ṇvuc syāt . yathā—bhavataḥ śāyikā . bhavata āsikā . arhe—bhavānikṣubhakṣikāmarhati . ṛṇe—ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi . utpattau—ikṣubhakṣikā me udapādi (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 224) ..
atha kyap—ʻvrajayajorbhāve kyap (3. 3. 98) . ʻvraja gataü . vrajyā . ʻyaja devapūjādaü . ijyā . ʻsaṃjñāyāṃ samajaniṣadanipatamanavidaṣuñśīṅbhṛñiṇaḵ (3. 3. 99) iti kyap . ʻaja gatikṣepaṇayoḵ . samajantyasyāmiti samajyā . ʻṣadlṛ viśaraṇagatyavasādaneṣü . niṣīdantyasyāmiti niṣadyā . niptayā . ʻmana jñāne . manyate manyā . jhalāditvābhāvād anunāsikalopābhāvaḥ . ʻvida jñāne . vidanti yayā sā vidyā . ʻṣuñ abhiṣave . sunvantyasyāmiti sutyā . ʻśīṅ svapne . śerate'syāmiti śayyā . ʻbhṛñ bharaṇe . bhriyate karmakaro'nayeti bhṛtyā . ʻiṇ gataü . yantyanayeti ityā . ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) iti kyapi kṛtyā (6. 1. 71) ..
atra kyap pratyayodāharaṇamadhye ʻhanasta cö (3. 1. 108) iti sūtreṇa niṣpanno hatyāśabdo'pi strīliṅgaḥ kaiścidudāhṛtaḥ . tatra mūlaṃ cintanīyam . tathā hi—nātra bhāvamātravihitakyap pratyayāntatvameva strīliṅgatve prayojakam . kiṃ tarhi ? stryadhikāravihitakyabantatvam . anyathā ʻbhuvo bhāve (3. 1. 107) iti sūtravihitakyabanto brahmabhūyaśabdo'pi strīliṅgaḥ prasajyeta . taccāniṣṭam . na ca ʻhanasta cö iti sūtre striyāmiti padaṃ śrūyate . nāpi stryadhikāragatamidaṃ sūtram . tasmādasmin prakaraṇe hatyā ityudāharaṇamasaṅgatam . ataḥ hatyāśabdasya pramāṇāntarāt strīliṅgatvamavagantavyam ..
atha yuc . ʻṇyāsaśrantho yuc (3. 3. 107) iti . tatra ṇyantād yathā—kāraṇā . hāraṇā . ʻāsa upaveśane . āsanā . ʻśrantha grantha saṃdarbhe . śranthanā . granthanā . candrastu—ʻṇyāsaśrantho yuc iti sūtraṃ paṭhitvā ʻgrantha mocanapratipādanayoḵ iti kryādidhātujaṃ granthanāśabdamāha . ʻghaṭṭivandividibhya upasaṃkhyānam (vā. 3. 3. 107) iti yuc . ʻghaṭṭa calane . ghaṭṭanā . ʻvadi abhivādanastutyoḵ . vandanā . ʻvida jñāne . vedanā (kāśikā 1. pṛ. 222) . ʻiṣeranicchārthasya yuj vaktavyaḵ (vā. 3. 3. 107) iti anveṣaṇā, adhyeṣaṇā iti .. 
atha iñ . ʻvibhāṣākhyānaparipraśnayoriñ cö (3. 3. 110) iti . paripraśne ākhyāne gamyamāne iñ syāt . yathā—kāṃ kāriṃ tvamakārṣīḥ . kāṃ kārikāṃ kriyāṃ kṛtyāṃ kṛtiṃ vā akārṣīḥ . cakārānubandhanād ṇvulapi ..
atha aṅ . ʻṣidbhidādibhyo'ṅ (3. 3. 104) iti . ṣidbhyastāvat . ʻjṝṣ vayohānaü . jīryantyaṅgānyasyāmiti jarā . ʻṛdṛśo'ṅi guṇaḵ (7. 4. 16) iti guṇaḥ . ʻtrapūṣ lajjāyām . trapā ityādi . bhidādayastu mahodadhau—
ʻbhidiṃ chidiṃ vidiṃ dayiṃ rujiṃ mṛjiṃ prachiṃ curim .
anāmani kṣipiṃ tathā guhiṃ tuliṃ vasiṃ vapim ..
kṣapiṃ kṣiyiṃ rikhiṃ likhiṃ śubhiṃ sidhiṃ midhiṃ gudhim .
ityādayaḥ paṭhitāḥ (8. 451-2, pṛ. 474) . ʻbhidir vidāraṇe . bhidā . ʻchidir dvaidhikaraṇe . chidā . ʻvidir lābhe, ʻvida jñāne . vidā . ʻdaya dānagatirakṣaṇeṣü . dayā . ʻruja roge . rujā . ʻmṛjūṣ śuddhaü . mṛjā . ʻpraccha jñīpsāyām . pṛcchā . ʻcura steye . curā . gaṇapāṭhādeva ṇerluk . ʻkṣipa preraṇe . kṣipā . ete'nāmani asaṃjñāviṣaye sādhavaḥ . anantaradhātubhyaḥ saṃjñāyāmeva pratyayaḥ . yathā—ʻguhū saṃvaraṇe . guhā . parvatakuharam, oṣadhiviśeṣaśca . ʻtula unmāne . tulā . ʻvasa nivāse . vasatyanayā māṃsamiti vasā māṃsasnehaḥ . ʻḍuvap bījatantusaṃtāne . upyate nābhisamīpamiti vapā . vastrakhaṇḍasadṛśākāro medoviśeṣaḥ . ʻkṣai kṣaye . hetumaṇṇici pugāgame (7. 3. 36) mitāṃ hrasve ca (6. 4. 92) kṣapā rātriḥ . ʻkṣi hiṃsāyām . kṣiyā ācārabhraṃśaḥ . rekhā rājiḥ . lekhā saiva . rikhirlikhasamānārthaḥ sautro dhātuḥ . ʻśubha dīptaü . śobhā kāntiḥ . ʻṣidhū saṃrāddhaü . sedhā . prāṇiviśeṣaḥ . [ʻmidhi medhāhiṃsanayoḵ . medhā] . ʻgudha pariveṣṭane . godhā . ʻkrapa kṛpāyām ityasmāt ʻkrapeḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ cö (gaṇasūtram) ityaṅi kṛpā . ārā śastrī . hārā . kārā bandhane . tārā jyotiḥ . dhārā prapātaḥ ityādiprapañco bhidāderdraṣṭavyaḥ ..
ʻcintipūjikathikumbicarcaścö (3. 3. 105) iti striyāmaṅ . ʻcitī saṃjñāne . asmāccurādiṇyantāt cintā . ʻpūja pūjāyām . pūjā . ʻkatha vākyapravandhe . kathā . ʻkubi ācchādane . kumbā . ʻcarca adhyayane . carcā . ʻātaścopasarge (3. 3. 106) . pradā . pradhā . vidā . upadhā . ʻśradantarorupasargavadvṛttirvaktavyȫ (vā. 3. 3. 106) . śraddhā . antardhā . ʻik kṛṣyādibhyaḵ (vā. 3. 3. 108) . kṛṣiḥ . ʻlipa upadehe . lipiḥ ityādi ..
atha niḥ ʻglāmlājyāhābhyo nirvaktavyaḵ (vā. 3. 3. 94) . ʻglai harṣakṣaye . glāniḥ . ʻmlai gātravināme . mlāniḥ . ʻjyā vayohānaü . jyāniḥ . ʻohāk tyāge . hāniḥ . glādibhyo nipratyayaḥ ktinpratyayasyāpavādaḥ (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 221) ..
atha śapratyayaḥ . ʻkṛñaḥ śa cö (3. 3. 100) . kriyā . tathā iccherapratyayānto nipātaḥ (3. 3. 101) . icchā . tathā ʻparicaryāparisaryāmṛgayāṭāṭyānāmupasaṃkhyānam (vā. 3. 3. 101) iti śapratyayāntanipātaḥ . tathā ʻjagarterakāro vȫ (vā. 3. 3. 101) iti śapratyayaḥ . jāgaryā . evaṃ mūlagranthasyā daśa pratyayā udāhṛtāḥ ..
atha śeṣakārīyāścatvāraḥ krameṇodāhriyante—kvip . ʻsaṃpadādibhyaḥ kvip (vā. 3. 3. 94) . bhāvagrahaṇaṃ [akartṛkakārake bhāve iti śeṣagranthe pṛ. 662] kartṛvyatiriktakārakopalakṣaṇam . ʻpada gataü . saṃpat . vipat . āpat . ʻṣadlṛ viśaraṇagatyavasādaneṣü . saṃsat . pariṣat . upaniṣat . ʻvida jñāne . vit . saṃvit . ʻṇaha bandhane . upānat . ʻvṛṣu secane . prāvṛṭ . ʻpluṣa dāhe . vipruṭ . ʻvṛtu vartane . āvṛt . ʻyam uparame . saṃyat . ʻśru śravaṇe . pratiśrut . ʻḍubhṛñ dhāraṇapoṣaṇayoḵ . upabhṛt . ʻvṛdhu vṛddhaü . saṃvṛt . ʻñi indhī dīptaü . samit . ʻkrudha kope . krut . ʻkṣudha bubhukṣāyām kṣut . ʻyudha saṃprahāre . yut . ʻrujo bhaṅge . ruk . ʻruṣa hiṃsāyām . ruṭ . ʻśuca śoke . śuk . ʻruca dīptaü . ruk . ʻmṛḍa sukhane . mṛṭ . ʻgṝ nigaraṇe . gīḥ . ʻgurī udyamane . āgūḥ . ʻhrī lajjāyām hrīḥ . ʻñibhī bhaye . bhīḥ . ʻlubha vimohane . lup .. ʻbhū sattāyām . bhūḥ . ʻlūñ chedane . lūḥ . ʻdviṣa aprītaü . dviṭ . ʻtviṣa dauptaü . tviṭ . ʻkruśa āhvāne . kruṭ . tathā—ʻjvaratvaraśrivyavimavāmupadhāyāścö . (6. 4. 20) . jūḥ . ʻñitvarā saṃbhrame tūḥ . ʻsrivu gatiśoṣaṇayoḵ . srūḥ . ʻava rakṣaṇe . ūḥ . ʻmava bandhane . mūḥ . ʻmuclṛ mokṣaṇe . muṭ . ʻṇaśa adarśane . naṭ . ʻnaśervȫ (8. 2. 63) iti kutvavikalpe nak . naṭ . evaṃ kṛt, yuj, viṭ, bhid, chid ityādayo'vagantavyāḥ .. 
atha a . ʻguptijkidbhyaḥ san (3. 1. 5) iti . nindākṣamāvyādhipratīkāreṣvartheṣu vihitāt san pratyayāntād dhātoḥ ʻa pratyayāt (3. 3. 102) iti akārapratyaye jugupsā . titikṣā . cikitsā . ʻmānbadhadānśānbhyo dīrghaścābhyāsasyö (3. 1. 6) ityatra ʻmāna jijñāsāyām iti sannantād apratyaye mīmāṃsā . ʻbadha vairūpye sani upadhādīrghe bhaṣ bhāve (8. 2. 37) cartve ca akārapratyaye bībhatsā . dānerārjava iti dīdāṃsā . śānerniśātane'rthe sani śīśāṃsā . tathā ʻdhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samānakartṛkādicchāyāṃ vȫ (3. 1. 7) iti sani apratyaye ca cikīrṣā, jihīrṣā, jigīṣā ityādi . ʻāśaṅkāyāmupasaṃkhyānam (vā. 3. 1. 7) . vicikitsā . evaṃ sanpratyayavyatirikta-kyajādi-pratyayāntebhyo'pi dhātubhyaḥ pūrvavadapratyayāntā udāhartavyāḥ . yathā—putrīyā, putrakāmyā, lolūyā, kaṇḍūyā, citrīyā, kalahāyā ityādayaḥ . tathā—ʻgurośca halaḵ (3. 3. 103) ityapratyayaḥ . ʻedha vṛddhaü . edhā . ʻspardha saṃgharṣe . spardhā . ʻśaṃsu stutaü . śaṃsā iti . ʻjāgarterakāro vȫ (vā. 3. 3. 101) . jāgarā, jāgaryā iti .
atha iṇ . ʻiṇajādibhyaḵ (vā. 3. 3. 108) iti iṇ . ʻaja gatikṣepaṇayoḵ . ājiḥ . ʻata sātatyagamane . ātiḥ . ʻrājṛ dīptaü . rājiḥ . ʻjanī prādurbhāve, ʻjanivadhyoścö (7. 3. 35) iti vṛddhipratiṣedhe janiḥ . tathā ʻvibhāṣākhyānaparipraśnayoriñ cö (3. 3. 110) iti . paripraśne yathā—kāṃ tvaṃ kārimakārṣīḥ . kāṃ kriyāmakārṣīḥ iti praśnārthaḥ . ākhyāne yathā—sarvāṃ kārimakārṣam ityādi (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 224) ..
atha ṇvuc . ʻparyāyārhaṇotpattiṣu ṇvuc (3. 3. 111) iti . paryāye yathā—bhavataḥ śāyikā . bhavata āsikā . arhe yathā—arhati bhavānikṣubhakṣikām . ṛṇe yathā—ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi . utpattau yathā—ikṣubhakṣikā me utpannā iti . atra ʻṇvultṛcaü (3. 1. 133), ʻvadaḥ supi kyap cö (3. 1. 106), ʻkyaci cö (7. 4. 33), ʻata iñ (4. 1. 95), ʻpāghrādhmādheṭdṛśaḥ śaḵ (3. 1. 137), ʻikśtipau dhātunirdeśe (vā. 3. 3. 108) ityādibhiḥ kartari vihitānāṃ ṇvulādīnāṃ strītvaṃ mā bhūditi ʻbhāvādaü ityuktm . tathāpi ʻbhuvo bhāve (3. 1. 107) ityādinā vihitakyabādinivṛttyarthaṃ stryadhikāraviśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam ..
kecidatra ʻstrībhāvādaniktiṇṇulṇacṇvuckyabyujiñaṅniśāḵ iti pūrvodāhṛtadaśapratyayātiriktaṃ ṇvucpratyayamakārapratyayaṃ cāntarīkṛtya dvādaśapratyayopasaṃgrahatvena amarasiṃhīyaślokārdhaṃ paṭhanti . sa pāṭhaḥ śeṣakārasyānabhipretaḥ . ṇvucpratyayākārapratyayoḥ amarasiṃhanāthenānuktatvabuddhyā tābhyāṃ saha pratyayacatuṣṭayasya svenopasaṃgrahaṇāditi ..
uṇādiṣu nirūrīśca . uṇādipratyayānāṃ madhye niḥ, ūḥ, īḥ iti pratyayā uktāḥ . tadantāḥ śabdāḥ strīliṅgā bhavanti . tatra nipratyayo yathā—ʻvījyājvaribhyo niḵ (u. 4. 49) iti . ʻvī gatiprajanakāntyasanakhādaneṣü . vīyate badhyata iti veṇiḥ keśabandhaḥ . ʻjyā vayohānaü . jinātyanayeti jyāniḥ . ʻjvara roge . jvarayatīti jūrṇiḥ ādityaḥ . ʻsuvṛṣibhyāṃ kit (u. 4. 50) . sarantyanayeti sṛṇiḥ aṅkuśaḥ . varṣatīti vṛṣṇiḥ yaduviśeṣaḥ . agniḥ . vahniḥ . ityādīnāṃ tu suraparyāyāṇāṃ viśeṣaṇena bādhasadbhāvāt puṃstvam ..
atha ūḥ . ʻkṛṣicamitanidhanisarjikharjibhya ūḵ (u. 1. 84) . ʻkṛṣa vilekhane . karṣūḥ vyādhiviśeṣaḥ, gomayaśca . ʻcamu adane . camūḥ senā . ʻtanu vistāre . tanūḥśarīram . ʻdhana dhānye . dhanatyaneneti dhanūḥ śaraḥ . ʻsarja ṣarja arjane . sarjyate ārjyate 'neneti sarjūḥ vaṇik . ʻkharja vyathane pūjane cö . kharjatīti kharjūḥ . pāmā . ʻmṛjerguṇaścö (u. 1. 85) . ʻmṛjūṣ śūddhaü . marjūḥ śuddhiḥ rajaśca . ʻvaho dhaścö (u. 1. 86) . uhyata iti vadhūḥ abhinavapāṇigrahaṇā . anyatra strīmātre gauṇaḥ . ʻkaṣeśchaścö (u. 1. 87) . ʻkaṣa hiṃsārthaḵ . kaṣatyanayeti kacchūḥ pāmā . ʻṇitkasipadyarteḵ (u. 1. 88) . ʻkasa gataü . kāsūḥ rogaviśeṣaḥ . (śaktiriti kaumudyām pṛ. 498) . āyudhaviśeṣaśca . ʻpada gataü . pādūḥ upānat . ʻṛ gataü . aryate'nayeti ārūḥ . vedikā, vedanā, balaṃ ca . ʻnañi lambernalopaścö (u. 1. 90) . ʻlabi śabde avasraṃsane cö . alābūḥ . ʻke śra eraṅ cāsyö (u. 1. 91) . ʻśṝ hiṃsāyām . kaśerūḥ . tṛṇakandaviśeṣaḥ . padmamūlam . vīrudviśeṣaḥ . phalajātiśca . ʻtro duṭ cö (u. 1. 92) . ʻtṛ plavanataraṇayoḵ . taratīti tardūḥ . dāruhastakaḥ . ʻdaridrāteryalopaścö (u. 1. 93) . ʻdaridrā durgataü . dardrūḥ kuṣṭhaviśeṣaḥ . ʻnṛtiśṛdhyoḥ kūḵ (u. 1. 94) . ʻnṛtī gātravikṣepe . nṛtyatīti nṛtūḥ . dīrghakṛmiviśeṣaḥ . ʻśṛdhu mṛdhu unde . śradhūḥ guṇaḥ prajñā ca . ʻandūdṛmbhūjambūkaphelūkarkandhūdidhiṣūḵ (u. 1. 96) . ʻati adi bandhane . andūḥ ayomayī śṛṅkhalā . ʻdṛbhī granthe . dṛmbhūḥ sarpajātiḥ, dṛnbhūrvā . ʻcamu chamu jamu jhamu adane . jamyata iti jambūḥvṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . ʻphala niṣpattaü . kaphelūḥ śleṣmātakaḥ . karkaśabdopapadād dhāñaḥ kūpratyayaḥ . upapadasya nuk . karkandhūḥ badarī . dadhāteḥ iṣuk cāgamaḥ . didhiṣūḥ dvirūḍhā ..
atha īḥ . ʻavitṝstṝtantribhya īḵ (u. 3. 159) . ʻava rakṣaṇādiṣü . avatīti avīḥ prakāśaḥ . avati rakṣatyātmānaṃ parapuruṣādibhya iti avīḥ rajasvalā . ʻtṝ plavanataraṇayoḵ . tīryate'nayeti tarīḥ nauḥ . ʻstṝñ ācchādane . stṛṇātīti starīḥ dhūmaḥ . ʻtantri kuṭumbadhāraṇe . tantrīḥ vīṇārajjuḥ, vādyaviśeṣaśca . tandriḥ sautro dhātuḥ ālasyārthaḥ . tandrīḥ ālasyam . ʻlakṣermuṭ cö (u. 3. 162) . ʻlakṣa darśanīṅkanayoḵ . lakṣayatīti lakṣmīḥ .. atra cakāreṇa auṇādika eva anipratyayo gṛhyate . yathā—ʻartisṛdhṛdhamyaśya‒vitṝbhyo'niḵ (u. 2. 102) . ʻṛ gataü . aryata iti araṇiḥ kāṣṭhaviśeṣaḥ . ʻsṛ gataü . sarantyaneneti saraṇiḥpanthāḥ . ʻdhṛṅ avasthāne . dharaṇiḥ pṛthivī . dhamiḥ sautro dhātuḥ . dhamaniḥ . aśnuta iti aśaniḥ vajram . avatīti avaniḥ pṛthivī . taratīti taraṇiḥ sūryaḥ iti . atra araṇyāśaniśabdayorapi viśeṣavidhinā liṅgadvayavṛttitvam . taraṇiśabdasya sūryavācakatvād ʻdyumaṇistaraṇirmitraḵ (1, pṛ. 69) iti viśeṣavidhikalpanena pūrvottarasāhacaryeṇa pūṃliṅgatvamiti vijñeyam ..
ṅyābūṅantaṃ calaṃ sthiram . ṅīp, ṅīṣ, ṅīn iti trayāṇāṃ ṅī iti sāmānyagrahaṇam . āp iti ṭāp, ḍāp, cāp iti trayāṇāṃ grahaṇam . ṅyantam, ābantam, ūṅantaṃ ca strīliṅgaṃ bhavati . krameṇodāharaṇāni . yathā ʻṛnnebhyo ṅīp (4. 1. 5) . kartrī, daṇḍinī iti . ʻanyato ṅīṣ (4. 1. 40), ʻṣid gaurādibhyaścö (4. 1. 41) iti ṅīṣi gaurī . ʻśārṅgaravādyaño ṅīn (4. 1. 73) . śārṅgaravī . baidī . ityādi . ʻajādyataṣṭāp (4. 1. 4) iti ṭāpi ajā, eḍakā . ʻḍābubhābhyāmanyatarasyām (4. 1. 13) iti ḍāpi bahurājā . ʻyaṅaścāp (4. 1. 74) iti cāppratyaye kārīṣagandhyā . ʻūṅutaḵ (4. 1. 66) iti ūṅpratyaye brahmabandhūḥ . ʻūrūttarapadādaupamye (4. 1. 69) karabhorūḥ . ʻsaṃhitaśaphalakṣaṇavāmādeścö (4. 1. 70) iti rambhorūḥ, saṃhitorūḥ, śaphorūḥ, lakṣaṇorūḥ, vāmorūḥ ityādi .
nanu yasya śabdasya striyāṃ vṛttiḥ sa śabdaḥ striliṅga iti vaktavyam . tataścāsmin śāstre striyāmaparibhāṣitatvāt lokaprasiddhastrīgrahaṇe khaṭvāśālādau ativyāptiprasaṅgāt ʻstriyām iti siddhavadanuvādo'nupapannaḥ . evaṃ puṃnapuṃsakayorliṅgayorapi durvacanatvāt liṅgaviśeṣavyavahārānupapattirityāśaṅkyāha—calaṃ sthiramiti . calaṃ cetanam . sthiramacetanamityarthaḥ . ayamabhiprāyaḥ—cetaneṣu stanādirabhivyaktiḥ strīvyañjikā . śmaśruromādirabhivyaktiḥ puṃstvasya . ubhayavilakṣaṇā tu napuṃsakatvasya . acetaneṣu khaṭvādiṣu pūrvoktavyañjakavyaktīnāmabhāvād brāhmaṇatvādivad upadeśavyaṅgyā eva jātaya iti . taduktaṃ ʻstriyām (4. 1. 3) ityatra sūtre vṛttikāraiḥ—ʻsāmānyaviśeṣāḥ strītvādayo gotvādaya iva bahuprakārā vyaktayaḥ . kvacidāśraviśeṣābhāvād upadeśavyaṅgyā eva bhavanti . yathā brāhmaṇatvādayaḵ iti (kāśikā. 1, pṛ. 262) . atra nyāsakārādibhiśca ayamevārthaḥ prapañcitaḥ . tatra calanaśīleṣu cetaneṣu yoṣitādiṣu vyaktiviśeṣavyaṅgyaṃ strītvādikaṃ śabdārthaḥ . sthiraprāyeṣvacetaneṣu khaṭvādiṣu punarupadeśamātrābhivyaṅgyaṃ strītvādikaṃ śabdārthaḥ . evaṃ ca sati calaṃ calavyaktivyaṅgyaliṅgaviśiṣṭārthābhadhāyakam . sthiraṃ sthiravyaktigatopadeśamātrābhivyaṅgyaliṅgaviśiṣṭārthābhidhāyakaṃ ṅyābūṅantaṃ striyāṃ bhavatīti . etacca liṅgasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ yadyapyetadvargādau granthādau vā kartavyam, tathāpi ṅyābūṅantamityasya mūlabhūte ʻstriyām (4. 1. 3) iti sūtre kṛtamityatraivāyamarthaḥ ekamuṣṭyā ācāryeṇa sūcitamityavadheyam .. 4 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.005-6>  
tatkrīḍāyāṃ praharaṇaṃ cet . asyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ tatpraharaṇamityetasminnarthe ṇapratyayo vihitaścet tadantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ striyāṃ vartate . mauṣṭā pāllavā ṇadik . pūrvoktapratyayasyodāharaṇamidam . muṣṭiḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ krīḍāyāmiti mauṣṭā . pallavaḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ krīḍāyāmiti pāllavā .. ghaño ñaḥ sā kriyāsyāṃ cet . sā kriyā asyāṃ vartate iti vivakṣā cet tadā ghañantapratipādakopari vihito'ñpratyayaḥ striyāṃ bhavati . atra pūrvoktaṃ spaṣṭīkartuṃ svayamevodāharaṇāni darśayati—dāṇḍapātā hi phālgunī—svadheti dik . yasyāṃ phālgunyāṃ daṇḍapāto vartate sā dāṇḍapātā . yasyāṃ mṛgayāyāṃ śyenānāṃ pāto vartate sā śyainaṃpātā . yasyāṃ svadhāyāṃ tilānāṃ pāto vartate sā tailaṃpātā . diggrahaṇamudāharaṇāntarapradarśanārtham .. 5-6 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.005-6>  
tatkrīḍāyāṃ praharaṇaṃ cet . tadityanantaram asyām ityadhyāhāryam . anantarodāharaṇa eva vākye ʻṇadik iti vakṣyamāṇasāmarthyād ihāpi cet ityanantaraṃ ṇapratyaya ityadhyāhāryam . tataścāyamarthaḥ—muṣṭyādikamasyāṃ krīḍāyāmityasminnarthe taditi prathamāsamarthāt praharaṇavācino muṣṭyādiśabdāt ṇapratyayo vihitaḥ . tadantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ ca striyāṃ bhavati . ʻtadasyāṃ praharaṇamiti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḵ (4. 2. 57) iti krīḍāyāmiti strīliṅganirdeśād evaṃvidhaviṣaye ṇapratyayāntasya strīliṅgatvaṃ sūtrakārasyābhimatamiti gamyate .. svayamevodāharati—mauṣṭā pāllavā ṇadik iti . muṣṭiḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ krīḍāyāmiti mauṣṭā . pallavāḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ kriyāyāmiti pāllavā iti . ṇadik ṇapratyayasyodāharaṇamārga ityarthaḥ ..
ghaño ñaḥ sā kriyāsyāṃ cet . bhāvārthavihitaghañantaśabdavācyā daṇḍapātādirūpā yā kriyā sā vartate'syāmiti vivakṣā ced bhavati tadā ghaño ghañantarūpāt prātipadikāt prathamāsamarthād ʻghañaḥ sāsyāṃ kriyeti ñaḵ (4. 2. 58) iti sūtreṇa yo ñapratyayo vihitaḥ tadantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ striyāṃ bhavati . svayamevodāharati—
dāṇḍapātā hi phālgunī—svadheti dik iti . daṇḍānāṃ kartṛbhūtānāṃ pātaḥ . ʻṣaṣṭhī (2. 2. 8) iti kartari ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ . daṇḍapātarūpākriyā yasyāṃ phālgunyāṃ sā phālgunī dāṇḍapātā . śyenapātalakṣaṇā kriyā mṛgayāyāṃ sā śyainaṃpātā . svadheti padaṃ śrāddhakriyāvacanamākārāntam . ʻsvadhāyai vaḥ pitaro namaḵ (vāja. saṃ. kāṇva. 2. 7. 4), ʻmadhyānnīcāduccā svadhayābhipratasthe, ʻsvadhāṃ pitṛbhyo'mṛtaṃ duhānāḵ ityādiprayogadarśanāt . tilapātakriyā yasyāṃ svadhāyāṃ sā svadhā tailaṃpātā . ʻghañaḥ sāsyāṃ kriyeti ñaḵ (4. 2. 58) iti ñapratyaye ādivṛddhiśca (7. 2. 117) . ʻśyenatilasya pāte ñe (6. 3. 71) iti mum . atrāpi sūtrakāreṇa asyāmiti nirdeśāt strīliṅgatvamabhipretam . ataśca mṛgayādereva viśeṣyatvam . na tvākheṭamṛgavyaśrāddhādīnāmityavagantavyam . dik . eṣa digudāharaṇamārga ityarthaḥ . tena mausalapātā, pauṣpapātā ityādi bhavati .. 5-6 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.005-6>  
tatkrīḍāyāṃ—pāllavā ṇadik . ʻtadasyāṃ praharaṇamiti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḵ (4. 2. 57) ityarthe vihitaṇapratyayāntaḥ strīliṅgaḥ . muṣṭipraharaṇamasyāmiti mauṣṭā . pāllavā . evaṃ daṇḍaḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ krīḍāyāmiti dāṇḍā .. ghaño ñaḥ sā kriyāyāṃ—tailaṃpātā svadheti dik . ʻghañaḥ sāsyāṃ kriyeti ñaḵ (4. 2. 58) ityasminnarthe vihitañapratyayāntaḥ strīliṅgaḥ . daṇḍapoto'syāṃ vartata iti dāṇḍapātā phālgunī . phālgunīti phalgunīnakṣatrayuktā paurṇamāsī . śyenarāto'syāṃ vartata iti śyainaṃpātā mṛgayā . tilapāto 'syāṃ vartata iti tailaṃpātā svadhā . ʻśyenatilasya pāte ñe (6. 3. 71) iti mumāgamaḥ .. 5-6 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
%%p. 05.674
AK.03.05.007ab strī syāt kācinmṛṇālyādirvivakṣāpacaye yadi .
AK.03.05.007cd laṅkā śephālikā ṭīkā dhātakī pañjikāḍhakī .. 7 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.007>  
strī syāt kācit—apacaye yadi . mṛṇālyādiḥ kācidākhyā apacaye'lpatve yadi vivakṣā tadā strī syāt . alpaṃ mṛṇālaṃ mṛṇālī . ādigrahaṇād alpaḥ paṭaḥ paṭī . evaṃ ghaṭī puṭī chatrī ityādi .. laṅkā śephālikā—āḍhakī . ete śabdāḥ strīliṅge vartante . laṅkā rāvaṇapurī . śephālikā suvahā . ṭīkā pūrvakṛtagranthavyākhyā . dhātakī dhātupuṣpikā . pañcikā nyāsaḥ . āḍhakī tuvarikā .. 7 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.007>  
strī syāt kācit—apacaye yadi . mṛṇālyādirityayamarthaḥ . alpavivakṣāyāmaśeṣeṣvapi mahāprabandheṣu dṛṣṭā kācideva mṛṇālyādiḥ strī syāt . gaurādipāṭhāt (4. 1. 41) ṅīṣantaśca bhavati . ādiśabdād ghaṭapaṭakumbhādiśabdebhyaḥ tadarthāpacayavivakṣāyāṃ ghaṭī paṭī kumbhī ityādirbhavati . kāciditi kim? alpo vṛkṣaḥ . alpaṃ gṛham . alpaṃ sukhamityadau mā bhūt ..
evaṃ purātanaliṅgānuśāsanachāyāmanusṛtyānekaśabdopasaṃgrāhapratyayādimukhena keṣāṃcilliṅgānyanuśiṣya adhunā kāṃścit strīliṅgān sārdhaślokatrayeṇa svarūpato darśayati—laṅkā śephālikā—āḍhakī iti . laṅkā rāvaṇapurī . śephālikā nīlapuṣpikā nirguṇḍī . ṭīk pratipadavyākhyāgranthaḥ nyāsapadamañjaryādiḥ . dhātakī dhātupuṣpikā prāguktā (1. pṛ. 289) . pañcikā vyākhyeyaviṣayapadārthaprakāśako granthaḥ kaumārapañcikādiḥ . āḍhakī tuvaryākhyo dhānyaviśeṣaḥ . ʻāḍhakaṃ mānabhede syāt tuvaryāmāḍhakī matȫ iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (vṛ. 8, ślo. 69) .. 7 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.007>  
strī syāt kācit—apacaye yadi . mṛṇalyādiśabdāḥ kecana apacayavivakṣāyāṃ strīliṅgāḥ . alpaṃ mṛṇālaṃ mṛṇālī . evaṃ maṭhī chatrī ityādi .. laṅkā śephālikā—āḍhakī . laṅkādayaḥ śabdāḥ strīliṅgāḥ . laṅkāśabdo'nekārthaḥ . ʻlaṅkā rakṣaḥpurīśākhāśākinīkulaṭāsu cö iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (pṛ. 6, ślo. 46) . śephālikā gatārthā (1, pṛ. 257) . ṭīketi vivaraṇam . dhātakī gatārthā (1, pṛ. 289) . pañciketi vivaraṇam . dyūtabhedo'pi syāt . ʻdyūto'striyāmakṣavatī tadbhedāḥ pañcikādayaḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 140, ślo. 59) . āḍhakīti svalpadroṇaḥ . āḍhakiketi keṣāṃcidābantaḥ .. 7 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.008ab sighrakā śārikā hikkā prācikolkā pipīlikā .
AK.03.05.008cd tindukī kaṇikā bhaṅgiḥ suraṅgāsūcimāṃḍhayaḥ .. 8 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.008>  
sidhrakā—sūcimāḍhayaḥ . ete śabdāḥ strīliṅge vartante . sidhrakā vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . śārikā pakṣibhedaḥ . hikkā vāyuvikāreṇa kaṇṭhe vilambya jāyamāno dhvaniḥ . prācikā spṛkkā . ulkā pucchajyotiḥ . pipīlikā kṣudrajantubhedaḥ . tindukī vṛkṣabhedaḥ . kaṇikā godhūmapiṣṭam . bhaṅgirbhaṅgī vā vicchittiḥ . suraṅgā corakṛtakuḍyādigadadvāram . sūciḥ sīvanasādhanam . māḍhirdeśaviśeṣaḥ .. 8 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.008>  
sidhrakā—sūcimāḍhayaḥ . sidhrakā śivaliṅgābhabījāḍhyaphalā . ʻsyāt sidhrakā latȫ iti bhaṭṭaśivaḥ . śārī eva śārikā pakṣiviśeṣaḥ . hikkā vilambya kaṇṭhādudgato vāyuvikārajaḥ śabdaḥ . ʻvekkuperü . prācikā vanamakṣikā . prācikāśabdaḥ prasiddha iti subodhinīkāraḥ . ʻprācikā vanamakṣikȫ  iti subhūticandraḥ . ʻśyenyāṃ tu prācikā matȫ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 27, ślo. 20) . ulkā nabhasaḥ patantī vidyutsamatārā . pipīlikā svedajaḥ kṣudrajantuviśeṣaḥ . ʻcimaperü . tindukaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 238) . saṃprati tatraivārthe tindukīti strīliṅgo'pi ṅīṣantaḥ paṭhyate . kaṇikā dārumayī lekhinī . godhūmacūrṇa ca . vrīhibheda ityanye . karṇikā iti pāṭhe karṇabhūṣaṇamarthaḥ . bhaṅgī prakāraḥ . ʻcañcadvipañcīkalanādabhaṅgīsaṃgītamaṅgīkurute sma bhṛṅgī iti prayogaḥ . suruṅgā caurakṛtakuḍyavivaram . ʻkannaperü . sūciḥ jīrṇavastrakhaṇḍasīvanasādhanam, tīkṣṇāgrāyovikāraḥ . sūcī nṛttabhedaśca . vīciḥ kallolaḥ . anye tu vīciśabdasthāne māṭiriti mūrdhanyaprathamopadhaṃ māṭiśabdaṃ paṭhanti . tatra māṭiḥ parṇaśirā . anye tu māḍhiriti mūrdhanyacaturthopadhamāhuḥ . tatra māḍhiḥ deśaviśeṣa iti svāmī (pṛ. 346) . patrādibhaṅga ityapare . ʻmāḍhiḥ patrādibhaṅgau syānmāḍhirdainyaprakāśane iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (pṛ. 46, ślo. 4) . māṭimāḍhiśabdayorubhayorapi deśīyapadatvena dhātujatvābhāvāt svopakrāntavarṇakramollaṅghanamapi na doṣamāvahati . kecit kāñciriti paṭhanti . kāñcirmekhalā . ʻnīvīmunmucya śanaiḥ spṛśati ratikāle kareṇa kāñcipadam iti campūkāvye hrasvāntasya prayogaḥ .. 8 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.008>  
sidhrakā—sūcimāḍhayaḥ . sidhraketi vṛkṣabhedaḥ . śārikā śukāṅganā . vādyalaguḍo'pi syāt . ʻvāditralaguḍe koṇā na napuṃ śārikā striyām iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 147, ślo. 136) . hikkā rogaviśeṣaḥ . prācikā pakṣijātiḥ . nīlamakṣikāpi syāt . ʻprācikā pakṣijātiḥ syāt prācikā nīlamakṣikȫ iti dhvanimañjarī . ulkā nirgatajvālā . pipīlikā kṛmiviśeṣaḥ . ʻcimö . ʻśanairyāti pipīlikaḵ iti puṃstvamapi siddhaṃ kṣīrasvāmivacanāt (pṛ. 346) . tindukīti vṛkṣabhedaḥ . kaṇikā nāma vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . bhaṅgiḥ vicchittiḥ . suraṅgā nāma corādikṛtabhittyādirandhram . ʻkannamü . sūcīti syūtisādhanam . sūciśca sūcā ca syāt . ʻsūciḥ sūcā ca sīvanī iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 136, ślo. 11) . māṭhiḥ kavacaḥ . ʻmāṭhiḥ strī jāgaro vakṣaśchadaḥ saṃnāhakaṅkaṭaü iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 116, ślo. 153) . māḍhiriti pāṭhe, patravalkamapi syāt . ʻpatramadhyasirā māḍhiḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 46, ślo. 18) .. 8 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
