AK.03.05.009ab picchāvitaṇḍākākiṇyaścūrṇiḥ śāṇī druṇī darat .
AK.03.05.009cd sātiḥ kanthā tathāsandī nābhī rājasabhāpi ca .. 9 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.009>  
picchā—druṇī darat . ete śabdāḥ strīliṅge vartante . picchā ācāmaḥ . vitaṇḍā vādaviśeṣaḥ . kākaṇī [kākiṇī] karṣasya caṃturtho bhāgaḥ . cūrṇī gadyaviśeṣaḥ . śāṇī karṣaṇaśilā . druṇī karṇajalūkā . darad dāradākhyaviṣajanmadeśaḥ . sātirdānam . kanthā paṭakhaṇḍaiḥ syūtavāsaḥ . kathā prasiddhā . āsandī śavayāpanayānaviśeṣaḥ (?) . nābhiḥ kukṣimadhyagatarandhram . rājasabhā nṛpāsthānam .. 9 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.009>  
picchā—druṇī darat . picchādayaḥ strīliṅge vartante . picchā śālmalipiṣṭaḥ odanamaṇḍaśca . vitaṇḍā svapakṣasthāpanāhīno vādaḥ . kākaṇirmānabhedaḥ . ʻmāṣacaturtho bhāgaḥ kākaṇī iti suvodhinīkāraḥ . viṃśatirvarāṭikā kākaṇī ityanye . cūrṇiḥ gadyātmakaḥ padasaṃdarbhaḥ, kādambaryādau cūrṇiketi prasiddhā . śāṇiḥ karṣaṇaśilā . dṛṇiḥ karṇajalūkā . darad mlecchādhiṣṭhito deśaviśeṣaḥ . takārāntatvamasya varṇaprakramādevāgamyate . sātirdānam . kanthā nirantaratantujālasyūtapaṭakhaṇḍasamudāyaḥ . kathā vādajalpavitaṇḍātmikā, vākyasaṃdarbharūpā rājavāhanādikathā ca . āsandī śavavāhanasādhanaṃ kāṣṭhayantram . svalpakhaṭvātulyaṃ samacaturaśramāsanaṃ ca . nābhiḥ piṇḍikākhyaḥ cakrāvayavaviśeṣaḥ . kukṣimadhyarandhre tu dvayorliṅgayoḥ prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 408) . kṣatriyaviśeṣe tu puṃstvaṃ nānārthe kathitam (2, pṛ. 410) . vakṣyati ca (ślo. 20) . rājñaḥ sabhā rājasabhā . ʻsabhā rājāmanuṣyapūrvȫ (2. 4. 23) ityatra paryāyasyaiva rājādyarthamiti vacanād (kāśikā. 1, pṛ. 132) rājaparyāyāṇāmeva grahaṇam . na rājaśabdasya . tenāyamarthaḥ—sabhāntastatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati, sā cet sabhā rājavarjitād rājaparyāyāt parā bhavati . yathā—īśasabham . īśvarasabham . rājaparyāyavācina iti kim? puṣyamitrasabhā, candraguptasabhā ityādau tadviśeṣaṇavācino mā bhūt . rājaśabdavarjitāditi kim? rājasabhā . tadetatpratyudāharaṇamabhipretya ʻrājasabhāpi cö ityuktam .. 9 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.009>  
picchā—druṇī darat . picchā nāmāśvapadavyādhiḥ . vitaṇḍā vādaḥ, dāruviśeṣo vā . kākiṇyanekārthā . ʻkākiṇī paṇaturyāṃśe mānadaṇḍe ca kākiṇī iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 53, ślo. 79) . cūrṇirnāma gadyabhedaḥ . granthabhede'pi syāt . cūrṇirbhāṣyamiti kṣīrasvāmī (pṛ. 346) . śāṇī nikaṣapāṣāṇaḥ . ʻoragallü . śāṇo'pi syāt . ʻśāṇī nikaṣaḥ, śāṇa ityeke iti kṣīrasvāmī (pṛ. 346) . druṇīśabdo'nekārthaḥ . ʻdruṇī kacchapikāyāṃ ca jaladroṇyāmudāhṛtȫ iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 48, ślo. 7) . daraditi deśaḥ . sātirnāma drukūlam . kanthā bhikṣuprāvaraṇam . kanthaṭikāpi syāt . ʻkanthākanthaṭike same iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 169, ślo. 128) . kanthaṭirapi syāt . ʻchinnaṃ ca saṃdhatte daridra iva kanthaṭim iti prayogaratnāvaliḥ . āsandī nāmāsanam . nābhirgatārthaḥ (1, pṛ. 518; 2, pṛ. 410) . rājasabhā nāmāsthānam . apiśabdena manuṣyasabheti manuṣyasaṃghātaḥ .. 9 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.010ab jhallarī carcarī pārī horā laṭvā ca sidhmalā .
AK.03.05.010cd lākṣā likṣā ca gaṇḍūṣā gṛdhrasī camasī masī .. 10 ..
iti strīliṅgaviśeṣaprakaraṇam
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.0010>  
jhallarī—camasī maṣī . ete śabdāḥ strīliṅge vartante . jhallarī vādyaviśeṣaḥ . carcarī kāciddevī [nṛttaviśeṣaḥ] . pārī kalaśī . horā lagnam . laṭvā bhramarakaḥ . sidhmalā pāmā . lākṣā alaktakaḥ . likṣā yūkā . gaṇḍūṣā prasiddhā . gṛdhrasī ūrusaṃdhau vātaruk . camasī pātraviśeṣaḥ . maṣī lekhanārthaṃ dravadravyam .. 10 ..
iti strīliṅgaviśeṣaprakaraṇam </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.010>  
jhallarī—camasī masī . jhallarī vādyaviśeṣaḥ . carcarī gītibhedaḥ . carcarī kāciddevīnṛttaviśeṣaḥ ityanye . tālaviśeṣaḥ ityapare . pārī jalādhāraḥ . karkaryākhyapātraviśeṣaḥ iti sūbhūticandraḥ . tathā ca naiṣadhakāvye—
ʻcucumba norvīvalayorvaśīṃ paraṃ
puro'dhipāri pratibimbitāṃ viṭaḵ .
iti (16. 99) . dohanabhāṇḍamiti subodhinī . tathā ca ʻpragṛhya pārīmubhayena jānunoḵ iti māghakāvye prayogaḥ (śiśu. 12. 40) . horā ahorātravikalpaḥ . sasidhmalā sidhmalāsahitā ca dve ityarthaḥ . evaṃ ca laṭvāśabdāt pūrvameva sidhmalāśabdasya nirdeśaḥ phalati . tathā ca lāntādikramasya bhaṅgo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ . laṭvā bālakrīḍāsādhanabhūtā bhramarakākhyā . ʻboṅgaruperü . grāmacaṭako laṭvākhya iti candraḥ . śikyameveti subodhinī . manuṣyavarge ʻkilāsī sidhmalaḵ (pṛ. 399) ityuktasya vācyaliṅgatvād atra na tasya grahaṇam . lākṣā alaktakaḥ . likṣā yūkāṇḍam . ʻīruperü . gaṇḍūṣā jalādinā mukhapūraṇam . atrāha subhūticandraḥ—gaṇḍūṣaśabdaḥ striyāmāmnāto'pi kavisamayāt puṃsi prayujyate . tathā ca māghakāvye—
ʻgaṇḍūṣamujjhitavatā payasaḥ saroṣaṃ
nāgena labdhaparavāraṇamārutena .
iti (śiśu. 5. 36) . tathānyatrāpi ʻgaṇḍūṣamekamaśanaiḵ iti . yathāhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ—ʻdeśabhāṣāpadaṃ prayoktavyam, liṅgādhyāhāro'pi iti . “gaṇḍūṣe mukhapūrto nā” iti bopālitena puṃliṅgatayānuśāsanamapi kavisamayamūlameva, yadyevaṃ na syād gaṇḍūṣaśabdamācāryaḥ strīpuṃsaprakaraṇa eva brūyāt iti . “gaṇḍūṣajalam” (ku. saṃ. 3. 37) ityādau tu matvarthe'c pratyayāśrayaṇena nirvāhaḥ kāryö iti . atha dantyopadhāstraḥ . gṛdhrasī ūrusaṃdhiprabhavo vātarogaviśeṣaḥ . camasī somapātram . śrutau ʻcamaso devapānaḵ (tai. saṃ. 2. 5. 9. 3) ityādayo bahavaḥ puṃliṅgaprayogāḥ . masīprakramādayamapi dantyopadhaḥ śrītālapatrādau lipiprayojanamañjanarūpaṃ dravyaṃ masīti . masyati varṇādirūpeṇa pariṇamatīti masī . ʻmasī pariṇāme . pacādyaci (3. 1. 134) gaurādiṅīṣi (4. 1. 41) rūpam . atra prāguktānāmapi śephālikādiśabdānāmihāpi paṭhanametaddṛṣṭāntabalāditareṣāmapi liṅgavidhānārathamiti vijñeyam .. 10 .. 
iti strīliṅgaviśeṣaprakaraṇam </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.010>  
jhallarī—camasī masī . jhallarī anekārthaḥ . ʻjhallarī jhāllarī ca dve huḍukke bālacakrake iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 143, śloḥ 224) . ʻtyuḍuku vādyamü .
ʻjayanti mama sūktayo jalajasūtisīmantinī-
vilāsahasitāmṛtamradimanarmamarmaspṛśaḥ .
viśaṃkaṭanaṭanmahānaṭajaṭāṭavīvāṭikā-
jharīlaharijhallarīgarimagarvasarvakaṣāḵ ..
iti sāhitīkalpavallī . carcarī karatālikā . pārī kṣīradohanapātram . horā ahorātraḥ . laṭvā caṭakā ʻāṃḍupicukö . laṭvā caṭaketi uṇādivṛttiḥ . laṭvetyeva pāṭhaḥ . laḍveti pāṭho durukto'pi kaiścidaṅgīkṛtaḥ . ʻbogaramü . laṭvā bhramaraka iti kṣīrasvāmī (pṛ. 346) . sidhmalā nāma malinacitram . lākṣā gatārthaḥ (1, pṛ. 441) . gaṇḍūṣā gaṇḍapūrtiḥ . strīliṅgamadhyapāṭhaḥ āvantatvamātraprakhyāpanārthaḥ .
ʻgaṇḍūṣagarjabhujajāgarahārakīla-
jvālācchaṭārabhasavartakagartaśṛṅgāḥ .

AK.03.05.011ab puṃstve sabhedānucarāḥ saparyāyāḥ surāsurāḥ .
AK.03.05.011cd svargayāgādrimeghābdhidrukālāsiśarārayaḥ .. 11 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.011>  
puṃstve—surāsurāḥ . suraparyāyā amarā nirjarā devā ityādayaḥ (1. pṛ. 7) . surabhedaparyāyā brahmaśaṃbhuviṣṇusūryacandrā ityādayaḥ (1, pṛ. 16, 22, 15, 68, 59) . surānucaraparyāyā māṭharapiṅgaladaṇḍādayaḥ (1. pṛ. 70) . asuraparyāyā asurā daityadaiteyā ityādayaḥ (1, pṛ. 11) . asuraviśeṣaparyāyā hiraṇyakaśipubāṇavirocanādayaḥ . asurānucaraparyāyā prahastacaṇḍamuṇḍādayaḥ . ete puṃstve puṃliṅge vartante . atra tatparyāyapadeṣvevodāharaṇāni draṣṭavyāni .. svargayāga—śarārayaḥ . nākayajñaśailavāridasamudravṛkṣakālakhaḍgabāṇaśatrūṇāṃ paryāyā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tadviśeṣaparyāyāśca puṃsi bhavanti . atrodāharaṇāni tattatparyāye draṣṭavyāni .. 11 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.011>  
atha puṃliṅgaviśeṣāḥ . puṃstve—surāsurāḥ . puṃstva ityadhikāro'yaṃ napuṃsakavidhiparyantaḥ . tato'rvāganukrāntāḥ sarve puṃliṅgā ityarthaḥ . surāśca asurāśca iti śabdavyaktigatabahutvābhiprāyeṇa bahuvacanam . kathaṃbhūtāḥ? saparyāyāḥ . amaranirjarādibhiḥ daityadaiteyādibhiśca paryāyaiḥ sahitāḥ . punaḥ kathaṃbhūtāḥ? sabhedānucarāḥ . atra bhedānucaraśabdābhyāṃ tadvācakāḥ śabdāḥ lakṣyante . tataśca suraviśeṣavācakaiḥ indrāgniyamavaruṇādiśabdaiḥ asuraviśeṣavācakaiḥ hiraṇyakaśipurāvaṇakumbhakarṇādiśabdaiḥ surānucaravacanaiḥ māṭharapiṅgalādiśabdaiḥ, asurānucaravacanaiḥ prahastadhūmrākṣādiśabdaiśca sahitā ityarthaḥ .
atra daivataśabdasya svargavargoktarūpabhedalakṣaṇaviśeṣeṇa kevalapuṃstvābhāvāt napuṃsakatvam . iha keṣāṃcid devādiśabdānāṃ prāptaṃ puṃstvaṃ, ʻdvicatuḥṣaṭpadoragāḥ jātibhedāḵ (ślo. 37) ityatraiva varge vakṣyamāṇena strīpuṃsavidhinā virudhyate . tathāpi strīpuṃsavidheḥ paratvāt tasyaiva prābalyam . divyopapādukaśabdasya (2, pṛ. 71) devatāvacanatve'pi kriyāvacanatvād, ʻguṇadravyakriyāyogopādhibhiḥ paragāminaḵ (ślo. 44) iti vakṣyamāṇavidhibalāt triliṅgatvam . ata eva viśeṣyanighnavarga eva paṭhitaḥ ityādirūpeṇa sarvatra bādhakaparyālocanayā samāmanyavidhiviṣayā unneyāḥ ..
svargayāga—śarārayaḥ . atra sabhedāḥ saparyāyā iti padadvayaṃ pūrvavākyādanuṣajyate . tataśca ete svargādayaḥ śabdāḥ suraparyāyā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ svaprabhedarahitāḥpuṃstve bhavantītyadhikṛtenānvayaḥ . svargādiparyāyāstadanuśāsanaprastāve pravyaktā eva darśitāḥ svargaviśeṣāḥ—nākapṛṣṭhamahendrādayaḥ . yāgaviśeṣāḥ—agniṣṭomo 'tyagniṣṭomokthyādayaḥ . adreḥ parvatasya viśeṣāḥ—meruhimavadādayaḥ . meghaviśeṣāḥ—puṣkarāvartakādayaḥ . samudraviśeṣāḥ—kṣīrodādayaḥ . droḥ vṛkṣasya viśeṣāḥ—aśvatthacūtapanasādayaḥ . kālaviśeṣāḥ—kṣaṇalavamāsasaṃvatsarādayaḥ . aseḥ khaḍgasya bhedāḥ—nandakacandrahāsādayaḥ . śaraviśeṣāḥ—kṣurapranārācādayaḥ . ariviśeṣāḥ—yātavyapārṣṇigrāhodāsīnādayaḥ ityādyudāhartavyam . triviṣṭaparājasūyagandhamādanābhraharicandanapratipadādiśabdānāṃ viśeṣabādhena liṅgāntaravṛttirityapi na vismartavyaḥ .. 11 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.011>  
puṃstve—surāsurāḥ . puṃstve iti āpatadgrahaśabdam (ślo. 21) adhikāraḥ . sabhedānucarāḥ surāsuraparyāyāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . suraparyāyasya—ʻamarā nirjarā devāstridaśā vibudhāḥ surāḵ (1, pṛ. 7) . surabhedaparyāyasya—ʻādityaviśvavasavastuṣitābhāsvarānilāḵ (1, pṛ. 9) . surānucaraparyāyasya—ʻsyāt kiṃnaraḥ kiṃpuruṣasturaṅgavadano mayuḵ (1, pṛ. 49) . asuraparyāyasya—ʻasurā daityadaiteyadanujendrāridānavāḵ (1, pṛ. 11) . asurabhedaparyāyasya—ʻtamastu rāhuḥ svarbhānuḥ saiṃhikeyo vidhuṃtudaḵ (1, pṛ. 67) .. svargayāga—śarārayaḥ . sabhedānāṃ svargādīnāṃ paryāyāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ .. 11 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.012ab karagaṇḍauṣṭhadordantakaṇṭhakeśanakhastanāḥ .
AK.03.05.012cd ahnāhāntāḥ kṣveḍabhedā rātrāntāḥ prāgasaṃkhyakāḥ .. 12 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.012>  
karagaṇḍa—nakhastanāḥ . pāṇikapolādharabāhuradanagalakacanakhakucānāṃ paryāyā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tadviśeṣaparyāyāśca puṃsi bhavanti . atrodāharaṇāni tattatparyāyeṣu draṣṭavyāni .. ahnāhāntāḥ . ahna aha ityevamantāḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi vartante . ahnāntā yathā—prāhṇaḥ, parāhṇaḥ, pūrvāhṇaḥ, madhyāhnaḥ ityādi . ahāntā yathā—dvyahaḥ, tryahaḥ, pañcāhaḥ ityādi .. kṣveḍabhedāḥ . kṣveḍabhedā viṣavācakāḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi vartante . atrodāharaṇāni—saurāṣṭrikaḥ . śauklikeyaḥ . brahmaputraḥ . pradīpanaḥ ityādi .. rātrāntāḥ prāgasaṃkhyakāḥ . saṃkhyāvyatiriktaśabdapūrvā rātra ityevamantāḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi bhavanti . atrodāharaṇāni . ardharātraḥ . pūrvarātraḥ . ahorātraḥ ityādi .. 12 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.012>  
karagaṇḍa—nakhastanāḥ . karādīnāṃ navānāmarthāḥ prasiddhā eva . tathāpi lipisaṃdehabhrāntyādimūlapāṭhāntarasaṃdehanivṛttyarthaṃ tatparyāyapadāni likhyante . karo hastaḥ . gaṇḍaḥ kapolaḥ . oṣṭho dantacchadaḥ . dorbāhuḥ . danto radaḥ . kaṇṭho galaḥ . keśaḥ śiroruhaḥ . nakha kararuhaḥ . stanaḥ kuca iti . śeṣe—
ʻkusūlanadapuṣyāṃśupavikuntaparaśvadhāḥ .
dhānyadhvaniratho'hyātmagulmamānābjakardamāḥ ..
iti . ete kusūlādayaḥ ṣoḍaśaparyāyāḥ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ viśeṣarahitāśca puṃliṅgāḥ . kusūlaḥ koṣṭhaḥ . nadaviśeṣaḥ śoṇādiḥ . puṣyaḥ tiṣyaḥ . aṃśuḥ kiraṇaḥ . paviḥ śatakoṭiḥ . kuntaḥ prāsaḥ . paraśvadhaḥ paraśuḥ . atra dhānyaśabdena na svarūpagrahaṇam . kiṃ tu tadviśeṣā vrīhiyavagodhūmādaya eva gṛhyante . dhvaniḥ śabdaḥ . rathaḥ śatāṅgaḥ . tadviśeṣaḥ puṣyarathaḥ . ahiḥ sarpaḥ . tadviśeṣāḥ śeṣavāsukiprabhṛtayaḥ . ʻdvicatuḥṣaṭpadoragāḵ (ślo. 37) iti vakṣyamāṇasya strīpuṃsavidheḥ paratvāt paravalliṅgam . ātmā jīvaḥ . gulmaḥ stambaḥ . atra mānaśabdena tadviśeṣāḥ kuḍuvaprasthāḍhakadroṇādaya eva gṛhyante . na svarūpam . abjaḥ śaṅkhaḥ . kardamo jambālaḥ . ʻviśeṣairyadyabādhitaḵ (ślo. 2) ityuktatvād aśanikuliśādīnāṃ liṅgāntare'pi vṛttirityanusmartavyaḥ ..
ahnāhāntāḥ . samāse sati ʻrājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣṭac (5. 4. 91) iti ṭac pratyaye aha ityevaṃrupatayā śrūyamāṇaḥ śabdo yeṣāṃ samāsaśabdānāṃ te ahāntāḥ . pūrvavadeva samāsāntapratyaye ʻahno'hna etebhyaḵ (5. 4. 88) ityahanśabdasya ahnādeśe sati ahna ityevaṃ śrūyamāṇaḥ śabdo yeṣāṃ samāsāntānāṃ te'hnāntāḥ . te ca dvividhāḥ puṃsyeva bhavanti ityadhikṛtena saṃbandhaḥ . ʻrātrāhnāhāḥ puṃsi (2. 4. 29) iti sūtramūlametat . ahnāntā yathā—sarvāhṇaḥ . ahnaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvāhṇaḥ . madhyāhnaḥ . aparāhṇa ityādi . liṅgānuśāsane ʻdroṇāparāhṇatoraṇa . . .  ityādinā aparāhṇaśabdaḥ ardharcādau paṭhita iti subhūticandraḥ . ahāntā yathā—dvayorahnoḥ samāhāro dvyahaḥ . trayāṇāmahnāṃ samāhāraḥ tryahaḥ . atra ʻna saṃkhyādeḥ samāhāre (5. 4. 86) ityahnādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . tathā vartamānamahaḥ vartamānāhaḥ . gatāhaḥ ityādi . atra ahāntā ityadhikṛtasamāsāntagrahaṇena bahuvrīhisamāse samāsāntābhāvāt tadantasya viśeṣyanighnatvena niyatapuṃliṅgatvaṃ mā bhūt . ahāntasya tu ʻpuṇyasudinābhyāṃ tvahaḥ paraḵ (ślo. 29) iti kvacinnapuṃsakatvaṃ vakṣyate . dvayorahnorbhavaḥ dvyahaḥ utsavaḥ . dvyahā pūjā . ityādau ʻtaddhitārthe dviguḵ (ślo. 43) iti paropagatvaṃ vakṣyate ..
kṣveḍabhedāḥ . saurāṣṭrikavatsanābhādayaḥ ṣaḍ viṣaviśeṣāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . kākolakālakūṭādīnāṃ viśeṣavidhānāt puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgatvaṃ prāguktam (1, pṛ. 152) .. rātrāntāḥ prāgasaṃkhyakāḥ . ʻsaṃkhyāvyayādeḵ (5. 4. 86) iti vartamāne ʻahaḥsarvaikadeśasaṃkhyātapuṇyācca rātreḵ (5. 4. 87) ityaci rātraśabdaḥ, tadantāḥ saṃkhyāvācakaśabdavyatiriktapūrvapadāḥ puṃsi bhavanti . yathā—ahaśca rātriśca samāhṛte ahorātraḥ . ʻcārthe dvandvaḵ (2. 2. 29) iti samāse sati samāhāre napuṃsakasyāpavādaḥ . asamāhāre tu puṃstvavidhervakṣyamāṇavācyaliṅgatāpavādo veditavyaḥ . ʻahorātre vā akāmayetām ityādau vede liṅgavyatyayaśchāndasaḥ . sarvā rātririti karmadhāraye sarvarātraḥ . pūrvo bhāgo rātreḥ ityekadeśisamāse pūrvarātraḥ . evamapararātraḥ, paścimarātraḥ, saṃkhyātā rātriḥ saṃkhyātarātraḥ . atikrānto rātrimatirātraḥ somasaṃsthāviśeṣaḥ . prāgasaṃkhyakāḥ iti kim? pañcarātram . gaṇarātram . atra ʻtrirātramāhurāśaucam (manu. 5. 80) iti jayādityena ʻrātrāhnāhāḥ puṃsi (2. 4. 29) iti sūtre ujāhṛtam .. 12 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.012>  
karagaṇḍa—nakhastanāḥ . karādīnāṃ paryāyāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ .. ahnāhāntāḥ . ahnāntā ahāntāśca śabdāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . pūrvamahnaḥ pūrvāhṇaḥ . aparāhṇaḥ dvayorahnoḥ samāhāro dvyahaḥ . tryahaḥ .. kṣveḍabhedāḥ . viṣabhedāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . meṣaśṛṅgaḥ . vatsanābhaḥ . puṇḍarīkaḥ . kuṣṭhaḥ . brahmaghoṣaḥ .. rātrāntāḥ prāgasaṃkhyakāḥ . prāgasaṃkhyakāḥ rātrāntāḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . pūrvarātraḥ . sarvarātraḥ . madhyarātraḥ . prāgasaṃkhyakā iti bādhitaviṣayapradarśanārtham .. 12 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.013ab śrīveṣṭādyāśca niryāsā asannantā abādhitāḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.013>  
śrīveṣṭādyāśca niryāsāḥ . śrīveṣṭasarjarasakarpūrayāvanādayo niryāsāḥ puṃliṅge vartante .. asannantā abādhitāḥ . asantā annantāśca śabdā abādhitā viśeṣavidhinābādhitāḥ puṃsi bhavanti . asantā yathā—uśanā . anehā ityādayaḥ . annantā yathā—sutrāmā, mātariśvā ityevamādayaḥ . kaśeru—turuvirāmakāḥ . ruvirāmāḥ śabdāḥ kaśeru, dāru, śmaśru, aśru varjayitvā; tuvirāmāḥ mastu, jatu, vastvādīn śabdān varjayitvā; sarve puṃliṅge vartante . tuvirāmā yathā—dhātuḥ, otuḥ, setuḥ ityādi . ruvirāmā yathā—caruḥ, maruḥ, tsaruḥ ityādi .. 13 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

śrīveṣṭādyāśca niryāsāḥ . niryāso vṛkṣadravaḥ . śrīveṣṭaḥ prāguktaḥ (1. pṛ. 443) . tadādayo niryāsavācakāḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . śrīveṣṭaḥ, sarjarasaḥ, karpūraḥ ityādayaḥ .. asannantā abādhitāḥ . as ityevamantāḥ, an ityevamantāśceti dvividhāḥ abādhitāḥ ʻdvyackamasisusannantam (ślo. 24) iti napuṃsakavidhānādabādhitāḥ tadvidheraviṣayāḥ, tryackāḥ caturackāśceti yāvat, puṃliṅgā bhavanti . aṅgirāḥ, purodhāḥ, purūravāḥ ityādyā asantāḥ . atharvā, sutrāmā, mātariśvā ityādyā annantā iti ..
kaśeru—turuvirāmakāḥ . virāmo'ntyākṣaram . dhātuhetusetuprabhṛtayastuvirāmāḥ . kārumerumarutsaruprabhṛtayo ruvirāmāśca śabdāḥ pumāṃsaḥ . atrāpavādamāha—kaśervādīni hitvā varjayitvā . kaśeru jalakandaḥ . jatu lākṣārasaḥ . vastu padārthaḥ . etacca mastuvāstu-aśruśmaśrudārukustumburu-prabhṛtīnāmupalakṣaṇam . turuvirāmakā iti kim? trapujānutālvādīni napuṃsakani .. 13 .. </Amarapadavivarana>

śrīveṣṭādyaśca niryāsāḥ . śrīveṣṭādiniryāsāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . śrīveṣṭaḥ, silvākaḥ, gugguluḥ . śrīveṣṭādigrahaṇādatra na bhavati—picchā, hiṅgu .. asannantā abādhitāḥ . abādhitā asannantāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ .
ʻnabho vyomni nabhā māghe śrāvaṇe ca patadgrahe .
adhvā vartmani saṃsthāne ..
ityādyanuśāsanena na bādhitatvam . ʻdvyac kamasisusannantam (ślo. 24) ityanena bādhaḥ .. kaśeru—turuvirāmakāḥ . kaśerujatuvastvādīn śabdān hitvā turuvirāmakāḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . dhātuḥ, setuḥ, hetuḥ, ketuḥ, jīvātuḥ, mantuḥ, tantuḥ, jantuḥ; maruḥ, ḍamaruḥ, caruḥ, kharuḥ . ʻkharurdante hare darpe haye śvete tu vācyavat . ūruḥ, kiṃśāruḥ . kaśervādiniyamād atrāpi syāt dāruḥ, agaruḥ .. 13 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.014ab kaṣaṇabhamaropāntā yadyadantā amī atha .
AK.03.05.014cd pathanayasaṭopāntā gotrākhyāścaraṇāhvayāḥ .. 14 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.014>  
kaṣaṇabhama—saṭopāntāḥ . atra athaśabdaḥ sadāśabdārthaḥ . kakāraṣakāraṇakārabhakāramakārarephā upadhā yeṣāṃ śabdānām . tathā pakārathakāranakārayakārasakāraṭakārā upadhā yeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ te śabdā yadyakārāntā bhaveyustarhi puṃliṅge vartante . atrodāharaṇāni draṣṭavyāni .. gotrākhyāḥ . gotraṃ kāśyapādi, tasya ākhyā gotrākhyāḥ . tāḥ puṃliṅge vartante . atrodāharaṇāni—gārgyaḥ, vāsiṣṭhaḥ, bhāradvājaḥ ityādi .. caraṇāhvayāḥ . atra caraṇaśabdo gauṇaḥ śākhānimittakaḥ puruṣe vartate . caraṇaviśeṣādyatrāhvayāḥ, kaṭhakalāpavahavṛca ityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅge vartante .. 14 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.014>  
kaṣaṇabhama—saṭopāntāḥ . atra upāntaśabdaḥ ʻalo'ntyāt pūrva upadhȫ (1. 1. 65) iti vaiyākaraṇaprasiddhopadhāvacanaḥ . amī atha iti kecit paṭhanti . atrāpyathaśabdaḥ tathāśabdārthaḥ . tataśca nākaḥ, sāyakaḥ, ślokaḥ, lokaḥ, kalaṅka ityādyāḥ kakāropadhāḥ . pakṣaḥ, kakṣaḥ, śoṣaḥ, roṣa ityādyāḥ ṣakāropadhāḥ . koṇaḥ, bāṇaḥ, paṇaḥ, guṇaḥ ityādyāḥ ṇakāropadhāḥ . kumbhaḥ, stambhaḥ, dambhaḥ, garbha ityādyāḥ bhakāropadhāḥ . utsaḥ, samāsaḥ, dāsa ityādayaḥ sakāropadhāḥ . vaṭaḥ, viṭaḥ, raṭaḥ, cāṭa ityādayo ṭakāropadhāśca ityevaṃ dvādaśavarṇopadhāḥ śabdā yadi adantāḥ akārāntā bhavanti tadā viśeṣabādharahitāḥ puṃliṅgā bhavantītyarthaḥ . kaṣādigrahaṇaṃ kim? kuṇḍalam, balam, kūlam, upadā, upadhā ityādau mā bhūt . adantā iti kim? kokā, bhūṣā, pāraṇā, śobhā, nārī, vāmā ityādau mā bhūt ..
gotrākhyāḥ . yābhirgotrasya vaṃśasya vyapadeśaḥ tā gotrākhyāḥ puṃsi bhavanti . yathā—gārgyaḥ, vātsyaḥ, bhāradvājaḥ, vāsiṣṭhaḥ ityādigotrāntāḥ . apatyapratyayāntā iti tu vyākhyānamasaṅgatam . ʻstrīpuṃsayorapatyāntāḵ (ślo. 37) ityanena paunaruktyavirodhayorāpatteḥ .. caraṇāhvayāḥ . yathā svamanuṣṭhātāraḥ carantyeteṣviti caraṇaśabdo yadyapi mukhyayā vṛttyā kāṭhakakālāpakādiśākhāviśeṣeṣu vartate, tathāpi atra tadadhyetṛpuruṣāḥ caraṇaśabdena puṃliṅgatayā vivakṣitāḥ . ata eva caraṇaśabdaḥ śākhānimittakaḥ puruṣeṣu gauṇyā vṛttyā vartata iti kāśikādayaḥ . yathā—kaṭhaḥ, kalāpaḥ, kauthumiḥ iti .. 14 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.014>  
kaṣaṇabhama—adantā amī . adantāḥ kādyupāntāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . alakaḥ, pulakaḥ, calukaḥ, kalaṅkaḥ, karaṅkaḥ, peṭakaḥ, pāṭakaḥ senāniveśaḥ, kuśikaḥ tailaśeṣaḥ, misikaḥ, sasyakaḥ haridratnam, malūkaḥ kṛmiḥ, phallūkaḥ bālapakṣī, jāhakaḥ saṃkucitagātramārjāraḥ, gokuṇikaḥ paṅakapatitagauḥ, rātrakaḥ lañjāmīḍhaḥ, bhāryāṭikaḥ bhāryāpradhānaḥ, sūcakaḥ bukkacchunakaḥ, khaṭṭikaḥ mahiṣīkṣīram, śārkakaḥ kṣīraphenam, tartarikaḥ kākanīḍam, parparikaḥcapeṭaḥ, karkarikaḥ jalapātram, pracalākaḥ mayūrabarham, khajakaḥ dadhimanthanadaṇḍaḥ iti . kvacitsthale na bhavati . śalākā, salākā, patākā, khajākā, matelikā, raktapipīlikā, vikā cintā, śūkā jugupsā, kuṭilikā, rikkaṇikā, gulikā muktāmaṇiḥ, cillikā, tumbikā cakramadhyarandhram, ambakaṃ netram .. ṣakāropāntasya yathā—veṣaḥ, koṣaḥ, māṣaḥ, ūṣaḥ, pratyūṣaḥ, vātarūṣaḥ indradhanuḥ, lambūṣaḥ saptasūtraprotamuktādāma ʻyeḍupeṭṭinamutyoladaṇḍö, akṣaḥ, pakṣaḥ, kakṣaḥ, kaṭākṣaḥ ..
ṇakāropāntasya yathā—kṣaṇaḥ, paṅkaṇaḥ, guṇaḥ, paṇaḥ, kārṣāpaṇaḥ, ṭippaṇaḥ ṭīkā, matkuṇaḥ śmaśruvihīnapuruṣaḥ ʻpeḍumūtivāṃḍü, praghaṇaḥ tāmrakumbhaḥ, pariraṇaḥ,taṇḍurīṇaḥ, karṇaḥ, varṇaḥ, avarṇaḥ, cūrṇaḥ, rāgacūrṇaḥ smaraḥ, kiraṇaḥ, varaṇaḥ, vāraṇaḥ, kurvāṇaḥ bhṛtyaḥ, bhrūṇaḥ, koṇaḥ .. bhakāropāntasya yathā—garbhaḥ, rāsabhaḥ, kumbhaḥ, kumbhī iti svalpaghaṭe strītvam, kumbhā iti veśyāputryāṃ strītvam, karambhaḥ, karabhaḥ ʻkva prasthitāsi karabhoru ghane niśīthe (amaru. 71), ṛṣabhaḥ, vṛṣabhaḥ, kakubhaḥ, kaustubhaḥ, śalabhaḥ, valibhaḥ strīvastrabhaṅgī ʻstrīlanerikaṭṭinakuccullü ..
makāropāntasya yathā—vyāmaḥ, somaḥ, homaḥ, dhūmaḥ, grāmaḥ, saṃgrāmaḥ, drumaḥ, vidrumaḥ, ḍiṇḍimaḥ, ḍimaḥ, gharmaḥ, dharmaḥ .. rephopāntasya yathā—mukuraḥ, śīkaraḥ, śekharaḥ, mudgaraḥ, vāgaraḥ paśuvyādhiḥ ʻpasularogamü, viṣṭaraḥ, piṭharaḥ, koṭīraḥ, kaiṭīraḥ ʻindragopamü, aṅgāraḥ, bhṛṅgāraḥ, śṛṅgāraḥ, dīnāraḥ, śunīraḥ śunīsamūhaḥ. bandhumāraḥ ʻkaruduvö, ghargharaḥ varṣadhvaniḥ ʻvānamrātö, karkaraḥ, avaskaraḥ, murmuraḥ tuṣāgniḥ iti ..
pathanayasaṭopāntāḥ . pakārādyupāntāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . kūpaḥ, sūpaḥ, pūpaḥ, dīpaḥ, pradīpaḥ praśabdaḥ itaropasarganivṛttyarthaḥ, dhūpaḥ agarvādidhūmaḥ ʻdhūpo'sau gandhavāsitaḵ, iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 11, ślo. 28), kopaḥ, nīpaḥ, tapaḥ grīṣmakālaḥ, capaḥ veṇuḥ, bāṣpaḥ, khajapaḥ darvī, kṛpapaḥ śuṣkavṛkṣaḥ ʻyeṃḍinaceṭṭü, dalapaḥ mukhatrāṇam, kutupaḥ ʻkutupaniyatavikramāḥ striyaḵ, kuṭapaḥ gṛhārāmaḥ . kvacittu sthale na bhavati . piṇḍapuṣpam, bālakūpī baddhasopānakūpaḥ .. thopāntasya yathā—rathaḥ, karṇīrathaḥ, puṣparathaḥ . ʻdhānyadhvanirathī hyātmā gulmamāsartukardamaḵ iti pustakāntarapāṭhādapi syāt puliṅgaḥ rathī iti . apacayavivakṣāyāṃ strītvam . methiḥ, sārathiḥ buddhyaiva sārathinā śāstramidaṃ khe . . .iti . atithiḥ ʻatithinā bhavitavmatrabhavatyȫ . bhedakāḥ santo'pi bhedyaliṅgā na bhavanti . arthaḥ, sārthaḥ, ghaṇṭāpathaḥ, śamathaḥ, damathaḥ, āvasathaḥ, saṃvasathaḥ, avabhṛthaḥ, niśīthaḥ gopīthaḥ jaladroṇī, avagāthaḥ prātaḥsavanam, granthaḥ, granthiḥ, kunthuḥ sūkṣmajantuḥ .
nopāntasya yathā—janaḥ, abhijanaḥ, devanaḥ, karketanaḥ gomedaḥ, sinaḥ śarīraṃ vastraṃ ca syāt, bhānuḥ, dhanuḥ ʻastriyau cāpadhanuṣāvāseṣvāsau dhanurdruṇam iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 118, ślo. 172), snuḥ, vasnaḥ, budhna, rakṣoghnaḥ śvetasarṣapaḥ, adhvānaḥ ʻkarituragamanuṣyaṃ yatra cādhvānadīpam, anumānaḥ ʻko'sāvanumānaḵ ityamarabhāṣyam, anaḥ ucchvāsaḥ, apānaḥ ..
yopāntasya yathā—pāyuḥ, māyuḥ, jāyuḥ agadaḥ, jarāyuḥ, manyuḥ, janyuḥ janma, kulāyaḥ, vipūyaḥ, vinīyaḥ pāpam, udyaḥ, bhidyaḥ ʻbhidyadyau tadatiṣyapuṣya . . . iti pustakāntarapāṭhādapi syāta puṃliṅgaḥ . vīkṣyaḥ nartakaḥ, kulyaḥ kulīnaḥ pūjyaḥ . hayamantraśvaśuravācakatvād vācyaliṅgā na bhavanti .. sakāropāntasya yathā—kīkasaḥ kṛmiḥ ʻpuruvü, panasaḥ kaṇṭakaḥ ʻmullü, vāhasaḥ ʻnīrugaṇḍi, strīpuṃsaḥ śikhaṇḍī, malīmasaḥ ayaḥ, nabhaścamasaḥ indrajālam, vibhāvasuḥ hāraḥ, asuḥ, pāṃsuḥ, utsaḥ, gutsaḥ .. ṭakāropāntasya yathā—paṭaḥ, kūṭaḥ, ceṭaḥ, kilāṭaḥ kṣīravikāraḥ, karahāṭaḥ, ārakūṭaḥ, kāmakūṭaḥ veśyāpraṇayaḥ, parikūṭaḥ puradvārasthamṛtkūṭaḥ, matkoṭaḥ ʻcīmö, catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ gītanṛtyādikalāḥ, gharaṭṭaḥ godhūmayantram ʻpratihaṭṭapathe gharaṭṭajāt pathikāhvānadasaktusaurabhaiḵ iti naiṣadhaḥ (2. 85), karpaṭaḥ, kaṅkaṭaḥ, avaṭaḥ, cipiṭaḥ, niṣkuṭaḥ, karaṭaḥ, bharaṭaḥ kumbhakāraḥ, vahaṭaḥ tantūtpādakayantram ʻrāṭnamü, argaṭaḥ argalam . kvacit sthale na bhavati . dhāṭī, bhāṭī veśyā, kukkuṭī .. gotrākhyāḥ . gotranāmāni puṃliṅgāni . vātsyaḥ, gārgyaḥ .. caraṇāhvayāḥ . śākhānāmāni puṃliṅgāni . chandogaḥ kaṭhaḥ .. 14 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.015ab nāmnyakartari bhāve ca ghañajabnaṅṇaghāthucaḥ
AK.03.05.015cd lyuḥ kartarīmanijbhāve ko ghoḥ kiḥ prādito'nyataḥ .. 15 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.015>  
nāmnyakartari—ṇaghāthucaḥ . nāmni saṃjñāyāmakartari kārake bhāve ca vihitā ghañādipratyayāntāḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅge vartante . ghañanto yathā—pādaḥ, rogaḥ veśa ityādi . kartṛvyatiriktakārake yathā—prakriyata iti prakāraḥ . prasīdatyasminniti prasādaḥ . bhāvārthe yathā—tyāgaḥ, bhogaḥ, yoga ityādi . ac pratyayāntā yathā—nayaḥ, cayaḥ, jaya ityādi . appratyayantā yathā—karaḥ, garaḥ, lava ityādi . naṅpratyayāntā yathā—vijñaḥ, yatnaḥ, praśna ityādi . ṇapratyayānto yathā—nyādaḥ iti . ghapratyayāntā yathā—uracchadaḥ, dantacchada ityādi . athuc pratyayāntā yathā—ānandathuḥ, kṣavathuḥ, vepathurityādi .. lyuḥ kartari . kartaryakārakārthe vihito lyupratyayānto puṃliṅgo bhavati . udāharaṇe—nandanaḥ, ramaṇa ityādi .. imanijbhāve . bhāvārthe vihita imanic pratyayāntaḥ puṃsi bhavati . udāharaṇe—prathimā, laghimā ityādi .. ko ghoḥ kiḥ prādito'nyataḥ . bhāve vihitaḥ kapratyayāntaḥ puṃsi vartate . udāharaṇe—ākhūtthaḥ, śyonotthaḥ ityādi . prāditaḥ prādyupasargācca anyataḥ upasarga vyatiriktācca paraḥ kipratyayānto yo ghusaṃjñako dhātuḥ tadupari vihitaḥ kipratyayāntaśabdaśca puṃsi bhavati . prādita udāharaṇe—nidhiḥ, vidhiriti . anyata ityatrodāharaṇe—vārdhiḥ, jaladhiriti .. 15 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.015>  
nāmnyakartari—ṇaghāthucaḥ . nāmni kartṛrūpārthaviṣaye tadvyatiriktārthaviṣaye vā, saṃjñāmātre, akartari saṃjñāvyatiriktārthatve'pi kartṛvyatiriktakārakamātre bhāve śuddhe dhātvarthamātre ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ ghañ, ac, ap, naṅ, ṇa, gha athuc iti saptapratyayāntāḥ puṃsi bhavanti . tatra kartari saṃjñāyāṃ ghañpratyayānto yathā—ʻpadarujaviśaspṛśo ghañ (3. 3. 16) . padyate'sau pādaḥ . rujatīti rogaḥ . viśatīti veśaḥ . akartari saṃjñāviṣaye yathā—prakriyata iti prakāraḥ . pacyata iti pākaḥ odanaḥ . ata eva keṣāṃcid yajñānāṃ pakvaguṇakatvena pākayajñasaṃjñā . rajyate'neneti rāgo lākṣā . prapatantyasminniti prapātaḥ taṭam . pratihāro dvāram . vipathaḥ kākoṭikākhyaḥ paryāhāro vā ityādikamudāhāryam . ʻakartari ca kārake saṃjñāyām (3. 3. 19) ityatra sūtre cakāraḥ saṃjñāvyabhicārārtha iti vṛttikāreṇābhidhānād (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 210) asaṃjñāyāmapi kartṛvyatirikte ghañ pratyayo yathā—dīyata iti dāyaḥ . labhyata iti lābhaḥ ..
kecittu—kartṛvyatiriktārthaviṣayasya ghañantasya viśeṣyanighnatvam . yathā—paṅkaṃ, kāṣṭhamiti . tathā nama ityucyate yatra vākye, tat namovākam . tathā ca ʻanuvākādayaḥ puṃsi vaktavyāḵ ityatra ʻbhāve (3. 3. 18) iti sūtreṇa bhāvārtheṣu ghañpratyayānto yathā—pacanaṃ pākaḥ . tyajanaṃ tyāgaḥ . yajanaṃ yāga ityādi . saṃjñāyāmac pratyayāntā yathā—kṣayanti nivasantyasminniti kṣayaḥ gṛham . cīyata iti cayaḥ prakāraḥ . nīyate'rtho'neneti nayaḥ nītiḥ . bhāve yathā—cayanaṃ cayaḥ . ʻerac (3. 3. 56) . asaṃjñāyāṃ yathā—cayaḥ, jayaḥ iti . ʻaj vidhau bhayādīnāmupasaṃkhyānam napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham (vā. 3. 3. 56) iti viśeṣavidhānād ajantānāmapi bhayādīnāṃ napuṃsakatvam . ap pratyayāntā yathā—kīryata iti karaḥ, rājagrāhyo bhāgaḥ . lavanaṃ lavaḥ . atra ʻṛdorap (3. 3. 57) iti sūtreṇa ap pratyayaḥ . naṅpratyayāntastu—ʻyajayācayatavicchapraccharakṣo naṅ (3. 3. 90) iti . yajñaḥ, yatnaḥ, viśnaḥ, praśnaḥ, rakṣṇaḥ . naṅntasyāpi yācñāśabdasya rupabhedalakṣaṇaviśeṣabādhena strīliṅgatvam . ʻnau ṇa cö (3. 3. 60) iti . sūtreṇa ṇapratyayānto yathā—nitarāmadyata iti nyādaḥ nyadanaṃ ca . ghapratyayānto yathā—ʻpuṃsi saṃjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prāyeṇö (3. 3. 118) iti . uraśchādyate'neneti uraśchadaḥ kavacaḥ . dantacchadaḥ oṣṭhaḥ . etya kurvantyatreti ākaraḥ . athuc pratyayo yathā—kṣavathuḥ . vepathuḥ . śvayathuḥ ityādi . atra ʻṭvito'thuc (3. 3. 89) ityathuc pratyayaḥ ..
lyuḥ kartari . ʻnandigrahipacādibhyo lyuṇinyacaḵ (3. 1. 134) iti vihito nandyādilyupratyayāntaḥ puṃsyeva . yathā—nandanaḥ putraḥ . ramaṇo bhartā . dahanaḥ pāvakaḥ . pavano vāyurityādi . ye tu saṃjñāyāmeva nandyādilyupratyayamicchanti tanmatenedamuktam . kevalayaugikatve tu viśeṣyanighnatvameva . ʻkartari iti svarūpakathanam .. imanijbhāve kaḥ . ʻpṛthvādibhya imanijvȫ (5. 1. 122) iti sūtreṇa vihite bhāvārthe ya imanicpratyayaḥ, yaśca bhāvārthe kapratyayaḥ tadantāḥ puṃsi . yathā—pṛthorbhāvaḥ prathimā . evaṃ mahimā, garimā ityādi . viśeṣavidhānāt premaśabdasya napuṃsakatvamapi . ʻsupisthaḵ (3. 2. 4) iti yogavibhāgāt kapratyaye sati ākhūnāmutthānam ākhūtthaḥ . śyenotthaḥ (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 175) . yathā ʻghañarthe kavidhānaṃ sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham (vā. 3. 3. 58) iti vaktavyāt kapratyayaḥ . yathā—prasthānaṃ prasthaḥ . āvidhaḥ . vighnaḥ ityādi . śabdārṇave tu—ʻākhūtthaśalabhotthādi tata utthānamadvayoḵ iti napuṃsakatvamuktam . bhāva iti kim? bharimā paryaṅkaḥ . bharimā khaṭvā . bharimā pīṭham ityāderauṇādikasya kartrarthasya vihite tasya imanic pratyayāntasya, godaḥ, pārṣṇiḥ, triḥ ityādeḥ kapratyayāntasya ca viśeṣyanighnayorvyavacchedārtham ..
ghoḥ kiḥ prādito'nyataḥ . ʻdādhāghvadāp (1. 1. 20) iti keṣāṃcid dhātūnāṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ kṛtā ghusaṃjñā . prādyupasargapūrvāt padāntapūrvācca ghusaṃjñakād dhātoryaḥ kipratyayaḥ tadantaḥ puṃsi . prāditaḥ kipratyaye yathā—vidhiḥ, ādhiḥ, upādhiḥ, nidhiḥ ityādi . upasargavyatyayāt kipratyaye yathā—jaladhiḥ, abdhiḥ ambudhiḥ ityādi . atra ʻprāditaḵ ityanena ʻupasarge ghoḥ kiḵ (3. 3. 92) iti vihitaḥ kapratyayaḥ ʻanyataḵ ityanena ʻkarmaṇyadhikaraṇe cö (3. 3. 93) iti vihita uktaḥ . na tu tadanyasya grahaṇam . tathāhi—ʻkānac ktavasūcakikinau bhāṣāyāṃ yaṅlukāvapi iti vākyapadīyavacanāt bhāṣāyāmapi kikin pratyayadarśanāt ʻādṛgamahanajanaḥ kikinau liṭ cö (3. 2. 171) iti sūtre vihitasya kipratyayāntasya kartari vihitasya viśeṣyanighnatvāditi .. 15 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.015>  
nāmnyakartari—ṇaghāthucaḥ . saṃjñāsu vihitāḥ ghañādipratyayāntāḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . bhāve ghañ—pākaḥ, tyāgaḥ . ʻerac (3. 3. 56)—cayaḥ, jayaḥ . ʻṛdorap (3. 3. 57) karaḥ, garaḥ, bhavaḥ, stavaḥ . ʻyajayācayatavicchapraccharakṣo naṅ (3. 3. 90) yajñaḥ, praśnaḥ . ʻnau ṇa cö (3. 3. 60) nyādaḥ . ʻpuṃsi saṃjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prāyeṇö (3. 3. 118) uraśchadaḥ, dantacchadaḥ . ʻṭito'thuc (3. 3. 89) śvayathuḥ, vepathuḥ .. lyuḥ kartari . kartrarthe vihitalyupratyayāntaḥ śabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . ʻnandigrahipacādibhyo lyuṇinyacaḵ (3. 1. 134) nandanaḥ, śobhanaḥ . imanijbhāve . bhāvārthe vihita imanicpratyayāntaḥ śabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . ʻpṛthvādibhya imanijvȫ (5. 1. 122) prathimā, mradimā, akiṃcanimā . kaḥ . kapratyayāntaḥ śabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . ʻghañarthe kavidhānaṃ kartavyam (vā. 3. 3. 58) prasnaḥ, vighnaḥ . kipratyayasāṃnidhyād ghañarthasyaiva grahaṇam . ghoḥ kiḥ prādito'nyataḥ . prādipūrvasya ca karmapūrvakasya ca ghusaṃjñakadhātorvihitaḥ kipratyayāntaḥ śabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . ʻupasarge ghoḥ kiḵ (3. 3. 92) vidhiḥ, nidhiḥ . ʻkarmaṇyadhikaraṇe cö (3. 3. 93) jaladhiḥ, iṣudhiḥ .. 15 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.016ab dvandve'śvabaḍavāvaśvabaḍavānasamāhṛte .
AK.03.05.016cd kāntaḥ sūryenduparyāyapūrvo'yaḥpūrvako'pi ca .. 16 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.016>  
dvandve'śva—asamāhṛte . itaretaraśabdayogārthe 'śvabaḍavayoḥ yaḥ samāsaḥ tadātmakaḥ śabdaḥ puṃliṅgo bhavati . atrodāharaṇe darśite—aśvabaḍavau . aśvabaḍavāniti .. kāntaḥ—ayaḥpūrvako'pi ca . sūryaparyāyapūrvaḥ, induparyāyapūrvaḥ, ayaḥśabdapūrvakaśca kāntaśabdaḥ puṃliṅge vartate . krameṇodāharaṇāni—sūryakāntaḥ, pataṅgakāntaḥ, candrakāntaḥ, ayaskāntaḥ ityādi .. 16 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.016>  
dvandve—asamāhṛte . asamāhṛte samāhāradvandvādanyatra, aśvaśca baḍavā ca iti itaretarayoge dvandvasamāse paravalliṅgabādhena pūrvapadaliṅgatvamanenocyate . ʻpūrvavadaśvabaḍavaü (2. 4. 27) iti dvirvacanāntasyoktatvād aśvabaḍavāgatabahutvavivakṣāyāṃ pūrvapadaliṅgatvaṃ nāstīti vā mandāśaṅkānirāsārtham, asaṃdigdhamudāharaṇadvayam . tatra aśvabaḍavau iti prathamayordvicanam . aśvabaḍavāniti śasantaṃ dvitīyam . samāhāradvandve tu ʻsa napuṃsakam (2. 4. 17) iti napuṃsakaliṅgatvād asamāhṛta ityuktam . kāntaḥ—ayaḥpūrvako'pi ca . sūryaśabdapūrvakaḥ, induśabdapūrvakaḥ, tadubhayaparyāyapūrvakaśca, ayaḥśabdapūrvakaśca kāntaśabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . yathā—sūryakāntaḥ, ravikāntaḥ, indukāntaḥ, candrakānta iti . dvāmimau maṇiviśeṣau . ayaskānto lohāviśeṣaprakṛtiḥ cumbakaśīlā . kaskāditvāt (8. 3. 48) visarjanīyasya satvam . atra kecit ʻapi cö iti samuccayadarśanād ayaḥparyāyāt lohāśabdād uttarasyāpi kāntaśabdasya puṃliṅgatvamicchanti . yathā—lohakānta iti .. 16 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.016>  
dvandve—aśvabaḍavaṃ tu samāhṛte . itaretarayogadvandve 'śvabaḍavau iti puṃliṅgaḥ . samāhāradvandve tu aśvabaḍavamiti napuṃsakaṃ syāt . ʻparavalliṅgaṃ dvandvatatpuruṣayoḵ (2. 4. 26) iti vihitaparavalliṅgasyāpavādaḥ .. kāntaḥ—ayaḥpūrvako'pi ca . sūryenduparyāyapūrvakaśca ayaḥparyāyapūrvakaśca kāntaśabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ . yathā—sūryakāntaḥ, ravikāntaḥ, indukāntaḥ, ayaskāntaḥ, lohakāntaḥ .. 16 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.017ab vaṭakaścānuvākaśca rallakaśca kuḍaṅgakaḥ .
AK.03.05.017cd puṅkho nyūṅkhaḥ samudgaśca viṭapaṭṭadhaṭāḥ khaṭaḥ .. 17 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.017>  
vaṭakaścānuvākaśca—khaṭaḥ . atra kāṃścit puṃliṅgān svarūpeṇāha—vaṭaka iti . vaṭako bhakṣyaviśeṣaḥ . anuvākaḥ ṛksāmayajuḥsamūhaḥ . rallakaḥ kambalaḥ . kuḍaṅgo latāgahanam . puṅkho bāṇamūlam . nyūṅkho nairantaryeṇoktāḥ ṣaḍoṃkārāḥ . samudgaḥ saṃpuṭakaḥ . viṭaḥ kāmukānucaraḥ . paṭṭo lalāṭabhūṣaṇam . dhaṭo dārutulā . khaṭaḥ sthūṇāviśeṣaḥ .. 17 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.017>  
vaṭakaścānuvākaśca—khaṭaḥ . atha pūrvācāryakṛtaliṅgānuśāsanacchāyayā paryāyāvasare prāguktānanuktāṃśca kāṃścit puṃliṅgān svarūpeṇāha—vaṭaka iti . vaṭako marīcajīrakādimiśritaḥ piṣṭādikṛto bhakṣyaviśeṣaḥ . nistalīkṛtamṛtpāṣāṇauṣadhādi ca . anūcyata ityanuvākaḥ . yathāyogam ṛcāṃ sāmnāṃ yajuṣāṃ vā samūhaḥ . yathā—rudrānuvākaḥ, kāṇḍānuvākaḥ, śāntyanuvāka ityādi . atrānuvākaśabdena ʻanuvākādayaḥ puṃsi vaktavyāḵ ityuktānāṃ grahaṇam . yathā—sūktavākaḥ, śaṃyuvāka ityādi . rallakaḥ kambalaviśeṣaḥ . mṛgabhedaśca . kuḍaṅgo vṛkṣalatādicchāditapradeśaḥ . yathā—ʻabhiṣekajalena dattasekāḥ pramathādhīśajaṭāṭavīkuḍaṅgāḵ iti . svārthe vṛttapūraṇārthaḥ kapratyayaḥ . puṅkhaḥ śarasya jyāsaṃdhānapradeśaḥ . nyūṅkho nairantaryeṇoccāritāḥ ṣaḍoṃkārāḥ . sundare tu vācyaliṅgaḥ . tathā ca candraḥ—ʻnyūṅkhaḥ sāmni ṣaḍoṃkāre triṣu samyaṅmanoharaḵ iti . dīrghādirayaṃ śabdaḥ . samudgakaḥ saṃpuṭakaḥ . viṭaḥ kāmukānucaraviśeṣaḥ . paṭṭo lalāṭabhūṣaṇaviśeṣaḥ . śilāviśeṣaśca . dhaṭaḥ tulāviśeṣo dārunirmitaḥ . khaṭaḥ karasya prahāraviśeṣaḥ . ʻkhaṭaḥ śleṣmaṇyandhakūpe prahārāntaraṭaṅkayoḵ iti rabhasaḥ . prahārāntaraṃ muṣṭiviśeṣa iti subhūticandraḥ . śaṭastṛṇaviśeṣa iti svāmi (pṛ. 349) subodhinīkārau .. 17 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.017>  
vaṭakaścānuvākaśca—khaṭaḥ . vaṭakādayaḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . vaṭakaḥ ʻvaḍiyamü . anuvāko nāma avacchedaviśeṣaḥ .
ʻanuvākaśca khaṇḍikā .
brāhmaṇaṃ cetyavacchedā ekagranthastu phakkikā ..

AK.03.05.018ab koṭṭāraghaṭṭahaṭṭāśca piṇḍagoṇḍapicaṇḍavat .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.018>  
koṭṭāraghaṭṭa—kiṇo ghuṇaḥ . koṭṭājighuṇāntāḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ bhavanti . koṭṭo durgaḥ . araghaṭṭo mahākūpaḥ . haṭṭo vipaṇiḥ . piṇḍo grāsaḥ . goṇḍaḥ tundilaḥ . picaṇḍaḥ kukṣiḥ . gaḍurmāṃsaviśeṣaḥ . karaṇḍaḥ samudgaḥ . laguḍo daṇḍaḥ . varaṇḍo rogaḥ . kiṇo vraṇasthānam . ghuṇo dārukṛmiḥ .. 18 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

koṭṭāraghaṭṭa—kiṇo ghuṇaḥ . atra koṭṭāraśca ghaṭṭaśca haṭṭaśca iti vigrahe prathamapadaṃ tryakṣaraṃ rephopadhaṃ cābhipretya subhūticandro vyācaṣṭa . bhaṭṭagrāmanyāyena ṭānteṣvapi rephāntasya koṭṭāraśabdasya pāṭhaḥ . ʻkoṭṭāro nāgare kūpe puṣkariṇyāṃ ca pāṭake ityabhidhānāt (viśva. pṛ. 139, ślo. 177) . ʻghaṭṭaḥ śulkasthānam iti . svāmī (pṛ. 349) tu prakārāntareṇa padaṃ chitvā vyācaṣṭa—ʻkoṭṭo durgam . araghaṭṭaḥ mahākūpö iti . haṭṭaḥ krayavikrayasthānam . piṇḍaḥ—

koṭṭāraghaṭṭa—kiṇo ghuṇaḥ . koṭṭādayaḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . koṭṭo durgapuram . araghaṭṭo ghaṭīyantram . yadvā koṭṭāro jalakuṇḍam . ʻniślakuṇḍö . ghaṭṭo vanagiriprāyadeśaḥ . haṭṭaḥ āpaṇavīthī . piṇḍo'nekārthaḥ . ʻpiṇḍo dehe japāpuṣpe nivāpe silhake'pi cö iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 44, ślo. 14) . goṇḍaḥ pāmarajātiḥ . tuṇḍile vācyaliṅgaḥ . ʻgoṇḍaḥ pāmarajātau ca vṛddhanābhau ca vācyavat iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 44, ślo. 13) . picaṇḍo gatārthaḥ (1, pṛ. 410) . athavā picaṇḍaḥ śayyā . ʻpicaṇḍaḥ kukṣiśayyayoḵ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 243, ślo. 57) . gaḍuḥ ʻvennukoppü . karaṇḍaḥ puṣpapuṭaḥ . ʻkareḍe . karaṇḍītyapacayavivakṣāyāṃ strītvam . laguḍo daṇḍaḥ . varaṇḍastvanekārthaḥ . varaṇḍo'pyantarāvedau saṃdohamukharogayoḵ iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 45, ślo. 27) . kiṇo vraṇalāñchanam . ʻpuṃṭimatsö . ghuṇo dārūpaparivarṇālekhakīṭaḥ . ʻkuṭṭikapuruvü .. 18 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.019ab dṛtisīmantaharitā romanthodgīthabudbudāḥ .

dṛtisīmanta—sayūpakau . dṛtyādiyūpakāntāḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅgā bhavanti . dṛtirbhastrikā . sīmantaḥ keśapaddhatiḥ . haritaḥ pakṣibhedaḥ . munirvā . romanthaḥ paśūnāṃ carvitacarvaṇam . udgīthaḥ sāmapravaṇaḥ . budbudo jalasphoṭaḥ . kāsamardaḥ śākabhedaḥ . arbudaḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣaḥ . kundo māghyapuṣpam . pheno ḍiṇḍīraḥ . stūpo mṛdālindaḥ . yūpako yūpastambhaḥ .. 19 .. </Amarapadavivrti>

dṛtisīmanta—sayūpakau . dṛtyādayaḥ śabdāḥ puṃliṅgāḥ . dṛtirjalādhāraścarmavikāraḥ . sīmanto lalāṭasyopari vartamānā keśapaddhatiḥ . haritaḥ pakṣibhedaḥ . ṛṣiviśeṣaśca . romanthaḥ paśūnāṃ carvitacarvaṇam . udgīthaḥ sāmabhaktiviśeṣaḥ . budbudo jalasphoṭaḥ . kāsamardo vanyaśākaviśeṣaḥ . ʻkasavandaperü . arbudo vraṇaviśeṣaḥ . parvatabhedaśca . saṃkhyāvacanatve tu puṃnapuṃsakatvam . kundaḥ puṣpavṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . ʻkundaścakrabhramau māghye nidhibhede muradviṣi iti viśvaprakāśaḥ (pṛ. 78, ślo. 9) . ʻmāghyaṃ kundam (1, pṛ. 258) ityatra kundaśabdasya napuṃsakatvamuktam . iha tu puṃliṅgatvamityubhayaliṅgatvam . ʻmāghyaṃ kundo'striyām iti vanauṣadhivarge śeṣakāreṇoktam . pheno ḍiṇḍīrākhyo jalapariṇāmaḥ . stūpo mṛtpāṣāṇādikṛta unnatapradeśaḥ . gṛhavaṃśarūpo dāruviśeṣaśca . tathā ca ʻgṛhastūpe nidadhāti ityāpastambaprayogaḥ . yūpaḥ agnīṣomīyādipaśubandhanārthaṃ pālāśādidāruviśeṣaḥ . tena saha varteta iti sayūpakau . svārthe kapratyayaḥ (5. 4. 5) . ʻsapūpakaü iti pāṭhe pūpo godhūmādipiṣṭavikāraḥ pakva ucyate .. 19 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.019>

<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.020>

cakramadhye pradhāne ca striyāṃ kastūrikāmade ..

ʻcakraḥ koke vraje puṃsi cakraṃ sainyarathāṅgayoḥ .
grāmajāle kumbhakārabhāṇḍe rāṣṭre ca dṛśyate ..
iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ (pṛ. 33, ślo. 904) . golaḥ ʻgoṭṭikallü . hiṅgulo rāgadravyam . ʻiṅgilikam . ʻhiṅgulaṃ haṃsapādaṃ ca kuruvindaṃ nigadyate iti keṣāṃcinnapuṃsakam . pudgalo dehaḥ .. 20 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

[akṣi nayanam] . draviṇaṃ dhanam . balaṃ sainyaṃ śauryaṃ ca .. 22 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.022>

AK.03.05.023ab phalahemaśulbalohaṃ sukhaduḥkhaśubhāśubham .
AK.03.05.023cd jalapuṣpāṇi lavaṇaṃ vyañjanānyanulepanam .. 23 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.023>  
phalahema—anulepanam . phalādayaḥ śabdāḥ napuṃsakaliṅge vartante .. 23 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
vivṛtau adhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ—
bhayāmṛtaśakṛdvastracāpābharaṇalāñchanam .
dārvauṣadhamṛdhāpatyahṛdayodarakākudam ..
pattanājinaśṛṅgārmadvārabarhoḍumānasam .
dhvāntaṃ cāvyaktaliṅgasya bhaṇitau yatprayujyate ..
avyaktaliṅgasya iyaṃ strī, ayaṃ pumān iti yasya vyaktirnāsti, asya bhaṇitau uktau yatprayujyate tat napuṃsakaṃ jñeyam . atrodāhāraṇam—ʻstrī vā pumān vā kiṃ tasya jātaṃ tad brūhi paṇḍitö iti . 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.023>  
phalahema—anulepanam . phalaṃ cūtapanasādi . hema hiraṇyam . halamiti pāṭhe halaṃ lāṅgalam . śulbaṃ tāmram . lohaśabdenātra gobalīvardanyāyena suvarṇatāmravyatiriktameva trapusīsādikaṃ gṛhyate . sukhaṃ śarma . tadviparītaṃ duḥkham . śubhaṃ kalyāṇam . aśubhamamaṅgalam . jalapuṣpāṇi kamalotpalakumudādīni . lavaṇaṃ saindhavaṃ sāmudrādi . vyañjanaṃ temanaṃ rasādivastu, śākādikaṃ ca . anulepanaṃ candanāgarukuṅkumādi .. 23 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.023>

AK.03.05.024ab koṭyāḥ śatādiḥ saṃkhyānyā vā lakṣā niyutaṃ ca tat .
AK.03.05.024cd dvyackamasisusannantaṃ yadanāntamakartari .. 24 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.024>  
koṭyāḥ śatādiḥ—akartari . koṭyā anyā śatasahasrādisaṃkhyā napuṃsake vartate . lakṣaśabdo vikalpena napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . niyutapadaṃ ca lakṣaśabdārtham . dvau acau yasya dvyackam . dvyackamasantamisantamusantaṃ, dvyackamannantaṃ ca napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati . asantaṃ yathā—teja ityādi . isantaṃ yathā—havirityādi . usantaṃ yathā—vapurityādi . annantaṃ yathā—nāmetyādi . yadanāntamakartari . akartari vartamānamanapratyayāntaṃ yacchabdarūpaṃ tannapuṃsakaṃ jñeyam . atrodāharaṇāni—sādhyate'neneti sādhanam . lavanam . chedanamityādi .. 24 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.024>  
koṭyāḥ śatādisaṃkhyānyā . koṭipadavyatiriktaṃ śataṃ sahasramityādisaṃkhyāvācakaṃ padaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ . koṭyā iti rūpanirdeśāt koṭiśabdasya strīliṅgatvam . atra śatādigrahaṇāt tato'rvācīnānām ekādiviṃśatiparyantānāṃ vācyaliṅgatvam . viṃśatyādīnāṃ navatiparyantānāṃ strīliṅgatvaṃ ca prāguktamavagantavyam (1, pṛ.602-3) .. vā lakṣā niyutaṃ ca tat . lakṣaśabdaḥ śatāditve'pi rūpabhedād vikalpena strīliṅgaḥ . yathā—
ʻkiyatī pañcasahasrī kiyatī lakṣādhikoṭirapi kiyatī .
audāryonnatamanasāṃ ratnavatī vasumatī kiyatī ..
iti . strītvābhāvapakṣe prakaraṇānnapuṃsakatvam . tadeva lakṣaṃ niyutamityucyate . atrādityapurāṇam—
ʻekaṃ daśa śataṃ caiva sahasraṃ ceti sattamāḥ .
yathottaraṃ daśaguṇaṃ sahasrāṇi daśāyutam ..
tathā śatasahasrāṇi procyate niyutaṃ budhaiḥ .
tathā śatasahasrāṇi daśaprayutamucyate ..
śataṃ śatasahasrāṇi koṭirityabhidhīyate ..
iti . dvyackamasisusannantam . dvāvacau svarākhyau varṇau yasya tad dvyackam . antaśabdaḥ pratyekamabhisaṃbadhyate . as, is, us, an ityevamantaṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvyackaṃ ced napuṃsakam . asantaṃ yathā—yaśaḥ, payaḥ, tejaḥ ityādi . barhiḥ, sarpiḥ, rociḥ ityādikamisantam . usantaṃ yathā—yajuḥ, vapuḥ, aruḥ, paruḥ ityādi . annantaṃ yathā—sāma, loma, varma, carma ityādi . dvyackamiti kim ? uśanā, purūravāḥ, mātariśvā ityatra mā bhūt . vedhāḥ, barhiḥ, ayaṃ dhanuḥ ityādau viśeṣavidhānād anyathātvaṃ vijñeyam ..
yadanāntamakartari . anaśabdena ʻyuvoranākaü (7. 1. 1) iti sūtraprāptamādiṣṭarūpaṃ vivakṣitam . tena ghanaḥ, vighanaḥ, abhijanaḥ, saṃtānaḥ, saṃmāna ityādāvaprasaṅgaḥ . akartari vartamāne ana ityantaśabdarūpaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati . atra kartṛpadaṃ kārakamātropalakṣakaṃ sarveṣāmapi kārakāṇām
ʻsvavyāpāreṣu kartṛtvaṃ sarveṣāmupajāyate .
viklṛdyanti jvalantīti bibhartīti ca darśanāt ..
iti . viklṛdyanti taṇḍulā ityatra pacanarūpavyāpāre karaṇabhūtānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ kartṛtvam . jvalanti kāṣṭhānītyatra jvalanākhyavyāpāre karaṇabhūtānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ kartṛtvam . bibharti sthālītyatra taṇḍuladhāraṇarūpavyāpāre'dhikaraṇabhūtasthālyāḥ kartṛtvam . tataśca kārakavyatirikte bhāvamātre vihitamanāntaṃ napuṃsakaṃ bhavatītyuktam . yathā—haraṇam, gamanam, bhojanam ityādi . akāraka iti kim? nandayatīti nandanaḥ, dahanaḥ ityādi . atra ʻnandigrahi . . . . (3. 1. 134) ityādinā kartari lyuḥ . tathā mukhasahitayā nāsikayā ucyata iti mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . rājabhirbhujyanta iti rājabhojinaḥ śālayaḥ . atra ʻkṛtyalyuṭo bahulam (3. 3. 113) iti karmaṇi lyuṭ . tathā idhmapravraścanaḥ kuṭhāraḥ, palāśaśātana āyasanakhaḥ iti . atra ʻkaraṇādhikaraṇayoścö (3. 3. 117) iti karaṇe lyuṭ . tathā yatra māṃsaṃ pacyate sā māṃsapacanī . atrādhikaraṇe lyuṭ . evaṃ niṣpravāṇī tantuvāyaśalākā, prasādhanī kaṅkatikā, pṛṣadājyadhānī ityādīnāṃ kārakārthānāmanapuṃsakatvamavagantavyam . tasya vākyasya bhāvavacanamanāntaṃ napuṃsakamityatraiva tātparyāt, anyatra caudāsīnyād bhāvārthavyatiriktavṛtteranāntasyāpi kvacinnapuṃsakaliṅgatvaṃ na niṣidhyate . yathā—sādhyate'neneti sādhanam, gajaturagādyupakaraṇam . mehanaṃ śephaḥ . yānaṃ turagaśakaṭabalīvardādi . vyañjanaṃ śmaśvrādi . karaṇaṃ sādhakatamam (1. 4. 42) . karaṇaṃ hetuḥ pīyata iti pānam . prahriyati'neneti praharaṇam āyudham . āsyata upaviśyate'treti āsanaṃ pīṭham . śayanaṃ mañcaḥ ityādi tattatprastāve liṅgānuśāsanaṃ kṛtameva . yatra tu na kṛtaḥ tatra śiṣṭaprayogānnirṇaya iti granthānte vakṣyati (ślo. 46) .. 24 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.024>  
koṭyāḥ śatādisaṃkhyānyā . koṭisaṃkhyāyā anyā śatādisaṃkhyā napuṃsakam . śataṃ sahasramayutaṃ lakṣam . vā lakṣā . pakṣe lakṣaśabdaḥ strīliṅgaśya syāt . niyutaṃ ca syāt . niyutamityapyucyate .. dvyackamasisusannantam . dvyackāḥ asantā isantā usantā annantāśca napuṃsakāḥ . asantasya yathā—vacaḥ, tapaḥ, yaśaḥ, vayaḥ, vivaḥ . ʻvivāṃsi bhānvoriva bibhratostayoḵ iti . isantasya yathā—haviḥ, jyotiḥ, chardhiḥ, sarpiḥ, . usantasya yathā—aruḥ, paruḥ, dhanuḥ, vapuḥ . annantasya yathā—dāma, dhāma, nāma, vyoma, loma . dvyackaraṇād anyatra na bhavati . sugandhayaḥ sumanasaḥ, candramāḥ . ʻprakṣipyodarciṣaṃ kakṣe (śiśu. 2. 42) . udarcirnāma varhirmukhaḥ . saṃcakhyuṣo hi sabhāmaṇḍanam . saṃcakhyuṣo vidvāṃsaḥ . sudharmāṇamatiśete bhūsurasabhā . sudharmā devasabhā .. yadanāntamakartari . akartrarthe'nānto yaḥ śabdo'sti sa napuṃsakaḥ . sādhyate'neneti sādhanam . adhikriyate 'sminnityadhikaraṇam . pākaḥ pacanam . tyāgaḥ tyajanam . kvacinna bhavati . rājabhojanāḥ śālayaḥ . godohanī sthālī .. 24 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.025ab trāntaṃ salopadhaṃ śiṣṭaṃ rātraṃ prāksaṃkhyayānvitam .
AK.03.05.025cd pātrādyadantairekārtho dvigurlakṣyānusārataḥ .. 25 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.025>  
trāntaṃ—saṃkhyayānvitam . lakaropadhena sahitaṃ trāntaṃ śabdarūpaṃ śiṣṭaṃ pūrvoktāt trāntāt lakāropadhācca vyatiriktaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati . udāharaṇāni . trāntaṃ yathā—pātram, mitram, patram ityādi . lakāropadhāni yathā—phalam, jalam, kulamityādi .. rātrāntaṃ saṃkhyāpūrvakaṃ śabdarūpaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati . udāharaṇāni—trirātram, pañcarātram, gaṇarātram ityādi . pātrādyadantaiḥ—anusārataḥ . pātrādibhiradantairekārthaḥ samāhāro dvigusamāso lakṣyānusārataḥ prayogānusāreṇa napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . udāharaṇāni—triyugam, tripātram, tribhuvanamityādi .. 25 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.025>  
trāntaṃ salopadhaṃ śiṣṭam . tra iti sarephamasaṃyuktamakṣaram ante yasyeti tat trāntam . sakāro lakāro vā upadhā yasya tat salopadham . tat trividhaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati . trāntaṃ yathā—patram, patatram, pātram, gātram, gotram, mitram, kalatram, citram, totram ityādi . sakāropadhaṃ yathā—bisam, busam, sādhvasam, sāhasam, kīkasam, mahānasam, śvaḥśreyasam, brahmavarcasam, niḥśreyasam ityādi . lakāropadhaṃ yathā—āvālam, ālavālam, kamalam, kūlam, kautūhalam, palam, palalam, pātālam, phalam, balam, lāṅgalam, lāṅgūlam ityādi . nanu kathaṃ tarhi putraḥ, mantraḥ, mitraḥ sūryaḥ, śātravo'mitraḥ, mātrā, gotrā, gajasya jaṅghādeśo gātrāḥ; tathā ghāsaḥ, kāsaḥ, prāsaḥ, vyāsaḥ, māsaḥ, rasaḥ, hasaḥ; tathā tālaḥ, kālaḥ, kolaḥ, phālaḥ, sālaḥ, hālaḥ, velā, śilā, śālā, kalā, mālā, helā, ḍolā, līlā, phelā, khalā, balā, bālā, jālā, ityādīnāṃ liṅgāntaratvamityata āha—śiṣṭamiti . strīliṅgatvena puṃliṅgatvena vā tatra tatrānuśiṣṭād yat śiṣṭam avaśiṣṭam anyadeva trāntaṃ salakāropadhaṃ ca tad napuṃsakamityarthaḥ ..
rātraṃ prāksaṃkhyayānvitam . saṃkhyāvācakapadapūrvakaṃ rātrāntaṃ napuṃsakam . yathā—tisṛṇāṃ rātrīṇāṃ samāhāraḥ trirātram . pañcarātram . gaṇarātramityādi . ʻahaḥsarvaikadeśasaṃkhyātapuṇyācca rātreḵ (5. 4. 87) iti cakāreṇa samāsānto'cpratyayaḥ samāhāra ityeva . dvayoḥ rātryoḥ samāhāraḥ dvirātram . prāksaṃkhyayānvitamiti kim? ahorātraḥ . atirātraḥ ityādi . rātrāntāḥ prāksaṃkhyākā ityanena saṃkhyāpūrvasya puṃstve niṣiddhe kiṃliṅgatvamiti jijñāsāyāmidamucyate . idaṃ ca napuṃsakatvaṃ kātyāyanamatānusāreṇeti draṣṭavyam . pāṇinīyācāryamate tu—ʻrātrāhnāhāḥ puṃsi (2. 4. 29) ityatropapadaviśeṣānupapādanāt pratyuta vṛttikāreṇa (kāśikā 1, pṛ. 133) dvirātraḥ trirātraḥ iti saṃkhyāpūrvasyaivodāhṛtatvācca puṃstvamevābhipretamiti gamyate . vakṣyamāṇena samanantaravacanenaiva asyārthasya siddhatve'pi puṃstvanapuṃsakatvalakṣaṇamatabhedasūcanārthamatrāpyābhidhānamityavagantavyam ..
pātrādyadantaiḥ—anusārataḥ . pūrvam ʻadantairdvigurekārthaḵ (pṛ. 656, ślo. 3) iti prāptasya strītvasya, ʻna sa pātrayugādibhiḵ (ślo. 3) iti pratiṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ . tarhi kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavatīti jijñāsāyāmidamārabhyate . pātrādibhirakārāntaiḥ uttarapadabhūtaiḥ samāhārārthe saṃkhyāśabdānāṃ yo dvigusamāsaḥ sa prayogānusāreṇa napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . yathā—tripātram, caturyugam, tribhuvanam, dvicandram ityādi . tathā—pañcānāṃ gavāṃ samāhāraḥ pañcagavam, ṣaḍgavam ityādi . atra ʻgorataddhitaluki (5. 4. 92) iti samāsāntaḥ . atra kecidāhuḥ—prathamataḥ samāsāntavidhiḥ, tataḥ samāsa iti tatra kṛtā padayojanā . yattu matam—samāsottarakālaṃ samāsāntavidhiḥ iti . tatra tu adantaiḥ akārāntyāvayatvenopalikṣatairyo dvigurekārthaḥ iti yojanīyam . pātrādigrahaṇaṃ kim? pañcapūlī, daśapūlī iti . adantairiti kim? trikhaṭvam, trikhaṭvī ityatra ʻvā ṭābantö (ślo. 41) iti vikalpo na syāt . ekārtha iti kim? pañcakapālaḥ puroḍāśaḥ ityatra taddhitārthaviṣayadvigusamāse napuṃsakatvaṃ mā bhūt . dviguriti kim? lakṣyānusārata ityanena pātrāderākṛtigaṇatvaṃ darśitam . ata eva ʻpātrādirākṛtigaṇaḵ iti kaiyaṭaḥ .. 25 .. </Amarapadavivarana> 
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.025>  
trāntaṃ salopadhaṃ śiṣṭam . avaśiṣṭāni trāntāni lopadhāni ca napuṃsakāni . trāntaṃ yathā—pātram, kṣetram, dātram, gātram, kalatram, khanitram, bhaṭitram, dhavitram . lopadhāni yathā—kulam, bilam, śilam, silam . lūnakedāraśeṣaṃ tu śilasilamiti smṛtam . mūlam, jālam, kūlam, maṅgalam, lāṅgalam, jāṅgalam, tryaṅgulam, caturaṅgulam . śiṣṭagrahaṇādatra na bhavati—yātrā, mātrā, hotrā, varatrā, śālā, ḍolā, mālā, helā, ulaṃkalaḥ ʻcalicimö, kamalī mañjūṣā, kākalaḥ ʻkākitamü, taitilaḥ ʻmaṃdagi .. rātraṃ prākyasaṃkhyayānvitam saṃkhyāpūrvako rātriśabdo napuṃsakaḥ . trirātram, gaṇarātram . pātrādyadantaiḥ—anusārataḥ . pātrādyadantaiḥ kṛtaḥ samāhāradviguḥ śiṣṭaprayogagamyaḥ .. 25 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.026ab dvandvaikatvāvyayībhāvau pathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayātparaḥ .
AK.03.05.026cd ṣaṣṭhyāśchāyā bahūnāṃ cedvicchāyaṃ saṃhatau sabhā .. 26 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.026>  
dvandvaikatvāvyayībhāvau . dvandvaikatvaṃ samāhāre dvandvasamāsaḥ, avyayībhāvasamāsaśca napuṃsakaliṅgau bhavataḥ . dvandvaikatvaṃ yathā—pāṇipādam, samitkuśam (ku. saṃ. 5. 33) ityādi . avyayībhāvasamāso yathā—yathāśakti, yāvadamitramityādi .. pathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayātparaḥ . saṃkhyāvācipadādavyayācca paraḥ samāsāntaḥ pathaśabdo viśeṣavidhinā avādhito napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . saṃkhyāparo yathā—tripatham, catuṣpathamityādi . avyayātparo yathā—utpatham, satpathamityādi . ṣaṣṭhyāśchāyā—vicchāyam . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣāt paro yaḥ chāyāśabdo bahūnāṃ ced bahūnāṃ chāyā cet napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . atrādāharaṇe—ikṣūṇāṃ chāyā ikṣucchāyam (raghu. 4. 20) . vīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ chāyā vicchāyam .. saṃhatau sabhā . atra sabhāśabdaḥ samūhārthaḥ, śālārthaśca . samūhārthe vartamānaḥ sabhāśabdāntaḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . atrodāharaṇam—strīṇāṃ sabhā strīsabham . strīsamūha ityarthaḥ .. 26 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.026>  
dvandvaikatvāvyayībhāvau . dvandvasyaikatvaṃ samāhārarūpo'rthaḥ . arthe liṅgavidhyasaṃbhavāt tadvācino napuṃsakatvavidhirityavaseyam . tataśca samāhārārthadvandvasamāso'vyayībhāvaśca napuṃsakaliṅgau syātāmityarthaḥ . aśvaśca balīvardaśca aśvabalīvardam . dhavakhadirapalāśam . atra samāhāraḥ samāsārthaḥ . tathā—ʻdvandvaśca prāṇitūryasenāṅgānām (2. 4. 2) iti samāhārārthe dvandvaḥ . pāṇipādam . śirogrīvam . mārdaṅgikapāṇavikam . gajāśvam . gajāroham . aśvārohamityādi samāsārthaikatvād, ekavacanam . ʻsa napuṃsakam (2. 4. 17) ʻavyayībhāvaścö (2. 4. 18) iti ca sūtreṇa avyayībhāvasamāsasya samāhārasyāpi napuṃsakatvam . yathā—adhipīṭham iti . vibhaktyarthe'vyayībhāvaḥ (2. 1. 6) . anvaham iti yathārthe . śākasya mātrā śākaprati iti ʻsupratinā mātrārthe (2. 1. 9) . upakumbhamiti samīpārthe nirmakṣikamityabhāve . ʻhrasvo napuṃsake prātipadikasyö (1. 2. 47) iti hrasvatvam . avyayībhāvasya liṅgavidhānaṃ śabdaśāstre kṛtam . nighaṇṭukāraistu liṅgavidhānaṃ nirmakṣikaṃ mukhamityādau avyayībhāvaviśeṣaṇānāṃ napuṃsakaliṅgānāmeva sādhutvamiti jñāpayitumityavagantavyam ..
pathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayātparaḥ . saṃkhyāvācinaḥ śabdā avyayāśca, kṛtasamāsāntaḥ pathaśabdo napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ . yathā—trayāṇāṃ panthāḥ tripatham . dvayoḥ panthāḥ dvipatham . ʻpathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayādeḥ klībateṣyate (vā. 2. 4. 18) ityatra padamañjarīkāraḥ śivabhakto haradattācāryaḥ—ʻtripathamiti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso'yam. dvigau tu pātrāditvāt siddham iti (padama. pṛ. 61) . avyayāt paro yathā—utpatham . prapatham . duṣpathamityādi . atra ʻkugatiprādayaḵ (2. 2. 18) iti samāsaḥ . na tvavyayaparatve satyeva vipathakāpathaśabdayoḥ bhūvargoktaṃ puṃstvam (1, pṛ. 193) anena virudhyate . na ca vācyam—śṛṅgagrāhikayā bhūvargoktaṃ śabdadvayamapahāya ayaṃ napuṃsakavidhiḥ utpathādiṣvavatiṣṭhata iti .
ʻduradhvastu kadadhvā syād vyadhvau vipathakāpathau .
na striyau stām ..
iti pratāpamārtāṇḍe vipathakāpathaśabdayoḥ napuṃsakaliṅgatvamapyaṅgīkṛtatvāt . ayamatra samādhiḥ—śabdadvayasyāpi prāk puṃliṅgatvamuktam (1, pṛ. 193) . iha tu klābatvamucyata ityubhayaliṅgatvaṃ vipathakāpathayoḥ amarasiṃhanāthenābhipretamiti . ʻpathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayādeḥ klībateṣyate (vā. 2. 4. 18) iti liṅgavidhāyakasūtravirodhastu śeṣakāreṇa parihṛtaḥ—
ʻiha dvaidhaṃ jayādityaḥ pathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayātparam .
napuṃsakamuvācāmuṃ pumāṃsaṃ vāmano'bravīt ..
iti . asyārthaḥ—kṛtasamāsānto'kārāntaḥ pathaśabdaḥ saṃkhyāvācakād avyayācca paraścet taṃ pathaśabdaṃ jayādityo napuṃsakamāha . tathā ca tasya granthaḥ—ʻpathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayāderiti napuṃsakamiti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḵ iti . vāmanastu amuṃ pathaśabdaṃ pumāṃsamāha . tathā ca tasya granthaḥ—ʻsaṃkhyāvyayātpūrvakaśca pathaḥ iti puṃsi prakṛtenānvayaḵ iti . jayādityamatena napuṃsakatvamuktam . bhūvarge tu vāmanamatena puṃliṅgatvamiti na pūrvottaravirodha iti . evaṃ vāmanamatena puṃstvaṃ prāguktam (1, pṛ. 193) . iha tu jayādityamatena klībatvamuktamiti jñeyam . subhūticandrastu prakārāntareṇa virodhaṃ parijahāra . ʻpādaḥ pathaśca mārgaścö iti trikāṇḍaśeṣe darśanāt (pṛ. 9, ślo. 199) pathiparyāyo'dantaśabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ pathaśabdo'pyasti . tathā ca ʻkupathaṃ taṃ vijānīyāt iti mahābhārataprayogaśca (13. 637. 6) . tathā ca viruddhaḥ patho vipathaḥ iti pathaśabdenaiva vigrahe puṃliṅgatvameva . yathā pathin śabdenaiva vigṛhya samāsāntavidhiḥ tathā ʻpathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayādeḵ iti napuṃsakatvamiti . saṃkhyāvyayāderiti kim? rājapathaḥ . janapathaḥ . ghaṇṭāpathaḥ . kṛtasamāsāntagrahaṇaṃ kim? apanthāḥ, supanthāḥ iti ..
ṣaṣṭhyāśchāyā—vicchāyam . atra ṣaṣṭhyā iti padaṃ ʻkanthośīnaranāmasü (ślo. 28) ityetadantamadhikriyate . ṣaṣṭhīvibhaktyantapūrvapadāt paro yaḥ chāyāśabdaḥ tadantaḥ tatpuruṣasamāso napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ sā chāyā bahūnāṃ saṃbandhinī bhavati cet . ʻchāyā bāhulye iti (2. 4. 22) sūtrāmūlametat . atra svayamevodāharati . vīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ chāyā vicchāyamiti . evaṃ śalabhacchāyamityādi . ʻaprabodhāya suṣvāpa gṛdhracchāye varūthinī iti kālidāsaḥ (raghu. 12. 50) . kuḍyasya chāyā ityādau chāyāyā ekamātrasaṃbandhitve ʻvibhāṣā senāsurācchāyāśālāniśānām (2. 4. 25) iti vikalpena strīliṅgatvamapi syāt . tannivṛttyarthaṃ bahūnāmityuktam . ṣaṣṭhyā iti kim? śuddhā cāsau chāyā ca śuddhacchāyā . bahvarthavacanaṣaṣṭhyantapūrvapadatve'pi uttarapadārthavivakṣāyāṃ napuṃsakatvaṃ nāstīti subhūticandraḥ .. saṃhatau sabhā . sabhāśabdaḥ śālāvacanaḥ, samūhavacanaśca . tatra samūhavācī sabhāśabdāntaḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣasamāso napuṃsakaligaḥ . yathā—strīṇāṃ sabhā strīsabham, strīsaṃghāta ityarthaḥ . ʻaśālā cö (2. 4. 24) iti, sūtreṇa napuṃsakatvam . saṃhatāviti kim? anāthasabhā, anāthaśāletyarthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyā iti kim? śuddhā cāsau sabhā ca śuddhasabhā .. 26 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.026>  
dvandvaikatvāvyayībhāvau . samāhāradvandvaśca avyayībhāvaśca napuṃsakau . yathā—pāṇipādam, tiṣṭhadgu .. pathaḥ saṃkhyāvyayātparaḥ . saṃkhyāyā avyayebhyaśca paraḥ pathaśabdo napuṃsakaḥ . yathā—tripatham . utpatham .. ṣaṣṭhyāśchāyā—vicchāyam . bahusaṃbandhi syāccet ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣāt paraḥ chāyāśabdo napuṃsakaḥ . vicchāyamiti tadudāharaṇam . vīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ chāyā vicchāyam . avahusaṃbandhi cenna bhavati . vṛkṣasya chāyā vṛkṣacchāyā iti .. saṃhatau sabhā . saṃhatirarthaścet ṣaṣṭhyāḥ paraḥ sabhāśabdo napuṃsakaḥ . dāsīnāṃ sabhā dāsīsabham . śālārthe na bhavati . dāsyāḥ sabhā dāsīsabhā . dāsīśāletyarthaḥ .. 26 . </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.027ab śālārthāpi parā rājāmanuṣyārthādarājakāt .
AK.03.05.027cd dāsīsabhaṃ nṛpasabhaṃ rakṣaḥsabhamimā diśaḥ .. 27 .. 
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.027>  
śālārthāpi—arājakāt . arājakād rājaśabdavarjitād rājāmanuṣyārthād rājaparyāyād amanuṣyād rakṣaḥpiśācaparyāyācca parā śālārthā sabhā, apiśabdāt samūhārthāpi ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣe sati napuṃsakaliṅge vartate . nṛpāṇāṃ sabhā saṃhatiḥ śālā vā nṛpasabham . atrodāharaṇāni svayameva darśayati—dāsīsabham—imā diśaḥ . dāsīsabhamiti ʻsaṃhatau sabhȫ (ślo. 26) ityasyodāharaṇam . nṛpasabhamiti rājaparyāyasyodāharaṇam . rakṣaḥsabhamiti amanuṣyārthasyodāharaṇam .. imā diśa iti imānyudāharaṇānītyarthaḥ .. 27 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.027>  
śālārthāpi—arājakāt . arājakād rājaśabdavarjitād rājārthād rājaparyāyād amanuṣyārthād rakṣaḥpiśācaparyāyācca parā sabhā śālārthā, apiśabdād aśālārthāpi, tadantaḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣasamāso napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . ʻsabhā rājāmanuṣyapūrvȫ (2. 4. 23) iti sūtreṇa napuṃsakatvam . ʻatrāmanuṣyaśabdo rakṣaḥpiśāceṣu rūḍhaḵ iti kāśikā (1, pṛ. 132) . atra vedabhāṣyakartā haradattācāryaḥ—ʻtatra pūrvasūtreṇa rājāmanuṣyapūrvatve śālāvacanasyāpi bhaviṣyati; ʻaśālā cö ityatra tu aśālāvacanatve rājāmanuṣyapūrvatvābhāve'pīti (padama. pṛ. 63) . atrodāharaṇāni svayameva darśayati—dāsīsabhaṃ—imā diśaḥ . atra dāsīsabhamityetat ʻsaṃhatau sabhȫ (ślo. 26) ityasyodāharaṇam . nṛpasabhamityetad rājavyatiriktarājaparyāyottarasya . rakṣaḥsabhamityetadamanuṣyottarasya . ʻaśālā cö (2. 4. 24) iti niṣedhād dāsīsabhaṃ dāsīsamūhamityarthaḥ . nṛpāṇāṃ saṃhatiḥ śālā ca nṛpasabham . rājapūrvasya tu ʻnābhī rājasabhāpi cö iti strīliṅgatvamuktam (pṛ. 678, ślo. 9) . tasmād arājakādityuktam . atra rājaśabdena rājaparyāyāṇāmeva grahaṇam . na tu tadviśeṣāṇām . tena brahmaguptasabhā, hariścandrasabhā ityādau strīliṅgatvameva . amanuṣyāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ saṃhatiḥ śālā vā rakṣaḥsabham . imā diśaḥ udāharaṇaprakārā ityarthaḥ . tata udāharaṇāntarāṇyapi unneyānīti bhāvaḥ . yathā—strīṇāṃ samūhaḥ strīsabham, īśvarasabham, rākṣasasabham, piśācasabhamityādi . ṣaṣṭhyā iti kim? dāsīpradhānā sabhā dāsīsabhā iti .. 27 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.027>  
śālārthāpi—imā diśaḥ . rājaśabdavarjitarājārthakebhyaḥ amanuṣyārthakebhyaśca ṣaṣṭhyāḥ paraḥ sabhāśabdaḥ saṃhatiśālārthayoḥ napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . rājārthaṣaṣṭhyāḥ udāharaṇam—nṛpasabhamiti . nṛpāṇāṃ saṃhatiḥ śālā cetyarthaḥ . rakṣaḥsabhamiti amanuṣyārthaṣaṣṭhyā udārahaṇam . rakṣasāṃ saṃhatiḥ śālā cetyarthaḥ . amanuṣyaśabdo rūḍhyā rakṣaḥpiśācādivacanaḥ . anyatra tu ʻsyāt sudharmā devasabhȫ iti (1, pṛ. 34) .. 27 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.028ab upajñopakramāntaśca tadāditvaprakāśane .
AK.03.05.028cd kopajñakopakramādi kanthośīnaranāmasu .. 28 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.028>  
upajñopakrama—prakāśane . ādyaṃ jñānamupajñā . upakramyata ityupakramaḥ . imāvantau yasya samāsasya sa upajñopakramāntaḥ . tadāditvaprakāśane—tayoḥ upajñopakramayoḥ āditvaprakāśane upajñeyasya upakramyārthasya ca prakāśane dyotye sati napuṃsakaṃ bhavati . udāharaṇe svayameva darśayati—kopajñakopakramādi iti . kasya brahmaṇaḥ upajñā kopajñam vedaḥ . kasya brahmaṇaḥ upakramaḥ kopakramaṃ sargaḥ . ādigrahaṇāt prācetasopajñaṃ rāmāyaṇamityādi .. kanthośīnaranāmasu . uśīnaradeśe yā kanthā ṣaṣṭhyāḥ parā tadantaḥ samāsaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . atrodāharaṇe—suśamasyāpatyāni sauśamayaḥ . teṣāṃ kanthā sauśamikantham .. 28 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.028>  
upajñopakrama—prakāśane . atrāpyupadeśamantareṇa prāgbhavīyasaṃskārādinā svenaiva upajñāyata ityupajñā, svayameva pratibhātaṃ vastu . upakramyata ityupakramaḥ . anyopadeśaṃ vinā svata eva prakrāntaṃ vastu . anayorarthayoḥ abhidhāyakau upajñopakramaśabdāntau yasya ṣaṣṭhīsamāsasya asau upajñātaḥ upakrāntaśca . tayoḥ upajñopakramayoḥ āditve prāthamye gamyamāne napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati . taduktam—ʻupajñopapakramaṃ tadādyācikhyāsāyām (2. 4. 21) iti .. svayamevodāharati—kopajñakopakramādi . kasya brahmaṇaḥ upajñā kopajñaṃ vedaḥ . kasya brahmaṇaḥ upakramaṇaṃ kopakramaṃ sargaḥ . ādiśabdāt ʻprācetasopajñaṃ rāmāyaṇam (raghu. 15. 63) . manūpajñaṃ lokavyavahāraḥ . nandasya upakramāḥ nandopakramāṇi mānāni . ʻtiryañcamapyañca mṛṣānabhijñarasajñatopajñasamajñamajñam iti naiṣadhakāvye (3. 64) . ʻrāmopakramamācakhyau rakṣaḥparibhavaṃ navam iti kālidāsaḥ (raghu. 12. 42) . tadāditvaprakāśane iti kim? devadattopajño granthārthaḥ . yajñadattopakramaḥ svādhyāyaḥ iti . atra kriyāsaṃbandhamātrasya vivakṣitatvāt tadāditvaprakāśanamavivakṣitam . ṣaṣṭhyā ityeva tvadupakramaḥ madupakramaḥ ityatra viśeṣaṇasamāse puṃliṅgatvameva ..
kanthośīnaranāmasu . uśīnaro nāma deśaviśeṣaḥ . tatpratibaddhā grāmā api uśīnaranāmasaṃjñāḥ . uśīnarāśca nāma ceti bahuvacanānupapatteḥ . ayamarthaḥ kanthāśabdāntaḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ syāt, saṃjñāyāṃ viṣaye sā cet kanthā uśīnareṣu uśīnarākhye deśe bhavati . tathā ʻsaṃjñāyāṃ kanthośīnareṣü (2. 4. 20) iti napuṃsakatvam . yathā—sauśamikantham . āhvarakantham iti . suśamasyāpatyāni sauśamayaḥ, teṣāṃ kanthā iti śabdasādhutvārthaṃ vyutpattimātrakathanam . vastutastu—kanthāviśeṣasyeyaṃ prasiddhā saṃjñā . evam āhvarakantham . uśīnareṣviti kim? dākṣeriti prasiddhastha kasyacit deśāntarabhavā kanthā dākṣikantheti saṃjñayā prasiddhā, tatra mā bhūt . nāmnīti kim? uśīnaradeśeṣveva, variṇānāṃ kanthā iti yogavaśādeva variṇakantheti prayujyate . tatra napuṃsakanvaṃ mā bhūt iti .. 28 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.028>  
upajñopakrama—prakāśane . upajñāyata ityupajñā . upakramyata ityupakramaḥ . upajñopakramayoḥ prāthamye gamyamāne tadantāḥ tatpuruṣā napuṃsakaliṅgāḥ . kopajñakopakramādi iti tadudāharaṇam . kasya brahmaṇaḥ upajñā kopajñaṃ, kopakramaṃ vā sṛṣṭiḥ . vālmīkyupajñaṃ vālmīkyupakramaṃ vā ślokaḥ . prāthamyāgamye cenna bhavati . devadattopajñā devadattopakramo vā taṭākasnānam .. kanthośīnaranāmasu . kanthāntraḥ tatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ, sa ced uśīnaradeśotpannāyāḥ kanthāyāḥ saṃjñā . sauśamikantham . āhlikantham . uśīnaragrahaṇadatra na bhavati—dākṣikanthā . nāmagrahaṇādatra na bhavati—caitrakanthā .. 28 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.029ab bhāve naṇakacidbhyo'nye samūhe bhāvakarmaṇo .
AK.03.05.029cd adantapratyayāḥ puṇyasudinābhyāṃ tvahaḥ paraḥ .. 29 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.029>  
bhāve naṇakacit—adantapratyayāḥ . adantapratyayā ye bhāvārthe vihitāḥ naṇakacidbhyo'nye napratyayaṇapratyayakapratyaya-cakārānubandhakapratyayebhyaḥ itare kṛtsaṃjñakāḥ, ye ca samūhārthe bhāvakarmaṇoścārthe vihitāḥ taddhitasaṃjñakāḥ, te'dantapratyayā napuṃsakaliṅgā bhavanti . atrodāharaṇāni—sāṃrāviṇaṃ vartate . samantād rāvo vartata ityarthaḥ . sāṃkūṭinaṃ vartate . bhikṣāṇāṃ samūho bhaikṣam . bhāvakarmaṇoryathā—brāhmaṇasya bhāvaḥ karma vā brāhmaṇyam ityādi . puṇyasudinābhyāmahaḥparam . puṇyaṃ ca sudinaṃ ca puṇyasudine . tābhyāṃ paramuttarabhūtam ahariti padaṃ kṛtasamāsāntaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati . atra sudinaśabdaḥ śobhanavacanaḥ . udāharaṇe—puṇyāham, sudināhamiti .. 29 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.029>  
bhāve naṇakacit—adantapratyayāḥ . atra naṇakacidbhyaḥ ityupalakṣaṇam . tataśca napratyayaṇapratyayakapratyayacakārānubandhapratyayebhyaḥ strīliṅgapuṃliṅgaprakaraṇoktaghañabādhitapratyayebhyaścānye ye dhātvarthalakṣaṇabhāvārthavihitāḥ kṛtsaṃjñakāḥ, ye ca samūhādyarthatraye vihitāḥ taddhitasaṃjñakāḥ adantapratyayāḥ te tadantāḥ śabdāḥ napuṃsakaliṅgā bhavanti . tatra bhāvamātre yathā—samantato rāvaṇamiti vigrahe, ʻru śabde iti saṃpūrvaḥ, ʻabhividhau bhāva inuṇ (3. 3. 44) iti inuṇpratyayaḥ . tadantāt svārthe ʻaṇinuṇaḵ (5. 4. 15) ityaṇ . ʻnastaddhite (6. 4. 144) iti prāptasya ṭilopasya, ʻinaṇyanapatye (6. 4. 164) iti prakṛtibhāvāt pratiṣedhaḥ . evaṃ sāṃrāviṇam . evaṃ sāṃkoṭinam iti . tathā ʻbhuvo bhāve iti kyap pratyaye brahmabhūyam, devabhūyam ityādi . tathā ʻnapuṃsake bhāve ktaḵ (3. 3.114) iti bhāve ktapratyaye hasitam, jalpitam ityādi . ʻyajayāca . . . (3. 3. 90) ityādinā vihitanaṅpratyayāntānāṃ svapnayajñapraśnādīnāṃ, ʻnau ṇa cö (3. 3. 60) iti ṇapratyayāntasya, ghañarthe kapratyayāntānāṃ (vā. 3. 3. 58) ākhūtthādīnāṃ cakārānubandhapratyayānāṃ cayajayādīnāmanyeṣāṃ copalakṣaṇaprasaktaghañādipratyayāntānāṃ pākādīnāṃ ca bhāvavihitakṛtpratyayāntatve satyapi paryudāsasāmarthyāt teṣāṃ napuṃsakatvaṃ na bhavati .
samūhe yathā—bhikṣāṇāṃ samūho bhaikṣam . ʻbhikṣādibhyo'ṇ (4. 2. 38) iti . yuvatīnāṃ samūho yauvatamiti . bhikṣādiṣu pāṭhasāmarthyādeva puṃvadbhāvo nāstīti kāśikā (1, pṛ. 309) . mahābhāṣye tu—ʻbhasyāḍhe taddhite (vā. 6. 3. 35) iti puṃvadbhāve, ʻprakṛtyāke rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḵ (vā. 7. 1. 1) iti prakṛtibhāve ṭilopābhāve ca yauvatamityuktam . tathā ca vārttikam—ʻbhikṣādiṣu yuvatigrahaṇānarthakyaṃ puṃvadbhāvasya siddhatvāt iti . tathā ʻgotrokṣoṣṭrobhra. . .  (4. 2. 39) ityādinā vuñpratyaye gargāṇāṃ samūho gārgakam . ukṣṇāṃ samuhaḥ aukṣakam . evaṃ auṣṭrakamityādi . tathā ʻkedārādyañcö (4. 2. 40) iti kaidāryam, kaidārakam ityādi . atra dvitīyabhāvaśabdena pravṛttinimittaṃ vivakṣitam . yathā—gorbhāvo gotvam . ʻtasya bhāvastvatalaü (5. 1. 119) iti tvapratyayaḥ . aśvatvam, ghaṭatvamiti . ʻvarṇadṛḍhādibhyaḥ ṣyañ cö (5. 1. 123) iti ṣyañ . śauklyam, kārṣṇyam, dāḍharym iti . karmavyāpāre yathā—ʻguṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi cö (5. 1. 124) iti ṣyañpratyayaḥ . yathā—rājño bhāvaḥ karma vā rājyam . ādhipatyam . yuvāditvād aṇ pratyayo bhavati (5. 1. 130) . kauśalam, kauśalyam; cāpalam, cāpalyam; paiśunam, paiśunyam ityādyudāhāryam . adantagrahaṇaṃ spaṣṭārtham ..
puṇyasudinābhyāṃ tvahaḥ paraḥ. puṇyasudinābhyāṃ paraḥ kṛtasamāsānto'haḥśabdo napuṃsake . yathā—puṇyaṃ ca tadahaśceti puṇyāham . sudinaṃ ca tadahaśceti sudināham . sudinaśabdaḥ śobhanamātravacanaḥ . tathā—ʻsudināsu sabhāsu kāryametat paricinvīta viśeṣataḥ svayaṃ cö iti prayogaḥ . tathā ca ʻbhavantu sudināhaḥkriyāḵ iti ca . ʻahnāhāntāḵ iti prāguktasya (ślo. 12) apavādo'yam . tathā ca ʻpuṇyasudinābhyāmahnaḥ klībateṣyate (vā. 2. 4. 17) iti napuṃsakatvam .. 29 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.029>  
bhāve naṇakacidbhyo'nye . bhāve vihitā naṇakacidvyatiriktā kṛt pratyayāḥ adantāḥ napuṃsakaliṅgāḥ . ʻabhividhau bhāva inuṇ (3. 3. 44) . ʻaṇinuṇaḵ (5. 4. 15) . samantād rāvaḥ sāṃrāviṇaṃ vartate . ʻbhuvo bhāve (3. 1. 107) iti kyap . brahmaṇo bhāvaḥ brahmabhūyaṃ gataḥ . adantagrahaṇādatra na bhavati—saṃdhiḥ, vyavadhiḥ iti .. samūhe—adantapratyayāḥ . samūhe ca bhāvakarmaṇośca vihitāḥ taddhitapratyayāntāḥ napuṃsakāḥ . samūhe yathā—kākānāṃ samūhaḥ kākam . bhaikṣam . aukṣakam . kaidāryam . kāvacikam . adantagrahaṇādatra na bhavati—khalānāṃ samūhaḥ khalinī . bhāvakarmaṇoryathā—śuklasya bhāvaḥ karma vā śauklyam . mārdavam . mānojñakam . brahmatvam . adantagrahaṇādatra na bhavati—pṛthorbhāvaḥ prathimā .. puṇyasudinābhyāṃ tvahaḥ paraḥ . puṇyasudinābhyāṃ paraḥ ahaḥśabdo napuṃsakaḥ . puṇyamahaḥ puṇyāham . sudinamahaḥ sudināham . ʻsudinaṃ śobanārthe syād durdinaṃ tadviparyaye .. 29 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

AK.03.05.030ab kriyāvyayānāṃ bhedakānyekatve'pyukthatoṭake .
AK.03.05.030cd cocaṃ picchaṃ gṛhasthūṇaṃ tirīṭaṃ marmayojane .. 30 ..
<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.030>  
kriyāvyaya—ekatve'pi . kriyāviśeṣaṇāni avyayaviśeṣaṇāni ca . apiśabdāt kriyāvyayāśca napuṃsakaliṅgā bhavanti . tānyekatve ekavacane vartante . kriyāviśeṣaṇāni yathā—śobhanaṃ pacati . mandaṃ pacati . sādhu vadatītyādi . avyayaviśeṣaṇāni yathā—purastādramaṇīyam . prāggantavyam ityādi . kriyāvyayā yathā—pacatirūpam . pacatikalpam . pacatideśyam ityādi . atra kāṃścinnapuṃsakaliṅgān svarūpeṇāha—ukthatoṭake—marmayojane . ukthaṃ sāmaviśeṣaḥ . toṭakaṃ vṛttaviśeṣaḥ . cocaṃ lavaṅgākhyagandhadravyam . uktamekākṣaraṃ chandaḥ . gṛhasthūṇaṃ gṛhastambhaḥ . kirīṭaṃ śiroveṣṭanam . marma saṃdhisthānam . yojanaṃ krośacatuṣṭayam .. 30 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.030>  
kriyāvyaya—ekatve'pi . dhātvarthalakṣaṇakriyāṇām avyayārthasya ca yāni bhedakāni viśeṣaṇāni tadabhidhāyakāni śabdarūpāṇi napuṃsakaliṅgāni ekavacanāni ca bhavantītyarthaḥ . kriyāyā avyayārthasya cāsattvarūpatvena liṅgasaṃkhyābhāvāt tadviśeṣaṇamapi aliṅgasaṃkhyatve prāpte idamārabdham . kriyāviśeṣaṇāni yathā—śobhanaṃ pacati . saṃtataṃ paṭhati . ʻmandaṃ nudati pavanaḵ iti (megha. 1. 10) . avyayaviśeṣaṇāni yathā—nirmalaṃ prātaḥ . śobhanaṃ śvaḥ ityādi . tathā—ʻtiṅaścö (5. 3. 56) iti vartamāne ʻpraśaṃsāyāṃ rūpap (5. 3. 66) . yathā—pacatirūpam, pacatorūpam, pacantirūpam iti . tathā—ʻīṣadasamāptau kalpabdeśyadeśīyaraḵ (5. 3. 67) iti . pacatikalpam, pacataḥkalpam, pacantikalpam iti . atra kāśikā (2, pṛ. 69)—ʻkriyāpradhānamākhyānaṃ bhavati . ekā ca kriyeti rūpap pratyayāntād dvivacanabahuvacane na bhavataḥ . napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ tu bhavati, lokāśrayatvālliṅgasyö iti . atra nyāsaḥ (2, pṛ. 127)—ʻyadi tarhi ekā kriyā, pacataḥ pacantīti dvivacanabahuvacane na bhavataḥ; naitat sādhanāśraye bhaviṣyataḥ . rūpap pratyayāntāttu tiṅantenaivoktatvād na bhaviṣyataḥ, ekavacanaṃ tu bhavati . “ekavacanamutsargataḥ kariṣyati” iti nyāyāt tasyautsargikatvāditi .
atha kānicid napuṃsakāni liṅgāni svarūpeṇa nirdiśati—ukthatoṭake—marma yojanam . ukthaṃ nāma sutyāhe hotrādibhiḥ śaṃsyaḥ sapratigaramṛk samūhaḥ . yathā—ʻājyamukthamavyathayat (tai. saṃ. 4. 4. 2. 1), ʻpra ugamukthamavyathayat (tai. saṃ. 4. 4. 2. 1) ityādi . toṭakaṃ rūpakabhedaḥ, chandobhedo vā . ʻiha toṭakamambudhisaiḥ pramitam ityuktalakṣaṇavṛttaviśeṣaśca . cocaṃ lavaṅgākhyaṃ gandhadravyam . ʻcocaṃ bhuktaphalāvaśeṣaḵ iti candraḥ . tālaphalamityapare . ulbaṃ prāguktalakṣaṇam (1, pṛ. 383) . picchamiti pāṭhe mayūrasya śikhaṇḍaḥ . gṛhasya sthūṇā gṛhasthūṇamiti vigrahe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣasya paraliṅgatvabādhena napuṃsakatvamucyate . vāmanīyaliṅgānuśāsane'pyuktam—ʻūrṇāsthūṇe śaśagṛhapare iti śaśagṛhaśabdābhyāṃ ye ūrṇāsthūṇe śabdau tadantaḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅga ityarthaḥ . tirīṭaṃ veṣṭanam . kirīṭaṃ śiroveṣṭanamiti kecit paṭhanti . śirobhūṣaṇamityaruṇadattaḥ . marma prāṇasaṃcaraṇasthānam . yojanaṃ krośacatuṣṭayam .. 30 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.030>  
kriyāvyaya—ekatve'pi . kriyāviśeṣaṇāni avyayaviśeṣaṇāni ca napuṃsakāni . yathā—stokaṃ pacati . puro ramaṇīyam . ekatve'pītyanena ubhayatraikavacanam . ukthatoṭake—marmayojane . ukthādīni napuṃsakāni . ukthaṃ sāmabhedaḥ . toṭakaṃ vṛttabhedaḥ . ʻiha toṭakamambudhisaiḥ pramitam . cocaṃ nārikelaphalam . uktaṃ vacanam . chandobhedo vā . ʻuktamekākṣaraṃ chandasyuktaṃ syād bhāṣite'pi cö iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 59, ślo. 35) . gṛhasthūṇaṃ gṛhamadhyastambhaḥ . ʻnihraḍü . veśmasthūṇā gṛhasthūṇamulbasthūṇā tu pādikȫ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 162, ślo. 39) . gṛhasya sthūṇā gṛhasthūṇamityevaṃprakāreṇa brahmaṇi caryā brahmacaryam . tirīṭaṃ kirīṭam . marma jīvasthānam . ʻjīvasthānaṃ bhavenmarmö iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 2. 374) . yojanaṃ krośacatuṣṭayam .. 30 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.031>  
rājasūyaṃ—sthālabāhlavam . rājasūyādiśabdā napuṃsakāḥ . rājasūyavājapeyau yajñaviśeṣau . kaveḥ kṛtau kaviviracite gadyapadye vartete . gadyamapādabaddham . padyaṃ pādabaddham . māṇikyaṃ maṇiviśeṣaḥ . bhāṣyaṃ sūtravyākhyānam . sindūraṃ nāgasaṃbhavam . cīraṃ valkalavastram . cīvaraṃ munivāsaḥ . pañjaraṃ pakṣyādivandhanam . lokāyataṃ cārvākatarkaśāstram . haritālaṃ dhātuviśeṣaḥ . vidalaṃ dāḍimaphalakaṇam . sthālaṃ bhojanapātram . bāhlīkaṃ deśabhedaḥ .. 31 .. 
iti napuṃsakaliṅgaśeṣaḥ  </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.031>  
rājasūyaṃ—bāhlakam . rājasūyavājapeyaśabdayoḥ yajñaviśeṣavacanayoḥ puṃliṅgatvena sarvatra prasiddhatvād iha tābhyāmannaviśeṣāveva vivakṣitāviti subodhinīkāraḥ . kaveḥ kṛtau kāvye vartamānau gadyapadyaśabdau napuṃsakaliṅgau . ʻapādaḥ padasaṃtāno gadyam (kāvyādarśaḥ 1. 23) . padyaṃ tu pādabaddham . kavikṛteranyatra tu ʻgadamada. . .  . ityādinā (3. 1. 100) yatpratyaye gadyā vāk, gadyaḥ ślokaḥ, gadyaṃ vacanamiti . tathā—ʻpadamasmin dṛśyam (4. 4. 87) iti yatpratyaye padyā dhūliḥ, padyaḥ kardamaḥ, padyaṃ rajaḥ iti viśeṣyanighnatvameva . maṇiśabdāt praśaṃsāyāṃ kanpratyaye, tataḥ svārthe ṣyañi māṇikyaṃ ratnaviśeṣaḥ . bhāṣyaṃ sūtravyākhyānarūpo granthaḥ . taduktam—
ʻsūtrārtho varṇyate yatra vākyaiḥ sūtrānusāribhiḥ .
svapadāni ca varṇyante bhāṣyaṃ bhāṣyavido viduḥ ..
iti . sindūraṃ strīṇāṃ sīmantaprasādhanārtho raktadravyaviśeṣaḥ . cīraṃ valkalādivastram . ʻadhyāsate cīrabhṛto yathāsvaṃ cirojjhitānyāśramamaṇḍalāni iti raghuvaṃśe (13. 22) . cīvaraṃ jīrṇatyaktavastram . ʻpretacīvaravasā svanograyȫ iti ca tatraiva (raghu. 11. 16) . pañjaraṃ vaṃśaśalākādikṛtaṃ śukaśārikādipalāyanapratibandhanārthaṃ yantram . lokāyataṃ cārvākaśāstram . harītālaṃ haridrāsadṛśavarṇo dhātuviśeṣaḥ . haritālamiti hrasvadvitīyākṣaraśabdastu prāguktaḥ (1, pṛ. 614) . ata eva ʻharitālaṃ harītālam iti śabdabhedaprakāśe dvayamapyuktam . dvidhākṛte mudgamāṣakalāyādidhānye, dvidhākṛte veṇuvetrādau ca vidalaśabdo vartate . ʻvidalaṃ dāḍimabījakaṇaḵ iti subodhinīkāraḥ . sthalaṃ kāṃsyādinirmitaṃ vistṛtaṃ bhojanapātram . ʻsthālānīva pretarājasyö iti māghakāvye (śiśu. 18. 67) . bāhlakaṃ kuṅkumam . bāhlavaṃ deśaviśeṣa iti subodhinīkāraḥ . bāhubhavam . aṅgadādipariṣkārajātaṃ bāhubhavamiti subhūticandraḥ .. 31 ..
iti napuṃsakaliṅgaśeṣaprakaraṇam  </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.031>  
rājasūyaṃ—sthālabāhlikam . rājasūyādibāhlikāntāḥ śabdāḥ napuṃsakāḥ . rājasūyaṃ vājapeyaṃ yajñabhedau . gadyapadye dve kavikṛtī syātām . anyatra gadyā strī . gaditavyetyarthaḥ . padyā śarkarilā pādāhitetyarthaḥ . māṇikyaṃ maṇiḥ . pallyāṃ tu napuṃsakaṃ na . ʻṭaṭṭanī musalī pallī māṇikyā gṛhagodhikȫ iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 150, ślo. 30) . bhāṣyaṃ vivaraṇabhedaḥ . sindūraṃ gatārtham (1, pṛ. 615) . cīracīvare dve vastrabhedau . ʻcīraṃ khaṇḍakamastriyām iti, ʻcīvaraṃ bhikṣusaṃghāṭī ityubhayatra vaijayantī (pṛ. 169, ślo. 130, 128) . pañjaraṃ pakṣinīḍam . ʻpiṭṭagūḍü . lokāyataṃ cārvākamatam . haritālaṃ gatārtham (1. pṛ. 614) haritālī ca gatārthā (?) . ʻharitālī nabhorekhādūrvākhaḍgalatāsu cö iti viśvaḥ (pṛ. 161, ślo. 155) . vidalaṃ ʻmrākuviḍike . ʻvidalaṃ dāru pāṭitam iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 46, ślo. 14) . dāḍimaphalamiti kṣīrasvāmī (pṛ. 353) . sthālaṃ bhojanapātram . bāhlikaṃ kuṅkumam .. 31 ..

AK.03.05.032cd puṃnapuṃsakayoḥ śeṣo'rdharcapiṇyākakaṇṭakāḥ .. 32 ..
AK.03.05.033ab modakastaṇḍakaṣṭaṅkaḥ śāṭakaḥ kharvaṭo'rbudaḥ .

<Amarapadavivrti ><AK.03.05.032-33>  
puṃnapuṃsakayoḥ śeṣaḥ . puṃnapuṃsake prāganuśiṣṭebhyaḥ śiṣṭāḥ ardharcādiśabdāḥ puṃnapuṃsakayoḥ vartante . ke te śabdāḥ—ardharcapiṇyāka—āmalakā naḍaḥ . ṛco'rdhamardharcaḥ . piṇyākaḥ uddhatatailapiṣṭam . kaṇṭakaḥ tīkṣṇāgrasvalpakhadirādyavayavaḥ . modako bhakṣyaviśeṣaḥ . taṇḍakaḥ parikaraḥ . ṭaṅkaḥ pāṣāṇabhedakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ svalpavastram . kharvaṭaḥ catuḥśatagrāmasaṃgrahasthānam . arbudo dantarogaḥ . saṃkhyāviśeṣo vā . pātako brahmahatyādi . udyoga utsāhaḥ . carako vaidyaśāstrabhedaḥ . tamālo vṛkṣabhedaḥ . āmalako dhātrīphalam . naḍaḥ tṛṇaviśeṣaḥ .. 32-3 .. </Amarapadavivrti> 
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.031-32>  
puṃnapuṃsakayoḥ śeṣaḥ . puṃnapuṃsakobhayaliṅgatvena prāganuśiṣeṭebhyaḥ śeṣo vakṣyamāṇo'rdharcādiḥ puṃnapuṃsakayoḥ vartata ityarthaḥ . atra kaścidāha—ʻpuṃnapuṃsakayoḥ ityekameva padaṃ āprakaraṇamadhikriyate . śeṣaśabdo'rdharcādiśabdavad vidheyabhūta eva . upayuktādanyaḥ śeṣaḥ . “śeṣo bahuvrīhiḥ” (2. 2. 23) “śeṣaṃ pūrvavat” ityādau śeṣaśabdasyāpyubhayaliṅgatvadarśanāt iti . tadasaṅgatam .
ʻśeṣo'pradhāne'nantākhye sarparāje'tha śārṅgiṇaḥ .
avatārāntare'patye triṣvanyatropayuktataḥ .
mālyākṣatādidāne tu strī śeṣā ..
iti keśavasvāminā (nānā. saṃ. 1. pṛ. 163, ślo. 1415-16) upayuktād anyasminnarthe triliṅgatvābhidhānāt kevalapuṃnapuṃsakaprakaraṇe śeṣaśabdasya pāṭhāyogād upayuktādanyaḥ ityatrāpi śeṣaśabdasya liṅgaviśeṣaḥ sūtrasthānyaśabdavadeva prākaraṇikaviśeṣyābhiprāyeṇoktaḥ . ihāpi ʻkṛtaḥ kartaryasaṃjñāyām (ślo. 45) iti viśeṣyanighnatvaṃ vakṣyate . ata eva—ʻśeṣān māsān gaṇaya caturo locane mīlayitvȫ iti kālidāsaḥ (megha. 2. 50) . ʻtayā nabhaḥ puṣyatu korakeṇö iti naiṣadhakāvye (3. 114) strīliṅgaprayogo viśeṣyānurodhādeva . ʻsaptarṣihastāvacitāvaśeṣāṇi iti (ku. saṃ. 1. 16) napuṃsake ..
tāneva śabdānāha—ardharcapiṇyāka—āmalakā naḍaḥ . ardhaṃ ṛcaḥ ardharcam, ardharcaḥ . evaṃ tadgaṇapaṭhitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ liṅgadvaye rūpadvayaṃ draṣṭavyam . piṇyākam uddhṛtatailapiṣṭam . kaṇṭako nāma khadirabarbarādivṛkṣāṇāṃ tīkṣṇāgrāvayavaviśeṣaḥ . ʻromāñce kṣudraśatrau ca drumāṅge kaṇṭako'striyām ipi rudraḥ . kaṅkaṭa iti mūrdhanyaprathamopadhāntapāṭhe kaṅkaṭa uracchadaḥ . modako bhakṣyaviśeṣaḥ . taṇṭakaḥ parikaraḥ . daṇḍaka iti dantyavargatṛtīyāditvapāṭhe daṇḍakaḥ samāsaprayogagadyaviśeṣaḥ . ṭaṅkaḥ pāṣāṇadāraṇaḥ . śāṭako'lpavastram . kharvaṭaḥ catuḥśatagrāmajanasaṃgrahasthānamiti subodhinī . grāmajanavāstavyajanopajīvyo grāmaḥ kharvaṭa iti subhūticandraḥ . kharvaṭaḥ pracurakaṇṭakasaṃtāno grāma iti vijñāneśvaraḥ (yā. smṛ. 2. 10. 167) . karpaṭa iti pāṭhe svalpamupasaṃvyānam . karpaṭaḥ kaupīnamityeke . arbudaṃ dantarogaviśeṣaḥ . saṃkhyāviśeṣaśca . pātakaḥ pāpaviśeṣaḥ . udyoga udyamaḥ . carakaṃ vaidyaśāstraviśeṣaḥ . tamālaṃ vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ . āmalakaṃ dhātrī . nalo naḍo vā tṛṇaviśeṣaḥ .. 32-3 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.031-32>  
puṃnapuṃsakayoḥ—āmalakā naḍaḥ . ardharcādayaḥ puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgāḥ . ardharcaḥ ṛco'rdham . piṇyāko gatārthaḥ (pṛ. 231, nānā. 9) . kaṇṭako veṇvādiḥ . ʻveṇau drumāṅge romāñce kṣudraśatrau ca kaṇṭakaḵ iti puṃliṅgādhyāye vaijayantī (pṛ. 240, ślo. 14) . modako laḍḍukaḥ . taṇḍako gṛhadāru . samāsaprāyavacanaṃ vā . ʻtaṇḍako daṇḍakaḵ iti kṣīrasvāmī (pṛ. 354) . ṭaṅko gatārthaḥ (1, pṛ. 640) . śākaṭo nāma pratyayaḥ . tadgrahaṇāt tadantasyaiva grahaṇam . śākasya kṣetraṃ śākaśākaṭam . kharvaṭo grāmabhedaḥ . arbudaḥ saṃkhyābhedaḥ . ʻatha strī koṭirarbude iti koṭisaṃkhyāyāṃ vaijayantī (pṛ. 188, ślo. 29) . ʻdaśakoṭiṣu cārbudam iti daśakoṭau viśvaḥ (pṛ. 79, ślo. 23) . pātako brahmahatyādiḥ . udyogo yatnaḥ . carakaṃ vaidyaśāstram . tamālaṃ tamālapatram . āmalakamāmalakaphalam . naḍo gatārthaḥ (1, pṛ. 316) .. 32-3 .. </Amarapadaparijata>

kuṣṭhaṃ muṇḍaṃ—tāṇḍavam . kuṣṭhādayaḥ puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgāḥ . kuṣṭhaḥ tvagdoṣaḥ . muṇḍaḥ kabandhaḥ . śīdhuḥ madyaviśeṣaḥ . pustaḥ lekhyādikarma . kṣveḍito viṣaviśeṣaḥ . kṣemaḥ kuśalam . kuṭṭimo maṇibaddhabhūmiḥ . saṃgamo nadyādimelanam . śatamānaḥ palaparimitam . hemarūpaṃ vā . arma akṣirogaḥ . śambalaḥ pātheyam . avyayaḥ svarādinipātarūpāḥ cādayaḥ . tāṇḍavo nṛttaviśeṣaḥ .. 34 .. </Amarapadavivrti>
<Amarapadavivarana ><AK.03.05.034>  
kuṣṭhaṃ muṇḍaṃ—tāṇḍavam . kuṣṭhaṃ gandhadravyaviśeṣaḥ . rogaviśeṣaśca . muṇḍaṃ [chinna]mastakam . tadyukte tu vācyaliṅgaḥ . muṇḍo brahmacārī . muṇḍā vidhavā ityādi . śīdhu madyaviśeṣaḥ . pustaṃ pustakam . ʻbustaṃ lekhyakarmavijñānayorapi iti svāmī (pṛ. 354) . kṣveḍitamutsāharjāsahanādaḥ . kṣemaṃ kuśalam . kuṭṭimaṃ maṇipāṣāṇasudhādibandhanena nirvṛttaṃ sthalam . saṃgamaṃ saṃbandhaḥ . nadyādimelaśca . śatamānaṃ palaparimitaṃ rajatam . tacca rajatamānaprastāve yājñavalkyaḥ (yā. smṛ. 1. 13. 364-5)—
ʻdve kṛṣṇale rūpyamāṣo dharaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśaiva te .
śatamānaṃ tu daśabhirdharaṇaiḥ palameva tu ..
iti . arma netrarogaviśeṣaḥ . tasya dviliṅgatve'pi napuṃsakaliṅga eva prayogaprācuryadarśanāt ʻpattanājiraśṛṅgārmö (pṛ. 707) iti kevalanapuṃsakaliṅgamadhye'pi pāṭhaḥ kṛta iti na virodhaḥ . śambalaṃ pātheyam . avyayamaliṅgasaṃkhyaṃ śabdarūpam . taduktam—
ʻsadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu .
vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tadavyayam ..
iti tāṇḍavamuddhatanṛtyam .. 34 .. </Amarapadavivarana>
<Amarapadaparijata><AK.03.05.034>  
kuṣṭhaṃ muṇḍaṃ—tāṇḍavam . kuṣṭho gatārthaḥ (1, pṛ. 394) . muṇḍaṃ śiraḥ . śīdhurgatārthaḥ (1, pṛ. 644) . pustaṃ pustakam . athavā bustamiti māṃsaśaṣkulī . ʻbustaṃ māṃsaśaṣkulī iti kṣīrasvāmī (pṛ. 354) . kṣveḍitaṃ siṃhanādaḥ . ʻpiḍibobbö . kṣemaṃ gatārtham (1, pṛ. 88) . kuṭṭimaṃ nibaddhabhūmiḥ . ʻrāyigaṭṭinanelö . saṃgamaṃ saṅgaḥ . śatamānaṃ palam . ʻśatamānaṃ tu karṣe dve iti vaijayantī (pṛ. 190, ślo. 50) . athavā śatamāne saṃkhyābhedaparimāṇabhede . arma pakṣmamadhyakeśaḥ ʻkoṭireppalü . śambalaṃ pātheyam . ʻpātheyaṃ śambalaṃ matam iti halāyudhaḥ (a. mā. 2. 203) . avyayaṃ svarādiśabdaḥ . tāṇḍavaṃ gatārtham (1, pṛ. 126) .. 34 .. </Amarapadaparijata>
